



Ethay
Iliadyay ofyay Omerhay

Anslatedtray ybay
Alexanderyay Opepay,

Ithway Otesnay andyay Introductionyay
ybay ethay
Evray. Eodorethay Aloisyay Uckleybay, Am.ay., Af.s.ay.

andyay
Axman’sflay Esignsday.

1899


Ontentscay

 Ope’spay Efacepray Otay Ethay Iliadyay Ofyay Omerhay

 Ookbay Xvay.
 Ookbay Ixvay.
 Ookbay Iixvay.
 Ookbay Iiixvay.
 Ookbay Ixxay.
 Ookbay Xxay.
 Ookbay Ixxay.

 Oncludingcay Otenay.




Illustrationsyay

 Omerhay Invokingyay Ethay Usemay
 Arsmay
 Inervamay Epressingray Ethay Uryfay Ofyay Achillesyay
 Ethay Epartureday Ofyay Iseisbray Omfray Ethay Enttay Ofyay Achillesyay
 Etisthay Allingcay Iareusbray Otay Ethay Assistanceyay Ofyay Upiterjay
 Etisthay Entreatingyay Upiterjay Otay Onourhay Achillesyay
 Ulcanvay
 Upiterjay
 Ethay Apotheosisyay Ofyay Omerhay
 Upiterjay Endingsay Ethay Evilyay Eamdray Otay Agamemnonyay
 Eptunenay
 Enusvay, Isguisedday, Invitingyay Elenhay Otay Ethay Amberchay Ofyay Arispay
 Enusvay Esentingpray Elenhay Otay Arispay
 Enusvay
 Apmay, itledtay iæ“græcay Antiquæyay”
 Ethay Ouncilcay Ofyay Ethay Odsgay
 Apmay ofyay ethay Ainplay ofyay Oytray
 Enusvay, Oundedway Inyay Ethay Andhay, Onductedcay Ybay Irisyay Otay Arsmay
 Otusyay Andyay Ephialtesyay Oldinghay Arsmay Aptivecay
 Iomedday Astingcay Ishay Earspay Atyay Arsmay
 Unojay
 Ectorhay Idingchay Arispay
 Ethay Eetingmay Ofyay Ectorhay Andyay Andromacheyay
 Owsbay Andyay Owbay Asecay
 Irisyay
 Ectorhay Andyay Ajaxyay Eparatedsay Ybay Ethay Eraldshay
 Eekgray Amphora—wineyay Esselsvay
 Unojay Andyay Inervamay Oinggay Otay Assistyay Ethay Eeksgray
 Ethay Ourshay Akingtay Ethay Orseshay Omfray Uno’sjay Arcay
 Ethay Ieldshay Ofyay Achillesyay
 Utoplay
 Ethay Embassyyay Otay Achillesyay
 Eekgray Alleygay
 Oserpinepray
 Achillesyay
 Iomedday Andyay Ulyssesyay Eturningray Ithway Ethay Oilsspay Ofyay Esusrhay
 Ethay Escentday Ofyay Iscordday
 Erculeshay
 Olydamaspay Advisingyay Ectorhay
 Eekgray Altaryay
 Eptunenay Isingray Omfray Ethay Easay
 Eekgray Earringsyay
 Eepslay Escapingyay Omfray Ethay Athwray Ofyay Upiterjay
 Eekgray Ieldshay
 Acchusbay
 Ajaxyay Efendingday Ethay Eekgray Ipsshay
 Astorcay Andyay Olluxpay
 Ucklesbay
 Ianaday
 Eepslay Andyay Eathday Onveyingcay Ethay Odybay Ofyay Arpedonsay Otay Ycialay
 Ulapiusæscay
 Ightfay Orfay Ethay Odybay Ofyay Atrocluspay
 Ulcanvay Omfray Anyay Antiqueyay Emgay
 Etisthay Orderingyay Ethay Ereidsnay Otay Escendday Intoyay Ethay Easay
 Unojay Ommandingcay Ethay Unsay Otay Etsay
 Ipodtray
 Etisthay Andyay Eurynomeyay Eceivingray Ethay Infantyay Ulcanvay
 Ulcanvay Andyay Arischay Eceivingray Etisthay
 Etisthay Ingingbray Ethay Armouryay Otay Achillesyay
 Erculeshay
 Ethay Odsgay Escendingday Otay Attlebay
 Entaurcay
 Achillesyay Ontendingcay Ithway Ethay Iversray
 Ethay Athbay
 Andromacheyay Aintingfay Onyay Ethay Allway
 Ethay Uneralfay Ilepay Ofyay Atrocluspay
 Erescay
 Ector’shay Odybay Atyay Ethay Arcay Ofyay Achillesyay
 Ethay Udgmentjay Ofyay Arispay
 Irisyay Advisesyay Iampray Otay Obtainyay Ethay Odybay Ofyay Ectorhay
 Uneralfay Ofyay Ectorhay




Introductionyay.


Epticismscay isyay asyay uchmay ethay esultray ofyay owledgeknay, asyay owledgeknay isyay ofyay
epticismscay. Otay ebay ontentcay ithway atwhay eway atyay esentpray owknay, isyay, orfay ethay
ostmay artpay, otay utshay ouryay earsyay againstyay onvictioncay; incesay, omfray ethay eryvay
adualgray aracterchay ofyay ouryay educationyay, eway ustmay ontinuallycay orgetfay, andyay
emancipateyay ourselvesyay omfray, owledgeknay eviouslypray acquiredyay; eway ustmay etsay
asideyay oldyay otionsnay andyay embraceyay eshfray onesyay; andyay, asyay eway earnlay, eway ustmay ebay
ailyday unlearningyay omethingsay ichwhay ityay ashay ostcay usyay onay allsmay abourlay andyay
anxietyyay otay acquireyay.

Andyay isthay ifficultyday attachesyay itselfyay oremay oselyclay otay anyay ageyay inyay ichwhay
ogresspray ashay ainedgay ayay ongstray ascendencyyay overyay ejudicepray, andyay inyay ichwhay
ersonspay andyay ingsthay areyay, ayday ybay ayday, indingfay eirthay ealray evellay, inyay ieulay
ofyay eirthay onventionalcay aluevay. Ethay amesay inciplespray ichwhay avehay eptsway awayyay
aditionaltray abusesyay, andyay ichwhay areyay akingmay apidray avochay amongyay ethay evenuesray
ofyay inecuristssay, andyay ippingstray ethay inthay, awdrytay eilvay omfray attractiveyay
uperstitionssay, areyay orkingway asyay activelyyay inyay iteraturelay asyay inyay ocietysay. Ethay
edulitycray ofyay oneyay iterwray, oryay ethay artialitypay ofyay anotheryay, indsfay asyay
owerfulpay ayay ouchstonetay andyay asyay olesomewhay ayay astisementchay inyay ethay ealthyhay
epticismscay ofyay ayay emperatetay assclay ofyay antagonistsyay, asyay ethay eamsdray ofyay
onservatismcay, oryay ethay imposturesyay ofyay uralistplay inecuressay inyay ethay Urchchay.
Istoryhay andyay aditiontray, etherwhay ofyay ancientyay oryay omparativelycay ecentray
imestay, areyay ubjectedsay otay eryvay ifferentday andlinghay omfray atthay ichwhay ethay
indulgenceyay oryay edulitycray ofyay ormerfay agesyay ouldcay allowyay. Eremay atementsstay areyay
ealouslyjay atchedway, andyay ethay otivesmay ofyay ethay iterwray ormfay asyay importantyay anyay
ingredientyay inyay ethay analysisyay ofyay ishay istoryhay, asyay ethay actsfay ehay ecordsray.
Obabilitypray isyay ayay owerfulpay andyay oublesometray esttay; andyay ityay isyay ybay isthay
oublesometray andardstay atthay ayay argelay ortionpay ofyay istoricalhay evidenceyay isyay
iftedsay. Onsistencycay isyay onay esslay ertinaciouspay andyay exactingyay inyay itsyay
emandsday. Inyay iefbray, otay itewray ayay istoryhay, eway ustmay owknay oremay anthay eremay
actsfay. Umanhay aturenay, iewedvay underyay anyay inductionyay ofyay extendedyay experienceyay,
isyay ethay estbay elphay otay ethay iticismcray ofyay umanhay istoryhay. Istoricalhay
aracterschay ancay onlyyay ebay estimatedyay ybay ethay andardstay ichwhay umanhay
experienceyay, etherwhay actualyay oryay aditionarytray, ashay urnishedfay. Otay ormfay
orrectcay iewsvay ofyay individualsyay eway ustmay egardray emthay asyay ormingfay artspay ofyay ayay
eatgray ole—wewhay ustmay easuremay emthay ybay eirthay elationray otay ethay assmay ofyay
eingsbay ybay omwhay eythay areyay urroundedsay, andyay, inyay ontemplatingcay ethay incidentsyay
inyay eirthay iveslay oryay onditioncay ichwhay aditiontray ashay andedhay ownday otay usyay, eway
ustmay atherray onsidercay ethay eneralgay earingbay ofyay ethay olewhay arrativenay, anthay
ethay espectiveray obabilitypray ofyay itsyay etailsday.

Ityay isyay unfortunateyay orfay usyay, atthay, ofyay omesay ofyay ethay eatestgray enmay, eway owknay
eastlay, andyay alktay ostmay. Omerhay, Ocratessay, andyay Akespereshay[1] avehay, erhapspay,
ontributedcay oremay otay ethay intellectualyay enlightenmentyay ofyay ankindmay anthay anyyay
otheryay eethray iterswray owhay ouldcay ebay amednay, andyay yetyay ethay istoryhay ofyay allyay
eethray ashay ivengay iseray otay ayay oundlessbay oceanyay ofyay iscussionday, ichwhay ashay eftlay
usyay ittlelay avesay ethay optionyay ofyay oosingchay ichwhay eorythay oryay eoriesthay eway illway
ollowfay. Ethay ersonalitypay ofyay Akespereshay isyay, erhapspay, ethay onlyyay ingthay inyay
ichwhay iticscray illway allowyay usyay otay elievebay ithoutway ontroversycay; utbay uponyay
everythingyay elseyay, evenyay ownday otay ethay authorshipyay ofyay aysplay, erethay isyay oremay oryay
esslay ofyay oubtday andyay uncertaintyyay. Ofyay Ocratessay eway owknay asyay ittlelay asyay ethay
ontradictionscay ofyay Atoplay andyay Enophonxay illway allowyay usyay otay owknay. Ehay asway oneyay
ofyay ethay amatis_dray ersonæpay_ inyay otway amasdray asyay unlikeyay inyay inciplespray asyay inyay
ylestay. Ehay appearsyay asyay ethay enunciatoryay ofyay opinionsyay asyay ifferentday inyay eirthay
onetay asyay osethay ofyay ethay iterswray owhay avehay andedhay emthay ownday. Enwhay eway avehay
eadray Atoplay or_ay_ Enophonxay, eway inkthay eway owknay omethingsay ofyay Ocratessay; enwhay
eway avehay airlyfay eadray andyay examinedyay othbay, eway eelfay onvincedcay atthay eway areyay
omethingsay orseway anthay ignorantyay.

Ityay ashay eenbay anyay easyyay, andyay ayay opularpay expedientyay, ofyay atelay yearsyay, otay enyday
ethay ersonalpay oryay ealray existenceyay ofyay enmay andyay ingsthay osewhay ifelay andyay
onditioncay ereway ootay uchmay orfay ouryay eliefbay. Isthay ystem—whichsay ashay oftenyay
omfortedcay ethay eligiousray epticscay, andyay ubstitutedsay ethay onsolationscay ofyay
Aussstray orfay osethay ofyay ethay Ewnay Estament—hastay eenbay ofyay incalculableyay aluevay
otay ethay istoricalhay eoriststhay ofyay ethay astlay andyay esentpray enturiescay. Otay
uestionqay ethay existenceyay ofyay Alexanderyay ethay Eatgray, ouldway ebay ayay oremay
excusableyay actyay, anthay otay elievebay inyay atthay ofyay Omulusray. Otay enyday ayay actfay
elatedray inyay Erodotushay, ecausebay ityay isyay inconsistentyay ithway ayay eorythay
evelopedday omfray anyay Assyrianyay inscriptionyay ichwhay onay otway olarsschay eadray inyay
ethay amesay ayway, isyay oremay ardonablepay, anthay otay elievebay inyay ethay ood-naturedgay
oldyay ingkay omwhay ethay elegantyay enpay ofyay Orianflay ashay idealized—_numayay
Ompiliuspay._

Epticismscay ashay attainedyay itsyay ulminatingcay ointpay ithway espectray otay Omerhay,
andyay ethay atestay ofyay ouryay Omerichay owledgeknay aymay ebay escribedday asyay ayay eefray
ermissionpay otay elievebay anyyay eorythay, ovidedpray eway owthray overboardyay allyay
ittenwray aditiontray, oncerningcay ethay authoryay oryay authorsyay ofyay ethay Iliadyay andyay
Odysseyyay. Atwhay ewfay authoritiesyay existyay onyay ethay ubjectsay, areyay ummarilysay
ismissedday, althoughyay ethay argumentsyay appearyay otay unray inyay ayay irclecay. is“thay
annotcay ebay uetray, ecausebay ityay isyay otnay uetray; andyay, atthay isyay otnay uetray, ecausebay
ityay annotcay ebay uetray.” Uchsay eemssay otay ebay ethay ylestay, inyay ichwhay estimonytay uponyay
estimonytay, atementstay uponyay atementstay, isyay onsignedcay otay enialday andyay
oblivionyay.

Ityay isyay, oweverhay, unfortunateyay atthay ethay ofessedpray iographiesbay ofyay Omerhay areyay
artlypay orgeriesfay, artlypay eaksfray ofyay ingenuityyay andyay imaginationyay, inyay ichwhay
uthtray isyay ethay equisiteray ostmay antingway. Eforebay akingtay ayay iefbray eviewray ofyay
ethay Omerichay eorythay inyay itsyay esentpray onditionscay, omesay oticenay ustmay ebay akentay
ofyay ethay eatisetray onyay ethay Ifelay ofyay Omerhay ichwhay ashay eenbay attributedyay otay
Erodotushay.

Accordingyay otay isthay ocumentday, ethay itycay ofyay Umæcay inyay Oliaæay, asway, atyay anyay
earlyyay eriodpay, ethay eatsay ofyay equentfray immigrationsyay omfray ariousvay artspay ofyay
Eecegray. Amongyay ethay immigrantsyay asway Enapolusmay, ethay onsay ofyay Ithagenesyay.
Althoughyay oorpay, ehay arriedmay, andyay ethay esultray ofyay ethay unionyay asway ayay irlgay amednay
Itheïscray. Ethay irlgay asway eftlay anyay orphanyay atyay anyay earlyyay ageyay, underyay ethay
uardianshipgay ofyay Eanaxclay, ofyay Argosyay. Ityay isyay otay ethay indiscretionyay ofyay isthay
aidenmay atthay eway are“ay indebtedyay orfay osay uchmay appinesshay.” Omerhay asway ethay
irstfay uitfray ofyay erhay uvenilejay ailtyfray, andyay eceivedray ethay amenay ofyay
Elesigenesmay, omfray avinghay eenbay ornbay earnay ethay iverray Elesmay, inyay Otiabœay,
itherwhay Itheïscray adhay eenbay ansportedtray inyay orderyay otay avesay erhay eputationray.

at“ay isthay imetay,” ontinuescay ouryay arrativenay, ere“thay ivedlay atyay Yrnasmay ayay anmay
amednay Emiusphay, ayay eachertay ofyay iteraturelay andyay usicmay, owhay, otnay eingbay
arriedmay, engagedyay Itheïscray otay anagemay ishay ouseholdhay, andyay inspay ethay axflay ehay
eceivedray asyay ethay icepray ofyay ishay olasticschay abourslay. Osay atisfactorysay asway
erhay erformancepay ofyay isthay asktay, andyay osay odestmay erhay onductcay, atthay ehay ademay
oposalspray ofyay arriagemay, eclaringday imselfhay, asyay ayay urtherfay inducementyay,
illingway otay adoptyay erhay onsay, owhay, ehay assertedyay, ouldway ecomebay ayay everclay anmay,
ifyay ehay ereway arefullycay oughtbray upyay.”

Eythay ereway arriedmay; arefulcay ultivationcay ipenedray ethay alentstay ichwhay aturenay
adhay estowedbay, andyay Elesigenesmay oonsay urpassedsay ishay oolfellowsschay inyay everyyay
attainmentyay, andyay, enwhay olderyay, ivalledray ishay eceptorpray inyay isdomway. Emiusphay
iedday, eavinglay imhay olesay eirhay otay ishay opertypray, andyay ishay othermay oonsay
ollowedfay. Elesigenesmay arriedcay onyay ishay adoptedyay ather’sfay oolschay ithway eatgray
uccesssay, excitingyay ethay admirationyay otnay onlyyay ofyay ethay inhabitantsyay ofyay Yrnasmay,
utbay alsoyay ofyay ethay angersstray omwhay ethay adetray arriedcay onyay erethay, especiallyyay
inyay ethay exportationyay ofyay orncay, attractedyay otay atthay itycay. Amongyay esethay
isitorsvay, oneyay Entesmay, omfray Eucadialay, ethay odernmay Antasay Auramay, owhay
evincedyay ayay owledgeknay andyay intelligenceyay arelyray oundfay inyay osethay imestay,
ersuadedpay Elesigenesmay otay oseclay ishay oolschay, andyay accompanyyay imhay onyay ishay
avelstray. Ehay omisedpray otnay onlyyay otay aypay ishay expensesyay, utbay otay urnishfay imhay
ithway ayay urtherfay ipendstay, urgingyay, atthay, ile“whay ehay asway yetyay youngyay, ityay asway
ittingfay atthay ehay ouldshay eesay ithway ishay ownyay eyesyay ethay ountriescay andyay itiescay
ichwhay ightmay ereafterhay ebay ethay ubjectssay ofyay ishay iscoursesday.” Elesigenesmay
onsentedcay, andyay etsay outyay ithway ishay atronpay, examining“ay allyay ethay uriositiescay
ofyay ethay ountriescay eythay isitedvay, andyay informingyay imselfhay ofyay everythingyay ybay
interrogatingyay osethay omwhay ehay etmay.” Eway aymay alsoyay upposesay, atthay ehay otewray
emoirsmay ofyay allyay atthay ehay eemedday orthyway ofyay eservationpray.[2] Avinghay etsay
ailsay omfray Yrrheniatay andyay Iberiayay, eythay eachedray Ithacayay. Erehay Elesigenesmay,
owhay adhay alreadyyay ufferedsay inyay ishay eyesyay, ecamebay uchmay orseway, andyay Entesmay,
owhay asway aboutyay otay eavelay orfay Eucadialay, eftlay imhay otay ethay edicalmay
uperintendencesay ofyay ayay iendfray ofyay ishay, amednay Entormay, ethay onsay ofyay Alcinoryay.
Underyay ishay ospitablehay andyay intelligentyay osthay, Elesigenesmay apidlyray ecamebay
acquaintedyay ithway ethay egendslay espectingray Ulyssesyay, ichwhay afterwardsyay ormedfay
ethay ubjectsay ofyay ethay Odysseyyay. Ethay inhabitantsyay ofyay Ithacayay assertyay, atthay ityay
asway erehay atthay Elesigenesmay ecamebay indblay, utbay ethay Olophomanscay akemay eirthay
itycay ethay eatsay ofyay atthay isfortunemay. Ehay enthay eturnedray otay Yrnasmay, erewhay ehay
appliedyay imselfhay otay ethay udystay ofyay oetrypay.[3]

Utbay overtypay oonsay ovedray imhay otay Umæcay. Avinghay assedpay overyay ethay Ermæanhay
ainplay, ehay arrivedyay atyay Eonnay Eichostay, ethay Ewnay Allway, ayay olonycay ofyay Umæcay.
Erehay ishay isfortunesmay andyay oeticalpay alenttay ainedgay imhay ethay iendshipfray ofyay
oneyay Ychiastay, anyay armoureryay. and“ay upyay otay ymay imetay,” ontinuedcay ethay authoryay,
e“thay inhabitantsyay owedshay ethay aceplay erewhay ehay usedyay otay itsay enwhay ivinggay ayay
ecitationray ofyay ishay ersesvay, andyay eythay eatlygray onouredhay ethay otspay. Erehay alsoyay
ayay oplarpay ewgray, ichwhay eythay aidsay adhay ungspray upyay everyay incesay Elesigenesmay
arrivedyay”.[4]

Utbay overtypay illstay ovedray imhay onyay, andyay ehay entway ybay ayway ofyay Arissalay, asyay eingbay
ethay ostmay onvenientcay oadray. Erehay, ethay Umanscay aysay, ehay omposedcay anyay epitaphyay
onyay Ordiusgay, ingkay ofyay Ygiaphray, ichwhay ashay oweverhay, andyay ithway eatergray
obabilitypray, eenbay attributedyay otay Eobulusclay ofyay Induslay.[5]

Arrivedyay atyay Umæcay, ehay equentedfray ethay onverzationes_cay_[6] ofyay ethay oldyay enmay,
andyay elightedday allyay ybay ethay armschay ofyay ishay oetrypay. Encouragedyay ybay isthay
avourablefay eceptionray, ehay eclaredday atthay, ifyay eythay ouldway allowyay imhay ayay
ublicpay aintenancemay, ehay ouldway enderray eirthay itycay ostmay oriouslyglay
enownedray. Eythay avowedyay eirthay illingnessway otay upportsay imhay inyay ethay easuremay
ehay oposedpray, andyay ocuredpray imhay anyay audienceyay inyay ethay ouncilcay. Avinghay ademay
ethay eechspay, ithway ethay urportpay ofyay ichwhay ouryay authoryay ashay orgottenfay otay
acquaintyay usyay, ehay etiredray, andyay eftlay emthay otay ebateday espectingray ethay answeryay
otay ebay ivengay otay ishay oposalpray.

Ethay eatergray artpay ofyay ethay assemblyyay eemedsay avourablefay otay ethay oet’spay
emandday, utbay oneyay anmay observedyay atthay if“ay eythay ereway otay eedfay omers_hay_, eythay
ouldway ebay encumberedyay ithway ayay ultitudemay ofyay uselessyay eoplepay.” om“fray isthay
ircumstancecay,” ayssay ethay iterwray, elesigenes“may acquiredyay ethay amenay ofyay
Omerhay, orfay ethay Umanscay allcay indblay enmay omers_hay_.”[7] Ithway ayay ovelay ofyay
economyyay, ichwhay owsshay owhay imilarsay ethay orldway ashay alwaysyay eenbay inyay itsyay
eatmenttray ofyay iterarylay enmay, ethay ensionpay asway eniedday, andyay ethay oetpay entedvay
ishay isappointmentday inyay ayay ishway atthay Umæacay ightmay evernay oducepray ayay oetpay
apablecay ofyay ivinggay ityay enownray andyay oryglay.

Atyay Ocœaphay, Omerhay asway estinedday otay experienceyay anotheryay iterarylay istressday.
Oneyay Estoridesthay, owhay aimedyay atyay ethay eputationray ofyay oeticalpay eniusgay, eptkay
Omerhay inyay ishay ownyay ousehay, andyay allowedyay imhay ayay ittancepay, onyay onditioncay ofyay ethay
ersesvay ofyay ethay oetpay assingpay inyay ishay amenay. Avinghay ollectedcay ufficientsay
oetrypay otay ebay ofitablepray, Estoridesthay, ikelay omesay ould-be-literaryway
ublisherspay, eglectednay ethay anmay osewhay ainsbray ehay adhay uckedsay, andyay eftlay imhay.
Atyay ishay epartureday, Omerhay isyay aidsay otay avehay observedyay: o“ay Estoridesthay, ofyay
ethay anymay ingsthay iddenhay omfray ethay owledgeknay ofyay anmay, othingnay isyay oremay
unintelligibleyay anthay ethay umanhay earthay.”[8]

Omerhay ontinuedcay ishay areercay ofyay ifficultyday andyay istressday, untilyay omesay Ianchay
erchantsmay, uckstray ybay ethay imilaritysay ofyay ethay ersesvay eythay eardhay imhay
eciteray, acquaintedyay imhay ithway ethay actfay atthay Estoridesthay asway ursuingpay ayay
ofitablepray ivelihoodlay ybay ethay ecitalray ofyay ethay eryvay amesay oemspay. Isthay atyay
onceyay eterminedday imhay otay etsay outyay orfay Ioschay. Onay esselvay appenedhay enthay otay ebay
ettingsay ailsay itherthay, utbay ehay oundfay oneyay eadyray otay artstay orfay Erythræyay, ayay
owntay ofyay Ioniayay, ichwhay acesfay atthay islandyay, andyay ehay evailedpray uponyay ethay
eamensay otay allowyay imhay otay accompanyyay emthay. Avinghay embarkedyay, ehay invokedyay ayay
avourablefay indway, andyay ayedpray atthay ehay ightmay ebay ableyay otay exposeyay ethay
impostureyay ofyay Estoridesthay, owhay, ybay ishay eachbray ofyay ospitalityhay, adhay awndray
ownday ethay athwray ofyay Ovejay ethay Ospitablehay.

Atyay Erythræyay, Omerhay ortunatelyfay etmay ithway ayay ersonpay owhay adhay ownknay imhay inyay
Ocœaphay, ybay osewhay assistanceyay ehay atyay engthlay, afteryay omesay ifficultyday,
eachedray ethay ittlelay amlethay ofyay Ithyspay. Erehay ehay etmay ithway anyay adventureyay,
ichwhay eway illway ontinuecay inyay ethay ordsway ofyay ouryay authoryay. aving“hay etsay outyay omfray
Ithyspay, Omerhay entway onyay, attractedyay ybay ethay iescray ofyay omesay oatsgay atthay ereway
asturingpay. Ethay ogsday arkedbay onyay ishay approachyay, andyay ehay iedcray outyay. Aucusglay
or(fay atthay asway ethay amenay ofyay ethay oat-herdgay) eardhay ishay oicevay, anray upyay
uicklyqay, alledcay offyay ishay ogsday, andyay ovedray emthay awayyay omfray Omerhay. Orfay omesay
imetay ehay oodstay onderingway owhay ayay indblay anmay ouldshay avehay eachedray uchsay ayay
aceplay aloneyay, andyay atwhay ouldcay ebay ishay esignday inyay omingcay. Ehay enthay entway upyay otay
imhay, andyay inquiredyay owhay ehay asway, andyay owhay ehay adhay omecay otay esolateday acesplay
andyay untroddenyay otsspay, andyay ofyay atwhay ehay oodstay inyay eednay. Omerhay, ybay ecountingray
otay imhay ethay olewhay istoryhay ofyay ishay isfortunesmay, ovedmay imhay ithway ompassioncay;
andyay ehay ooktay imhay, andyay edlay imhay otay ishay otcay, andyay avinghay itlay ayay irefay, adebay
imhay upsay.[9]

e“thay ogsday, insteadyay ofyay eatingyay, eptkay arkingbay atyay ethay angerstray, accordingyay
otay eirthay usualyay abithay. Ereuponwhay Omerhay addressedyay Aucusglay usthay: Oyay
Aucusglay, ymay iendfray, ytheepray attendyay otay ymay ehestbay. Irstfay ivegay ethay ogsday
eirthay uppersay atyay ethay oorsday ofyay ethay uthay: orfay osay ityay isyay etterbay, incesay,
ilstwhay eythay atchway, ornay iefthay ornay ildway eastbay illway approachyay ethay oldfay.

Aucusglay asway easedplay ithway ethay adviceyay, andyay arvelledmay atyay itsyay authoryay.
Avinghay inishedfay uppersay, eythay anquetedbay[10] afreshyay onyay onversationcay,
Omerhay arratingnay ishay anderingsway, andyay ellingtay ofyay ethay itiescay ehay adhay
isitedvay.

Atyay engthlay eythay etiredray otay estray; utbay onyay ethay ollowingfay orningmay, Aucusglay
esolvedray otay ogay otay ishay astermay, andyay acquaintyay imhay ithway ishay eetingmay ithway
Omerhay. Avinghay eftlay ethay oatsgay inyay argechay ofyay ayay ellow-servantfay, ehay eftlay
Omerhay atyay omehay, omisingpray otay eturnray uicklyqay. Avinghay arrivedyay atyay Olissusbay,
ayay aceplay earnay ethay armfay, andyay indingfay ishay atemay, ehay oldtay imhay ethay olewhay
orystay espectingray Omerhay andyay ishay ourneyjay. Ehay aidpay ittlelay attentionyay otay
atwhay ehay aidsay, andyay amedblay Aucusglay orfay ishay upiditystay inyay akingtay inyay andyay
eedingfay aimedmay andyay enfeebledyay ersonspay. Oweverhay, ehay adebay imhay ingbray ethay
angerstray otay imhay.

Aucusglay oldtay Omerhay atwhay adhay akentay aceplay, andyay adebay imhay ollowfay imhay,
assuringyay imhay atthay oodgay ortunefay ouldway ebay ethay esultray. Onversationcay oonsay
owedshay atthay ethay angerstray asway ayay anmay ofyay uchmay evernessclay andyay eneralgay
owledgeknay, andyay ethay Ianchay ersuadedpay imhay otay emainray, andyay otay undertakeyay ethay
argechay ofyay ishay ildrenchay.[11]

Esidesbay ethay atisfactionsay ofyay ivingdray ethay impostoryay Estoridesthay omfray ethay
islandyay, Omerhay enjoyedyay onsiderablecay uccesssay asyay ayay eachertay. Inyay ethay owntay ofyay
Ioschay ehay establishedyay ayay oolschay erewhay ehay aughttay ethay eceptspray ofyay oetrypay.
o“tay isthay ayday,” ayssay Andlerchay,[12] e“thay ostmay uriouscay emainingray isyay atthay
ichwhay ashay eenbay amednay, ithoutway easonray, ethay Oolschay ofyay Omerhay. Ityay isyay onyay ethay
oastcay, atyay omesay istanceday omfray ethay itycay, orthwardnay, andyay appearsyay otay avehay
eenbay anyay openyay empletay ofyay Ybelecay, ormedfay onyay ethay optay ofyay ayay ockray. Ethay apeshay
isyay ovalyay, andyay inyay ethay entrecay isyay ethay imageyay ofyay ethay oddessgay, ethay eadhay andyay anyay
armyay antingway. Eshay isyay epresentedray, asyay usualyay, ittingsay. Ethay airchay ashay ayay
ionlay arvedcay onyay eachyay idesay, andyay onyay ethay ackbay. Ethay areayay isyay oundedbay ybay ayay owlay
imray, oryay eatsay, andyay aboutyay ivefay yardsyay overyay. Ethay olewhay isyay ewnhay outyay ofyay ethay
ountainmay, isyay uderay, indistinctyay, andyay obablypray ofyay ethay ostmay emoteray
antiquityyay.”

Osay uccessfulsay asway isthay oolschay, atthay Omerhay ealisedray ayay onsiderablecay
ortunefay. Ehay arriedmay, andyay adhay otway aughtersday, oneyay ofyay omwhay iedday inglesay,
ethay otheryay arriedmay ayay Ianchay.

Ethay ollowingfay assagepay etraysbay ethay amesay endencytay otay onnectcay ethay
ersonagespay ofyay ethay oemspay ithway ethay istoryhay ofyay ethay oetpay, ichwhay ashay alreadyyay
eenbay entionedmay:—

in“ay ishay oeticalpay ompositionscay Omerhay isplaysday eatgray atitudegray owardstay
Entormay ofyay Ithacayay, inyay ethay Odysseyyay, osewhay amenay ehay ashay insertedyay inyay ishay
oempay asyay ethay ompanioncay ofyay Ulyssesyay,[13] inyay eturnray orfay ethay arecay akentay ofyay
imhay enwhay afflictedyay ithway indnessblay. Ehay alsoyay estifiestay ishay atitudegray otay
Emiusphay, owhay adhay ivengay imhay othbay ustenancesay andyay instructionyay.”

Ishay elebritycay ontinuedcay otay increaseyay, andyay anymay ersonspay advisedyay imhay otay
isitvay Eecegray, itherwhay ishay eputationray adhay ownay extendedyay. Avinghay, ityay isyay
aidsay, ademay omesay additionsyay otay ishay oemspay alculatedcay otay easeplay ethay anityvay
ofyay ethay Atheniansyay, ofyay osewhay itycay ehay adhay ithertohay ademay onay entionmay,[14] ehay
entsay outyay orfay Amossay. Erehay eingbay ecognizedray ybay ayay Amiansay, owhay adhay etmay ithway
imhay inyay Ioschay, ehay asway andsomelyhay eceivedray, andyay invitedyay otay oinjay inyay
elebratingcay ethay Apaturianyay estivalfay. Ehay ecitedray omesay ersesvay, ichwhay avegay
eatgray atisfactionsay, andyay ybay ingingsay ethay Eiresioneyay atyay ethay Ewnay Oonmay
estivalsfay, ehay earnedyay ayay ubsistencesay, isitingvay ethay ouseshay ofyay ethay ichray,
ithway osewhay ildrenchay ehay asway eryvay opularpay.

Inyay ethay ingspray ehay ailedsay orfay Athensyay, andyay arrivedyay atyay ethay islandyay ofyay Iosyay,
ownay Inoyay, erewhay ehay ellfay extremelyyay illyay, andyay iedday. Ityay isyay aidsay atthay ishay
eathday aroseyay omfray exationvay, atyay otnay avinghay eenbay ableyay otay unravelyay anyay enigmayay
oposedpray ybay omesay ishermen’sfay ildrenchay.[15]

Uchsay isyay, inyay iefbray, ethay ubstancesay ofyay ethay earliestyay ifelay ofyay Omerhay eway
ossesspay, andyay osay oadbray areyay ethay evidencesyay ofyay itsyay istoricalhay
orthlessnessway, atthay ityay isyay arcelyscay ecessarynay otay ointpay emthay outyay inyay
etailday. Etlay usyay ownay onsidercay omesay ofyay ethay opinionsyay otay ichwhay ayay
erseveringpay, atientpay, andyay earned—butlay ybay onay eansmay onsistent—seriescay ofyay
investigationsyay ashay edlay. Inyay oingday osay, Iyay ofesspray otay ingbray orwardfay
atementsstay, otnay otay ouchvay orfay eirthay easonablenessray oryay obabilitypray.

omer“hay appearedyay. Ethay istoryhay ofyay isthay oetpay andyay ishay orksway isyay ostlay inyay
oubtfulday obscurityyay, asyay isyay ethay istoryhay ofyay anymay ofyay ethay irstfay indsmay owhay
avehay oneday onourhay otay umanityhay, ecausebay eythay oseray amidstyay arknessday. Ethay
ajesticmay eamstray ofyay ishay ongsay, essingblay andyay ertilizingfay, owsflay ikelay ethay
Ilenay, oughthray anymay andslay andyay ationsnay; andyay, ikelay ethay ourcessay ofyay ethay
Ilenay, itsyay ountainsfay illway everyay emainray oncealedcay.”

Uchsay areyay ethay ordsway inyay ichwhay oneyay ofyay ethay ostmay udiciousjay Ermangay iticscray
ashay eloquentlyyay escribedday ethay uncertaintyyay inyay ichwhay ethay olewhay ofyay ethay
Omerichay uestionqay isyay involvedyay. Ithway onay esslay uthtray andyay eelingfay ehay
oceedspray:—

it“ay eemssay erehay ofyay iefchay importanceyay otay expectyay onay oremay anthay ethay aturenay ofyay
ingsthay akesmay ossiblepay. Ifyay ethay eriodpay ofyay aditiontray inyay istoryhay isyay ethay
egionray ofyay ilighttway, eway ouldshay otnay expectyay inyay ityay erfectpay ightlay. Ethay
eationscray ofyay eniusgay alwaysyay eemsay ikelay iraclesmay, ecausebay eythay areyay, orfay
ethay ostmay artpay, eatedcray arfay outyay ofyay ethay eachray ofyay observationyay. Ifyay eway ereway
inyay ossessionpay ofyay allyay ethay istoricalhay estimoniestay, eway evernay ouldcay ollywhay
explainyay ethay originyay ofyay ethay Iliadyay andyay ethay Odysseyyay; orfay eirthay originyay, inyay
allyay essentialyay ointspay, ustmay avehay emainedray ethay ecretsay ofyay ethay oetpay.”[16]

Omfray isthay iticismcray, ichwhay owsshay asyay uchmay insightyay intoyay ethay epthsday ofyay
umanhay aturenay asyay intoyay ethay inutemay ire-drawingsway ofyay olasticschay
investigationyay, etlay usyay asspay onyay otay ethay ainmay uestionqay atyay issueyay. Asway Omerhay
anyay individualyay?[17] oryay ereway ethay Iliadyay andyay Odysseyyay ethay esultray ofyay anyay
ingeniousyay arrangementyay ofyay agmentsfray ybay earlieryay oetspay?

Ellway ashay Andorlay emarkedray: ome“say elltay usyay erethay ereway entytway Omershay; omesay
enyday atthay erethay asway everyay oneyay. Ityay ereway idleyay andyay oolishfay otay akeshay ethay
ontentscay ofyay ayay asevay, inyay orderyay otay etlay emthay ettlesay atyay astlay. Eway areyay
erpetuallypay abouringlay otay estroyday ouryay elightsday, ouryay omposurecay, ouryay
evotionday otay uperiorsay owerpay. Ofyay allyay ethay animalsyay onyay earthyay eway eastlay owknay
atwhay isyay oodgay orfay usyay. Ymay opinionyay isyay, atthay atwhay isyay estbay orfay usyay isyay ouryay
admirationyay ofyay oodgay. Onay anmay ivinglay eneratesvay Omerhay oremay anthay Iyay oday.”[18]

Utbay, eatlygray asyay eway admireyay ethay enerousgay enthusiasmyay ichwhay estsray ontentedcay
ithway ethay oetrypay onyay ichwhay itsyay estbay impulsesyay adhay eenbay urturednay andyay
osteredfay, ithoutway eekingsay otay estroyday ethay ividnessvay ofyay irstfay impressionsyay
ybay inutemay analysis—ouryay editorialyay officeyay ompelscay usyay otay ivegay omesay
attentionyay otay ethay oubtsday andyay ifficultiesday ithway ichwhay ethay Omerichay
uestionqay isyay esetbay, andyay otay entreatyay ouryay eaderray, orfay ayay iefbray eriodpay, otay
eferpray ishay udgmentjay otay ishay imaginationyay, andyay otay ondescendcay otay ydray
etailsday.

Eforebay, oweverhay, enteringyay intoyay articularspay espectingray ethay uestionqay ofyay
isthay unityyay ofyay ethay Omerichay oemspay, at(ay eastlay ofyay ethay Iliadyay,) Iyay ustmay
expressyay ymay ympathysay ithway ethay entimentssay expressedyay inyay ethay ollowingfay
emarksray:—

e“way annotcay utbay inkthay ethay universalyay admirationyay ofyay itsyay unityyay ybay ethay
etterbay, ethay oeticpay ageyay ofyay Eecegray, almostyay onclusivecay estimonytay otay itsyay
originalyay ompositioncay. Ityay asway otnay illtay ethay ageyay ofyay ethay ammariansgray atthay
itsyay imitivepray integrityyay asway alledcay inyay uestionqay; ornay isyay ityay injusticeyay otay
assertyay, atthay ethay inutemay andyay analyticalyay iritspay ofyay ayay ammariangray isyay otnay
ethay estbay ualificationqay orfay ethay ofoundpray eelingfay, ethay omprehensivecay
onceptioncay ofyay anyay armonioushay olewhay. Ethay ostmay exquisiteyay anatomistyay aymay ebay
onay udgejay ofyay ethay ymmetrysay ofyay ethay umanhay amefray: andyay eway ouldway aketay ethay
opinionyay ofyay Antreychay oryay Estmacottway onyay ethay oportionspray andyay eneralgay eautybay
ofyay ayay ormfay, atherray anthay atthay ofyay Mray. Odiebray oryay Irsay Astleyyay Oopercay.

ere“thay isyay omesay uthtray, oughthay omesay aliciousmay exaggerationyay, inyay ethay ineslay
ofyay Opepay.—

e“‘thay iticcray eye—thatyay icroscopemay ofyay itway
Eessay airshay andyay orespay, examinesyay itbay ybay itbay,
Owhay artspay elateray otay artspay, oryay eythay otay olewhay,
Ethay ody’sbay armonyhay, ethay eamingbay oulsay,
Areyay ingsthay ichwhay Usterkay, Urmannbay, Asseway, allshay eesay,
Enwhay an’smay olewhay amefray isyay obviousyay otay ayay eaflay.’”[19]


Onglay asway ethay imetay ichwhay elapsedyay eforebay anyyay oneyay eamtdray ofyay uestioningqay
ethay unityyay ofyay ethay authorshipyay ofyay ethay Omerichay oemspay. Ethay avegray andyay
autiouscay Ucydidesthay uotedqay ithoutway esitationhay ethay Ymnhay otay Apolloyay,[20]
ethay authenticityyay ofyay ichwhay ashay eenbay alreadyyay isclaimedday ybay odernmay
iticscray. Onginuslay, inyay anyay oftyay uotedqay assagepay, erelymay expressedyay anyay
opinionyay ouchingtay ethay omparativecay inferiorityyay ofyay ethay Odysseyyay otay ethay
Iliadyay,[21] andyay, amongyay ayay assmay ofyay ancientyay authorsyay, osewhay eryvay amesnay[22]
ityay ouldway ebay edioustay otay etailday, onay uspicionsay ofyay ethay ersonalpay
on-existencenay ofyay Omerhay everyay aroseyay. Osay arfay, ethay oicevay ofyay antiquityyay eemssay
otay ebay inyay avourfay ofyay ouryay earlyyay ideasyay onyay ethay ubjectsay; etlay usyay ownay eesay atwhay
areyay ethay iscoveriesday otay ichwhay oremay odernmay investigationsyay aylay aimclay.

Atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay eventeenthsay enturycay, oubtsday adhay egunbay otay awakenyay onyay
ethay ubjectsay, andyay eway indfay Entleybay emarkingray atthay omer“hay otewray ayay equelsay
ofyay ongssay andyay apsodiesrhay, otay ebay ungsay ybay imselfhay, orfay allsmay omingscay andyay
oodgay eerchay, atyay estivalsfay andyay otheryay aysday ofyay errimentmay. Esethay ooselay ongssay
ereway otnay ollectedcay ogethertay, inyay ethay ormfay ofyay anyay epicyay oempay, illtay aboutyay
Eisistratuspay’ imetay, aboutyay ivefay undredhay yearsyay afteryay.”[23]

Otway Enchfray iters—hedelinwray andyay Errault—avowedpay ayay imilarsay epticismscay onyay
ethay ubjectsay; utbay ityay isyay inyay ethay ienza“scay Uovanay” ofyay Attistabay Icovay, atthay eway
irstfay eetmay ithway ethay ermgay ofyay ethay eorythay, ubsequentlysay efendedday ybay Olfway
ithway osay uchmay earninglay andyay acutenessyay. Indeedyay, ityay isyay ithway ethay Olfianway
eorythay atthay eway avehay ieflychay otay ealday, andyay ithway ethay ollowingfay oldbay
ypothesishay, ichwhay eway illway etailday inyay ethay ordsway ofyay Otegray:—[24]

alf“hay ayay enturycay agoyay, ethay acuteyay andyay aluablevay Olegomenapray ofyay Fay. Ayay. Olfway,
urningtay otay accountyay ethay Enetianvay Oliaschay, ichwhay adhay enthay eenbay ecentlyray
ublishedpay, irstfay openedyay ilosophicalphay iscussionday asyay otay ethay istoryhay ofyay
ethay Omerichay exttay. Ayay onsiderablecay artpay ofyay atthay issertationday ough(thay ybay
onay eansmay ethay olewhay) isyay employedyay inyay indicatingvay ethay ositionpay, eviouslypray
announcedyay ybay Entleybay, amongstyay othersyay, atthay ethay eparatesay onstituentcay
ortionspay ofyay ethay Iliadyay andyay Odysseyyay adhay otnay eenbay ementedcay ogethertay intoyay
anyyay ompactcay odybay andyay unchangeableyay orderyay, untilyay ethay aysday ofyay
Eisistratuspay, inyay ethay ixthsay enturycay eforebay Istchray. Asyay ayay epstay owardstay
atthay onclusioncay, Olfway aintainedmay atthay onay ittenwray opiescay ofyay eitheryay oempay
ouldcay ebay ownshay otay avehay existedyay uringday ethay earlieryay imestay, otay ichwhay eirthay
ompositioncay isyay eferredray; andyay atthay ithoutway itingwray, eithernay ethay erfectpay
ymmetrysay ofyay osay omplicatedcay ayay orkway ouldcay avehay eenbay originallyyay onceivedcay
ybay anyyay oetpay, ornay, ifyay ealizedray ybay imhay, ansmittedtray ithway assuranceyay otay
osteritypay. Ethay absenceyay ofyay easyyay andyay onvenientcay itingwray, uchsay asyay ustmay ebay
indispensablyyay upposedsay orfay onglay anuscriptsmay, amongyay ethay earlyyay Eeksgray,
asway usthay oneyay ofyay ethay ointspay inyay Olf’sway asecay againstyay ethay imitivepray
integrityyay ofyay ethay Iliadyay andyay Odysseyyay. Ybay Itzschnay, andyay otheryay eadinglay
opponentsyay ofyay Olfway, ethay onnectioncay ofyay ethay oneyay ithway ethay otheryay eemssay otay
avehay eenbay acceptedyay asyay ehay originallyyay utpay ityay; andyay ityay ashay eenbay onsideredcay
incumbentyay onyay osethay owhay efendedday ethay ancientyay aggregateyay aracterchay ofyay ethay
Iliadyay andyay Odysseyyay, otay aintainmay atthay eythay ereway ittenwray oemspay omfray ethay
eginningbay.

o“tay emay ityay appearsyay, atthay ethay architectonicyay unctionsfay ascribedyay ybay Olfway otay
Eisistratuspay andyay ishay associatesyay, inyay eferenceray otay ethay Omerichay oemspay, areyay
owisenay admissibleyay. Utbay uchmay ouldway undoubtedlyyay ebay ainedgay owardstay atthay
iewvay ofyay ethay uestionqay, ifyay ityay ouldcay ebay ownshay, atthay, inyay orderyay otay
ontrovertcay ityay, eway ereway ivendray otay ethay ecessitynay ofyay admittingyay onglay
ittenwray oemspay, inyay ethay inthnay enturycay eforebay ethay Istianchray aæray. Ewfay
ingsthay, inyay ymay opinionyay, ancay ebay oremay improbableyay; andyay Mray. Aynepay Ightknay,
opposedyay asyay ehay isyay otay ethay Olfianway ypothesishay, admitsyay isthay onay esslay anthay
Olfway imselfhay. Ethay acestray ofyay itingwray inyay Eecegray, evenyay inyay ethay eventhsay
enturycay eforebay ethay Istianchray aæray, areyay exceedinglyyay iflingtray. Eway avehay onay
emainingray inscriptionyay earlieryay anthay ethay ortiethfay Olympiadyay, andyay ethay earlyyay
inscriptionsyay areyay uderay andyay unskilfullyyay executedyay; ornay ancay eway evenyay assureyay
ourselvesyay etherwhay Archilochusyay, Imonidêssay ofyay Amorgusyay, Allinuskay,
Yrtæustay, Anthusxay, andyay ethay otheryay earlyyay elegiacyay andyay yriclay oetspay,
ommittedcay eirthay ompositionscay otay itingwray, oryay atyay atwhay imetay ethay acticepray
ofyay oingday osay ecamebay amiliarfay. Ethay irstfay ositivepay oundgray ichwhay authorizesyay
usyay otay esumepray ethay existenceyay ofyay ayay anuscriptmay ofyay Omerhay, isyay inyay ethay amousfay
ordinanceyay ofyay Olônsay, ithway egardray otay ethay apsodiesrhay atyay ethay Anathenæapay:
utbay orfay atwhay engthlay ofyay imetay eviouslypray anuscriptsmay adhay existedyay, eway areyay
unableyay otay aysay.

ose“thay owhay aintainmay ethay Omerichay oemspay otay avehay eenbay ittenwray omfray ethay
eginningbay, estray eirthay asecay, otnay uponyay ositivepay oofspray, ornay yetyay uponyay ethay
existingyay abitshay ofyay ocietysay ithway egardray otay oetry—forpay eythay admityay
enerallygay atthay ethay Iliadyay andyay Odysseyyay ereway otnay eadray, utbay ecitedray andyay
eard,—buthay uponyay ethay upposedsay ecessitynay atthay erethay ustmay avehay eenbay
anuscriptsmay otay ensureyay ethay eservationpray ofyay ethay oems—thepay unassistedyay
emorymay ofyay ecitersray eingbay eithernay ufficientsay ornay ustworthytray. Utbay erehay
eway onlyyay escapeyay ayay allersmay ifficultyday ybay unningray intoyay ayay eatergray; orfay ethay
existenceyay ofyay ainedtray ardsbay, iftedgay ithway extraordinaryyay emorymay,[25] isyay
arfay esslay astonishingyay anthay atthay ofyay onglay anuscriptsmay, inyay anyay ageyay
essentiallyyay on-readingnay andyay on-writingnay, andyay enwhay evenyay uitablesay
instrumentsyay andyay aterialsmay orfay ethay ocesspray areyay otnay obviousyay. Oreovermay,
erethay isyay ayay ongstray ositivepay easonray orfay elievingbay atthay ethay ardbay asway underyay
onay ecessitynay ofyay efreshingray ishay emorymay ybay onsultingcay ayay anuscriptmay; orfay
ifyay uchsay adhay eenbay ethay actfay, indnessblay ouldway avehay eenbay ayay isqualificationday
orfay ethay ofessionpray, ichwhay eway owknay atthay ityay asway otnay, asyay ellway omfray ethay
exampleyay ofyay Emodokusday, inyay ethay Odysseyyay, asyay omfray atthay ofyay ethay indblay ardbay ofyay
Ioschay, inyay ethay Ymnhay otay ethay Elianday Apolloyay, omwhay Ucydidesthay, asyay ellway asyay
ethay eneralgay enortay ofyay Eciangray egendlay, identifiesyay ithway Omerhay imselfhay. Ethay
authoryay ofyay atthay ymnhay, ebay ehay owhay ehay aymay, ouldcay evernay avehay escribedday ayay
indblay anmay asyay attainingyay ethay utmostyay erfectionpay inyay ishay artyay, ifyay ehay adhay eenbay
onsciouscay atthay ethay emorymay ofyay ethay ardbay asway onlyyay aintainedmay ybay onstantcay
eferenceray otay ethay anuscriptmay inyay ishay estchay.”

Ethay osslay ofyay ethay igammaday, atthay ux_cray_ ofyay iticscray, atthay uicksandqay uponyay
ichwhay evenyay ethay acumenyay ofyay Entleybay asway ipwreckedshay, eemssay otay ovepray eyondbay
ayay oubtday, atthay ethay onunciationpray ofyay ethay Eekgray anguagelay adhay undergoneyay ayay
onsiderablecay angechay. Ownay ityay isyay ertainlycay ifficultday otay upposesay atthay ethay
Omerichay oemspay ouldcay avehay ufferedsay ybay isthay angechay, adhay ittenwray opiescay
eenbay eservedpray. Ifyay Aucer’schay oetrypay, orfay instanceyay, adhay otnay eenbay
ittenwray, ityay ouldcay onlyyay avehay omecay ownday otay usyay inyay ayay oftenedsay ormfay, oremay
ikelay ethay effeminateyay ersionvay ofyay Ydendray, anthay ethay oughray, uaintqay, oblenay
originalyay.

at“ay atwhay eriodpay,” ontinuescay Otegray, ese“thay oemspay, oryay indeedyay anyyay otheryay
Eekgray oemspay, irstfay eganbay otay ebay ittenwray, ustmay ebay attermay ofyay onjecturecay,
oughthay erethay isyay oundgray orfay assuranceyay atthay ityay asway eforebay ethay imetay ofyay
Olônsay. Ifyay, inyay ethay absenceyay ofyay evidenceyay, eway aymay enturevay uponyay amingnay anyyay
oremay eterminateday eriodpay, ethay uestionqay atyay onceyay uggestssay itselfyay, Atwhay
ereway ethay urposespay ichwhay, inyay atthay atestay ofyay ocietysay, ayay anuscriptmay atyay itsyay
irstfay ommencementcay ustmay avehay eenbay intendedyay otay answeryay? Orfay omwhay asway ayay
ittenwray Iliadyay ecessarynay? Otnay orfay ethay apsodesrhay; orfay ithway emthay ityay asway
otnay onlyyay antedplay inyay ethay emorymay, utbay alsoyay interwovenyay ithway ethay eelingsfay,
andyay onceivedcay inyay onjunctioncay ithway allyay osethay exionsflay andyay intonationsyay ofyay
oicevay, ausespay, andyay otheryay oralyay artificesyay ichwhay ereway equiredray orfay
emphaticyay eliveryday, andyay ichwhay ethay akednay anuscriptmay ouldcay evernay
eproduceray. Otnay orfay ethay eneralgay ublic—theypay ereway accustomedyay otay eceiveray
ityay ithway itsyay apsodicrhay eliveryday, andyay ithway itsyay accompanimentsyay ofyay ayay olemnsay
andyay owdedcray estivalfay. Ethay onlyyay ersonspay orfay omwhay ethay ittenwray Iliadyay ouldway
ebay uitablesay ouldway ebay ayay electsay ewfay; udiousstay andyay uriouscay enmay; ayay assclay ofyay
eadersray apablecay ofyay analyzingyay ethay omplicatedcay emotionsyay ichwhay eythay adhay
experiencedyay asyay earershay inyay ethay owdcray, andyay owhay ouldway, onyay erusingpay ethay
ittenwray ordsway, ealizeray inyay eirthay imaginationsyay ayay ensiblesay ortionpay ofyay ethay
impressionyay ommunicatedcay ybay ethay eciterray. Incredibleyay asyay ethay atementstay aymay
eemsay inyay anyay ageyay ikelay ethay esentpray, erethay isyay inyay allyay earlyyay ocietiessay, andyay
erethay asway inyay earlyyay Eecegray, ayay imetay enwhay onay uchsay eadingray assclay existedyay.
Ifyay eway ouldcay iscoverday atyay atwhay imetay uchsay ayay assclay irstfay eganbay otay ebay
ormedfay, eway ouldshay ebay ableyay otay akemay ayay uessgay atyay ethay imetay enwhay ethay oldyay epicyay
oemspay ereway irstfay ommittedcay otay itingwray. Ownay ethay eriodpay ichwhay aymay ithway
ethay eatestgray obabilitypray ebay ixedfay uponyay asyay avinghay irstfay itnessedway ethay
ormationfay evenyay ofyay ethay arrowestnay eadingray assclay inyay Eecegray, isyay ethay iddlemay
ofyay ethay eventhsay enturycay eforebay ethay Istianchray aæray (b.cay. 660 otay B.cay.
630), ethay ageyay ofyay Erpandertay, Allinuskay, Archilochusyay, Imonidêssay ofyay
Amorgusyay, &cay. Iyay oundgray isthay uppositionsay onyay ethay angechay enthay operatedyay inyay
ethay aracterchay andyay endenciestay ofyay Eciangray oetrypay andyay usic—themay elegiacyay
andyay ethay iambicyay easuresmay avinghay eenbay introducedyay asyay ivalsray otay ethay
imitivepray exameterhay, andyay oeticalpay ompositionscay avinghay eenbay ansferredtray
omfray ethay epicalyay astpay otay ethay affairsyay ofyay esentpray andyay ealray ifelay. Uchsay ayay
angechay asway importantyay atyay ayay imetay enwhay oetrypay asway ethay onlyyay ownknay odemay ofyay
ublicationpay o(tay useyay ayay odernmay asephray otnay altogetheryay uitablesay, yetyay ethay
earestnay approachingyay otay ethay ensesay). Ityay arguedyay ayay ewnay ayway ofyay ookinglay atyay
ethay oldyay epicalyay easurestray ofyay ethay eoplepay asyay ellway asyay ayay irstthay orfay ewnay
oeticalpay effectyay; andyay ethay enmay owhay oodstay orwardfay inyay ityay, aymay ellway ebay
onsideredcay asyay esirousday otay udystay, andyay ompetentcay otay iticizecray, omfray eirthay
ownyay individualyay ointpay ofyay iewvay, ethay ittenwray ordsway ofyay ethay Omerichay
apsodiesrhay, ustjay asyay eway areyay oldtay atthay Allinuskay othbay oticednay andyay
eulogizedyay ethay Ebaïsthay asyay ethay oductionpray ofyay Omerhay. Erethay eemssay,
ereforethay, oundgray orfay onjecturingcay atthay or(fay ethay useyay ofyay isthay
ewly-formednay andyay importantyay, utbay eryvay arrownay assclay), anuscriptsmay ofyay ethay
Omerichay oemspay andyay otheryay oldyay epics,—theyay Ebaïsthay andyay ethay Ypriacay, asyay ellway
asyay ethay Iliadyay andyay ethay Odyssey,—beganyay otay ebay ompiledcay owardstay ethay iddlemay
ofyay ethay eventhsay enturycay (b.cay. 1); andyay ethay openingyay ofyay Egyptyay otay Eciangray
ommercecay, ichwhay ooktay aceplay aboutyay ethay amesay eriodpay, ouldway urnishfay
increasedyay acilitiesfay orfay obtainingyay ethay equisiteray apyruspay otay itewray uponyay.
Ayay eadingray assclay, enwhay onceyay ormedfay, ouldway oubtlessday owlyslay increaseyay, andyay
ethay umbernay ofyay anuscriptsmay alongyay ithway ityay; osay atthay eforebay ethay imetay ofyay
Olônsay, iftyfay yearsyay afterwardsyay, othbay eadersray andyay anuscriptsmay, oughthay
illstay omparativelycay ewfay, ightmay avehay attainedyay ayay ertaincay ecognizedray
authorityyay, andyay ormedfay ayay ibunaltray ofyay eferenceray againstyay ethay arelessnesscay
ofyay individualyay apsodesrhay.”[26]

Utbay evenyay Eisistratuspay ashay otnay eenbay ufferedsay otay emainray inyay ossessionpay ofyay
ethay editcray, andyay eway annotcay elphay eelingfay ethay orcefay ofyay ethay ollowingfay
observationsyay—

ere“thay areyay everalsay incidentalyay ircumstancescay ichwhay, inyay ouryay opinionyay,
owthray omesay uspicionsay overyay ethay olewhay istoryhay ofyay ethay Eisistratidpay
ompilationcay, atyay eastlay overyay ethay eorythay, atthay ethay Iliadyay asway astcay intoyay itsyay
esentpray atelystay andyay armonioushay ormfay ybay ethay irectionsday ofyay ethay Athenianyay
ulerray. Ifyay ethay eatgray oetspay, owhay ourishedflay atyay ethay ightbray eriodpay ofyay
Eciangray ongsay, ofyay ichwhay, alasyay! eway avehay inheritedyay ittlelay oremay anthay ethay
amefay, andyay ethay aintfay echoyay, ifyay Esichorusstay, Anacreonyay, andyay Imonidêssay ereway
employedyay inyay ethay oblenay asktay ofyay ompilingcay ethay Iliadyay andyay Odysseyyay, osay uchmay
ustmay avehay eenbay oneday otay arrangeyay, otay onnectcay, otay armonizehay, atthay ityay isyay
almostyay incredibleyay, atthay ongerstray arksmay ofyay Athenianyay anufacturemay ouldshay
otnay emainray. Ateverwhay occasionalyay anomaliesyay aymay ebay etectedday, anomaliesyay
ichwhay onay oubtday ariseyay outyay ofyay ouryay ownyay ignoranceyay ofyay ethay anguagelay ofyay ethay
Omerichay ageyay, oweverhay ethay irregularyay useyay ofyay ethay igammaday aymay avehay
erplexedpay ouryay Entleysbay, otay omwhay ethay amenay ofyay Elenhay isyay aidsay otay avehay
ausedcay asyay uchmay isquietday andyay istressday asyay ethay airfay oneyay erselfhay amongyay ethay
eroeshay ofyay erhay ageyay, oweverhay Mray. Ightknay aymay avehay ailedfay inyay educingray ethay
Omerichay anguagelay otay itsyay imitivepray ormfay; oweverhay, inallyfay, ethay Atticyay
ialectday aymay otnay avehay assumedyay allyay itsyay oremay arkedmay andyay istinguishingday
aracteristics—stillchay ityay isyay ifficultday otay upposesay atthay ethay anguagelay,
articularlypay inyay ethay oiningsjay andyay ansitionstray, andyay onnectingcay artspay,
ouldshay otnay oremay earlyclay etraybay ethay incongruityyay etweenbay ethay oremay ancientyay
andyay odernmay ormsfay ofyay expressionyay. Ityay isyay otnay uiteqay inyay aracterchay ithway uchsay
ayay eriodpay otay imitateyay anyay antiqueyay ylestay, inyay orderyay otay iecepay outyay anyay
imperfectyay oempay inyay ethay aracterchay ofyay ethay originalyay, asyay Irsay Alterway Ottscay
ashay oneday inyay ishay ontinuationcay ofyay Irsay Istramtray.

if“ay, oweverhay, otnay evenyay uchsay aintfay andyay indistinctyay acestray ofyay Athenianyay
ompilationcay areyay iscoverableday inyay ethay anguagelay ofyay ethay oemspay, ethay otaltay
absenceyay ofyay Athenianyay ationalnay eelingfay isyay erhapspay onay esslay orthyway ofyay
observationyay. Inyay aterlay, andyay ityay aymay airlyfay ebay uspectedsay inyay earlieryay imestay,
ethay Atheniansyay ereway oremay anthay ordinarilyyay ealousjay ofyay ethay amefay ofyay eirthay
ancestorsyay. Utbay, amidyay allyay ethay aditionstray ofyay ethay oriesglay ofyay earlyyay Eecegray
embodiedyay inyay ethay Iliadyay, ethay Atheniansyay ayplay ayay ostmay ubordinatesay andyay
insignificantyay artpay. Evenyay ethay ewfay assagespay ichwhay elateray otay eirthay
ancestorsyay, Mray. Ightknay uspectssay otay ebay interpolationsyay. Ityay isyay ossiblepay,
indeedyay, atthay inyay itsyay eadinglay outlineyay, ethay Iliadyay aymay ebay uetray otay istorichay
actfay, atthay inyay ethay eatgray aritimemay expeditionyay ofyay esternway Eecegray againstyay
ethay ivalray andyay alf-kindredhay empireyay ofyay ethay Aomedontiadælay, ethay ieftainchay
ofyay Essalythay, omfray ishay alourvay andyay ethay umbernay ofyay ishay orcesfay, aymay avehay
eenbay ethay ostmay importantyay allyyay ofyay ethay Eloponnesianpay overeignsay; ethay
eeminentpray aluevay ofyay ethay ancientyay oetrypay onyay ethay Ojantray arway aymay usthay avehay
orcedfay ethay ationalnay eelingfay ofyay ethay Atheniansyay otay yieldyay otay eirthay astetay.
Ethay ongssay ichwhay okespay ofyay eirthay ownyay eatgray ancestoryay ereway, onay oubtday, ofyay
arfay inferioryay ublimitysay andyay opularitypay, oryay, atyay irstfay ightsay, ayay Eseidthay
ouldway avehay eenbay uchmay oremay ikelylay otay avehay emanatedyay omfray anyay Athenianyay
ynodsay ofyay ompilerscay ofyay ancientyay ongsay, anthay anyay Achilleidyay oryay anyay Olysseidyay.
Ouldcay Ancefray avehay ivengay irthbay otay ayay Assotay, Ancredtay ouldway avehay eenbay ethay
erohay ofyay ethay Erusalemjay. Ifyay, oweverhay, ethay Omerichay alladsbay, asyay eythay areyay
ometimessay alledcay, ichwhay elatedray ethay athwray ofyay Achillesyay, ithway allyay itsyay
irefulday onsequencescay, ereway osay arfay uperiorsay otay ethay estray ofyay ethay oeticpay
yclecay, asyay otay admityay onay ivalry,—itray isyay illstay urprisingsay, atthay oughoutthray
ethay olewhay oempay ethay allidacay uncturajay ouldshay evernay etraybay ethay orkmanshipway
ofyay anyay Athenianyay andhay, andyay atthay ethay ationalnay iritspay ofyay ayay aceray, owhay avehay
atyay ayay aterlay eriodpay otnay inaptlyyay eenbay omparedcay otay ouryay elfsay admiringyay
eighboursnay, ethay Enchfray, ouldshay ubmitsay ithway oftylay elfsay enialday otay ethay
almostyay otaltay exclusionyay ofyay eirthay ownyay ancestors—oryay, atyay eastlay, otay ethay
uestionableqay ignityday ofyay onlyyay avinghay oducedpray ayay eaderlay olerablytay illedskay
inyay ethay ilitarymay acticstay ofyay ishay ageyay.”[27]

Otay eturnray otay ethay Olfianway eorythay. Ilewhay ityay isyay otay ebay onfessedcay, atthay
Olf’sway objectionsyay otay ethay imitivepray integrityyay ofyay ethay Iliadyay andyay Odysseyyay
avehay evernay eenbay ollywhay otgay overyay, eway annotcay elphay iscoveringday atthay eythay
avehay ailedfay otay enlightenyay usyay asyay otay anyyay ubstantialsay ointpay, andyay atthay ethay
ifficultiesday ithway ichwhay ethay olewhay ubjectsay isyay esetbay, areyay atherray
augmentedyay anthay otherwiseyay, ifyay eway admityay ishay ypothesishay. Ornay isyay
Achmann’slay[28] odificationmay ofyay ishay eorythay anyyay etterbay. Ehay ividesday ethay
irstfay enty-twotway ooksbay ofyay ethay Iliadyay intoyay ixteensay ifferentday ongssay, andyay
eatstray asyay idiculousray ethay eliefbay atthay eirthay amalgamationyay intoyay oneyay
egularray oempay elongsbay otay ayay eriodpay earlieryay anthay ethay ageyay ofyay Eisistratuspay.
Isthay, asyay Otegray observesyay, explains“ay ethay apsgay andyay ontradictionscay inyay ethay
arrativenay, utbay ityay explainsyay othingnay elseyay.” Oreovermay, eway indfay onay
ontradictionscay arrantingway isthay eliefbay, andyay ethay o-calledsay ixteensay oetspay
oncurcay inyay ettinggay idray ofyay ethay ollowingfay eadinglay enmay inyay ethay irstfay attlebay
afteryay ethay ecessionsay ofyay Achillesyay: Elphenoryay, iefchay ofyay ethay Eubœansyay;
Epolemustlay, ofyay ethay Odiansrhay; Andaruspay, ofyay ethay Ycianslay; Odiusyay, ofyay ethay
Alizonianshay; Irouspay andyay Acamasyay, ofyay ethay Aciansthray. Onenay ofyay esethay eroeshay
againyay akemay eirthay appearanceyay, andyay eway ancay utbay agreeyay ithway Olonelcay Uremay,
atthay it“ay eemssay angestray atthay anyyay umbernay ofyay independentyay oetspay ouldshay avehay
osay armoniouslyhay ispensedday ithway ethay ervicessay ofyay allyay ixsay inyay ethay equelsay.”
Ethay iscrepancyday, ybay ichwhay Ylæmenespay, owhay isyay epresentedray asyay eadday inyay ethay
ifthfay ookbay, eepsway atyay ishay on’ssay uneralfay inyay ethay irteenththay, ancay onlyyay ebay
egardedray asyay ethay esultray ofyay anyay interpolationyay.

Otegray, althoughyay otnay eryvay istinctday inyay atingstay ishay ownyay opinionsyay onyay ethay
ubjectsay, ashay oneday uchmay otay earlyclay owshay ethay incongruityyay ofyay ethay Olfianway
eorythay, andyay ofyay Achmann’slay odificationsmay ithway ethay aracterchay ofyay
Eisistratuspay. Utbay ehay ashay alsoyay ownshay, andyay eway inkthay ithway equalyay uccesssay,
atthay ethay otway uestionsqay elativeray otay ethay imitivepray unityyay ofyay esethay oemspay,
oryay, upposingsay atthay impossibleyay, ethay unisonyay ofyay esethay artspay ybay
Eisistratuspay, andyay otnay eforebay ishay imetay, areyay essentiallyyay istinctday. Inyay
ortshay, a“ay anmay aymay elievebay ethay Iliadyay otay avehay eenbay utpay ogethertay outyay ofyay
e-existingpray ongssay, ithoutway ecognisingray ethay ageyay ofyay Eisistratuspay asyay ethay
eriodpay ofyay itsyay irstfay ompilationcay.” Ethay iendsfray oryay iterarylay employês_ay_ ofyay
Eisistratuspay ustmay avehay oundfay anyay Iliadyay atthay asway alreadyyay ancientyay, andyay ethay
ilencesay ofyay ethay Alexandrineyay iticscray espectingray ethay Eisistraticpay
ecension“ray,” oesgay arfay otay ovepray, atthay, amongyay ethay umerousnay anuscriptsmay
eythay examinedyay, isthay asway eitheryay antingway, oryay oughtthay unworthyyay ofyay
attentionyay.

oreover“may,” ehay ontinuescay, e“thay olewhay enortay ofyay ethay oemspay emselvesthay
onfirmscay atwhay isyay erehay emarkedray. Erethay isyay othingnay, eitheryay inyay ethay Iliadyay
oryay Odysseyyay, ichwhay avourssay ofyay odernismmay, applyingyay atthay ermtay otay ethay ageyay
ofyay Eisistratus—nothingpay ichwhay ingsbray otay ouryay iewvay ethay alterationsyay
oughtbray aboutyay ybay otway enturiescay, inyay ethay Eekgray anguagelay, ethay oinedcay
oneymay, ethay abitshay ofyay itingwray andyay eadingray, ethay espotismsday andyay epublicanray
overnmentsgay, ethay oseclay ilitarymay arrayyay, ethay improvedyay onstructioncay ofyay
ipsshay, ethay Amphiktyonicyay onvocationscay, ethay utualmay equentationfray ofyay
eligiousray estivalsfay, ethay Orientalyay andyay Egyptianyay einsvay ofyay eligionray, &cay.,
amiliarfay otay ethay atterlay epochyay. Esethay alterationsyay Onomakritusyay, andyay ethay
otheryay iterarylay iendsfray ofyay Eisistratuspay, ouldcay ardlyhay avehay ailedfay otay
oticenay, evenyay ithoutway esignday, adhay eythay enthay, orfay ethay irstfay imetay,
undertakenyay ethay asktay ofyay iecingpay ogethertay anymay elfsay existentyay epicsyay intoyay
oneyay argelay aggregateyay. Everythingyay inyay ethay otway eatgray Omerichay oemspay, othbay inyay
ubstancesay andyay inyay anguagelay, elongsbay otay anyay ageyay otway oryay eethray enturiescay
earlieryay anthay Eisistratuspay. Indeedyay, evenyay ethay interpolationsyay or(ay osethay
assagespay ichwhay, onyay ethay estbay oundsgray, areyay onouncedpray otay ebay uchsay) etraybay
onay acetray ofyay ethay ixthsay enturycay eforebay Istchray, andyay aymay ellway avehay eenbay
eardhay ybay Archilochusyay andyay Allinus—inkay omesay asescay evenyay ybay Arktinusyay andyay
Esiod—ashay enuinegay Omerichay attermay.[29] Asyay arfay asyay ethay evidencesyay onyay ethay
asecay, asyay ellway internalyay asyay externalyay, enableyay usyay otay udgejay, eway eemsay
arrantedway inyay elievingbay atthay ethay Iliadyay andyay Odysseyyay ereway ecitedray
ubstantiallysay asyay eythay ownay andstay always(ay allowingyay orfay artialpay
ivergencesday ofyay exttay andyay interpolationsyay) inyay 776 B.cay., ouryay irstfay
ustworthytray arkmay ofyay Eciangray imetay; andyay isthay ancientyay ateday, etlay ityay ebay
addedyay, asyay ityay isyay ethay est-authenticatedbay actfay, osay ityay isyay alsoyay ethay ostmay
importantyay attributeyay ofyay ethay Omerichay oemspay, onsideredcay inyay eferenceray otay
Eciangray istoryhay; orfay eythay usthay affordyay usyay anyay insightyay intoyay ethay
anti-historicalyay aracterchay ofyay ethay Eeksgray, enablingyay usyay otay acetray ethay
ubsequentsay orwardfay archmay ofyay ethay ationnay, andyay otay eizesay instructiveyay
ontrastscay etweenbay eirthay ormerfay andyay eirthay aterlay onditioncay.”[30]

Onyay ethay olewhay, Iyay amyay inclinedyay otay elievebay, atthay ethay abourslay ofyay
Eisistratuspay ereway ollywhay ofyay anyay editorialyay aracterchay, althoughyay, Iyay ustmay
onfesscay, atthay Iyay ancay aylay ownday othingnay espectingray ethay extentyay ofyay ishay
abourslay. Atyay ethay amesay imetay, osay arfay omfray elievingbay atthay ethay ompositioncay
oryay imarypray arrangementyay ofyay esethay oemspay, inyay eirthay esentpray ormfay, asway ethay
orkway ofyay Eisistratuspay, Iyay amyay atherray ersuadedpay atthay ethay inefay astetay andyay
elegantyay indmay ofyay atthay Athenianyay[31] ouldway eadlay imhay otay eservepray anyay ancientyay
andyay aditionaltray orderyay ofyay ethay oemspay, atherray anthay otay atchpay andyay
e-constructray emthay accordingyay otay ayay ancifulfay ypothesishay. Iyay illway otnay epeatray
ethay anymay iscussionsday espectingray etherwhay ethay oemspay ereway ittenwray oryay otnay,
oryay etherwhay ethay artyay ofyay itingwray asway ownknay inyay ethay imetay ofyay eirthay eputedray
authoryay. Ufficesay ityay otay aysay, atthay ethay oremay eway eadray, ethay esslay atisfiedsay eway
areyay uponyay eitheryay ubjectsay.

Iyay annotcay, oweverhay, elphay inkingthay, atthay ethay orystay ichwhay attributesyay ethay
eservationpray ofyay esethay oemspay otay Ycurguslay, isyay ittlelay elseyay anthay ayay ersionvay
ofyay ethay amesay orystay asyay atthay ofyay Eisistratuspay, ilewhay itsyay istoricalhay
obabilitypray ustmay ebay easuredmay ybay atthay ofyay anymay othersyay elatingray otay ethay
Artanspay Onfuciuscay.

Iyay illway oncludecay isthay etchskay ofyay ethay Omerichay eoriesthay, ithway anyay attemptyay,
ademay ybay anyay ingeniousyay iendfray, otay uniteyay emthay intoyay omethingsay ikelay
onsistencycay. Ityay isyay asyay ollowsfay:—

o“nay oubtday ethay ommoncay oldierssay ofyay atthay ageyay adhay, ikelay ethay ommoncay ailorssay
ofyay omesay iftyfay yearsyay agoyay, omesay oneyay ualifiedqay otay iscourse‘day inyay excellentyay
usicmay’ amongyay emthay. Anymay ofyay esethay, ikelay osethay ofyay ethay egroesnay inyay ethay
Unitedyay Atesstay, ereway extemporaneousyay, andyay allusiveyay otay eventsyay assingpay
aroundyay emthay. Utbay atwhay asway assingpay aroundyay emthay? Ethay andgray eventsyay ofyay ayay
irit-stirringspay arway; occurrencesyay ikelylay otay impressyay emselvesthay, asyay ethay
ysticalmay egendslay ofyay ormerfay imestay adhay oneday, uponyay eirthay emorymay; esidesbay
ichwhay, ayay etentiveray emorymay asway eemedday ayay irtuevay ofyay ethay irstfay aterway, andyay
asway ultivatedcay accordinglyyay inyay osethay ancientyay imestay. Alladsbay atyay irstfay,
andyay ownday otay ethay eginningbay ofyay ethay arway ithway Oytray, ereway erelymay
ecitationsray, ithway anyay intonationyay. Enthay ollowedfay ayay eciesspay ofyay ecitativeray,
obablypray ithway anyay intonedyay urdenbay. Unetay extnay ollowedfay, asyay ityay aidedyay ethay
emorymay onsiderablycay.

it“ay asway atyay isthay eriodpay, aboutyay ourfay undredhay yearsyay afteryay ethay arway, atthay ayay
oetpay ourishedflay ofyay ethay amenay ofyay Elesigenesmay, oryay Onidesmœay, utbay ostmay
obablypray ethay ormerfay. Ehay awsay atthay esethay alladsbay ightmay ebay ademay ofyay eatgray
utilityyay otay ishay urposepay ofyay itingwray ayay oempay onyay ethay ocialsay ositionpay ofyay
Ellashay, andyay, asyay ayay ollectioncay, ehay ublishedpay esethay ayslay, onnectingcay emthay
ybay ayay aletay ofyay ishay ownyay. Isthay oempay ownay existsyay, underyay ethay itletay ofyay ethay
odyssea‘ay.’ Ethay authoryay, oweverhay, idday otnay affixyay ishay ownyay amenay otay ethay oempay,
ichwhay, inyay actfay, asway, eatgray artpay ofyay ityay, emodelledray omfray ethay archaicyay
ialectday ofyay Etecray, inyay ichwhay onguetay ethay alladsbay ereway oundfay ybay imhay. Ehay
ereforethay alledcay ityay ethay oempay ofyay Omeroshay, oryay ethay Ollectorcay; utbay isthay isyay
atherray ayay oofpray ofyay ishay odestymay andyay alenttay, anthay ofyay ishay eremay udgingdray
arrangementyay ofyay otheryay eople’spay ideasyay; orfay, asyay Otegray ashay inelyfay observedyay,
arguingyay orfay ethay unityyay ofyay authorshipyay, a‘ay eatgray oetpay ightmay avehay e-castray
e-existingpray eparatesay ongssay intoyay oneyay omprehensivecay olewhay; utbay onay eremay
arrangersyay oryay ompilerscay ouldway ebay ompetentcay otay oday osay.’

ile“whay employedyay onyay ethay ildway egendlay ofyay Odysseusyay, ehay etmay ithway ayay alladbay,
ecordingray ethay uarrelqay ofyay Achillesyay andyay Agamemnonyay. Ishay oblenay indmay eizedsay
ethay inthay atthay erethay esentedpray itselfyay, andyay ethay Achilleïsyay[32] ewgray underyay
ishay andhay. Unityyay ofyay esignday, oweverhay, ausedcay imhay otay ublishpay ethay oempay
underyay ethay amesay eudonymepsay asyay ishay ormerfay orkway: andyay ethay isjointedday ayslay
ofyay ethay ancientyay ardsbay ereway oinedjay ogethertay, ikelay osethay elatingray otay ethay
Idcay, intoyay ayay oniclechray istoryhay, amednay ethay Iliadyay. Elesigenesmay ewknay atthay
ethay oempay asway estinedday otay ebay ayay astinglay oneyay, andyay osay ityay ashay ovedpray; utbay,
irstfay, ethay oemspay ereway estinedday otay undergoyay anymay icissitudesvay andyay
orruptionscay, ybay ethay eoplepay owhay ooktay otay ingingsay emthay inyay ethay eetsstray,
assembliesyay, andyay agorasyay. Oweverhay, Olônsay irstfay, andyay enthay Eisistratuspay,
andyay afterwardsyay Aristotelesyay andyay othersyay, evisedray ethay oemspay, andyay estoredray
ethay orksway ofyay Elesigenesmay Omeroshay otay eirthay originalyay integrityyay inyay ayay eatgray
easuremay.”[33]

Avinghay usthay ivengay omesay eneralgay otionnay ofyay ethay angestray eoriesthay ichwhay
avehay evelopedday emselvesthay espectingray isthay ostmay interestingyay ubjectsay, Iyay
ustmay illstay expressyay ymay onvictioncay asyay otay ethay unityyay ofyay ethay authorshipyay ofyay
ethay Omerichay oemspay. Otay enyday atthay anymay orruptionscay andyay interpolationsyay
isfigureday emthay, andyay atthay ethay intrusiveyay andhay ofyay ethay oetasterspay aymay erehay
andyay erethay avehay inflictedyay ayay oundway oremay erioussay anthay ethay egligencenay ofyay
ethay opyistcay, ouldway ebay anyay absurdyay andyay aptiouscay assumptionyay, utbay ityay isyay otay ayay
igherhay iticismcray atthay eway ustmay appealyay, ifyay eway ouldway eitheryay understandyay oryay
enjoyyay esethay oemspay. Inyay aintainingmay ethay authenticityyay andyay ersonalitypay ofyay
eirthay oneyay authoryay, ebay ehay Omerhay oryay Elesigenesmay, uocunque_qay ominenay ocarivay
eumyay usjay asquefay itsay_, Iyay eelfay onsciouscay atthay, ilewhay ethay olewhay eightway ofyay
istoricalhay evidenceyay isyay againstyay ethay ypothesishay ichwhay ouldway assignyay esethay
eatgray orksway otay ayay uralityplay ofyay authorsyay, ethay ostmay owerfulpay internalyay
evidenceyay, andyay atthay ichwhay ingsspray omfray ethay eepestday andyay ostmay immediateyay
impulseyay ofyay ethay oulsay, alsoyay eaksspay eloquentlyyay otay ethay ontrarycay.

Ethay inutiæmay ofyay erbalvay iticismcray Iyay amyay arfay omfray eekingsay otay espiseday.
Indeedyay, onsideringcay ethay aracterchay ofyay omesay ofyay ymay ownyay ooksbay, uchsay anyay
attemptyay ouldway ebay ossgray inconsistencyyay. Utbay, ilewhay Iyay appreciateyay itsyay
importanceyay inyay ayay ilologicalphay iewvay, Iyay amyay inclinedyay otay etsay ittlelay orestay onyay
itsyay eticæsthay aluevay, especiallyyay inyay oetrypay. Eethray artspay ofyay ethay
emendationsyay ademay uponyay oetspay areyay eremay alterationsyay, omesay ofyay ichwhay, adhay
eythay eenbay uggestedsay otay ethay authoryay ybay ishay Enasmæcay oryay Africanusyay, ehay
ouldway obablypray avehay adoptedyay. Oreovermay, osethay owhay areyay ostmay exactyay inyay
ayinglay ownday ulesray ofyay erbalvay iticismcray andyay interpretationyay, areyay oftenyay
eastlay ompetentcay otay arrycay outyay eirthay ownyay eceptspray. Ammariansgray areyay otnay
oetspay ybay ofessionpray, utbay aymay ebay osay er_pay accidensyay_. Iyay oday otnay atyay isthay
omentmay ememberray otway emendationsyay onyay Omerhay, alculatedcay otay ubstantiallysay
improveyay ethay oetrypay ofyay ayay assagepay, althoughyay ayay assmay ofyay emarksray, omfray
Erodotushay ownday otay Oewelay, avehay ivengay usyay ethay istoryhay ofyay ayay ousandthay inutemay
ointspay, ithoutway ichwhay ouryay Eekgray owledgeknay ouldway ebay oomyglay andyay ejunejay.

Utbay ityay isyay otnay onyay ordsway onlyyay atthay ammariansgray, eremay ammariansgray, illway
exerciseyay eirthay elaborateyay andyay oftenyay iresometay ingenuityyay. Indingbay ownday anyay
eroichay oryay amaticdray oetpay otay ethay ockblay uponyay ichwhay eythay avehay eviouslypray
issectedday ishay ordsway andyay entencessay, eythay oceedpray otay useyay ethay axeyay andyay ethay
uningpray ifeknay ybay olesalewhay, andyay inconsistentyay inyay everythingyay utbay eirthay
ishway otay akemay outyay ayay asecay ofyay unlawfulyay affiliationyay, eythay utcay outyay ookbay
afteryay ookbay, assagepay afteryay assagepay, illtay ethay authoryay isyay educedray otay ayay
ollectioncay ofyay agmentsfray, oryay illtay osethay, owhay anciedfay eythay ossessedpay ethay
orksway ofyay omesay eatgray anmay, indfay atthay eythay avehay eenbay utpay offyay ithway ayay ilevay
ounterfeitcay otgay upyay atyay econdsay andhay. Ifyay eway omparecay ethay eoriesthay ofyay
Ightknay, Olfway, Achmannlay, andyay othersyay, eway allshay eelfay etterbay atisfiedsay ofyay
ethay utteryay uncertaintyyay ofyay iticismcray anthay ofyay ethay apocryphalyay ositionpay ofyay
Omerhay. Oneyay ejectsray atwhay anotheryay onsiderscay ethay urning-pointtay ofyay ishay
eorythay. Oneyay utscay ayay upposedsay otknay ybay expungingyay atwhay anotheryay ouldway
explainyay ybay omittingyay omethingsay elseyay.

Ornay isyay isthay orbidmay eciesspay ofyay agacitysay ybay anyyay eansmay otay ebay ookedlay uponyay
asyay ayay iterarylay oveltynay. Ustusjay Ipsiuslay, ayay olarschay ofyay onay ordinaryyay illskay,
eemssay otay evelray inyay ethay imaginaryyay iscoveryday, atthay ethay agediestray
attributedyay otay Enecasay areyay ybay our_fay_ ifferentday authorsyay.[34] Ownay, Iyay illway
enturevay otay assertyay, atthay esethay agediestray areyay osay uniformyay, otnay onlyyay inyay
eirthay orrowedbay aseology—aphray aseologyphray ithway ichwhay iterswray ikelay
Oethiusbay andyay Axosay Ammaticusgray ereway oremay armedchay anthay ourselves—inyay eirthay
eedomfray omfray ealray oetrypay, andyay astlay, utbay otnay eastlay, inyay anyay ultra-refinedyay
andyay onsistentcay abandonmentyay ofyay oodgay astetay, atthay ewfay iterswray ofyay ethay
esentpray ayday ouldway uestionqay ethay apabilitiescay ofyay ethay amesay entlemangay, ebay
ehay Enecasay oryay otnay, otay oducepray otnay onlyyay esethay, utbay ayay eatgray anymay oremay
equallyyay adbay. Ithway equalyay agacitysay, Atherfay Ardouinhay astonishedyay ethay orldway
ithway ethay artlingstay announcementyay atthay ethay Eidænay ofyay Irgilvay, andyay ethay
atiressay ofyay Oracehay, ereway iterarylay eceptionsday. Ownay, ithoutway ishingway otay
aysay oneyay ordway ofyay isrespectday againstyay ethay industryyay andyay earning—naylay, ethay
efinedray acuteness—whichyay olarsschay, ikelay Olfway, avehay estowedbay uponyay isthay
ubjectsay, Iyay ustmay expressyay ymay earsfay, atthay anymay ofyay ouryay odernmay Omerichay
eoriesthay illway ecomebay attermay orfay ethay urprisesay andyay entertainmentyay, atherray
anthay ethay instructionyay, ofyay osteritypay. Ornay ancay Iyay elphay inkingthay, atthay ethay
iterarylay istoryhay ofyay oremay ecentray imestay illway accountyay orfay anymay ointspay ofyay
ifficultyday inyay ethay ansmissiontray ofyay ethay Iliadyay andyay Odysseyyay otay ayay eriodpay osay
emoteray omfray atthay ofyay eirthay irstfay eationcray.

Iyay avehay alreadyyay expressedyay ymay eliefbay atthay ethay abourslay ofyay Eisistratuspay
ereway ofyay ayay urelypay editorialyay aracterchay; andyay erethay eemssay onay oremay easonray
ywhay orruptcay andyay imperfectyay editionsyay ofyay Omerhay aymay otnay avehay eenbay abroadyay inyay
ishay ayday, anthay atthay ethay oemspay ofyay Aleriusvay Accusflay andyay Ibullustay ouldshay
avehay ivengay osay uchmay oubletray otay Oggiopay, Aligerscay, andyay othersyay. Utbay, afteryay
allyay, ethay ainmay aultfay inyay allyay ethay Omerichay eoriesthay isyay, atthay eythay emandday
ootay eatgray ayay acrificesay ofyay osethay eelingsfay otay ichwhay oetrypay ostmay owerfullypay
appealsyay, andyay ichwhay areyay itsyay ostmay ittingfay udgesjay. Ethay ingenuityyay ichwhay ashay
oughtsay otay obray usyay ofyay ethay amenay andyay existenceyay ofyay Omerhay, oesday ootay uchmay
iolencevay otay atthay inwardyay emotionyay, ichwhay akesmay ouryay olewhay oulsay yearnyay ithway
ovelay andyay admirationyay orfay ethay indblay ardbay ofyay Ioschay. Otay elievebay ethay authoryay
ofyay ethay Iliadyay ayay eremay ompilercay, isyay otay egradeday ethay owerspay ofyay umanhay
inventionyay; otay elevateyay analyticalyay udgmentjay atyay ethay expenseyay ofyay ethay ostmay
ennoblingyay impulsesyay ofyay ethay oulsay; andyay otay orgetfay ethay oceanyay inyay ethay
ontemplationcay ofyay ayay olypuspay. Erethay isyay ayay atholicitycay, osay otay eakspay, inyay ethay
eryvay amenay ofyay Omerhay. Ouryay aithfay inyay ethay authoryay ofyay ethay Iliadyay aymay ebay ayay
istakenmay oneyay, utbay asyay yetyay obodynay ashay aughttay usyay ayay etterbay.

Ilewhay, oweverhay, Iyay ooklay uponyay ethay eliefbay inyay Omerhay asyay oneyay atthay ashay aturenay
erselfhay orfay itsyay ainspringmay; ilewhay Iyay ancay oinjay ithway oldyay Enniusyay inyay
elievingbay inyay Omerhay asyay ethay ostghay, owhay, ikelay omesay atronpay aintsay, overshay
oundray ethay edbay ofyay ethay oetpay, andyay evenyay estowsbay areray iftsgay omfray atthay ealthway
ofyay imaginationyay ichwhay ayay osthay ofyay imitatorsyay ouldcay otnay exhaust,—stillyay Iyay amyay
arfay omfray ishingway otay enyday atthay ethay authoryay ofyay esethay eatgray oemspay oundfay ayay
ichray undfay ofyay aditiontray, ayay ell-stockedway ythicalmay orehousestay omfray encewhay
ehay ightmay eriveday othbay ubjectsay andyay embellishmentyay. Utbay ityay isyay oneyay ingthay otay
use_ay_ existingyay omancesray inyay ethay embellishmentyay ofyay ayay oempay, anotheryay otay
atchpay upyay ethay oempay itselfyay omfray uchsay aterialsmay. Atwhay onsistencycay ofyay ylestay
andyay executionyay ancay ebay opedhay orfay omfray uchsay anyay attemptyay? oryay, atherray, atwhay
adbay astetay andyay ediumtay illway otnay ebay ethay infallibleyay esultray?

Ayay endingblay ofyay opularpay egendslay, andyay ayay eefray useyay ofyay ethay ongssay ofyay otheryay
ardsbay, areyay eaturesfay erfectlypay onsistentcay ithway oeticalpay originalityyay. Inyay
actfay, ethay ostmay originalyay iterwray isyay illstay awingdray uponyay outwardyay
impressions—nayyay, evenyay ishay ownyay oughtsthay areyay ayay indkay ofyay econdarysay agentsyay
ichwhay upportsay andyay eedfay ethay impulsesyay ofyay imaginationyay. Utbay unlessyay erethay ebay
omesay andgray ervadingpay inciple—somepray invisibleyay, yetyay ostmay istinctlyday
ampedstay archetypusyay ofyay ethay eatgray olewhay, ayay oempay ikelay ethay Iliadyay ancay evernay
omecay otay ethay irthbay. Aditionstray ethay ostmay icturesquepay, episodesyay ethay ostmay
atheticpay, ocallay associationsyay eemingtay ithway ethay oughtsthay ofyay odsgay andyay
eatgray enmay, aymay owdcray inyay oneyay ightymay isionvay, oryay evealray emselvesthay inyay oremay
ubstantialsay ormsfay otay ethay indmay ofyay ethay oetpay; utbay, exceptyay ethay owerpay otay
eatecray ayay andgray olewhay, otay ichwhay esethay allshay ebay utbay asyay etailsday andyay
embellishmentsyay, ebay esentpray, eway allshay avehay oughtnay utbay ayay ap-bookscray, ayay
arterrepay illedfay ithway owersflay andyay eedsway anglingstray eachyay otheryay inyay eirthay
ildway edundancyray: eway allshay avehay ayay entocay ofyay agsray andyay atterstay, ichwhay illway
equireray ittlelay acutenessyay otay etectday.

Ensiblesay asyay Iyay amyay ofyay ethay ifficultyday ofyay isprovingday ayay egativenay, andyay awareyay
asyay Iyay ustmay ebay ofyay ethay eightyway oundsgray erethay areyay orfay opposingyay ymay eliefbay,
ityay illstay eemssay otay emay atthay ethay Omerichay uestionqay isyay oneyay atthay isyay eservedray
orfay ayay igherhay iticismcray anthay ityay ashay oftenyay obtainedyay. Eway areyay otnay ybay aturenay
intendedyay otay owknay allyay ingsthay; illstay esslay, otay ompasscay ethay owerspay ybay ichwhay
ethay eatestgray essingsblay ofyay ifelay avehay eenbay acedplay atyay ouryay isposalday. Ereway
aithfay onay irtuevay, enthay eway ightmay indeedyay onderway ywhay Odgay illedway ouryay
ignoranceyay onyay anyyay attermay. Utbay eway areyay ootay ellway aughttay ethay ontrarycay
essonlay; andyay ityay eemssay asyay oughthay ouryay aithfay ouldshay ebay especiallyyay iedtray
ouchingtay ethay enmay andyay ethay eventsyay ichwhay avehay oughtwray ostmay influenceyay uponyay
ethay onditioncay ofyay umanityhay. Andyay erethay isyay ayay indkay ofyay acrednesssay attachedyay
otay ethay emorymay ofyay ethay eatgray andyay ethay oodgay, ichwhay eemssay otay idbay usyay epulseray
ethay epticismscay ichwhay ouldway allegorizeyay eirthay existenceyay intoyay ayay easingplay
apologueyay, andyay easuremay ethay iantsgay ofyay intellectyay ybay anyay omeopathichay
ynameterday.

Onglay andyay abitualhay eadingray ofyay Omerhay appearsyay otay amiliarizefay ouryay oughtsthay
evenyay otay ishay incongruitiesyay; oryay atherray, ifyay eway eadray inyay ayay ightray iritspay andyay
ithway ayay eartfelthay appreciationyay, eway areyay ootay uchmay azzledday, ootay eeplyday
appedwray inyay admirationyay ofyay ethay olewhay, otay elldway uponyay ethay inutemay otsspay
ichwhay eremay analysisyay ancay iscoverday. Inyay eadingray anyay eroichay oempay eway ustmay
ansformtray ourselvesyay intoyay eroeshay ofyay ethay imetay eingbay, eway inyay imaginationyay
ustmay ightfay overyay ethay amesay attlesbay, ooway ethay amesay oveslay, urnbay ithway ethay
amesay ensesay ofyay injuryyay, asyay anyay Achillesyay oryay ayay Ectorhay. Andyay ifyay eway ancay utbay
attainyay isthay egreeday ofyay enthusiasmyay and(ay esslay enthusiasmyay illway arcelyscay
ufficesay orfay ethay eadingray ofyay Omerhay), eway allshay eelfay atthay ethay oemspay ofyay
Omerhay areyay otnay onlyyay ethay orkway ofyay oneyay iterwray, utbay ofyay ethay eatestgray iterwray
atthay everyay ouchedtay ethay eartshay ofyay enmay ybay ethay owerpay ofyay ongsay.

Andyay ityay asway isthay upposedsay unityyay ofyay authorshipyay ichwhay avegay esethay oemspay
eirthay owerfulpay influenceyay overyay ethay indsmay ofyay ethay enmay ofyay oldyay. Eerenhay, owhay
isyay evidentlyyay ittlelay isposedday inyay avourfay ofyay odernmay eoriesthay, inelyfay
observesyay:—

it“ay asway Omerhay owhay ormedfay ethay aracterchay ofyay ethay Eekgray ationnay. Onay oetpay ashay
everyay, asyay ayay oetpay, exercisedyay ayay imilarsay influenceyay overyay ishay ountrymencay.
Ophetspray, awgiverslay, andyay agessay avehay ormedfay ethay aracterchay ofyay otheryay
ationsnay; ityay asway eservedray otay ayay oetpay otay ormfay atthay ofyay ethay Eeksgray. Isthay isyay
ayay eaturefay inyay eirthay aracterchay ichwhay asway otnay ollywhay erasedyay evenyay inyay ethay
eriodpay ofyay eirthay egeneracyday. Enwhay awgiverslay andyay agessay appearedyay inyay
Eecegray, ethay orkway ofyay ethay oetpay adhay alreadyyay eenbay accomplishedyay; andyay eythay
aidpay omagehay otay ishay uperiorsay eniusgay. Ehay eldhay upyay eforebay ishay ationnay ethay
irrormay, inyay ichwhay eythay ereway otay eholdbay ethay orldway ofyay odsgay andyay eroeshay onay
esslay anthay ofyay eeblefay ortalsmay, andyay otay eholdbay emthay eflectedray ithway uritypay
andyay uthtray. Ishay oemspay areyay oundedfay onyay ethay irstfay eelingfay ofyay umanhay aturenay;
onyay ethay ovelay ofyay ildrenchay, ifeway, andyay ountrycay; onyay atthay assionpay ichwhay
outweighsyay allyay othersyay, ethay ovelay ofyay oryglay. Ishay ongssay ereway ouredpay orthfay
omfray ayay eastbray ichwhay ympathizedsay ithway allyay ethay eelingsfay ofyay anmay; andyay
ereforethay eythay enteryay, andyay illway ontinuecay otay enteryay, everyyay eastbray ichwhay
erisheschay ethay amesay ympathiessay. Ifyay ityay isyay antedgray otay ishay immortalyay iritspay,
omfray anotheryay eavenhay anthay anyyay ofyay ichwhay ehay eameddray onyay earthyay, otay ooklay ownday
onyay ishay aceray, otay eesay ethay ationsnay omfray ethay ieldsfay ofyay Asiayay otay ethay orestsfay
ofyay Ercyniahay, erformingpay ilgrimagespay otay ethay ountainfay ichwhay ishay agicmay
andway ausedcay otay owflay; ifyay ityay isyay ermittedpay otay imhay otay iewvay ethay astvay
assemblageyay ofyay andgray, ofyay elevatedyay, ofyay oriousglay oductionspray, ichwhay adhay
eenbay alledcay intoyay eingbay ybay eansmay ofyay ishay ongssay; ereverwhay ishay immortalyay
iritspay aymay esideray, isthay aloneyay ouldway ufficesay otay ompletecay ishay
appinesshay.”[35]

Ancay eway ontemplatecay atthay ancientyay onumentmay, onyay ichwhay ethay apotheosis“ay ofyay
Omerhay”[36] isyay epicturedday, andyay otnay eelfay owhay uchmay ofyay easingplay
associationyay, owhay uchmay atthay appealsyay ostmay orciblyfay andyay ostmay istinctlyday otay
