ouryay indsmay, isyay ostlay ybay ethay admittanceyay ofyay anyyay eorythay utbay ouryay oldyay
aditiontray? Ethay oremay eway eadray, andyay ethay oremay eway ink—thinkthay asyay ecomesbay ethay
eadersray ofyay Omer,—thehay oremay ootedray ecomesbay ethay onvictioncay atthay ethay
Atherfay ofyay Oetrypay avegay usyay isthay ichray inheritanceyay, olewhay andyay entireyay.
Ateverwhay ereway ethay eansmay ofyay itsyay eservationpray, etlay usyay atherray ebay ankfulthay
orfay ethay easurytray ofyay astetay andyay eloquenceyay usthay aidlay openyay otay ouryay useyay, anthay
eeksay otay akemay ityay ayay eremay entrecay aroundyay ichwhay otay ivedray ayay eriessay ofyay
eoriesthay, osewhay ildnessway isyay onlyyay equalledyay ybay eirthay inconsistencyyay ithway
eachyay otheryay.

Asyay ethay ymnshay, andyay omesay otheryay oemspay usuallyyay ascribedyay otay Omerhay, areyay otnay
includedyay inyay Ope’spay anslationtray, Iyay illway ontentcay yselfmay ithway ayay iefbray
accountyay ofyay ethay Attlebay ofyay ethay Ogsfray andyay Icemay, omfray ethay enpay ofyay ayay iterwray
owhay ashay oneday ityay ullfay usticejay[37]:—

is“thay oempay,” ayssay Oleridgecay, is“ay ayay ortshay ock-heroicmay ofyay ancientyay ateday.
Ethay exttay ariesvay inyay ifferentday editionsyay, andyay isyay obviouslyyay isturbedday andyay
orruptcay otay ayay eatgray egreeday; ityay isyay ommonlycay aidsay otay avehay eenbay ayay uvenilejay
essayyay ofyay Omer’shay eniusgay; othersyay avehay attributedyay ityay otay ethay amesay Igreespay,
entionedmay aboveyay, andyay osewhay eputationray orfay umourhay eemssay otay avehay invitedyay
ethay appropriationyay ofyay anyyay iecepay ofyay ancientyay itway, ethay authoryay ofyay ichwhay asway
uncertainyay; osay ittlelay idday ethay Eeksgray, eforebay ethay ageyay ofyay ethay Olemiesptay,
owknay oryay arecay aboutyay atthay epartmentday ofyay iticismcray employedyay inyay eterminingday
ethay enuinenessgay ofyay ancientyay itingswray. Asyay otay isthay ittlelay oempay eingbay ayay
youthfulyay ofusionpray ofyay Omerhay, ityay eemssay ufficientsay otay aysay atthay omfray ethay
eginningbay otay ethay endyay ityay isyay ayay ainplay andyay alpablepay arodypay, otnay onlyyay ofyay ethay
eneralgay iritspay, utbay ofyay ethay umerousnay assagespay ofyay ethay Iliadyay itselfyay; andyay
evenyay, ifyay onay uchsay intentionyay otay arodypay ereway iscernibleday inyay ityay, ethay
objectionyay ouldway illstay emainray, atthay otay upposesay ayay orkway ofyay eremay urlesquebay
otay ebay ethay imarypray effortyay ofyay oetrypay inyay ayay implesay ageyay, eemssay otay everseray
atthay orderyay inyay ethay evelopmentday ofyay ationalnay astetay, ichwhay ethay istoryhay ofyay
everyyay otheryay eoplepay inyay Europeyay, andyay ofyay anymay inyay Asiayay, ashay almostyay
ascertainedyay otay ebay ayay awlay ofyay ethay umanhay indmay; ityay isyay inyay ayay atestay ofyay ocietysay
uchmay oremay efinedray andyay ermanentpay anthay atthay escribedday inyay ethay Iliadyay, atthay
anyyay opularitypay ouldway attendyay uchsay ayay idiculeray ofyay arway andyay ethay odsgay asyay isyay
ontainedcay inyay isthay oempay; andyay ethay actfay ofyay erethay avinghay existedyay eethray
otheryay oemspay ofyay ethay amesay indkay attributedyay, orfay aughtyay eway ancay eesay, ithway asyay
uchmay easonray otay Omerhay, isyay ayay ongstray inducementyay otay elievebay atthay onenay ofyay
emthay ereway ofyay ethay Omerichay ageyay. Ightknay infersyay omfray ethay usageyay ofyay ethay ordway
eltosday, iting“wray ablettay,” insteadyay ofyay διφθέραay, in“skay,” ichwhay, accordingyay
otay Erodhay. 5, 58, asway ethay aterialmay employedyay ybay ethay Asiaticyay Eeksgray orfay
atthay urposepay, atthay isthay oempay asway anotheryay offspringyay ofyay Atticyay ingenuityyay;
andyay enerallygay atthay ethay amiliarfay entionmay ofyay ethay ockcay (vay. 191) isyay ayay
ongstray argumentyay againstyay osay ancientyay ayay ateday orfay itsyay ompositioncay.”

Avinghay usthay ivengay ayay iefbray accountyay ofyay ethay oemspay omprisedcay inyay Ope’spay
esignday, Iyay illway ownay oceedpray otay akemay ayay ewfay emarksray onyay ishay anslationtray,
andyay onyay ymay ownyay urposepay inyay ethay esentpray editionyay.

Opepay asway otnay ayay Eciangray. Ishay olewhay educationyay adhay eenbay irregularyay, andyay ishay
earliestyay acquaintanceyay ithway ethay oetpay asway oughthray ethay ersionvay ofyay Ogilbyyay.
Ityay isyay otnay ootay uchmay otay aysay atthay ishay olewhay orkway earsbay ethay impressyay ofyay ayay
ispositionday otay ebay atisfiedsay ithway ethay eneralgay ensesay, atherray anthay otay iveday
eeplyday intoyay ethay inutemay andyay elicateday eaturesfay ofyay anguagelay. Encehay ishay
olewhay orkway isyay otay ebay ookedlay uponyay atherray asyay anyay elegantyay araphrasepay anthay ayay
anslationtray. Erethay areyay, otay ebay uresay, ertaincay onventionalcay anecdotesyay,
ichwhay ovepray atthay Opepay onsultedcay ariousvay iendsfray, osewhay assicalclay
attainmentsyay ereway oundersay anthay ishay ownyay, uringday ethay undertakingyay; utbay ityay
isyay obablepray atthay esethay examinationsyay ereway ethay esultray atherray ofyay ethay
ontradictorycay ersionsvay alreadyyay existingyay, anthay ofyay ayay esireday otay akemay ayay
erfectpay anscripttray ofyay ethay originalyay. Andyay inyay osethay aysday, atwhay isyay alledcay
iterallay anslationtray asway esslay ultivatedcay anthay atyay esentpray. Ifyay omethingsay
ikelay ethay eneralgay ensesay ouldcay ebay ecoratedday ithway ethay easyyay acefulnessgray ofyay
ayay actisedpray oetpay; ifyay ethay armschay ofyay etricalmay adencecay andyay ayay easingplay
uencyflay ouldcay ebay ademay onsistentcay ithway ayay airfay interpretationyay ofyay ethay
oet’spay eaningmay, ishay ords_way_ ereway esslay ealouslyjay oughtsay orfay, andyay osethay
owhay ouldcay eadray osay oodgay ayay oempay asyay Ope’spay Iliadyay adhay airfay easonray otay ebay
atisfiedsay.

Ityay ouldway ebay absurdyay, ereforethay, otay esttay Ope’spay anslationtray ybay ouryay ownyay
advancingyay owledgeknay ofyay ethay originalyay exttay. Eway ustmay ebay ontentcay otay ooklay atyay
ityay asyay ayay ostmay elightfulday orkway inyay itself,—ayay orkway ichwhay isyay asyay uchmay ayay artpay
ofyay Englishyay iteraturelay asyay Omerhay imselfhay isyay ofyay Eekgray. Eway ustmay otnay ebay orntay
omfray ouryay indlykay associationsyay ithway ethay oldyay Iliadyay, atthay onceyay asway ouryay ostmay
erishedchay ompanioncay, oryay ouryay ostmay ooked-forlay izepray, erelymay ecausebay
Uttmannbay, Oewelay, andyay Iddelllay avehay ademay usyay osay uchmay oremay accurateyay asyay otay
ἀμφικύπελλονay eingbay anyay adjectiveyay, andyay otnay ayay ubstantivesay. Arfay ebay ityay omfray
usyay otay efendday ethay aultsfay ofyay Opepay, especiallyyay enwhay eway inkthay ofyay Apman’schay
inefay, oldbay, oughray oldyay English;—faryay ebay ityay omfray usyay otay oldhay upyay ishay
anslationtray asyay atwhay ayay anslationtray ofyay Omerhay ight_may_ ebay. Utbay eway ancay illstay
ismissday Ope’spay Iliadyay otay ethay andshay ofyay ouryay eadersray, ithway ethay
onsciousnesscay atthay eythay ustmay avehay eadray ayay eryvay eatgray umbernay ofyay ooksbay
eforebay eythay avehay eadray itsyay ellowfay.

Asyay otay ethay Otesnay accompanyingyay ethay esentpray olumevay, eythay areyay awndray upyay
ithoutway etensionpray, andyay ainlymay ithway ethay iewvay ofyay elpinghay ethay eneralgay
eaderray. Avinghay omesay ittlelay imetay incesay anslatedtray allyay ethay orksway ofyay Omerhay
orfay anotheryay ublisherpay, Iyay ightmay avehay oughtbray ayay argelay amountyay ofyay
accumulatedyay attermay, ometimessay ofyay ayay iticalcray aracterchay, otay earbay uponyay ethay
exttay. Utbay Ope’spay ersionvay asway onay ieldfay orfay uchsay ayay isplayday; andyay ymay
urposepay asway otay ouchtay ieflybray onyay antiquarianyay oryay ythologicalmay allusionsyay,
otay oticenay occasionallyyay ome_say_ eparturesday omfray ethay originalyay, andyay otay ivegay
ayay ewfay arallelpay assagespay omfray ouryay Englishyay Omerhay, Iltonmay. Inyay ethay atterlay
asktay Iyay annotcay etendpray otay oveltynay, utbay Iyay usttray atthay ymay otheryay
annotationsyay, ilewhay utterlyyay isclaimingday ighhay olasticschay iewsvay, illway ebay
oundfay otay onveycay asyay uchmay asyay isyay antedway; atyay eastlay, asyay arfay asyay ethay ecessarynay
imitslay ofyay esethay olumesvay ouldcay ebay expectedyay otay admityay. Otay itewray ayay
ommentarycay onyay Omerhay isyay otnay ymay esentpray aimyay; utbay ifyay Iyay avehay ademay Ope’spay
anslationtray ayay ittlelay oremay entertainingyay andyay instructiveyay otay ayay assmay ofyay
iscellaneousmay eadersray, Iyay allshay onsidercay ymay ishesway atisfactorilysay
accomplishedyay.

Eodorethay Aloisyay Uckleybay.


ist_chray Urchchay_.




Ope’spay Efacepray Otay Ethay Iliadyay Ofyay Omerhay


Omerhay isyay universallyyay allowedyay otay avehay adhay ethay eatestgray inventionyay ofyay anyyay
iterwray ateverwhay. Ethay aisepray ofyay udgmentjay Irgilvay ashay ustlyjay ontestedcay
ithway imhay, andyay othersyay aymay avehay eirthay etensionspray asyay otay articularpay
excellencesyay; utbay ishay inventionyay emainsray yetyay unrivalledyay. Ornay isyay ityay ayay
onderway ifyay ehay ashay everyay eenbay acknowledgedyay ethay eatestgray ofyay oetspay, owhay ostmay
excelledyay inyay atthay ichwhay isyay ethay eryvay oundationfay ofyay oetrypay. Ityay isyay ethay
inventionyay atthay, inyay ifferentday egreesday, istinguishesday allyay eatgray eniusesgay:
ethay utmostyay etchstray ofyay umanhay udystay, earninglay, andyay industryyay, ichwhay
astersmay everythingyay esidesbay, ancay evernay attainyay otay isthay. Ityay urnishesfay artyay
ithway allyay erhay aterialsmay, andyay ithoutway ityay udgmentjay itselfyay ancay atyay estbay utbay
eal“stay iselyway:” orfay artyay isyay onlyyay ikelay ayay udentpray ewardstay atthay iveslay onyay
anagingmay ethay ichesray ofyay aturenay. Ateverwhay aisespray aymay ebay ivengay otay orksway
ofyay udgmentjay, erethay isyay otnay evenyay ayay inglesay eautybay inyay emthay otay ichwhay ethay
inventionyay ustmay otnay ontributecay: asyay inyay ethay ostmay egularray ardensgay, artyay ancay
onlyyay educeray eautiesbay ofyay aturenay otay oremay egularityray, andyay uchsay ayay igurefay,
ichwhay ethay ommoncay eyeyay aymay etterbay aketay inyay, andyay isyay, ereforethay, oremay
entertainedyay ithway. Andyay, erhapspay, ethay easonray ywhay ommoncay iticscray areyay
inclinedyay otay eferpray ayay udiciousjay andyay ethodicalmay eniusgay otay ayay eatgray andyay
uitfulfray oneyay, isyay, ecausebay eythay indfay ityay easieryay orfay emselvesthay otay ursuepay
eirthay observationsyay oughthray ayay uniformyay andyay oundedbay alkway ofyay artyay, anthay otay
omprehendcay ethay astvay andyay ariousvay extentyay ofyay aturenay.

Ouryay author’syay orkway isyay ayay ildway aradisepay, erewhay, ifyay eway annotcay eesay allyay ethay
eautiesbay osay istinctlyday asyay inyay anyay orderedyay ardengay, ityay isyay onlyyay ecausebay ethay
umbernay ofyay emthay isyay infinitelyyay eatergray. Ityay isyay ikelay ayay opiouscay urserynay,
ichwhay ontainscay ethay eedssay andyay irstfay oductionspray ofyay everyyay indkay, outyay ofyay
ichwhay osethay owhay ollowedfay imhay avehay utbay electedsay omesay articularpay antsplay,
eachyay accordingyay otay ishay ancyfay, otay ultivatecay andyay eautifybay. Ifyay omesay ingsthay
areyay ootay uxuriantlay ityay isyay owingyay otay ethay ichnessray ofyay ethay oilsay; andyay ifyay
othersyay areyay otnay arrivedyay otay erfectionpay oryay aturitymay, ityay isyay onlyyay ecausebay
eythay areyay overrunyay andyay oppressedyay ybay osethay ofyay ayay ongerstray aturenay.

Ityay isyay otay ethay engthstray ofyay isthay amazingyay inventionyay eway areyay otay attributeyay
atthay unequalledyay irefay andyay aptureray ichwhay isyay osay orciblefay inyay Omerhay, atthay onay
anmay ofyay ayay uetray oeticalpay iritspay isyay astermay ofyay imselfhay ilewhay ehay eadsray imhay.
Atwhay ehay iteswray isyay ofyay ethay ostmay animatedyay aturenay imaginableyay; everyyay ingthay
ovesmay, everyyay ingthay iveslay, andyay isyay utpay inyay actionyay. Ifyay ayay ouncilcay ebay alledcay,
oryay ayay attlebay oughtfay, youyay areyay otnay oldlycay informedyay ofyay atwhay asway aidsay oryay
oneday asyay omfray ayay irdthay ersonpay; ethay eaderray isyay urriedhay outyay ofyay imselfhay ybay
ethay orcefay ofyay ethay oet’spay imaginationyay, andyay urnstay inyay oneyay aceplay otay ayay
earerhay, inyay anotheryay otay ayay ectatorspay. Ethay oursecay ofyay ishay ersesvay esemblesray
atthay ofyay ethay armyyay ehay escribesday,

 Οἵδay’ ἄῤay ἴσανay, ὡσείay τεay πυρὶay χθὼνay πἆσαay νέμοιτοay.

ey“thay ourpay alongyay ikelay ayay irefay atthay eepssway ethay olewhay earthyay eforebay ityay.” Ityay
isyay, oweverhay, emarkableray, atthay ishay ancyfay, ichwhay isyay everywhereyay igorousvay,
isyay otnay iscoveredday immediatelyyay atyay ethay eginningbay ofyay ishay oempay inyay itsyay
ullestfay endoursplay: ityay owsgray inyay ethay ogresspray othbay uponyay imselfhay andyay
othersyay, andyay ecomesbay onyay irefay, ikelay ayay ariot-wheelchay, ybay itsyay ownyay apidityray.
Exactyay ispositionday, ustjay oughtthay, orrectcay elocutionyay, olishedpay umbersnay,
aymay avehay eenbay oundfay inyay ayay ousandthay; utbay isthay oeticpay irefay, isthay ivida“vay
isvay animiyay,” inyay ayay eryvay ewfay. Evenyay inyay orksway erewhay allyay osethay areyay imperfectyay
oryay eglectednay, isthay ancay overpoweryay iticismcray, andyay akemay usyay admireyay evenyay
ilewhay eway isapproveday. Aynay, erewhay isthay appearsyay, oughthay attendedyay ithway
absurditiesyay, ityay ightensbray allyay ethay ubbishray aboutyay ityay, illtay eway eesay othingnay
utbay itsyay ownyay endoursplay. Isthay irefay isyay iscernedday inyay Irgilvay, utbay iscernedday
asyay oughthray ayay assglay, eflectedray omfray Omerhay, oremay iningshay anthay iercefay, utbay
everywhereyay equalyay andyay onstantcay: inyay Ucanlay andyay Atiusstay ityay urstsbay outyay inyay
uddensay, ortshay, andyay interruptedyay ashesflay: Inyay Iltonmay ityay owsglay ikelay ayay
urnacefay eptkay upyay otay anyay uncommonyay ardouryay ybay ethay orcefay ofyay artyay: inyay
Akspeareshay ityay ikesstray eforebay eway areyay awareyay, ikelay anyay accidentalyay irefay omfray
eavenhay: utbay inyay Omerhay, andyay inyay imhay onlyyay, ityay urnsbay everywhereyay earlyclay andyay
everywhereyay irresistiblyyay.

Iyay allshay erehay endeavouryay otay owshay owhay isthay astvay inventionyay exertsyay itselfyay inyay
ayay annermay uperiorsay otay atthay ofyay anyyay oetpay oughthray allyay ethay ainmay onstituentcay
artspay ofyay ishay orkway: asyay ityay isyay ethay eatgray andyay eculiarpay aracteristicchay ichwhay
istinguishesday imhay omfray allyay otheryay authorsyay.

Isthay ongstray andyay ulingray acultyfay asway ikelay ayay owerfulpay arstay, ichwhay, inyay ethay
iolencevay ofyay itsyay oursecay, ewdray allyay ingsthay ithinway itsyay ortexvay. Ityay eemedsay
otnay enoughyay otay avehay akentay inyay ethay olewhay irclecay ofyay artsyay, andyay ethay olewhay
ompasscay ofyay aturenay, otay upplysay ishay aximsmay andyay eflectionsray; allyay ethay inwardyay
assionspay andyay affectionsyay ofyay ankindmay, otay urnishfay ishay aracterschay: andyay allyay
ethay outwardyay ormsfay andyay imagesyay ofyay ingsthay orfay ishay escriptionsday: utbay
antingway yetyay anyay ampleryay eresphay otay expatiateyay inyay, ehay openedyay ayay ewnay andyay
oundlessbay alkway orfay ishay imaginationyay, andyay eatedcray ayay orldway orfay imselfhay inyay
ethay inventionyay ofyay ablefay. Atthay ichwhay Aristotleyay allscay e“thay oulsay ofyay
oetrypay,” asway irstfay eathedbray intoyay ityay ybay Omerhay. Iyay allshay eginbay ithway
onsideringcay imhay inyay ishay artpay, asyay ityay isyay aturallynay ethay irstfay; andyay Iyay eakspay
ofyay ityay othbay asyay ityay eansmay ethay esignday ofyay ayay oempay, andyay asyay ityay isyay akentay orfay
ictionfay.


Ablefay aymay ebay ividedday intoyay ethay obablepray, ethay allegoricalyay, andyay ethay
arvellousmay. Ethay obablepray ablefay isyay ethay ecitalray ofyay uchsay actionsyay asyay,
oughthay eythay idday otnay appenhay, yetyay ightmay, inyay ethay ommoncay oursecay ofyay aturenay;
oryay ofyay uchsay asyay, oughthay eythay idday, ecamebay ablesfay ybay ethay additionalyay
episodesyay andyay annermay ofyay ellingtay emthay. Ofyay isthay ortsay isyay ethay ainmay orystay ofyay
anyay epicyay oempay, e“thay eturnray ofyay Ulyssesyay, ethay ettlementsay ofyay ethay Ojanstray inyay
Italyyay,” oryay ethay ikelay. Atthay ofyay ethay Iliadyay isyay ethay anger“ay ofyay Achillesyay,” ethay
ostmay ortshay andyay inglesay ubjectsay atthay everyay asway osenchay ybay anyyay oetpay. Yetyay
isthay ehay ashay uppliedsay ithway ayay astervay arietyvay ofyay incidentsyay andyay eventsyay, andyay
owdedcray ithway ayay eatergray umbernay ofyay ouncilscay, eechesspay, attlesbay, andyay
episodesyay ofyay allyay indskay, anthay areyay otay ebay oundfay evenyay inyay osethay oemspay osewhay
emesschay areyay ofyay ethay utmostyay atitudelay andyay irregularityyay. Ethay actionyay isyay
urriedhay onyay ithway ethay ostmay ehementvay iritspay, andyay itsyay olewhay urationday
employsyay otnay osay uchmay asyay iftyfay aysday. Irgilvay, orfay antway ofyay osay armway ayay
eniusgay, aidedyay imselfhay ybay akingtay inyay ayay oremay extensiveyay ubjectsay, asyay ellway asyay
ayay eatergray engthlay ofyay imetay, andyay ontractingcay ethay esignday ofyay othbay Omer’shay
oemspay intoyay oneyay, ichwhay isyay yetyay utbay ayay ourthfay artpay asyay argelay asyay ishay. Ethay
otheryay epicyay oetspay avehay usedyay ethay amesay acticepray, utbay enerallygay arriedcay ityay
osay arfay asyay otay uperinducesay ayay ultiplicitymay ofyay ablesfay, estroyday ethay unityyay ofyay
actionyay, andyay oselay eirthay eadersray inyay anyay unreasonableyay engthlay ofyay imetay. Ornay
isyay ityay onlyyay inyay ethay ainmay esignday atthay eythay avehay eenbay unableyay otay addyay otay ishay
inventionyay, utbay eythay avehay ollowedfay imhay inyay everyyay episodeyay andyay artpay ofyay
orystay. Ifyay ehay ashay ivengay ayay egularray ataloguecay ofyay anyay armyyay, eythay allyay awdray upyay
eirthay orcesfay inyay ethay amesay orderyay. Ifyay ehay ashay uneralfay amesgay orfay Atrocluspay,
Irgilvay ashay ethay amesay orfay Anchisesyay, andyay Atiusstay ather(ray anthay omityay emthay)
estroysday ethay unityyay ofyay ishay actionsyay orfay osethay ofyay Archemorusyay. Ifyay Ulyssesyay
isitvay ethay adesshay, ethay Easænay ofyay Irgilvay andyay Ipioscay ofyay Iliussay areyay entsay
afteryay imhay. Ifyay ehay ebay etainedday omfray ishay eturnray ybay ethay allurementsyay ofyay
Alypsocay, osay isyay Easænay ybay Idoday, andyay Inaldoray ybay Armidayay. Ifyay Achillesyay ebay
absentyay omfray ethay armyyay onyay ethay orescay ofyay ayay uarrelqay oughthray alfhay ethay oempay,
Inaldoray ustmay absentyay imselfhay ustjay asyay onglay onyay ethay ikelay accountyay. Ifyay ehay
ivesgay ishay erohay ayay uitsay ofyay elestialcay armouryay, Irgilvay andyay Assotay akemay ethay
amesay esentpray otay eirsthay. Irgilvay ashay otnay onlyyay observedyay isthay oseclay
imitationyay ofyay Omerhay, utbay, erewhay ehay adhay otnay edlay ethay ayway, uppliedsay ethay
antway omfray otheryay Eekgray authorsyay. Usthay ethay orystay ofyay Inonsay, andyay ethay akingtay
ofyay Oytray, asway opiedcay ays(say Acrobiusmay) almostyay ordway orfay ordway omfray
Isanderpay, asyay ethay oveslay ofyay Idoday andyay Easænay areyay akentay omfray osethay ofyay Edeamay
andyay Asonjay inyay Apolloniusyay, andyay everalsay othersyay inyay ethay amesay annermay.


Otay oceedpray otay ethay allegoricalyay able—iffay eway eflectray uponyay osethay
innumerableyay owledgesknay, osethay ecretssay ofyay aturenay andyay ysicalphay ilosophyphay
ichwhay Omerhay isyay enerallygay upposedsay otay avehay appedwray upyay inyay ishay allegoriesyay,
atwhay ayay ewnay andyay ampleyay enescay ofyay onderway aymay isthay onsiderationcay affordyay usyay!
Owhay ertilefay illway atthay imaginationyay appearyay, ichwhay asway ableyay otay otheclay allyay
ethay opertiespray ofyay elementsyay, ethay ualificationsqay ofyay ethay indmay, ethay irtuesvay
andyay icesvay, inyay ormsfay andyay ersonspay, andyay otay introduceyay emthay intoyay actionsyay
agreeableyay otay ethay aturenay ofyay ethay ingsthay eythay adowedshay! Isthay isyay ayay ieldfay inyay
ichwhay onay ucceedingsay oetspay ouldcay isputeday ithway Omerhay, andyay ateverwhay
ommendationscay avehay eenbay allowedyay emthay onyay isthay eadhay, areyay ybay onay eansmay orfay
eirthay inventionyay inyay avinghay enlargedyay ishay irclecay, utbay orfay eirthay udgmentjay
inyay avinghay ontractedcay ityay. Orfay enwhay ethay odemay ofyay earninglay angedchay inyay ethay
ollowingfay agesyay, andyay iencescay asway eliveredday inyay ayay ainerplay annermay, ityay enthay
ecamebay asyay easonableray inyay ethay oremay odernmay oetspay otay aylay ityay asideyay, asyay ityay
asway inyay Omerhay otay akemay useyay ofyay ityay. Andyay erhapspay ityay asway onay unhappyyay
ircumstancecay orfay Irgilvay, atthay erethay asway otnay inyay ishay imetay atthay emandday
uponyay imhay ofyay osay eatgray anyay inventionyay asyay ightmay ebay apablecay ofyay urnishingfay allyay
osethay allegoricalyay artspay ofyay ayay oempay.


Ethay arvellousmay ablefay includesyay ateverwhay isyay upernaturalsay, andyay especiallyyay
ethay achinesmay ofyay ethay odsgay. Ifyay Omerhay asway otnay ethay irstfay owhay introducedyay ethay
eitiesday as(ay Erodotushay imaginesyay) intoyay ethay eligionray ofyay Eecegray, ehay eemssay
ethay irstfay owhay oughtbray emthay intoyay ayay ystemsay ofyay achinerymay orfay oetrypay, andyay
uchsay ayay oneyay asyay akesmay itsyay eatestgray importanceyay andyay ignityday: orfay eway indfay
osethay authorsyay owhay avehay eenbay offendedyay atyay ethay iterallay otionnay ofyay ethay odsgay,
onstantlycay ayinglay eirthay accusationyay againstyay Omerhay asyay ethay iefchay upportsay
ofyay ityay. Utbay ateverwhay ausecay erethay ightmay ebay otay ameblay ishay achinesmay inyay ayay
ilosophicalphay oryay eligiousray iewvay, eythay areyay osay erfectpay inyay ethay oeticpay,
atthay ankindmay avehay eenbay everyay incesay ontentedcay otay ollowfay emthay: onenay avehay
eenbay ableyay otay enlargeyay ethay eresphay ofyay oetrypay eyondbay ethay imitslay ehay ashay etsay:
everyyay attemptyay ofyay isthay aturenay ashay ovedpray unsuccessfulyay; andyay afteryay allyay ethay
ariousvay angeschay ofyay imestay andyay eligionsray, ishay odsgay ontinuecay otay isthay ayday
ethay odsgay ofyay oetrypay.


Eway omecay ownay otay ethay aracterschay ofyay ishay ersonspay; andyay erehay eway allshay indfay onay
authoryay ashay everyay awndray osay anymay, ithway osay isiblevay andyay urprisingsay ayay
arietyvay, oryay ivengay usyay uchsay ivelylay andyay affectingyay impressionsyay ofyay emthay.
Everyyay oneyay ashay omethingsay osay ingularlysay ishay ownyay, atthay onay ainterpay ouldcay
avehay istinguishedday emthay oremay ybay eirthay eaturesfay, anthay ethay oetpay ashay ybay
eirthay annersmay. Othingnay ancay ebay oremay exactyay anthay ethay istinctionsday ehay ashay
observedyay inyay ethay ifferentday egreesday ofyay irtuesvay andyay icesvay. Ethay inglesay
ualityqay ofyay ouragecay isyay onderfullyway iversifiedday inyay ethay everalsay aracterschay
ofyay ethay Iliadyay. Atthay ofyay Achillesyay isyay uriousfay andyay intractableyay; atthay ofyay
Iomededay orwardfay, yetyay isteninglay otay adviceyay, andyay ubjectsay otay ommandcay; atthay
ofyay Ajaxyay isyay eavyhay andyay elf-confidingsay; ofyay Ectorhay, activeyay andyay igilantvay:
ethay ouragecay ofyay Agamemnonyay isyay inspiritedyay ybay ovelay ofyay empireyay andyay ambitionyay;
atthay ofyay Enelausmay ixedmay ithway oftnesssay andyay endernesstay orfay ishay eoplepay: eway
indfay inyay Idomeneusyay ayay ainplay irectday oldiersay; inyay Arpedonsay ayay allantgay andyay
enerousgay oneyay. Ornay isyay isthay udiciousjay andyay astonishingyay iversityday otay ebay
oundfay onlyyay inyay ethay incipalpray ualityqay ichwhay onstitutescay ethay ainmay ofyay eachyay
aracterchay, utbay evenyay inyay ethay underyay artspay ofyay ityay, otay ichwhay ehay akestay arecay otay
ivegay ayay incturetay ofyay atthay incipalpray oneyay. Orfay exampleyay: ethay ainmay aracterschay
ofyay Ulyssesyay andyay Estornay onsistcay inyay isdomway; andyay eythay areyay istinctday inyay isthay,
atthay ethay isdomway ofyay oneyay isyay artificialyay andyay ariousvay, ofyay ethay otheryay aturalnay,
openyay, andyay egularray. Utbay eythay avehay, esidesbay, aracterschay ofyay ouragecay; andyay
isthay ualityqay alsoyay akestay ayay ifferentday urntay inyay eachyay omfray ethay ifferenceday ofyay
ishay udencepray; orfay oneyay inyay ethay arway ependsday illstay uponyay autioncay, ethay otheryay
uponyay experienceyay. Ityay ouldway ebay endlessyay otay oducepray instancesyay ofyay esethay
indskay. Ethay aracterschay ofyay Irgilvay areyay arfay omfray ikingstray usyay inyay isthay openyay
annermay; eythay ielay, inyay ayay eatgray egreeday, iddenhay andyay undistinguishedyay; andyay,
erewhay eythay areyay arkedmay ostmay evidentlyyay affectyay usyay otnay inyay oportionpray otay
osethay ofyay Omerhay. Ishay aracterschay ofyay alourvay areyay uchmay alikeyay; evenyay atthay ofyay
Urnustay eemssay onay ayway eculiarpay, utbay, asyay ityay isyay, inyay ayay uperiorsay egreeday; andyay
eway eesay othingnay atthay ifferencesday ethay ouragecay ofyay Estheusmnay omfray atthay ofyay
Ergestussay, Oanthusclay, oryay ethay estray. Inyay ikelay annermay ityay aymay ebay emarkedray ofyay
Atius’sstay eroeshay, atthay anyay airyay ofyay impetuosityyay unsray oughthray emthay allyay; ethay
amesay orridhay andyay avagesay ouragecay appearsyay inyay ishay Apaneuscay, Ydeustay,
Ippomedonhay, &cay. Eythay avehay ayay aritypay ofyay aracterchay, ichwhay akesmay emthay eemsay
othersbray ofyay oneyay amilyfay. Iyay elievebay enwhay ethay eaderray isyay edlay intoyay isthay
acttray ofyay eflectionray, ifyay ehay illway ursuepay ityay oughthray ethay epicyay andyay agictray
iterswray, ehay illway ebay onvincedcay owhay infinitelyyay uperiorsay, inyay isthay ointpay,
ethay inventionyay ofyay Omerhay asway otay atthay ofyay allyay othersyay.


Ethay eechesspay areyay otay ebay onsideredcay asyay eythay owflay omfray ethay aracterschay;
eingbay erfectpay oryay efectiveday asyay eythay agreeyay oryay isagreeday ithway ethay annersmay,
ofyay osethay owhay utteryay emthay. Asyay erethay isyay oremay arietyvay ofyay aracterschay inyay ethay
Iliadyay, osay erethay isyay ofyay eechesspay, anthay inyay anyyay otheryay oempay. everything“ay inyay
ityay ashay annermay” as(ay Aristotleyay expressesyay ityay), atthay isyay, everythingyay isyay
actedyay oryay okenspay. Ityay isyay ardlyhay ediblecray, inyay ayay orkway ofyay uchsay engthlay, owhay
allsmay ayay umbernay ofyay ineslay areyay employedyay inyay arrationnay. Inyay Irgilvay ethay
amaticdray artpay isyay esslay inyay oportionpray otay ethay arrativenay, andyay ethay eechesspay
oftenyay onsistcay ofyay eneralgay eflectionsray oryay oughtsthay, ichwhay ightmay ebay
equallyyay ustjay inyay anyyay erson’spay outhmay uponyay ethay amesay occasionyay. Asyay anymay ofyay
ishay ersonspay avehay onay apparentyay aracterschay, osay anymay ofyay ishay eechesspay escapeyay
eingbay appliedyay andyay udgedjay ybay ethay uleray ofyay oprietypray. Eway ofteneryay inkthay ofyay
ethay authoryay imselfhay enwhay eway eadray Irgilvay, anthay enwhay eway areyay engagedyay inyay
Omerhay, allyay ichwhay areyay ethay effectsyay ofyay ayay oldercay inventionyay, atthay interestsyay
usyay esslay inyay ethay actionyay escribedday. Omerhay akesmay usyay earershay, andyay Irgilvay
eaveslay usyay eadersray.


Ifyay, inyay ethay extnay aceplay, eway aketay ayay iewvay ofyay ethay entimentssay, ethay amesay
esidingpray acultyfay isyay eminentyay inyay ethay ublimitysay andyay iritspay ofyay ishay
oughtsthay. Onginuslay ashay ivengay ishay opinionyay, atthay ityay asway inyay isthay artpay
Omerhay incipallypray excelledyay. Atwhay ereway aloneyay ufficientsay otay ovepray ethay
andeurgray andyay excellenceyay ofyay ishay entimentssay inyay eneralgay, isyay, atthay eythay
avehay osay emarkableray ayay aritypay ithway osethay ofyay ethay Ipturescray. Uportday, inyay ishay
Omologiagnay Omericahay, ashay ollectedcay innumerableyay instancesyay ofyay isthay ortsay.
Andyay ityay isyay ithway usticejay anyay excellentyay odernmay iterwray allowsyay, atthay ifyay
Irgilvay ashay otnay osay anymay oughtsthay atthay areyay owlay andyay ulgarvay, ehay ashay otnay osay
anymay atthay areyay ublimesay andyay oblenay; andyay atthay ethay Omanray authoryay eldomsay isesray
intoyay eryvay astonishingyay entimentssay erewhay ehay isyay otnay iredfay ybay ethay Iliadyay.


Ifyay eway observeyay ishay escriptionsday, imagesyay, andyay imilessay, eway allshay indfay ethay
inventionyay illstay edominantpray. Otay atwhay elseyay ancay eway ascribeyay atthay astvay
omprehensioncay ofyay imagesyay ofyay everyyay ortsay, erewhay eway eesay eachyay ircumstancecay
ofyay artyay, andyay individualyay ofyay aturenay, ummonedsay ogethertay ybay ethay extentyay andyay
ecundityfay ofyay ishay imaginationyay otay ichwhay allyay ingsthay, inyay eirthay ariousvay
iewsvay esentedpray emselvesthay inyay anyay instantyay, andyay adhay eirthay impressionsyay
akentay offyay otay erfectionpay atyay ayay eathay? Aynay, ehay otnay onlyyay ivesgay usyay ethay ullfay
ospectspray ofyay ingsthay, utbay everalsay unexpectedyay eculiaritiespay andyay idesay
iewsvay, unobservedyay ybay anyyay ainterpay utbay Omerhay. Othingnay isyay osay urprisingsay asyay
ethay escriptionsday ofyay ishay attlesbay, ichwhay aketay upyay onay esslay anthay alfhay ethay
Iliadyay, andyay areyay uppliedsay ithway osay astvay ayay arietyvay ofyay incidentsyay, atthay onay
oneyay earsbay ayay ikenesslay otay anotheryay; uchsay ifferentday indskay ofyay eathsday, atthay
onay otway eroeshay areyay oundedway inyay ethay amesay annermay, andyay uchsay ayay ofusionpray ofyay
oblenay ideasyay, atthay everyyay attlebay isesray aboveyay ethay astlay inyay eatnessgray,
orrorhay, andyay onfusioncay. Ityay isyay ertaincay erethay isyay otnay earnay atthay umbernay ofyay
imagesyay andyay escriptionsday inyay anyyay epicyay oetpay, oughthay everyyay oneyay ashay assistedyay
imselfhay ithway ayay eatgray uantityqay outyay ofyay imhay; andyay ityay isyay evidentyay ofyay Irgilvay
especiallyyay, atthay ehay ashay arcescay anyyay omparisonscay ichwhay areyay otnay awndray omfray
ishay astermay.


Ifyay eway escendday omfray encehay otay ethay expressionyay, eway eesay ethay ightbray
imaginationyay ofyay Omerhay iningshay outyay inyay ethay ostmay enlivenedyay ormsfay ofyay ityay. Eway
acknowledgeyay imhay ethay atherfay ofyay oeticalpay ictionday; ethay irstfay owhay aughttay
atthay anguage“lay ofyay ethay odsgay” otay enmay. Ishay expressionyay isyay ikelay ethay
olouringcay ofyay omesay eatgray astersmay, ichwhay iscoversday itselfyay otay ebay aidlay onyay
oldlybay, andyay executedyay ithway apidityray. Ityay isyay, indeedyay, ethay ongeststray andyay
ostmay owingglay imaginableyay, andyay ouchedtay ithway ethay eatestgray iritspay.
Aristotleyay adhay easonray otay aysay, ehay asway ethay onlyyay oetpay owhay adhay oundfay outyay
iving“lay ordsway;” erethay areyay inyay imhay oremay aringday iguresfay andyay etaphorsmay anthay
inyay anyyay oodgay authoryay ateverwhay. Anyay arrowyay isyay impatient“ay” otay ebay onyay ethay ingway,
ayay eaponway irsts“thay” otay inkdray ethay oodblay ofyay anyay enemyyay, andyay ethay ikelay, yetyay
ishay expressionyay isyay evernay ootay igbay orfay ethay ensesay, utbay ustlyjay eatgray inyay
oportionpray otay ityay. Ityay isyay ethay entimentsay atthay ellssway andyay illsfay outyay ethay
ictionday, ichwhay isesray ithway ityay, andyay ormsfay itselfyay aboutyay ityay, orfay inyay ethay
amesay egreeday atthay ayay oughtthay isyay armerway, anyay expressionyay illway ebay ighterbray,
asyay atthay isyay oremay ongstray, isthay illway ecomebay oremay erspicuouspay; ikelay assglay
inyay ethay urnacefay, ichwhay owsgray otay ayay eatergray agnitudemay, andyay efinesray otay ayay
eatergray earnessclay, onlyyay asyay ethay eathbray ithinway isyay oremay owerfulpay, andyay ethay
eathay oremay intenseyay.


Otay owthray ishay anguagelay oremay outyay ofyay osepray, Omerhay eemssay otay avehay affectedyay
ethay ompoundcay epithetsyay. Isthay asway ayay ortsay ofyay ompositioncay eculiarlypay operpray
otay oetrypay, otnay onlyyay asyay ityay eightenedhay ethay ictionday, utbay asyay ityay assistedyay
andyay illedfay ethay umbersnay ithway eatergray oundsay andyay omppay, andyay ikewiselay
onducedcay inyay omesay easuremay otay ickenthay ethay imagesyay. Onyay isthay astlay
onsiderationcay Iyay annotcay utbay attributeyay esethay alsoyay otay ethay uitfulnessfray ofyay
ishay inventionyay, incesay as(ay ehay ashay anagedmay emthay) eythay areyay ayay ortsay ofyay
upernumerarysay icturespay ofyay ethay ersonspay oryay ingsthay otay ichwhay eythay ereway
oinedjay. Eway eesay ethay otionmay ofyay Ector’shay umesplay inyay ethay epithetyay
Κορυθαίολοςay, ethay andscapelay ofyay Ountmay Eritusnay inyay atthay ofyay Εἰνοσίφυλλοςay,
andyay osay ofyay othersyay, ichwhay articularpay imagesyay ouldcay otnay avehay eenbay insistedyay
uponyay osay onglay asyay otay expressyay emthay inyay ayay escriptionday ough(thay utbay ofyay ayay
inglesay inelay) ithoutway ivertingday ethay eaderray ootay uchmay omfray ethay incipalpray
actionyay oryay igurefay. Asyay ayay etaphormay isyay ayay ortshay imilesay, oneyay ofyay esethay
epithetsyay isyay ayay ortshay escriptionday.


Astlylay, ifyay eway onsidercay ishay ersificationvay, eway allshay ebay ensiblesay atwhay ayay
areshay ofyay aisepray isyay ueday otay ishay inventionyay inyay atthay alsoyay. Ehay asway otnay
atisfiedsay ithway ishay anguagelay asyay ehay oundfay ityay ettledsay inyay anyyay oneyay artpay ofyay
Eecegray, utbay earchedsay oughthray itsyay ifferentday ialectsday ithway isthay
articularpay iewvay, otay eautifybay andyay erfectpay ishay umbersnay ehay onsideredcay
esethay asyay eythay adhay ayay eatergray ixturemay ofyay owelsvay oryay onsonantscay, andyay
accordinglyyay employedyay emthay asyay ethay ersevay equiredray eitheryay ayay eatergray
oothnesssmay oryay engthstray. Atwhay ehay ostmay affectedyay asway ethay Ionicyay, ichwhay ashay
ayay eculiarpay eetnesssway, omfray itsyay evernay usingyay ontractionscay, andyay omfray itsyay
ustomcay ofyay esolvingray ethay iphthongsday intoyay otway yllablessay, osay asyay otay akemay
ethay ordsway openyay emselvesthay ithway ayay oremay eadingspray andyay onoroussay uencyflay.
Ithway isthay ehay ingledmay ethay Atticyay ontractionscay, ethay oaderbray Oricday, andyay ethay
eeblerfay Olicæay, ichwhay oftenyay ejectsray itsyay aspirateyay, oryay akestay offyay itsyay
accentyay, andyay ompletedcay isthay arietyvay ybay alteringyay omesay etterslay ithway ethay
icencelay ofyay oetrypay. Usthay ishay easuresmay, insteadyay ofyay eingbay ettersfay otay ishay
ensesay, ereway alwaysyay inyay eadinessray otay unray alongyay ithway ethay armthway ofyay ishay
aptureray, andyay evenyay otay ivegay ayay urtherfay epresentationray ofyay ishay otionsnay, inyay
ethay orrespondencecay ofyay eirthay oundssay otay atwhay eythay ignifiedsay. Outyay ofyay allyay
esethay ehay ashay erivedday atthay armonyhay ichwhay akesmay usyay onfesscay ehay adhay otnay
onlyyay ethay ichestray eadhay, utbay ethay inestfay earyay inyay ethay orldway. Isthay isyay osay
eatgray ayay uthtray, atthay oeverwhay illway utbay onsultcay ethay unetay ofyay ishay ersesvay,
evenyay ithoutway understandingyay emthay ith(way ethay amesay ortsay ofyay iligenceday asyay eway
ailyday eesay actisedpray inyay ethay asecay ofyay Italianyay operasyay), illway indfay oremay
eetnesssway, arietyvay, andyay ajestymay ofyay oundsay, anthay inyay anyyay otheryay anguagelay ofyay
oetrypay. Ethay eautybay ofyay ishay umbersnay isyay allowedyay ybay ethay iticscray otay ebay
opiedcay utbay aintlyfay ybay Irgilvay imselfhay, oughthay eythay areyay osay ustjay asyay otay
ascribeyay ityay otay ethay aturenay ofyay ethay Atinlay onguetay: indeedyay ethay Eekgray ashay omesay
advantagesyay othbay omfray ethay aturalnay oundsay ofyay itsyay ordsway, andyay ethay urntay andyay
adencecay ofyay itsyay ersevay, ichwhay agreeyay ithway ethay eniusgay ofyay onay otheryay anguagelay.
Irgilvay asway eryvay ensiblesay ofyay isthay, andyay usedyay ethay utmostyay iligenceday inyay
orkingway upyay ayay oremay intractableyay anguagelay otay atsoeverwhay acesgray ityay asway
apablecay ofyay, andyay, inyay articularpay, evernay ailedfay otay ingbray ethay oundsay ofyay ishay
inelay otay ayay eautifulbay agreementyay ithway itsyay ensesay. Ifyay ethay Eciangray oetpay ashay
otnay eenbay osay equentlyfray elebratedcay onyay isthay accountyay asyay ethay Omanray, ethay
onlyyay easonray isyay, atthay ewerfay iticscray avehay understoodyay oneyay anguagelay anthay
ethay otheryay. Ionysiusday ofyay Alicarnassushay ashay ointedpay outyay anymay ofyay ouryay
author’syay eautiesbay inyay isthay indkay, inyay ishay eatisetray ofyay ethay Ompositioncay ofyay
Ordsway. Ityay ufficessay atyay esentpray otay observeyay ofyay ishay umbersnay, atthay eythay owflay
ithway osay uchmay easeyay, asyay otay akemay oneyay imagineyay Omerhay adhay onay otheryay arecay anthay
otay anscribetray asyay astfay asyay ethay Usesmay ictatedday, andyay, atyay ethay amesay imetay,
ithway osay uchmay orcefay andyay inspiritingyay igourvay, atthay eythay awakenyay andyay aiseray
usyay ikelay ethay oundsay ofyay ayay umpettray. Eythay ollray alongyay asyay ayay entifulplay iverray,
alwaysyay inyay otionmay, andyay alwaysyay ullfay; ilewhay eway areyay ornebay awayyay ybay ayay idetay ofyay
ersevay, ethay ostmay apidray, andyay yetyay ethay ostmay oothsmay imaginableyay.


Usthay onyay ateverwhay idesay eway ontemplatecay Omerhay, atwhay incipallypray ikesstray usyay
isyay ishay inventionyay. Ityay isyay atthay ichwhay ormsfay ethay aracterchay ofyay eachyay artpay ofyay
ishay orkway; andyay accordinglyyay eway indfay ityay otay avehay ademay ishay ablefay oremay
extensiveyay andyay opiouscay anthay anyyay otheryay, ishay annersmay oremay ivelylay andyay
onglystray arkedmay, ishay eechesspay oremay affectingyay andyay ansportedtray, ishay
entimentssay oremay armway andyay ublimesay, ishay imagesyay andyay escriptionsday oremay ullfay
andyay animatedyay, ishay expressionyay oremay aisedray andyay aringday, andyay ishay umbersnay
oremay apidray andyay ariousvay. Iyay opehay, inyay atwhay ashay eenbay aidsay ofyay Irgilvay, ithway
egardray otay anyyay ofyay esethay eadshay, Iyay avehay onay ayway erogatedday omfray ishay
aracterchay. Othingnay isyay oremay absurdyay oryay endlessyay, anthay ethay ommoncay ethodmay ofyay
omparingcay eminentyay iterswray ybay anyay oppositionyay ofyay articularpay assagespay inyay
emthay, andyay ormingfay ayay udgmentjay omfray encethay ofyay eirthay eritmay uponyay ethay olewhay.
Eway oughtyay otay avehay ayay ertaincay owledgeknay ofyay ethay incipalpray aracterchay andyay
istinguishingday excellenceyay ofyay eachyay: ityay isyay inyay atthay eway areyay otay onsidercay
imhay, andyay inyay oportionpray otay ishay egreeday inyay atthay eway areyay otay admireyay imhay. Onay
authoryay oryay anmay everyay excelledyay allyay ethay orldway inyay oremay anthay oneyay acultyfay; andyay
asyay Omerhay ashay oneday isthay inyay inventionyay, Irgilvay ashay inyay udgmentjay. Otnay atthay
eway areyay otay inkthay atthay Omerhay antedway udgmentjay, ecausebay Irgilvay adhay ityay inyay ayay
oremay eminentyay egreeday; oryay atthay Irgilvay antedway inventionyay, ecausebay Omerhay
ossessedpay ayay argerlay areshay ofyay ityay; eachyay ofyay esethay eatgray authorsyay adhay oremay ofyay
othbay anthay erhapspay anyyay anmay esidesbay, andyay areyay onlyyay aidsay otay avehay esslay inyay
omparisoncay ithway oneyay anotheryay. Omerhay asway ethay eatergray eniusgay, Irgilvay ethay
etterbay artistyay. Inyay oneyay eway ostmay admireyay ethay anmay, inyay ethay otheryay ethay orkway.
Omerhay urrieshay andyay ansportstray usyay ithway ayay ommandingcay impetuosityyay; Irgilvay
eadslay usyay ithway anyay attractiveyay ajestymay; Omerhay attersscay ithway ayay enerousgay
ofusionpray; Irgilvay estowsbay ithway ayay arefulcay agnificencemay; Omerhay, ikelay ethay
Ilenay, ourspay outyay ishay ichesray ithway ayay oundlessbay overflowyay; Irgilvay, ikelay ayay
iverray inyay itsyay anksbay, ithway ayay entlegay andyay onstantcay eamstray. Enwhay eway eholdbay
eirthay attlesbay, ethinksmay ethay otway oetspay esembleray ethay eroeshay eythay
elebratecay. Omerhay, oundlessbay andyay esistlessray asyay Achillesyay, earsbay allyay
eforebay imhay, andyay inesshay oremay andyay oremay asyay ethay umulttay increasesyay; Irgilvay,
almlycay aringday, ikelay Easænay, appearsyay undisturbedyay inyay ethay idstmay ofyay ethay
actionyay; isposesday allyay aboutyay imhay, andyay onquerscay ithway anquillitytray. Andyay
enwhay eway ooklay uponyay eirthay achinesmay, Omerhay eemssay ikelay ishay ownyay Upiterjay inyay
ishay errorstay, akingshay Olympusyay, atteringscay ethay ightningslay, andyay iringfay ethay
eavenshay: Irgilvay, ikelay ethay amesay owerpay inyay ishay enevolencebay, ounsellingcay
ithway ethay odsgay, ayinglay ansplay orfay empiresyay, andyay egularlyray orderingyay ishay
olewhay eationcray.


Utbay afteryay allyay, ityay isyay ithway eatgray artspay, asyay ithway eatgray irtuesvay, eythay
aturallynay orderbay onyay omesay imperfectionyay; andyay ityay isyay oftenyay ardhay otay
istinguishday exactlyyay erewhay ethay irtuevay endsyay, oryay ethay aultfay eginsbay. Asyay
udencepray aymay ometimessay inksay otay uspicionsay, osay aymay ayay eatgray udgmentjay
eclineday otay oldnesscay; andyay asyay agnanimitymay aymay unray upyay otay ofusionpray oryay
extravaganceyay, osay aymay ayay eatgray inventionyay otay edundancyray oryay ildnessway. Ifyay eway
ooklay uponyay Omerhay inyay isthay iewvay, eway allshay erceivepay ethay iefchay objectionsyay
againstyay imhay otay oceedpray omfray osay oblenay ayay ausecay asyay ethay excessyay ofyay isthay
acultyfay.


Amongyay esethay eway aymay eckonray omesay ofyay ishay arvellousmay ictionsfay, uponyay ichwhay
osay uchmay iticismcray ashay eenbay entspay, asyay urpassingsay allyay ethay oundsbay ofyay
obabilitypray. Erhapspay ityay aymay ebay ithway eatgray andyay uperiorsay oulssay, asyay ithway
iganticgay odiesbay, ichwhay, exertingyay emselvesthay ithway unusualyay engthstray,
exceedyay atwhay isyay ommonlycay oughtthay ethay ueday oportionpray ofyay artspay, otay ecomebay
iraclesmay inyay ethay olewhay; andyay, ikelay ethay oldyay eroeshay ofyay atthay akemay, ommitcay
omethingsay earnay extravaganceyay, amidstyay ayay eriessay ofyay oriousglay andyay inimitableyay
erformancespay. Usthay Omerhay ashay ishay eaking“spay orseshay;” andyay Irgilvay ishay
yrtles“may istillingday oodblay;” erewhay ethay atterlay ashay otnay osay uchmay asyay
ontrivedcay ethay easyyay interventionyay ofyay ayay eityday otay avesay ethay obabilitypray.


Ityay isyay owingyay otay ethay amesay astvay inventionyay, atthay ishay imilessay avehay eenbay
oughtthay ootay exuberantyay andyay ullfay ofyay ircumstancescay. Ethay orcefay ofyay isthay
acultyfay isyay eensay inyay othingnay oremay, anthay inyay itsyay inabilityyay otay onfinecay
itselfyay otay atthay inglesay ircumstancecay uponyay ichwhay ethay omparisoncay isyay
oundedgray: ityay unsray outyay intoyay embellishmentsyay ofyay additionalyay imagesyay, ichwhay,
oweverhay, areyay osay anagedmay asyay otnay otay overpoweryay ethay ainmay oneyay. Ishay imilessay
areyay ikelay icturespay, erewhay ethay incipalpray igurefay ashay otnay onlyyay itsyay
oportionpray ivengay agreeableyay otay ethay originalyay, utbay isyay alsoyay etsay offyay ithway
occasionalyay ornamentsyay andyay ospectspray. Ethay amesay illway accountyay orfay ishay
annermay ofyay eapinghay ayay umbernay ofyay omparisonscay ogethertay inyay oneyay eathbray, enwhay
ishay ancyfay uggestedsay otay imhay atyay onceyay osay anymay ariousvay andyay orrespondentcay
imagesyay. Ethay eaderray illway easilyyay extendyay isthay observationyay otay oremay
objectionsyay ofyay ethay amesay indkay.


Ifyay erethay areyay othersyay ichwhay eemsay atherray otay argechay imhay ithway ayay efectday oryay
arrownessnay ofyay eniusgay, anthay anyay excessyay ofyay ityay, osethay eemingsay efectsday illway
ebay oundfay uponyay examinationyay otay oceedpray ollywhay omfray ethay aturenay ofyay ethay
imestay ehay ivedlay inyay. Uchsay areyay ishay ossergray epresentationsray ofyay ethay odsgay;
andyay ethay iciousvay andyay imperfectyay annersmay ofyay ishay eroeshay; utbay Iyay ustmay erehay
eakspay ayay ordway ofyay ethay atterlay, asyay ityay isyay ayay ointpay enerallygay arriedcay intoyay
extremesyay, othbay ybay ethay ensurerscay andyay efendersday ofyay Omerhay. Ityay ustmay ebay ayay
angestray artialitypay otay antiquityyay, otay inkthay ithway Adamemay Acierday,[38] at“thay
osethay imestay andyay annersmay areyay osay uchmay ethay oremay excellentyay, asyay eythay areyay
oremay ontrarycay otay oursyay.” Owhay ancay ebay osay ejudicedpray inyay eirthay avourfay asyay otay
agnifymay ethay elicityfay ofyay osethay agesyay, enwhay ayay iritspay ofyay evengeray andyay
ueltycray, oinedjay ithway ethay acticepray ofyay apineray andyay obberyray, eignedray
oughthray ethay orldway: enwhay onay ercymay asway ownshay utbay orfay ethay akesay ofyay ucrelay;
enwhay ethay eatestgray incespray ereway utpay otay ethay ordsway, andyay eirthay ivesway andyay
aughtersday ademay avesslay andyay oncubinescay? Onyay ethay otheryay idesay, Iyay ouldway otnay ebay
osay elicateday asyay osethay odernmay iticscray, owhay areyay ockedshay atyay ethay ervilesay
officesyay andyay eanmay employmentsyay inyay ichwhay eway ometimessay eesay ethay eroeshay ofyay
Omerhay engagedyay. Erethay isyay ayay easureplay inyay akingtay ayay iewvay ofyay atthay implicitysay,
inyay oppositionyay otay ethay uxurylay ofyay ucceedingsay agesyay: inyay eholdingbay onarchsmay
ithoutway eirthay uardsgay; incespray endingtay eirthay ocksflay, andyay incessespray
awingdray aterway omfray ethay ingsspray. Enwhay eway eadray Omerhay, eway oughtyay otay eflectray
atthay eway areyay eadingray ethay ostmay ancientyay authoryay inyay ethay eathenhay orldway; andyay
osethay owhay onsidercay imhay inyay isthay ightlay, illway oubleday eirthay easureplay inyay ethay
erusalpay ofyay imhay. Etlay emthay inkthay eythay areyay owinggray acquaintedyay ithway ationsnay
andyay eoplepay atthay areyay ownay onay oremay; atthay eythay areyay eppingstay almostyay eethray
ousandthay yearsyay ackbay intoyay ethay emotestray antiquityyay, andyay entertainingyay
emselvesthay ithway ayay earclay andyay urprisingsay isionvay ofyay ingsthay owherenay elseyay otay
ebay oundfay, ethay onlyyay uetray irrormay ofyay atthay ancientyay orldway. Ybay isthay eansmay
aloneyay eirthay eatestgray obstaclesyay illway anishvay; andyay atwhay usuallyyay eatescray
eirthay islikeday, illway ecomebay ayay atisfactionsay.

Isthay onsiderationcay aymay urtherfay ervesay otay answeryay orfay ethay onstantcay useyay ofyay
ethay amesay epithetsyay otay ishay odsgay andyay eroeshay; uchsay asyay ethay ar-darting“fay
Usphœbay,” ethay ue-eyed“blay Allaspay,” ethay ift-footed“sway Achillesyay,” &cay.,
ichwhay omesay avehay ensuredcay asyay impertinentyay, andyay ediouslytay epeatedray. Osethay
ofyay ethay odsgay ependedday uponyay ethay owerspay andyay officesyay enthay elievedbay otay
elongbay otay emthay; andyay adhay ontractedcay ayay eightway andyay enerationvay omfray ethay
itesray andyay olemnsay evotionsday inyay ichwhay eythay ereway usedyay: eythay ereway ayay ortsay ofyay
attributesyay ithway ichwhay ityay asway ayay attermay ofyay eligionray otay alutesay emthay onyay allyay
occasionsyay, andyay ichwhay ityay asway anyay irreverenceyay otay omityay. Asyay orfay ethay epithetsyay
ofyay eatgray enmay, Onsmay. Oileaubay isyay ofyay opinionyay, atthay eythay ereway inyay ethay aturenay
ofyay urnamessay, andyay epeatedray asyay uchsay; orfay ethay Eeksgray avinghay onay amesnay
erivedday omfray eirthay athersfay, ereway obligedyay otay addyay omesay otheryay istinctionday
ofyay eachyay ersonpay; eitheryay amingnay ishay arentspay expresslyyay, oryay ishay aceplay ofyay
irthbay, ofessionpray, oryay ethay ikelay: asyay Alexanderyay ethay onsay ofyay Ilipphay,
Erodotushay ofyay Alicarnassushay, Iogenesday ethay Yniccay, &cay. Omerhay, ereforethay,
omplyingcay ithway ethay ustomcay ofyay ishay ountrycay, usedyay uchsay istinctiveday
additionsyay asyay etterbay agreedyay ithway oetrypay. Andyay, indeedyay, eway avehay omethingsay
arallelpay otay esethay inyay odernmay imestay, uchsay asyay ethay amesnay ofyay Aroldhay
Arefoothay, Edmundyay Ironsideyay, Edwardyay Ongshankslay, Edwardyay ethay Ackblay Incepray,
&cay. Ifyay yetyay isthay ebay oughtthay otay accountyay etterbay orfay ethay oprietypray anthay orfay
ethay epetitionray, Iyay allshay addyay ayay urtherfay onjecturecay. Esiodhay, ividingday ethay
orldway intoyay itsyay ifferentday agesyay, ashay acedplay ayay ourthfay ageyay, etweenbay ethay
azenbray andyay ethay ironyay oneyay, ofyay eroes“hay istinctday omfray otheryay enmay; ayay ivineday
aceray owhay oughtfay atyay Ebesthay andyay Oytray, areyay alledcay emi-godsday, andyay ivelay ybay
ethay arecay ofyay Upiterjay inyay ethay islandsyay ofyay ethay essedblay.”[39] Ownay amongyay ethay
ivineday onourshay ichwhay ereway aidpay emthay, eythay ightmay avehay isthay alsoyay inyay
ommoncay ithway ethay odsgay, otnay otay ebay entionedmay ithoutway ethay olemnitysay ofyay anyay
epithetyay, andyay uchsay asyay ightmay ebay acceptableyay otay emthay ybay elebratingcay eirthay
amiliesfay, actionsyay oryay ualitiesqay.

Atwhay otheryay avilscay avehay eenbay aisedray againstyay Omerhay, areyay uchsay asyay ardlyhay
eserveday ayay eplyray, utbay illway yetyay ebay akentay oticenay ofyay asyay eythay occuryay inyay ethay
oursecay ofyay ethay orkway. Anymay avehay eenbay occasionedyay ybay anyay injudiciousyay
endeavouryay otay exaltyay Irgilvay; ichwhay isyay uchmay ethay amesay, asyay ifyay oneyay ouldshay
inkthay otay aiseray ethay uperstructuresay ybay underminingyay ethay oundationfay: oneyay
ouldway imagineyay, ybay ethay olewhay oursecay ofyay eirthay arallelspay, atthay esethay
iticscray evernay osay uchmay asyay eardhay ofyay Omer’shay avinghay ittenwray irstfay; ayay
onsiderationcay ichwhay oeverwhay omparescay esethay otway oetspay oughtyay otay avehay
alwaysyay inyay ishay eyeyay. Omesay accuseyay imhay orfay ethay amesay ingsthay ichwhay eythay
overlookyay oryay aisepray inyay ethay otheryay; asyay enwhay eythay eferpray ethay ablefay andyay
oralmay ofyay ethay Eisænay otay osethay ofyay ethay Iliadyay, orfay ethay amesay easonsray ichwhay
ightmay etsay ethay Odysseyyay aboveyay ethay Eisænay; asyay atthay ethay erohay isyay ayay iserway anmay,
andyay ethay actionyay ofyay ethay oneyay oremay eneficialbay otay ishay ountrycay anthay atthay ofyay
ethay otheryay; oryay elseyay eythay ameblay imhay orfay otnay oingday atwhay ehay evernay esignedday;
asyay ecausebay Achillesyay isyay otnay asyay oodgay andyay erfectpay ayay incepray asyay Easænay, enwhay
ethay eryvay oralmay ofyay ishay oempay equiredray ayay ontrarycay aracterchay: ityay isyay usthay
atthay Apinray udgesjay inyay ishay omparisoncay ofyay Omerhay andyay Irgilvay. Othersyay electsay
osethay articularpay assagespay ofyay Omerhay ichwhay areyay otnay osay abouredlay asyay omesay
atthay Irgilvay ewdray outyay ofyay emthay: isthay isyay ethay olewhay anagementmay ofyay Aligerscay
inyay ishay Oeticspay. Othersyay uarrelqay ithway atwhay eythay aketay orfay owlay andyay eanmay
expressionsyay, ometimessay oughthray ayay alsefay elicacyday andyay efinementray, ofteneryay
omfray anyay ignoranceyay ofyay ethay acesgray ofyay ethay originalyay, andyay enthay iumphtray inyay
ethay awkwardnessyay ofyay eirthay ownyay anslationstray: isthay isyay ethay onductcay ofyay
Erraultpay inyay ishay Arallelspay. Astlylay, erethay areyay othersyay, owhay, etendingpray otay
ayay airerfay oceedingpray, istinguishday etweenbay ethay ersonalpay eritmay ofyay Omerhay,
andyay atthay ofyay ishay orkway; utbay enwhay eythay omecay otay assignyay ethay ausescay ofyay ethay
eatgray eputationray ofyay ethay Iliadyay, eythay oundfay ityay uponyay ethay ignoranceyay ofyay ishay
imestay, andyay ethay ejudicepray ofyay osethay atthay ollowedfay; andyay inyay ursuancepay ofyay
isthay inciplepray, eythay akemay osethay accidentsyay uch(say asyay ethay ontentioncay ofyay
ethay itiescay, &cay.) otay ebay ethay ausescay ofyay ishay amefay, ichwhay ereway inyay ealityray
ethay onsequencescay ofyay ishay eritmay. Ethay amesay ightmay asyay ellway ebay aidsay ofyay
Irgilvay, oryay anyyay eatgray authoryay osewhay eneralgay aracterchay illway infalliblyyay
aiseray anymay asualcay additionsyay otay eirthay eputationray. Isthay isyay ethay ethodmay ofyay
Onsmay. eday alay Ottmay; owhay yetyay onfessescay uponyay ethay olewhay atthay inyay ateverwhay ageyay
Omerhay adhay ivedlay, ehay ustmay avehay eenbay ethay eatestgray oetpay ofyay ishay ationnay, andyay
atthay ehay aymay ebay aidsay inyay ishay ensesay otay ebay ethay astermay evenyay ofyay osethay owhay
urpassedsay imhay.

Inyay allyay esethay objectionsyay eway eesay othingnay atthay ontradictscay ishay itletay otay
ethay onourhay ofyay ethay iefchay inventionyay: andyay asyay onglay asyay isthay ich(whay isyay indeedyay
ethay aracteristicchay ofyay oetrypay itselfyay) emainsray unequalledyay ybay ishay
ollowersfay, ehay illstay ontinuescay uperiorsay otay emthay. Ayay oolercay udgmentjay aymay
ommitcay ewerfay aultsfay, andyay ebay oremay approvedyay inyay ethay eyesyay ofyay oneyay ortsay ofyay
iticscray: utbay atthay armthway ofyay ancyfay illway arrycay ethay oudestlay andyay ostmay
universalyay applausesyay ichwhay oldshay ethay earthay ofyay ayay eaderray underyay ethay
ongeststray enchantmentyay. Omerhay otnay onlyyay appearsyay ethay inventoryay ofyay oetrypay,
utbay excelsyay allyay ethay inventorsyay ofyay otheryay artsyay, inyay isthay, atthay ehay ashay
allowedsway upyay ethay onourhay ofyay osethay owhay ucceededsay imhay. Atwhay ehay ashay oneday
admittedyay onay increaseyay, ityay onlyyay eftlay oomray orfay ontractioncay oryay egulationray.
Ehay owedshay allyay ethay etchstray ofyay ancyfay atyay onceyay; andyay ifyay ehay ashay ailedfay inyay
omesay ofyay ishay ightsflay, ityay asway utbay ecausebay ehay attemptedyay everythingyay. Ayay orkway
ofyay isthay indkay eemssay ikelay ayay ightymay eetray, ichwhay isesray omfray ethay ostmay
igorousvay eedsay, isyay improvedyay ithway industryyay, ourishesflay, andyay oducespray ethay
inestfay uitfray: aturenay andyay artyay onspirecay otay aiseray ityay; easureplay andyay ofitpray
oinjay otay akemay ityay aluablevay: andyay eythay owhay indfay ethay ustestjay aultsfay, avehay
onlyyay aidsay atthay ayay ewfay anchesbray ichwhay unray uxuriantlay oughthray ayay ichnessray ofyay
aturenay, ightmay ebay oppedlay intoyay ormfay otay ivegay ityay ayay oremay egularray appearanceyay.

Avinghay ownay okenspay ofyay ethay eautiesbay andyay efectsday ofyay ethay originalyay, ityay
emainsray otay eattray ofyay ethay anslationtray, ithway ethay amesay iewvay otay ethay iefchay
aracteristicchay. Asyay arfay asyay atthay isyay eensay inyay ethay ainmay artspay ofyay ethay oempay,
uchsay asyay ethay ablefay, annersmay, andyay entimentssay, onay anslatortray ancay ejudicepray
ityay utbay ybay ilfulway omissionsyay oryay ontractionscay. Asyay ityay alsoyay eaksbray outyay inyay
everyyay articularpay imageyay, escriptionday, andyay imilesay, oeverwhay essenslay oryay ootay
uchmay oftenssay osethay, akestay offyay omfray isthay iefchay aracterchay. Ityay isyay ethay
irstfay andgray utyday ofyay anyay interpreteryay otay ivegay ishay authoryay entireyay andyay
unmaimedyay; andyay orfay ethay estray, ethay ictionday andyay ersificationvay onlyyay areyay ishay
operpray ovincepray, incesay esethay ustmay ebay ishay ownyay, utbay ethay othersyay ehay isyay otay
aketay asyay ehay indsfay emthay.

Ityay ouldshay enthay ebay onsideredcay atwhay ethodsmay aymay affordyay omesay equivalentyay inyay
ouryay anguagelay orfay ethay acesgray ofyay esethay inyay ethay Eekgray. Ityay isyay ertaincay onay
iterallay anslationtray ancay ebay ustjay otay anyay excellentyay originalyay inyay ayay uperiorsay
anguagelay: utbay ityay isyay ayay eatgray istakemay otay imagineyay as(ay anymay avehay oneday) atthay
ayay ashray araphrasepay ancay akemay amendsyay orfay isthay eneralgay efectday; ichwhay isyay onay
esslay inyay angerday otay oselay ethay iritspay ofyay anyay ancientyay, ybay eviatingday intoyay ethay
odernmay annersmay ofyay expressionyay. Ifyay erethay ebay ometimessay ayay arknessday, erethay
isyay oftenyay ayay ightlay inyay antiquityyay, ichwhay othingnay etterbay eservespray anthay ayay
ersionvay almostyay iterallay. Iyay owknay onay ibertieslay oneyay oughtyay otay aketay, utbay
osethay ichwhay areyay ecessarynay otay ansfusingtray ethay iritspay ofyay ethay originalyay,
andyay upportingsay ethay oeticalpay ylestay ofyay ethay anslationtray: andyay Iyay illway
enturevay otay aysay, erethay avehay otnay eenbay oremay enmay isledmay inyay ormerfay imestay ybay
ayay ervilesay, ullday adherenceyay otay ethay etterlay, anthay avehay eenbay eludedday inyay oursyay
ybay ayay imericalchay, insolentyay opehay ofyay aisingray andyay improvingyay eirthay authoryay.
Ityay isyay otnay otay ebay oubtedday, atthay ethay irefay ofyay ethay oempay isyay atwhay ayay anslatortray
ouldshay incipallypray egardray, asyay ityay isyay ostmay ikelylay otay expireyay inyay ishay
anagingmay: oweverhay, ityay isyay ishay afestsay ayway otay ebay ontentcay ithway eservingpray
isthay otay ishay utmostyay inyay ethay olewhay, ithoutway endeavouringyay otay ebay oremay anthay
ehay indsfay ishay authoryay isyay, inyay anyyay articularpay aceplay. Ityay isyay ayay eatgray ecretsay
inyay itingwray, otay owknay enwhay otay ebay ainplay, andyay enwhay oeticalpay andyay igurativefay;
andyay ityay isyay atwhay Omerhay illway eachtay usyay, ifyay eway illway utbay ollowfay odestlymay inyay
ishay ootstepsfay. Erewhay ishay ictionday isyay oldbay andyay oftylay, etlay usyay aiseray oursyay
asyay ighhay asyay eway ancay; utbay erewhay ishay isyay ainplay andyay umblehay, eway oughtyay otnay otay
ebay eterredday omfray imitatingyay imhay ybay ethay earfay ofyay incurringyay ethay ensurecay ofyay
ayay eremay Englishyay iticcray. Othingnay atthay elongsbay otay Omerhay eemssay otay avehay eenbay
oremay ommonlycay istakenmay anthay ethay ustjay itchpay ofyay ishay ylestay: omesay ofyay ishay
anslatorstray avinghay elledsway intoyay ustianfay inyay ayay oudpray onfidencecay ofyay ethay
ublimesay; othersyay unksay intoyay atnessflay, inyay ayay oldcay andyay imoroustay otionnay ofyay
implicitysay. Ethinksmay Iyay eesay esethay ifferentday ollowersfay ofyay Omerhay, omesay
eatingsway andyay ainingstray afteryay imhay ybay iolentvay eapslay andyay oundsbay e(thay
ertaincay ignssay ofyay alsefay ettlemay), othersyay owlyslay andyay ervilelysay eepingcray inyay
ishay aintray, ilewhay ethay oetpay imselfhay isyay allyay ethay imetay oceedingpray ithway anyay
unaffectedyay andyay equalyay ajestymay eforebay emthay. Oweverhay, ofyay ethay otway extremesyay
oneyay ouldcay oonersay ardonpay enzyfray anthay igidityfray; onay authoryay isyay otay ebay
enviedyay orfay uchsay ommendationscay, asyay ehay aymay aingay ybay atthay aracterchay ofyay
ylestay, ichwhay ishay iendsfray ustmay agreeyay ogethertay otay allcay implicitysay, andyay
ethay estray ofyay ethay orldway illway allcay ulnessday. Erethay isyay ayay acefulgray andyay
ignifiedday implicitysay, asyay ellway asyay ayay oldbay andyay ordidsay oneyay; ichwhay ifferday asyay
uchmay omfray eachyay otheryay asyay ethay airyay ofyay ayay ainplay anmay omfray atthay ofyay ayay ovenslay:
ityay isyay oneyay ingthay otay ebay ickedtray upyay, andyay anotheryay otnay otay ebay esseddray atyay allyay.
Implicitysay isyay ethay eanmay etweenbay ostentationyay andyay usticityray.

Isthay urepay andyay oblenay implicitysay isyay owherenay inyay uchsay erfectionpay asyay inyay ethay
Ipturescray andyay ouryay authoryay. Oneyay aymay affirmyay, ithway allyay espectray otay ethay
inspiredyay itingswray, atthay ethay Ivineday Iritspay ademay useyay ofyay onay otheryay ordsway
utbay atwhay ereway intelligibleyay andyay ommoncay otay enmay atyay atthay imetay, andyay inyay atthay
artpay ofyay ethay orldway; andyay, asyay Omerhay isyay ethay authoryay earestnay otay osethay, ishay
ylestay ustmay ofyay oursecay earbay ayay eatergray esemblanceray otay ethay acredsay ooksbay
anthay atthay ofyay anyyay otheryay iterwray. Isthay onsiderationcay ogether(tay ithway atwhay
ashay eenbay observedyay ofyay ethay aritypay ofyay omesay ofyay ishay oughtsthay) aymay, ethinksmay,
induceyay ayay anslatortray, onyay ethay oneyay andhay, otay ivegay inyay otay everalsay ofyay osethay
eneralgay asesphray andyay annersmay ofyay expressionyay, ichwhay avehay attainedyay ayay
enerationvay evenyay inyay ouryay anguagelay omfray eingbay usedyay inyay ethay Oldyay Estamenttay;
asyay, onyay ethay otheryay, otay avoidyay osethay ichwhay avehay eenbay appropriatedyay otay ethay
Ivinityday, andyay inyay ayay annermay onsignedcay otay ysterymay andyay eligionray.

Orfay ayay urtherfay eservationpray ofyay isthay airyay ofyay implicitysay, ayay articularpay arecay
ouldshay ebay akentay otay expressyay ithway allyay ainnessplay osethay oralmay entencessay andyay
overbialpray eechesspay ichwhay areyay osay umerousnay inyay isthay oetpay. Eythay avehay
omethingsay enerablevay, andyay asyay Iyay aymay aysay, oracularyay, inyay atthay unadornedyay
avitygray andyay ortnessshay ithway ichwhay eythay areyay eliveredday: ayay acegray ichwhay
ouldway ebay utterlyyay ostlay ybay endeavouringyay otay ivegay emthay atwhay eway allcay ayay oremay
ingeniousyay at(thay isyay, ayay oremay odernmay) urntay inyay ethay araphrasepay.

Erhapspay ethay ixturemay ofyay omesay Ismsgræcay andyay oldyay ordsway afteryay ethay annermay ofyay
Iltonmay, ifyay oneday ithoutway ootay uchmay affectationyay, ightmay otnay avehay anyay illyay
effectyay inyay ayay ersionvay ofyay isthay articularpay orkway, ichwhay ostmay ofyay anyyay otheryay
eemssay otay equireray ayay enerablevay, antiqueyay astcay. Utbay ertainlycay ethay useyay ofyay
odernmay ermstay ofyay arway andyay overnmentgay, uchsay asyay atoon“play, ampaigncay, untojay,”
oryay ethay ikelay, into(ay ichwhay omesay ofyay ishay anslatorstray avehay allenfay) annotcay ebay
allowableyay; osethay onlyyay exceptedyay ithoutway ichwhay ityay isyay impossibleyay otay eattray
ethay ubjectssay inyay anyyay ivinglay anguagelay.

Erethay areyay otway eculiaritiespay inyay Omer’shay ictionday, ichwhay areyay ayay ortsay ofyay
arksmay oryay olesmay ybay ichwhay everyyay ommoncay eyeyay istinguishesday imhay atyay irstfay
ightsay; osethay owhay areyay otnay ishay eatestgray admirersyay ooklay uponyay emthay asyay
efectsday, andyay osethay owhay areyay, eemedsay easedplay ithway emthay asyay eautiesbay. Iyay
eakspay ofyay ishay ompoundcay epithetsyay, andyay ofyay ishay epetitionsray. Anymay ofyay ethay
ormerfay annotcay ebay oneday iterallylay intoyay Englishyay ithoutway estroyingday ethay
uritypay ofyay ouryay anguagelay. Iyay elievebay uchsay ouldshay ebay etainedray asyay ideslay
easilyyay ofyay emselvesthay intoyay anyay Englishyay ompoundcay, ithoutway iolencevay otay ethay
earyay oryay otay ethay eceivedray ulesray ofyay ompositioncay, asyay ellway asyay osethay ichwhay
avehay eceivedray ayay anctionsay omfray ethay authorityyay ofyay ouryay estbay oetspay, andyay areyay
ecomebay amiliarfay oughthray eirthay useyay ofyay emthay; uchsay asyay e“thay
oud-compellingclay Ovejay,” &cay. Asyay orfay ethay estray, eneverwhay anyyay ancay ebay asyay
ullyfay andyay ignificantlysay expressedyay inyay ayay inglesay ordway asyay inyay ayay ompoundedcay
oneyay, ethay oursecay otay ebay akentay isyay obviousyay.

Omesay atthay annotcay ebay osay urnedtay, asyay otay eservepray eirthay ullfay imageyay ybay oneyay
oryay otway ordsway, aymay avehay usticejay oneday emthay ybay ircumlocutioncay; asyay ethay
epithetyay einosiphyllosyay otay ayay ountainmay, ouldway appearyay ittlelay oryay idiculousray
anslatedtray iterallylay eaf-shaking“lay,” utbay affordsyay ayay ajesticmay ideayay inyay ethay
eriphrasispay: e“thay oftylay ountainmay akesshay ishay avingway oodsway.” Othersyay atthay
admityay ofyay ifferentday ignificationssay, aymay eceiveray anyay advantageyay omfray ayay
udiciousjay ariationvay, accordingyay otay ethay occasionsyay onyay ichwhay eythay areyay
introducedyay. Orfay exampleyay, ethay epithetyay ofyay Apolloyay, ἑκηβόλοςay oryay
ar-shooting“fay,” isyay apablecay ofyay otway explicationsyay; oneyay iterallay, inyay espectray
ofyay ethay artsday andyay owbay, ethay ensignsyay ofyay atthay odgay; ethay otheryay allegoricalyay,
ithway egardray otay ethay aysray ofyay ethay unsay; ereforethay, inyay uchsay acesplay erewhay
Apolloyay isyay epresentedray asyay ayay odgay inyay ersonpay, Iyay ouldway useyay ethay ormerfay
interpretationyay; andyay erewhay ethay effectsyay ofyay ethay unsay areyay escribedday, Iyay ouldway
akemay oicechay ofyay ethay atterlay. Uponyay ethay olewhay, ityay illway ebay ecessarynay otay
avoidyay atthay erpetualpay epetitionray ofyay ethay amesay epithetsyay ichwhay eway indfay inyay
Omerhay, andyay ichwhay, oughthay ityay ightmay ebay accommodatedyay as(ay ashay eenbay alreadyyay
ownshay) otay ethay earyay ofyay osethay imestay, isyay ybay onay eansmay osay otay oursyay: utbay oneyay
aymay aitway orfay opportunitiesyay ofyay acingplay emthay, erewhay eythay eriveday anyay
additionalyay eautybay omfray ethay occasionsyay onyay ichwhay eythay areyay employedyay; andyay inyay
oingday isthay operlypray, ayay anslatortray aymay atyay onceyay owshay ishay ancyfay andyay ishay
udgmentjay.

Asyay orfay Omer’shay epetitionsray, eway aymay ivideday emthay intoyay eethray ortssay: ofyay
olewhay arrationsnay andyay eechesspay, ofyay inglesay entencessay, andyay ofyay oneyay ersevay oryay
emistitchhay. Iyay opehay ityay isyay otnay impossibleyay otay avehay uchsay ayay egardray otay esethay,
asyay eithernay otay oselay osay ownknay ayay arkmay ofyay ethay authoryay onyay ethay oneyay andhay, ornay
otay offendyay ethay eaderray ootay uchmay onyay ethay otheryay. Ethay epetitionray isyay otnay
ungracefulyay inyay osethay eechesspay, erewhay ethay ignityday ofyay ethay eakerspay endersray
ityay ayay ortsay ofyay insolenceyay otay alteryay ishay ordsway; asyay inyay ethay essagesmay omfray odsgay
otay enmay, oryay omfray igherhay owerspay otay inferiorsyay inyay oncernscay ofyay atestay, oryay
erewhay ethay eremonialcay ofyay eligionray eemssay otay equireray ityay, inyay ethay olemnsay
ormsfay ofyay ayerspray, oathsyay, oryay ethay ikelay. Inyay otheryay asescay, Iyay elievebay ethay
estbay uleray isyay, otay ebay uidedgay ybay ethay earnessnay, oryay istanceday, atyay ichwhay ethay
epetitionsray areyay acedplay inyay ethay originalyay: enwhay eythay ollowfay ootay oseclay, oneyay
aymay aryvay ethay expressionyay; utbay ityay isyay ayay uestionqay, etherwhay ayay ofessedpray
anslatortray ebay authorizedyay otay omityay anyyay: ifyay eythay ebay edioustay, ethay authoryay isyay
otay answeryay orfay ityay.

Ityay onlyyay emainsray otay eakspay ofyay ethay ersificationvay. Omerhay as(ay ashay eenbay aidsay)
isyay erpetuallypay applyingyay ethay oundsay otay ethay ensesay, andyay aryingvay ityay onyay everyyay
ewnay ubjectsay. Isthay isyay indeedyay oneyay ofyay ethay ostmay exquisiteyay eautiesbay ofyay
oetrypay, andyay attainableyay ybay eryvay ewfay: Iyay onlyyay owknay ofyay Omerhay eminentyay orfay ityay
inyay ethay Eekgray, andyay Irgilvay inyay ethay Atinlay. Iyay amyay ensiblesay ityay isyay atwhay aymay
ometimessay appenhay ybay ancechay, enwhay ayay iterwray isyay armway, andyay ullyfay ossessedpay
ofyay ishay imageyay: oweverhay, ityay aymay easonablyray ebay elievedbay eythay esignedday
isthay, inyay osewhay ersevay ityay osay anifestlymay appearsyay inyay ayay uperiorsay egreeday otay
allyay othersyay. Ewfay eadersray avehay ethay earyay otay ebay udgesjay ofyay ityay: utbay osethay owhay
avehay, illway eesay Iyay avehay endeavouredyay atyay isthay eautybay.

Uponyay ethay olewhay, Iyay ustmay onfesscay yselfmay utterlyyay incapableyay ofyay oingday
usticejay otay Omerhay. Iyay attemptyay imhay inyay onay otheryay opehay utbay atthay ichwhay oneyay aymay
entertainyay ithoutway uchmay anityvay, ofyay ivinggay ayay oremay olerabletay opycay ofyay imhay
anthay anyyay entireyay anslationtray inyay ersevay ashay yetyay oneday. Eway avehay onlyyay osethay
ofyay Apmanchay, Obbeshay, andyay Ogilbyyay. Apmanchay ashay akentay ethay advantageyay ofyay anyay
immeasurableyay engthlay ofyay ersevay, otwithstandingnay ichwhay, erethay isyay arcescay
anyyay araphrasepay oremay ooselay andyay amblingray anthay ishay. Ehay ashay equentfray
interpolationsyay ofyay ourfay oryay ixsay ineslay; andyay Iyay ememberray oneyay inyay ethay
irteenththay ookbay ofyay ethay Odysseyyay, ervay. 312, erewhay ehay ashay unspay entytway
ersesvay outyay ofyay otway. Ehay isyay oftenyay istakenmay inyay osay oldbay ayay annermay, atthay oneyay
ightmay inkthay ehay eviatedday onyay urposepay, ifyay ehay idday otnay inyay otheryay acesplay ofyay
ishay otesnay insistyay osay uchmay uponyay erbalvay iflestray. Ehay appearsyay otay avehay adhay ayay
ongstray affectationyay ofyay extractingyay ewnay eaningsmay outyay ofyay ishay authoryay;
insomuchyay asyay otay omisepray, inyay ishay ymingrhay efacepray, ayay oempay ofyay ethay ysteriesmay
ehay adhay evealedray inyay Omerhay; andyay erhapspay ehay endeavouredyay otay ainstray ethay
obviousyay ensesay otay isthay endyay. Ishay expressionyay isyay involvedyay inyay ustianfay; ayay
aultfay orfay ichwhay ehay asway emarkableray inyay ishay originalyay itingswray, asyay inyay ethay
agedytray ofyay Ussybay amboised’ay, &cay. Inyay ayay ordway, ethay aturenay ofyay ethay anmay aymay
accountyay orfay ishay olewhay erformancepay; orfay ehay appearsyay, omfray ishay efacepray andyay
emarksray, otay avehay eenbay ofyay anyay arrogantyay urntay, andyay anyay enthusiastyay inyay oetrypay.
Ishay ownyay oastbay, ofyay avinghay inishedfay alfhay ethay Iliadyay inyay esslay anthay ifteenfay
eeksway, owsshay ithway atwhay egligencenay ishay ersionvay asway erformedpay. Utbay atthay
ichwhay isyay otay ebay allowedyay imhay, andyay ichwhay eryvay uchmay ontributedcay otay overcay
ishay efectsday, isyay ayay aringday ieryfay iritspay atthay animatesyay ishay anslationtray,
ichwhay isyay omethingsay ikelay atwhay oneyay ightmay imagineyay Omerhay imselfhay ouldway avehay
itwray eforebay ehay arrivedyay atyay yearsyay ofyay iscretionday.

Obbeshay ashay ivengay usyay ayay orrectcay explanationyay ofyay ethay ensesay inyay eneralgay; utbay
orfay articularspay andyay ircumstancescay ehay ontinuallycay opslay emthay, andyay oftenyay
omitsyay ethay ostmay eautifulbay. Asyay orfay itsyay eingbay esteemedyay ayay oseclay
anslationtray, Iyay oubtday otnay anymay avehay eenbay edlay intoyay atthay erroryay ybay ethay
ortnessshay ofyay ityay, ichwhay oceedspray otnay omfray ishay ollowingfay ethay originalyay
inelay ybay inelay, utbay omfray ethay ontractionscay aboveyay entionedmay. Ehay ometimessay
omitsyay olewhay imilessay andyay entencessay; andyay isyay ownay andyay enthay uiltygay ofyay
istakesmay, intoyay ichwhay onay iterwray ofyay ishay earninglay ouldcay avehay allenfay, utbay
oughthray arelessnesscay. Ishay oetrypay, asyay ellway asyay Ogilby’syay, isyay ootay eanmay orfay
iticismcray.

Ityay isyay ayay eatgray osslay otay ethay oeticalpay orldway atthay Mray. Ydendray idday otnay ivelay
otay anslatetray ethay Iliadyay. Ehay ashay eftlay usyay onlyyay ethay irstfay ookbay, andyay ayay allsmay
artpay ofyay ethay ixthsay; inyay ichwhay ifyay ehay ashay inyay omesay acesplay otnay ulytray
interpretedyay ethay ensesay, oryay eservedpray ethay antiquitiesyay, ityay oughtyay otay ebay
excusedyay onyay accountyay ofyay ethay astehay ehay asway obligedyay otay itewray inyay. Ehay eemssay otay
avehay adhay ootay uchmay egardray otay Apmanchay, osewhay ordsway ehay ometimessay opiescay,
andyay ashay unhappilyyay ollowedfay imhay inyay assagespay erewhay ehay andersway omfray ethay
originalyay. Oweverhay, adhay ehay anslatedtray ethay olewhay orkway, Iyay ouldway onay oremay
avehay attemptedyay Omerhay afteryay imhay anthay Irgilvay: ishay ersionvay ofyay omwhay
otwithstanding(nay omesay umanhay errorsyay) isyay ethay ostmay oblenay andyay iritedspay
anslationtray Iyay owknay inyay anyyay anguagelay. Utbay ethay atefay ofyay eatgray eniusesgay isyay
ikelay atthay ofyay eatgray inistersmay: oughthay eythay areyay onfessedlycay ethay irstfay inyay
ethay ommonwealthcay ofyay etterslay, eythay ustmay ebay enviedyay andyay alumniatedcay onlyyay
orfay eingbay atyay ethay eadhay ofyay ityay.

Atthay ichwhay, inyay ymay opinionyay, oughtyay otay ebay ethay endeavouryay ofyay anyyay oneyay owhay
anslatestray Omerhay, isyay aboveyay allyay ingsthay otay eepkay aliveyay atthay iritspay andyay
irefay ichwhay akesmay ishay iefchay aracterchay: inyay articularpay acesplay, erewhay ethay
ensesay ancay earbay anyyay oubtday, otay ollowfay ethay ongeststray andyay ostmay oeticalpay, asyay
ostmay agreeingyay ithway atthay aracterchay; otay opycay imhay inyay allyay ethay ariationsvay ofyay
ishay ylestay, andyay ethay ifferentday odulationsmay ofyay ishay umbersnay; otay eservepray,
inyay ethay oremay activeyay oryay escriptiveday artspay, ayay armthway andyay elevationyay; inyay ethay
oremay edatesay oryay arrativenay, ayay ainnessplay andyay olemnitysay; inyay ethay eechesspay, ayay
ulnessfay andyay erspicuitypay; inyay ethay entencessay, ayay ortnessshay andyay avitygray; otnay
otay eglectnay evenyay ethay ittlelay iguresfay andyay urnstay onyay ethay ordsway, ornay
ometimessay ethay eryvay astcay ofyay ethay eriodspay; eithernay otay omityay ornay onfoundcay
anyyay itesray oryay ustomscay ofyay antiquityyay: erhapspay ootay ehay oughtyay otay includeyay ethay
olewhay inyay ayay ortershay ompasscay anthay ashay ithertohay eenbay oneday ybay anyyay
anslatortray owhay ashay olerablytay eservedpray eitheryay ethay ensesay oryay oetrypay. Atwhay
Iyay ouldway urtherfay ecommendray otay imhay isyay, otay udystay ishay authoryay atherray omfray
ishay ownyay exttay, anthay omfray anyyay ommentariescay, owhay earnedlay oeversay, oryay
ateverwhay igurefay eythay aymay akemay inyay ethay estimationyay ofyay ethay orldway; otay
onsidercay imhay attentivelyyay inyay omparisoncay ithway Irgilvay aboveyay allyay ethay
ancientsyay, andyay ithway Iltonmay aboveyay allyay ethay odernsmay. Extnay esethay, ethay
Archbishopyay ofyay Ambray’scay Elemachustay aymay ivegay imhay ethay uesttray ideayay ofyay ethay
iritspay andyay urntay ofyay ouryay authoryay; andyay Ossu’sbay admirableyay Eatisetray ofyay ethay
Epicyay Oempay ethay ustestjay otionnay ofyay ishay esignday andyay onductcay. Utbay afteryay allyay,
ithway ateverwhay udgmentjay andyay udystay ayay anmay aymay oceedpray, oryay ithway ateverwhay
appinesshay ehay aymay erformpay uchsay ayay orkway, ehay ustmay opehay otay easeplay utbay ayay ewfay;
osethay onlyyay owhay avehay atyay onceyay ayay astetay ofyay oetrypay, andyay ompetentcay earninglay.
Orfay otay atisfysay uchsay ayay antway eitheryay, isyay otnay inyay ethay aturenay ofyay isthay
undertakingyay; incesay ayay eremay odernmay itway ancay ikelay othingnay atthay isyay otnay
odernmay, andyay ayay edantpay othingnay atthay isyay otnay Eekgray.

Atwhay Iyay avehay oneday isyay ubmittedsay otay ethay ublicpay; omfray osewhay opinionsyay Iyay amyay
eparedpray otay earnlay; oughthay Iyay earfay onay udgesjay osay ittlelay asyay ouryay estbay oetspay,
owhay areyay ostmay ensiblesay ofyay ethay eightway ofyay isthay asktay. Asyay orfay ethay orstway,
ateverwhay eythay allshay easeplay otay aysay, eythay aymay ivegay emay omesay oncerncay asyay
eythay areyay unhappyyay enmay, utbay onenay asyay eythay areyay alignantmay iterswray. Iyay asway
uidedgay inyay isthay anslationtray ybay udgmentsjay eryvay ifferentday omfray eirsthay, andyay
ybay ersonspay orfay omwhay eythay ancay avehay onay indnesskay, ifyay anyay oldyay observationyay ebay
uetray, atthay ethay ongeststray antipathyyay inyay ethay orldway isyay atthay ofyay oolsfay otay enmay
ofyay itway. Mray. Addisonyay asway ethay irstfay osewhay adviceyay eterminedday emay otay
undertakeyay isthay asktay; owhay asway easedplay otay itewray otay emay uponyay atthay occasionyay
inyay uchsay ermstay asyay Iyay annotcay epeatray ithoutway anityvay. Iyay asway obligedyay otay Irsay
Ichardray Eelestay orfay ayay eryvay earlyyay ecommendationray ofyay ymay undertakingyay otay ethay
ublicpay. Dray. Iftsway omotedpray ymay interestyay ithway atthay armthway ithway ichwhay ehay
alwaysyay ervessay ishay iendfray. Ethay umanityhay andyay anknessfray ofyay Irsay Amuelsay
Arthgay areyay atwhay Iyay evernay ewknay antingway onyay anyyay occasionyay. Iyay ustmay alsoyay
acknowledgeyay, ithway infiniteyay easureplay, ethay anymay iendlyfray officesyay, asyay ellway
asyay inceresay iticismscray, ofyay Mray. Ongrevecay, owhay adhay edlay emay ethay ayway inyay
anslatingtray omesay artspay ofyay Omerhay. Iyay ustmay addyay ethay amesnay ofyay Mray. Oweray, andyay
Dray. Arnellpay, oughthay Iyay allshay aketay ayay urtherfay opportunityyay ofyay oingday usticejay
otay ethay astlay, osewhay oodgay aturenay o(tay ivegay ityay ayay eatgray anegyricpay), isyay onay
esslay extensiveyay anthay ishay earninglay. Ethay avourfay ofyay esethay entlemengay isyay otnay
entirelyyay undeservedyay ybay oneyay owhay earsbay emthay osay uetray anyay affectionyay. Utbay
atwhay ancay Iyay aysay ofyay ethay onourhay osay anymay ofyay ethay eatgray avehay oneday emay; ilewhay
ethay irstfay amesnay ofyay ethay ageyay appearyay asyay ymay ubscriberssay, andyay ethay ostmay
istinguishedday atronspay andyay ornamentsyay ofyay earninglay asyay ymay iefchay
encouragersyay? Amongyay esethay ityay isyay ayay articularpay easureplay otay emay otay indfay,
atthay ymay ighesthay obligationsyay areyay otay uchsay owhay avehay oneday ostmay onourhay otay
ethay amenay ofyay oetpay: atthay ishay acegray ethay Ukeday ofyay Uckinghambay asway otnay
ispleasedday Iyay ouldshay undertakeyay ethay authoryay otay omwhay ehay ashay ivengay in(ay ishay
excellentyay Essayyay), osay ompletecay ayay aisepray:

ead“ray Omerhay onceyay, andyay youyay ancay eadray onay oremay;
Orfay allyay ooksbay elseyay appearyay osay eanmay, osay oorpay,
Ersevay illway eemsay osepray: utbay illstay ersistpay otay eadray,
Andyay Omerhay illway ebay allyay ethay ooksbay youyay eednay.”
