Atthay ethay Earlyay ofyay Alifaxhay asway oneyay ofyay ethay irstfay otay avourfay emay; ofyay omwhay ityay
isyay ardhay otay aysay etherwhay ethay advancementyay ofyay ethay olitepay artsyay isyay oremay owingyay
otay ishay enerositygay oryay ishay exampleyay: atthay uchsay ayay eniusgay asyay ymay Ordlay
Olingbrokebay, otnay oremay istinguishedday inyay ethay eatgray enesscay ofyay usinessbay,
anthay inyay allyay ethay usefulyay andyay entertainingyay artspay ofyay earninglay, ashay otnay
efusedray otay ebay ethay iticcray ofyay esethay eetsshay, andyay ethay atronpay ofyay eirthay
iterwray: andyay atthay ethay oblenay authoryay ofyay ethay agedytray ofyay eroic“hay Ovelay” ashay
ontinuedcay ishay artialitypay otay emay, omfray ymay itingwray astoralspay otay ymay
attemptingyay ethay Iliadyay. Iyay annotcay enyday yselfmay ethay idepray ofyay onfessingcay,
atthay Iyay avehay adhay ethay advantageyay otnay onlyyay ofyay eirthay adviceyay orfay ethay onductcay
inyay eneralgay, utbay eirthay orrectioncay ofyay everalsay articularspay ofyay isthay
anslationtray.

Iyay ouldcay aysay ayay eatgray ealday ofyay ethay easureplay ofyay eingbay istinguishedday ybay ethay
Earlyay ofyay Arnarvoncay; utbay ityay isyay almostyay absurdyay otay articularizepay anyyay oneyay
enerousgay actionyay inyay ayay ersonpay osewhay olewhay ifelay isyay ayay ontinuedcay eriessay ofyay
emthay. Mray. Anhopestay, ethay esentpray ecretarysay ofyay atestay, illway ardonpay ymay
esireday ofyay avinghay ityay ownknay atthay ehay asway easedplay otay omotepray isthay affairyay.
Ethay articularpay ealzay ofyay Mray. Arcourthay e(thay onsay ofyay ethay atelay Ordlay
Ancellorchay) avegay emay ayay oofpray owhay uchmay Iyay amyay onouredhay inyay ayay areshay ofyay ishay
iendshipfray. Iyay ustmay attributeyay otay ethay amesay otivemay atthay ofyay everalsay othersyay
ofyay ymay iendsfray: otay omwhay allyay acknowledgmentsyay areyay enderedray unnecessaryyay ybay
ethay ivilegespray ofyay ayay amiliarfay orrespondencecay; andyay Iyay amyay atisfiedsay Iyay ancay
onay ayway etterbay obligeyay enmay ofyay eirthay urntay anthay ybay ymay ilencesay.

Inyay ortshay, Iyay avehay oundfay oremay atronspay anthay everyay Omerhay antedway. Ehay ouldway
avehay oughtthay imselfhay appyhay otay avehay etmay ethay amesay avourfay atyay Athensyay atthay
ashay eenbay ownshay emay ybay itsyay earnedlay ivalray, ethay Universityyay ofyay Oxfordyay. Andyay Iyay
ancay ardlyhay envyyay imhay osethay ompouspay onourshay ehay eceivedray afteryay eathday, enwhay
Iyay eflectray onyay ethay enjoymentyay ofyay osay anymay agreeableyay obligationsyay, andyay easyyay
iendshipsfray, ichwhay akemay ethay atisfactionsay ofyay ifelay. Isthay istinctionday isyay
ethay oremay otay ebay acknowledgedyay, asyay ityay isyay ownshay otay oneyay osewhay enpay ashay evernay
atifiedgray ethay ejudicespray ofyay articularpay artiespay, oryay ethay anitiesvay ofyay
articularpay enmay. Ateverwhay ethay uccesssay aymay ovepray, Iyay allshay evernay epentray ofyay
anyay undertakingyay inyay ichwhay Iyay avehay experiencedyay ethay andourcay andyay iendshipfray
ofyay osay anymay ersonspay ofyay eritmay; andyay inyay ichwhay Iyay opehay otay asspay omesay ofyay osethay
yearsyay ofyay youthyay atthay areyay enerallygay ostlay inyay ayay irclecay ofyay olliesfay, afteryay ayay
annermay eithernay ollywhay unusefulyay otay othersyay, ornay isagreeableday otay yselfmay.




Ethay Iliadyay.




Ookbay Iyay.


Argumentyay.[40]


Ethay Ontentioncay Ofyay Achillesyay Andyay Agamemnonyay.


Inyay ethay arway ofyay Oytray, ethay Eeksgray avinghay ackedsay omesay ofyay ethay eighbouringnay
ownstay, andyay akentay omfray encethay otway eautifulbay aptivescay, Yseïschray andyay
Iseïsbray, allottedyay ethay irstfay otay Agamemnonyay, andyay ethay astlay otay Achillesyay.
Yseschray, ethay atherfay ofyay Yseïschray, andyay iestpray ofyay Apolloyay, omescay otay ethay
Eciangray ampcay otay ansomray erhay; ithway ichwhay ethay actionyay ofyay ethay oempay opensyay, inyay
ethay enthtay yearyay ofyay ethay iegesay. Ethay iestpray eingbay efusedray, andyay insolentlyyay
ismissedday ybay Agamemnonyay, entreatsyay orfay engeancevay omfray ishay odgay; owhay
inflictsyay ayay estilencepay onyay ethay Eeksgray. Achillesyay allscay ayay ouncilcay, andyay
encouragesyay Alcaschay otay eclareday ethay ausecay ofyay ityay; owhay attributesyay ityay otay ethay
efusalray ofyay Yseïschray. Ethay ingkay, eingbay obligedyay otay endsay ackbay ishay aptivecay,
entersyay intoyay ayay uriousfay ontestcay ithway Achillesyay, ichwhay Estornay acifiespay;
oweverhay, asyay ehay adhay ethay absoluteyay ommandcay ofyay ethay armyyay, ehay eizessay onyay
Iseïsbray inyay evengeray. Achillesyay inyay iscontentday ithdrawsway imselfhay andyay ishay
orcesfay omfray ethay estray ofyay ethay Eeksgray; andyay omplainingcay otay Etisthay, eshay
upplicatessay Upiterjay otay enderray emthay ensiblesay ofyay ethay ongwray oneday otay erhay
onsay, ybay ivinggay ictoryvay otay ethay Ojanstray. Upiterjay, antinggray erhay uitsay,
incensesyay Unojay: etweenbay omwhay ethay ebateday unsray ighhay, illtay eythay areyay
econciledray ybay ethay addressyay ofyay Ulcanvay.
 Ethay imetay ofyay o-and-twentytway aysday isyay akentay upyay inyay isthay ookbay: inenay
 uringday ethay agueplay, oneyay inyay ethay ouncilcay andyay uarrelqay ofyay ethay incespray,
 andyay elvetway orfay Upiter’sjay aystay ithway ethay Iopiansæthay, atyay osewhay eturnray
 Etisthay eferspray erhay etitionpay. Ethay enescay ieslay inyay ethay Eciangray ampcay,
 enthay angeschay otay Ysachray, andyay astlylay otay Olympusyay.


Achillesyay’ athwray, otay Eecegray ethay irefulday ingspray
Ofyay oesway unnumber’dyay, eavenlyhay oddessgay, ingsay!
Atthay athwray ichwhay url’dhay otay Uto’splay oomyglay eignray
Ethay oulssay ofyay ightymay iefschay untimelyyay ainslay;
Osewhay imbslay unburiedyay onyay ethay akednay oreshay,
Evouringday ogsday andyay ungryhay ulturesvay oretay.[41]
Incesay eatgray Achillesyay andyay Atridesyay ovestray,
Uchsay asway ethay overeignsay oomday, andyay uchsay ethay illway ofyay Ovejay![42]

Eclareday, Oyay Usemay! inyay atwhay ill-fatedyay ourhay[43]
Ungspray ethay iercefay ifestray, omfray atwhay offendedyay owerpay
Atona’slay onsay ayay ireday ontagioncay eadspray,[44]
Andyay eap’dhay ethay ampcay ithway ountainsmay ofyay ethay eadday;
Ethay ingkay ofyay enmay ishay everentray iestpray efiedday,[45]
Andyay orfay ethay ing’skay offenceyay ethay eoplepay iedday.

Orfay Yseschray oughtsay ithway ostlycay iftsgay otay aingay
Ishay aptivecay aughterday omfray ethay ictor’svay ainchay.
Uppliantsay ethay enerablevay atherfay andsstay;
Apollo’syay awfulyay ensignsyay acegray ishay andshay:
Ybay esethay ehay egsbay; andyay owlylay endingbay ownday,
Extendsyay ethay eptrescay andyay ethay aurellay owncray.
Ehay uedsay otay allyay, utbay iefchay imploredyay orfay acegray
Ethay other-kingsbray, ofyay Atreusyay’ oyalray aceray[46]

ye“ay ingskay andyay arriorsway! aymay youryay owsvay ebay own’dcray,
Andyay Oy’stray oudpray allsway ielay evellay ithway ethay oundgray.
Aymay Ovejay estoreray youyay enwhay youryay oilstay areyay o’eryay
Afesay otay ethay easuresplay ofyay youryay ativenay oreshay.
Utbay, ohyay! elieveray ayay etchedwray arent’spay ainpay,
Andyay ivegay Yseïschray otay esethay armsyay againyay;
Ifyay ercymay ailfay, yetyay etlay ymay esentspray ovemay,
Andyay eaddray avengingyay Usphœbay, onsay ofyay Ovejay.”

Ethay Eeksgray inyay outsshay eirthay ointjay assentyay eclareday,
Ethay iestpray otay everenceray, andyay eleaseray ethay airfay.
Otnay osay Atridesyay; ehay, ithway inglykay idepray,
Epulsedray ethay acredsay iresay, andyay usthay epliedray:
ence“hay onyay ythay ifelay, andyay yflay esethay ostilehay ainsplay,
Ornay askyay, esumptuouspray, atwhay ethay ingkay etainsday:

Encehay, ithway ythay aurellay owncray, andyay oldengay odray,
Ornay usttray ootay arfay osethay ensignsyay ofyay ythay odgay.
Inemay isyay ythay aughterday, iestpray, andyay allshay emainray;
Andyay ayerspray, andyay earstay, andyay ibesbray, allshay eadplay inyay ainvay;
Illtay imetay allshay ifleray everyyay youthfulyay acegray,
Andyay ageyay ismissday erhay omfray ymay oldcay embraceyay,
Inyay ailyday abourslay ofyay ethay oomlay employ’dyay,
Oryay oom’dday otay eckday ethay edbay eshay onceyay enjoy’dyay.
Encehay enthay; otay Argosyay allshay ethay aidmay etireray,
Arfay omfray erhay ativenay oilsay andyay eepingway iresay.”


illustration[ay: ] Omerhay Invokingyay Ethay Usemay


Ethay emblingtray iestpray alongyay ethay oreshay eturn’dray,
Andyay inyay ethay anguishyay ofyay ayay atherfay ourn’dmay.
Isconsolateday, otnay aringday otay omplaincay,
Ilentsay ehay ander’dway ybay ethay oundingsay ainmay;
Illtay, afesay atyay istanceday, otay ishay odgay ehay ayspray,
Ethay odgay owhay artsday aroundyay ethay orldway ishay aysray.

o“ay Intheussmay! ungspray omfray airfay Atona’slay inelay,[47]
Outhay uardiangay owerpay ofyay Illacay ethay ivineday,[48]
Outhay ourcesay ofyay ightlay! omwhay Enedostay adoresyay,
Andyay osewhay ightbray esencepray ildsgay ythay Ysa’schray oresshay.
Ifyay e’eryay ithway eathswray Iyay unghay ythay acredsay anefay,[49]
Oryay edfay ethay amesflay ithway atfay ofyay oxenyay ainslay;
Odgay ofyay ethay ilversay owbay! ythay aftsshay employyay,
Avengeyay ythay ervantsay, andyay ethay Eeksgray estroyday.”

Usthay Yseschray ay’d:—thepray avouringfay owerpay attendsyay,
Andyay omfray Olympusyay’ oftylay opstay escendsday.
Entbay asway ishay owbay, ethay Eciangray eartshay otay oundway;[50]
Iercefay asyay ehay ovedmay, ishay ilversay aftsshay esoundray.
Eathingbray evengeray, ayay uddensay ightnay ehay eadspray,
Andyay oomyglay arknessday oll’dray aboutyay ishay eadhay.
Ethay eetflay inyay iewvay, ehay ang’dtway ishay eadlyday owbay,
Andyay issinghay yflay ethay eather’dfay atesfay elowbay.
Onyay ulesmay andyay ogsday ethay infectionyay irstfay eganbay;[51]
Andyay astlay, ethay engefulvay arrowsyay ix’dfay inyay anmay.
Orfay inenay onglay ightsnay, oughthray allyay ethay uskyday airyay,
Ethay yrespay, ick-flamingthay, otshay ayay ismalday areglay.
Utbay ereyay ethay enthtay evolvingray ayday asway unray,
Inspiredyay ybay Unojay, Etisthay’ odlikegay onsay
Onvenedcay otay ouncilcay allyay ethay Eciangray aintray;
Orfay uchmay ethay oddessgay ourn’dmay erhay eroeshay ainslay.[52]
Ethay assemblyyay eatedsay, isingray o’eryay ethay estray,
Achillesyay usthay ethay ingkay ofyay enmay address’dyay:

y“whay eavelay eway otnay ethay atalfay Ojantray oreshay,
Andyay easuremay ackbay ethay eassay eway oss’dcray eforebay?
Ethay agueplay estroyingday omwhay ethay ordsway ouldway arespay,
is’tay imetay otay avesay ethay ewfay emainsray ofyay arway.
Utbay etlay omesay ophetpray, oryay omesay acredsay agesay,
Exploreyay ethay ausecay ofyay eatgray Apollo’syay ageray;
Oryay earnlay ethay astefulway engeancevay otay emoveray
Ybay ysticmay eamsdray, orfay eamsdray escendday omfray Ovejay.[53]
Ifyay okenbray owsvay isthay eavyhay ursecay avehay aidlay,
Etlay altarsyay okesmay, andyay ecatombshay ebay aidpay.
Osay Eavenhay, atonedyay, allshay yingday Eecegray estoreray,
Andyay Usphœbay artday ishay urningbay aftsshay onay oremay.”

Ehay aidsay, andyay atsay: enwhay Alcaschay usthay epliedray;
Alcaschay ethay iseway, ethay Eciangray iestpray andyay uidegay,
Atthay acredsay eersay, osewhay omprehensivecay iewvay,
Ethay astpay, ethay esentpray, andyay ethay uturefay ewknay:
Uprisingyay owslay, ethay enerablevay agesay
Usthay okespay ethay udencepray andyay ethay earsfay ofyay ageyay:

eloved“bay ofyay Ovejay, Achillesyay! ould’stway outhay owknay
Ywhay angryyay Usphœbay endsbay ishay atalfay owbay?
Irstfay ivegay ythay aithfay, andyay ightplay ayay ince’spray ordway
Ofyay uresay otectionpray, ybay ythay owerpay andyay ordsway:
Orfay Iyay ustmay eakspay atwhay isdomway ouldway oncealcay,
Andyay uthstray, invidiousyay otay ethay eatgray, evealray,
Oldbay isyay ethay asktay, enwhay ubjectssay, owngray ootay iseway,
Instructyay ayay onarchmay erewhay ishay erroryay ieslay;
Orfay oughthay eway eemday ethay ort-livedshay uryfay astpay,
is’tay uresay ethay ightymay illway evengeray atyay astlay.”
Otay omwhay Elides:—“frompay ythay inmostyay oulsay
Eakspay atwhay outhay ow’stknay, andyay eakspay ithoutway ontrolcay.
E’enyay ybay atthay odgay Iyay earsway owhay ulesray ethay ayday,
Otay omwhay ythay andshay ethay owsvay ofyay Eecegray onveycay.
Andyay osewhay ess’dblay oraclesyay ythay ipslay eclareday;
Onglay asyay Achillesyay eathesbray isthay italvay airyay,
Onay aringday Eekgray, ofyay allyay ethay umerousnay andbay,
Againstyay ishay iestpray allshay iftlay anyay impiousyay andhay;
Otnay e’enyay ethay iefchay ybay omwhay ouryay ostshay areyay edlay,
Ethay ingkay ofyay ingskay, allshay ouchtay atthay acredsay eadhay.”

Encouragedyay usthay, ethay amelessblay anmay epliesray:
or“nay owsvay unpaidyay, ornay ightedslay acrificesay,
Utbay ehay, ouryay iefchay, ovokedpray ethay agingray estpay,
Apollo’syay engeancevay orfay ishay injuredyay iestpray.
Ornay illway ethay od’sgay awaken’dyay uryfay easecay,
Utbay aguesplay allshay eadspray, andyay uneralfay iresfay increaseyay,
Illtay ethay eatgray ingkay, ithoutway ayay ansomray aidpay,
Otay erhay ownyay Ysachray endsay ethay ack-eyedblay aidmay.[54]
Erhapspay, ithway addedyay acrificesay andyay ayerpray,
Ethay iestpray aymay ardonpay, andyay ethay odgay aymay arespay.”

Ethay ophetpray okespay: enwhay ithway ayay oomyglay ownfray
Ethay onarchmay artedstay omfray ishay iningshay onethray;
Ackblay olerchay ill’dfay ishay eastbray atthay oil’dbay ithway ireyay,
Andyay omfray ishay eye-ballsyay ash’dflay ethay ivinglay irefay:
augur“ay accursedyay! enouncingday ischiefmay illstay,
Ophetpray ofyay aguesplay, orfay everyay odingbay illyay!
Illstay ustmay atthay onguetay omesay oundingway essagemay ingbray,
Andyay illstay ythay iestlypray idepray ovokepray ythay ingkay?
Orfay isthay areyay Usphœbay’ oraclesyay exploredyay,
Otay eachtay ethay Eeksgray otay urmurmay atyay eirthay ordlay?
Orfay isthay ithway alsehoodfay isyay ymay onourhay ain’dstay,
Isyay eavenhay offendedyay, andyay ayay iestpray ofanedpray;
Ecausebay ymay izepray, ymay eauteousbay aidmay, Iyay oldhay,
Andyay eavenlyhay armschay eferpray otay offer’dpray oldgay?
Ayay aidmay, unmatch’dyay inyay annersmay asyay inyay acefay,
Ill’dskay inyay eachyay artyay, andyay own’dcray ithway everyyay acegray;
Otnay alfhay osay earday ereway Ytæmnestra’sclay armschay,
Enwhay irstfay erhay oomingblay eautiesbay ess’dblay ymay armsyay.
Yetyay, ifyay ethay odsgay emandday erhay, etlay erhay ailsay;
Ouryay arescay areyay onlyyay orfay ethay ublicpay ealway:
Etlay emay ebay eem’dday ethay atefulhay ausecay ofyay allyay,
Andyay uffersay, atherray anthay ymay eoplepay allfay.
Ethay izepray, ethay eauteousbay izepray, Iyay illway esignray,
Osay earlyday aluedvay, andyay osay ustlyjay inemay.
Utbay incesay orfay ommoncay oodgay Iyay yieldyay ethay airfay,
Ymay ivatepray osslay etlay atefulgray Eecegray epairray;
Ornay unrewardedyay etlay youryay incepray omplaincay,
Atthay ehay aloneyay ashay oughtfay andyay edblay inyay ainvay.”
insatiate“ay ingkay achilles(ay usthay epliesray),
Ondfay ofyay ethay owerpay, utbay onderfay ofyay ethay izepray!
Ould’stway outhay ethay Eeksgray eirthay awfullay eypray ouldshay yieldyay,
Ethay ueday ewardray ofyay anymay ayay ell-foughtway ieldfay?

Ethay oilsspay ofyay itiescay azedray andyay arriorsway ainslay,
Eway areshay ithway usticejay, asyay ithway oiltay eway aingay;
Utbay otay esumeray ate’erwhay ythay avariceyay avescray
at(thay icktray ofyay yrantstay) aymay ebay ornebay ybay avesslay.
Yetyay ifyay ouryay iefchay orfay underplay onlyyay ightfay,
Ethay oilsspay ofyay Ilionyay allshay ythay osslay equiteray,
Ene’erwhay, ybay Ove’sjay ecreeday, ouryay onqueringcay owerspay
Allshay umblehay otay ethay ustday erhay oftylay owerstay.”

Enthay usthay ethay ingkay: all“shay Iyay ymay izepray esignray
Ithway ametay ontentcay, andyay outhay ossess’dpay ofyay inethay?
Eatgray asyay outhay artyay, andyay ikelay ayay odgay inyay ightfay,
Inkthay otnay otay obray emay ofyay ayay oldier’ssay ightray.
Atyay ythay emandday allshay Iyay estoreray ethay aidmay?
Irstfay etlay ethay ustjay equivalentyay ebay aidpay;
Uchsay asyay ayay ingkay ightmay askyay; andyay etlay ityay ebay
Ayay easuretray orthyway erhay, andyay orthyway emay.
Oryay antgray emay isthay, oryay ithway ayay onarch’smay aimclay
Isthay andhay allshay eizesay omesay otheryay aptivecay ameday.
Ethay ightymay Ajaxyay allshay ishay izepray esignray;[55]
Ulyssesyay’ oilsspay, oryay evenyay ythay ownyay, ebay inemay.
Ethay anmay owhay ufferssay, oudlylay aymay omplaincay;
Andyay ageray ehay aymay, utbay ehay allshay ageray inyay ainvay.
Utbay isthay enwhay imetay equires.—itray ownay emainsray
Eway aunchlay ayay arkbay otay oughplay ethay ateryway ainsplay,
Andyay aftway ethay acrificesay otay Ysa’schray oresshay,
Ithway osenchay ilotspay, andyay ithway abouringlay oarsyay.
Oonsay allshay ethay airfay ethay ablesay ipshay ascendyay,
Andyay omesay eputedday incepray ethay argechay attendyay:
Isthay Eta’scray ingkay, oryay Ajaxyay allshay ulfilfay,
Oryay iseway Ulyssesyay eesay erform’dpay ouryay illway;
Oryay, ifyay ouryay oyalray easureplay allshay ordainyay,
Achillesyay’ elfsay onductcay erhay o’eryay ethay ainmay;
Etlay iercefay Achillesyay, eadfuldray inyay ishay ageray,
Ethay odgay opitiatepray, andyay ethay estpay assuageyay.”


illustration[ay: ] Arsmay


Atyay isthay, Elidespay, owningfray ernstay, epliedray:
o“ay yranttay, arm’dyay ithway insolenceyay andyay idepray!
Ingloriousyay aveslay otay interestyay, everyay oin’djay
Ithway audfray, unworthyyay ofyay ayay oyalray indmay!
Atwhay enerousgay Eekgray, obedientyay otay ythay ordway,
Allshay ormfay anyay ambushyay, oryay allshay iftlay ethay ordsway?
Atwhay ausecay avehay Iyay otay arway atyay ythay ecreeday?
Ethay istantday Ojanstray evernay injuredyay emay;
Otay Ia’sphthay ealmsray onay ostilehay oopstray eythay edlay:
Afesay inyay erhay alesvay ymay arlikeway ourserscay edfay;
Arfay encehay emovedray, ethay oarse-resoundinghay ainmay,
Andyay allsway ofyay ocksray, ecuresay ymay ativenay eignray,
Osewhay uitfulfray oilsay uxuriantlay arvestshay acegray,
Ichray inyay erhay uitsfray, andyay inyay erhay artialmay aceray.
Itherhay eway ail’dsay, ayay oluntaryvay ongthray,
Otay avengeyay ayay ivatepray, otnay ayay ublicpay ongwray:
Atwhay elseyay otay Oytray ethay assembledyay ationsnay awsdray,
Utbay inethay, ungratefulyay, andyay ythay other’sbray ausecay?
Isyay isthay ethay aypay ouryay oodblay andyay oilstay eserveday;
Isgracedday andyay injuredyay ybay ethay anmay eway ervesay?
Andyay arestday outhay eatthray otay atchsnay ymay izepray awayyay,
Ueday otay ethay eedsday ofyay anymay ayay eadfuldray ayday?
Ayay izepray asyay allsmay, Oyay yranttay! atch’dmay ithway inethay,
Asyay ythay ownyay actionsyay ifyay omparedcay otay inemay.
Inethay inyay eachyay onquestcay isyay ethay ealthyway eypray,
Oughthay inemay ethay eatsway andyay angerday ofyay ethay ayday.
Omesay ivialtray esentpray otay ymay ipsshay Iyay earbay:
Oryay arrenbay aisespray aypay ethay oundsway ofyay arway.
Utbay owknay, oudpray onarchmay, I’myay ythay aveslay onay oremay;
Ymay eetflay allshay aftway emay otay Essalia’sthay oreshay:
Eftlay ybay Achillesyay onyay ethay Ojantray ainplay,
Atwhay oilsspay, atwhay onquestscay, allshay Atridesyay aingay?”

Otay isthay ethay ingkay: y“flay, ightymay arriorway! yflay;
Ythay aidyay eway eednay otnay, andyay ythay eatsthray efyday.
Erethay antway otnay iefschay inyay uchsay ayay ausecay otay ightfay,
Andyay Ovejay imselfhay allshay uardgay ayay onarch’smay ightray.
Ofyay allyay ethay ingskay e(thay od’sgay istinguish’dday arecay)
Otay owerpay uperiorsay onenay uchsay atredhay earbay:
Ifestray andyay ebateday ythay estlessray oulsay employyay,
Andyay arsway andyay orrorshay areyay ythay avagesay oyjay,
Ifyay outhay asthay engthstray, as’tway Eavenhay atthay engthstray estow’dbay;
Orfay owknay, ainvay anmay! ythay alourvay isyay omfray Odgay.
Astehay, aunchlay ythay esselsvay, yflay ithway eedspay awayyay;
Uleray ythay ownyay ealmsray ithway arbitraryyay aysway;
Iyay eedhay eethay otnay, utbay izepray atyay equalyay ateray
Ythay ort-livedshay iendshipfray, andyay ythay oundlessgray atehay.
Ogay, eatthray ythay earth-bornyay Yrmidons:—butmay erehay[56]
is’tay inemay otay eatenthray, incepray, andyay inethay otay earfay.
Owknay, ifyay ethay odgay ethay eauteousbay ameday emandday,
Ymay arkbay allshay aftway erhay otay erhay ativenay andlay;
Utbay enthay eparepray, imperiousyay incepray! eparepray,
Iercefay asyay outhay artyay, otay yieldyay ythay aptivecay airfay:
Evenyay inyay ythay enttay I’llyay eizesay ethay oomingblay izepray,
Ythay ovedlay Iseïsbray ithway ethay adiantray eyesyay.
Encehay altshay outhay ovepray ymay ightmay, andyay ursecay ethay ourhay
Outhay ood’ststay ayay ivalray ofyay imperialyay owerpay;
Andyay encehay, otay allyay ouryay ostshay ityay allshay ebay ownknay,
Atthay ingskay areyay ubjectsay otay ethay odsgay aloneyay.”

Achillesyay eardhay, ithway iefgray andyay ageray oppress’dyay,
Ishay earthay ell’dsway ighhay, andyay abour’dlay inyay ishay eastbray;
Istractingday oughtsthay ybay urnstay ishay osombay uledray;
Ownay iredfay ybay athwray, andyay ownay ybay easonray ool’dcay:
Atthay omptspray ishay andhay otay awdray ethay eadlyday ordsway,
Orcefay oughthray ethay Eeksgray, andyay iercepay eirthay aughtyhay ordlay;
Isthay isperswhay oftsay ishay engeancevay otay ontrolcay,
Andyay almcay ethay isingray empesttay ofyay ishay oulsay.
Ustjay asyay inyay anguishyay ofyay uspensesay ehay ay’dstay,
Ilewhay alfhay unsheathedyay appear’dyay ethay itteringglay adeblay,[57]
Inervamay iftsway escendedday omfray aboveyay,
Entsay ybay ethay istersay andyay ethay ifeway ofyay Ovejay
or(fay othbay ethay incespray aim’dclay erhay equalyay arecay);
Ehindbay eshay oodstay, andyay ybay ethay oldengay airhay
Achillesyay eizedsay; otay imhay aloneyay onfess’dcay;
Ayay ablesay oudclay onceal’dcay erhay omfray ethay estray.
Ehay eessay, andyay uddensay otay ethay oddessgay iescray,
Ownknay ybay ethay amesflay atthay arklespay omfray erhay eyesyay:


illustration[ay: ] Inervamay Epressingray Ethay Uryfay Ofyay Achillesyay


escends“day Inervamay, inyay erhay uardiangay arecay,
Ayay eavenlyhay itnessway ofyay ethay ongswray Iyay earbay
Omfray Atreusyay’ on?—thensay etlay osethay eyesyay atthay iewvay
Ethay aringday imecray, eholdbay ethay engeancevay ootay.”

orbear“fay e(thay ogenypray ofyay Ovejay epliesray)
Otay almcay ythay uryfay Iyay orsakefay ethay iesskay:
Etlay eatgray Achillesyay, otay ethay odsgay esign’dray,
Otay easonray yieldyay ethay empireyay o’eryay ishay indmay.
Ybay awfulyay Unojay isthay ommandcay isyay ivengay;
Ethay ingkay andyay youyay areyay othbay ethay arecay ofyay eavenhay.
Ethay orcefay ofyay eenkay eproachesray etlay imhay eelfay;
Utbay eatheshay, obedientyay, ythay evengingray eelstay.
Orfay Iyay onouncepray and(ay usttray ayay eavenlyhay owerpay)
Ythay injuredyay onourhay ashay itsyay atedfay ourhay,
Enwhay ethay oudpray onarchmay allshay ythay armsyay imploreyay,
Andyay ibebray ythay iendshipfray ithway ayay oundlessbay orestay.
Enthay etlay evengeray onay ongerlay earbay ethay aysway;
Ommandcay ythay assionspay, andyay ethay odsgay obeyyay.”

Otay erhay Elides:—“withpay egardfulray earyay,
is’tay ustjay, Oyay oddessgay! Iyay ythay ictatesday earhay.
Ardhay asyay ityay isyay, ymay engeancevay Iyay uppresssay:
Osethay owhay evereray ethay odsgay ethay odsgay illway essblay.”
Ehay aidsay, observantyay ofyay ethay ue-eyedblay aidmay;
Enthay inyay ethay eathshay eturn’dray ethay iningshay adeblay.
Ethay oddessgay iftsway otay ighhay Olympusyay iesflay,
Andyay oinsjay ethay acredsay enatesay ofyay ethay iesskay.

Ornay yetyay ethay ageray ishay oilingbay eastbray orsookfay,
Ichwhay usthay edoublingray onyay Atridesyay okebray:
o“ay onstermay! ix’dmay ofyay insolenceyay andyay earfay,
Outhay ogday inyay oreheadfay, utbay inyay earthay ayay eerday!
Enwhay ertway outhay ownknay inyay ambush’dyay ightsfay otay areday,
Oryay oblynay acefay ethay orridhay ontfray ofyay arway?
is’tay oursyay, ethay ancechay ofyay ightingfay ieldsfay otay ytray;
Inethay otay ooklay onyay, andyay idbay ethay aliantvay ieday:
Osay uchmay is’tay afersay oughthray ethay ampcay otay ogay,
Andyay obray ayay ubjectsay, anthay espoilday ayay oefay.
Ourgescay ofyay ythay eoplepay, iolentvay andyay asebay!
Entsay inyay Ove’sjay angeryay onyay ayay avishslay aceray;
Owhay, ostlay otay ensesay ofyay enerousgay eedomfray astpay,
Areyay amedtay otay ongs;—orwray isthay adhay eenbay ythay astlay.
Ownay ybay isthay acredsay eptrescay earhay emay earsway,
Ichwhay evernay oremay allshay eaveslay oryay ossomsblay earbay,
Ichwhay ever’dsay omfray ethay unktray as(ay Iyay omfray eethay)
Onyay ethay arebay ountainsmay eftlay itsyay arentpay eetray;
Isthay eptrescay, orm’dfay ybay emper’dtay eelstay otay ovepray
Anyay ensignyay ofyay ethay elegatesday ofyay Ovejay,
Omfray omwhay ethay owerpay ofyay awslay andyay usticejay ingsspray
emendous(tray oathyay! inviolateyay otay ingskay);
Ybay isthay Iyay ear:—whensway eedingblay Eecegray againyay
Allshay allcay Achillesyay, eshay allshay allcay inyay ainvay.
Enwhay, ush’dflay ithway aughterslay, Ectorhay omescay otay eadspray
Ethay urpledpay oreshay ithway ountainsmay ofyay ethay eadday,
Enthay altshay outhay ournmay ethay affrontyay ythay adnessmay avegay,
Orcedfay otay eploreday enwhay impotentyay otay avesay:
Enthay ageray inyay itternessbay ofyay oulsay otay owknay
Isthay actyay ashay ademay ethay avestbray Eekgray ythay oefay.”

Ehay okespay; andyay uriousfay url’dhay againstyay ethay oundgray
Ishay eptrescay arr’dstay ithway oldengay udsstay aroundyay:
Enthay ernlystay ilentsay atsay. Ithway ikelay isdainday
Ethay agingray ingkay eturn’dray ishay ownsfray againyay.

Otay almcay eirthay assionpay ithway ethay ordsway ofyay ageyay,
Owslay omfray ishay eatsay aroseyay ethay Ylianpay agesay,
Experiencedyay Estornay, inyay ersuasionpay ill’dskay;
Ordsway, eetsway asyay oneyhay, omfray ishay ipslay istill’dday:[58]
Otway enerationsgay ownay adhay ass’dpay awayyay,
Iseway ybay ishay ulesray, andyay appyhay ybay ishay aysway;
Otway agesyay o’eryay ishay ativenay ealmray ehay eign’dray,
Andyay ownay ethay exampleyay ofyay ethay irdthay emain’dray.
Allyay iew’dvay ithway aweyay ethay enerablevay anmay;
Owhay usthay ithway ildmay enevolencebay eganbay:—

at“whay ameshay, atwhay oeway isyay isthay otay Eecegray! atwhay oyjay
Otay Oy’stray oudpray onarchmay, andyay ethay iendsfray ofyay Oytray!
Atthay adverseyay odsgay ommitcay otay ernstay ebateday
Ethay estbay, ethay avestbray, ofyay ethay Eciangray atestay.
Youngyay asyay yeyay areyay, isthay youthfulyay eathay estrainray,
Ornay inkthay youryay Estor’snay yearsyay andyay isdomway ainvay.
Ayay odlikegay aceray ofyay eroeshay onceyay Iyay ewknay,
Uchsay asyay onay oremay esethay agedyay eyesyay allshay iewvay!
Iveslay erethay ayay iefchay otay atchmay Irithouspay’ amefay,
Yasdray ethay oldbay, oryay Eneuscay’ eathlessday amenay;
Eseusthay, enduedyay ithway oremay anthay ortalmay ightmay,
Oryay Olyphemuspay, ikelay ethay odsgay inyay ightfay?
Ithway esethay ofyay oldyay, otay oilstay ofyay attlebay edbray,
Inyay earlyyay youthyay ymay ardyhay aysday Iyay edlay;
Iredfay ithway ethay irstthay ichwhay irtuousvay envyyay eedsbray,
Andyay itsmay ithway ovelay ofyay onourablehay eedsday,
Ongeststray ofyay enmay, eythay iercedpay ethay ountainmay oarbay,
Angedray ethay ildway esertsday edray ithway onstersmay’ oregay,
Andyay omfray eirthay illshay ethay aggyshay Entaurscay oretay:
Yetyay esethay ithway oftsay ersuasivepay artsyay Iyay ay’dsway;
Enwhay Estornay okespay, eythay isten’dlay andyay obey’dyay.
Ifyay inyay ymay youthyay, evenyay esethay esteem’dyay emay iseway;
Oday youyay, youngyay arriorsway, earhay ymay ageyay adviseyay.
Atridesyay, eizesay otnay onyay ethay eauteousbay aveslay;
Atthay izepray ethay Eeksgray ybay ommoncay uffragesay avegay:
Ornay outhay, Achillesyay, eattray ouryay incepray ithway idepray;
Etlay ingskay ebay ustjay, andyay overeignsay owerpay esidepray.
Eethay, ethay irstfay onourshay ofyay ethay arway adornyay,
Ikelay odsgay inyay engthstray, andyay ofyay ayay oddessgay ornbay;
Imhay, awfulyay ajestymay exaltsyay aboveyay
Ethay owerspay ofyay earthyay, andyay eptredscay onssay ofyay Ovejay.
Etlay othbay uniteyay ithway ell-consentingway indmay,
Osay allshay authorityyay ithway engthstray ebay oin’djay.
Eavelay emay, Oyay ingkay! otay almcay Achillesyay’ ageray;
Uleray outhay yselfthay, asyay oremay advancedyay inyay ageyay.
Orbidfay ityay, odsgay! Achillesyay ouldshay ebay ostlay,
Ethay idepray ofyay Eecegray, andyay ulwarkbay ofyay ouryay osthay.”

Isthay aidsay, ehay easedcay. Ethay ingkay ofyay enmay epliesray:
y“thay yearsyay areyay awfulyay, andyay ythay ordsway areyay iseway.
Utbay atthay imperiousyay, atthay unconquer’dyay oulsay,
Onay awslay ancay imitlay, onay espectray ontrolcay.
Eforebay ishay idepray ustmay ishay uperiorssay allfay;
Ishay ordway ethay awlay, andyay ehay ethay ordlay ofyay allyay?
Imhay ustmay ouryay ostshay, ouryay iefschay, ourselfyay obeyyay?
Atwhay ingkay ancay earbay ayay ivalray inyay ishay aysway?
Antgray atthay ethay odsgay ishay atchlessmay orcefay avehay ivengay;
Ashay oulfay eproachray ayay ivilegepray omfray eavenhay?”

Erehay onyay ethay onarch’smay eechspay Achillesyay okebray,
Andyay uriousfay, usthay, andyay interruptingyay okespay:
yrant“tay, Iyay ellway eservedday ythay allinggay ainchay,
Otay ivelay ythay aveslay, andyay illstay otay ervesay inyay ainvay,
Ouldshay Iyay ubmitsay otay eachyay unjustyay ecreeday:—
Ommandcay ythay assalsvay, utbay ommandcay otnay emay.
Eizesay onyay Iseïsbray, omwhay ethay Eciansgray oom’dday
Ymay izepray ofyay arway, yetyay amelytay eesay esumedray;
Andyay eizesay ecuresay; onay oremay Achillesyay awsdray
Ishay onqueringcay ordsway inyay anyyay oman’sway ausecay.
Ethay odsgay ommandcay emay otay orgivefay ethay astpay:
Utbay etlay isthay irstfay invasionyay ebay ethay astlay:
Orfay owknay, ythay oodblay, enwhay extnay outhay arestday invadeyay,
Allshay eamstray inyay engeancevay onyay ymay eekingray adeblay.”

Atyay isthay eythay easedcay: ethay ernstay ebateday expiredyay:
Ethay iefschay inyay ullensay ajestymay etiredray.

Achillesyay ithway Atrocluspay ooktay ishay ayway
Erewhay earnay ishay entstay ishay ollowhay esselsvay aylay.
Eantimemay Atridesyay aunch’dlay ithway umerousnay oarsyay
Ayay ell-rigg’dway ipshay orfay Ysa’schray acredsay oresshay:
Ighhay onyay ethay eckday asway airfay Yseïschray acedplay,
Andyay agesay Ulyssesyay ithway ethay onductcay acedgray:
Afesay inyay erhay idessay ethay ecatombhay eythay ow’dstay,
Enthay iftlysway ailingsay, utcay ethay iquidlay oadray.

Ethay osthay otay expiateyay extnay ethay ingkay eparespray,
Ithway urepay ustrationslay, andyay ithway olemnsay ayerspray.
Ash’dway ybay ethay inybray aveway, ethay iouspay aintray[59]
Areyay eansedclay; andyay astcay ethay ablutionsyay inyay ethay ainmay.
Alongyay ethay oreshay olewhay ecatombshay ereway aidlay,
Andyay ullsbay andyay oatsgay otay Usphœbay’ altarsyay aidpay;
Ethay ablesay umesfay inyay urlingcay iresspay ariseyay,
Andyay aftway eirthay atefulgray odoursyay otay ethay iesskay.

Ethay armyyay usthay inyay acredsay itesray engagedyay,
Atridesyay illstay ithway eepday esentmentray agedray.
Otay aitway ishay illway otway acredsay eraldshay oodstay,
Althybiustay andyay Eurybatesyay ethay oodgay.
aste“hay otay ethay iercefay Achillesyay’ enttay e(hay iescray),
Encethay earbay Iseïsbray asyay ouryay oyalray izepray:
Ubmitsay ehay ustmay; oryay ifyay eythay illway otnay artpay,
Ourselfyay inyay armsyay allshay eartay erhay omfray ishay earthay.”

Ethay unwillingyay eraldshay actyay eirthay ord’slay ommandscay;
Ensivepay eythay alkway alongyay ethay arrenbay andssay:
Arrivedyay, ethay erohay inyay ishay enttay eythay indfay,
Ithway oomyglay aspectyay onyay ishay armyay eclinedray.
Atyay awfulyay istanceday onglay eythay ilentsay andstay,
Othlay otay advanceyay, andyay eakspay eirthay ardhay ommandcay;
Ecentday onfusioncay! Isthay ethay odlikegay anmay
Erceivedpay, andyay usthay ithway accentyay ildmay eganbay:

ith“way eavelay andyay onourhay enteryay ouryay abodesyay,
Yeyay acredsay inistersmay ofyay enmay andyay odsgay![60]
Iyay owknay youryay essagemay; ybay onstraintcay youyay amecay;
Otnay youyay, utbay youryay imperiousyay ordlay Iyay ameblay.
Atrocluspay, astehay, ethay airfay Iseïsbray ingbray;
Onductcay ymay aptivecay otay ethay aughtyhay ingkay.
Utbay itnessway, eraldshay, andyay oclaimpray ymay owvay,
Itnessway otay odsgay aboveyay, andyay enmay elowbay!
Utbay irstfay, andyay oudestlay, otay youryay incepray eclareday
at(thay awlesslay yranttay osewhay ommandscay youyay earbay),
Unmovedyay asyay eathday Achillesyay allshay emainray,
Oughthay ostratepray Eecegray allshay eedblay atyay everyyay einvay:
Ethay agingray iefchay inyay anticfray assionpay ostlay,
Indblay otay imselfhay, andyay uselessyay otay ishay osthay,
Unskill’dyay otay udgejay ethay uturefay ybay ethay astpay,
Inyay oodblay andyay aughterslay allshay epentray atyay astlay.”


illustration[ay: ] Ethay Epartureday Ofyay Iseisbray Omfray Ethay Enttay Ofyay Achillesyay


Atrocluspay ownay ethay unwillingyay eautybay oughtbray;
Eshay, inyay oftsay orrowssay, andyay inyay ensivepay oughtthay,
Ass’dpay ilentsay, asyay ethay eraldshay eldhay erhay andhay,
Andyay oftyay ook’dlay ackbay, ow-movingslay o’eryay ethay andstray.
Otnay osay ishay osslay ethay iercefay Achillesyay orebay;
Utbay adsay, etiringray otay ethay oundingsay oreshay,
O’eryay ethay ildway arginmay ofyay ethay eepday ehay unghay,
Atthay indredkay eepday omfray encewhay ishay othermay ungspray:[61]
Erethay athedbay inyay earstay ofyay angeryay andyay isdainday,
Usthay oudlay amentedlay otay ethay ormystay ainmay:

o“ay arentpay oddessgay! incesay inyay earlyyay oomblay
Ythay onsay ustmay allfay, ybay ootay everesay ayay oomday;
Uresay otay osay ortshay ayay aceray ofyay oryglay ornbay,
Eatgray Ovejay inyay usticejay ouldshay isthay anspay adornyay:
Onourhay andyay amefay atyay eastlay ethay undererthay owedyay;
Andyay illyay ehay ayspay ethay omisepray ofyay ayay odgay,
Ifyay yonyay oudpray onarchmay usthay ythay onsay efiesday,
Obscuresyay ymay oriesglay, andyay esumesray ymay izepray.”

Arfay omfray ethay eepday ecessesray ofyay ethay ainmay,
Erewhay agedyay Oceanyay oldshay ishay ateryway eignray,
Ethay oddess-mothergay eardhay. Ethay avesway ivideday;
Andyay ikelay ayay istmay eshay oseray aboveyay ethay idetay;
Eheldbay imhay ourningmay onyay ethay akednay oresshay,
Andyay usthay ethay orrowssay ofyay ishay oulsay exploresyay.
y“whay ievesgray ymay onsay? Ythay anguishyay etlay emay areshay;
Evealray ethay ausecay, andyay usttray ayay arent’spay arecay.”

Ehay eeplyday ighingsay aidsay: o“tay elltay ymay oeway
Isyay utbay otay entionmay atwhay ootay ellway youyay owknay.
Omfray Ebéthay, acredsay otay Apollo’syay amenay[62]
aëtion’s(ay ealmray), ouryay onqueringcay armyyay amecay,
Ithway easuretray oadedlay andyay iumphanttray oilsspay,
Osewhay ustjay ivisionday own’dcray ethay oldier’ssay oilstay;
Utbay ightbray Yseïschray, eavenlyhay izepray! asway edlay,
Ybay otevay electedsay, otay ethay eneral’sgay edbay.
Ethay iestpray ofyay Usphœbay oughtsay ybay iftsgay otay aingay
Ishay eauteousbay aughterday omfray ethay ictor’svay ainchay;
Ethay eetflay ehay each’dray, andyay, owlylay endingbay ownday,
Eldhay orthfay ethay eptrescay andyay ethay aurellay owncray,
Intreatingyay allyay; utbay iefchay imploredyay orfay acegray
Ethay other-kingsbray ofyay Atreusyay’ oyalray aceray:
Ethay enerousgay Eeksgray eirthay ointjay onsentcay eclareday,
Ethay iestpray otay everenceray, andyay eleaseray ethay airfay;
Otnay osay Atridesyay: ehay, ithway ontedway idepray,
Ethay iresay insultedyay, andyay ishay iftsgay eniedday:
Ethay insultedyay iresay is(hay od’sgay eculiarpay arecay)
Otay Usphœbay ay’dpray, andyay Usphœbay eardhay ethay ayerpray:
Ayay eadfuldray agueplay ensuesyay: ethay avengingyay artsday
Incessantyay yflay, andyay iercepay ethay Eciangray eartshay.
Ayay ophetpray enthay, inspiredyay ybay eavenhay, aroseyay,
Andyay ointspay ethay imecray, andyay encethay erivesday ethay oesway:
Yselfmay ethay irstfay ethay assembledyay iefschay inclineyay
Otay avertyay ethay engeancevay ofyay ethay owerpay ivineday;
Enthay isingray inyay ishay athwray, ethay onarchmay orm’dstay;
Incensedyay ehay eaten’dthray, andyay ishay eatsthray erform’dpay:
Ethay airfay Yseïschray otay erhay iresay asway entsay,
Ithway offer’dyay iftsgay otay akemay ethay odgay elentray;
Utbay ownay ehay eizedsay Iseïsbray’ eavenlyhay armschay,
Andyay ofyay ymay alour’svay izepray efraudsday ymay armsyay,
Efraudsday ethay otesvay ofyay allyay ethay Eciangray aintray;[63]
Andyay ervicesay, aithfay, andyay usticejay, eadplay inyay ainvay.
Utbay, oddessgay! outhay ythay uppliantsay onsay attendyay.
Otay ighhay Olympusyay’ iningshay ourtcay ascendyay,
Urgeyay allyay ethay iestay otay ormerfay ervicesay owedyay,
Andyay uesay orfay engeancevay otay ethay underingthay odgay.
Oftyay asthay outhay iumph’dtray inyay ethay oriousglay oastbay,
Atthay outhay ood’ststay orthfay ofyay allyay ethay etherealyay osthay,
Enwhay oldbay ebellionray ookshay ethay ealmsray aboveyay,
Ethay undauntedyay uardgay ofyay oud-compellingclay Ovejay:
Enwhay ethay ightbray artnerpay ofyay ishay awfulyay eignray,
Ethay arlikeway aidmay, andyay onarchmay ofyay ethay ainmay,
Ethay aitor-godstray, ybay admay ambitionyay ivendray,
Urstday eatthray ithway ainschay ethay omnipotenceyay ofyay Eavenhay.
Enthay, all’dcay ybay eethay, ethay onstermay Itantay amecay
om(whay odsgay Iareusbray, enmay Eonægay amenay),
Oughthray onderingway iesskay enormousyay alk’dstay alongyay;
Otnay ehay atthay akesshay ethay olidsay earthyay osay ongstray:
Ithway iant-pridegay atyay Ove’sjay ighhay onethray ehay andsstay,
Andyay andish’dbray oundray imhay allyay ishay undredhay andshay:
Ethay affrightedyay odsgay onfess’dcay eirthay awfulyay ordlay,
Eythay opp’ddray ethay ettersfay, embledtray, andyay adoredyay.[64]
Isthay, oddessgay, isthay otay ishay emembranceray allcay,
Embraceyay ishay eesknay, atyay ishay ibunaltray allfay;
Onjurecay imhay arfay otay ivedray ethay Eciangray aintray,
Otay urlhay emthay eadlonghay otay eirthay eetflay andyay ainmay,
Otay eaphay ethay oresshay ithway opiouscay eathday, andyay ingbray
Ethay Eeksgray otay owknay ethay ursecay ofyay uchsay ayay ingkay.
Etlay Agamemnonyay iftlay ishay aughtyhay eadhay
O’eryay allyay ishay ideway ominionday ofyay ethay eadday,
Andyay ournmay inyay oodblay atthay e’eryay ehay urstday isgraceday
Ethay oldestbay arriorway ofyay ethay Eciangray aceray.”


illustration[ay: ] Etisthay Allingcay Iareusbray Otay Ethay Assistanceyay Ofyay Upiterjay


unhappy“ay onsay! air(fay Etisthay usthay epliesray,
Ilewhay earstay elestialcay ickletray omfray erhay eyesyay)
Ywhay avehay Iyay ornebay eethay ithway ayay other’smay oesthray,
Otay Atesfay averseyay, andyay ursednay orfay uturefay oesway?[65]
Osay ortshay ayay acespay ethay ightlay ofyay eavenhay otay iewvay!
Osay ortshay ayay acespay! andyay ill’dfay ithway orrowsay ootay!
Oyay ightmay ayay arent’spay arefulcay ishway evailpray,
Arfay, arfay omfray Ilionyay ouldshay ythay esselsvay ailsay,
Andyay outhay, omfray ampscay emoteray, ethay angerday unshay
Ichwhay ownay, alasyay! ootay earlynay eatsthray ymay onsay.
Yetyay at(whay Iyay ancay) otay ovemay ythay uitsay I’llyay ogay
Otay eatgray Olympusyay own’dcray ithway eecyflay owsnay.
Eantimemay, ecuresay ithinway ythay ipsshay, omfray arfay
Eholdbay ethay ieldfay, otnay inglemay inyay ethay arway.
Ethay iresay ofyay odsgay andyay allyay ethay etherealyay aintray,
Onyay ethay armway imitslay ofyay ethay arthestfay ainmay,
Ownay ixmay ithway ortalsmay, ornay isdainday otay acegray
Ethay eastsfay ofyay Iopia’sæthay amelessblay aceray,[66]
Elvetway aysday ethay owerspay indulgeyay ethay enialgay iteray,
Eturningray ithway ethay elfthtway evolvingray ightlay.
Enthay illway Iyay ountmay ethay azenbray omeday, andyay ovemay
Ethay ighhay ibunaltray ofyay immortalyay Ovejay.”

Ethay oddessgay okespay: ethay ollingray avesway uncloseyay;
Enthay ownday ethay eepstay eshay ungedplay omfray encewhay eshay oseray,
Andyay eftlay imhay orrowingsay onyay ethay onelylay oastcay,
Inyay ildway esentmentray orfay ethay airfay ehay ostlay.

Inyay Ysa’schray ortpay ownay agesay Ulyssesyay oderay;
Eneathbay ethay eckday ethay estinedday ictimsvay ow’dstay:
Ethay ailssay eythay url’dfay, eythay ashlay ethay astmay asideyay,
Andyay opp’ddray eirthay anchorsyay, andyay ethay innacepay iedtay.
Extnay onyay ethay oreshay eirthay ecatombhay eythay andlay;
Yseïschray astlay escendingday onyay ethay andstray.
Erhay, usthay eturningray omfray ethay urrow’dfay ainmay,
Ulyssesyay edlay otay Usphœbay’ acredsay anefay;
Erewhay atyay ishay olemnsay altaryay, asyay ethay aidmay
Ehay avegay otay Yseschray, usthay ethay erohay aidsay:

ail“hay, everendray iestpray! otay Usphœbay’ awfulyay omeday
Ayay uppliantsay Iyay omfray eatgray Atridesyay omecay:
Unransom’dyay, erehay eceiveray ethay otlessspay airfay;
Acceptyay ethay ecatombhay ethay Eeksgray eparepray;
Andyay aymay ythay odgay owhay attersscay artsday aroundyay,
Atonedyay ybay acrificesay, esistday otay oundway.”[67]

Atyay isthay, ethay iresay embracedyay ethay aidmay againyay,
Osay adlysay ostlay, osay atelylay oughtsay inyay ainvay.
Enthay earnay ethay altaryay ofyay ethay artingday ingkay,
Isposedday inyay ankray eirthay ecatombhay eythay ingbray;
Ithway aterway urifypay eirthay andshay, andyay aketay
Ethay acredsay offeringyay ofyay ethay altedsay akecay;
Ilewhay usthay ithway armsyay evoutlyday aisedray inyay airyay,
Andyay olemnsay oicevay, ethay iestpray irectsday ishay ayerpray:

od“gay ofyay ethay ilversay owbay, ythay earyay inclineyay,
Osewhay owerpay incirclesyay Illacay ethay ivineday;
Osewhay acredsay eyeyay ythay Enedostay urveyssay,
Andyay ildsgay airfay Ysachray ithway istinguish’dday aysray!
Ifyay, iredfay otay engeancevay atyay ythay iest’spray equestray,
Ythay irefulday artsday inflictyay ethay agingray estpay:
Onceyay oremay attendyay! avertyay ethay astefulway oeway,
Andyay ilesmay opitiouspray, andyay unbendyay ythay owbay.”

Osay Yseschray ay’dpray. Apolloyay eardhay ishay ayerpray:
Andyay ownay ethay Eeksgray eirthay ecatombhay eparepray;
Etweenbay eirthay ornshay ethay altedsay arleybay ewthray,
Andyay, ithway eirthay eadshay otay eavenhay, ethay ictimsvay ewslay:[68]
Ethay imbslay eythay eversay omfray ethay inclosingyay idehay;
Ethay ighsthay, electedsay otay ethay odsgay, ivideday:
Onyay esethay, inyay oubleday aulscay involvedyay ithway artyay,
Ethay oicestchay orselsmay aylay omfray everyyay artpay.
Ethay iestpray imselfhay eforebay ishay altaryay andsstay,
Andyay urnsbay ethay offeringyay ithway ishay olyhay andshay.
Ourspay ethay ackblay ineway, andyay eessay ethay amesflay aspireyay;
Ethay youthyay ithway instrumentsyay urroundsay ethay irefay:
Ethay ighsthay usthay acrificedsay, andyay entrailsyay ess’ddray,
Ethay assistantsyay artpay, ansfixtray, andyay oastray ethay estray:
Enthay eadspray ethay ablestay, ethay epastray eparepray;
Eachyay akestay ishay eatsay, andyay eachyay eceivesray ishay areshay.
Enwhay ownay ethay ageray ofyay ungerhay asway epress’dray,
Ithway urepay ibationslay eythay oncludecay ethay eastfay;
Ethay youthsyay ithway ineway ethay opiouscay obletsgay own’dcray,[69]
Andyay, easedplay, ispenseday ethay owingflay owlsbay aroundyay
Ithway ymnshay ivineday ethay oyousjay anquetbay endsyay,
Ethay anspæay engthen’dlay illtay ethay unsay escendsday:
Ethay Eeksgray, estoredray, ethay atefulgray otesnay olongpray;
Apolloyay istenslay, andyay approvesyay ethay ongsay.

as’tway ightnay; ethay iefschay esidebay eirthay esselvay ielay,
Illtay osyray ornmay adhay urpledpay o’eryay ethay yskay:
Enthay aunchlay, andyay oisthay ethay astmay: indulgentyay alesgay,
Uppliedsay ybay Usphœbay, illfay ethay ellingsway ailssay;
Ethay ilk-whitemay anvascay ellyingbay asyay eythay owblay,
Ethay artedpay oceanyay oamsfay andyay oarsray elowbay:
Aboveyay ethay oundingbay illowsbay iftsway eythay ewflay,
Illtay ownay ethay Eciangray ampcay appear’dyay inyay iewvay.
Arfay onyay ethay eachbay eythay aulhay eirthay arkbay otay andlay,
e(thay ookedcray eelkay ividesday ethay yellowyay andsay,)
Enthay artpay, erewhay etch’dstray alongyay ethay indingway aybay,
Ethay ipsshay andyay entstay inyay ingledmay ospectpray aylay.

Utbay agingray illstay, amidstyay ishay avynay atsay
Ethay ernstay Achillesyay, edfaststay inyay ishay atehay;
Ornay ix’dmay inyay ombatcay, ornay inyay ouncilcay oin’djay;
Utbay astingway arescay aylay eavyhay onyay ishay indmay:
Inyay ishay ackblay oughtsthay evengeray andyay aughterslay ollray,
Andyay enesscay ofyay oodblay iseray eadfuldray inyay ishay oulsay.

Elvetway aysday ereway astpay, andyay ownay ethay awningday ightlay
Ethay odsgay adhay ummon’dsay otay ethay Olympianyay eighthay:
Ovejay, irstfay ascendingyay omfray ethay ateryway owersbay,
Eadslay ethay onglay orderyay ofyay etherealyay owerspay.
Enwhay, ikelay ethay orning-mistmay inyay earlyyay ayday,
Oseray omfray ethay oodflay ethay aughterday ofyay ethay easay:
Andyay otay ethay eatssay ivineday erhay ightflay address’dyay.
Erethay, arfay apartyay, andyay ighhay aboveyay ethay estray,
Ethay undererthay atsay; erewhay oldyay Olympusyay oudsshray
Ishay undredhay eadshay inyay eavenhay, andyay opspray ethay oudsclay.
Uppliantsay ethay oddessgay oodstay: oneyay andhay eshay acedplay
Eneathbay ishay eardbay, andyay oneyay ishay eesknay embracedyay.
if“ay e’eryay, Oyay atherfay ofyay ethay odsgay! e(shay aidsay)
Ymay ordsway ouldcay easeplay eethay, oryay ymay actionsyay aidyay,
Omesay arksmay ofyay onourhay onyay ymay onsay estowbay,
Andyay aypay inyay oryglay atwhay inyay ifelay youyay oweyay.
Amefay isyay atyay eastlay ybay eavenlyhay omisepray ueday
Otay ifelay osay ortshay, andyay ownay ishonour’dday ootay.
Avengeyay isthay ongwray, Oyay everyay ustjay andyay iseway!
Etlay Eecegray ebay umbledhay, andyay ethay Ojanstray iseray;
Illtay ethay oudpray ingkay andyay allyay ethay Achaianyay aceray
Allshay eaphay ithway onourshay imhay eythay ownay isgraceday.”


illustration[ay: ] Etisthay Entreatingyay Upiterjay Otay Onourhay Achillesyay


Usthay Etisthay okespay; utbay Ovejay inyay ilencesay eldhay
Ethay acredsay ounselscay ofyay ishay eastbray onceal’dcay.
Otnay osay epulsedray, ethay oddessgay oserclay ess’dpray,
Illstay asp’dgray ishay eesknay, andyay urgedyay ethay earday equestray.
o“ay iresay ofyay odsgay andyay enmay! ythay uppliantsay earhay;
Efuseray, oryay antgray; orfay atwhay ashay Ovejay otay earfay?
Oryay ohyay! eclareday, ofyay allyay ethay owerspay aboveyay,
Isyay etchedwray Etisthay eastlay ethay arecay ofyay Ovejay?”

Eshay aidsay; andyay, ighingsay, usthay ethay odgay epliesray,
Owhay ollsray ethay underthay o’eryay ethay aultedvay iesskay:

at“whay asthay outhay ask’dyay? ahyay, ywhay ouldshay Ovejay engageyay
Inyay oreignfay ontestscay andyay omesticday ageray,
Ethay odsgay’ omplaintscay, andyay Uno’sjay iercefay alarmsyay,
Ilewhay Iyay, ootay artialpay, aidyay ethay Ojantray armsyay?
Ogay, estlay ethay aughtyhay artnerpay ofyay ymay aysway
Ithway ealousjay eyesyay ythay oseclay accessyay urveysay;
Utbay artpay inyay eacepay, ecuresay ythay ayerpray isyay edspay:
Itnessway ethay acredsay onourshay ofyay ouryay eadhay,
Ethay odnay atthay atifiesray ethay illway ivineday,
Ethay aithfulfay, ix’dfay, irrevocableyay ignsay;
Isthay ealssay ythay uitsay, andyay isthay ulfilsfay ythay owsvay—”
Ehay okespay, andyay awfulyay endsbay ishay ablesay owsbray,[70]
Akesshay ishay ambrosialyay urlscay, andyay ivesgay ethay odnay,
Ethay ampstay ofyay atefay andyay anctionsay ofyay ethay odgay:
Ighhay eavenhay ithway emblingtray ethay eaddray ignalsay ooktay,
Andyay allyay Olympusyay otay ethay entrecay ookshay.[71]

Iftsway otay ethay eassay ofoundpray ethay oddessgay iesflay,
Ovejay otay ishay arrystay ansionsmay inyay ethay iesskay.
Ethay iningshay ynodsay ofyay ethay immortalsyay aitway
Ethay omingcay odgay, andyay omfray eirthay onesthray ofyay atestay
Arisingyay ilentsay, app’dwray inyay olyhay earfay,
Eforebay ethay ajestymay ofyay eavenhay appearyay.
Emblingtray eythay andstay, ilewhay Ovejay assumesyay ethay onethray,
Allyay, utbay ethay od’sgay imperiousyay ueenqay aloneyay:
Atelay adhay eshay iew’dvay ethay ilver-footedsay ameday,
Andyay allyay erhay assionspay indledkay intoyay ameflay.
ay“say, artfulyay anagermay ofyay eavenhay e(shay iescray),
Owhay ownay artakespay ethay ecretssay ofyay ethay iesskay?
Ythay Unojay owsknay otnay ethay ecreesday ofyay atefay,
Inyay ainvay ethay artnerpay ofyay imperialyay atestay.
Atwhay avouritefay oddessgay enthay osethay arescay ividesday,
Ichwhay Ovejay inyay udencepray omfray ishay onsortcay ideshay?”

Otay isthay ethay undererthay: eek“say otnay outhay otay indfay
Ethay acredsay ounselscay ofyay almightyyay indmay:
Involvedyay inyay arknessday ieslay ethay eatgray ecreeday,
Ornay ancay ethay epthsday ofyay atefay ebay iercedpay ybay eethay.
Atwhay itsfay ythay owledgeknay, outhay ethay irstfay altshay owknay;
Ethay irstfay ofyay odsgay aboveyay, andyay enmay elowbay;
Utbay outhay, ornay eythay, allshay earchsay ethay oughtsthay atthay ollray
Eepday inyay ethay oseclay ecessesray ofyay ymay oulsay.”

Ullfay onyay ethay iresay ethay oddessgay ofyay ethay iesskay
Oll’dray ethay argelay orbsyay ofyay erhay ajesticmay eyesyay,
Andyay usthay eturn’d:—“austereray Aturniussay, aysay,
Omfray encewhay isthay athwray, oryay owhay ontrolscay ythay aysway?
Ythay oundlessbay illway, orfay emay, emainsray inyay orcefay,
Andyay allyay ythay ounselscay aketay ethay estinedday oursecay.
Utbay is’tay orfay Eecegray Iyay earfay: orfay atelay asway eensay,
Inyay oseclay onsultcay, ethay ilver-footedsay ueenqay.
Ovejay otay ishay Etisthay othingnay ouldcay enyday,
Ornay asway ethay ignalsay ainvay atthay ookshay ethay yskay.
Atwhay atalfay avourfay ashay ethay oddessgay onway,
Otay acegray erhay iercefay, inexorableyay onsay?
Erhapspay inyay Eciangray oodblay otay enchdray ethay ainplay,
Andyay utglay ishay engeancevay ithway ymay eoplepay ainslay.”

Enthay usthay ethay odgay: o“ay estlessray atefay ofyay idepray,
Atthay ivesstray otay earnlay atwhay eavenhay esolvesray otay idehay;
Ainvay isyay ethay earchsay, esumptuouspray andyay abhorr’dyay,
Anxiousyay otay eethay, andyay odiousyay otay ythay ordlay.
Etlay isthay ufficesay: ethay immutableyay ecreeday
Onay orcefay ancay akeshay: atwhay isyay, atthay oughtyay otay ebay.
Oddessgay, ubmitsay; ornay areday ouryay illway ithstandway,
Utbay eaddray ethay owerpay ofyay isthay avengingyay andhay:
Ethay unitedyay engthstray ofyay allyay ethay odsgay aboveyay
Inyay ainvay esistsray ethay omnipotenceyay ofyay Ovejay.”


illustration[ay: ] Ulcanvay


Ethay undererthay okespay, ornay urstday ethay ueenqay eplyray;
Ayay everentray orrorhay ilencedsay allyay ethay yskay.
Ethay eastfay isturb’dday, ithway orrowsay Ulcanvay awsay
Ishay othermay enacedmay, andyay ethay odsgay inyay aweyay;
Eacepay atyay ishay earthay, andyay easureplay ishay esignday,
Usthay interposedyay ethay architectyay ivineday:
e“thay etchedwray uarrelsqay ofyay ethay ortalmay atestay
Areyay arfay unworthyyay, odsgay! ofyay youryay ebateday:
Etlay enmay eirthay aysday inyay enselesssay ifestray employyay,
Eway, inyay eternalyay eacepay andyay onstantcay oyjay.
Outhay, oddess-mothergay, ithway ouryay iresay omplycay,
Ornay eakbray ethay acredsay unionyay ofyay ethay yskay:
Estlay, ousedray otay ageray, ehay akeshay ethay ess’dblay abodesyay,
Aunchlay ethay edray ightninglay, andyay ethroneday ethay odsgay.
Ifyay youyay ubmitsay, ethay undererthay andsstay appeasedyay;
Ethay aciousgray owerpay isyay illingway otay ebay easedplay.”

Usthay Ulcanvay okespay: andyay isingray ithway ayay oundbay,
Ethay oubleday owlbay ithway arklingspay ectarnay own’dcray,[72]
Ichwhay eldhay otay Unojay inyay ayay eerfulchay ayway,
oddess“gay e(hay iedcray), ebay atientpay andyay obeyyay.
Earday asyay youyay areyay, ifyay Ovejay ishay armyay extendyay,
Iyay ancay utbay ievegray, unableyay otay efendday.
Atwhay odgay osay aringday inyay youryay aidyay otay ovemay,
Oryay iftlay ishay andhay againstyay ethay orcefay ofyay Ovejay?
Onceyay inyay youryay ausecay Iyay eltfay ishay atchlessmay ightmay,
Url’dhay eadlonghay ownday omfray ethay etherealyay eighthay;[73]
Oss’dtay allyay ethay ayday inyay apidray irclescay oundray,
Ornay illtay ethay unsay escendedday ouch’dtay ethay oundgray.
Eathlessbray Iyay ellfay, inyay iddygay otionmay ostlay;
Ethay Inthianssay aisedray emay onyay ethay Emnianlay oastcay;[74]

Ehay aidsay, andyay otay erhay andshay ethay obletgay eavedhay,
Ichwhay, ithway ayay ilesmay, ethay ite-arm’dwhay ueenqay eceivedray
Enthay, otay ethay estray ehay ill’dfay; andyay inyay ishay urntay,
Eachyay otay ishay ipslay appliedyay ethay ectar’dnay urnyay,
Ulcanvay ithway awkwardyay acegray ishay officeyay iesplay,
Andyay unextinguish’dyay aughterlay akesshay ethay iesskay.

Usthay ethay estblay odsgay ethay enialgay ayday olongpray,
Inyay eastsfay ambrosialyay, andyay elestialcay ongsay.[75]
Apolloyay unedtay ethay yrelay; ethay Usesmay oundray
Ithway oicevay alternateyay aidyay ethay ilversay oundsay.
Eantimemay ethay adiantray unsay otay ortalmay ightsay
Escendingday iftsway, oll’dray ownday ethay apidray ightlay:
Enthay otay eirthay arrystay omesday ethay odsgay epartday,
Ethay iningshay onumentsmay ofyay Ulcan’svay artyay:
Ovejay onyay ishay ouchcay eclinedray ishay awfulyay eadhay,
Andyay Unojay umber’dslay onyay ethay oldengay edbay.


illustration[ay: ] Upiterjay


illustration[ay: ] Ethay Apotheosisyay Ofyay Omerhay




Ookbay Iiyay.


Argumentyay.


Ethay Ialtray Ofyay Ethay Armyyay, Andyay Ataloguecay Ofyay Ethay Orcesfay.


Upiterjay, inyay ursuancepay ofyay ethay equestray ofyay Etisthay, endssay ayay eceitfulday
isionvay otay Agamemnonyay, ersuadingpay imhay otay eadlay ethay armyyay otay attlebay, inyay
orderyay otay akemay ethay Eeksgray ensiblesay ofyay eirthay antway ofyay Achillesyay. Ethay
eneralgay, owhay isyay eludedday ithway ethay opeshay ofyay akingtay Oytray ithoutway ishay
assistanceyay, utbay earsfay ethay armyyay asway iscouragedday ybay ishay absenceyay, andyay ethay
atelay agueplay, asyay ellway asyay ybay ethay engthlay ofyay imetay, ontrivescay otay akemay ialtray
ofyay eirthay ispositionday ybay ayay atagemstray. Ehay irstfay ommunicatescay ishay esignday
otay ethay incespray inyay ouncilcay, atthay ehay ouldway oposepray ayay eturnray otay ethay
oldierssay, andyay atthay eythay ouldshay utpay ayay opstay otay emthay ifyay ethay oposalpray asway
embracedyay. Enthay ehay assemblesyay ethay olewhay osthay, andyay uponyay ovingmay orfay ayay
eturnray otay Eecegray, eythay unanimouslyyay agreeyay otay ityay, andyay unray otay eparepray ethay
ipsshay. Eythay areyay etainedday ybay ethay anagementmay ofyay Ulyssesyay, owhay astiseschay
ethay insolenceyay ofyay Ersitesthay. Ethay assemblyyay isyay ecalledray, everalsay eechesspay
ademay onyay ethay occasionyay, andyay atyay engthlay ethay adviceyay ofyay Estornay ollowedfay,
ichwhay asway otay akemay ayay eneralgay ustermay ofyay ethay oopstray, andyay otay ivideday emthay
intoyay eirthay everalsay ationsnay, eforebay eythay oceededpray otay attlebay. Isthay ivesgay
occasionyay otay ethay oetpay otay enumerateyay allyay ethay orcesfay ofyay ethay Eeksgray andyay
Ojanstray, andyay inyay ayay argelay ataloguecay.
 Ethay imetay employedyay inyay isthay ookbay onsistscay otnay entirelyyay ofyay oneyay ayday.
 Ethay enescay ieslay inyay ethay Eciangray ampcay, andyay uponyay ethay ea-shoresay; owardstay
 ethay endyay ityay emovesray otay Oytray.


Ownay easingplay eepslay adhay eal’dsay eachyay ortalmay eyeyay,
Etch’dstray inyay ethay entstay ethay Eciangray eaderslay ielay:
Ethay immortalsyay umber’dslay onyay eirthay onesthray aboveyay;
Allyay, utbay ethay ever-wakefulyay eyesyay ofyay Ovejay.[76]
Otay onourhay Etisthay’ onsay ehay endsbay ishay arecay,
Andyay ungeplay ethay Eeksgray inyay allyay ethay oesway ofyay arway:
Enthay idsbay anyay emptyyay antomphay iseray otay ightsay,
Andyay usthay ommandscay ethay isionvay ofyay ethay ightnay.

y“flay encehay, eludingday Eamdray! andyay ightlay asyay airyay,[77]
Otay Agamemnon’syay ampleyay enttay epairray.
Idbay imhay inyay armsyay awdray orthfay ethay embattledyay aintray,
Eadlay allyay ishay Eciansgray otay ethay ustyday ainplay.
Eclareday, e’enyay ownay is’tay ivengay imhay otay estroyday
Ethay oftylay owerstay ofyay ide-extendedway Oytray.
Orfay ownay onay oremay ethay odsgay ithway atefay ontendcay,
Atyay Uno’sjay uitsay ethay eavenlyhay actionsfay endyay.
Estructionday angshay o’eryay yonyay evotedday allway,
Andyay oddingnay Ilionyay aitsway ethay impendingyay allfay.”

Iftsway asyay ethay ordway ethay ainvay illusionyay edflay,
Escendsday, andyay overshay o’eryay Atridesyay’ eadhay;
Othedclay inyay ethay igurefay ofyay ethay Ylianpay agesay,
Enown’dray orfay isdomway, andyay everedray orfay ageyay:
Aroundyay ishay emplestay eadsspray ishay oldengay ingway,
Andyay usthay ethay atteringflay eamdray eceivesday ethay ingkay.


illustration[ay: ] Upiterjay Endingsay Ethay Evilyay Eamdray Otay Agamemnonyay


anst“cay outhay, ithway allyay ayay onarch’smay arescay oppress’dyay,
Oyay Atreusyay’ onsay! anstcay outhay indulgeyay ythay estray?[78]
Illyay itsfay ayay iefchay owhay ightymay ationsnay uidesgay,
Irectsday inyay ouncilcay, andyay inyay arway esidespray,
Otay omwhay itsyay afetysay ayay olewhay eoplepay owesyay,
Otay asteway onglay ightsnay inyay indolentyay eposeray.[79]
Onarchmay, awakeyay! is’tay Ove’sjay ommandcay Iyay earbay;
Outhay, andyay ythay oryglay, aimclay ishay eavenlyhay arecay.
Inyay ustjay arrayyay awdray orthfay ethay embattledyay aintray,
Eadlay allyay ythay Eciansgray otay ethay ustyday ainplay;
E’enyay ownay, Oyay ingkay! is’tay ivengay eethay otay estroyday
Ethay oftylay owerstay ofyay ide-extendedway Oytray.
Orfay ownay onay oremay ethay odsgay ithway atefay ontendcay,
Atyay Uno’sjay uitsay ethay eavenlyhay actionsfay endyay.
Estructionday angshay o’eryay yonyay evotedday allway,
Andyay oddingnay Ilionyay aitsway ethay impendingyay allfay.
Awakeyay, utbay akingway isthay adviceyay approveyay,
Andyay usttray ethay isionvay atthay escendsday omfray Ovejay.”

Ethay antomphay aidsay; enthay anish’dvay omfray ishay ightsay,
Esolvesray otay airyay, andyay ixesmay ithway ethay ightnay.
Ayay ousandthay emesschay ethay onarch’smay indmay employyay;
Elateyay inyay oughtthay ehay ackssay untakenyay Oytray:
Ainvay asyay ehay asway, andyay otay ethay uturefay indblay,
Ornay awsay atwhay Ovejay andyay ecretsay atefay esign’dday,
Atwhay ightymay oilstay otay eitheryay osthay emainray,
Atwhay enesscay ofyay iefgray, andyay umbersnay ofyay ethay ainslay!
Eageryay ehay isesray, andyay inyay ancyfay earshay
Ethay oicevay elestialcay urmuringmay inyay ishay earsyay.
Irstfay onyay ishay imbslay ayay enderslay estvay ehay ewdray,
Aroundyay imhay extnay ethay egalray antlemay ewthray,
Ethay embroider’dyay andalssay onyay ishay eetfay ereway iedtay;
Ethay arrystay alchionfay itter’dglay atyay ishay idesay;
Andyay astlay, ishay armyay ethay assymay eptrescay oadslay,
Unstain’dyay, immortalyay, andyay ethay iftgay ofyay odsgay.

Ownay osyray Ornmay ascendsyay ethay ourtcay ofyay Ovejay,
Iftslay upyay erhay ightlay, andyay opensyay ayday aboveyay.
Ethay ingkay espatch’dday ishay eraldshay ithway ommandscay
Otay angeray ethay ampcay andyay ummonsay allyay ethay andsbay:
Ethay atheringgay ostshay ethay onarch’smay ordway obeyyay;
Ilewhay otay ethay eetflay Atridesyay endsbay ishay ayway.
Inyay ishay ackblay ipshay ethay Ylianpay incepray ehay oundfay;
Erethay allscay ayay enatesay ofyay ethay eerspay aroundyay:
Ethay assemblyyay acedplay, ethay ingkay ofyay enmay express’dyay
Ethay ounselscay abouringlay inyay ishay artfulyay eastbray.

iends“fray andyay onfederatescay! ithway attentiveyay earyay
Eceiveray ymay ordsway, andyay editcray atwhay youyay earhay.
Atelay asyay Iyay umber’dslay inyay ethay adesshay ofyay ightnay,
Ayay eamdray ivineday appear’dyay eforebay ymay ightsay;
Osewhay isionaryvay ormfay ikelay Estornay amecay,
Ethay amesay inyay abithay, andyay inyay ienmay ethay amesay.[80]
Ethay eavenlyhay antomphay over’dhay o’eryay ymay eadhay,
and‘ay, ostday outhay eepslay, Oyay Atreusyay’ onsay? e(hay aidsay)
Illyay itsfay ayay iefchay owhay ightymay ationsnay uidesgay,
Irectsday inyay ouncilcay, andyay inyay arway esidespray;
Otay omwhay itsyay afetysay ayay olewhay eoplepay owesyay,
Otay asteway onglay ightsnay inyay indolentyay eposeray.
Onarchmay, awakeyay! is’tay Ove’sjay ommandcay Iyay earbay,
Outhay andyay ythay oryglay aimclay ishay eavenlyhay arecay.
Inyay ustjay arrayyay awdray orthfay ethay embattledyay aintray,
Andyay eadlay ethay Eciansgray otay ethay ustyday ainplay;
E’enyay ownay, Oyay ingkay! is’tay ivengay eethay otay estroyday
Ethay oftylay owerstay ofyay ide-extendedway Oytray.
Orfay ownay onay oremay ethay odsgay ithway atefay ontendcay,
Atyay Uno’sjay uitsay ethay eavenlyhay actionsfay endyay.
Estructionday angshay o’eryay yonyay evotedday allway,
Andyay oddingnay Ilionyay aitsway ethay impendingyay allfay.

Isthay earhay observantyay, andyay ethay odsgay obeyyay!’
Ethay isionvay okespay, andyay ass’dpay inyay airyay awayyay.
Ownay, aliantvay iefschay! incesay eavenhay itselfyay alarmsyay,
Uniteyay, andyay ouseray ethay onssay ofyay Eecegray otay armsyay.
Utbay irstfay, ithway autioncay, ytray atwhay yetyay eythay areday,
Ornway ithway inenay yearsyay ofyay unsuccessfulyay arway.
Otay ovemay ethay oopstray otay easuremay ackbay ethay ainmay,
Ebay inemay; andyay yoursyay ethay ovincepray otay etainday.”

Ehay okespay, andyay atsay: enwhay Estornay, isingray aidsay,
estor(nay, omwhay Ylospay’ andysay ealmsray obey’dyay,)
inces“pray ofyay Eecegray, youryay aithfulfay earsyay inclineyay,
Ornay oubtday ethay isionvay ofyay ethay owerspay ivineday;
Entsay ybay eatgray Ovejay otay imhay owhay ulesray ethay osthay,
Orbidfay ityay, eavenhay! isthay arningway ouldshay ebay ostlay!
Enthay etlay usyay astehay, obeyyay ethay od’sgay alarmsyay,
Andyay oinjay otay ouseray ethay onssay ofyay Eecegray otay armsyay.”

Usthay okespay ethay agesay: ethay ingskay ithoutway elayday
Issolveday ethay ouncilcay, andyay eirthay iefchay obeyyay:
Ethay eptredscay ulersray eadlay; ethay ollowingfay osthay,
Our’dpay orthfay ybay ousandsthay, arkensday allyay ethay oastcay.
Asyay omfray omesay ockyray eftclay ethay epherdshay eessay
Usteringclay inyay eapshay onyay eapshay ethay ivingdray eesbay,
Ollingray andyay ackeningblay, armssway ucceedingsay armssway,
Ithway eeperday urmursmay andyay oremay oarsehay alarmsyay;
Uskyday eythay eadspray, ayay oseclay embodiedyay owdcray,
Andyay o’eryay ethay alevay escendsday ethay ivinglay oudclay.[81]
Osay, omfray ethay entstay andyay ipsshay, ayay engthen’dlay aintray
Eadsspray allyay ethay eachbay, andyay ideway o’ershadesyay ethay ainplay:
Alongyay ethay egionray unsray ayay eafeningday oundsay;
Eneathbay eirthay ootstepsfay oansgray ethay emblingtray oundgray.
Amefay iesflay eforebay ethay essengermay ofyay Ovejay,
Andyay iningshay oarssay, andyay apsclay erhay ingsway aboveyay.
Inenay acredsay eraldshay ownay, oclaimingpray oudlay[82]
Ethay onarch’smay illway, uspendsay ethay isteninglay owdcray.
Oonsay asyay ethay ongsthray inyay orderyay angedray appearyay,
Andyay ainterfay urmursmay iedday uponyay ethay earyay,
Ethay ingkay ofyay ingskay ishay awfulyay igurefay aisedray:
Ighhay inyay ishay andhay ethay oldengay eptrescay azedblay;
Ethay oldengay eptrescay, ofyay elestialcay ameflay,
Ybay Ulcanvay orm’dfay, omfray Ovejay otay Ermeshay amecay.
Otay Elopspay ehay ethay immortalyay iftgay esign’dray;
Ethay immortalyay iftgay eatgray Elopspay eftlay ehindbay,
Inyay Atreusyay’ andhay, ichwhay otnay ithway Atreusyay endsyay,
Otay ichray Yestesthay extnay ethay izepray escendsday;
Andyay ownay ethay arkmay ofyay Agamemnon’syay eignray,
Ubjectssay allyay Argosyay, andyay ontrolscay ethay ainmay.[83]

Onyay isthay ightbray eptrescay ownay ethay ingkay eclinedray,
Andyay artfulyay usthay onouncedpray ethay eechspay esign’dday:
ye“ay onssay ofyay Arsmay, artakepay youryay eader’slay arecay,
Eroeshay ofyay Eecegray, andyay othersbray ofyay ethay arway!
Ofyay artialpay Ovejay ithway usticejay Iyay omplaincay,
Andyay eavenlyhay oraclesyay elievedbay inyay ainvay
Ayay afesay eturnray asway omisedpray otay ouryay oilstay,
Enown’dray, iumphanttray, andyay enrich’dyay ithway oilsspay.
Ownay amefulshay ightflay aloneyay ancay avesay ethay osthay,
Ouryay oodblay, ouryay easuretray, andyay ouryay oryglay ostlay.
Osay Ovejay ecreesday, esistlessray ordlay ofyay allyay!
Atyay osewhay ommandcay olewhay empiresyay iseray oryay allfay:
Ehay akesshay ethay eeblefay opspray ofyay umanhay usttray,
Andyay ownstay andyay armiesyay umbleshay otay ethay ustday.
Atwhay ameshay otay Eecegray ayay uitfulfray arway otay ageway,
Ohyay, astinglay ameshay inyay everyyay uturefay ageyay!
Onceyay eatgray inyay armsyay, ethay ommoncay ornscay eway owgray,
Epulsedray andyay affledbay ybay ayay eeblefay oefay.
Osay allsmay eirthay umbernay, atthay ifyay arsway ereway easedcay,
Andyay Eecegray iumphanttray eldhay ayay eneralgay eastfay,
Allyay ank’dray ybay enstay, olewhay ecadesday enwhay eythay ineday
Ustmay antway ayay Ojantray aveslay otay ourpay ethay ineway.[84]
Utbay otheryay orcesfay avehay ouryay opeshay o’erthrownyay,
Andyay Oytray evailspray ybay armiesyay otnay erhay ownyay.
Ownay inenay onglay yearsyay ofyay ightymay Ovejay areyay unray,
Incesay irstfay ethay abourslay ofyay isthay arway egunbay:
Ouryay ordagecay orntay, ecay’dday ouryay esselsvay ielay,
Andyay arcescay insureyay ethay etchedwray owerpay otay yflay.
Astehay, enthay, orfay everyay eavelay ethay Ojantray allway!
Ouryay eepingway ivesway, ouryay endertay ildrenchay allcay:
Ovelay, utyday, afetysay, ummonsay usyay awayyay,
is’tay ature’snay oicevay, andyay aturenay eway obeyyay.
Ouryay atter’dshay arksbay aymay yetyay ansporttray usyay o’eryay,
Afesay andyay ingloriousyay, otay ouryay ativenay oreshay.
Yflay, Eciansgray, yflay, youryay ailssay andyay oarsyay employyay,
Andyay eamdray onay oremay ofyay eaven-defendedhay Oytray.”

Ishay eepday esignday unknownyay, ethay ostshay approveyay
Atridesyay’ eechspay. Ethay ightymay umbersnay ovemay.
Osay ollray ethay illowsbay otay ethay Icarianyay oreshay,
Omfray eastyay andyay outhsay enwhay indsway eginbay otay oarray,
Urstbay eirthay arkday ansionsmay inyay ethay oudsclay, andyay eepsway
Ethay iteningwhay urfacesay ofyay ethay uffledray eepday.
Andyay asyay onyay orncay enwhay esternway ustsgay escendday,[85]
Eforebay ethay astblay ethay oftylay arvestshay endbay:
Usthay o’eryay ethay ieldfay ethay ovingmay osthay appearsyay,
Ithway oddingnay umesplay andyay ovesgray ofyay avingway earsspay.
Ethay atheringgay urmurmay eadsspray, eirthay amplingtray eetfay
Eatbay ethay ooselay andssay, andyay ickenthay otay ethay eetflay;
Ithway ong-resoundinglay iescray eythay urgeyay ethay aintray
Otay itfay ethay ipsshay, andyay aunchlay intoyay ethay ainmay.
Eythay oiltay, eythay eatsway, ickthay oudsclay ofyay ustday ariseyay,
Ethay oublingday amoursclay echoyay otay ethay iesskay.
E’enyay enthay ethay Eeksgray adhay eftlay ethay ostilehay ainplay,
Andyay atefay ecreedday ethay allfay ofyay Oytray inyay ainvay;
Utbay Ove’sjay imperialyay ueenqay eirthay ightflay urvey’dsay,
Andyay ighingsay usthay espokebay ethay ue-eyedblay aidmay:

all“shay enthay ethay Eciansgray yflay! Oyay ireday isgraceday!
Andyay eavelay unpunish’dyay isthay erfidiouspay aceray?
Allshay Oytray, allshay Iampray, andyay ethay adulterousyay ousespay,
Inyay eacepay enjoyyay ethay uitsfray ofyay okenbray owsvay?
Andyay avestbray iefschay, inyay Elen’shay uarrelqay ainslay,
Ielay unrevengedyay onyay yonyay etestedday ainplay?
Onay: etlay ymay Eeksgray, unmovedyay ybay ainvay alarmsyay,
Onceyay oremay efulgentray ineshay inyay azenbray armsyay.
Astehay, oddessgay, astehay! ethay yingflay osthay etainday,
Ornay etlay oneyay ailsay ebay oistedhay onyay ethay ainmay.”

Allaspay obeysyay, andyay omfray Olympusyay’ eighthay
Iftsway otay ethay ipsshay ecipitatespray erhay ightflay.
Ulyssesyay, irstfay inyay ublicpay arescay, eshay oundfay,
Orfay udentpray ounselcay ikelay ethay odsgay enown’dray:
Oppress’dyay ithway enerousgay iefgray ethay erohay oodstay,
Ornay ewdray ishay ablesay esselsvay otay ethay oodflay.
and“ay isyay ityay usthay, ivineday Aerteslay’ onsay,
Usthay yflay ethay Eeksgray e(thay artialmay aidmay egunbay),
Usthay otay eirthay ountrycay earbay eirthay ownyay isgraceday,
Andyay amefay eternalyay eavelay otay Iam’spray aceray?
Allshay eauteousbay Elenhay illstay emainray unfreedyay,
Illstay unrevengedyay, ayay ousandthay eroeshay eedblay!
Astehay, enerousgay Ithacusyay! eventpray ethay ameshay,
Ecallray youryay armiesyay, andyay youryay iefschay eclaimray.
Youryay ownyay esistlessray eloquenceyay employyay,
Andyay otay ethay immortalsyay usttray ethay allfay ofyay Oytray.”

Ethay oicevay ivineday onfess’dcay ethay arlikeway aidmay,
Ulyssesyay eardhay, ornay uninspiredyay obey’dyay:
Enthay eetingmay irstfay Atridesyay, omfray ishay andhay
Eceivedray ethay imperialyay eptrescay ofyay ommandcay.
Usthay acedgray, attentionyay andyay espectray otay aingay,
Ehay unsray, ehay iesflay oughthray allyay ethay Eciangray aintray;
Eachyay incepray ofyay amenay, oryay iefchay inyay armsyay approvedyay,
Ehay iredfay ithway aisepray, oryay ithway ersuasionpay ovedmay.

arriors“way ikelay youyay, ithway engthstray andyay isdomway ess’dblay,
Ybay avebray examplesyay ouldshay onfirmcay ethay estray.
Ethay onarch’smay illway otnay yetyay eveal’dray appearsyay;
Ehay iestray ouryay ouragecay, utbay esentsray ouryay earsfay.
Ethay unwaryyay Eeksgray ishay uryfay aymay ovokepray;
Otnay usthay ethay ingkay inyay ecretsay ouncilcay okespay.
Ovejay oveslay ouryay iefchay, omfray Ovejay ishay onourhay ingsspray,
Ewarebay! orfay eadfuldray isyay ethay athwray ofyay ingskay.”

Utbay ifyay ayay amorousclay ilevay ebeianplay oseray,
Imhay ithway eproofray ehay eck’dchay oryay amedtay ithway owsblay.
e“bay illstay, outhay aveslay, andyay otay ythay ettersbay yieldyay;
Unknownyay alikeyay inyay ouncilcay andyay inyay ieldfay!
Yeyay odsgay, atwhay astardsday ouldway ouryay osthay ommandcay!
Eptsway otay ethay arway, ethay umberlay ofyay ayay andlay.
Ebay ilentsay, etchwray, andyay inkthay otnay erehay allow’dyay
Atthay orstway ofyay yrantstay, anyay usurpingyay owdcray.
Otay oneyay olesay onarchmay Ovejay ommitscay ethay aysway;
Ishay areyay ethay awslay, andyay imhay etlay allyay obeyyay.”[86]

Ithway ordsway ikelay esethay ethay oopstray Ulyssesyay uledray,
Ethay oudestlay ilencedsay, andyay ethay iercestfay ool’dcay.
Ackbay otay ethay assemblyyay ollray ethay ongingthray aintray,
Esertday ethay ipsshay, andyay ourpay uponyay ethay ainplay.
Urmuringmay eythay ovemay, asyay enwhay oldyay oceanyay oarsray,
Andyay eaveshay ugehay urgessay otay ethay emblingtray oresshay;
Ethay oaninggray anksbay areyay urstbay ithway ellowingbay oundsay,
Ethay ocksray emurmurray andyay ethay eepsday eboundray.
Atyay engthlay ethay umulttay inkssay, ethay oisesnay easecay,
Andyay ayay illstay ilencesay ullslay ethay ampcay otay eacepay.
Ersitesthay onlyyay amour’dclay inyay ethay ongthray,
Oquaciouslay, oudlay, andyay urbulenttay ofyay onguetay:
Awedyay ybay onay ameshay, ybay onay espectray ontroll’dcay,
Inyay andalscay usybay, inyay eproachesray oldbay:
Ithway ittyway alicemay udiousstay otay efameday,
Ornscay allyay ishay oyjay, andyay aughterlay allyay ishay aimyay:—
Utbay iefchay ehay oriedglay ithway icentiouslay ylestay
Otay ashlay ethay eatgray, andyay onarchsmay otay evileray.
Ishay igurefay uchsay asyay ightmay ishay oulsay oclaimpray;
Oneyay eyeyay asway inkingblay, andyay oneyay eglay asway amelay:
Ishay ountainmay ouldersshay alfhay ishay eastbray o’erspreadyay,
Inthay airshay estrew’dbay ishay onglay isshapenmay eadhay.
Eensplay otay ankindmay ishay enviousyay earthay ossess’dpay,
Andyay uchmay ehay atedhay allyay, utbay ostmay ethay estbay:
Ulyssesyay oryay Achillesyay illstay ishay emethay;
Utbay oyalray andalscay ishay elightday upremesay,
Onglay adhay ehay ivedlay ethay ornscay ofyay everyyay Eekgray,
Ex’dvay enwhay ehay okespay, yetyay illstay eythay eardhay imhay eakspay.
Arpshay asway ishay oicevay; ichwhay inyay ethay illestshray onetay,
Usthay ithway injuriousyay auntstay attack’dyay ethay onethray.

amidst“ay ethay oriesglay ofyay osay ightbray ayay eignray,
Atwhay ovesmay ethay eatgray Atridesyay otay omplaincay?
is’tay inethay ate’erwhay ethay arrior’sway eastbray inflamesyay,
Ethay oldengay oilspay, andyay inethay ethay ovelylay amesday.
Ithway allyay ethay ealthway ouryay arsway andyay oodblay estowbay,
Ythay entstay areyay owdedcray andyay ythay estschay o’erflowyay.
Usthay atyay ullfay easeyay inyay eapshay ofyay ichesray oll’dray,
Atwhay ievesgray ethay onarchmay? Isyay ityay irstthay ofyay oldgay?
Aysay, allshay eway archmay ithway ouryay unconquer’dyay owerspay
e(thay Eeksgray andyay Iyay) otay Ilion’syay ostilehay owerstay,
Andyay ingbray ethay aceray ofyay oyalray astardsbay erehay,
Orfay Oytray otay ansomray atyay ayay icepray ootay earday?
Utbay afersay underplay ythay ownyay osthay uppliessay;
Aysay, ouldstway outhay eizesay omesay aliantvay eader’slay izepray?
Oryay, ifyay ythay earthay otay enerousgay ovelay ebay edlay,
Omesay aptivecay airfay, otay essblay ythay inglykay edbay?
Ate’erwhay ouryay astermay avescray ubmitsay eway ustmay,
Aguedplay ithway ishay idepray, oryay unish’dpay orfay ishay ustlay.
Ohyay omenway ofyay Achaiayay; enmay onay oremay!
Encehay etlay usyay yflay, andyay etlay imhay asteway ishay orestay
Inyay oveslay andyay easuresplay onyay ethay Ygianphray oreshay.
Eway aymay ebay antedway onyay omesay usybay ayday,
Enwhay Ectorhay omescay: osay eatgray Achillesyay aymay:
Omfray imhay ehay orcedfay ethay izepray eway ointlyjay avegay,
Omfray imhay, ethay iercefay, ethay earlessfay, andyay ethay avebray:
Andyay urstday ehay, asyay ehay oughtyay, esentray atthay ongwray,
Isthay ightymay yranttay ereway onay yranttay onglay.”

Iercefay omfray ishay eatsay atyay isthay Ulyssesyay ingsspray,[87]
Inyay enerousgay engeancevay ofyay ethay ingkay ofyay ingskay.
Ithway indignationyay arklingspay inyay ishay eyesyay,
Ehay iewsvay ethay etchwray, andyay ernlystay usthay epliesray:

eace“pay, actiousfay onstermay, ornbay otay exvay ethay atestay,
Ithway anglingwray alentstay orm’dfay orfay oulfay ebateday:
Urbcay atthay impetuousyay onguetay, ornay ashlyray ainvay,
Andyay inglysay admay, asperseyay ethay overeignsay eignray.
Avehay eway otnay ownknay eethay, aveslay! ofyay allyay ouryay osthay,
Ethay anmay owhay actsyay ethay eastlay, upbraidsyay ethay ostmay?
Inkthay otnay ethay Eeksgray otay amefulshay ightflay otay ingbray,
Ornay etlay osethay ipslay ofanepray ethay amenay ofyay ingkay.
Orfay ouryay eturnray eway usttray ethay eavenlyhay owerspay;
Ebay atthay eirthay arecay; otay ightfay ikelay enmay ebay oursyay.
Utbay antgray ethay osthay ithway ealthway ethay eneralgay oadlay,
Exceptyay etractionday, atwhay asthay outhay estow’dbay?
Upposesay omesay erohay ouldshay ishay oilsspay esignray,
Artyay outhay atthay erohay, ouldcay osethay oilsspay ebay inethay?
Odsgay! etlay emay erishpay onyay isthay atefulhay oreshay,
Andyay etlay esethay eyesyay eholdbay ymay onsay onay oremay;
Ifyay, onyay ythay extnay offenceyay, isthay andhay orbearfay
Otay ipstray osethay armsyay outhay illyay eserv’stday otay earway,
Expelyay ethay ouncilcay erewhay ouryay incespray eetmay,
Andyay endsay eethay ourgedscay andyay owlinghay oughthray ethay eetflay.”

Ehay aidsay, andyay oweringcay asyay ethay astardday endsbay,
Ethay eightyway eptrescay onyay ishay ackbay escendsday.[88]
Onyay ethay oundray unchbay ethay oodyblay umourstay iseray:
Ethay earstay ingspray artingstay omfray ishay aggardhay eyesyay;
Emblingtray ehay atsay, andyay unkshray inyay abjectyay earsfay,
Omfray ishay ilevay isagevay ipedway ethay aldingscay earstay;
Ilewhay otay ishay eighbournay eachyay express’dyay ishay oughtthay:

ye“ay odsgay! atwhay ondersway ashay Ulyssesyay oughtwray!
Atwhay uitsfray ishay onductcay andyay ishay ouragecay yieldyay!
Eatgray inyay ethay ouncilcay, oriousglay inyay ethay ieldfay.
Enerousgay ehay isesray inyay ethay own’scray efenceday,
Otay urbcay ethay actiousfay onguetay ofyay insolenceyay,
Uchsay ustjay examplesyay onyay offendersyay ownshay,
Editionsay ilencesay, andyay assertyay ethay onethray.”

as’tway usthay ethay eneralgay oicevay ethay erohay aisedpray,
Owhay, isingray, ighhay ethay imperialyay eptrescay aisedray:
Ethay ue-eyedblay Allaspay, ishay elestialcay iendfray,
in(ay ormfay ayay eraldhay,) adebay ethay owdscray attendyay.
Ethay expectingyay owdscray inyay illstay attentionyay unghay,
Otay earhay ethay isdomway ofyay ishay eavenlyhay onguetay.
Enthay eeplyday oughtfulthay, ausingpay ereyay ehay okespay,
Ishay ilencesay usthay ethay udentpray erohay okebray:

unhappy“ay onarchmay! omwhay ethay Eciangray aceray
Ithway ameshay esertingday, eaphay ithway ilevay isgraceday.
Otnay uchsay atyay Argosyay asway eirthay enerousgay owvay:
Onceyay allyay eirthay oicevay, utbay ahyay! orgottenfay ownay:
E’ernay otay eturnray, asway enthay ethay ommoncay ycray,
Illtay Oy’stray oudpray ucturesstray ouldshay inyay ashesyay ielay.
Eholdbay emthay eepingway orfay eirthay ativenay oreshay;
Atwhay ouldcay eirthay ivesway oryay elplesshay ildrenchay oremay?
Atwhay earthay utbay eltsmay otay eavelay ethay endertay aintray,
Andyay, oneyay ortshay onthmay, endureyay ethay intryway ainmay?
Ewfay eagueslay emovedray, eway ishway ouryay eacefulpay eatsay,
Enwhay ethay ipshay ossestay, andyay ethay empeststay eatbay:
Enthay ellway aymay isthay onglay aystay ovokepray eirthay earstay,
Ethay edioustay engthlay ofyay inenay evolvingray yearsyay.
Otnay orfay eirthay iefgray ethay Eciangray osthay Iyay ameblay;
Utbay anquish’dvay! affledbay! ohyay, eternalyay ameshay!
Expectyay ethay imetay otay Oy’stray estructionday ivengay.
Andyay ytray ethay aithfay ofyay Alcaschay andyay ofyay eavenhay.
Atwhay ass’dpay atyay Aulisyay, Eecegray ancay itnessway earbay,[89]
Andyay allyay owhay ivelay otay eathebray isthay Ygianphray airyay.
Esidebay ayay ountain’sfay acredsay inkbray eway aisedray
Ouryay erdantvay altarsyay, andyay ethay ictimsvay azedblay:
as’tway erewhay ethay ane-treeplay eadspray itsyay adesshay aroundyay,
Ethay altarsyay eavedhay; andyay omfray ethay umblingcray oundgray
Ayay ightymay agondray otshay, ofyay ireday ortentpay;
Omfray Ovejay imselfhay ethay eadfuldray ignsay asway entsay.
Aightstray otay ethay eetray ishay anguinesay iresspay ehay oll’dray,
Andyay url’dcay aroundyay inyay anymay ayay indingway oldfay;
Ethay opmosttay anchbray ayay other-birdmay ossess’dpay;
Eightyay allowcay infantsyay ill’dfay ethay ossymay estnay;
Erselfhay ethay inthnay; ethay erpentsay, asyay ehay unghay,
Etch’dstray ishay ackblay awsjay andyay ush’dcray ethay yingcray youngyay;
Ilewhay overinghay earnay, ithway iserablemay oanmay,
Ethay oopingdray othermay ail’dway erhay ildrenchay onegay.
Ethay othermay astlay, asyay oundray ethay estnay eshay ewflay,
Eizedsay ybay ethay eatingbay ingway, ethay onstermay ewslay;
Ornay onglay urvivedsay: otay arblemay urn’dtay, ehay andsstay
Ayay astinglay odigypray onyay Aulisyay’ andssay.
