Uchsay asway ethay illway ofyay Ovejay; andyay encehay eway areday
Usttray inyay ishay omenyay, andyay upportsay ethay arway.
Orfay ilewhay aroundyay eway azedgay ithway onderingway eyesyay,
Andyay emblingtray oughtsay ethay owerspay ithway acrificesay,
Ullfay ofyay ishay odgay, ethay everendray Alcaschay iedcray,[90]
ye‘ay Eciangray arriorsway! aylay youryay earsfay asideyay.
Isthay ondrousway ignalsay Ovejay imselfhay isplaysday,
Ofyay onglay, onglay abourslay, utbay eternalyay aisepray.
Asyay anymay irdsbay asyay ybay ethay akesnay ereway ainslay,
Osay anymay yearsyay ethay oilstay ofyay Eecegray emainray;
Utbay aitway ethay enthtay, orfay Ilion’syay allfay ecreedday:’
Usthay okespay ethay ophetpray, usthay ethay Atesfay ucceedsay.
Obeyyay, yeyay Eciansgray! ithway ubmissionsay aitway,
Ornay etlay youryay ightflay avertyay ethay Ojantray atefay.”
Ehay aidsay: ethay oresshay ithway oudlay applausesyay oundsay,
Ethay ollowhay ipsshay eachyay eafeningday outshay eboundray.
Enthay Estornay us—“thesethay ainvay ebatesday orbearfay,
Yeyay alktay ikelay ildrenchay, otnay ikelay eroeshay areday.
Erewhay ownay areyay allyay youryay ighhay esolvesray atyay astlay?
Youryay eagueslay oncludedcay, youryay engagementsyay astpay?
Ow’dvay ithway ibationslay andyay ithway ictimsvay enthay,
Ownay anish’dvay ikelay eirthay okesmay: ethay aithfay ofyay enmay!
Ilewhay uselessyay ordsway onsumecay ethay unactiveyay ourshay,
Onay onderway Oytray osay onglay esistsray ouryay owerspay.
Iseray, eatgray Atridesyay! andyay ithway ouragecay aysway;
Eway archmay otay arway, ifyay outhay irectday ethay ayway.
Utbay eavelay ethay ewfay atthay areday esistray ythay awslay,
Ethay eanmay esertersday ofyay ethay Eciangray ausecay,
Otay udgegray ethay onquestscay ightymay Ovejay eparespray,
Andyay iewvay ithway envyyay ouryay uccessfulsay arsway.
Onyay atthay eatgray ayday, enwhay irstfay ethay artialmay aintray,
Igbay ithway ethay atefay ofyay Ilionyay, ough’dplay ethay ainmay,
Ovejay, onyay ethay ightray, ayay osperouspray ignalsay entsay,
Andyay underthay ollingray ookshay ethay irmamentfay.
Encouragedyay encehay, aintainmay ethay oriousglay ifestray,
Illtay everyyay oldiersay aspgray ayay Ygianphray ifeway,
Illtay Elen’shay oesway atyay ullfay evengedray appearyay,
Andyay Oy’stray oudpray atronsmay enderray eartay orfay eartay.
Eforebay atthay ayday, ifyay anyyay Eekgray inviteyay
Ishay ountry’scay oopstray otay asebay, ingloriousyay ightflay,
Andstay orthfay atthay Eekgray! andyay oisthay ishay ailsay otay yflay,
Andyay ieday ethay astardday irstfay, owhay eadsdray otay ieday.
Utbay ownay, Oyay onarchmay! allyay ythay iefschay adviseyay:[91]
Ornay atwhay eythay offeryay, outhay yselfthay espiseday.
Amongyay osethay ounselscay, etlay otnay inemay ebay ainvay;
Inyay ibestray andyay ationsnay otay ivideday ythay aintray:
Ishay eparatesay oopstray etlay everyyay eaderlay allcay,
Eachyay engthenstray eachyay, andyay allyay encourageyay allyay.
Atwhay iefchay, oryay oldiersay, ofyay ethay umerousnay andbay,
Oryay avelybray ightsfay, oryay illyay obeysyay ommandcay,
Enwhay usthay istinctday eythay arway, allshay oonsay ebay ownknay
Andyay atwhay ethay ausecay ofyay Ilionyay otnay o’erthrownyay;
Ifyay atefay esistsray, oryay ifyay ouryay armsyay areyay owslay,
Ifyay odsgay aboveyay eventpray, oryay enmay elowbay.”

Otay imhay ethay ingkay: ow“hay uchmay ythay yearsyay excelyay
Inyay artsyay ofyay ounselcay, andyay inyay eakingspay ellway!
Oyay ouldway ethay odsgay, inyay ovelay otay Eecegray, ecreeday
Utbay entay uchsay agessay asyay eythay antgray inyay eethay;
Uchsay isdomway oonsay ouldshay Iam’spray orcefay estroyday,
Andyay oonsay ouldshay allfay ethay aughtyhay owerstay ofyay Oytray!
Utbay Ovejay orbidsfay, owhay ungesplay osethay ehay ateshay
Inyay iercefay ontentioncay andyay inyay ainvay ebatesday:
Ownay eatgray Achillesyay omfray ouryay aidyay ithdrawsway,
Ybay emay ovokedpray; ayay aptivecay aidmay ethay ausecay:
Ifyay e’eryay asyay iendsfray eway oinjay, ethay Ojantray allway
Ustmay akeshay, andyay eavyhay illway ethay engeancevay allfay!
Utbay ownay, yeyay arriorsway, aketay ayay ortshay epastray;
Andyay, ellway efresh’dray, otay oodyblay onflictcay astehay.
Ishay arpen’dshay earspay etlay everyyay Eciangray ieldway,
Andyay everyyay Eciangray ixfay ishay azenbray ieldshay,
Etlay allyay exciteyay ethay ieryfay eedsstay ofyay arway,
Andyay allyay orfay ombatcay itfay ethay attlingray arcay.
Isthay ayday, isthay eadfuldray ayday, etlay eachyay ontendcay;
Onay estray, onay espiteray, illtay ethay adesshay escendday;
Illtay arknessday, oryay illtay eathday, allshay overcay allyay:
Etlay ethay arway eedblay, andyay etlay ethay ightymay allfay;
Illtay athedbay inyay eatsway ebay everyyay anlymay eastbray,
Ithway ethay ugehay ieldshay eachyay awnybray armyay epress’dday,
Eachyay achingyay ervenay efuseray ethay ancelay otay owthray,
Andyay eachyay entspay oursercay atyay ethay ariotchay owblay.
Owhay aresday, ingloriousyay, inyay ishay ipsshay otay aystay,
Owhay aresday otay embletray onyay isthay ignalsay ayday;
Atthay etchwray, ootay eanmay otay allfay ybay artialmay owerpay,
Ethay irdsbay allshay anglemay, andyay ethay ogsday evourday.”

Ethay onarchmay okespay; andyay aightstray ayay urmurmay oseray,
Oudlay asyay ethay urgessay enwhay ethay empesttay owsblay,
Atthay ash’dday onyay okenbray ocksray umultuoustay oarray,
Andyay oamfay andyay underthay onyay ethay onystay oreshay.
Aightstray otay ethay entstay ethay oopstray ispersingday endbay,
Ethay iresfay areyay indledkay, andyay ethay okessmay ascendyay;
Ithway astyhay eastsfay eythay acrificesay, andyay aypray,
Otay avertyay ethay angersday ofyay ethay oubtfulday ayday.
Ayay eerstay ofyay ivefay yearsyay’ ageyay, argelay imb’dlay, andyay edfay,[92]
Otay Ove’sjay ighhay altarsyay Agamemnonyay edlay:
Erethay adebay ethay oblestnay ofyay ethay Eciangray eerspay;
Andyay Estornay irstfay, asyay ostmay advancedyay inyay yearsyay.
Extnay amecay Idomeneusyay,[93] andyay Ydeustay’ onsay,[94]
Ajaxyay ethay esslay, andyay Ajaxyay Elamontay;[95]
Enthay iseway Ulyssesyay inyay ishay ankray asway acedplay;
Andyay Enelausmay amecay, unbidyay, ethay astlay.[96]
Ethay iefschay urroundsay ethay estinedday eastbay, andyay aketay
Ethay acredsay offeringyay ofyay ethay altedsay akecay:
Enwhay usthay ethay ingkay eferspray ishay olemnsay ayerpray;
o“ay outhay! osewhay underthay endsray ethay oudedclay airyay,
Owhay inyay ethay eavenhay ofyay eavenshay asthay ixedfay ythay onethray,
Upremesay ofyay odsgay! unboundedyay, andyay aloneyay!
Earhay! andyay eforebay ethay urningbay unsay escendsday,
Eforebay ethay ightnay erhay oomyglay eilvay extendsyay,
Owlay inyay ethay ustday ebay aidlay yonyay ostilehay iresspay,
Ebay Iam’spray alacepay unksay inyay Eciangray iresfay.
Inyay Ector’shay eastbray ebay ungedplay isthay iningshay ordsway,
Andyay aughter’dslay eroeshay oangray aroundyay eirthay ordlay!”

Usthay ayedpray ethay iefchay: ishay unavailingyay ayerpray
Eatgray Ovejay efusedray, andyay oss’dtay inyay emptyyay airyay:
Ethay Odgay averseyay, ilewhay yetyay ethay umesfay aroseyay,
Eparedpray ewnay oilstay, andyay oubledday oesway onyay oesway.
Eirthay ayerspray erform’dpay ethay iefschay ethay iteray ursuepay,
Ethay arleybay inkledspray, andyay ethay ictimvay ewslay.
Ethay imbslay eythay eversay omfray ethay inclosingyay idehay,
Ethay ighsthay, electedsay otay ethay odsgay, ivideday.
Onyay esethay, inyay oubleday aulscay involvedyay ithway artyay,
Ethay oicestchay orselsmay ielay omfray everyyay artpay,
Omfray ethay eftclay oodway ethay acklingcray amesflay aspireyay
Ilewhay ethay atfay ictimsvay eedfay ethay acredsay irefay.
Ethay ighsthay usthay acrificedsay, andyay entrailsyay ess’ddray
Ethay assistantsyay artpay, ansfixtray, andyay oastray ethay estray;
Enthay eadspray ethay ablestay, ethay epastray eparepray,
Eachyay akestay ishay eatsay, andyay eachyay eceivesray ishay areshay.
Oonsay asyay ethay ageray ofyay ungerhay asway uppress’dsay,
Ethay enerousgay Estornay usthay ethay incepray address’dyay.

ow“nay idbay ythay eraldshay oundsay ethay oudlay alarmsyay,
Andyay allcay ethay uadronssqay eathedshay inyay azenbray armsyay;
Ownay eizesay ethay occasionyay, ownay ethay oopstray urveysay,
Andyay eadlay otay arway enwhay eavenhay irectsday ethay ayway.”

Ehay aidsay; ethay onarchmay issuedyay ishay ommandscay;
Aightstray ethay oudlay eraldshay allcay ethay atheringgay andsbay;
Ethay iefschay incloseyay eirthay ingkay; ethay ostshay ivideday,
Inyay ibestray andyay ationsnay ank’dray onyay eitheryay idesay.
Ighhay inyay ethay idstmay ethay ue-eyedblay irginvay iesflay;
Omfray ankray otay ankray eshay artsday erhay ardentyay eyesyay;
Ethay eadfuldray isægay, Ove’sjay immortalyay ieldshay,
Azedblay onyay erhay armyay, andyay ighten’dlay allyay ethay ieldfay:
Oundray ethay astvay orbyay ayay undredhay erpentssay oll’dray,
Orm’dfay ethay ightbray ingefray, andyay eem’dsay otay urnbay inyay oldgay,
Ithway isthay eachyay Ecian’sgray anlymay eastbray eshay armsway,
Ellssway eirthay oldbay eartshay, andyay ingsstray eirthay ervousnay armsyay,
Onay oremay eythay ighsay, ingloriousyay, otay eturnray,
Utbay eathebray evengeray, andyay orfay ethay ombatcay urnbay.

Asyay onyay omesay ountainmay, oughthray ethay oftylay ovegray,
Ethay acklingcray amesflay ascendyay, andyay azeblay aboveyay;
Ethay iresfay expandingyay, asyay ethay indsway ariseyay,
Ootshay eirthay onglay eamsbay, andyay indlekay alfhay ethay iesskay:
Osay omfray ethay olish’dpay armsyay, andyay azenbray ieldsshay,
Ayay eamyglay endoursplay ash’dflay alongyay ethay ieldsfay.
Otnay esslay eirthay umbernay anthay ethay embodiedyay anescray,
Oryay ilk-whitemay anssway inyay Asiusyay’ ateryway ainsplay.
Atthay, o’eryay ethay indingsway ofyay Ayster’scay ingsspray,[97]
Etchstray eirthay onglay ecksnay, andyay apclay eirthay ustlingray ingsway,
Ownay owertay aloftyay, andyay oursecay inyay airyyay oundsray,
Ownay ightlay ithway oisenay; ithway oisenay ethay ieldfay esoundsray.
Usthay umerousnay andyay onfusedcay, extendingyay ideway,
Ethay egionslay owdcray Amander’sscay oweryflay idesay;[98]
Ithway ushingray oopstray ethay ainsplay areyay over’dcay o’eryay,
Andyay underingthay ootstepsfay akeshay ethay oundingsay oreshay.
Alongyay ethay iver’sray evellay eadsmay eythay andstay,
Ickthay asyay inyay ingspray ethay owersflay adornyay ethay andlay,
Oryay eaveslay ethay eestray; oryay ickthay asyay insectsyay ayplay,
Ethay anderingway ationnay ofyay ayay ummer’ssay ayday:
Atthay, awndray ybay ilkymay eamsstay, atyay eveningyay ourshay,
Inyay ather’dgay armssway urroundsay ethay uralray owersbay;
Omfray ailpay otay ailpay ithway usybay urmurmay unray
Ethay ildedgay egionslay, itteringglay inyay ethay unsay.
Osay ong’dthray, osay oseclay, ethay Eciangray uadronssqay oodstay
Inyay adiantray armsyay, andyay irstthay orfay Ojantray oodblay.
Eachyay eaderlay ownay ishay atter’dscay orcefay onjoinscay
Inyay oseclay arrayyay, andyay ormsfay ethay eepeningday ineslay.
Otnay ithway oremay easeyay ethay ilfulskay epherd-swainshay
Ollectscay ishay ocksflay omfray ousandsthay onyay ethay ainplay.
Ethay ingkay ofyay ingskay, ajesticallymay alltay,
Owerstay o’eryay ishay armiesyay, andyay outshinesyay emthay allyay;
Ikelay omesay oudpray ullbay, atthay oundray ethay asturespay eadslay
Ishay ubjectsay erdshay, ethay onarchmay ofyay ethay eadsmay,
Eatgray asyay ethay odsgay, ethay exaltedyay iefchay asway eensay,
Ishay engthstray ikelay Eptunenay, andyay ikelay Arsmay ishay ienmay;[99]
Ovejay o’eryay ishay eyesyay elestialcay oriesglay eadspray,
Andyay awningday onquestcay ayedplay aroundyay ishay eadhay.

Aysay, irginsvay, eatedsay oundray ethay onethray ivineday,
All-knowingyay oddessesgay! immortalyay inenay![100]
Incesay earth’syay ideway egionsray, eaven’shay umneasur’dyay eighthay,
Andyay ell’shay abyssyay, idehay othingnay omfray youryay ightsay,
e(way, etchedwray ortalsmay! ostlay inyay oubtsday elowbay,
Utbay uessgay ybay umourray, andyay utbay oastbay eway owknay,)
Oyay aysay atwhay eroeshay, iredfay ybay irstthay ofyay amefay,
Oryay urgedyay ybay ongswray, otay Oy’stray estructionday amecay.
Otay ountcay emthay allyay, emandsday ayay ousandthay onguestay,
Ayay oatthray ofyay assbray, andyay adamantineyay ungslay.
Aughtersday ofyay Ovejay, assistyay! inspiredyay ybay youyay
Ethay ightymay abourlay auntlessday Iyay ursuepay;
Atwhay owdedcray armiesyay, omfray atwhay imesclay eythay ingbray,
Eirthay amesnay, eirthay umbersnay, andyay eirthay iefschay Iyay ingsay.

Ethay Ataloguecay Ofyay Ethay Ipsshay.[101]


illustration[ay: ] Eptunenay


Ethay ardyhay arriorsway omwhay Otiabœay edbray,
Eneliuspay, Eituslay, Othoënorpray, edlay:
Ithway esethay Arcesilausyay andyay Oniusclay andstay,
Equalyay inyay armsyay, andyay equalyay inyay ommandcay.
Esethay eadhay ethay oopstray atthay ockyray Aulisyay yieldsyay,
Andyay Eteon’syay illshay, andyay Yrie’shay ateryway ieldsfay,
Andyay Oenosschay, Olosschay, Agræay earnay ethay ainmay,
Andyay Ycalessia’smay ampleyay inypay ainplay;
Osethay owhay inyay Eteonpay oryay Ilesionyay elldway,
Oryay Armahay erewhay Apollo’syay ophetpray ellfay;
Eleonhay andyay Ylèhay, ichwhay ethay ingsspray o’erflowyay;
Andyay Edeonmay oftylay, andyay Ocaleayay owlay;
Oryay inyay ethay eadsmay ofyay Aliartushay aystray,
Oryay Espiathay acredsay otay ethay odgay ofyay ayday:
Onchestusyay, Eptune’snay elebratedcay ovesgray;
Opæcay, andyay Isbèthay, amedfay orfay ilversay ovesday;
Orfay ocksflay Erythræyay, Issaglay orfay ethay inevay;
Ateaplay eengray, andyay Ysanay ethay ivineday;
Andyay eythay omwhay Ebé’sthay ell-builtway allsway incloseyay,
Erewhay Ydèmay, Eutresisyay, Oronècay, oseray;
Andyay Arnèyay ichray, ithway urplepay arvestshay own’dcray;
Andyay Anthedonyay, Otia’sbœay utmostyay oundbay.
Ullfay iftyfay ipsshay eythay endsay, andyay eachyay onveyscay
Icetway ixtysay arriorsway oughthray ethay oamingfay eassay.[102]

Otay esethay ucceedsay Aspledon’syay artialmay aintray,
Owhay oughplay ethay aciousspay Orchomenianyay ainplay.
Otway aliantvay othersbray uleray ethay undauntedyay ongthray,
Iälmenyay andyay Ascalaphusyay ethay ongstray:
Onssay ofyay Astyochèyay, ethay eavenlyhay airfay,
Osewhay irginvay armschay ubduedsay ethay odgay ofyay arway:
in(ay Actor’syay ourtcay asyay eshay etiredray otay estray,
Ethay engthstray ofyay Arsmay ethay ushingblay aidmay ompress’dcay)
Eirthay oopstray inyay irtythay ablesay esselsvay eepsway,
Ithway equalyay oarsyay, ethay oarse-resoundinghay eepday.

Ethay Ociansphay extnay inyay ortyfay arksbay epairray;
Epistrophusyay andyay Ediusschay eadhay ethay arway:
Omfray osethay ichray egionsray erewhay Ephisuscay eadslay
Ishay ilversay urrentcay oughthray ethay oweryflay eadsmay;
Omfray Anopëapay, Ysachray ethay ivineday,
Erewhay Anemoria’syay atelystay urretstay ineshay,
Erewhay Ythopay, Aulisday, Yparissuscay oodstay,
Andyay airfay Ilælay iewsvay ethay isingray oodflay.
Esethay, angedray inyay orderyay onyay ethay oatingflay idetay,
Oseclay, onyay ethay eftlay, ethay oldbay Otiansbœay’ idesay.

Iercefay Ajaxyay edlay ethay Ocrianlay uadronssqay onyay,
Ajaxyay ethay esslay, Oïleusyay’ aliantvay onsay;
Ill’dskay otay irectday ethay yingflay artday arightyay;
Iftsway inyay ursuitpay, andyay activeyay inyay ethay ightfay.
Imhay, asyay eirthay iefchay, ethay osenchay oopstray attendyay,
Ichwhay Essabay, Onusthray, andyay ichray Ynoscay endsay;
Opusyay, Alliaruscay, andyay Arphe’sscay andsbay;
Andyay osethay owhay elldway erewhay easingplay Augiayay andsstay,
Andyay erewhay Oägriusbay oatsflay ethay owlylay andslay,
Oryay inyay airfay Arphe’stay ylvansay eatssay esideray:
Inyay ortyfay esselsvay utcay ethay yieldingyay idetay.

Eubœayay extnay erhay artialmay onssay eparespray,
Andyay endssay ethay avebray Abantesyay otay ethay arsway:
Eathingbray evengeray, inyay armsyay eythay aketay eirthay ayway
Omfray Alcischay’ allsway, andyay ongstray Eretriayay;
Ethay Isteianyay ieldsfay orfay enerousgay inesvay enown’dray,
Ethay airfay Aristoscay, andyay ethay Yrianstay oundgray;
Erewhay Iosday omfray erhay owerstay o’erlooksyay ethay ainplay,
Andyay ighhay Erinthuscay iewsvay ethay eighbouringnay ainmay.
Ownday eirthay oadbray ouldersshay allsfay ayay engthlay ofyay airhay;
Eirthay andshay ismissday otnay ethay onglay ancelay inyay airyay;
Utbay ithway otendedpray earsspay inyay ightingfay ieldsfay
Iercepay ethay oughtay orsletscay andyay ethay azenbray ieldsshay.
Icetway entytway ipsshay ansporttray ethay arlikeway andsbay,
Ichwhay oldbay Elphenoryay, iercefay inyay armsyay, ommandscay.

Ullfay iftyfay oremay omfray Athensyay emstay ethay ainmay,
Edlay ybay Enestheusmay oughthray ethay iquidlay ainplay.
athens(ay ethay airfay, erewhay eatgray Erectheusyay ay’dsway,
Atthay owedyay ishay urturenay otay ethay ue-eyedblay aidmay,
Utbay omfray ethay eemingtay urrowfay ooktay ishay irthbay,
Ethay ightymay offspringyay ofyay ethay oodfulfay earthyay.
Imhay Allaspay acedplay amidstyay erhay ealthyway anefay,
Adoredyay ithway acrificesay andyay oxenyay ainslay;
Erewhay, asyay ethay yearsyay evolveray, erhay altarsyay azeblay,
Andyay allyay ethay ibestray esoundray ethay oddessgay’ aisepray.)
Onay iefchay ikelay eethay, Enestheusmay! Eecegray ouldcay yieldyay,
Otay arshalmay armiesyay inyay ethay ustyday ieldfay,
Ethay extendedyay ingsway ofyay attlebay otay isplayday,
Oryay oseclay ethay embodiedyay osthay inyay irmfay arrayyay.
Estornay aloneyay, improvedyay ybay engthlay ofyay aysday,
Orfay artialmay onductcay orebay anyay equalyay aisepray.

Ithway esethay appearyay ethay Alaminiansay andsbay,
Omwhay ethay iganticgay Elamontay ommandscay;
Inyay elvetway ackblay ipsshay otay Oytray eythay eerstay eirthay oursecay,
Andyay ithway ethay eatgray Atheniansyay oinjay eirthay orcefay.

Extnay ovemay otay arway ethay enerousgay Argiveyay aintray,
Omfray ighhay Enètrœzay, andyay Aseta’smay ainplay,
Andyay airfay Inaægay ircledcay ybay ethay ainmay:
Omwhay ongstray Yrinthe’stay oftylay allsway urroundsay,
Andyay Epidaureyay ithway inyvay arvestshay own’dcray:
Andyay erewhay airfay Asinenyay andyay Ermoinhay owshay
Eirthay iffsclay aboveyay, andyay ampleyay aybay elowbay.
Esethay ybay ethay avebray Euryalusyay ereway edlay,
Eatgray Enelussthay, andyay eatergray Iomedday;
Utbay iefchay Ydidestay orebay ethay overeignsay aysway:
Inyay ourscorefay arksbay eythay oughplay ethay ateryway ayway.

Ethay oudpray Ycenèmay armsyay erhay artialmay owerspay,
Eonèclay, Orinthcay, ithway imperialyay owerstay,[103]
Airfay Aræthyreayay, Ornia’syay uitfulfray ainplay,
Andyay Ionægay, andyay Adrastusyay’ ancientyay eignray;
Andyay osethay owhay elldway alongyay ethay andysay oreshay,
Andyay erewhay Ellenèpay yieldsyay erhay eecyflay orestay,
Erewhay Elicèhay andyay Yperesiahay ielay,
Andyay Onoëssa’sgay iresspay alutesay ethay yskay.
Eatgray Agamemnonyay ulesray ethay umerousnay andbay,
Ayay undredhay esselsvay inyay onglay orderyay andstay,
Andyay owdedcray ationsnay aitway ishay eaddray ommandcay.
Ighhay onyay ethay eckday ethay ingkay ofyay enmay appearsyay,
Andyay ishay efulgentray armsyay inyay iumphtray earsway;
Oudpray ofyay ishay osthay, unrivall’dyay inyay ishay eignray,
Inyay ilentsay omppay ehay ovesmay alongyay ethay ainmay.

Ishay otherbray ollowsfay, andyay otay engeancevay armsway
Ethay ardyhay Artansspay, exercisedyay inyay armsyay:
Aresphay andyay Ysia’sbray aliantvay oopstray, andyay osethay
Omwhay Acedæmon’slay oftylay illshay incloseyay;
Oryay Essé’smay owerstay orfay ilversay ovesday enown’dray,
Amyclæyay, Aäslay, Augia’syay appyhay oundgray,
Andyay osethay omwhay Ylosœtay’ owlay allsway ontaincay,
Andyay Eloshay, onyay ethay arginmay ofyay ethay ainmay.
Esethay, o’eryay ethay endingbay oceanyay, Elen’shay ausecay,
Inyay ixtysay ipsshay ithway Enelausmay awsdray:
Eageryay andyay oudlay omfray anmay otay anmay ehay iesflay,
Evengeray andyay uryfay amingflay inyay ishay eyesyay;
Ilewhay ainlyvay ondfay, inyay ancyfay oftyay ehay earshay
Ethay airfay one’syay iefgray, andyay eessay erhay allingfay earstay.

Inyay inetynay ailsay, omfray Ylospay’ andysay oastcay,
Estornay ethay agesay onductscay ishay osenchay osthay:
Omfray Amphigenia’syay ever-fruitfulyay andlay,
Erewhay Yæpay ighhay, andyay ittlelay Eleonptay andstay;
Erewhay eauteousbay Areneyay erhay ucturesstray owsshay,
Andyay Yon’sthray allsway Alpheusyay’ eamsstray incloseyay:
Andyay Orionday, amedfay orfay Amyristhay’ isgraceday,
Uperiorsay onceyay ofyay allyay ethay unefultay aceray,
Illtay, ainvay ofyay ortalsmay’ emptyyay aisepray, ehay ovestray
Otay atchmay ethay eedsay ofyay oud-compellingclay Ovejay!
Ootay aringday ardbay! osewhay unsuccessfulyay idepray
Ethay immortalyay Usesmay inyay eirthay artyay efiedday.
Ethay avengingyay Usesmay ofyay ethay ightlay ofyay ayday
Eprivedday ishay eyesyay, andyay atch’dsnay ishay oicevay awayyay;
Onay oremay ishay eavenlyhay oicevay asway eardhay otay ingsay,
Ishay andhay onay oremay awakedyay ethay ilversay ingstray.

Erewhay underyay ighhay Yllenècay, own’dcray ithway oodway,
Ethay adedshay ombtay ofyay oldyay Ytusæpay oodstay;
Omfray Ipèray, Atiestray, Egea’stay orderingbay ownstay,
Ethay Eneanphay ieldsfay, andyay Orchomenianyay ownsday,
Erewhay ethay atfay erdshay inyay enteousplay asturepay overay;
Andyay Ymphelusstay ithway erhay urroundingsay ovegray;
Arrhasiapay, onyay erhay owysnay iffsclay eclinedray,
Andyay ighhay Enispèyay ookshay ybay intryway indway,
Andyay airfay Antinea’smay ever-pleasingyay itesay;
Inyay ixtysay ailsay ethay Arcadianyay andsbay uniteyay.
Oldbay Agapenoryay, oriousglay atyay eirthay eadhay,
ancæus(ay’ onsay) ethay ightymay uadronsqay edlay.
Eirthay ipsshay, uppliedsay ybay Agamemnon’syay arecay,
Oughthray oaringray eassay ethay onderingway arriorsway earbay;
Ethay irstfay otay attlebay onyay ethay appointedyay ainplay,
Utbay ewnay otay allyay ethay angersday ofyay ethay ainmay.

Osethay, erewhay airfay Elisyay andyay Uprasiumbay oinjay;
Omwhay Yrminhay, erehay, andyay Yrsinusmay onfinecay,
Andyay oundedbay erethay, erewhay o’eryay ethay alleysvay oseray
Ethay Olenianyay ockray; andyay erewhay Alisiumyay owsflay;
Eneathbay ourfay iefschay a(ay umerousnay armyyay) amecay:
Ethay engthstray andyay oryglay ofyay ethay Epeanyay amenay.
Inyay eparatesay uadronssqay esethay eirthay aintray ivideday,
Eachyay eadslay entay esselsvay oughthray ethay yieldingyay idetay.
Oneyay asway Amphimachusyay, andyay Alpiusthay oneyay;
eurytus(ay’ isthay, andyay atthay Eätustay’ onsay;)
Ioresday ungspray omfray Amarynceusyay’ inelay;
Andyay eatgray Olyxenuspay, ofyay orcefay ivineday.

Utbay osethay owhay iewvay airfay Elisyay o’eryay ethay eassay
Omfray ethay estblay islandsyay ofyay ethay Echinadesyay,
Inyay ortyfay esselsvay underyay Egesmay ovemay,
Egotbay ybay Yleusphay, ethay elovedbay ofyay Ovejay:
Otay ongstray Ulichiumday omfray ishay iresay ehay edflay,
Andyay encethay otay Oytray ishay ardyhay arriorsway edlay.

Ulyssesyay ollow’dfay oughthray ethay ateryway oadray,
Ayay iefchay, inyay isdomway equalyay otay ayay odgay.
Ithway osethay omwhay Ephalenia’scay inelay inclosedyay,
Oryay illtay eirthay ieldsfay alongyay ethay oastcay opposedyay;
Oryay erewhay airfay Ithacayay o’erlooksyay ethay oodsflay,
Erewhay ighhay Eritosnay akesshay ishay avingway oodsway,
Erewhay Ilipa’sægay uggedray idessay areyay eensay,
Ocyliacray ockyray, andyay Acynthuszay eengray.
Esethay inyay elvetway alleysgay ithway ermilionvay orespray,
Eneathbay ishay onductcay oughtsay ethay Ygianphray oresshay.

Oasthay amecay extnay, Andræmon’syay aliantvay onsay,
Omfray Euron’splay allsway, andyay alkychay Alydoncay,
Andyay oughray Ylenepay, andyay ethay Olenianyay eepstay,
Andyay Alcischay, eatenbay ybay ethay ollingray eepday.
Ehay edlay ethay arriorsway omfray ethay Olianætay oreshay,
Orfay ownay ethay onssay ofyay Eusœnay ereway onay oremay!
Ethay oriesglay ofyay ethay ightymay aceray ereway edflay!
Eusœnay imselfhay, andyay Eleagermay eadday!
Otay Oasthay’ arecay ownay usttray ethay artialmay aintray,
Ishay ortyfay esselsvay ollowfay oughthray ethay ainmay.

Extnay, eightyyay arksbay ethay Etancray ingkay ommandscay,
Ofyay Ossusgnay, Yctuslay, andyay Ortyna’sgay andsbay;
Andyay osethay owhay elldway erewhay Ytion’srhay omesday ariseyay,
Oryay itewhay Ycastuslay ittersglay otay ethay iesskay,
Oryay erewhay ybay Usphæstay ilversay Ardanjay unsray;
Ete’scray undredhay itiescay ourpay orthfay allyay erhay onssay.
Esethay arch’dmay, Idomeneusyay, eneathbay ythay arecay,
Andyay Erionmay, eadfuldray asyay ethay odgay ofyay arway.

Epolemustlay, ethay onsay ofyay Erculeshay,
Edlay inenay iftsway esselsvay oughthray ethay oamyfay eassay,
Omfray Odesrhay, ithway everlastingyay unshinesay ightbray,
Alyssusjay, Induslay, andyay Amiruscay itewhay.
Ishay aptivecay othermay iercefay Alcidesyay orebay
Omfray Ephyr’syay allsway andyay Ellè’ssay indingway oreshay,
Erewhay ightymay ownstay inyay uinsray eadspray ethay ainplay,
Andyay awsay eirthay oomingblay arriorsway earlyyay ainslay.
Ethay erohay, enwhay otay anlymay yearsyay ehay ewgray,
Alcidesyay’ uncleyay, oldyay Icymniuslay, ewslay;
Orfay isthay, onstrain’dcay otay uitqay ishay ativenay aceplay,
Andyay unshay ethay engeancevay ofyay ethay Erculeanhay aceray,
Ayay eetflay ehay uiltbay, andyay ithway ayay umerousnay aintray
Ofyay illingway exilesyay ander’dway o’eryay ethay ainmay;
Erewhay, anymay eassay andyay anymay ufferingssay astpay,
Onyay appyhay Odesrhay ethay iefchay arrivedyay atyay astlay:
Erethay inyay eethray ibestray ividesday ishay ativenay andbay,
Andyay ulesray emthay eacefulpay inyay ayay oreignfay andlay;
Increasedyay andyay osper’dpray inyay eirthay ewnay abodesyay
Ybay ightymay Ovejay, ethay iresay ofyay enmay andyay odsgay;
Ithway oyjay eythay awsay ethay owinggray empireyay iseray,
Andyay owersshay ofyay ealthway escendingday omfray ethay iesskay.

Eethray ipsshay ithway Ireusnay oughtsay ethay Ojantray oreshay,
Ireusnay, omwhay Agäleyay otay Aropuschay orebay,
Ireusnay, inyay aultlessfay apeshay andyay oomingblay acegray,
Ethay oveliestlay youthyay ofyay allyay ethay Eciangray aceray;[104]
Elidespay onlyyay atch’dmay ishay earlyyay armschay;
Utbay ewfay ishay oopstray, andyay allsmay ishay engthstray inyay armsyay.

Extnay irtythay alleysgay eaveclay ethay iquidlay ainplay,
Ofyay osethay Alydnæ’scay ea-girtsay islesyay ontaincay;
Ithway emthay ethay youthyay ofyay Isyrusnay epairray,
Asuscay ethay ongstray, andyay Apathuscray ethay airfay;
Oscay, erewhay Eurypylusyay ossess’dpay ethay aysway,
Illtay eatgray Alcidesyay ademay ethay ealmsray obeyyay:
Esethay Antiphusyay andyay oldbay Idippusphay ingbray,
Ungspray omfray ethay odgay ybay Essalusthay ethay ingkay.

Ownay, Usemay, ecountray Elasgicpay Argosyay’ owerspay,
Omfray Alosyay, Alopéyay, andyay Echin’stray owerstay:
Omfray Ia’sphthay aciousspay alesvay; andyay Ellahay, ess’dblay
Ithway emalefay eautybay arfay eyondbay ethay estray.
Ullfay iftyfay ipsshay eneathbay Achillesyay’ arecay,
Ethay Achaiansyay, Yrmidonsmay, Ellenianshay earbay;
Essaliansthay allyay, oughthay ariousvay inyay eirthay amenay;
Ethay amesay eirthay ationnay, andyay eirthay iefchay ethay amesay.
Utbay ownay ingloriousyay, etch’dstray alongyay ethay oreshay,
Eythay earhay ethay azenbray oicevay ofyay arway onay oremay;
Onay oremay ethay oefay eythay acefay inyay ireday arrayyay:
Oseclay inyay ishay eetflay ethay angryyay eaderlay aylay;
Incesay airfay Iseïsbray omfray ishay armsyay asway orntay,
Ethay oblestnay oilspay omfray ack’dsay Yrnessuslay ornebay,
Enthay, enwhay ethay iefchay ethay Ebanthay allsway o’erthrewyay,
Andyay ethay oldbay onssay ofyay eatgray Evenusyay ewslay.
Erethay ourn’dmay Achillesyay, ungedplay inyay epthday ofyay arecay,
Utbay oonsay otay iseray inyay aughterslay, oodblay, andyay arway.

Otay esethay ethay youthyay ofyay Ylacèphay ucceedsay,
Itonayay, amousfay orfay erhay eecyflay eedbray,
Andyay assygray Eleonptay eck’dday ithway eerfulchay eensgray,
Ethay owersbay ofyay Erescay, andyay ethay ylvansay enesscay.
Eetsway Yrrhasuspay, ithway oomingblay oweretsflay own’dcray,
Andyay Antron’syay ateryway ensday, andyay avern’dcay oundgray.
Esethay own’dyay, asyay iefchay, Otesilaspray ethay avebray,
Owhay ownay aylay ilentsay inyay ethay oomyglay avegray:
Ethay irstfay owhay oldlybay ouch’dtay ethay Ojantray oreshay,
Andyay yedday ayay Ygianphray ancelay ithway Eciangray oregay;
Erethay ieslay, arfay istantday omfray ishay ativenay ainplay;
Unfinish’dyay ishay oudpray alacespay emainray,
Andyay ishay adsay onsortcay eatsbay erhay eastbray inyay ainvay.
Ishay oopstray inyay ortyfay ipsshay Odarcespay edlay,
Iphiclusyay’ onsay, andyay otherbray otay ethay eadday;
Ornay ehay unworthyyay otay ommandcay ethay osthay;
Yetyay illstay eythay ourn’dmay eirthay ancientyay eaderlay ostlay.

Ethay enmay owhay Aphyra’sglay airfay oilsay artakepay,
Erewhay illshay incircleyay E’sbœbay owlylay akelay,
Erewhay Ephæray earshay ethay eighbouringnay atersway allfay,
Oryay oudpray Iölcusyay iftslay erhay airyyay allway,
Inyay entay ackblay ipsshay embark’dyay orfay Ilion’syay oreshay,
Ithway oldbay Eumelusyay, omwhay Alcestèyay orebay:
Allyay Eliaspay’ aceray Alcestèyay arfay outshinedyay,
Ethay acegray andyay oryglay ofyay ethay eauteousbay indkay,

Ethay oopstray Ethonèmay oryay Aumaciathay yieldsyay,
Olizon’syay ocksray, oryay Elibœa’smay ieldsfay,
Ithway Iloctetesphay ail’dsay osewhay atchlessmay artyay
Omfray ethay oughtay owbay irectsday ethay eather’dfay artday.
Evensay ereway ishay ipsshay; eachyay esselvay iftyfay owray,
Ill’dskay inyay ishay iencescay ofyay ethay artday andyay owbay.
Utbay ehay aylay agingray onyay ethay Emnianlay oundgray,
Ayay oisonouspay ydrahay avegay ethay urningbay oundway;
Erethay oan’dgray ethay iefchay inyay agonizingyay ainpay,
Omwhay Eecegray atyay engthlay allshay ishway, ornay ishway inyay ainvay.
Ishay orcesfay Edonmay edlay omfray Emnoslay’ oreshay,
Oïleusyay’ onsay, omwhay eauteousbay Enarhay orebay.

Ethay Alianœchay aceray, inyay osethay ighhay owerstay ontain’dcay
Erewhay onceyay Eurytusyay inyay oudpray iumphtray eign’dray,
Oryay erewhay erhay umblerhay urretstay Iccatray earsray,
Oryay erewhay Ithomeyay, oughray ithway ocksray, appearsyay,
Inyay irtythay ailsay ethay arklingspay avesway ivideday,
Ichwhay Odaliriuspay andyay Achaonmay uidegay.
Otay esethay ishay illskay eirthay arent-godpay impartsyay,
Ivineday ofessorspray ofyay ethay ealinghay artsyay.

Ethay oldbay Ormenianyay andyay Asterianyay andsbay
Inyay ortyfay arksbay Eurypylusyay ommandscay.
Erewhay Itantay ideshay ishay oaryhay eadhay inyay owsnay,
Andyay erewhay Yperia’shay ilversay ountainsfay owflay.
Ythay oopstray, Argissayay, Olypœtespay eadslay,
Andyay Eleonyay, elter’dshay ybay Olympusyay’ adesshay,
Yrtonè’sgay arriorsway; andyay erewhay Orthèyay ieslay,
Andyay Oloösson’syay alkychay iffsclay ariseyay.
Ungspray omfray Irithouspay ofyay immortalyay aceray,
Ethay uitfray ofyay airfay Ippodame’shay embraceyay,
at(thay ayday, enwhay url’dhay omfray Elion’spay oudyclay eadhay,
Otay istantday ensday ethay aggyshay Entaurscay edflay)
Ithway Olypœtespay oin’djay inyay equalyay aysway
Eonteuslay eadslay, andyay ortyfay ipsshay obeyyay.

Inyay entytway ailsay ethay oldbay Errhæbianspay amecay
Omfray Yphuscay, Uneusgay asway eirthay eader’slay amenay.
Ithway esethay ethay Eniansyay oin’djay, andyay osethay owhay eezefray
Erewhay oldcay Odonaday iftslay erhay olyhay eestray;
Oryay erewhay ethay easingplay Itaresiustay idesglay,
Andyay intoyay Eneuspay ollsray ishay easyyay idestay;
Yetyay o’eryay ethay ilverysay urfacesay urepay eythay owflay,
Ethay acredsay eamstray unmix’dyay ithway eamsstray elowbay,
Acredsay andyay awfulyay! omfray ethay arkday abodesyay
Yxstay ourspay emthay orthfay, ethay eadfuldray oathyay ofyay odsgay!

Astlay, underyay Othouspray ethay Agnesiansmay oodstay,
othous(pray ethay iftsway, ofyay oldyay Enthredon’stay oodblay;)
Owhay elldway erewhay Elionpay, own’dcray ithway inypay oughsbay,
Obscuresyay ethay adeglay, andyay odsnay ishay aggyshay owsbray;
Oryay erewhay oughthray oweryflay Empetay Eneuspay ay’dstray:
e(thay egionray etch’dstray eneathbay ishay ightymay adeshay:)
Inyay ortyfay ablesay arksbay eythay emm’dstay ethay ainmay;
Uchsay ereway ethay iefschay, andyay uchsay ethay Eciangray aintray.

Aysay extnay, Oyay Usemay! ofyay allyay Achaiayay eedsbray,
Owhay avestbray oughtfay, oryay ein’dray ethay oblestnay eedsstay?
Eumelusyay’ aresmay ereway oremostfay inyay ethay asechay,
Asyay eaglesyay eetflay, andyay ofyay Eretianphay aceray;
Edbray erewhay Ieria’spay uitfulfray ountainsfay owflay,
Andyay ain’dtray ybay imhay owhay earsbay ethay ilversay owbay.
Iercefay inyay ethay ightfay eirthay ostrilsnay eathedbray ayay ameflay,
Eirthay eighthay, eirthay olourcay, andyay eirthay ageyay ethay amesay;
O’eryay ieldsfay ofyay eathday eythay irlwhay ethay apidray arcay,
Andyay eakbray ethay anksray, andyay underthay oughthray ethay arway.
Ajaxyay inyay armsyay ethay irstfay enownray acquiredyay,
Ilewhay ernstay Achillesyay inyay ishay athwray etiredray:
is(hay asway ethay engthstray atthay ortalmay ightmay exceedsyay,
Andyay ishay ethay unrivall’dyay aceray ofyay eavenlyhay eedsstay:)
Utbay Etisthay’ onsay ownay inesshay inyay armsyay onay oremay;
Ishay oopstray, eglectednay onyay ethay andysay oreshay.
Inyay emptyyay airyay eirthay ortivespay avelinsjay owthray,
Oryay irlwhay ethay iskday, oryay endbay anyay idleyay owbay:
Unstain’dyay ithway oodblay ishay over’dcay ariotschay andstay;
Ethay immortalyay ourserscay azegray alongyay ethay andstray;
Utbay ethay avebray iefschay ethay ingloriousyay ifelay eploredday,
Andyay, anderingway o’eryay ethay ampcay, equiredray eirthay ordlay.

Ownay, ikelay ayay elugeday, overingcay allyay aroundyay,
Ethay iningshay armiesyay eepsway alongyay ethay oundgray;
Iftsway asyay ayay oodflay ofyay irefay, enwhay ormsstay ariseyay,
Oatsflay ethay ildway ieldfay, andyay azesblay otay ethay iesskay.
Earthyay oan’dgray eneathbay emthay; asyay enwhay angryyay Ovejay
Urlshay ownday ethay orkyfay ightninglay omfray aboveyay,
Onyay Ariméyay enwhay ehay ethay underthay owsthray,
Andyay iresfay Yphœustay ithway edoubledray owsblay,
Erewhay Yphontay, ess’dpray eneathbay ethay urningbay oadlay,
Illstay eelsfay ethay uryfay ofyay ethay avengingyay odgay.

Utbay ariousvay Irisyay, Ove’sjay ommandscay otay earbay,
Eedsspay onyay ethay ingsway ofyay indsway oughthray iquidlay airyay;
Inyay Iam’spray orchpay ethay Ojantray iefschay eshay oundfay,
Ethay oldyay onsultingcay, andyay ethay youthsyay aroundyay.
Olitespay’ apeshay, ethay onarch’smay onsay, eshay osechay,
Owhay omfray Etesæsay’ ombtay observedyay ethay oesfay,[105]
Ighhay onyay ethay oundmay; omfray encewhay inyay ospectpray aylay
Ethay ieldsfay, ethay entstay, ethay avynay, andyay ethay aybay.
Inyay isthay issembledday ormfay, eshay asteshay otay ingbray
Ethay unwelcomeyay essagemay otay ethay Ygianphray ingkay.

ease“cay otay onsultcay, ethay imetay orfay actionyay allscay;
Arway, orridhay arway, approachesyay otay youryay allsway!
Assembledyay armiesyay oftyay avehay Iyay eheldbay;
Utbay e’ernay illtay ownay uchsay umbersnay argedchay ayay ieldfay:
Ickthay asyay autumnalyay eaveslay oryay ivingdray andsay,
Ethay ovingmay uadronssqay ackenblay allyay ethay andstray.
Outhay, odlikegay Ectorhay! allyay ythay orcefay employyay,
Assembleyay allyay ethay unitedyay andsbay ofyay Oytray;
Inyay ustjay arrayyay etlay everyyay eaderlay allcay
Ethay oreignfay oopstray: isthay ayday emandsday emthay allyay!”

Ethay oicevay ivineday ethay ightymay iefchay alarmsyay;
Ethay ouncilcay eaksbray, ethay arriorsway ushray otay armsyay.
Ethay atesgay unfoldingyay ourpay orthfay allyay eirthay aintray,
Ationsnay onyay ationsnay illfay ethay uskyday ainplay,
Enmay, eedsstay, andyay ariotschay, akeshay ethay emblingtray oundgray:
Ethay umulttay ickensthay, andyay ethay iesskay esoundray.

Amidstyay ethay ainplay, inyay ightsay ofyay Ilionyay, andsstay
Ayay isingray ountmay, ethay orkway ofyay umanhay andshay;
is(thay orfay Yrinne’smay ombtay ethay immortalsyay owknay,
Oughthay all’dcay Ateïabay inyay ethay orldway elowbay;)
Eneathbay eirthay iefschay inyay artialmay orderyay erehay,
Ethay auxiliaryay oopstray andyay Ojantray ostshay appearyay.

Ethay odlikegay Ectorhay, ighhay aboveyay ethay estray,
Akesshay ishay ugehay earspay, andyay odsnay ishay umyplay estcray:
Inyay ongsthray aroundyay ishay ativenay andsbay epairray,
Andyay ovesgray ofyay anceslay itterglay inyay ethay airyay.

Ivineday Easænay ingsbray ethay Ardanday aceray,
Anchisesyay’ onsay, ybay Enusvay’ olenstay embraceyay,
Ornbay inyay ethay adesshay ofyay Ida’syay ecretsay ovegray;
a(ay ortalmay ixingmay ithway ethay ueenqay ofyay ovelay;)
Archilochusyay andyay Acamasyay ivideday
Ethay arrior’sway oilstay, andyay ombatcay ybay ishay idesay.

Owhay airfay Eleia’szay ealthyway alleysvay illtay,[106]
Astfay ybay ethay ootfay ofyay Ida’syay acredsay illhay,
Oryay inkdray, Epusæsay, ofyay ythay ablesay oodflay,
Ereway edlay ybay Andaruspay, ofyay oyalray oodblay;
Otay omwhay ishay artyay Apolloyay eign’dday otay owshay,
Acedgray ithway ethay esentspray ofyay ishay aftsshay andyay owbay.

Omfray ichray Apæsusyay andyay Adrestia’syay owerstay,
Ighhay Eree’stay ummitssay, andyay Ityea’spay owersbay;
Omfray esethay ethay ongregatedcay oopstray obeyyay
Youngyay Amphiusyay andyay Adrastusyay’ equalyay aysway;
Oldyay Eropsmay’ onssay; omwhay, ill’dskay inyay atesfay otay omecay,
Ethay iresay orewarn’dfay, andyay ophesiedpray eirthay oomday:
Atefay urgedyay emthay onyay! ethay iresay orewarn’dfay inyay ainvay,
Eythay ush’dray otay arway, andyay erish’dpay onyay ethay ainplay.

Omfray Actiuspray’ eamstray, Ercotè’spay asturepay andslay,
Andyay Estossay andyay Abydosyay’ eighbouringnay andsstray,
Omfray eatgray Arisba’syay allsway andyay Ellè’ssay oastcay,
Asiusyay Yrtacideshay onductscay ishay osthay:
Ighhay onyay ishay arcay ehay akesshay ethay owingflay einsray,
Ishay ieryfay ourserscay underthay o’eryay ethay ainsplay.

Ethay iercefay Elasgipay extnay, inyay arway enown’dray,
Archmay omfray Arissa’slay ever-fertileyay oundgray:
Inyay equalyay armsyay eirthay otherbray eaderslay ineshay,
Ippothoushay oldbay, andyay Yleuspay ethay ivineday.

Extnay Acamasyay andyay Yrouspay eadlay eirthay ostshay,
Inyay eaddray arrayyay, omfray Acia’sthray intryway oastscay;
Oundray ethay eakblay ealmsray erewhay Ellespontushay oarsray,
Andyay Oreasbay eatsbay ethay oarse-resoundinghay oresshay.

Ithway eatgray Euphemusyay ethay Iconianscay ovemay,
Ungspray omfray Eniantrœzay Eüscay, ovedlay ybay Ovejay.

Yræchmespay ethay Onianpæay oopstray attendyay,
Ill’dskay inyay ethay ightfay eirthay ookedcray owsbay otay endbay;
Omfray Axiusyay’ ampleyay edbay ehay eadslay emthay onyay,
Axiusyay, atthay aveslay ethay istantday Amydonyay,
Axiusyay, atthay ellssway ithway allyay ishay eighbouringnay illsray,
Andyay ideway aroundyay ethay oatingflay egionray illsfay.

Ethay Aphlagonianspay Ylæmenespay ulesray,
Erewhay ichray Enetiahay eedsbray erhay avagesay ulesmay,
Erewhay Erythinusyay’ isingray iffsclay areyay eensay,
Ythay ovesgray ofyay oxbay, Ytoruscay! everyay eengray,
Andyay erewhay Ialusægay andyay Omnacray ielay,
Andyay oftylay Esamussay invadesyay ethay yskay,
Andyay erewhay Artheniuspay, oll’dray oughthray anksbay ofyay owersflay,
Eflectsray erhay orderingbay alacespay andyay owersbay.

Erehay arch’dmay inyay armsyay ethay Alizonianhay andbay,
Omwhay Odiusyay andyay Epistrophusyay ommandcay,
Omfray osethay arfay egionsray erewhay ethay unsay efinesray
Ethay ipeningray ilversay inyay Alybeanyay inesmay.

Erethay ightymay Omischray edlay ethay Ysianmay aintray,
Andyay auguryay Ennomusyay, inspiredyay inyay ainvay;
Orfay ernstay Achillesyay opp’dlay ishay acredsay eadhay,
Oll’dray ownday Amanderscay ithway ethay ulgarvay eadday.

Orcysphay andyay avebray Ascaniusyay erehay uniteyay
Ethay Ascanianyay Ygiansphray, eageryay orfay ethay ightfay.

Ofyay osethay owhay oundray Onia’smæay ealmsray esideray,
Oryay omwhay ethay alesvay inyay adesshay ofyay Olustmay idehay,
Estlesmay andyay Antiphusyay ethay argechay artakepay,
Ornbay onyay ethay anksbay ofyay Ygesgay’ ilentsay akelay.
Erethay, omfray ethay ieldsfay erewhay ildway Andermæay owsflay,
Ighhay Ycalemay, andyay Atmoslay’ adyshay owsbray,
Andyay oudpray Iletusmay, amecay ethay Ariancay ongsthray,
Ithway ingledmay amoursclay andyay ithway arbarousbay onguestay.[107]
Amphimachusyay andyay Austesnay uidegay ethay aintray,
Austesnay ethay oldbay, Amphimachusyay ethay ainvay,
Owhay, ick’dtray ithway oldgay, andyay itteringglay onyay ishay arcay,
Oderay ikelay ayay omanway otay ethay ieldfay ofyay arway.
Oolfay atthay ehay asway! ybay iercefay Achillesyay ainslay,
Ethay iverray eptsway imhay otay ethay inybray ainmay:
Erethay elm’dwhay ithway avesway ethay audygay arriorway ieslay
Ethay aliantvay ictorvay eizedsay ethay oldengay izepray.

Ethay orcesfay astlay inyay airfay arrayyay ucceedsay,
Ichwhay amelessblay Aucusglay andyay Arpedonsay eadlay
Ethay arlikeway andsbay atthay istantday Ycialay yieldsyay,
Erewhay ulfygay Anthusxay oamsfay alongyay ethay ieldsfay.




Ookbay Iiiyay.


Argumentyay.


Ethay Uelday Ofyay Enelausmay Andyay Arispay.


Ethay armiesyay eingbay eadyray otay engageyay, ayay inglesay ombatcay isyay agreedyay uponyay
etweenbay Enelausmay andyay Arispay y(bay ethay interventionyay ofyay Ectorhay) orfay ethay
eterminationday ofyay ethay arway. Irisyay isyay entsay otay allcay Elenhay otay eholdbay ethay
ightfay. Eshay eadslay erhay otay ethay allsway ofyay Oytray, erewhay Iampray atsay ithway ishay
ounsellerscay observingyay ethay Eciangray eaderslay onyay ethay ainplay elowbay, otay omwhay
Elenhay ivesgay anyay accountyay ofyay ethay iefchay ofyay emthay. Ethay ingskay onyay eitheryay artpay
aketay ethay olemnsay oathyay orfay ethay onditionscay ofyay ethay ombatcay. Ethay uelday ensuesyay;
ereinwhay Arispay eingbay overcomeyay, ehay isyay atchedsnay awayyay inyay ayay oudclay ybay Enusvay,
andyay ansportedtray otay ishay apartmentyay. Eshay enthay allscay Elenhay omfray ethay allsway,
andyay ingsbray ethay overslay ogethertay. Agamemnonyay, onyay ethay artpay ofyay ethay Eciansgray,
emandsday ethay estorationray ofyay Elenhay, andyay ethay erformancepay ofyay ethay articlesyay.
 Ethay ee-and-twentieththray ayday illstay ontinuescay oughoutthray isthay ookbay.
 Ethay enescay isyay ometimessay inyay ethay ieldsfay eforebay Oytray, andyay ometimessay inyay
 Oytray itselfyay.


Usthay ybay eirthay eaderslay’ arecay eachyay artialmay andbay
Ovesmay intoyay anksray, andyay etchesstray o’eryay ethay andlay.
Ithway outsshay ethay Ojanstray, ushingray omfray afaryay,
Oclaimpray eirthay otionsmay, andyay ovokepray ethay arway.
Osay enwhay inclementyay intersway exvay ethay ainplay
Ithway iercingpay ostsfray, oryay ick-descendingthay ainray,
Otay armerway eassay ethay anescray embodiedyay yflay,[108]
Ithway oisenay, andyay orderyay, oughthray ethay idwaymay yskay;
Otay igmypay ationsnay oundsway andyay eathday eythay ingbray,
Andyay allyay ethay arway escendsday uponyay ethay ingway,
Utbay ilentsay, eathingbray ageray, esolvedray andyay ill’dskay[109]
Ybay utualmay aidsyay otay ixfay ayay oubtfulday ieldfay,
Iftsway archmay ethay Eeksgray: ethay apidray ustday aroundyay
Arkeningday arisesyay omfray ethay abour’dlay oundgray.
Usthay omfray ishay aggyflay ingsway enwhay Otusnay edsshay
Ayay ightnay ofyay apoursvay oundray ethay ountainmay eadshay,
Ift-glidingsway istsmay ethay uskyday ieldsfay invadeyay,
Otay ievesthay oremay atefulgray anthay ethay idnightmay adeshay;
Ilewhay arcescay ethay ainssway eirthay eedingfay ocksflay urveysay,
Ostlay andyay onfusedcay amidstyay ethay icken’dthay ayday:
Osay app’dwray inyay atheringgay ustday, ethay Eciangray aintray,
Ayay ovingmay oudclay, eptsway onyay, andyay idhay ethay ainplay.

Ownay ontfray otay ontfray ethay ostilehay armiesyay andstay,
Eageryay ofyay ightfay, andyay onlyyay aitway ommandcay;
Enwhay, otay ethay anvay, eforebay ethay onssay ofyay amefay
Omwhay Oytray entsay orthfay, ethay eauteousbay Arispay amecay:
Inyay ormfay ayay odgay! ethay anther’spay eckledspay idehay
Ow’dflay o’eryay ishay armouryay ithway anyay easyyay idepray:
Ishay endedbay owbay acrossyay ishay ouldersshay ungflay,
Ishay ordsway esidebay imhay egligentlynay unghay;
Otway ointedpay earsspay ehay ookshay ithway allantgay acegray,
Andyay aredday ethay avestbray ofyay ethay Eciangray aceray.

Asyay usthay, ithway oriousglay airyay andyay oudpray isdainday,
Ehay oldlybay alk’dstay, ethay oremostfay onyay ethay ainplay,
Imhay Enelausmay, ovedlay ofyay Arsmay, espiesyay,
Ithway earthay elatedyay, andyay ithway oyfuljay eyesyay:
Osay oysjay ayay ionlay, ifyay ethay anchingbray eerday,
Oryay ountainmay oatgay, ishay ulkybay izepray, appearyay;
Eageryay ehay eizessay andyay evoursday ethay ainslay,
Ess’dpray ybay oldbay youthsyay andyay ayingbay ogsday inyay ainvay.
Usthay ondfay ofyay engeancevay, ithway ayay uriousfay oundbay,
Inyay angingclay armsyay ehay eapslay uponyay ethay oundgray
Omfray ishay ighhay ariotchay: imhay, approachingyay earnay,
Ethay eauteousbay ampionchay iewsvay ithway arksmay ofyay earfay,
Itsmay ithway ayay onsciouscay ensesay, etiresray ehindbay,
Andyay unsshay ethay atefay ehay ellway eservedday otay indfay.
Asyay enwhay omesay epherdshay, omfray ethay ustlingray eestray[110]
Otshay orthfay otay iewvay, ayay alyscay erpentsay eessay,
Emblingtray andyay alepay, ehay artsstay ithway ildway affrightyay
Andyay allyay onfusedcay ecipitatespray ishay ightflay:
Osay omfray ethay ingkay ethay iningshay arriorway iesflay,
Andyay ungedplay amidyay ethay ickestthay Ojanstray ieslay.

Asyay odlikegay Ectorhay eessay ethay incepray etreatray,
Ehay usthay upbraidsyay imhay ithway ayay enerousgay eathay:
unhappy“ay Arispay![111] utbay otay omenway avebray!
Osay airlyfay orm’dfay, andyay onlyyay otay eceiveday!
Ohyay, adsthay outhay iedday enwhay irstfay outhay aw’stsay ethay ightlay,
Oryay iedday atyay eastlay eforebay ythay uptialnay iteray!
Ayay etterbay atefay anthay ainlyvay usthay otay oastbay,
Andyay yflay, ethay andalscay ofyay ythay Ojantray osthay.
Odsgay! owhay ethay ornfulscay Eeksgray exultyay otay eesay
Eirthay earsfay ofyay angerday undeceivedyay inyay eethay!
Ythay igurefay omisedpray ithway ayay artialmay airyay,
Utbay illyay ythay oulsay uppliessay ayay ormfay osay airfay.
Inyay ormerfay aysday, inyay allyay ythay allantgay idepray,
Enwhay ythay alltay ipsshay iumphanttray emm’dstay ethay idetay,
Enwhay Eecegray eheldbay ythay aintedpay anvascay owflay,
Andyay owdscray oodstay onderingway atyay ethay assingpay owshay,
Aysay, asway ityay usthay, ithway uchsay ayay affledbay ienmay,
Youyay etmay ethay approachesyay ofyay ethay Artanspay ueenqay,
Usthay omfray erhay ealmray onvey’dcay ethay eauteousbay izepray,
Andyay othbay erhay arlikeway ordslay outshinedyay inyay Elen’shay eyesyay?
Isthay eedday, ythay oesfay’ elightday, ythay ownyay isgraceday,
Ythay ather’sfay iefgray, andyay uinray ofyay ythay aceray;
Isthay eedday ecallsray eethay otay ethay offer’dpray ightfay;
Oryay asthay outhay injuredyay omwhay outhay ar’stday otnay ightray?
Oonsay otay ythay ostcay ethay ieldfay ouldway akemay eethay owknay
Outhay eep’stkay ethay onsortcay ofyay ayay averbray oefay.
Ythay acefulgray ormfay instillingyay oftsay esireday,
Ythay urlingcay essestray, andyay ythay ilversay yrelay,
Eautybay andyay youthyay; inyay ainvay otay esethay youyay usttray,
Enwhay youthyay andyay eautybay allshay ebay aidlay inyay ustday:
Oytray yetyay aymay akeway, andyay oneyay avengingyay owblay
Ushcray ethay ireday authoryay ofyay ishay ountry’scay oeway.”

Ishay ilencesay erehay, ithway ushesblay, Arispay eaksbray:
is“’tay ustjay, ymay otherbray, atwhay youryay angeryay eaksspay:
Utbay owhay ikelay eethay ancay oastbay ayay oulsay edatesay,
Osay irmlyfay oofpray otay allyay ethay ocksshay ofyay atefay?
Ythay orcefay, ikelay eelstay, ayay emper’dtay ardnesshay owsshay,
Illstay edgedyay otay oundway, andyay illstay untiredyay ithway owsblay,
Ikelay eelstay, upliftedyay ybay omesay enuousstray ainsway,
Ithway allingfay oodsway otay ewstray ethay astedway ainplay.
Ythay iftsgay Iyay aisepray; ornay outhay espiseday ethay armschay
Ithway ichwhay ayay overlay oldengay Enusvay armsyay;
Oftsay ovingmay eechspay, andyay easingplay outwardyay owshay,
Onay ishway ancay aingay emthay, utbay ethay odsgay estowbay.
Yetyay, ould’stway outhay avehay ethay offer’dpray ombatcay andstay,
Ethay Eeksgray andyay Ojanstray eatsay onyay eitheryay andhay;
Enthay etlay ayay idwaymay acespay ouryay ostshay ivideday,
Andyay, onyay atthay agestay ofyay arway, ethay ausecay ebay iedtray:
Ybay Arispay erethay ethay Artanspay ingkay ebay oughtfay,
Orfay eauteousbay Elenhay andyay ethay ealthway eshay oughtbray;
Andyay owhay ishay ivalray ancay inyay armsyay ubduesay,
Ishay ebay ethay airfay, andyay ishay ethay easuretray ootay.
Usthay ithway ayay astinglay eaguelay youryay oilstay aymay easecay,
Andyay Oytray ossesspay erhay ertilefay ieldsfay inyay eacepay;
Usthay aymay ethay Eeksgray eviewray eirthay ativenay oreshay,
Uchmay amedfay orfay enerousgay eedsstay, orfay eautybay oremay.”

Ehay aidsay. Ethay allengechay Ectorhay eardhay ithway oyjay,
Enthay ithway ishay earspay estrain’dray ethay youthyay ofyay Oytray,
Eldhay ybay ethay idstmay, athwartyay; andyay earnay ethay oefay
Advancedyay ithway epsstay ajesticallymay owslay:
Ilewhay oundray ishay auntlessday eadhay ethay Eciansgray ourpay
Eirthay onesstay andyay arrowsyay inyay ayay ingledmay owershay.

Enthay usthay ethay onarchmay, eatgray Atridesyay, iedcray:
orbear“fay, yeyay arriorsway! aylay ethay artsday asideyay:
Ayay arleypay Ectorhay asksyay, ayay essagemay earsbay;
Eway owknay imhay ybay ethay ariousvay umeplay ehay earsway.”
Awedyay ybay ishay ighhay ommandcay ethay Eeksgray attendyay,
Ethay umulttay ilencesay, andyay ethay ightfay uspendsay.

Ilewhay omfray ethay entrecay Ectorhay ollsray ishay eyesyay
Onyay eitheryay osthay, andyay usthay otay othbay appliesyay:
ear“hay, allyay yeyay Ojantray, allyay yeyay Eciangray andsbay,
Atwhay Arispay, authoryay ofyay ethay arway, emandsday.
Youryay iningshay ordssway ithinway ethay eathshay estrainray,
Andyay itchpay youryay anceslay inyay ethay yieldingyay ainplay.
Erehay inyay ethay idstmay, inyay eitheryay army’syay ightsay,
Ehay aresday ethay Artanspay ingkay otay inglesay ightfay;
Andyay illsway atthay Elenhay andyay ethay avish’dray oilspay,
Atthay ausedcay ethay ontestcay, allshay ewardray ethay oiltay.
Etlay esethay ethay avebray iumphanttray ictorvay acegray,
Andyay ifferentday ationsnay artpay inyay eagueslay ofyay eacepay.”

Ehay okespay: inyay illstay uspensesay onyay eitheryay idesay
Eachyay armyyay oodstay: ethay Artanspay iefchay epliedray:

e“may ootay, yeyay arriorsway, earhay, osewhay atalfay ightray
Ayay orldway engagesyay inyay ethay oilstay ofyay ightfay.
Otay emay ethay abourlay ofyay ethay ieldfay esignray;
Emay Arispay injuredyay; allyay ethay arway ebay inemay.
Allfay ehay atthay ustmay, eneathbay ishay ival’sray armsyay;
Andyay ivelay ethay estray, ecuresay ofyay uturefay armshay.
Otway ambslay, evotedday ybay youryay ountry’scay iteray,
Otay earthyay ayay ablesay, otay ethay unsay ayay itewhay,
Eparepray, yeyay Ojanstray! ilewhay ayay irdthay eway ingbray
Electsay otay Ovejay, ethay inviolableyay ingkay.
Etlay everendray Iampray inyay ethay ucetray engageyay,
Andyay addyay ethay anctionsay ofyay onsideratecay ageyay;
Ishay onssay areyay aithlessfay, eadlonghay inyay ebateday,
Andyay youthyay itselfyay anyay emptyyay averingway atestay;
Oolcay ageyay advancesyay, enerablyvay iseway,
Urnstay onyay allyay andshay itsyay eep-discerningday eyesyay;
Eessay atwhay efellbay, andyay atwhay aymay yetyay efallbay,
Oncludescay omfray othbay, andyay estbay ovidespray orfay allyay.

Ethay ationsnay earhay ithway isingray opeshay ossess’dpay,
Andyay eacefulpay ospectspray awnday inyay everyyay eastbray.
Ithinway ethay ineslay eythay ewdray eirthay eedsstay aroundyay,
Andyay omfray eirthay ariotschay issuedyay onyay ethay oundgray;
Extnay, allyay unbucklingyay ethay ichray ailmay eythay oreway,
Aidlay eirthay ightbray armsyay alongyay ethay ablesay oreshay.
Onyay eitheryay idesay ethay eetingmay ostshay areyay eensay
Ithway anceslay ix’dfay, andyay oseclay ethay acespay etweenbay.
Otway eraldshay ownay, espatch’dday otay Oytray, inviteyay
Ethay Ygianphray onarchmay otay ethay eacefulpay iteray.

Althybiustay astenshay otay ethay eetflay, otay ingbray
Ethay amblay orfay Ovejay, ethay inviolableyay ingkay.

Eantimemay otay eauteousbay Elenhay, omfray ethay iesskay
Ethay ariousvay oddessgay ofyay ethay ainbowray iesflay:
ike(lay airfay Aodicelay inyay ormfay andyay acefay,
Ethay oveliestlay ymphnay ofyay Iam’spray oyalray aceray:)
Erhay inyay ethay alacepay, atyay erhay oomlay eshay oundfay;
Ethay oldengay ebway erhay ownyay adsay orystay own’dcray,
Ethay Ojantray arsway eshay eavedway erself(hay ethay izepray)
Andyay ethay ireday iumphstray ofyay erhay atalfay eyesyay.
Otay omwhay ethay oddessgay ofyay ethay aintedpay owbay:
approach“ay, andyay iewvay ethay ondrousway enescay elowbay![112]
Eachyay ardyhay Eekgray, andyay aliantvay Ojantray ightknay,
Osay eadfuldray atelay, andyay uriousfay orfay ethay ightfay,
Ownay estray eirthay earsspay, oryay eanlay uponyay eirthay ieldsshay;
Easedcay isyay ethay arway, andyay ilentsay allyay ethay ieldsfay.
Arispay aloneyay andyay Arta’sspay ingkay advanceyay,
Inyay inglesay ightfay otay osstay ethay eamybay ancelay;
Eachyay etmay inyay armsyay, ethay atefay ofyay ombatcay iestray,
Ythay ovelay ethay otivemay, andyay ythay armschay ethay izepray.”

Isthay aidsay, ethay any-colouredmay aidmay inspiresyay
Erhay usband’shay ovelay, andyay akesway erhay ormerfay iresfay;
Erhay ountrycay, arentspay, allyay atthay onceyay ereway earday,
Ushray otay erhay oughtthay, andyay orcefay ayay endertay eartay,
O’eryay erhay airfay acefay ayay owysnay eilvay eshay ewthray,
Andyay, oftlysay ighingsay, omfray ethay oomlay ithdrewway.
Erhay andmaidshay, Ymeneclay andyay Aæthray, aitway
Erhay ilentsay ootstepsfay otay ethay Anscæay ategay.

Erethay atsay ethay eniorssay ofyay ethay Ojantray aceray:
old(ay Iam’spray iefschay, andyay ostmay inyay Iam’spray acegray,)
Ethay ingkay ethay irstfay; Ymœtesthay atyay ishay idesay;
Ampuslay andyay Ytiusclay, onglay inyay ouncilcay iedtray;
Anthuspay, andyay Icetaonhay, onceyay ethay ongstray;
Andyay extnay, ethay isestway ofyay ethay everendray ongthray,
Antenoryay avegray, andyay agesay Ucalegonyay,
Ean’dlay onyay ethay allsway andyay ask’dbay eforebay ethay unsay:
Iefschay, owhay onay oremay inyay oodyblay ightsfay engageyay,
Utbay iseway oughthray imetay, andyay arrativenay ithway ageyay,
Inyay ummersay aysday, ikelay asshoppersgray ejoiceray,
Ayay oodlessblay aceray, atthay endsay ayay eeblefay oicevay.
Esethay, enwhay ethay Artanspay ueenqay approach’dyay ethay owertay,
Inyay ecretsay own’dyay esistlessray eauty’sbay owerpay:
Eythay iedcray, o“nay onderway[113] uchsay elestialcay armschay
Orfay inenay onglay yearsyay avehay etsay ethay orldway inyay armsyay;
Atwhay inningway acesgray! atwhay ajesticmay ienmay!
Eshay ovesmay ayay oddessgay, andyay eshay ookslay ayay ueenqay!
Yetyay encehay, Oyay Eavenhay, onveycay atthay atalfay acefay,
Andyay omfray estructionday avesay ethay Ojantray aceray.”

Ethay oodgay oldyay Iampray elcomedway erhay, andyay iedcray,
approach“ay, ymay ildchay, andyay acegray ythay ather’sfay idesay.
Eesay onyay ethay ainplay ythay Eciangray ousespay appearsyay,
Ethay iendsfray andyay indredkay ofyay ythay ormerfay yearsyay.
Onay imecray ofyay inethay ouryay esentpray ufferingssay awsdray,
Otnay outhay, utbay Eaven’shay isposingday illway, ethay ausecay
Ethay odsgay esethay armiesyay andyay isthay orcefay employyay,
Ethay ostilehay odsgay onspirecay ethay atefay ofyay Oytray.
Utbay iftlay ythay eyesyay, andyay aysay, atwhay Eekgray isyay ehay
ar(fay asyay omfray encehay esethay agedyay orbsyay ancay eesay)
Aroundyay osewhay owbray uchsay artialmay acesgray ineshay,
Osay alltay, osay awfulyay, andyay almostyay ivineday!
Oughthay omesay ofyay argerlay aturestay eadtray ethay eengray,
Onenay atchmay ishay andeurgray andyay exaltedyay ienmay:
Ehay eemssay ayay onarchmay, andyay ishay ountry’scay idepray.”
Usthay easedcay ethay ingkay, andyay usthay ethay airfay epliedray:

efore“bay ythay esencepray, atherfay, Iyay appearyay,
Ithway onsciouscay ameshay andyay everentialray earfay.
Ahyay! adhay Iyay iedday, ereyay otay esethay allsway Iyay edflay,
Alsefay otay ymay ountrycay, andyay ymay uptialnay edbay;
Ymay othersbray, iendsfray, andyay aughterday eftlay ehindbay,
Alsefay otay emthay allyay, otay Arispay onlyyay indkay!
Orfay isthay Iyay ournmay, illtay iefgray oryay ireday iseaseday
Allshay asteway ethay ormfay osewhay aultfay ityay asway otay easeplay!
Ethay ingkay ofyay ingskay, Atridesyay, youyay urveysay,
Eatgray inyay ethay arway, andyay eatgray inyay artsyay ofyay aysway:
Ymay otherbray onceyay, eforebay ymay aysday ofyay ameshay!
Andyay ohyay! atthay illstay ehay orebay ayay other’sbray amenay!”

Ithway onderway Iampray iew’dvay ethay odlikegay anmay,
Extoll’dyay ethay appyhay incepray, andyay usthay eganbay:
o“ay ess’dblay Atridesyay! ornbay otay osperouspray atefay,
Uccessfulsay onarchmay ofyay ayay ightymay atestay!
Owhay astvay ythay empireyay! Ofyay youryay atchlessmay aintray
Atwhay umbersnay ostlay, atwhay umbersnay yetyay emainray!
Inyay Ygiaphray onceyay ereway allantgay armiesyay ownknay,
Inyay ancientyay imetay, enwhay Otreusyay ill’dfay ethay onethray,
Enwhay odlikegay Ygdonmay edlay eirthay oopstray ofyay orsehay,
Andyay Iyay, otay oinjay emthay, aisedray ethay Ojantray orcefay:
Againstyay ethay anlikemay Amazonsyay eway oodstay,[114]
Andyay Angar’ssay eamstray anray urplepay ithway eirthay oodblay.
Utbay arfay inferioryay osethay, inyay artialmay acegray,
Andyay engthstray ofyay umbersnay, otay isthay Eciangray aceray.”

Isthay aidsay, onceyay oremay ehay iew’dvay ethay arriorway aintray;
at’s“whay ehay, osewhay armsyay ielay atter’dscay onyay ethay ainplay?
Oadbray isyay ishay eastbray, ishay ouldersshay argerlay eadspray,
Oughthay eatgray Atridesyay overtopsyay ishay eadhay.
Ornay yetyay appearyay ishay arecay andyay onductcay allsmay;
Omfray ankray otay ankray ehay ovesmay, andyay ordersyay allyay.
Ethay atelystay amray usthay easuresmay o’eryay ethay oundgray,
Andyay, astermay ofyay ethay ockflay, urveyssay emthay oundray.”

Enthay Elenhay usthay: om“whay youryay iscerningday eyesyay
Avehay ingledsay outyay, isyay Ithacusyay ethay iseway;
Ayay arrenbay islandyay oastsbay ishay oriousglay irthbay;
Ishay amefay orfay isdomway illsfay ethay aciousspay earthyay.”

Antenoryay ooktay ethay ordway, andyay usthay eganbay:[115]
yself“may, Oyay ingkay! avehay eensay atthay ondrousway anmay
Enwhay, ustingtray Ovejay andyay ospitablehay awslay,
Otay Oytray ehay amecay, otay eadplay ethay Eciangray ausecay;
eat(gray Enelausmay urgedyay ethay amesay equestray;)
Ymay ousehay asway onour’dhay ithway eachyay oyalray uestgay:
Iyay ewknay eirthay ersonspay, andyay admiredyay eirthay artspay,
Othbay avebray inyay armsyay, andyay othbay approvedyay inyay artsyay.
Erectyay, ethay Artanspay ostmay engagedyay ouryay iewvay;
Ulyssesyay eatedsay, eatergray everenceray ewdray.
Enwhay Atreusyay’ onsay aranguedhay ethay isteninglay aintray,
Ustjay asway ishay ensesay, andyay ishay expressionyay ainplay,
Ishay ordsway uccinctsay, yetyay ullfay, ithoutway ayay aultfay;
Ehay okespay onay oremay anthay ustjay ethay ingthay ehay oughtyay.
Utbay enwhay Ulyssesyay oseray, inyay oughtthay ofoundpray,[116]
Ishay odestmay eyesyay ehay ix’dfay uponyay ethay oundgray;
Asyay oneyay unskill’dyay oryay umbday, ehay eem’dsay otay andstay,
Ornay aisedray ishay eadhay, ornay etch’dstray ishay eptredscay andhay;
Utbay, enwhay ehay eaksspay, atwhay elocutionyay owsflay!
Oftsay asyay ethay eecesflay ofyay escendingday owssnay,[117]
Ethay opiouscay accentsyay allfay, ithway easyyay artyay;
Eltingmay eythay allfay, andyay inksay intoyay ethay earthay!
Onderingway eway earhay, andyay ix’dfay inyay eepday urprisesay,
Ouryay earsyay efuteray ethay ensurecay ofyay ouryay eyesyay.”

Ethay ingkay enthay ask’dyay as(ay yetyay ethay ampcay ehay iew’dvay)
at“whay iefchay isyay atthay, ithway iantgay engthstray enduedyay,
Osewhay awnybray ouldersshay, andyay osewhay ellingsway estchay,
Andyay oftylay aturestay, arfay exceedyay ethay estray?
ajax“ay ethay eatgray, e(thay eauteousbay ueenqay epliedray,)
Imselfhay ayay osthay: ethay Eciangray engthstray andyay idepray.
Eesay! oldbay Idomeneusyay uperiorsay owerstay
Amidyay yonyay irclecay ofyay ishay Etancray owerspay,
Eatgray asyay ayay odgay! Iyay awsay imhay onceyay eforebay,
Ithway Enelausmay onyay ethay Artanspay oreshay.
Ethay estray Iyay owknay, andyay ouldcay inyay orderyay amenay;
Allyay aliantvay iefschay, andyay enmay ofyay ightymay amefay.
Yetyay otway areyay antingway ofyay ethay umerousnay aintray,
Omwhay onglay ymay eyesyay avehay oughtsay, utbay oughtsay inyay ainvay:
Astorcay andyay Olluxpay, irstfay inyay artialmay orcefay,
Oneyay oldbay onyay ootfay, andyay oneyay enown’dray orfay orsehay.
Ymay othersbray esethay; ethay amesay ouryay ativenay oreshay,
Oneyay ousehay ontain’dcay usyay, asyay oneyay othermay orebay.
Erhapspay ethay iefschay, omfray arlikeway oilstay atyay easeyay,
Orfay istantday Oytray efusedray otay ailsay ethay eassay;
Erhapspay eirthay ordssway omesay oblernay uarrelqay awsdray,
Ashamedyay otay ombatcay inyay eirthay ister’ssay ausecay.”

Osay okespay ethay airfay, ornay ewknay erhay othersbray’ oomday;[118]
Aptwray inyay ethay oldcay embracesyay ofyay ethay ombtay;
Adorn’dyay ithway onourshay inyay eirthay ativenay oreshay,
Ilentsay eythay eptslay, andyay eardhay ofyay arsway onay oremay.

Eantimemay ethay eraldshay, oughthray ethay owdedcray owntay,
Ingbray ethay ichray ineway andyay estinedday ictimsvay ownday.
Idæusyay’ armsyay ethay oldengay obletsgay ess’dpray,[119]
Owhay usthay ethay enerablevay ingkay address’dyay:
arise“ay, Oyay atherfay ofyay ethay Ojantray atestay!
Ethay ationsnay allcay, ythay oyfuljay eoplepay aitway
Otay ealsay ethay ucetray, andyay endyay ethay ireday ebateday.
Arispay, ythay onsay, andyay Arta’sspay ingkay advanceyay,
Inyay easuredmay istslay otay osstay ethay eightyway ancelay;
Andyay owhay ishay ivalray allshay inyay armsyay ubduesay,
Ishay ebay ethay ameday, andyay ishay ethay easuretray ootay.
Usthay ithway ayay astinglay eaguelay ouryay oilstay aymay easecay,
Andyay Oytray ossesspay erhay ertilefay ieldsfay inyay eacepay:
Osay allshay ethay Eeksgray eviewray eirthay ativenay oreshay,
Uchmay amedfay orfay enerousgay eedsstay, orfay eautybay oremay.”

Ithway iefgray ehay eardhay, andyay adebay ethay iefschay eparepray
Otay oinjay ishay ilk-whitemay ourserscay otay ethay arcay;
Ehay ountsmay ethay eatsay, Antenoryay atyay ishay idesay;
Ethay entlegay eedsstay oughthray A’sscæay atesgay eythay uidegay:[120]
Extnay omfray ethay arcay escendingday onyay ethay ainplay,
Amidyay ethay Eciangray osthay andyay Ojantray aintray,
Owslay eythay oceedpray: ethay agesay Ulyssesyay enthay
Aroseyay, andyay ithway imhay oseray ethay ingkay ofyay enmay.
Onyay eitheryay idesay ayay acredsay eraldhay andsstay,
Ethay ineway eythay ixmay, andyay onyay eachyay onarch’smay andshay
Ourpay ethay ullfay urnyay; enthay awsdray ethay Eciangray ordlay
Ishay utlasscay eathedshay esidebay ishay onderouspay ordsway;
Omfray ethay ign’dsay ictimsvay opscray ethay urlingcay airhay;[121]
Ethay eraldshay artpay ityay, andyay ethay incespray areshay;
Enthay oudlylay usthay eforebay ethay attentiveyay andsbay
Ehay allscay ethay odsgay, andyay eadsspray ishay iftedlay andshay:

o“ay irstfay andyay eatestgray owerpay! omwhay allyay obeyyay,
Owhay ighhay onyay Ida’syay olyhay ountainmay aysway,
Eternalyay Ovejay! andyay youyay ightbray orbyay atthay ollray
Omfray eastyay otay estway, andyay iewvay omfray olepay otay olepay!
Outhay othermay Earthyay! andyay allyay yeyay ivinglay oodsflay!
Infernalyay uriesfay, andyay Artareantay odsgay,
Owhay uleray ethay eadday, andyay orridhay oesway eparepray
Orfay erjuredpay ingskay, andyay allyay owhay alselyfay earsway!
Earhay, andyay ebay itnessway. Ifyay, ybay Arispay ainslay,
Eatgray Enelausmay esspray ethay atalfay ainplay;
Ethay ameday andyay easurestray etlay ethay Ojantray eepkay,
Andyay Eecegray eturningray oughplay ethay ateryway eepday.
Ifyay ybay ymay other’sbray ancelay ethay Ojantray eedblay,
Ebay ishay ethay ealthway andyay eauteousbay ameday ecreedday:
Ethay appointedyay inefay etlay Ilionyay ustlyjay aypay,
Andyay everyyay ageyay ecordray ethay ignalsay ayday.
Isthay ifyay ethay Ygiansphray allshay efuseray otay yieldyay,
Armsyay ustmay evengeray, andyay Arsmay ecideday ethay ieldfay.”

Ithway atthay ethay iefchay ethay endertay ictimsvay ewslay,
Andyay inyay ethay ustday eirthay eedingblay odiesbay ewthray;
Ethay italvay iritspay issuedyay atyay ethay oundway,
Andyay eftlay ethay embersmay uiveringqay onyay ethay oundgray.
Omfray ethay amesay urnyay eythay inkdray ethay ingledmay ineway,
Andyay addyay ibationslay otay ethay owerspay ivineday.
Ilewhay usthay eirthay ayerspray unitedyay ountmay ethay yskay,
ear“hay, ightymay Ovejay! andyay earhay, yeyay odsgay onyay ighhay!
Andyay aymay eirthay oodblay, owhay irstfay ethay eaguelay onfoundcay,
Edshay ikelay isthay ineway, isdainday ethay irstythay oundgray;
Aymay allyay eirthay onsortscay ervesay omiscuouspray ustlay,
Andyay allyay eirthay ustlay ebay atter’dscay asyay ethay ustday!”
Usthay eitheryay osthay eirthay imprecationsyay oin’djay,
Ichwhay Ovejay efusedray, andyay ingledmay ithway ethay indway.

Ethay itesray ownay inish’dfay, everendray Iampray oseray,
Andyay usthay express’dyay ayay earthay o’erchargedyay ithway oesway:
ye“ay Eeksgray andyay Ojanstray, etlay ethay iefschay engageyay,
Utbay arespay ethay eaknessway ofyay ymay eeblefay ageyay:
Inyay yonderyay allsway atthay objectyay etlay emay unshay,
Ornay iewvay ethay angerday ofyay osay earday ayay onsay.
Osewhay armsyay allshay onquercay andyay atwhay incepray allshay allfay,
Eavenhay onlyyay owsknay; orfay eavenhay isposesday allyay.”

Isthay aidsay, ethay oaryhay ingkay onay ongerlay ay’dstay,
Utbay onyay ishay arcay ethay aughter’dslay ictimsvay aidlay:
Enthay eizedsay ethay einsray ishay entlegay eedsstay otay uidegay,
Andyay ovedray otay Oytray, Antenoryay atyay ishay idesay.

Oldbay Ectorhay andyay Ulyssesyay ownay isposeday
Ethay istslay ofyay ombatcay, andyay ethay oundgray incloseyay:
Extnay otay ecideday, ybay acredsay otslay eparepray,
Owhay irstfay allshay aunchlay ishay ointedpay earspay inyay airyay.
Ethay eoplepay aypray ithway elevatedyay andshay,
Andyay ordsway ikelay esethay areyay eardhay oughthray allyay ethay andsbay:
immortal“ay Ovejay, ighhay Eaven’shay uperiorsay ordlay,
Onyay oftylay Ida’syay olyhay ountmay adoredyay!
Oe’erwhay involvedyay usyay inyay isthay ireday ebateday,
Oyay ivegay atthay authoryay ofyay ethay arway otay atefay
Andyay adesshay eternalyay! etlay ivisionday easecay,
Andyay oyfuljay ationsnay oinjay inyay eagueslay ofyay eacepay.”

Ithway eyesyay avertedyay Ectorhay asteshay otay urntay
Ethay otslay ofyay ightfay andyay akesshay ethay azenbray urnyay.
Enthay, Arispay, inethay eap’dlay orthfay; ybay atalfay ancechay
Ordain’dyay ethay irstfay otay irlwhay ethay eightyway ancelay.
Othbay armiesyay atsay ethay ombatcay otay urveysay.
Esidebay eachyay iefchay ishay azureyay armouryay aylay,
Andyay oundray ethay istslay ethay enerousgay ourserscay eighnay.
Ethay eauteousbay arriorway ownay arraysyay orfay ightfay,
Inyay ildedgay armsyay agnificentlymay ightbray:
Ethay urplepay uishescay aspclay ishay ighsthay aroundyay,
Ithway owersflay adorn’dyay, ithway ilversay ucklesbay oundbay:
Ycaon’slay orsletcay ishay airfay odybay ess’ddray,
Acedbray inyay andyay ittedfay otay ishay oftersay eastbray;
Ayay adiantray aldricbay, o’eryay ishay ouldershay iedtay,
Ustain’dsay ethay ordsway atthay itter’dglay atyay ishay idesay:
Ishay youthfulyay acefay ayay olish’dpay elmhay o’erspreadyay;
Ethay avingway orse-hairhay oddednay onyay ishay eadhay:
Ishay iguredfay ieldshay, ayay iningshay orbyay, ehay akestay,
Andyay inyay ishay andhay ayay ointedpay avelinjay akesshay.
Ithway equalyay eedspay andyay iredfay ybay equalyay armschay,
Ethay Artanspay erohay eathesshay ishay imbslay inyay armsyay.

Ownay oundray ethay istslay ethay admiringyay armiesyay andstay,
Ithway avelinsjay ix’dfay, ethay Eekgray andyay Ojantray andbay.
Amidstyay ethay eadfuldray alevay, ethay iefschay advanceyay,
Allyay alepay ithway ageray, andyay akeshay ethay eateningthray ancelay.
Ethay Ojantray irstfay ishay iningshay avelinjay ewthray;
Ullfay onyay Atridesyay’ ingingray ieldshay ityay ewflay,
Ornay iercedpay ethay azenbray orbyay, utbay ithway ayay oundbay[122]
Eap’dlay omfray ethay ucklerbay, untedblay, onyay ethay oundgray.
Atridesyay enthay ishay assymay ancelay eparespray,
Inyay actyay otay owthray, utbay irstfay eferspray ishay ayerspray:

ive“gay emay, eatgray Ovejay! otay unishpay awlesslay ustlay,
Andyay aylay ethay Ojantray aspinggay inyay ethay ustday:
Estroyday ethay aggressoryay, aidyay ymay ighteousray ausecay,
Avengeyay ethay eachbray ofyay ospitablehay awslay!
Etlay isthay exampleyay uturefay imestay eclaimray,
Andyay uardgay omfray ongwray airfay iendship’sfray olyhay amenay,”
Ehay aidsay, andyay oisedpay inyay airyay ethay avelinjay entsay,
Oughthray Arispay’ ieldshay ethay orcefulfay eaponway entway,
Ishay orsletcay iercespay, andyay ishay armentgay endsray,
Andyay ancingglay ownwardday, earnay ishay ankflay escendsday.
Ethay aryway Ojantray, endingbay omfray ethay owblay,
Eludesyay ethay eathday, andyay isappointsday ishay oefay:
Utbay iercefay Atridesyay avedway ishay ordsway, andyay ookstray
Ullfay onyay ishay asquecay: ethay estedcray elmethay ookshay;
Ethay ittlebray eelstay, unfaithfulyay otay ishay andhay,
Okebray ortshay: ethay agmentsfray itter’dglay onyay ethay andsay.
Ethay agingray arriorway otay ethay aciousspay iesskay
Aisedray ishay upbraidingyay oicevay andyay angryyay eyesyay:
en“thay isyay ityay ainvay inyay Ovejay imselfhay otay usttray?
Andyay isyay ityay usthay ethay odsgay assistyay ethay ustjay?
Enwhay imescray ovokepray usyay, Eavenhay uccesssay eniesday;
Ethay artday allsfay armlesshay, andyay ethay alchionfay iesflay.”
Uriousfay ehay aidsay, andyay owardstay ethay Eciangray ewcray
eized(say ybay ethay estcray) ethay unhappyyay arriorway ewdray;
Ugglingstray ehay ollowedfay, ilewhay ethay embroider’dyay ongthay
Atthay iedtay ishay elmethay, agg’ddray ethay iefchay alongyay.
Enthay adhay ishay uinray own’dcray Atridesyay’ oyjay,
Utbay Enusvay embledtray orfay ethay incepray ofyay Oytray:
Unseenyay eshay amecay, andyay urstbay ethay oldengay andbay;
Andyay eftlay anyay emptyyay elmethay inyay ishay andhay.
Ethay asquecay, enragedyay, amidstyay ethay Eeksgray ehay ewthray;
Ethay Eeksgray ithway ilessmay ethay olish’dpay ophytray iewvay.
Enthay, asyay onceyay oremay ehay iftslay ethay eadlyday artday,
Inyay irstthay ofyay engeancevay, atyay ishay ival’sray earthay;
Ethay ueenqay ofyay ovelay erhay avour’dfay ampionchay oudsshray
or(fay odsgay ancay allyay ingsthay) inyay ayay eilvay ofyay oudsclay.
Aisedray omfray ethay ieldfay ethay antingpay youthyay eshay edlay,
Andyay entlygay aidlay imhay onyay ethay idalbray edbay,
Ithway easingplay eetssway ishay aintingfay ensesay enewsray,
Andyay allyay ethay omeday erfumespay ithway eavenlyhay ewsday.
Eantimemay ethay ightestbray ofyay ethay emalefay indkay,
Ethay atchlessmay Elenhay, o’eryay ethay allsway eclinedray;
Otay erhay, esetbay ithway Ojantray eautiesbay, amecay,
Inyay orrow’dbay ormfay, ethay aughter-lovinglay ameday.
e(shay eem’dsay anyay ancientyay aidmay, ell-skill’dway otay ullcay
Ethay owysnay eeceflay, andyay indway ethay istedtway oolway.)
Ethay oddessgay oftlysay ookshay erhay ilkensay estvay,
Atthay edshay erfumespay, andyay isperingwhay usthay address’dyay:


illustration[ay: ] Enusvay, Isguisedday, Invitingyay Elenhay Otay Ethay Amberchay Ofyay
Arispay


aste“hay, appyhay ymphnay! orfay eethay ythay Arispay allscay,
Afesay omfray ethay ightfay, inyay yonderyay oftylay allsway,
Airfay asyay ayay odgay; ithway odoursyay oundray imhay eadspray,
Ehay ieslay, andyay aitsway eethay onyay ethay ell-knownway edbay;
Otnay ikelay ayay arriorway artedpay omfray ethay oefay,
Utbay omesay aygay ancerday inyay ethay ublicpay owshay.”

Eshay okespay, andyay Elen’shay ecretsay oulsay asway ovedmay;
Eshay orn’dscay ethay ampionchay, utbay ethay anmay eshay ovedlay.
Airfay Enusvay’ ecknay, erhay eyesyay atthay arkledspay irefay,
Andyay eastbray, eveal’dray ethay ueenqay ofyay oftsay esireday.[123]
Uckstray ithway erhay esencepray, aightstray ethay ivelylay edray
Orsookfay erhay eekchay; andyay emblingtray, usthay eshay aidsay:
en“thay isyay ityay illstay ythay easureplay otay eceiveday?
Andyay oman’sway ailtyfray alwaysyay otay elievebay!
Aysay, otay ewnay ationsnay ustmay Iyay osscray ethay ainmay,
Oryay arrycay arsway otay omesay oftsay Asianyay ainplay?
Orfay omwhay ustmay Elenhay eakbray erhay econdsay owvay?
Atwhay otheryay Arispay isyay ythay arlingday ownay?
Eftlay otay Atridesyay, ictor(vay inyay ethay ifestray,)
Anyay odiousyay onquestcay andyay ayay aptivecay ifeway,
Encehay etlay emay ailsay; andyay ifyay ythay Arispay earbay
Ymay absenceyay illyay, etlay Enusvay easeyay ishay arecay.
Ayay andmaidhay oddessgay atyay ishay idesay otay aitway,
Enounceray ethay oriesglay ofyay ythay eavenlyhay atestay,
Ebay ix’dfay orfay everyay otay ethay Ojantray oreshay,
Ishay ousespay, oryay aveslay; andyay ountmay ethay iesskay onay oremay.
Orfay emay, otay awlesslay ovelay onay ongerlay edlay,
Iyay ornscay ethay owardcay, andyay etestday ishay edbay;
Elseyay ouldshay Iyay eritmay everlastingyay ameshay,
Andyay eenkay eproachray, omfray everyyay Ygianphray ameday:
Illyay uitssay ityay ownay ethay oysjay ofyay ovelay otay owknay,
Ootay eepday ymay anguishyay, andyay ootay ildway ymay oeway.”


illustration[ay: ] Enusvay Esentingpray Elenhay Otay Arispay


Enthay usthay incensedyay, ethay Aphianpay ueenqay epliesray:
obey“ay ethay owerpay omfray omwhay ythay oriesglay iseray:
Ouldshay Enusvay eavelay eethay, everyyay armchay ustmay yflay,
Adefay omfray ythay eekchay, andyay anguishlay inyay ythay eyeyay.
Easecay otay ovokepray emay, estlay Iyay akemay eethay oremay
Ethay orld’sway aversionyay, anthay eirthay ovelay eforebay;
Ownay ethay ightbray izepray orfay ichwhay ankindmay engageyay,
Anthay, ethay adsay ictimvay, ofyay ethay ublicpay ageray.”

Atyay isthay, ethay airestfay ofyay erhay exsay obey’dyay,
Andyay eil’dvay erhay ushesblay inyay ayay ilkensay adeshay;
Unseenyay, andyay ilentsay, omfray ethay aintray eshay ovesmay,
Edlay ybay ethay oddessgay ofyay ethay Ilessmay andyay Oveslay.
Arrivedyay, andyay enter’dyay atyay ethay alacepay ategay,
Ethay aidsmay officiousyay oundray eirthay istressmay aitway;
Enthay, allyay ispersingday, ariousvay askstay attendyay;
Ethay ueenqay andyay oddessgay otay ethay incepray ascendyay.
Ullfay inyay erhay Arispay’ ightsay, ethay ueenqay ofyay ovelay
Adhay acedplay ethay eauteousbay ogenypray ofyay Ovejay;
Erewhay, asyay ehay iew’dvay erhay armschay, eshay urn’dtay awayyay
Erhay owingglay eyesyay, andyay usthay eganbay otay aysay:

is“ay isthay ethay iefchay, owhay, ostlay otay ensesay ofyay ameshay,
Atelay edflay ethay ieldfay, andyay yetyay urvivessay ishay amefay?
Oyay adsthay outhay iedday eneathbay ethay ighteousray ordsway
Ofyay atthay avebray anmay omwhay onceyay Iyay all’dcay ymay ordlay!
Ethay oasterbay Arispay oftyay esiredday ethay ayday
Ithway Arta’sspay ingkay otay eetmay inyay inglesay ayfray:
Ogay ownay, onceyay oremay ythay ival’sray ageray exciteyay,
Ovokepray Atridesyay, andyay enewray ethay ightfay:
Yetyay Elenhay idsbay eethay aystay, estlay outhay unskill’dyay
Ouldstshay allfay anyay easyyay onquestcay onyay ethay ieldfay.”

Ethay incepray epliesray: ah“ay easecay, ivinelyday airfay,
Ornay addyay eproachesray otay ethay oundsway Iyay earbay;
Isthay ayday ethay oefay evail’dpray ybay Allaspay’ owerpay:
Eway yetyay aymay anquishvay inyay ayay appierhay ourhay:
Erethay antway otnay odsgay otay avourfay usyay aboveyay;
Utbay etlay ethay usinessbay ofyay ouryay ifelay ebay ovelay:
Esethay oftersay omentsmay etlay elightsday employyay,
Andyay indkay embracesyay atchsnay ethay astyhay oyjay.
Otnay usthay Iyay ovedlay eethay, enwhay omfray Arta’sspay oreshay
Ymay orcedfay, ymay illingway eavenlyhay izepray Iyay orebay,
Enwhay irstfay entrancedyay inyay Anae’scray isleyay Iyay aylay,[124]
Ix’dmay ithway ythay oulsay, andyay allyay issolvedday awayyay!”
Usthay avinghay okespay, ethay enamour’dyay Ygianphray oybay
Ush’dray otay ethay edbay, impatientyay orfay ethay oyjay.
Imhay Elenhay ollow’dfay owslay ithway ashfulbay armschay,
Andyay asp’dclay ethay oomingblay erohay inyay erhay armsyay.

Ilewhay esethay otay ove’slay eliciousday aptureray yieldyay,
Ethay ernstay Atridesyay agesray oundray ethay ieldfay:
Osay omesay ellfay ionlay omwhay ethay oodsway obeyyay,
Oarsray oughthray ethay esertday, andyay emandsday ishay eypray.
Arispay ehay eekssay, impatientyay otay estroyday,
Utbay eekssay inyay ainvay alongyay ethay oopstray ofyay Oytray;
Evenyay osethay adhay yieldedyay otay ayay oefay osay avebray
Ethay ecreantray arriorway, atefulhay asyay ethay avegray.
Enthay eakingspay usthay, ethay ingkay ofyay ingskay aroseyay,
ye“ay Ojanstray, Ardansday, allyay ouryay enerousgay oesfay!
Earhay andyay attestyay! omfray Eavenhay ithway onquestcay own’dcray,
Ouryay other’sbray armsyay ethay ustjay uccesssay avehay oundfay:
Ebay ereforethay ownay ethay Artanspay ealthway estor’dray,
Etlay Argiveyay Elenhay ownyay erhay awfullay ordlay;
Ethay appointedyay inefay etlay Ilionyay ustlyjay aypay,
Andyay ageyay otay ageyay ecordray isthay ignalsay ayday.”

Ehay easedcay; ishay army’syay oudlay applausesyay iseray,
Andyay ethay onglay outshay unsray echoingyay oughthray ethay iesskay.


illustration[ay: ] Enusvay

illustration[ay: ] Apmay, itledtay iæ“græcay Antiquæyay”




Ookbay Ivyay.


Argumentyay.


Ethay Eachbray Ofyay Ethay Ucetray, Andyay Ethay Irstfay Attlebay.


Ethay odsgay eliberateday inyay ouncilcay oncerningcay ethay Ojantray arway: eythay agreeyay
uponyay ethay ontinuationcay ofyay ityay, andyay Upiterjay endssay ownday Inervamay otay eakbray
ethay ucetray. Eshay ersuadespay Andaruspay otay aimyay anyay arrowyay atyay Enelausmay, owhay isyay
oundedway, utbay uredcay ybay Achaonmay. Inyay ethay eantimemay omesay ofyay ethay Ojantray
oopstray attackyay ethay Eeksgray. Agamemnonyay isyay istinguishedday inyay allyay ethay artspay
ofyay ayay oodgay eneralgay; ehay eviewsray ethay oopstray, andyay exhortsyay ethay eaderslay, omesay
ybay aisespray andyay othersyay ybay eproofray. Estornay isyay articularlypay elebratedcay orfay
ishay ilitarymay isciplineday. Ethay attlebay oinsjay, andyay eatgray umbersnay areyay ainslay
onyay othbay idessay.
 Ethay amesay ayday ontinuescay oughthray isthay asyay oughthray ethay astlay ookbay as(ay ityay
 oesday alsoyay oughthray ethay otway ollowingfay, andyay almostyay otay ethay endyay ofyay ethay
 eventhsay ookbay). Ethay enescay isyay ollywhay inyay ethay ieldfay eforebay Oytray.


Andyay ownay Olympusyay’ iningshay atesgay unfoldyay;
Ethay odsgay, ithway Ovejay, assumeyay eirthay onesthray ofyay oldgay:
Immortalyay Ebehay, eshfray ithway oomblay ivineday,
Ethay oldengay obletgay ownscray ithway urplepay ineway:
Ilewhay ethay ullfay owlsbay owflay oundray, ethay owerspay employyay
Eirthay arefulcay eyesyay onyay ong-contendedlay Oytray.

Enwhay Ovejay, isposedday otay empttay Aturnia’ssay eensplay,
Usthay akedway ethay uryfay ofyay ishay artialpay ueenqay,
