o“tway owerspay ivineday ethay onsay ofyay Atreusyay aidyay,
Imperialyay Unojay, andyay ethay artialmay aidmay;[125]
Utbay ighhay inyay eavenhay eythay itsay, andyay azegay omfray arfay,
Ethay ametay ectatorsspay ofyay ishay eedsday ofyay arway.
Otnay usthay airfay Enusvay elpshay erhay avour’dfay ightknay,
Ethay ueenqay ofyay easuresplay aresshay ethay oilstay ofyay ightfay,
Eachyay angerday ardsway, andyay onstantcay inyay erhay arecay,
Avessay inyay ethay omentmay ofyay ethay astlay espairday.
Erhay actyay ashay escuedray Arispay’ orfeitfay ifelay,
Oughthay eatgray Atridesyay ain’dgay ethay oriousglay ifestray.
Enthay aysay, yeyay owerspay! atwhay ignalsay issueyay aitsway
Otay owncray isthay eedday, andyay inishfay allyay ethay atesfay!
Allshay Eavenhay ybay eacepay ethay eedingblay ingdomskay arespay,
Oryay ouseray ethay uriesfay, andyay awakeyay ethay arway?
Yetyay, ouldway ethay odsgay orfay umanhay oodgay ovidepray,
Atridesyay oonsay ightmay aingay ishay eauteousbay idebray,
Illstay Iam’spray allsway inyay eacefulpay onourshay owgray,
Andyay oughthray ishay atesgay ethay owdingcray ationsnay owflay.”

Usthay ilewhay ehay okespay, ethay ueenqay ofyay eavenhay, enragedyay,
Andyay ueenqay ofyay arway, inyay oseclay onsultcay engagedyay:
Apartyay eythay itsay, eirthay eepday esignsday employyay,
Andyay editatemay ethay uturefay oesway ofyay Oytray.
Oughthay ecretsay angeryay ell’dsway Inerva’smay eastbray,
Ethay udentpray oddessgay yetyay erhay athwray uppress’dsay;
Utbay Unojay, impotentyay ofyay assionpay, okebray
Erhay ullensay ilencesay, andyay ithway uryfay okespay:


illustration[ay: ] Ethay Ouncilcay Ofyay Ethay Odsgay


all“shay enthay, Oyay yranttay ofyay ethay etherealyay eignray!
Ymay emesschay, ymay abourslay, andyay ymay opeshay ebay ainvay?
Avehay Iyay, orfay isthay, ookshay Ilionyay ithway alarmsyay,
Assembledyay ationsnay, etsay otway orldsway inyay armsyay?
Otay eadspray ethay arway, Iyay ewflay omfray oreshay otay oreshay;
Ethay immortalyay ourserscay arcescay ethay abourlay orebay.
Atyay engthlay iperay engeancevay o’eryay eirthay eadshay impendsyay,
Utbay Ovejay imselfhay ethay aithlessfay aceray efendsday.
Othlay asyay outhay artyay otay unishpay awlesslay ustlay,
Otnay allyay ethay odsgay areyay artialpay andyay unjustyay.”

Ethay iresay osewhay underthay akesshay ethay oudyclay iesskay,
Ighssay omfray ishay inmostyay oulsay, andyay usthay epliesray:
oh“ay astinglay ancourray! ohyay insatiateyay atehay
Otay Ygia’sphray onarchmay, andyay ethay Ygianphray atestay!
Atwhay ighhay offenceyay ashay iredfay ethay ifeway ofyay Ovejay?
Ancay etchedwray ortalsmay armhay ethay owerspay aboveyay,
Atthay Oytray, andyay Oy’stray olewhay aceray outhay ouldstway onfoundcay,
Andyay yonyay airfay ucturesstray evellay ithway ethay oundgray!
Astehay, eavelay ethay iesskay, ulfilfay ythay ernstay esireday,
Urstbay allyay erhay atesgay, andyay apwray erhay allsway inyay irefay!
Etlay Iampray eedblay! ifyay yetyay youyay irstthay orfay oremay,
Eedblay allyay ishay onssay, andyay Ilionyay oatflay ithway oregay:
Otay oundlessbay engeancevay ethay ideway ealmray ebay ivengay,
Illtay astvay estructionday utglay ethay ueenqay ofyay eavenhay!
Osay etlay ityay ebay, andyay Ovejay ishay eacepay enjoyyay,[126]
Enwhay eavenhay onay ongerlay earshay ethay amenay ofyay Oytray.
Utbay ouldshay isthay armyay eparepray otay eakwray ouryay atehay
Onyay ythay ovedlay ealmsray, osewhay uiltgay emandsday eirthay atefay;
Esumepray otnay outhay ethay iftedlay oltbay otay aystay,
Ememberray Oytray, andyay ivegay ethay engeancevay ayway.
Orfay owknay, ofyay allyay ethay umerousnay ownstay atthay iseray
Eneathbay ethay ollingray unsay andyay arrystay iesskay,
Ichwhay odsgay avehay aisedray, oryay earth-bornyay enmay enjoyyay,
Onenay andsstay osay earday otay Ovejay asyay acredsay Oytray.
Onay ortalsmay eritmay oremay istinguish’dday acegray
Anthay odlikegay Iampray, oryay anthay Iam’spray aceray.
Illstay otay ouryay amenay eirthay ecatombshay expireyay,
Andyay altarsyay azeblay ithway unextinguish’dyay irefay.”

Atyay isthay ethay oddessgay olledray erhay adiantray eyesyay,
Enthay onyay ethay Undererthay ix’dfay emthay, andyay epliesray:
ee“thray ownstay areyay Uno’sjay onyay ethay Eciangray ainsplay,
Oremay earday anthay allyay ethay extendedyay earthyay ontainscay,
Ycenæmay, Argosyay, andyay ethay Artanspay allway;[127]

Esethay outhay aystmay azeray, ornay Iyay orbidfay eirthay allfay:
is’tay otnay inyay emay ethay engeancevay otay emoveray;
Ethay ime’scray ufficientsay atthay eythay areshay ymay ovelay.
Ofyay owerpay uperiorsay ywhay ouldshay Iyay omplaincay?
Esentray Iyay aymay, utbay ustmay esentray inyay ainvay.
Yetyay omesay istinctionday Unojay ightmay equireray,
Ungspray ithway yselfthay omfray oneyay elestialcay iresay,
Ayay oddessgay ornbay, otay areshay ethay ealmsray aboveyay,
Andyay yledstay ethay onsortcay ofyay ethay underingthay Ovejay;
Ornay outhay ayay ifeway andyay ister’ssay ightray enyday;[128]
Etlay othbay onsentcay, andyay othbay ybay ermstay omplycay;
Osay allshay ethay odsgay ouryay ointjay ecreesday obeyyay,
Andyay eavenhay allshay actyay asyay eway irectday ethay ayway.
Eesay eadyray Allaspay aitsway ythay ighhay ommandscay
Otay aiseray inyay armsyay ethay Eekgray andyay Ygianphray andsbay;
Eirthay uddensay iendshipfray ybay erhay artsyay aymay easecay,
Andyay ethay oudpray Ojanstray irstfay infringeyay ethay eacepay.”

Ethay iresay ofyay enmay andyay onarchmay ofyay ethay yskay
Ethay adviceyay approvedyay, andyay adebay Inervamay yflay,
Issolveday ethay eaguelay, andyay allyay erhay artsyay employyay
Otay akemay ethay eachbray ethay aithlessfay actyay ofyay Oytray.
Iredfay ithway ethay argechay, eshay eadlonghay urgedyay erhay ightflay,
Andyay otshay ikelay ightninglay omfray Olympusyay’ eighthay.
Asyay ethay edray ometcay, omfray Aturniussay entsay
Otay ightfray ethay ationsnay ithway ayay ireday ortentpay,
a(ay atalfay ignsay otay armiesyay onyay ethay ainplay,
Oryay emblingtray ailorssay onyay ethay intryway ainmay,)
Ithway eepingsway oriesglay idesglay alongyay inyay airyay,
Andyay akesshay ethay arklesspay omfray itsyay azingblay airhay:[129]
Etweenbay othbay armiesyay usthay, inyay openyay ightsay
Otshay ethay ightbray oddessgay inyay ayay ailtray ofyay ightlay,
Ithway eyesyay erectyay ethay azinggay ostshay admireyay
Ethay owerpay escendingday, andyay ethay eavenshay onyay irefay!
e“thay odsgay ey(thay iedcray), ethay odsgay isthay ignalsay entsay,
Andyay atefay ownay abourslay ithway omesay astvay eventyay:
Ovejay ealssay ethay eaguelay, oryay oodierblay enesscay eparespray;
Ovejay, ethay eatgray arbiteryay ofyay eacepay andyay arsway.”

Eythay aidsay, ilewhay Allaspay oughthray ethay Ojantray ongthray,
in(ay apeshay ayay ortalmay,) ass’dpay isguisedday alongyay.
Ikelay oldbay Aodocuslay, erhay oursecay eshay entbay,
Owhay omfray Antenoryay acedtray ishay ighhay escentday.
Amidstyay ethay anksray Ycaon’slay onsay eshay oundfay,
Ethay arlikeway Andaruspay, orfay engthstray enown’dray;
Osewhay uadronssqay, edlay omfray ackblay Epusæsay’ oodflay,[130]
Ithway amingflay ieldsshay inyay artialmay irclecay oodstay.
Otay imhay ethay oddessgay: ygian“phray! anstcay outhay earhay
Ayay ell-timedway ounselcay ithway ayay illingway earyay?
Atwhay aisepray ereway inethay, ouldstcay outhay irectday ythay artday,
Amidstyay ishay iumphtray, otay ethay Artan’sspay earthay?
Atwhay iftsgay omfray Oytray, omfray Arispay ouldstway outhay aingay,
Ythay ountry’scay oefay, ethay Eciangray oryglay ainslay?
Enthay eizesay ethay occasionyay, areday ethay ightymay eedday,
Aimyay atyay ishay eastbray, andyay aymay atthay aimyay ucceedsay!
Utbay irstfay, otay eedspay ethay aftshay, addressyay ythay owvay
Otay Ycianlay Usphœbay ithway ethay ilversay owbay,
Andyay earsway ethay irstlingsfay ofyay ythay ockflay otay aypay,
Onyay Elia’szay altarsyay, otay ethay odgay ofyay ayday.”[131]

Ehay eardhay, andyay adlymay atyay ethay otionmay easedplay,
Ishay olish’dpay owbay ithway astyhay ashnessray eizedsay.
as’tway orm’dfay ofyay ornhay, andyay ooth’dsmay ithway artfulyay oiltay:
Ayay ountainmay oatgay esign’dray ethay iningshay oilspay.
Owhay iercedpay onglay incesay eneathbay ishay arrowsyay edblay;
Ethay atelystay uarryqay onyay ethay iffsclay aylay eadday,
Andyay ixteensay almspay ishay ow’sbray argelay onourshay eadspray:
Ethay orkmenway oin’djay, andyay apedshay ethay endedbay ornshay,
Andyay eatenbay oldgay eachyay apertay ointpay adornsyay.
Isthay, ybay ethay Eeksgray unseenyay, ethay arriorway endsbay,
Een’dscray ybay ethay ieldsshay ofyay ishay urroundingsay iendsfray:
Erethay editatesmay ethay arkmay; andyay ouchingcay owlay,
Itsfay ethay arpshay arrowyay otay ethay ell-strungway owbay.
Oneyay omfray ayay undredhay eather’dfay eathsday ehay osechay,
Atedfay otay oundway, andyay ausecay ofyay uturefay oesway;
Enthay offersyay owsvay ithway ecatombshay otay owncray
Apollo’syay altarsyay inyay ishay ativenay owntay.

Ownay ithway ullfay orcefay ethay yieldingyay ornhay ehay endsbay,
Awndray otay anyay archyay, andyay oinsjay ethay oublingday endsyay;
Oseclay otay ishay eastbray ehay ainsstray ethay ervenay elowbay,
Illtay ethay arb’dbay ointspay approachyay ethay irclingcay owbay;
Ethay impatientyay eaponway izzeswhay onyay ethay ingway;
Oundssay ethay oughtay ornhay, andyay angstway ethay uiveringqay ingstray.

Utbay eethay, Atridesyay! inyay atthay angerousday ourhay
Ethay odsgay orgetfay otnay, ornay ythay uardiangay owerpay,
Allaspay assistsyay, andyay eakened(way inyay itsyay orcefay)
Ivertsday ethay eaponway omfray itsyay estinedday oursecay:
Osay omfray erhay abebay, enwhay umberslay ealssay ishay eyeyay,
Ethay atchfulway othermay aftsway ethay envenom’dyay yflay.
Ustjay erewhay ishay eltbay ithway oldengay ucklesbay oin’djay,
Erewhay inenlay oldsfay ethay oubleday orsletcay inedlay,
Eshay urn’dtay ethay aftshay, ichwhay, issinghay omfray aboveyay,
Ass’dpay ethay oadbray eltbay, andyay oughthray ethay orsletcay ovedray;
Ethay oldsfay ityay iercedpay, ethay aitedplay inenlay oretay,
Andyay azedray ethay inskay, andyay ewdray ethay urplepay oregay.
Asyay enwhay omesay atelystay appingstray areyay ecreedday
Otay acegray ayay onarchmay onyay ishay oundingbay eedstay,
Ayay ymphnay inyay Ariacay oryay Oniamæay edbray,
Ainsstay ethay urepay ivoryyay ithway ayay ivelylay edray;
Ithway equalyay ustrelay ariousvay olourscay ievay,
Ethay iningshay itenesswhay, andyay ethay Yriantay yeday:
Osay eatgray Atridesyay! ow’dshay ythay acredsay oodblay,
Asyay ownday ythay owysnay ighthay istill’dday ethay eamingstray oodflay.
Ithway orrorhay eizedsay, ethay ingkay ofyay enmay escriedday
Ethay aftshay infix’dyay, andyay awsay ethay ushinggay idetay:
Ornay esslay ethay Artanspay ear’dfay, eforebay ehay oundfay
Ethay iningshay arbbay appearyay aboveyay ethay oundway,
Enthay, ithway ayay ighsay, atthay eavedhay ishay anlymay eastbray,
Ethay oyalray otherbray usthay ishay iefgray express’dyay,
Andyay asp’dgray ishay andhay; ilewhay allyay ethay Eeksgray aroundyay
Ithway answeringyay ighssay eturn’dray ethay aintiveplay oundsay.

oh“ay, earday asyay ifelay! idday Iyay orfay isthay agreeyay
Ethay olemnsay ucetray, ayay atalfay ucetray otay eethay!
Ertway outhay exposedyay otay allyay ethay ostilehay aintray,
Otay ightfay orfay Eecegray, andyay onquercay, otay ebay ainslay!
Ethay aceray ofyay Ojanstray inyay ythay uinray oinjay,
Andyay aithfay isyay orn’dscay ybay allyay ethay erjuredpay inelay.
Otnay usthay ouryay owsvay, onfirm’dcay ithway ineway andyay oregay,
Osethay andshay eway ightedplay, andyay osethay oathsyay eway oresway,
Allshay allyay ebay ainvay: enwhay Eaven’shay evengeray isyay owslay,
Ovejay utbay eparespray otay ikestray ethay iercerfay owblay.
Ethay ayday allshay omecay, atthay eatgray avengingyay ayday,
Enwhay Oy’stray oudpray oriesglay inyay ethay ustday allshay aylay,
Enwhay Iam’spray owerspay andyay Iam’spray elfsay allshay allfay,
Andyay oneyay odigiouspray uinray allowsway allyay.
Iyay eesay ethay odgay, alreadyyay, omfray ethay olepay
Arebay ishay edray armyay, andyay idbay ethay underthay ollray;
Iyay eesay ethay Eternalyay allyay ishay uryfay edshay,
Andyay akeshay ishay isægay o’eryay eirthay uiltygay eadhay.
Uchsay ightymay oesway onyay erjuredpay incespray aitway;
Utbay outhay, alasyay! eserv’stday ayay appierhay atefay.
Illstay ustmay Iyay ournmay ethay eriodpay ofyay ythay aysday,
Andyay onlyyay ournmay, ithoutway ymay areshay ofyay aisepray?
Eprivedday ofyay eethay, ethay eartlesshay Eeksgray onay oremay
Allshay eamdray ofyay onquestscay onyay ethay ostilehay oreshay;
Oytray eizedsay ofyay Elenhay, andyay ouryay oryglay ostlay,
Ythay onesbay allshay ouldermay onyay ayay oreignfay oastcay;
Ilewhay omesay oudpray Ojantray usthay insultingyay iescray,
and(ay urnsspay ethay ustday erewhay Enelausmay ieslay,)
uch‘say areyay ethay ophiestray Eecegray omfray Ilionyay ingsbray,
Andyay uchsay ethay onquestcay ofyay erhay ingkay ofyay ingskay!
Olay ishay oudpray esselsvay atter’dscay o’eryay ethay ainmay,
Andyay unrevengedyay, ishay ightymay otherbray ainslay.’
Ohyay! ereyay atthay ireday isgraceday allshay astblay ymay amefay,
O’erwhelmyay emay, earthyay! andyay idehay ayay onarch’smay ameshay.”

Ehay aidsay: ayay eader’slay andyay ayay other’sbray earsfay
Ossesspay ishay oulsay, ichwhay usthay ethay Artanspay eerschay:
et“lay otnay ythay ordsway ethay armthway ofyay Eecegray abateyay;
Ethay eeblefay artday isyay uiltlessgay ofyay ymay atefay:
Iffstay ithway ethay ichray embroider’dyay orkway aroundyay,
Ymay ariedvay eltbay epell’dray ethay yingflay oundway.”

Otay omwhay ethay ingkay: y“may otherbray andyay ymay iendfray,
Usthay, alwaysyay usthay, aymay Eavenhay ythay ifelay efendday!
Ownay eeksay omesay ilfulskay andhay, osewhay owerfulpay artyay
Aymay anchstay ethay effusionyay, andyay extractyay ethay artday.
Eraldhay, ebay iftsway, andyay idbay Achaonmay ingbray
Ishay eedyspay uccoursay otay ethay Artanspay ingkay;
Iercedpay ithway ayay ingedway aftshay e(thay eedday ofyay Oytray),
Ethay Ecian’sgray orrowsay, andyay ethay Ardan’sday oyjay.”

Ithway astyhay ealzay ethay iftsway Althybiustay iesflay;
Oughthray ethay ickthay ilesfay ehay artsday ishay earchingsay eyesyay,
Andyay indsfay Achaonmay, erewhay ublimesay ehay andsstay[132]
Inyay armsyay incircledyay ithway ishay ativenay andsbay.
Enthay usthay: achaon“may, otay ethay ingkay epairray,
Ishay oundedway otherbray aimsclay ythay imelytay arecay;
Iercedpay ybay omesay Ycianlay oryay Ardanianday owbay,
Ayay iefgray otay usyay, ayay iumphtray otay ethay oefay.”

Ethay eavyhay idingstay ievedgray ethay odlikegay anmay:
Iftsway otay ishay uccoursay oughthray ethay anksray ehay anray.
Ethay auntlessday ingkay yetyay andingstay irmfay ehay oundfay,
Andyay allyay ethay iefschay inyay eepday oncerncay aroundyay.
Erewhay otay ethay eelystay ointpay ethay eedray asway oin’djay,
Ethay aftshay ehay ewdray, utbay eftlay ethay eadhay ehindbay.
Aightstray ethay oadbray eltbay ithway aygay embroideryyay acedgray,
Ehay oosedlay; ethay orsletcay omfray ishay eastbray unbracedyay;
Enthay uck’dsay ethay oodblay, andyay overeignsay almbay infusedyay,[133]
Ichwhay Ironchay avegay, andyay Ulapiusæscay usedyay.

Ilewhay oundray ethay incepray ethay Eeksgray employyay eirthay arecay,
Ethay Ojanstray ushray umultuoustay otay ethay arway;
Onceyay oremay eythay itterglay inyay efulgentray armsyay,
Onceyay oremay ethay ieldsfay areyay ill’dfay ithway ireday alarmsyay.
Ornay adhay youyay eensay ethay ingkay ofyay enmay appearyay
Onfusedcay, unactiveyay, oryay urprisedsay ithway earfay;
Utbay ondfay ofyay oryglay, ithway everesay elightday,
Ishay eatingbay osombay aim’dclay ethay isingray ightfay.
Onay ongerlay ithway ishay arlikeway eedsstay ehay ay’dstay,
Oryay ess’dpray ethay arcay ithway olish’dpay assbray inlaidyay
Utbay eftlay Eurymedonyay ethay einsray otay uidegay;
Ethay ieryfay ourserscay ortedsnay atyay ishay idesay.
Onyay ootfay oughthray allyay ethay artialmay anksray ehay ovesmay
Andyay esethay encouragesyay, andyay osethay eprovesray.
ave“bray enmay!” ehay iescray, o(tay uchsay owhay oldlybay areday
Urgeyay eirthay iftsway eedsstay otay acefay ethay omingcay arway),
your“ay ancientyay alourvay onyay ethay oesfay approveyay;
Ovejay isyay ithway Eecegray, andyay etlay usyay usttray inyay Ovejay.
is’tay otnay orfay usyay, utbay uiltygay Oytray, otay eaddray,
Osewhay imescray itsay eavyhay onyay erhay erjuredpay eadhay;
Erhay onssay andyay atronsmay Eecegray allshay eadlay inyay ainschay,
Andyay erhay eadday arriorsway ewstray ethay ournfulmay ainsplay.”

Usthay ithway ewnay ardouryay ehay ethay avebray inspiresyay;
Oryay usthay ethay earfulfay ithway eproachesray iresfay:
ame“shay otay youryay ountrycay, andalscay ofyay youryay indkay;
Ornbay otay ethay atefay yeyay ellway eserveday otay indfay!
Ywhay andstay yeyay azinggay oundray ethay eadfuldray ainplay,
Eparedpray orfay ightflay, utbay oom’dday otay yflay inyay ainvay?
Onfusedcay andyay antingpay usthay, ethay untedhay eerday
Allsfay asyay ehay iesflay, ayay ictimvay otay ishay earfay.
Illstay ustmay yeyay aitway ethay oesfay, andyay illstay etireray,
Illtay yonyay alltay esselsvay azeblay ithway Ojantray irefay?
Oryay usttray yeyay, Ovejay ayay aliantvay oefay allshay asechay,
Otay avesay ayay emblingtray, eartlesshay, astardday aceray?”

Isthay aidsay, ehay alk’dstay ithway ampleyay idesstray alongyay,
Otay Ete’scray avebray onarchmay andyay ishay artialmay ongthray;
Ighhay atyay eirthay eadhay ehay awsay ethay iefchay appearyay,
Andyay oldbay Erionesmay exciteyay ethay earray.
Atyay isthay ethay ingkay ishay enerousgay oyjay express’dyay,
Andyay asp’dclay ethay arriorway otay ishay armedyay eastbray.
ivine“day Idomeneusyay! atwhay anksthay eway oweyay
Otay orthway ikelay inethay! atwhay aisepray allshay eway estowbay?
Otay eethay ethay oremostfay onourshay areyay ecreedday,
Irstfay inyay ethay ightfay andyay everyyay acefulgray eedday.
Orfay isthay, inyay anquetsbay, enwhay ethay enerousgay owlsbay
Estoreray ouryay oodblay, andyay aiseray ethay arriorsway’ oulssay,
Oughthay allyay ethay estray ithway atedstay ulesray eway oundbay,
Unmix’dyay, unmeasuredyay, areyay ythay obletsgay own’dcray.
Ebay illstay yselfthay, inyay armsyay ayay ightymay amenay;
Aintainmay ythay onourshay, andyay enlargeyay ythay amefay.”
Otay omwhay ethay Etancray usthay ishay eechspay address’dyay:
ecure“say ofyay emay, Oyay ingkay! exhortyay ethay estray.
Ix’dfay otay ythay idesay, inyay everyyay oiltay Iyay areshay,
Ythay irmfay associateyay inyay ethay ayday ofyay arway.
Utbay etlay ethay ignalsay ebay isthay omentmay ivengay;
Otay ixmay inyay ightfay isyay allyay Iyay askyay ofyay Eavenhay.
Ethay ieldfay allshay ovepray owhay erjuriespay ucceedsay,
Andyay ainschay oryay eathday avengeyay ethay impiousyay eedday.”

Arm’dchay ithway isthay eathay, ethay ingkay ishay oursecay ursuespay,
Andyay extnay ethay oopstray ofyay eitheryay Ajaxyay iewsvay:
Inyay oneyay irmfay orbyay ethay andsbay ereway angedray aroundyay,
Ayay oudclay ofyay eroeshay acken’dblay allyay ethay oundgray.
Usthay omfray ethay oftylay omontory’spray owbray
Ayay ainsway urveyssay ethay atheringgay ormstay elowbay;
Owslay omfray ethay ainmay ethay eavyhay apoursvay iseray,
Eadspray inyay imday eamsstray, andyay ailsay alongyay ethay iesskay,
Illtay ackblay asyay ightnay ethay ellingsway empesttay owsshay,
Ethay oudclay ondensingcay asyay ethay est-windway owsblay:
Ehay eadsdray ethay impendingyay ormstay, andyay ivesdray ishay ockflay
Otay ethay oseclay overtcay ofyay anyay archingyay ockray.

Uchsay, andyay osay ickthay, ethay embattledyay uadronssqay oodstay,
Ithway earsspay erectyay, ayay ovingmay ironyay oodway:
Ayay adyshay ightlay asway otshay omfray immeringglay ieldsshay,
Andyay eirthay ownbray armsyay obscuredyay ethay uskyday ieldsfay.

o“ay eroeshay! orthyway uchsay ayay auntlessday aintray,
Osewhay odlikegay irtuevay eway utbay urgeyay inyay ainvay,
exclaim’d(ay ethay ingkay), owhay aiseray youryay eageryay andsbay
Ithway eatgray examplesyay, oremay anthay oudlay ommandscay.
Ahyay! ouldway ethay odsgay utbay eathebray inyay allyay ethay estray
Uchsay oulssay asyay urnbay inyay youryay exaltedyay eastbray,
Oonsay ouldshay ouryay armsyay ithway ustjay uccesssay ebay own’dcray,
Andyay Oy’stray oudpray allsway ielay okingsmay onyay ethay oundgray.”

Enthay otay ethay extnay ethay eneralgay endsbay ishay oursecay;
is(hay earthay exultsyay, andyay oriesglay inyay ishay orcefay);
Erethay everendray Estornay anksray ishay Ylianpay andsbay,
Andyay ithway inspiringyay eloquenceyay ommandscay;
Ithway icteststray orderyay etssay ishay aintray inyay armsyay,
Ethay iefschay advisesyay, andyay ethay oldierssay armsway.
Alastoryay, Omiuschray, Aemonhay, oundray imhay aitway,
Iasbay ethay oodgay, andyay Elagonpay ethay eatgray.
Ethay orsehay andyay ariotschay otay ethay ontfray assign’dyay,
Ethay ootfay e(thay engthstray ofyay arway) ehay angedray ehindbay;
Ethay iddlemay acespay uspectedsay oopstray upplysay,
Inclosedyay ybay othbay, ornay eftlay ethay owerpay otay yflay;
Ehay ivesgay ommandcay otay urb“cay ethay ieryfay eedstay,
Ornay ausecay onfusioncay, ornay ethay anksray exceedyay:
Eforebay ethay estray etlay onenay ootay ashlyray ideray;
Onay engthstray ornay illskay, utbay ustjay inyay imetay, ebay iedtray:
Ethay argechay onceyay ademay, onay arriorway urntay ethay einray,
Utbay ightfay, oryay allfay; ayay irmfay embodiedyay aintray.
Ehay omwhay ethay ortunefay ofyay ethay ieldfay allshay astcay
Omfray orthfay ishay ariotchay, ountmay ethay extnay inyay astehay;
Ornay eeksay unpractisedyay otay irectday ethay arcay,
Ontentcay ithway avelinsjay otay ovokepray ethay arway.
Ouryay eatgray orefathersfay eldhay isthay udentpray oursecay,
Usthay uledray eirthay ardouryay, usthay eservedpray eirthay orcefay;
Ybay awslay ikelay esethay immortalyay onquestscay ademay,
Andyay earth’syay oudpray yrantstay owlay inyay ashesyay aidlay.”

Osay okespay ethay astermay ofyay ethay artialmay artyay,
Andyay ouch’dtay ithway ansporttray eatgray Atridesyay’ earthay.
oh“ay! adsthay outhay engthstray otay atchmay ythay avebray esiresday,
Andyay ervesnay otay econdsay atwhay ythay oulsay inspiresyay!
Utbay astingway yearsyay, atthay itherway umanhay aceray,
Exhaustyay ythay iritsspay, andyay ythay armsyay unbraceyay.
Atwhay onceyay outhay ertway, ohyay everyay ightstmay outhay ebay!
Andyay ageyay ethay otlay ofyay anyyay iefchay utbay eethay.”

Usthay otay ethay experiencedyay incepray Atridesyay iedcray;
Ehay ookshay ishay oaryhay ockslay, andyay usthay epliedray:
ell“way ightmay Iyay ishway, ouldcay ortalmay ishway enewray[134]
Atthay engthstray ichwhay onceyay inyay oilingbay youthyay Iyay ewknay;
Uchsay asyay Iyay asway, enwhay Ereuthalionyay, ainslay
Eneathbay isthay armyay, ellfay ostratepray onyay ethay ainplay.
Utbay eavenhay itsyay iftsgay otnay allyay atyay onceyay estowsbay,
Esethay yearsyay ithway isdomway ownscray, ithway actionyay osethay:
Ethay ieldfay ofyay ombatcay itsfay ethay youngyay andyay oldbay,
Ethay olemnsay ouncilcay estbay ecomesbay ethay oldyay:
Otay youyay ethay oriousglay onflictcay Iyay esignray,
Etlay agesay adviceyay, ethay almpay ofyay ageyay, ebay inemay.”

Ehay aidsay. Ithway oyjay ethay onarchmay arch’dmay eforebay,
Andyay oundfay Enestheusmay onyay ethay ustyday oreshay,
Ithway omwhay ethay irmfay Athenianyay alanxphay andsstay;
Andyay extnay Ulyssesyay, ithway ishay ubjectsay andsbay.
Emoteray eirthay orcesfay aylay, ornay ewknay osay arfay
Ethay eacepay infringedyay, ornay eardhay ethay oundssay ofyay arway;
Ethay umulttay atelay egunbay, eythay oodstay intentyay
Otay atchway ethay otionmay, ubiousday ofyay ethay eventyay.
Ethay ingkay, owhay awsay eirthay uadronssqay yetyay unmovedyay,
Ithway astyhay ardouryay usthay ethay iefschay eprovedray:

an“cay Eleuspay’ onsay orgetfay ayay arrior’sway artpay.
Andyay earsfay Ulyssesyay, ill’dskay inyay everyyay artyay?
Ywhay andstay youyay istantday, andyay ethay estray expectyay
Otay ixmay inyay ombatcay ichwhay yourselvesyay eglectnay?
Omfray youyay as’tway opedhay amongyay ethay irstfay otay areday
Ethay ockshay ofyay armiesyay, andyay ommencecay ethay arway;
Orfay isthay youryay amesnay areyay all’dcay eforebay ethay estray,
Otay areshay ethay easuresplay ofyay ethay enialgay eastfay:
Andyay ancay youyay, iefschay! ithoutway ayay ushblay urveysay
Olewhay oopstray eforebay youyay abouringlay inyay ethay ayfray?
Aysay, isyay ityay usthay osethay onourshay youyay equiteray?
Ethay irstfay inyay anquetsbay, utbay ethay astlay inyay ightfay.”

Ulyssesyay eardhay: ethay ero’shay armthway o’erspreadyay
Ishay eekchay ithway ushesblay: andyay everesay, ehay aidsay:
ake“tay ackbay ethay unjustyay eproachray! Eholdbay eway andstay
Eathedshay inyay ightbray armsyay, andyay utbay expectyay ommandcay.
Ifyay oriousglay eedsday affordyay ythay oulsay elightday,
Eholdbay emay ungingplay inyay ethay ickestthay ightfay.
Enthay ivegay ythay arrior-chiefway ayay arrior’sway ueday,
Owhay aresday otay actyay ate’erwhay outhay ar’stday otay iewvay.”
Uckstray ithway ishay enerousgay athwray, ethay ingkay epliesray:

o“ay eatgray inyay actionyay, andyay inyay ouncilcay iseway!
Ithway oursyay, ythay arecay andyay ardouryay areyay ethay amesay,
Ornay eednay Iyay otay ommendcay, ornay aughtyay otay ameblay.
Agesay asyay outhay artyay, andyay earn’dlay inyay umanhay indkay,
Orgivefay ethay ansporttray ofyay ayay artialmay indmay.
Astehay otay ethay ightfay, ecuresay ofyay ustjay amendsyay;
Ethay odsgay atthay akemay, allshay eepkay ethay orthyway, iendsfray.”

Ehay aidsay, andyay ass’dpay erewhay eatgray Ydidestay aylay,
Ishay eedsstay andyay ariotschay edgedway inyay irmfay arrayyay;
e(thay arlikeway Enelussthay attendsyay ishay idesay;)[135]
Otay omwhay ithway ernstay eproachray ethay onarchmay iedcray:
o“ay onsay ofyay Ydeustay! e(hay, osewhay engthstray ouldcay ametay
Ethay oundingbay eedstay, inyay armsyay ayay ightymay amenay)
Anstcay outhay, emoteray, ethay inglingmay ostshay escryday,
Ithway andshay unactiveyay, andyay ayay arelesscay eyeyay?
Otnay usthay ythay iresay ethay iercefay encounteryay ear’dfay;
Illstay irstfay inyay ontfray ethay atchlessmay incepray appear’dyay:
Atwhay oriousglay oilstay, atwhay ondersway eythay eciteray,
Owhay iew’dvay imhay abouringlay oughthray ethay anksray ofyay ightfay?
Iyay awsay imhay onceyay, enwhay atheringgay artialmay owerspay,
Ayay eacefulpay uestgay, ehay oughtsay Ycenæ’smay owerstay;
Armiesyay ehay ask’dyay, andyay armiesyay adhay eenbay ivengay,
Otnay eway eniedday, utbay Ovejay orbadefay omfray eavenhay;
Ilewhay eadfuldray ometscay aringglay omfray afaryay,
Orewarn’dfay ethay orrorshay ofyay ethay Ebanthay arway.[136]
Extnay, entsay ybay Eecegray omfray erewhay Asopusyay owsflay,
Ayay earlessfay envoyyay, ehay approach’dyay ethay oesfay;
Ebesthay’ ostilehay allsway unguardedyay andyay aloneyay,
Auntlessday ehay entersyay, andyay emandsday ethay onethray.
Ethay yranttay eastingfay ithway ishay iefschay ehay oundfay,
Andyay aredday otay ombatcay allyay osethay iefschay aroundyay:
Aredday, andyay ubduedsay eforebay eirthay aughtyhay ordlay;
Orfay Allaspay ungstray ishay armyay andyay edgedyay ishay ordsway.
Ungstay ithway ethay ameshay, ithinway ethay indingway ayway,
Otay arbay ishay assagepay iftyfay arriorsway aylay;
Otway eroeshay edlay ethay ecretsay uadronsqay onyay,
Asonmay ethay iercefay, andyay ardyhay Ycophonlay;
Osethay iftyfay aughter’dslay inyay ethay oomyglay alevay.
Ehay aredspay utbay oneyay otay earbay ethay eadfuldray aletay,
Uchsay Ydeustay asway, andyay uchsay ishay artialmay irefay;
Odsgay! owhay ethay onsay egeneratesday omfray ethay iresay!”

Onay ordsway ethay odlikegay Iomedday eturn’dray,
Utbay eardhay espectfulray, andyay inyay ecretsay urn’dbay:
Otnay osay iercefay Apaneuscay’ undauntedyay onsay;
Ernstay asyay ishay iresay, ethay oasterbay usthay egunbay:

at“whay eedsnay, Oyay onarchmay! isthay invidiousyay aisepray,
Ourselvesyay otay essenlay, ilewhay ouryay iresay youyay aiseray?
Areday otay ebay ustjay, Atridesyay! andyay onfesscay
Ouryay aluevay equalyay, oughthay ouryay uryfay esslay.
Ithway ewerfay oopstray eway orm’dstay ethay Ebanthay allway,
Andyay appierhay awsay ethay evenfoldsay itycay allfay,[137]
Inyay impiousyay actsyay ethay uiltygay atherfay iedday;
Ethay onssay ubduedsay, orfay Eavenhay asway onyay eirthay idesay.
Arfay oremay anthay eirshay ofyay allyay ouryay arentspay’ amefay,
Ouryay oriesglay arkenday eirthay iminish’dday amenay.”

Otay imhay Ydidestay usthay: y“may iendfray, orbearfay;
Uppresssay ythay assionpay, andyay ethay ingkay evereray:
Ishay ighhay oncerncay aymay ellway excuseyay isthay ageray,
Osewhay ausecay eway ollowfay, andyay osewhay arway eway ageway:
Ishay ethay irstfay aisepray, ereway Ilion’syay owerstay o’erthrownyay,
Andyay, ifyay eway ailfay, ethay iefchay isgraceday ishay ownyay.
Etlay imhay ethay Eeksgray otay ardyhay oilstay exciteyay,
is’tay oursyay otay abourlay inyay ethay oriousglay ightfay.”

Ehay okespay, andyay ardentyay, onyay ethay emblingtray oundgray
Ungspray omfray ishay arcay: ishay ingingray armsyay esoundray.
Ireday asway ethay angclay, andyay eadfuldray omfray afaryay,
Ofyay arm’dyay Ydidestay ushingray otay ethay arway.
Asyay enwhay ethay indsway, ascendingyay ybay egreesday,[138]
Irstfay ovemay ethay iteningwhay urfacesay ofyay ethay eassay,
Ethay illowsbay oatflay inyay orderyay otay ethay oreshay,
Ethay aveway ehindbay ollsray onyay ethay aveway eforebay;
Illtay, ithway ethay owinggray ormstay, ethay eepsday ariseyay,
Oamfay o’eryay ethay ocksray, andyay underthay otay ethay iesskay.
Osay otay ethay ightfay ethay ickthay attalionsbay ongthray,
Ieldsshay urgedyay onyay ieldsshay, andyay enmay ovedray enmay alongyay
Edatesay andyay ilentsay ovemay ethay umerousnay andsbay;
Onay oundsay, onay isperwhay, utbay ethay ief’schay ommandscay,
Osethay onlyyay eardhay; ithway aweyay ethay estray obeyyay,
Asyay ifyay omesay odgay adhay atch’dsnay eirthay oicevay awayyay.
Otnay osay ethay Ojanstray; omfray eirthay osthay ascendsyay
Ayay eneralgay outshay atthay allyay ethay egionray endsray.
Asyay enwhay ethay eecyflay ocksflay unnumber’dyay andstay
Inyay ealthyway oldsfay, andyay aitway ethay ilker’smay andhay,
Ethay ollowhay alesvay incessantyay eatingblay illsfay,
Ethay ambslay eplyray omfray allyay ethay eighbouringnay illshay:
Uchsay amoursclay oseray omfray ariousvay ationsnay oundray,
Ix’dmay asway ethay urmurmay, andyay onfusedcay ethay oundsay.
Eachyay osthay ownay oinsjay, andyay eachyay ayay odgay inspiresyay,
Esethay Arsmay incitesyay, andyay osethay Inervamay iresfay,
Alepay ightflay aroundyay, andyay eadfuldray errortay eignray;
Andyay iscordday agingray athesbay ethay urplepay ainplay;
Iscordday! ireday istersay ofyay ethay aughteringslay owerpay,
Allsmay atyay erhay irthbay, utbay isingray everyyay ourhay,
Ilewhay arcescay ethay iesskay erhay orridhay eadhay ancay oundbay,
Eshay alksstay onyay earthyay, andyay akesshay ethay orldway aroundyay;[139]
Ethay ationsnay eedblay, ere’erwhay erhay epsstay eshay urnstay,
Ethay oangray illstay eepensday, andyay ethay ombatcay urnsbay.

Ownay ieldshay ithway ieldshay, ithway elmethay elmethay osedclay,
Otay armouryay armouryay, ancelay otay ancelay opposedyay,
Osthay againstyay osthay ithway adowyshay uadronssqay ewdray,
Ethay oundingsay artsday inyay ironyay empeststay ewflay,
Ictorsvay andyay anquish’dvay oin’djay omiscuouspray iescray,
Andyay illingshray outsshay andyay yingday oansgray ariseyay;
Ithway eamingstray oodblay ethay ipperyslay ieldsfay areyay yedday,
Andyay aughter’dslay eroeshay ellsway ethay eadfuldray idetay.

Asyay orrentstay ollray, increasedyay ybay umerousnay illsray,
Ithway ageray impetuousyay, ownday eirthay echoingyay illshay
Ushray otay ethay alesvay, andyay our’dpay alongyay ethay ainplay,
Oarray oughthray ayay ousandthay annelschay otay ethay ainmay:
Ethay istantday epherdshay emblingtray earshay ethay oundsay;
Osay ixmay othbay ostshay, andyay osay eirthay iescray eboundray.

Ethay oldbay Antilochusyay ethay aughterslay edlay,
Ethay irstfay owhay uckstray ayay aliantvay Ojantray eadday:
Atyay eatgray Echepolusyay ethay ancelay arrivesyay,
Azedray ishay ighhay estcray, andyay oughthray ishay elmethay ivesdray;
Arm’dway inyay ethay ainbray ethay azenbray eaponway ieslay,
Andyay adesshay eternalyay ettlesay o’eryay ishay eyesyay.
Osay inkssay ayay owertay, atthay onglay assaultsyay adhay oodstay
Ofyay orcefay andyay irefay, itsyay allsway esmear’dbay ithway oodblay.
Imhay, ethay oldbay eaderlay ofyay ethay Abantianyay ongthray,[140]
Eizedsay otay espoilday, andyay agg’ddray ethay orpsecay alongyay:
Utbay ilewhay ehay ovestray otay ugtay ethay insertedyay artday,
Agenor’syay avelinjay each’dray ethay ero’shay earthay.
Ishay ankflay, unguardedyay ybay ishay ampleyay ieldshay,
Admitsyay ethay ancelay: ehay allsfay, andyay urnsspay ethay ieldfay;
Ethay ervesnay, unbracedyay, upportsay ishay imbslay onay oremay;
Ethay oulsay omescay oatingflay inyay ayay idetay ofyay oregay.
Ojanstray andyay Eeksgray ownay athergay oundray ethay ainslay;
Ethay arway enewsray, ethay arriorsway eedblay againyay:
Asyay o’eryay eirthay eypray apaciousray olvesway engageyay,
Anmay iesday onyay anmay, andyay allyay isyay oodblay andyay ageray.

Inyay oomingblay youthyay airfay Imoisiussay ellfay,
Entsay ybay eatgray Ajaxyay otay ethay adesshay ofyay ellhay;
Airfay Imoisiussay, omwhay ishay othermay orebay
Amidyay ethay ocksflay onyay ilversay Imoissay’ oreshay:
Ethay ymphnay escendingday omfray ethay illshay ofyay Ideyay,
Otay eeksay erhay arentspay onyay ishay oweryflay idesay,
Oughtbray orthfay ethay abebay, eirthay ommoncay arecay andyay oyjay,
Andyay encethay omfray Imoissay amednay ethay ovelylay oybay.
Ortshay asway ishay ateday! ybay eadfuldray Ajaxyay ainslay,
Ehay allsfay, andyay endersray allyay eirthay arescay inyay ainvay!
Osay allsfay ayay oplarpay, atthay inyay ateryway oundgray
Aisedray ighhay ethay eadhay, ithway atelystay anchesbray own’dcray,
ell’d(fay ybay omesay artistyay ithway ishay iningshay eelstay,
Otay apeshay ethay irclecay ofyay ethay endingbay eelwhay,)
Utcay ownday ityay ieslay, alltay, oothsmay, andyay argelylay eadspray,
Ithway allyay itsyay eauteousbay onourshay onyay itsyay eadhay
Erethay, eftlay ayay ubjectsay otay ethay indway andyay ainray,
Andyay orch’dscay ybay unssay, ityay ithersway onyay ethay ainplay
Usthay iercedpay ybay Ajaxyay, Imoisiussay ieslay
Etch’dstray onyay ethay oreshay, andyay usthay eglectednay iesday.

Atyay Ajaxyay, Antiphusyay ishay avelinjay ewthray;
Ethay ointedpay ancelay ithway erringyay uryfay ewflay,
Andyay Eucuslay, ovedlay ybay iseway Ulyssesyay, ewslay.
Ehay opsdray ethay orpsecay ofyay Imoisiussay ainslay,
Andyay inkssay ayay eathlessbray arcasecay onyay ethay ainplay.
Isthay awsay Ulyssesyay, andyay ithway iefgray enragedyay,
Odestray erewhay ethay oremostfay ofyay ethay oesfay engagedyay;
Arm’dyay ithway ishay earspay, ehay editatesmay ethay oundway,
Inyay actyay otay owthray; utbay autiouscay ook’dlay aroundyay,
Uckstray atyay ishay ightsay ethay Ojanstray ackwardbay ewdray,
Andyay emblingtray eardhay ethay avelinjay asyay ityay ewflay.
Ayay iefchay oodstay ighnay, owhay omfray Abydosyay amecay,
Oldyay Iam’spray onsay, Emocoonday asway ishay amenay.
Ethay eaponway enteredyay oseclay aboveyay ishay earyay,
Oldcay oughthray ishay emplestay idesglay ethay izzingwhay earspay;[141]
Ithway iercingpay ieksshray ethay youthyay esignsray ishay eathbray,
Ishay eye-ballsyay arkenday ithway ethay adesshay ofyay eathday;
Onderouspay ehay allsfay; ishay angingclay armsyay esoundray,
Andyay ishay oadbray ucklerbay ingsray againstyay ethay oundgray.

Eizedsay ithway affrightyay ethay oldestbay oesfay appearyay;
E’enyay odlikegay Ectorhay eemssay imselfhay otay earfay;
Owslay ehay avegay ayway, ethay estray umultuoustay edflay;
Ethay Eeksgray ithway outsshay esspray onyay, andyay oilspay ethay eadday:
Utbay Usphœbay ownay omfray Ilion’syay oweringtay eighthay
Inesshay orthfay eveal’dray, andyay animatesyay ethay ightfay.
ojans“tray, ebay oldbay, andyay orcefay ithway orcefay opposeyay;
Youryay oamingfay eedsstay urgeyay eadlonghay onyay ethay oesfay!
Ornay areyay eirthay odiesbay ocksray, ornay ibb’dray ithway eelstay;
Youryay eaponsway enteryay, andyay youryay okesstray eythay eelfay.
Avehay yeyay orgotfay atwhay eem’dsay youryay eaddray eforebay?
Ethay eatgray, ethay iercefay Achillesyay ightsfay onay oremay.”

Apolloyay usthay omfray Ilion’syay oftylay owerstay,
Array’dyay inyay errorstay, ousedray ethay Ojantray owerspay:
Ilewhay ar’sway iercefay oddessgay iresfay ethay Eciangray oefay,
Andyay outsshay andyay understhay inyay ethay ieldsfay elowbay.
Enthay eatgray Ioresday ellfay, ybay oomday ivineday,
Inyay ainvay ishay alourvay andyay illustriousyay inelay.
Ayay okenbray ockray ethay orcefay ofyay Yruspay ewthray,
o(whay omfray oldcay Usænay edlay ethay Acianthray ewcray,)[142]
Ullfay onyay ishay ankleyay opp’ddray ethay onderouspay onestay,
Urstbay ethay ongstray ervesnay, andyay ash’dcray ethay olidsay onebay.
Upinesay ehay umblestay onyay ethay imsoncray andssay,
Eforebay ishay elplesshay iendsfray, andyay ativenay andsbay,
Andyay eadsspray orfay aidyay ishay unavailingyay andshay.
Ethay oefay ush’dray uriousfay asyay ehay antspay orfay eathbray,
Andyay oughthray ishay avelnay ovedray ethay ointedpay eathday:
Ishay ushinggay entrailsyay okedsmay uponyay ethay oundgray,
Andyay ethay armway ifelay amecay issuingyay omfray ethay oundway.

Ishay ancelay oldbay Oasthay atyay ethay onquerorcay entsay,
Eepday inyay ishay eastbray aboveyay ethay appay ityay entway,
Amidyay ethay ungslay asway ix’dfay ethay ingedway oodway,
Andyay uiveringqay inyay ishay eavinghay osombay oodstay:
Illtay omfray ethay yingday iefchay, approachingyay earnay,
Ethay Olianætay arriorway ugg’dtay ishay eightyway earspay:
Enthay uddensay avedway ishay amingflay alchionfay oundray,
Andyay ash’dgay ishay ellybay ithway ayay astlyghay oundway;
Ethay orpsecay ownay eathlessbray onyay ethay oodyblay ainplay,
Otay oilspay ishay armsyay ethay ictorvay ovestray inyay ainvay;
Ethay Acianthray andsbay againstyay ethay ictorvay ess’dpray,
Ayay ovegray ofyay anceslay itter’dglay atyay ishay eastbray.
Ernstay Oasthay, aringglay ithway evengefulray eyesyay,
Inyay ullensay uryfay owlyslay uitsqay ethay izepray.

Usthay ellfay otway eroeshay; oneyay ethay idepray ofyay Acethray,
Andyay oneyay ethay eaderlay ofyay ethay Epeianyay aceray;
Eath’sday ablesay adeshay atyay onceyay o’ercastyay eirthay eyesyay,
Inyay ustday ethay anquish’dvay andyay ethay ictorvay ieslay.
Ithway opiouscay aughterslay allyay ethay ieldsfay areyay edray,
Andyay eap’dhay ithway owinggray ountainsmay ofyay ethay eadday.

Adhay omesay avebray iefchay isthay artialmay enescay eheldbay,
Ybay Allaspay uardedgay oughthray ethay eadfuldray ieldfay;
Ightmay artsday ebay idbay otay urntay eirthay ointspay awayyay,
Andyay ordssway aroundyay imhay innocentlyyay ayplay;
Ethay ar’sway olewhay artyay ithway onderway adhay ehay eensay,
Andyay ountedcay eroeshay erewhay ehay ountedcay enmay.

Osay oughtfay eachyay osthay, ithway irstthay ofyay oryglay iredfay,
Andyay owdscray onyay owdscray iumphantlytray expiredyay.

illustration[ay: ] Apmay ofyay ethay Ainplay ofyay Oytray




Ookbay Vay.


Argumentyay.


Ethay Actsyay Ofyay Iomedday.


Iomedday, assistedyay ybay Allaspay, erformspay ondersway inyay isthay ay’sday attlebay.
Andaruspay oundsway imhay ithway anyay arrowyay, utbay ethay oddessgay urescay imhay, enablesyay
imhay otay iscernday odsgay omfray ortalsmay, andyay ohibitspray imhay omfray ontendingcay
ithway anyyay ofyay ethay ormerfay, exceptingyay Enusvay. Easænay oinsjay Andaruspay otay opposeyay
imhay; Andaruspay isyay illedkay, andyay Easænay inyay eatgray angerday utbay orfay ethay
assistanceyay ofyay Enusvay; owhay, asyay eshay isyay emovingray erhay onsay omfray ethay ightfay, isyay
oundedway onyay ethay andhay ybay Iomedday. Apolloyay econdssay erhay inyay ishay escueray, andyay atyay
engthlay arriescay offyay Easænay otay Oytray, erewhay ehay isyay ealedhay inyay ethay empletay ofyay
Ergamuspay. Arsmay alliesray ethay Ojanstray, andyay assistsyay Ectorhay otay akemay ayay andstay.
Inyay ethay eantimemay Easænay isyay estoredray otay ethay ieldfay, andyay eythay overthrowyay
everalsay ofyay ethay Eeksgray; amongyay ethay estray Epolemustlay isyay ainslay ybay Arpedonsay.
Unojay andyay Inervamay escendday otay esistray Arsmay; ethay atterlay incitesyay Iomedday otay
ogay againstyay atthay odgay; ehay oundsway imhay, andyay endssay imhay oaninggray otay eavenhay.
 Ethay irstfay attlebay ontinuescay oughthray isthay ookbay. Ethay enescay isyay ethay amesay
 asyay inyay ethay ormerfay.


Utbay Allaspay ownay Ydidestay’ oulsay inspiresyay,[143]
Illsfay ithway erhay orcefay, andyay armsway ithway allyay erhay iresfay,
Aboveyay ethay Eeksgray ishay eathlessday amefay otay aiseray,
Andyay owncray erhay erohay ithway istinguish’dday aisepray.
Ighhay onyay ishay elmhay elestialcay ightningslay ayplay,
Ishay eamybay ieldshay emitsyay ayay ivinglay ayray;
Ethay unweariedyay azeblay incessantyay eamsstray uppliessay,
Ikelay ethay edray arstay atthay iresfay ethay autumnalyay iesskay,
Enwhay eshfray ehay earsray ishay adiantray orbyay otay ightsay,
Andyay, athedbay inyay oceanyay, ootsshay ayay eenerkay ightlay.
Uchsay oriesglay Allaspay onyay ethay iefchay estow’dbay,
Uchsay, omfray ishay armsyay, ethay iercefay effulgenceyay ow’dflay:
Onwardyay eshay ivesdray imhay, uriousfay otay engageyay,
Erewhay ethay ightfay urnsbay, andyay erewhay ethay ickestthay ageray.

Ethay onssay ofyay Aresday irstfay ethay ombatcay oughtsay,
Ayay ealthyway iestpray, utbay ichray ithoutway ayay aultfay;
Inyay Ulcan’svay anefay ethay ather’sfay aysday ereway edlay,
Ethay onssay otay oilstay ofyay oriousglay attlebay edbray;
Esethay ingledsay omfray eirthay oopstray ethay ightfay aintainmay,
Esethay, omfray eirthay eedsstay, Ydidestay onyay ethay ainplay.
Iercefay orfay enownray ethay other-chiefsbray awdray earnay,
Andyay irstfay oldbay Egeusphay astcay ishay oundingsay earspay,
Ichwhay o’eryay ethay arrior’sway ouldershay ooktay itsyay oursecay,
Andyay entspay inyay emptyyay airyay itsyay erringyay orcefay.
Otnay osay, Ydidestay, ewflay ythay ancelay inyay ainvay,
Utbay iercedpay ishay eastbray, andyay etch’dstray imhay onyay ethay ainplay.
Eizedsay ithway unusualyay earfay, Idæusyay edflay,
Eftlay ethay ichray ariotchay, andyay ishay otherbray eadday.
Andyay adhay otnay Ulcanvay entlay elestialcay aidyay,
Ehay ootay adhay unksay otay eath’sday eternalyay adeshay;
Utbay inyay ayay okysmay oudclay ethay odgay ofyay irefay
Eservedpray ethay onsay, inyay itypay otay ethay iresay.
Ethay eedsstay andyay ariotchay, otay ethay avynay edlay,
Increasedyay ethay oilsspay ofyay allantgay Iomedday.

Uckstray ithway amazeyay andyay ameshay, ethay Ojantray ewcray,
Oryay ainslay, oryay edflay, ethay onssay ofyay Aresday iewvay;
Enwhay ybay ethay ood-stain’dblay andhay Inervamay ess’dpray
Ethay odgay ofyay attlesbay, andyay isthay eechspay address’dyay:

ern“stay owerpay ofyay arway! ybay omwhay ethay ightymay allfay,
Owhay athebay inyay oodblay, andyay akeshay ethay oftylay allway!
Etlay ethay avebray iefschay eirthay oriousglay oilstay ivideday;
Andyay osewhay ethay onquestcay, ightymay Ovejay ecideday:
Ilewhay eway omfray interdictedyay ieldsfay etireray,
Ornay empttay ethay athwray ofyay eaven’shay avengingyay iresay.”

Erhay ordsway allayyay ethay impetuousyay arrior’sway eathay,
Ethay odgay ofyay armsyay andyay artialmay aidmay etreatray;
Emovedray omfray ightfay, onyay Anthusxay’ oweryflay oundsbay
Eythay atsay, andyay isten’dlay otay ethay yingday oundssay.

Eantimemay, ethay Eeksgray ethay Ojantray aceray ursuepay,
Andyay omesay oldbay ieftainchay everyyay eaderlay ewslay:
Irstfay Odiusyay allsfay, andyay itesbay ethay oodyblay andsay,
Ishay eathday ennobledyay ybay Atridesyay’ andhay:

Asyay ehay otay ightflay ishay eelingwhay arcay address’dyay,
Ethay eedyspay avelinjay ovedray omfray ackbay otay eastbray.
Inyay ustday ethay ightymay Alizonianhay aylay,
Ishay armsyay esoundray, ethay iritspay ingsway itsyay ayway.

Ythay atefay asway extnay, Oyay Usphæstay! oom’dday otay eelfay
Ethay eatgray Idomeneusyay’ otendedpray eelstay;
Omwhay Orusbay entsay is(hay onsay andyay onlyyay oyjay)
Omfray uitfulfray Arnetay otay ethay ieldsfay ofyay Oytray.
Ethay Etancray avelinjay each’dray imhay omfray afaryay,
Andyay iercedpay ishay ouldershay asyay ehay ountsmay ishay arcay;
Ackbay omfray ethay arcay ehay umblestay otay ethay oundgray,
Andyay everlastingyay adesshay ishay eyesyay urroundsay.

Enthay iedday Amandriusscay, expertyay inyay ethay asechay,
Inyay oodsway andyay ildsway otay oundway ethay avagesay aceray;
Ianaday aughttay imhay allyay erhay ylvansay artsyay,
Otay endbay ethay owbay, andyay aimyay unerringyay artsday:
Utbay ainlyvay erehay Iana’sday artsyay ehay iestray,
Ethay atalfay ancelay arrestsyay imhay asyay ehay iesflay;
Omfray Enelausmay’ armyay ethay eaponway entsay,
Oughthray ishay oadbray ackbay andyay eavinghay osombay entway:
Ownday inkssay ethay arriorway ithway ayay underingthay oundsay,
Ishay azenbray armouryay ingsray againstyay ethay oundgray.

Extnay artfulyay Ereclusphay untimelyyay ellfay;
Oldbay Erionmay entsay imhay otay ethay ealmsray ofyay ellhay.
Ythay ather’sfay illskay, Oyay Ereclusphay! asway inethay,
Ethay acefulgray abricfay andyay ethay airfay esignday;
Orfay ovedlay ybay Allaspay, Allaspay idday impartyay
Otay imhay ethay ipwright’sshay andyay ethay uilder’sbay artyay.
Eneathbay ishay andhay ethay eetflay ofyay Arispay oseray,
Ethay atalfay ausecay ofyay allyay ishay ountry’scay oesway;
Utbay ehay, ethay ysticmay illway ofyay eavenhay unknownyay,
Ornay awsay ishay ountry’scay erilpay, ornay ishay ownyay.
Ethay aplesshay artistyay, ilewhay onfusedcay ehay edflay,
Ethay earspay ofyay Erionmay ingledmay ithway ethay eadday.
Oughthray ishay ightray iphay, ithway orcefulfay uryfay astcay,
Etweenbay ethay adderblay andyay ethay onebay ityay ass’dpay;
Onepray onyay ishay eesknay ehay allsfay ithway uitlessfray iescray,
Andyay eathday inyay astinglay umberslay ealssay ishay eyesyay.

Omfray Egesmay’ orcefay ethay iftsway Edaeuspay edflay,
Antenor’syay offspringyay omfray ayay oreignfay edbay,
Osewhay enerousgay ousespay, Eanorthay, eavenlyhay airfay,
Ursednay ethay youngyay angerstray ithway ayay other’smay arecay.
Owhay ainvay osethay arescay! enwhay Egesmay inyay ethay earray
Ullfay inyay ishay apenay infix’dyay ethay atalfay earspay;
Iftsway oughthray ishay acklingcray awsjay ethay eaponway idesglay,
Andyay ethay oldcay onguetay andyay inninggray eethtay ividesday.

Enthay iedday Ypsenorhay, enerousgay andyay ivineday,
Ungspray omfray ethay avebray Olopion’sday ightymay inelay,
Owhay earnay adoredyay Amanderscay ademay abodeyay,
Iestpray ofyay ethay eamstray, andyay onouredhay asyay ayay odgay.
Onyay imhay, amidstyay ethay yingflay umbersnay oundfay,
Eurypylusyay inflictsyay ayay eadlyday oundway;
Onyay ishay oadbray ouldersshay ellfay ethay orcefulfay andbray,
Encethay ancingglay ownwardsday, opp’dlay ishay olyhay andhay,
Ichwhay ain’dstay ithway acredsay oodblay ethay ushingblay andsay.
Ownday unksay ethay iestpray: ethay urplepay andhay ofyay eathday
Osedclay ishay imday eyeyay, andyay atefay uppress’dsay ishay eathbray.

Usthay oil’dtay ethay iefschay, inyay ifferentday artspay engagedyay.
Inyay everyyay uarterqay iercefay Ydidestay agedray;
Amidyay ethay Eekgray, amidyay ethay Ojantray aintray,
Aptray oughthray ethay anksray ehay understhay o’eryay ethay ainplay;
Ownay erehay, ownay erethay, ehay artsday omfray aceplay otay aceplay,
Ourspay onyay ethay earray, oryay ightenslay inyay eirthay acefay.
Usthay omfray ighhay illshay ethay orrentstay iftsway andyay ongstray
Elugeday olewhay ieldsfay, andyay eepsway ethay eestray alongyay,
Oughthray uin’dray olesmay ethay ushingray aveway esoundsray,
O’erwhelm’syay ethay idgebray, andyay urstsbay ethay oftylay oundsbay;
Ethay yellowyay arvestshay ofyay ethay ipen’dray yearyay,
Andyay attedflay ineyardsvay, oneyay adsay asteway appearyay![144]
Ilewhay Ovejay escendsday inyay uicyslay eetsshay ofyay ainray,
Andyay allyay ethay abourslay ofyay ankindmay areyay ainvay.

Osay agedray Ydidestay, oundlessbay inyay ishay ireyay,
Ovedray armiesyay ackbay, andyay ademay allyay Oytray etireray.
Ithway iefgray ethay eaderlay ofyay ethay Ycianlay andbay
Awsay ethay ideway asteway ofyay ishay estructiveday andhay:
Ishay endedbay owbay againstyay ethay iefchay ehay ewdray;
Iftsway otay ethay arkmay ethay irstythay arrowyay ewflay,
Osewhay orkyfay ointpay ethay ollowhay eastplatebray oretay,
Eepday inyay ishay ouldershay iercedpay, andyay ankdray ethay oregay:
Ethay ushingray eamstray ishay azenbray armouryay yedday,
Ilewhay ethay oudpray archeryay usthay exultingyay iedcray:

ither“hay, yeyay Ojanstray, itherhay ivedray youryay eedsstay!
Olay! ybay ouryay andhay ethay avestbray Eciangray eedsblay,
Otnay onglay ethay eathfulday artday ehay ancay ustainsay;
Oryay Usphœbay urgedyay emay otay esethay ieldsfay inyay ainvay.”
Osay okespay ehay, oastfulbay: utbay ethay ingedway artday
Opp’dstay ortshay ofyay ifelay, andyay ock’dmay ethay ooter’sshay artyay.
Ethay oundedway iefchay, ehindbay ishay arcay etiredray,
Ethay elpinghay andhay ofyay Enelussthay equiredray;
Iftsway omfray ishay eatsay ehay eap’dlay uponyay ethay oundgray,
Andyay ugg’dtay ethay eaponway omfray ethay ushinggay oundway;
Enwhay usthay ethay ingkay ishay uardiangay owerpay address’dyay,
Ethay urplepay urrentcay anderingway o’eryay ishay estvay:

o“ay ogenypray ofyay Ovejay! unconquer’dyay aidmay!
Ifyay e’eryay ymay odlikegay iresay eservedday ythay aidyay,
Ifyay e’eryay Iyay eltfay eethay inyay ethay ightingfay ieldfay;
Ownay, oddessgay, ownay, ythay acredsay uccoursay yieldyay.
Oyay ivegay ymay ancelay otay eachray ethay Ojantray ightknay,
Osewhay arrowyay oundsway ethay iefchay outhay uard’stgay inyay ightfay;
Andyay aylay ethay oasterbay ovellinggray onyay ethay oreshay,
Atthay auntsvay esethay eyesyay allshay iewvay ethay ightlay onay oremay.”

Usthay ay’dpray Ydidestay, andyay Inervamay eardhay,
Ishay ervesnay onfirm’dcay, ishay anguidlay iritsspay eer’dchay;
Ehay eelsfay eachyay imblay ithway ontedway igourvay ightlay;
Ishay eatingbay osombay aim’dclay ethay omisedpray ightfay.
e“bay oldbay, e(shay iedcray), inyay everyyay ombatcay ineshay,
Arway ebay ythay ovincepray, ythay otectionpray inemay;
Ushray otay ethay ightfay, andyay everyyay oefay ontrolcay;
Akeway eachyay aternalpay irtuevay inyay ythay oulsay:
Engthstray ellssway ythay oilingbay eastbray, infusedyay ybay emay,
Andyay allyay ythay odlikegay atherfay eathesbray inyay eethay;
Yetyay oremay, omfray ortalmay istsmay Iyay urgepay ythay eyesyay,[145]
Andyay etsay otay iewvay ethay arringway eitiesday.
Esethay eesay outhay unshay, oughthray allyay ethay embattledyay ainplay;
Ornay ashlyray ivestray erewhay umanhay orcefay isyay ainvay.
Ifyay Enusvay inglemay inyay ethay artialmay andbay,
Erhay altshay outhay oundway: osay Allaspay ivesgay ommandcay.”

Ithway atthay, ethay ue-eyedblay irginvay ing’dway erhay ightflay;
Ethay erohay ush’dray impetuousyay otay ethay ightfay;
Ithway enfoldtay ardouryay ownay invadesyay ethay ainplay,
Ildway ithway elayday, andyay oremay enragedyay ybay ainpay.
Asyay onyay ethay eecyflay ocksflay enwhay ungerhay allscay,
Amidstyay ethay ieldfay ayay indledbray ionlay allsfay;
Ifyay ancechay omesay epherdshay ithway ayay istantday artday
Ethay avagesay oundway, ehay ousesray atyay ethay artsmay,
Ehay oamsfay, ehay oarsray; ethay epherdshay aresday otnay aystay,
Utbay emblingtray eaveslay ethay atteringscay ocksflay ayay eypray;
Eapshay allfay onyay eapshay; ehay athesbay ithway oodblay ethay oundgray,
Enthay eapslay ictoriousvay o’eryay ethay oftylay oundmay.
Otnay ithway esslay uryfay ernstay Ydidestay ewflay;
Andyay otway avebray eaderslay atyay anyay instantyay ewslay;
Astynousyay eathlessbray ellfay, andyay ybay ishay idesay,
Ishay eople’spay astorpay, oodgay Ypenorhay, iedday;
Astynousyay’ eastbray ethay eadlyday ancelay eceivesray,
Ypenor’shay ouldershay ishay oadbray alchionfay eavesclay.
Osethay ainslay ehay eftlay, andyay ungspray ithway oblenay ageray
Abasyay andyay Olyiduspay otay engageyay;
Onssay ofyay Eurydamusyay, owhay, iseway andyay oldyay,
Ouldcay atefay oreseefay, andyay ysticmay eamsdray unfoldyay;
Ethay youthsyay eturn’dray otnay omfray ethay oubtfulday ainplay,
Andyay ethay adsay atherfay iedtray ishay artsyay inyay ainvay;
Onay ysticmay eamdray ouldcay akemay eirthay atesfay appearyay,
Oughthay ownay eterminedday ybay Ydidestay’ earspay.

Youngyay Anthusxay extnay, andyay Oonthay eltfay ishay ageray;
Ethay oyjay andyay opehay ofyay Aenopsphay’ eeblefay ageyay:
Astvay asway ishay ealthway, andyay esethay ethay onlyyay eirshay
Ofyay allyay ishay abourslay andyay ayay ifelay ofyay arescay.
Oldcay eathday o’ertakesyay emthay inyay eirthay oomingblay yearsyay,
Andyay eaveslay ethay atherfay unavailingyay earstay:
Otay angersstray ownay escendsday ishay eapyhay orestay,
Ethay aceray orgottenfay, andyay ethay amenay onay oremay.

Otway onssay ofyay Iampray inyay oneyay ariotchay ideray,
Itteringglay inyay armsyay, andyay ombatcay idesay ybay idesay.
Asyay enwhay ethay ordlylay ionlay eekssay ishay oodfay
Erewhay azinggray eifershay angeray ethay onelylay oodway,
Ehay eapslay amidstyay emthay ithway ayay uriousfay oundbay,
Endsbay eirthay ongstray ecksnay, andyay earstay emthay otay ethay oundgray:
Osay omfray eirthay eatssay ethay otherbray iefschay areyay orntay,
Eirthay eedsstay andyay ariotchay otay ethay avynay ornebay.

Ithway eepday oncerncay ivineday Easænay iew’dvay
Ethay oefay evailingpray, andyay ishay iendsfray ursuedpay;
Oughthray ethay ickthay ormstay ofyay ingingsay earsspay ehay iesflay,
Exploringyay Andaruspay ithway arefulcay eyesyay.
Atyay engthlay ehay oundfay Ycaon’slay ightymay onsay;
Otay omwhay ethay iefchay ofyay Enusvay’ aceray egunbay:

ere“whay, Andaruspay, areyay allyay ythay onourshay ownay,
Ythay ingedway arrowsyay andyay unerringyay owbay,
Ythay atchlessmay illskay, ythay yetyay unrivall’dyay amefay,
Andyay oastedbay oryglay ofyay ethay Ycianlay amenay?
Oyay iercepay atthay ortalmay! ifyay eway ortalmay allcay
Atthay ondrousway orcefay ybay ichwhay olewhay armiesyay allfay;
Oryay odgay incensedyay, owhay uitsqay ethay istantday iesskay
Otay unishpay Oytray orfay ightedslay acrificesay;
ich(whay, ohyay avertyay omfray ouryay unhappyyay atestay!
Orfay atwhay osay eadfuldray asyay elestialcay atehay)?
Oe’erwhay ehay ebay, opitiatepray Ovejay ithway ayerpray;
Ifyay anmay, estroyday; ifyay odgay, entreatyay otay arespay.”

Otay imhay ethay Ycianlay: om“whay youryay eyesyay eholdbay,
Ifyay ightray Iyay udgejay, isyay Iomedday ethay oldbay:
Uchsay ourserscay irlwhay imhay o’eryay ethay ustyday ieldfay,
Osay owerstay ishay elmethay, andyay osay amesflay ishay ieldshay.
Ifyay is’tay ayay odgay, ehay earsway atthay ief’schay isguiseday:
Oryay ifyay atthay iefchay, omesay uardiangay ofyay ethay iesskay,
Involvedyay inyay oudsclay, otectspray imhay inyay ethay ayfray,
Andyay urnstay unseenyay ethay ustratefray artday awayyay.
Iyay ing’dway anyay arrowyay, ichwhay otnay idlyyay ellfay,
Ethay okestray adhay ix’dfay imhay otay ethay atesgay ofyay ellhay;
Andyay, utbay omesay odgay, omesay angryyay odgay ithstandsway,
Ishay atefay asway ueday otay esethay unerringyay andshay.
Ill’dskay inyay ethay owbay, onyay ootfay Iyay oughtsay ethay arway,
Ornay oin’djay iftsway orseshay otay ethay apidray arcay.
Entay olish’dpay ariotschay Iyay ossess’dpay atyay omehay,
Andyay illstay eythay acegray Ycaon’slay incelypray omeday:
Erethay eil’dvay inyay aciousspay overletscay eythay andstay;
Andyay icetway entay ourserscay aitway eirthay ord’slay ommandcay.
Ethay oodgay oldyay arriorway adebay emay usttray otay esethay,
Enwhay irstfay orfay Oytray Iyay ail’dsay ethay acredsay eassay;
Inyay ieldsfay, aloftyay, ethay irlingwhay arcay otay uidegay,
Andyay oughthray ethay anksray ofyay eathday iumphanttray ideray.
Utbay ainvay ithway youthyay, andyay yetyay otay iftthray inclinedyay,
Iyay eardhay ishay ounselscay ithway unheedfulyay indmay,
Andyay oughtthay ethay eedsstay your(ay argelay uppliessay unknownyay)
Ightmay ailfay ofyay oragefay inyay ethay aiten’dstray owntay;
Osay ooktay ymay owbay andyay ointedpay artsday inyay andhay
Andyay eftlay ethay ariotschay inyay ymay ativenay andlay.

oo“tay atelay, Oyay iendfray! ymay ashnessray Iyay eploreday;
Esethay aftsshay, onceyay atalfay, arrycay eathday onay oremay.
Ydeustay’ andyay Atreusyay’ onssay eirthay ointspay avehay oundfay,
Andyay undissembledyay oregay ursuedpay ethay oundway.
Inyay ainvay eythay eedblay: isthay unavailingyay owbay
Ervessay, otnay otay aughterslay, utbay ovokepray ethay oefay.
Inyay evilyay ourhay esethay endedbay ornshay Iyay ungstray,
Andyay eizedsay ethay uiverqay erewhay ityay idlyyay unghay.
Ursedcay ebay ethay atefay atthay entsay emay otay ethay ieldfay
Ithoutway ayay arrior’sway armsyay, ethay earspay andyay ieldshay!
Ifyay e’eryay ithway ifelay Iyay uitqay ethay Ojantray ainplay,
Ifyay e’eryay Iyay eesay ymay ousespay andyay iresay againyay,
Isthay owbay, unfaithfulyay otay ymay oriousglay aimsyay,
Okebray ybay ymay andhay, allshay eedfay ethay azingblay amesflay.”

Otay omwhay ethay eaderlay ofyay ethay Ardanday aceray:
e“bay almcay, ornay Usphœbay’ onour’dhay iftgay isgraceday.
Ethay istantday artday ebay aisedpray, oughthay erehay eway eednay
Ethay ushingray ariotchay andyay ethay oundingbay eedstay.
Againstyay yonyay erohay etlay usyay endbay ouryay oursecay,
Andyay, andhay otay andhay, encounteryay orcefay ithway orcefay.
Ownay ountmay ymay eatsay, andyay omfray ethay ariot’schay eighthay
Observeyay ymay ather’sfay eedsstay, enown’dray inyay ightfay;
Actisedpray alikeyay otay urntay, otay opstay, otay asechay,
Otay areday ethay ockshay, oryay urgeyay ethay apidray aceray;
Ecuresay ithway esethay, oughthray ightingfay ieldsfay eway ogay;
Oryay afesay otay Oytray, ifyay Ovejay assistyay ethay oefay.
Astehay, eizesay ethay ipwhay, andyay atchsnay ethay uidinggay einray;
Ethay arrior’sway uryfay etlay isthay armyay ustainsay;
Oryay, ifyay otay ombatcay ythay oldbay earthay inclineyay,
Aketay outhay ethay earspay, ethay ariot’schay arecay ebay inemay.”

o“ay incepray! ycaon’s(lay aliantvay onsay epliedray)
Asyay inethay ethay eedsstay, ebay inethay ethay asktay otay uidegay.
Ethay orseshay, actisedpray otay eirthay ord’slay ommandcay,
Allshay earbay ethay einray, andyay answeryay otay ythay andhay;
Utbay, ifyay, unhappyyay, eway esertday ethay ightfay,
Ythay oicevay aloneyay ancay animateyay eirthay ightflay;
Elseyay allshay ouryay atesfay ebay umber’dnay ithway ethay eadday,
Andyay esethay, ethay ictor’svay izepray, inyay iumphtray edlay.
Inethay ebay ethay uidancegay, enthay: ithway earspay andyay ieldshay
Yselfmay illway argechay isthay errortay ofyay ethay ieldfay.”

Andyay ownay othbay eroeshay ountmay ethay itteringglay arcay;
Ethay oundingbay ourserscay ushray amidstyay ethay arway;
Eirthay iercefay approachyay oldbay Enelussthay espiedyay,
Owhay usthay, alarm’dyay, otay eatgray Ydidestay iedcray:

o“ay iendfray! otway iefschay ofyay orcefay immenseyay Iyay eesay,
Eadfuldray eythay omecay, andyay endbay eirthay ageray onyay eethay:
Olay ethay avebray eirhay ofyay oldyay Ycaon’slay inelay,
Andyay eatgray Easænay, ungspray omfray aceray ivineday!
Enoughyay isyay ivengay otay amefay. Ascendyay ythay arcay!
Andyay avesay ayay ifelay, ethay ulwarkbay ofyay ouryay arway.”

Atyay isthay ethay erohay astcay ayay oomyglay ooklay,
Ix’dfay onyay ethay iefchay ithway ornscay; andyay usthay ehay okespay:

e“may ostday outhay idbay otay unshay ethay omingcay ightfay?
Emay ouldstway outhay ovemay otay asebay, ingloriousyay ightflay?
Owknay, is’tay otnay onesthay inyay ymay oulsay otay earfay,
Ornay asway Ydidestay ornbay otay embletray erehay.
Iyay atehay ethay umbrouscay ariot’schay owslay advanceyay,
Andyay ethay onglay istanceday ofyay ethay yingflay ancelay;
Utbay ilewhay ymay ervesnay areyay ongstray, ymay orcefay entireyay,
Usthay ontfray ethay oefay, andyay emulateyay ymay iresay.
Ornay allshay yonyay eedsstay, atthay iercefay otay ightfay onveycay
Osethay eateningthray eroeshay, earbay emthay othbay awayyay;
Oneyay iefchay atyay eastlay eneathbay isthay armyay allshay ieday;
Osay Allaspay ellstay emay, andyay orbidsfay otay yflay.
Utbay ifyay eshay oomsday, andyay ifyay onay odgay ithstandway,
Atthay othbay allshay allfay ybay oneyay ictoriousvay andhay,
Enthay eedhay ymay ordsway: ymay orseshay erehay etainday,
Ix’dfay otay ethay ariotchay ybay ethay aiten’dstray einray;
Iftsway otay Easænay’ emptyyay eatsay oceedpray,
Andyay eizesay ethay ourserscay ofyay etherealyay eedbray;
Ethay aceray ofyay osethay, ichwhay onceyay ethay underingthay odgay[146]
Orfay avish’dray Anymedegay onyay Ostray estow’dbay,
Ethay estbay atthay e’eryay onyay earth’syay oadbray urfacesay unray,
Eneathbay ethay isingray oryay ethay ettingsay unsay.
Encehay eatgray Anchisesyay olestay ayay eedbray unknownyay,
Ybay ortalmay aresmay, omfray iercefay Aomedonlay:
Ourfay ofyay isthay aceray ishay ampleyay allsstay ontaincay,
Andyay otway ansporttray Easænay o’eryay ethay ainplay.
Esethay, ereway ethay ichray immortalyay izepray ouryay ownyay,
Oughthray ethay ideway orldway ouldshay akemay ouryay oryglay ownknay.”

Usthay ilewhay eythay okespay, ethay oefay amecay uriousfay onyay,
Andyay ernstay Ycaon’slay arlikeway aceray egunbay:

ince“pray, outhay artyay etmay. Oughthay atelay inyay ainvay assail’dyay,
Ethay earspay aymay enteryay erewhay ethay arrowyay ail’dfay.”

Ehay aidsay, enthay ookshay ethay onderouspay ancelay, andyay ungflay;
Onyay ishay oadbray ieldshay ethay oundingsay eaponway ungray,
Iercedpay ethay oughtay orbyay, andyay inyay ishay uirasscay unghay,
e“hay eedsblay! ethay idepray ofyay Eecegray! e(thay oasterbay iescray,)
Ouryay iumphtray ownay, ethay ightymay arriorway ieslay!”
istaken“may auntervay! iomed(day epliedray;)
Ythay artday ashay erredyay, andyay ownay ymay earspay ebay iedtray;
Yeyay ape’scay otnay othbay; oneyay, eadlonghay omfray ishay arcay,
Ithway ostilehay oodblay allshay utglay ethay odgay ofyay arway.”

Ehay okespay, andyay isingray url’dhay ishay orcefulfay artday,
Ichwhay, ivendray ybay Allaspay, iercedpay ayay italvay artpay;
Ullfay inyay ishay acefay ityay enter’dyay, andyay etwixtbay
Ethay osenay andyay eye-ballyay ethay oudpray Ycianlay ix’dfay;
Ash’dcray allyay ishay awsjay, andyay eftclay ethay onguetay ithinway,
Illtay ethay ightbray ointpay ook’dlay outyay eneathbay ethay inchay.
Eadlonghay ehay allsfay, ishay elmethay ocksknay ethay oundgray:
Earthyay oansgray eneathbay imhay, andyay ishay armsyay esoundray;
Ethay artingstay ourserscay embletray ithway affrightyay;
Ethay oulsay indignantyay eekssay ethay ealmsray ofyay ightnay.

Otay uardgay ishay aughter’dslay iendfray, Easænay iesflay,
Ishay earspay extendingyay erewhay ethay arcasecay ieslay;
Atchfulway ehay eelswhay, otectspray ityay everyyay ayway,
Asyay ethay imgray ionlay alksstay aroundyay ishay eypray.
O’eryay ethay all’nfay unktray ishay ampleyay ieldshay isplay’dday,
Ehay ideshay ethay erohay ithway ishay ightymay adeshay,
Andyay eatsthray aloudyay! ethay Eeksgray ithway onginglay eyesyay
Eholdbay atyay istanceday, utbay orbearfay ethay izepray.
Enthay iercefay Ydidestay oopsstay; andyay omfray ethay ieldsfay
Eavedhay ithway astvay orcefay, ayay ockyray agmentfray ieldsway.
Otnay otway ongstray enmay ethay enormousyay eightway ouldcay aiseray,
Uchsay enmay asyay ivelay inyay esethay egenerateday aysday:[147]
Ehay ungsway ityay oundray; andyay, atheringgay engthstray otay owthray,
Ischargedday ethay onderouspay uinray atyay ethay oefay.
Erewhay otay ethay iphay ethay insertedyay ighthay unitesyay,
Ullfay onyay ethay onebay ethay ointedpay arblemay ightslay;
Oughthray othbay ethay endonstay okebray ethay uggedray onestay,
Andyay ipp’dstray ethay inskay, andyay ack’dcray ethay olidsay onebay.
Unksay onyay ishay eesknay, andyay aggeringstay ithway ishay ainspay,
Ishay allingfay ulkbay ishay endedbay armyay ustainssay;
Ostlay inyay ayay izzyday istmay ethay arriorway ieslay;
Ayay uddensay oudclay omescay immingsway o’eryay ishay eyesyay.
Erethay ethay avebray iefchay, owhay ightymay umbersnay ay’dsway,
Oppress’dyay adhay unksay otay eath’sday eternalyay adeshay,
Utbay eavenlyhay Enusvay, indfulmay ofyay ethay ovelay
Eshay orebay Anchisesyay inyay ethay Idaeanyay ovegray,
Ishay angerday iewsvay ithway anguishyay andyay espairday,
Andyay uardsgay erhay offspringyay ithway ayay other’smay arecay.
Aboutyay erhay uch-lovedmay onsay erhay armsyay eshay owsthray,
Erhay armsyay osewhay itenesswhay atchmay ethay allingfay owssnay.
Een’dscray omfray ethay oefay ehindbay erhay iningshay eilvay,
Ethay ordssway aveway armlesshay, andyay ethay avelinsjay ailfay;
Afesay oughthray ethay ushingray orsehay, andyay eather’dfay ightflay
Ofyay oundingsay aftsshay, eshay earsbay imhay omfray ethay ightfay.

Ornay Enelussthay, ithway unassistingyay andshay,
Emain’dray unheedfulyay ofyay ishay ord’slay ommandscay:
Ishay antingpay eedsstay, emovedray omfray outyay ethay arway,
Ehay ix’dfay ithway aiten’dstray acestray otay ethay arcay,
Extnay, ushingray otay ethay Ardanday oilspay, etainsday
Ethay eavenlyhay ourserscay ithway ethay owingflay anesmay:
Esethay inyay oudpray iumphtray otay ethay eetflay onvey’dcay,
Onay ongerlay ownay ayay Ojantray ordlay obey’dyay.
Atthay argechay otay oldbay Eipylusday ehay avegay,
om(whay ostmay ehay ovedlay, asyay avebray enmay ovelay ethay avebray,)
Enthay ountingmay onyay ishay arcay, esumedray ethay einray,
Andyay ollow’dfay erewhay Ydidestay eptsway ethay ainplay.

Eanwhilemay is(hay onquestcay avishedray omfray ishay eyesyay)
Ethay agingray iefchay inyay asechay ofyay Enusvay iesflay:
Onay oddessgay eshay, ommission’dcay otay ethay ieldfay,
Ikelay Allaspay eadfuldray ithway erhay ablesay ieldshay,
Oryay iercefay Ellonabay underingthay atyay ethay allway,
Ilewhay amesflay ascendyay, andyay ightymay uinsray allfay;
Ehay ewknay oftsay ombatscay uitsay ethay endertay ameday,
Ewnay otay ethay ieldfay, andyay illstay ayay oefay otay amefay.
Oughthray eakingbray anksray ishay uriousfay oursecay ehay endsbay,
Andyay atyay ethay oddessgay ishay oadbray ancelay extendsyay;
Oughthray erhay ightbray eilvay ethay aringday eaponway ovedray,
Ethay ambrosialyay eilvay ichwhay allyay ethay Acesgray oveway;
Erhay owysnay andhay ethay azingray eelstay ofanedpray,
Andyay ethay ansparenttray inskay ithway imsoncray ain’dstay,
Omfray ethay earclay einvay ayay eamstray immortalyay ow’dflay,
Uchsay eamstray asyay issuesyay omfray ayay oundedway odgay;[148]
Urepay emanationyay! uncorruptedyay oodflay!
Unlikeyay ouryay ossgray, iseasedday, errestrialtay oodblay:
or(fay otnay ethay eadbray ofyay anmay eirthay ifelay ustainssay,
Ornay ine’sway inflamingyay uicejay uppliessay eirthay einsvay:)
Ithway endertay ieksshray ethay oddessgay ill’dfay ethay aceplay,
Andyay opp’ddray erhay offspringyay omfray erhay eakway embraceyay.
Imhay Usphœbay ooktay: ehay astscay ayay oudclay aroundyay
Ethay aintingfay iefchay, andyay ardsway ethay ortalmay oundway.

Enthay ithway ayay oicevay atthay ookshay ethay aultedvay iesskay,
Ethay ingkay insultsyay ethay oddessgay asyay eshay iesflay:
ill“ay ithway Ove’sjay aughterday oodyblay ightsfay agreeyay,
Ethay ieldfay ofyay ombatcay isyay onay enescay orfay eethay:
Ogay, etlay ythay ownyay oftsay exsay employyay ythay arecay,
Ogay, ulllay ethay owardcay, oryay eludeday ethay airfay.
Aughttay ybay isthay okestray enounceray ethay ar’sway alarmsyay,
Andyay earnlay otay embletray atyay ethay amenay ofyay armsyay.”

Ydidestay usthay. Ethay oddessgay, eizedsay ithway eaddray,
Onfusedcay, istractedday, omfray ethay onflictcay edflay.
Otay aidyay erhay, iftsway ethay ingedway Irisyay ewflay,
Aptwray inyay ayay istmay aboveyay ethay arringway ewcray.
Ethay ueenqay ofyay ovelay ithway adedfay armschay eshay oundfay.
Alepay asway erhay eekchay, andyay ividlay ook’dlay ethay oundway.
Otay Arsmay, owhay atsay emoteray, eythay entbay eirthay ayway:
Arfay, onyay ethay eftlay, ithway oudsclay involvedyay ehay aylay;
Esidebay imhay oodstay ishay ancelay, istain’dday ithway oregay,
Andyay, ein’dray ithway oldgay, ishay oamingfay eedsstay eforebay.
Owlay atyay ishay eeknay, eshay egg’dbay ithway eamingstray eyesyay
Erhay other’sbray arcay, otay ountmay ethay istantday iesskay,
Andyay ow’dshay ethay oundway ybay iercefay Ydidestay ivengay,
Ayay ortalmay anmay, owhay aresday encounteryay eavenhay.
Ernstay Arsmay attentiveyay earshay ethay ueenqay omplaincay,
Andyay otay erhay andhay ommitscay ethay oldengay einray;
Eshay ountsmay ethay eatsay, oppress’dyay ithway ilentsay oeway,
Ivendray ybay ethay oddessgay ofyay ethay aintedpay owbay.
Ethay ashlay esoundsray, ethay apidray ariotchay iesflay,
Andyay inyay ayay omentmay alesscay ethay oftylay iesskay:
Eythay opp’dstay ethay arcay, andyay erethay ethay ourserscay oodstay,
Edfay ybay airfay Irisyay ithway ambrosialyay oodfay;
Eforebay erhay othermay, ove’slay ightbray ueenqay appearsyay,
O’erwhelmedyay ithway anguishyay, andyay issolvedday inyay earstay:
Eshay aisedray erhay inyay erhay armsyay, eheldbay erhay eedblay,
Andyay ask’dyay atwhay odgay adhay oughtwray isthay uiltygay eedday?


illustration[ay: ] Enusvay, Oundedway Inyay Ethay Andhay, Onductedcay Ybay Irisyay Otay Arsmay


Enthay eshay: is“thay insultyay omfray onay odgay Iyay oundfay,
Anyay impiousyay ortalmay avegay ethay aringday oundway!
Eholdbay ethay eedday ofyay aughtyhay Iomedday!
as’tway inyay ethay on’ssay efenceday ethay othermay edblay.
Ethay arway ithway Oytray onay oremay ethay Eciansgray ageway;
Utbay ithway ethay odsgay e(thay immortalyay odsgay) engageyay.”

Ioneday enthay: y“thay ongswray ithway atiencepay earbay,
Andyay areshay osethay iefsgray inferioryay owerspay ustmay areshay:
Unnumber’dyay oesway ankindmay omfray usyay ustainsay,
Andyay enmay ithway oesway afflictyay ethay odsgay againyay.
Ethay ightymay Arsmay inyay ortalmay ettersfay oundbay,[149]
Andyay odgedlay inyay azenbray ungeonsday undergroundyay,
Ullfay irteenthay oonsmay imprison’dyay oar’dray inyay ainvay;
Otusyay andyay Ephialtesyay eldhay ethay ainchay:
Erhapspay adhay erish’dpay adhay otnay Ermeshay’ arecay
Estoredray ethay oaninggray odgay otay upperyay airyay.
Eatgray Uno’sjay elfsay ashay ornebay erhay eightway ofyay ainpay,
Ethay imperialyay artnerpay ofyay ethay eavenlyhay eignray;
Amphitryon’syay onsay infix’dyay ethay eadlyday artday,[150]
Andyay ill’dfay ithway anguishyay erhay immortalyay earthay.
E’enyay ell’shay imgray ingkay Alcidesyay’ owerpay onfess’dcay,
Ethay aftshay oundfay entranceyay inyay ishay ironyay eastbray;
Otay Ove’sjay ighhay alacepay orfay ayay urecay ehay edflay,
Iercedpay inyay ishay ownyay ominionsday ofyay ethay eadday;
Erewhay Aeonpay, inklingspray eavenlyhay almbay aroundyay,
Assuagedyay ethay owingglay angspay, andyay osedclay ethay oundway.
Ashray, impiousyay anmay! otay ainstay ethay ess’dblay abodesyay,
Andyay enchdray ishay arrowsyay inyay ethay oodblay ofyay odsgay!


illustration[ay: ] Otusyay Andyay Ephialtesyay Oldinghay Arsmay Aptivecay


ut“bay outhay ough(thay Allaspay urgedyay ythay anticfray eedday),
Osewhay earspay ill-fatedyay akesmay ayay oddessgay eedblay,
Owknay outhay, oe’erwhay ithway eavenlyhay owerpay ontendscay,
Ortshay isyay ishay ateday, andyay oonsay ishay oryglay endsyay;
Omfray ieldsfay ofyay eathday enwhay atelay ehay allshay etireray,
Onay infantyay onyay ishay eesknay allshay allcay imhay iresay.
Ongstray asyay outhay artyay, omesay odgay aymay yetyay ebay oundfay,
Otay etchstray eethay alepay andyay aspinggay onyay ethay oundgray;
Ythay istantday ifeway, Ialéægay ethay airfay,[151]
Artingstay omfray eepslay ithway ayay istractedday airyay,
Allshay ouseray ythay avesslay, andyay erhay ostlay ordlay eploreday,
Ethay avebray, ethay eatgray, ethay oriousglay ownay onay oremay!”

Isthay aidsay, eshay ipedway omfray Enusvay’ oundedway almpay
Ethay acredsay ichoryay, andyay infusedyay ethay almbay.
Unojay andyay Allaspay ithway ayay ilesmay urvey’dsay,
Andyay usthay otay Ovejay eganbay ethay ue-eyedblay aidmay:

ermit“pay ythay aughterday, aciousgray Ovejay! otay elltay
Owhay isthay ischancemay ethay Ypriancay ueenqay efellbay,
Asyay atelay eshay iedtray ithway assionpay otay inflameyay
Ethay endertay osombay ofyay ayay Eciangray ameday;
Alluredyay ethay airfay, ithway ovingmay oughtsthay ofyay oyjay,
Otay uitqay erhay ountrycay orfay omesay youthyay ofyay Oytray;
Ethay aspingclay onezay, ithway oldengay ucklesbay oundbay,
Azedray erhay oftsay andhay ithway isthay amentedlay oundway.”

Ethay iresay ofyay odsgay andyay enmay uperiorsay iledsmay,
Andyay, allingcay Enusvay, usthay address’dyay ishay ildchay:
ot“nay esethay, Oyay aughterday areyay ythay operpray arescay,
Eethay ildermay artsyay efitbay, andyay oftersay arsway;
Eetsway ilessmay areyay inethay, andyay indkay endearingyay armschay;
Otay Arsmay andyay Allaspay eavelay ethay eedsday ofyay armsyay.”

Usthay eythay inyay eavenhay: ilewhay onyay ethay ainplay elowbay
Ethay iercefay Ydidestay argedchay ishay Ardanday oefay,
Ush’dflay ithway elestialcay oodblay ursuedpay ishay ayway,
Andyay earlessfay aredday ethay eateningthray odgay ofyay ayday;
Alreadyyay inyay ishay opeshay ehay awsay imhay ill’dkay,
Oughthay een’dscray ehindbay Apollo’syay ightymay ieldshay.
Icethray ushingray uriousfay, atyay ethay iefchay ehay ookstray;
Ishay azingblay ucklerbay icethray Apolloyay ookshay:
Ehay iedtray ethay ourthfay: enwhay, eakingbray omfray ethay oudclay,
Ayay oremay anthay ortalmay oicevay asway eardhay aloudyay.

o“ay onsay ofyay Ydeustay, easecay! ebay iseway andyay eesay
Owhay astvay ethay ifferenceday ofyay ethay odsgay andyay eethay;
Istanceday immenseyay! etweenbay ethay owerspay atthay ineshay
Aboveyay, eternalyay, eathlessday, andyay ivineday,
Andyay ortalmay anmay! ayay etchwray ofyay umblehay irthbay,
Ayay ort-livedshay eptileray inyay ethay ustday ofyay earthyay.”

Osay okespay ethay odgay owhay artsday elestialcay iresfay:
Ehay eadsdray ishay uryfay, andyay omesay epsstay etiresray.
Enthay Usphœbay orebay ethay iefchay ofyay Enusvay’ aceray
Otay Oy’stray ighhay anefay, andyay otay ishay olyhay aceplay;
Atonalay erethay andyay Oebephay eal’dhay ethay oundway,
Ithway igourvay arm’dyay imhay, andyay ithway oryglay own’dcray.
Isthay oneday, ethay atronpay ofyay ethay ilversay owbay
Ayay antomphay aisedray, ethay amesay inyay apeshay andyay owshay
Ithway eatgray Easænay; uchsay ethay ormfay ehay orebay,
Andyay uchsay inyay ightfay ethay adiantray armsyay ehay oreway.
Aroundyay ethay ectrespay oodyblay arsway areyay agedway,
Andyay Eecegray andyay Oytray ithway ashingclay ieldsshay engagedyay.
Eantimemay onyay Ilion’syay owertay Apolloyay oodstay,
Andyay allingcay Arsmay, usthay urgedyay ethay agingray odgay:

ern“stay owerpay ofyay armsyay, ybay omwhay ethay ightymay allfay;
Owhay athestbay inyay oodblay, andyay akestshay ethay embattledyay allway,
Iseray inyay ythay athwray! otay ell’shay abhorr’dyay abodesyay
Espatchday yonyay Eekgray, andyay indicatevay ethay odsgay.
Irstfay osyray Enusvay eltfay ishay utalbray ageray;
Emay extnay ehay argedchay, andyay aresday allyay eavenhay engageyay:
Ethay etchwray ouldway avebray ighhay eaven’shay immortalyay iresay,
Ishay ipletray underthay, andyay ishay oltsbay ofyay irefay.”

Ethay odgay ofyay attlebay issuesyay onyay ethay ainplay,
Irsstay allyay ethay anksray, andyay iresfay ethay Ojantray aintray;
Inyay ormfay ikelay Acamasyay, ethay Acianthray uidegay,
Enragedyay otay Oy’stray etiringray iefschay ehay iedcray:

ow“hay onglay, yeyay onssay ofyay Iampray! illway yeyay yflay,
Andyay unrevengedyay eesay Iam’spray eoplepay ieday?
Illstay unresistedyay allshay ethay oefay estroyday,
Andyay etchstray ethay aughterslay otay ethay atesgay ofyay Oytray?
Olay, avebray Easænay inkssay eneathbay ishay oundway,
Otnay odlikegay Ectorhay oremay inyay armsyay enown’dray:
Astehay allyay, andyay aketay ethay enerousgay arrior’sway artpay.
Ehay aid;—newsay ouragecay ell’dsway eachyay ero’shay earthay.
Arpedonsay irstfay ishay ardentyay oulsay express’dyay,
Andyay, urn’dtay otay Ectorhay, esethay oldbay ordsway address’dyay:

ay“say, iefchay, isyay allyay ythay ancientyay alourvay ostlay?
Erewhay areyay ythay eatsthray, andyay erewhay ythay oriousglay oastbay,
Atthay opp’dpray aloneyay ybay Iam’spray aceray ouldshay andstay
Oy’stray acredsay allsway, ornay eednay ayay oreignfay andhay?
Ownay, ownay ythay ountrycay allscay erhay ontedway iendsfray,
Andyay ethay oudpray auntvay inyay ustjay erisionday endsyay.
Emoteray eythay andstay ilewhay alienyay oopstray engageyay,
Ikelay emblingtray oundshay eforebay ethay ion’slay ageray.
Arfay istantday encehay Iyay eldhay ymay ideway ommandcay,
Erewhay oamingfay Anthusxay aveslay ethay Ycianlay andlay;
Ithway ampleyay ealthway e(thay ishway ofyay ortalsmay) ess’dblay,
Ayay eauteousbay ifeway, andyay infantyay atyay erhay eastbray;
Ithway osethay Iyay eftlay ateverwhay earday ouldcay ebay:
Eecegray, ifyay eshay onquerscay, othingnay insway omfray emay;
Yetyay irstfay inyay ightfay ymay Ycianlay andsbay Iyay eerchay,
Andyay onglay otay eetmay isthay ightymay anmay yeyay earfay;
Ilewhay Ectorhay idleyay andsstay, ornay idsbay ethay avebray
Eirthay ivesway, eirthay infantsyay, andyay eirthay altarsyay avesay.
Astehay, arriorway, astehay! eservepray ythay eaten’dthray atestay,
Oryay oneyay astvay urstbay ofyay all-involvingyay atefay
Ullfay o’eryay youryay owerstay allshay allfay, andyay eepsway awayyay
Onssay, iressay, andyay ivesway, anyay undistinguish’dyay eypray.
Ouseray allyay ythay Ojanstray, urgeyay ythay aidsyay otay ightfay;
Esethay aimclay ythay oughtsthay ybay ayday, ythay atchway ybay ightnay;
Ithway orcefay incessantyay ethay avebray Eeksgray opposeyay;
Uchsay arescay ythay iendsfray eserveday, andyay uchsay ythay oesfay.”

Ungstay otay ethay earthay ethay enerousgay Ectorhay earshay,
Utbay ustjay eproofray ithway ecentday ilencesay earsbay.
Omfray ishay oudpray arcay ethay incepray impetuousyay ingsspray,
Onyay earthyay ehay eapslay, ishay azenbray armouryay ingsray.
Otway iningshay earsspay areyay andish’dbray inyay ishay andshay;
Usthay arm’dyay, ehay animatesyay ishay oopingdray andsbay,
Evivesray eirthay ardouryay, urnstay eirthay epsstay omfray ightflay,
Andyay akesway anewyay ethay yingday amesflay ofyay ightfay.
Eythay urntay, eythay andstay; ethay Eeksgray eirthay uryfay areday,
Ondensecay eirthay owerspay, andyay aitway ethay owinggray arway.

Asyay enwhay, onyay Erescay’ acredsay oorflay, ethay ainsway
Eadsspray ethay ideway anfay otay earclay ethay oldengay aingray,
Andyay ethay ightlay affchay, eforebay ethay eezesbray ornebay,
Ascendsyay inyay oudsclay omfray offyay ethay eapyhay orncay;
Ethay eygray ustday, isingray ithway ollectedcay indsway,
Ivesdray o’eryay ethay arnbay, andyay itenswhay allyay ethay indshay:
Osay itewhay ithway ustday ethay Eciangray osthay appearsyay,
Omfray amplingtray eedsstay, andyay underingthay arioteerschay.
Ethay uskyday oudsclay omfray abour’dlay earthyay ariseyay,
Andyay ollray inyay okingsmay olumesvay otay ethay iesskay.
Arsmay overshay o’eryay emthay ithway ishay ablesay ieldshay,
Andyay addsyay ewnay orrorshay otay ethay arken’dday ieldfay:
Easedplay ithway ishay argechay, andyay ardentyay otay ulfilfay,
Inyay Oy’stray efenceday, Apollo’syay eavenlyhay illway:
Oonsay asyay omfray ightfay ethay ue-eyedblay aidmay etiresray,
Eachyay Ojantray osombay ithway ewnay armthway ehay iresfay.
Andyay ownay ethay odgay, omfray orthfay ishay acredsay anefay,
Oducedpray Easænay otay ethay outingshay aintray;
