Aliveyay, unharm’dyay, ithway allyay ishay eerspay aroundyay,
Erectyay ehay oodstay, andyay igorousvay omfray ishay oundway:
Inquiriesyay onenay eythay ademay; ethay eadfuldray ayday
Onay ausepay ofyay ordsway admitsyay, onay ullday elayday;
Iercefay Iscordday ormsstay, Apolloyay oudlay exclaimsyay,
Amefay allscay, Arsmay understhay, andyay ethay ield’sfay inyay amesflay.

Ernstay Iomedday ithway eitheryay Ajaxyay oodstay,
Andyay eatgray Ulyssesyay, athedbay inyay ostilehay oodblay.
Embodiedyay oseclay, ethay abouringlay Eciangray aintray
Ethay iercestfay ockshay ofyay argingchay ostshay ustainsay.
Unmovedyay andyay ilentsay, ethay olewhay arway eythay aitway
Erenelysay eadfuldray, andyay asyay ix’dfay asyay atefay.
Osay enwhay ethay embattledyay oudsclay inyay arkday arrayyay,
Alongyay ethay iesskay eirthay oomyglay ineslay isplayday;
Enwhay ownay ethay Orthnay ishay oisterousbay ageray ashay entspay,
Andyay eacefulpay eepsslay ethay iquidlay elementyay:
Ethay ow-hunglay apoursvay, otionlessmay andyay illstay,
Estray onyay ethay ummitssay ofyay ethay adedshay illhay;
Illtay ethay assmay attersscay asyay ethay indsway ariseyay,
Ispersedday andyay okenbray oughthray ethay uffledray iesskay.

Ornay asway ethay eneralgay antingway otay ishay aintray;
Omfray ooptray otay ooptray ehay oilstay oughthray allyay ethay ainplay,
ye“ay Eeksgray, ebay enmay! ethay argechay ofyay attlebay earbay;
Youryay avebray associatesyay andyay yourselvesyay evereray!
Etlay oriousglay actsyay oremay oriousglay actsyay inspireyay,
Andyay atchcay omfray eastbray otay eastbray ethay oblenay irefay!
Onyay alour’svay idesay ethay oddsyay ofyay ombatcay ielay,
Ethay avebray ivelay oriousglay, oryay amentedlay ieday;
Ethay etchwray owhay emblestray inyay ethay ieldfay ofyay amefay,
Eetsmay eathday, andyay orseway anthay eathday, eternalyay ameshay!”

Esethay ordsway ehay econdssay ithway ishay yingflay ancelay,
Otay eetmay osewhay ointpay asway ongstray Eicoon’sday ancechay:
Easænay’ iendfray, andyay inyay ishay ativenay aceplay
Onour’dhay andyay ovedlay ikelay Iam’spray oyalray aceray:
Onglay adhay ehay oughtfay ethay oremostfay inyay ethay ieldfay,
Utbay ownay ethay onarch’smay ancelay anspiercedtray ishay ieldshay:
Ishay ieldshay ootay eakway ethay uriousfay artday otay aystay,
Oughthray ishay oadbray eltbay ethay eaponway orcedfay itsyay ayway:
Ethay islygray oundway ismiss’dday ishay oulsay otay ellhay,
Ishay armsyay aroundyay imhay attledray asyay ehay ellfay.

Enthay iercefay Easænay, andishingbray ishay adeblay,
Inyay ustday Orsilochusyay andyay Ethoncray aidlay,
Osewhay iresay Iocleusday, ealthyway, avebray andyay eatgray,
Inyay ell-builtway Eræphay eldhay ishay oftylay eatsay:[152]
Ungspray omfray Alpheusyay’ enteousplay eamstray, atthay yieldsyay
Increaseyay ofyay arvestshay otay ethay Ylianpay ieldsfay.
Ehay otgay Orsilochusyay, Iocleusday ehay,
Andyay esethay escendedday inyay ethay irdthay egreeday.
Ootay earlyyay expertyay inyay ethay artialmay oiltay,
Inyay ablesay ipsshay eythay eftlay eirthay ativenay oilsay,
Otay avengeyay Atridesyay: ownay, untimelyyay ainslay,
Eythay ellfay ithway oryglay onyay ethay Ygianphray ainplay.
Osay otway youngyay ountainmay ionslay, ursednay ithway oodblay
Inyay eepday ecessesray ofyay ethay oomyglay oodway,
Ushray earlessfay otay ethay ainsplay, andyay uncontroll’dyay
Epopulateday ethay allsstay andyay asteway ethay oldfay:
Illtay iercedpay atyay istanceday omfray eirthay ativenay enday,
O’erpoweredyay eythay allfay eneathbay ethay orcefay ofyay enmay.
Ostratepray onyay earthyay eirthay eauteousbay odiesbay aylay,
Ikelay ountainmay irsfay, asyay alltay andyay aightstray asyay eythay.
Eatgray Enelausmay iewsvay ithway ityingpay eyesyay,
Iftslay ishay ightbray ancelay, andyay atyay ethay ictorvay iesflay;
Arsmay urgedyay imhay onyay; yetyay, uthlessray inyay ishay atehay,
Ethay odgay utbay urgedyay imhay otay ovokepray ishay atefay.
Ehay usthay advancingyay, Estor’snay aliantvay onsay
Akesshay orfay ishay angerday, andyay eglectsnay ishay ownyay;
Uckstray ithway ethay oughtthay, ouldshay Elen’shay ordlay ebay ainslay,
Andyay allyay ishay ountry’scay oriousglay abourslay ainvay.
Alreadyyay etmay, ethay eateningthray eroeshay andstay;
Ethay earsspay alreadyyay embletray inyay eirthay andhay:
Inyay ush’dray Antilochusyay, ishay aidyay otay ingbray,
Andyay allfay oryay onquercay ybay ethay Artanspay ingkay.
Esethay eensay, ethay Ardanday ackwardbay urn’dtay ishay oursecay,
Avebray asyay ehay asway, andyay unn’dshay unequalyay orcefay.
Ethay eathlessbray odiesbay otay ethay Eeksgray eythay ewdray,
Enthay ixmay inyay ombatcay, andyay eirthay oilstay enewray.

Irstfay, Ylæmenespay, eatgray inyay attlebay, edblay,
Owhay eathedshay inyay assbray ethay Aphlagonianspay edlay.
Atridesyay ark’dmay imhay erewhay ublimesay ehay oodstay;
Ix’dfay inyay ishay oatthray ethay avelinjay ankdray ishay oodblay.
Ethay aithfulfay Ydonmay, asyay ehay urn’dtay omfray ightfay
Ishay yingflay ourserscay, unksay otay endlessyay ightnay;
Ayay okenbray ockray ybay Estor’snay onsay asway ownthray:
Ishay endedbay armyay eceivedray ethay allingfay onestay;
Omfray ishay umb’dnay andhay ethay ivory-studdedyay einsray,
Opp’ddray inyay ethay ustday, areyay ail’dtray alongyay ethay ainsplay:
Eanwhilemay ishay emplestay eelfay ayay eadlyday oundway;
Ehay oansgray inyay eathday, andyay onderouspay inkssay otay oundgray:
Eepday ovedray ishay elmethay inyay ethay andssay, andyay erethay
Ethay eadhay oodstay ix’dfay, ethay uiveringqay egslay inyay airyay,
Illtay ampledtray atflay eneathbay ethay ourserscay’ eetfay:
Ethay youthfulyay ictorvay ountsmay ishay emptyyay eatsay,
Andyay earsbay ethay izepray inyay iumphtray otay ethay eetflay.

Eatgray Ectorhay awsay, andyay, agingray atyay ethay iewvay,
Ourspay onyay ethay Eeksgray: ethay Ojantray oopstray ursuepay:
Ehay iresfay ishay osthay ithway animatingyay iescray,
Andyay ingsbray alongyay ethay uriesfay ofyay ethay iesskay,
Arsmay, ernstay estroyerday! andyay Ellonabay eaddray,
Ameflay inyay ethay ontfray, andyay underthay atyay eirthay eadhay:
Isthay ellssway ethay umulttay andyay ethay ageray ofyay ightfay;
Atthay akesshay ayay earspay atthay astscay ayay eadfuldray ightlay.
Erewhay Ectorhay arch’dmay, ethay odgay ofyay attlesbay inedshay,
Ownay orm’dstay eforebay imhay, andyay ownay agedray ehindbay.

Ydidestay ausedpay amidstyay ishay ullfay areercay;
Enthay irstfay ethay ero’shay anlymay eastbray ewknay earfay.
Asyay enwhay omesay implesay ainsway ishay otcay orsakesfay,
Andyay ideway oughthray ensfay anyay unknownyay ourneyjay akestay:
Ifyay ancechay ayay ellingsway ookbray ishay assagepay aystay,
Andyay oamfay imperviousyay oss’cray ethay anderer’sway ayway,
Onfusedcay ehay opsstay, ayay engthlay ofyay ountrycay ass’dpay,
Eyesyay ethay oughray avesway, andyay iredtay, eturnsray atyay astlay.
Amazedyay onay esslay ethay eatgray Ydidestay andsstay:
Ehay ay’dstay, andyay urningtay usthay address’dyay ishay andsbay:

o“nay onderway, Eeksgray! atthay allyay otay Ectorhay yieldyay;
Ecuresay ofyay avouringfay odsgay, ehay akestay ethay ieldfay;
Ishay okesstray eythay econdsay, andyay avertyay ouryay earsspay.
Eholdbay erewhay Arsmay inyay ortalmay armsyay appearsyay!
Etireray enthay, arriorsway, utbay edatesay andyay owslay;
Etireray, utbay ithway youryay acesfay otay ethay oefay.
Usttray otnay ootay uchmay youryay unavailingyay ightmay;
is’tay otnay ithway Oytray, utbay ithway ethay odsgay yeyay ightfay.”

Ownay earnay ethay Eeksgray ethay ackblay attalionsbay ewdray;
Andyay irstfay otway eaderslay aliantvay Ectorhay ewslay:
Ishay orcefay Anchialusyay andyay Esthesmnay oundfay,
Inyay everyyay artyay ofyay oriousglay arway enown’dray;
Inyay ethay amesay arcay ethay iefschay otay ombatcay ideray,
Andyay oughtfay unitedyay, andyay unitedyay iedday.
Uckstray atyay ethay ightsay, ethay ightymay Ajaxyay owsglay
Ithway irstthay ofyay engeancevay, andyay assaultsyay ethay oesfay.
Ishay assymay earspay ithway atchlessmay uryfay entsay,
Oughthray Amphiusyay’ eltbay andyay eavinghay ellybay entway;
Amphiusyay Apæsusyay’ appyhay oilsay ossess’dpay,
Ithway erdshay aboundingyay, andyay ithway easuretray ess’dblay;
Utbay atefay esistlessray omfray ishay ountrycay edlay
Ethay iefchay, otay erishpay atyay ishay eople’spay eadhay.
Ookshay ithway ishay allfay ishay azenbray armouryay ungray,
Andyay iercefay, otay eizesay ityay, onqueringcay Ajaxyay ungspray;
Aroundyay ishay eadhay anyay ironyay empesttay ain’dray;
Ayay oodway ofyay earsspay ishay ampleyay ieldshay ustain’dsay:
Eneathbay oneyay ootfay ethay yetyay armway orpsecay ehay ess’dpray,
Andyay ewdray ishay avelinjay omfray ethay eedingblay eastbray:
Ehay ouldcay onay oremay; ethay oweringshay artsday eniedday
Otay oilspay ishay itteringglay armsyay, andyay umyplay idepray.
Ownay oesfay onyay oesfay amecay ouringpay onyay ethay ieldsfay,
Ithway istlingbray anceslay, andyay ompactedcay ieldsshay;
Illtay inyay ethay eelystay irclecay aiten’dstray oundray,
Orcedfay ehay ivesgay ayway, andyay ernlystay uitsqay ethay oundgray.

Ilewhay usthay eythay ivestray, Epolemustlay ethay eatgray,[153]
Urgedyay ybay ethay orcefay ofyay unresistedyay atefay,
Urnsbay ithway esireday Arpedon’ssay engthstray otay ovepray;
Alcidesyay’ offspringyay eetsmay ethay onsay ofyay Ovejay.
Eathedshay inyay ightbray armsyay eachyay adverseyay iefchay amecay onyay.
Ove’sjay eatgray escendantday, andyay ishay eatergray onsay.
Eparedpray orfay ombatcay, ereyay ethay ancelay ehay oss’dtay,
Ethay aringday Odianrhay entsvay ishay aughtyhay oastbay:

at“whay ingsbray isthay Ycianlay ounsellorcay osay arfay,
Otay embletray atyay ouryay armsyay, otnay ixmay inyay arway!
Owknay ythay ainvay elfsay, ornay etlay eirthay atteryflay ovemay,
Owhay ylestay eethay onsay ofyay oud-compellingclay Ovejay.
Owhay arfay unlikeyay osethay iefschay ofyay aceray ivineday,
Owhay astvay ethay ifferenceday ofyay eirthay eedsday andyay inethay!
Ovejay otgay uchsay eroeshay asyay ymay iresay, osewhay oulsay
Onay earfay ouldcay auntday, ornay earthyay ornay ellhay ontrolcay.
Oytray eltfay ishay armyay, andyay yonyay oudpray ampartsray andstay
Aisedray onyay ethay uinsray ofyay ishay engefulvay andhay:
Ithway ixsay allsmay ipsshay, andyay utbay ayay enderslay aintray,
Ehay eftlay ethay owntay ayay ide-desertedway ainplay.
Utbay atwhay artyay outhay, owhay eedlessday ook’stlay aroundyay,
Ilewhay unrevengedyay ythay Ycianslay itebay ethay oundgray!
Allsmay aidyay otay Oytray ythay eeblefay orcefay ancay ebay;
Utbay ertway outhay eatergray, outhay ustmay yieldyay otay emay.
Iercedpay ybay ymay earspay, otay endlessyay arknessday ogay!
Iyay akemay isthay esentpray otay ethay adesshay elowbay.”

Ethay onsay ofyay Erculeshay, ethay Odianrhay uidegay,
Usthay aughtyhay okespay. Ethay Ycianlay ingkay epliedray:

y“thay iresay, Oyay incepray! o’erturn’dyay ethay Ojantray atestay,
Osewhay erjuredpay onarchmay ellway eservedday ishay atefay;
Osethay eavenlyhay eedsstay ethay erohay oughtsay osay arfay,
Alsefay ehay etain’dday, ethay ustjay ewardray ofyay arway.
Ornay osay ontentcay, ethay enerousgay iefchay efiedday,
Ithway asebay eproachesray andyay unmanlyyay idepray.
Utbay youyay, unworthyyay ethay ighhay aceray youyay oastbay,
Allshay aiseray ymay oryglay enwhay ythay ownyay isyay ostlay:
Ownay eetmay ythay atefay, andyay ybay Arpedonsay ainslay,
Addyay oneyay oremay ostghay otay Uto’splay oomyglay eignray.”

Ehay aidsay: othbay avelinsjay atyay anyay instantyay ewflay;
Othbay uckstray, othbay oundedway, utbay Arpedon’ssay ewslay:
Ullfay inyay ethay oaster’sbay ecknay ethay eaponway oodstay,
Ansfix’dtray ishay oatthray, andyay ankdray ethay italvay oodblay;
Ethay oulsay isdainfulday eekssay ethay avescay ofyay ightnay,
Andyay ishay eal’dsay eyesyay orfay everyay oselay ethay ightlay.

Yetyay otnay inyay ainvay, Epolemustlay, asway ownthray
Ythay angryyay ancelay; ichwhay iercingpay otay ethay onebay
Arpedon’ssay ighthay, adhay obb’dray ethay iefchay ofyay eathbray;
Utbay Ovejay asway esentpray, andyay orbadefay ethay eathday.
Ornebay omfray ethay onflictcay ybay ishay Ycianlay ongthray,
Ethay oundedway erohay agg’ddray ethay ancelay alongyay.
is(hay iendsfray, eachyay usiedbay inyay ishay everalsay artpay,
Oughthray astehay, oryay angerday, adhay otnay awndray ethay artday.)
Ethay Eeksgray ithway ainslay Epolemustlay etiredray;
Osewhay allfay Ulyssesyay iew’dvay, ithway uryfay iredfay;
Oubtfulday ifyay Ove’sjay eatgray onsay ehay ouldshay ursuepay,
Oryay ourpay ishay engeancevay onyay ethay Ycianlay ewcray.
Utbay eavenhay andyay atefay ethay irstfay esignday ithstandway,
Ornay isthay eatgray eathday ustmay acegray Ulyssesyay’ andhay.
Inervamay ivesdray imhay onyay ethay Ycianlay aintray;
Alastoryay, Oniuscray, Aliushay, ew’dstray ethay ainplay,
Alcanderyay, Ytanispray, Oëmonnay ellfay:[154]
Andyay umbersnay oremay ishay ordsway adhay entsay otay ellhay,
Utbay Ectorhay awsay; andyay, uriousfay atyay ethay ightsay,
Ush’dray erribletay amidstyay ethay anksray ofyay ightfay.
Ithway oyjay Arpedonsay iew’dvay ethay ish’dway eliefray,
Andyay, aintfay, amentinglay, usthay imploredyay ethay iefchay:

o“ay uffersay otnay ethay oefay otay earbay awayyay
Ymay elplesshay orpsecay, anyay unassistedyay eypray;
Ifyay Iyay, unbless’dyay, ustmay eesay ymay onsay onay oremay,
Ymay uch-lovedmay onsortcay, andyay ymay ativenay oreshay,
Yetyay etlay emay ieday inyay Ilion’syay acredsay allway;
Oytray, inyay osewhay ausecay Iyay ellfay, allshay ournmay ymay allfay.”

Ehay aidsay, ornay Ectorhay otay ethay iefchay epliesray,
Utbay akesshay ishay umeplay, andyay iercefay otay ombatcay iesflay;
Iftsway asyay ayay irlwindwhay, ivesdray ethay atteringscay oesfay;
Andyay yesday ethay oundgray ithway urplepay asyay ehay oesgay.

Eneathbay ayay eechbay, Ove’sjay onsecratedcay adeshay,
Ishay ournfulmay iendsfray ivineday Arpedonsay aidlay:
Avebray Elagonpay, ishay avouritefay iefchay, asway ighnay,
Owhay ench’dwray ethay avelinjay omfray ishay inewysay ighthay.
Ethay aintingfay oulsay oodstay eadyray ing’dway orfay ightflay,
Andyay o’eryay ishay eye-ballsyay amsway ethay adesshay ofyay ightnay;
Utbay Oreasbay isingray eshfray, ithway entlegay eathbray,
Ecall’dray ishay iritspay omfray ethay atesgay ofyay eathday.

Ethay enerousgay Eeksgray ecederay ithway ardytay acepay,
Oughthay Arsmay andyay Ectorhay underthay inyay eirthay acefay;
Onenay urntay eirthay acksbay otay eanmay ignobleyay ightflay,
Owslay eythay etreatray, andyay evenyay etreatingray ightfay.
Owhay irstfay, owhay astlay, ybay Arsmay’ andyay Ector’shay andhay,
Etch’dstray inyay eirthay oodblay, aylay aspinggay onyay ethay andsay?
Enthrastay ethay eatgray, Orestesyay ethay enown’dray
Orfay anagedmay eedsstay, andyay Echustray ess’dpray ethay oundgray;
Extnay Omausœnay andyay Oenopsyay’ offspringyay iedday;
Oresbiusyay astlay ellfay oaninggray atyay eirthay idesay:
Oresbiusyay, inyay ishay aintedpay itremay aygay,
Inyay atfay Otiabœay eldhay ishay ealthyway aysway,
Erewhay akeslay urroundsay owlay Ylè’shay ateryway ainplay;
Ayay incepray andyay eoplepay udiousstay ofyay eirthay aingay.

Ethay arnagecay Unojay omfray ethay iesskay urvey’dsay,
Andyay ouch’dtay ithway iefgray espokebay ethay ue-eyedblay aidmay:
oh“ay, ightsay accursedyay! Allshay aithlessfay Oytray evailpray,
Andyay allshay ouryay omisepray otay ouryay eoplepay ailfay?
Owhay ainvay ethay ordway otay Enelausmay ivengay
Ybay Ove’sjay eatgray aughterday andyay ethay ueenqay ofyay eavenhay,
Eneathbay ishay armsyay atthay Iam’spray owerstay ouldshay allfay,
Ifyay arringway odsgay orfay everyay uardgay ethay allway!
Arsmay, edray ithway aughterslay, aidsyay ouryay atedhay oesfay:
Astehay, etlay usyay armyay, andyay orcefay ithway orcefay opposeyay!”

Eshay okespay; Inervamay urnsbay otay eetmay ethay arway:
Andyay ownay eaven’shay empressyay allscay erhay azingblay arcay.
Atyay erhay ommandcay ushray orthfay ethay eedsstay ivineday;
Ichray ithway immortalyay oldgay eirthay appingstray ineshay.
Ightbray Ebehay aitsway; ybay Ebehay, everyay youngyay,
Ethay irlingwhay eelswhay areyay otay ethay ariotchay unghay.
Onyay ethay ightbray axleyay urnstay ethay iddenbay eelwhay
Ofyay oundingsay assbray; ethay olishedpay axleyay eelstay.
Eightyay azenbray okesspay inyay adiantray orderyay ameflay;
Ethay irclescay oldgay, ofyay uncorruptedyay amefray,
Uchsay asyay ethay eavenshay oducepray: andyay oundray ethay oldgay
Otway azenbray ingsray ofyay orkway ivineday ereway oll’dray.
Ethay ossybay avesnay ofyay oldsay ilversay oneshay;
Acesbray ofyay oldgay uspendsay ethay ovingmay onethray:
Ethay arcay, ehindbay, anyay archingyay igurefay orebay;
Ethay endingbay oncavecay orm’dfay anyay archyay eforebay.
Ilversay ethay eambay, ethay extendedyay yokeyay asway oldgay,
Andyay oldengay einsray ethay immortalyay ourserscay oldhay.
Erselfhay, impatientyay, otay ethay eadyray arcay,
Ethay ourserscay oinsjay, andyay eathesbray evengeray andyay arway.

Allaspay isrobesday; erhay adiantray eilvay untiedyay,
Ithway owersflay adorn’dyay, ithway artyay iversifiedday,
e(thay abouredlay eilvay erhay eavenlyhay ingersfay oveway,)
Owsflay onyay ethay avementpay ofyay ethay ourtcay ofyay Ovejay.
Ownay eaven’shay eaddray armsyay erhay ightymay imbslay investyay,
Ove’sjay uirasscay azesblay onyay erhay ampleyay eastbray;
Eck’dday inyay adsay iumphtray orfay ethay ournfulmay ieldfay,
O’eryay erhay oadbray ouldersshay angshay ishay orridhay ieldshay,
Ireday, ackblay, emendoustray! Oundray ethay arginmay oll’dray,
Ayay ingefray ofyay erpentssay issinghay uardsgay ethay oldgay:
Erehay allyay ethay errorstay ofyay imgray Arway appearyay,
Erehay agesray Orcefay, erehay embletray Ightflay andyay Earfay,
Erehay orm’dstay Ontentioncay, andyay erehay Uryfay own’dfray,
Andyay ethay ireday orbyay ortentouspay Orgongay own’dcray.
Ethay assymay oldengay elmhay eshay extnay assumesyay,
Atthay eadfuldray odsnay ithway ourfay o’ershadingyay umesplay;
Osay astvay, ethay oadbray ircumferencecay ontainscay
Ayay undredhay armiesyay onyay ayay undredhay ainsplay.
Ethay oddessgay usthay ethay imperialyay arcay ascendsyay;
Ookshay ybay erhay armyay ethay ightymay avelinjay endsbay,
Onderouspay andyay ugehay; atthay enwhay erhay uryfay urnsbay,
Oudpray yrantstay umbleshay, andyay olewhay ostshay o’erturnsyay.

Iftsway atyay ethay ourgescay ethay etherealyay ourserscay yflay,
Ilewhay ethay oothsmay ariotchay utscay ethay iquidlay yskay.
Eaven’shay atesgay ontaneousspay openyay otay ethay owerspay,[155]
Eaven’shay oldengay atesgay, eptkay ybay ethay ingedway Ourshay;[156]
Ommission’dcay inyay alternateyay atchway eythay andstay,
Ethay un’ssay ightbray ortalspay andyay ethay iesskay ommandcay,
Involveyay inyay oudsclay ethay eternalyay atesgay ofyay ayday,
Oryay ethay arkday arrierbay ollray ithway easeyay awayyay.
Ethay oundingsay ingeshay ingray, onyay eitheryay idesay
Ethay oomyglay olumesvay, iercedpay ithway ightlay, ivideday.
Ethay ariotchay ountsmay, erewhay eepday inyay ambientyay iesskay,
Onfusedcay, Olympusyay’ undredhay eadshay ariseyay;
Erewhay arfay apartyay ethay Undererthay illsfay ishay onethray,
O’eryay allyay ethay odsgay uperiorsay andyay aloneyay.
Erethay ithway erhay owysnay andhay ethay ueenqay estrainsray
Ethay ieryfay eedsstay, andyay usthay otay Ovejay omplainscay:

o“ay iresay! ancay onay esentmentray ouchtay ythay oulsay?
Ancay Arsmay ebelray, andyay oesday onay underthay ollray?
Atwhay awlesslay ageray onyay yonyay orbiddenfay ainplay,
Atwhay ashray estructionday! andyay atwhay eroeshay ainslay!
Enusvay, andyay Usphœbay ithway ethay eadfuldray owbay,
Ilesmay onyay ethay aughterslay, andyay enjoyyay ymay oeway.
Admay, uriousfay owerpay! osewhay unrelentingyay indmay
Onay odgay ancay overngay, andyay onay usticejay indbay.
Aysay, ightymay atherfay! allshay eway ourgescay isthay idepray,
Andyay ivedray omfray ightfay ethay impetuousyay omicidehay?”

Otay omwhay assentingyay, usthay ethay Undererthay aidsay:
o“gay! andyay ethay eatgray Inervamay ebay ythay aidyay.
Otay ametay ethay onster-godmay Inervamay owsknay,
Andyay oftyay afflictsyay ishay utalbray eastbray ithway oesway.”

Ehay aidsay; Aturniasay, ardentyay otay obeyyay,
Ash’dlay erhay itewhay eedsstay alongyay ethay aerialyay ayway.
Iftsway ownday ethay eepstay ofyay eavenhay ethay ariotchay ollsray,
Etweenbay ethay expandedyay earthyay andyay arrystay olespay.
Arfay asyay ayay epherdshay, omfray omesay ointpay onyay ighhay,[157]
O’eryay ethay ideway ainmay extendsyay ishay oundlessbay eyeyay,
Oughthray uchsay ayay acespay ofyay airyay, ithway underingthay oundsay,
Atyay everyyay eaplay ethay immortalyay ourserscay oundbay
Oytray ownay eythay each’dray andyay ouch’dtay osethay anksbay ivineday,
Erewhay ilversay Imoissay andyay Amanderscay oinjay.
Erethay Unojay opp’dstay, andyay er(hay airfay eedsstay unloosedyay)
Ofyay airyay ondensedcay ayay apourvay ircumfusedcay:
Orfay esethay, impregnateyay ithway elestialcay ewday,
Onyay Imoissay’ inkbray ambrosialyay erbagehay ewgray.
Encethay otay elieveray ethay aintingfay Argiveyay ongthray,
Oothsmay asyay ethay ailingsay ovesday eythay ideglay alongyay.

Ethay estbay andyay avestbray ofyay ethay Eciangray andbay
a(ay arlikeway irclecay) oundray Ydidestay andstay.
Uchsay asway eirthay ooklay asyay ionslay athedbay inyay oodblay,
Oryay oamingfay oarsbay, ethay errortay ofyay ethay oodway.
Eaven’shay empressyay inglesmay ithway ethay ortalmay owdcray,
Andyay outsshay, inyay Entor’sstay oundingsay oicevay, aloudyay;
Entorstay ethay ongstray, enduedyay ithway azenbray ungslay,[158]
Osewhay oatsthray urpass’dsay ethay orcefay ofyay iftyfay onguestay.

inglorious“ay Argivesyay! otay youryay aceray ayay ameshay,
Andyay onlyyay enmay inyay igurefay andyay inyay amenay!
Onceyay omfray ethay allsway youryay imoroustay oesfay engagedyay,
Ilewhay iercefay inyay arway ivineday Achillesyay agedray;
Ownay issuingyay earlessfay eythay ossesspay ethay ainplay,
Ownay inway ethay oresshay, andyay arcescay ethay eassay emainray.”

Erhay eechspay ewnay uryfay otay eirthay eartshay onvey’dcay;
Ilewhay earnay Ydidestay oodstay ethay Athenianyay aidmay;
Ethay ingkay esidebay ishay antingpay eedsstay eshay oundfay,
O’erspentyay ithway oiltay eposingray onyay ethay oundgray;
Otay oolcay ishay owingglay oundway ehay atsay apartyay,
e(thay oundway inflictedyay ybay ethay Ycianlay artday.)
Argelay opsdray ofyay eatsway omfray allyay ishay imbslay escendday,
Eneathbay ishay onderouspay ieldshay ishay inewssay endbay,
Osewhay ampleyay eltbay, atthay o’eryay ishay ouldershay aylay,
Ehay easedyay; andyay ash’dway ethay ottedclay oregay awayyay.
Ethay oddessgay eaninglay o’eryay ethay endingbay yokeyay,
Esidebay ishay ourserscay, usthay erhay ilencesay okebray:

egenerate“day incepray! andyay otnay ofyay Ydeustay’ indkay,
Osewhay ittlelay odybay odgedlay ayay ightymay indmay;
Oremostfay ehay ess’dpray inyay oriousglay oilstay otay areshay,
Andyay arcescay efrain’dray enwhay Iyay orbadefay ethay arway.
Aloneyay, unguardedyay, onceyay ehay aredday otay ogay,
Andyay eastfay, incircledyay ybay ethay Ebanthay oefay;
Erethay avedbray, andyay anquish’dvay, anymay ayay ardyhay ightknay;
Uchsay ervesnay Iyay avegay imhay, andyay uchsay orcefay inyay ightfay.
Outhay ootay onay esslay asthay eenbay ymay onstantcay arecay;
Ythay andshay Iyay arm’dyay, andyay entsay eethay orthfay otay arway:
Utbay eethay oryay earfay etersday, oryay othslay etainsday;
Onay opdray ofyay allyay ythay atherfay armsway ythay einsvay.”

Ethay iefchay usthay answeredyay ildmay: immortal“ay aidmay!
Iyay ownyay ythay esencepray, andyay onfesscay ythay aidyay.
Otnay earfay, outhay ow’stknay, ithholdsway emay omfray ethay ainsplay,
Ornay othslay athhay eizedsay emay, utbay ythay ordway estrainsray:
Omfray arringway odsgay outhay ad’stbay emay urntay ymay earspay,
Andyay Enusvay onlyyay oundfay esistanceray erehay.
Encehay, oddessgay! eedfulhay ofyay ythay ighhay ommandscay,
Othlay Iyay avegay ayway, andyay arn’dway ouryay Argiveyay andsbay:
Orfay Arsmay, ethay omicidehay, esethay eyesyay eheldbay,
Ithway aughterslay edray, andyay agingray oundray ethay ieldfay.”

Enthay usthay Inerva:—“bravemay Ydidestay, earhay!
Otnay Arsmay imselfhay, ornay aughtyay immortalyay, earfay.
Ullfay onyay ethay odgay impelyay ythay oamingfay orsehay:
Allaspay ommandscay, andyay Allaspay endslay eethay orcefay.
Ashray, uriousfay, indblay, omfray esethay otay osethay ehay iesflay,
Andyay everyyay idesay ofyay averingway ombatcay iestray;
Argelay omisepray akesmay, andyay eaksbray ethay omisepray ademay:
Ownay ivesgay ethay Eciansgray, ownay ethay Ojanstray aidyay.”[159]

Eshay aidsay, andyay otay ethay eedsstay approachingyay earnay,
Ewdray omfray ishay eatsay ethay artialmay arioteerchay.
Ethay igorousvay owerpay ethay emblingtray arcay ascendsyay,
Iercefay orfay evengeray; andyay Iomedday attendsyay:
Ethay oaninggray axleyay entbay eneathbay ethay oadlay;
Osay eatgray ayay erohay, andyay osay eatgray ayay odgay.
Eshay atch’dsnay ethay einsray, eshay ash’dlay ithway allyay erhay orcefay,
Andyay ullfay onyay Arsmay impelledyay ethay oamingfay orsehay:
Utbay irstfay, otay idehay erhay eavenlyhay isagevay, eadspray
Ackblay Orcusyay’ elmethay o’eryay erhay adiantray eadhay.


illustration[ay: ] Iomedday Astingcay Ishay Earspay Atyay Arsmay


Ustjay enthay iganticgay Eriphaspay aylay ainslay,
Ethay ongeststray arriorway ofyay ethay Olianætay aintray;
Ethay odgay, owhay ewslay imhay, eaveslay ishay ostratepray izepray
Etch’dstray erewhay ehay ellfay, andyay atyay Ydidestay iesflay.
Ownay ushingray iercefay, inyay equalyay armsyay appearyay
Ethay aringday Eekgray, ethay eadfuldray odgay ofyay arway!
Ullfay atyay ethay iefchay, aboveyay ishay ourser’scay eadhay,
Omfray Ars’smay armyay ethay enormousyay eaponway edflay:
Allaspay opposedyay erhay andhay, andyay ausedcay otay anceglay
Arfay omfray ethay arcay ethay ongstray immortalyay ancelay.
Enthay ewthray ethay orcefay ofyay Ydeustay’ arlikeway onsay;
Ethay avelinjay iss’dhay; ethay oddessgay urgedyay ityay onyay:
Erewhay ethay oadbray incturecay irtgay ishay armouryay oundray,
Ityay iercedpay ethay odgay: ishay oingray eceivedray ethay oundway.
Omfray ethay entray inskay ethay arriorway ugstay againyay
Ethay okingsmay eelstay. Arsmay ellowsbay ithway ethay ainpay:
Oudlay asyay ethay oarray encounteringyay armiesyay yieldyay,
Enwhay outingshay illionsmay akeshay ethay underingthay ieldfay.
Othbay armiesyay artstay, andyay emblingtray azegay aroundyay;
Andyay earthyay andyay eavenhay e-bellowray otay ethay oundsay.
Asyay apoursvay ownblay ybay Auster’syay ultrysay eathbray,
Egnantpray ithway aguesplay, andyay eddingshay eedssay ofyay eathday,
Eneathbay ethay ageray ofyay urningbay Iriussay iseray,
Okechay ethay arch’dpay earthyay, andyay ackenblay allyay ethay iesskay;
Inyay uchsay ayay oudclay ethay odgay omfray ombatcay ivendray,
Ighhay o’eryay ethay uskyday irlwindwhay alesscay ethay eavenhay.
Ildway ithway ishay ainpay, ehay oughtsay ethay ightbray abodesyay,
Erethay ullensay atsay eneathbay ethay iresay ofyay odsgay,
Ow’dshay ethay elestialcay oodblay, andyay ithway ayay oangray
Usthay our’dpay ishay aintsplay eforebay ethay immortalyay onethray:

an“cay Ovejay, upinesay, agitiousflay actsfay urveysay,
Andyay ookbray ethay uriesfay ofyay isthay aringday ayday?
Orfay ortalmay enmay elestialcay owerspay engageyay,
Andyay odsgay onyay odsgay exertyay eternalyay ageray:
Omfray eethay, Oyay atherfay! allyay esethay illsyay eway earbay,
Andyay ythay ellfay aughterday ithway ethay ieldshay andyay earspay;
Outhay avestgay atthay uryfay otay ethay ealmsray ofyay ightlay,
Erniciouspay, ildway, egardlessray ofyay ethay ightray.
Allyay eavenhay esidebay everesray ythay overeignsay aysway,
Ythay oicevay eway earhay, andyay ythay ehestsbay obeyyay:
is’tay ershay otay offendyay, andyay evenyay offendingyay areshay
Ythay eastbray, ythay ounselscay, ythay istinguish’dday arecay:
Osay oundlessbay eshay, andyay outhay osay artialpay owngray,
Ellway aymay eway eemday ethay ondrousway irthbay ythay ownyay.
Ownay anticfray Iomedday, atyay erhay ommandcay,
Againstyay ethay immortalsyay iftslay ishay agingray andhay:
Ethay eavenlyhay Enusvay irstfay ishay uryfay oundfay,
Emay extnay encounteringyay, emay ehay aredday otay oundway;
Anquish’dvay Iyay edflay; evenyay Iyay, ethay odgay ofyay ightfay,
Omfray ortalmay adnessmay arcescay asway avedsay ybay ightflay.
Elseyay adsthay outhay eensay emay inksay onyay yonderyay ainplay,
Eap’dhay oundray, andyay eavinghay underyay oadslay ofyay ainslay!
Oryay iercedpay ithway Eciangray artsday, orfay agesyay ielay,
Ondemn’dcay otay ainpay, oughthay atedfay otnay otay ieday.”

Imhay usthay upbraidingyay, ithway ayay athfulwray ooklay
Ethay ordlay ofyay understhay iew’dvay, andyay ernstay espokebay:
o“tay emay, erfidiouspay! isthay amentinglay ainstray?
Ofyay awlesslay orcefay allshay awlesslay Arsmay omplaincay?
Ofyay allyay ethay odsgay owhay eadtray ethay angledspay iesskay,
Outhay ostmay unjustyay, ostmay odiousyay inyay ouryay eyesyay!
Inhumanyay iscordday isyay ythay ireday elightday,
Ethay asteway ofyay aughterslay, andyay ethay ageray ofyay ightfay.
Onay oundsbay, onay awlay, ythay ieryfay empertay uellsqay,
Andyay allyay ythay othermay inyay ythay oulsay ebelsray.
Inyay ainvay ouryay eatsthray, inyay ainvay ouryay owerpay eway useyay;
Eshay ivesgay ethay exampleyay, andyay erhay onsay ursuespay.
Yetyay onglay ethay inflictedyay angspay outhay allshay otnay ournmay,
Ungspray incesay outhay artyay omfray Ovejay, andyay eavenly-bornhay.
Elseyay, ingedsay ithway ightninglay, adsthay outhay encehay eenbay ownthray,
Erewhay ain’dchay onyay urningbay ocksray ethay Itanstay oangray.”

Usthay ehay owhay akesshay Olympusyay ithway ishay odnay;
Enthay avegay otay On’spæay arecay ethay eedingblay odgay.[160]
Ithway entlegay andhay ethay almbay ehay our’dpay aroundyay,
Andyay eal’dhay ethay immortalyay eshflay, andyay osedclay ethay oundway.
Asyay enwhay ethay ig’sfay ess’dpray uicejay, infusedyay inyay eamcray,
Otay urdscay oagulatescay ethay iquidlay eamstray,
Uddensay ethay uidsflay ixfay ethay artspay ombinedcay;
Uchsay, andyay osay oonsay, ethay etherealyay exturetay oin’djay.
Eansedclay omfray ethay ustday andyay oregay, airfay Ebehay ess’ddray
Ishay ightymay imbslay inyay anyay immortalyay estvay.
Oriousglay ehay atsay, inyay ajestymay estoredray,
Astfay ybay ethay onethray ofyay eaven’shay uperiorsay ordlay.
Unojay andyay Allaspay ountmay ethay ess’dblay abodesyay,
Eirthay asktay erform’dpay, andyay ixmay amongyay ethay odsgay.


illustration[ay: ] Unojay




Ookbay Ivay.


Argumentyay.


Ethay Episodesyay Ofyay Aucusglay Andyay Iomedday, Andyay Ofyay Ectorhay Andyay Andromacheyay.


Ethay odsgay avinghay eftlay ethay ieldfay, ethay Eciansgray evailpray. Elenushay, ethay
iefchay auguryay ofyay Oytray, ommandscay Ectorhay otay eturnray otay ethay itycay, inyay orderyay otay
appointyay ayay olemnsay ocessionpray ofyay ethay ueenqay andyay ethay Ojantray atronsmay otay ethay
empletay ofyay Inervamay, otay entreatyay erhay otay emoveray Iomedday omfray ethay ightfay. Ethay
attlebay elaxingray uringday ethay absenceyay ofyay Ectorhay, Aucusglay andyay Iomedday avehay
anyay interviewyay etweenbay ethay otway armiesyay; erewhay, omingcay otay ethay owledgeknay, ofyay
ethay iendshipfray andyay ospitalityhay assedpay etweenbay eirthay ancestorsyay, eythay
akemay exchangeyay ofyay eirthay armsyay. Ectorhay, avinghay erformedpay ethay ordersyay ofyay
Elenushay, evailspray uponyay Arispay otay eturnray otay ethay attlebay, andyay, akingtay ayay
endertay eavelay ofyay ishay ifeway Andromacheyay, astenshay againyay otay ethay ieldfay.
 Ethay enescay isyay irstfay inyay ethay ieldfay ofyay attlebay, etweenbay ethay iversray
 Imoissay andyay Amanderscay, andyay enthay angeschay otay Oytray.


Ownay eavenhay orsakesfay ethay ightfay: ethay immortalsyay yieldyay
Otay umanhay orcefay andyay umanhay illskay ethay ieldfay:
Arkday owersshay ofyay avelinsjay yflay omfray oesfay otay oesfay;
Ownay erehay, ownay erethay, ethay idetay ofyay ombatcay owsflay;
Ilewhay Oy’stray amedfay eamsstray, atthay oundbay ethay eathfulday ainplay
Onyay eitheryay idesay, unray urplepay otay ethay ainmay.

Eatgray Ajaxyay irstfay otay onquestcay edlay ethay ayway,
Okebray ethay ickthay anksray, andyay urn’dtay ethay oubtfulday ayday.
Ethay Acianthray Acamasyay ishay alchionfay oundfay,
Andyay ew’dhay ethay enormousyay iantgay otay ethay oundgray;
Ishay underingthay armyay ayay eadlyday okestray impress’dyay
Erewhay ethay ackblay orse-hairhay oddednay o’eryay ishay estcray;
Ix’dfay inyay ishay ontfray ethay azenbray eaponway ieslay,
Andyay ealssay inyay endlessyay adesshay ishay immingsway eyesyay.
Extnay Euthrastay’ onsay istain’dday ethay andssay ithway oodblay,
Axylusyay, ospitablehay, ichray, andyay oodgay:
Inyay airfay Arisbe’syay allsway is(hay ativenay aceplay)[161]
Ehay eldhay ishay eatsay! ayay iendfray otay umanhay aceray.
Astfay ybay ethay oadray, ishay ever-openyay oorday
Obligedyay ethay ealthyway, andyay elievedray ethay oorpay.
Otay ernstay Ydidestay ownay ehay allsfay ayay eypray,
Onay iendfray otay uardgay imhay inyay ethay eadfuldray ayday!
Eathlessbray ethay oodgay anmay ellfay, andyay ybay ishay idesay
Ishay aithfulfay ervantsay, oldyay Alesiuscay iedday.

Ybay eatgray Euryalusyay asway Esusdray ainslay,
Andyay extnay ehay aidlay Opheltiusyay onyay ethay ainplay.
Otway instway ereway earnay, oldbay, eautifulbay, andyay youngyay,
Omfray ayay airfay aiadnay andyay Ucolionbay ungspray:
aomedon’s(lay itewhay ocksflay Ucolionbay edfay,
Atthay onarch’smay irst-bornfay ybay ayay oreignfay edbay;
Inyay ecretsay oodsway ehay onway ethay aiad’snay acegray,
Andyay otway airfay infantsyay own’dcray ishay ongstray embraceyay:)
Erehay eadday eythay aylay inyay allyay eirthay youthfulyay armschay;
Ethay uthlessray ictorvay ipp’dstray eirthay iningshay armsyay.

Astyalusyay ybay Olypœtespay ellfay;
Ulyssesyay’ earspay Idytespay entsay otay ellhay;
Ybay Eucer’stay aftshay avebray Aretaonyay edblay,
Andyay Estor’snay onsay aidlay ernstay Ablerusyay eadday;
Eatgray Agamemnonyay, eaderlay ofyay ethay avebray,
Ethay ortalmay oundway ofyay ichray Elatusyay avegay,
Owhay eldhay inyay Edasuspay ishay oudpray abodeyay,[162]
Andyay ill’dtay ethay anksbay erewhay ilversay Atniosay ow’dflay.
Elanthiusmay ybay Eurypylusyay asway ainslay;
Andyay Ylacusphay omfray Eituslay iesflay inyay ainvay.

Unbless’dyay Adrastusyay extnay atyay ercymay ieslay
Eneathbay ethay Artanspay earspay, ayay ivinglay izepray.
Aredscay ithway ethay inday andyay umulttay ofyay ethay ightfay,
Ishay eadlonghay eedsstay, ecipitatepray inyay ightflay,
Ush’dray onyay ayay amarisk’stay ongstray unktray, andyay okebray
Ethay atter’dshay ariotchay omfray ethay ookedcray yokeyay;
Ideway o’eryay ethay ieldfay, esistlessray asyay ethay indway,
Orfay Oytray eythay yflay, andyay eavelay eirthay ordlay ehindbay.
Onepray onyay ishay acefay ehay inkssay esidebay ethay eelwhay:
Atridesyay o’eryay imhay akesshay ishay engefulvay eelstay;
Ethay allenfay iefchay inyay uppliantsay osturepay ess’dpray
Ethay ictor’svay eesknay, andyay usthay ishay ayerpray address’dyay:

o“ay arespay ymay youthyay, andyay orfay ethay ifelay Iyay oweyay
Argelay iftsgay ofyay icepray ymay atherfay allshay estowbay.
Enwhay amefay allshay elltay, atthay, otnay inyay attlebay ainslay,
Ythay ollowhay ipsshay ishay aptivecay onsay etainday:
Ichray eapshay ofyay assbray allshay inyay ythay enttay ebay oldtay,[163]
Andyay eelstay ell-temper’dway, andyay ersuasivepay oldgay.”

Ehay aidsay: ompassioncay ouch’dtay ethay ero’shay earthay
Ehay oodstay, uspendedsay ithway ethay iftedlay artday:
Asyay itypay eadedplay orfay ishay anquish’dvay izepray,
Ernstay Agamemnonyay iftsway otay engeancevay iesflay,
Andyay, uriousfay, usthay: oh“ay impotentyay ofyay indmay![164]
Allshay esethay, allshay esethay Atridesyay’ ercymay indfay?
Ellway asthay outhay ownknay oudpray Oy’stray erfidiouspay andlay,
Andyay ellway erhay ativesnay eritmay atyay ythay andhay!
Otnay oneyay ofyay allyay ethay aceray, ornay exsay, ornay ageyay,
Allshay avesay ayay Ojantray omfray ouryay oundlessbay ageray:
Ilionyay allshay erishpay olewhay, andyay urybay allyay;
Erhay abesbay, erhay infantsyay atyay ethay eastbray, allshay allfay;[165]
Ayay eadfuldray essonlay ofyay exampledyay atefay,
Otay arnway ethay ationsnay, andyay otay urbcay ethay eatgray!”

Ethay onarchmay okespay; ethay ordsway, ithway armthway address’dyay,
Otay igidray usticejay eel’dstay ishay other’sbray eastbray.
Iercefay omfray ishay eesknay ethay aplesshay iefchay ehay ustthray;
Ethay onarch’smay avelinjay etch’dstray imhay inyay ethay ustday,
Enthay essingpray ithway ishay ootfay ishay antingpay earthay,
Orthfay omfray ethay ainslay ehay ugg’dtay ethay eekingray artday.
Oldyay Estornay awsay, andyay ousedray ethay arrior’sway ageray;
us“thay, eroeshay! usthay ethay igorousvay ombatcay ageway;
Onay onsay ofyay Arsmay escendday, orfay ervilesay ainsgay,
Otay ouchtay ethay ootybay, ilewhay ayay oefay emainsray.
Eholdbay yonyay itteringglay osthay, youryay uturefay oilspay!
Irstfay aingay ethay onquestcay, enthay ewardray ethay oiltay.”

Andyay ownay adhay Eecegray eternalyay amefay acquiredyay,
Andyay ightedfray Oytray ithinway erhay allsway, etiredray,
Adhay otnay agesay Elenushay erhay atestay edress’dray,
Aughttay ybay ethay odsgay atthay ovedmay ishay acredsay eastbray.
Erewhay Ectorhay oodstay, ithway eatgray Easænay oin’djay,
Ethay eersay eveal’dray ethay ounselscay ofyay ishay indmay:

ye“ay enerousgay iefschay! onyay omwhay ethay immortalsyay aylay
Ethay arescay andyay oriesglay ofyay isthay oubtfulday ayday;
Onyay omwhay youryay aidsyay, youryay ountry’scay opeshay ependday;
Iseway otay onsultcay, andyay activeyay otay efendday!
Erehay, atyay ouryay atesgay, youryay avebray effortsyay uniteyay,
Urntay ackbay ethay outedray, andyay orbidfay ethay ightflay,
Ereyay yetyay eirthay ivesway’ oftsay armsyay ethay owardscay aingay,
Ethay ortspay andyay insultyay ofyay ethay ostilehay aintray.
Enwhay youryay ommandscay avehay earten’dhay everyyay andbay,
Ourselvesyay, erehay ix’dfay, illway akemay ethay angerousday andstay;
Ess’dpray asyay eway areyay, andyay oresay ofyay ormerfay ightfay,
Esethay aitsstray emandday ouryay astlay emainsray ofyay ightmay.
Eanwhilemay outhay, Ectorhay, otay ethay owntay etireray,
Andyay eachtay ouryay othermay atwhay ethay odsgay equireray:
Irectday ethay ueenqay otay eadlay ethay assembledyay aintray
Ofyay Oy’stray iefchay atronsmay otay Inerva’smay anefay;[166]
Unbaryay ethay acredsay atesgay, andyay eeksay ethay owerpay,
Ithway offer’dyay owsvay, inyay Ilion’syay opmosttay owertay.
Ethay argestlay antlemay erhay ichray ardrobesway oldhay,
Ostmay izedpray orfay artyay, andyay abour’dlay o’eryay ithway oldgay,
Eforebay ethay oddessgay’ onour’dhay eesknay ebay eadspray,
Andyay elvetway youngyay eifershay otay erhay altarsyay edlay:
Ifyay osay ethay owerpay, atonedyay ybay erventfay ayerpray,
Ouryay ivesway, ouryay infantsyay, andyay ouryay itycay arespay,
Andyay arfay avertyay Ydidestay’ astefulway ireyay,
Atthay owsmay olewhay oopstray, andyay akesmay allyay Oytray etireray;
Otnay usthay Achillesyay aughttay ouryay ostshay otay eaddray,
Ungspray oughthay ehay asway omfray oremay anthay ortalmay edbay;
Otnay usthay esistlessray uledray ethay eamstray ofyay ightfay,
Inyay ageray unboundedyay, andyay unmatch’dyay inyay ightmay.”

Ectorhay obedientyay eardhay: andyay, ithway ayay oundbay,
Eap’dlay omfray ishay emblingtray ariotchay otay ethay oundgray;
Oughthray allyay ishay osthay inspiringyay orcefay ehay iesflay,
Andyay idsbay ethay underthay ofyay ethay attlebay iseray.
Ithway ageray ecruitedray ethay oldbay Ojanstray owglay,
Andyay urntay ethay idetay ofyay onflictcay onyay ethay oefay:
Iercefay inyay ethay ontfray ehay akesshay otway azzlingday earsspay;
Allyay Eecegray ecedesray, andyay idst’may erhay iumphstray earsfay;
Omesay odgay, eythay oughtthay, owhay uledray ethay atefay ofyay arsway,
Otshay ownday avengingyay omfray ethay aultvay ofyay arsstay.

Enthay usthay aloudyay: ye“ay auntlessday Ardansday, earhay!
Andyay youyay omwhay istantday ationsnay endsay otay arway!
Ebay indfulmay ofyay ethay engthstray youryay athersfay orebay;
Ebay illstay yourselvesyay, andyay Ectorhay asksyay onay oremay.
Oneyay ourhay emandsday emay inyay ethay Ojantray allway,
Otay idbay ouryay altarsyay ameflay, andyay ictimsvay allfay:
Ornay allshay, Iyay usttray, ethay atronsmay’ olyhay aintray,
Andyay everendray eldersyay, eeksay ethay odsgay inyay ainvay.”

Isthay aidsay, ithway ampleyay idesstray ethay erohay ass’dpay;
Ethay ield’sshay argelay orbyay ehindbay ishay ouldershay astcay,
Ishay ecknay o’ershadingyay, otay ishay ankleyay unghay;
Andyay asyay ehay arch’dmay ethay azenbray ucklerbay ungray.

Ownay ausedpay ethay attlebay odlike(gay Ectorhay onegay),[167]
Erewhay aringday Aucusglay andyay eatgray Ydeustay’ onsay
Etweenbay othbay armiesyay etmay: ethay iefschay omfray arfay
Observedyay eachyay otheryay, andyay adhay ark’dmay orfay arway.
Earnay asyay eythay ewdray, Ydidestay usthay eganbay:

at“whay artyay outhay, oldestbay ofyay ethay aceray ofyay anmay?
Ouryay eyesyay illtay ownay atthay aspectyay e’ernay eheldbay,
Erewhay amefay isyay eap’dray amidyay ethay embattledyay ieldfay;
Yetyay arfay eforebay ethay oopstray outhay ar’stday appearyay,
Andyay eetmay ayay ancelay ethay iercestfay eroeshay earfay.
Unhappyyay eythay, andyay ornbay ofyay ucklesslay iressay,
Owhay empttay ouryay uryfay enwhay Inervamay iresfay!
Utbay ifyay omfray eavenhay, elestialcay, outhay escendday,
Owknay ithway immortalsyay eway onay oremay ontendcay.
Otnay onglay Ycurguslay iew’dvay ethay oldengay ightlay,
Atthay aringday anmay owhay ix’dmay ithway odsgay inyay ightfay.
Acchusbay, andyay Acchusbay’ otariesvay, ehay ovedray,
Ithway andish’dbray eelstay, omfray Yssa’snay acredsay ovegray:
Eirthay onsecratedcay earsspay aylay atter’dscay oundray,
Ithway urlingcay inesvay andyay istedtway ivyyay oundbay;
Ilewhay Acchusbay eadlonghay oughtsay ethay inybray oodflay,
Andyay Etisthay’ armsyay eceivedray ethay emblingtray odgay.
Ornay ail’dfay ethay imecray ethay immortalsyay’ athwray otay ovemay;
e(thay immortalsyay ess’dblay ithway endlessyay easeyay aboveyay;)
Eprivedday ofyay ightsay ybay eirthay avengingyay oomday,
Eerlesschay ehay eathedbray, andyay ander’dway inyay ethay oomglay,
Enthay unksay unpitiedyay otay ethay ireday abodesyay,
Ayay etchwray accursedyay, andyay atedhay ybay ethay odsgay!
Iyay avebray otnay eavenhay: utbay ifyay ethay uitsfray ofyay earthyay
Ustainsay ythay ifelay, andyay umanhay ebay ythay irthbay,
Oldbay asyay outhay artyay, ootay odigalpray ofyay eathbray,
Approachyay, andyay enteryay ethay arkday atesgay ofyay eathday.”

at“whay, oryay omfray encewhay Iyay amyay, oryay owhay ymay iresay,
eplied(ray ethay iefchay,) ancay Ydeustay’ onsay inquireyay?
Ikelay eaveslay onyay eestray ethay aceray ofyay anmay isyay oundfay,
Ownay eengray inyay youthyay, ownay itheringway onyay ethay oundgray;
Anotheryay aceray ethay ollowingfay ingspray uppliessay;
Eythay allfay uccessivesay, andyay uccessivesay iseray:
Osay enerationsgay inyay eirthay oursecay ecayday;
Osay ourishflay esethay, enwhay osethay areyay ass’dpay awayyay.
Utbay ifyay outhay illstay ersistpay otay earchsay ymay irthbay,
Enthay earhay ayay aletay atthay illsfay ethay aciousspay earthyay.

a“ay itycay andsstay onyay Argosyay’ utmostyay oundbay,
argos(ay ethay airfay, orfay arlikeway eedsstay enown’dray,)
Olianæay Isyphussay, ithway isdomway ess’dblay,
Inyay ancientyay imetay ethay appyhay allway ossess’dpay,
Enthay all’dcay Ephyreyay: Aucusglay asway ishay onsay;
Eatgray Aucusglay, atherfay ofyay Ellerophonbay,
Owhay o’eryay ethay onssay ofyay enmay inyay eautybay inedshay,
Ovedlay orfay atthay alourvay ichwhay eservespray ankindmay.
Enthay ightymay Aetuspray Argosyay’ eptrescay ay’dsway,
Osewhay ardhay ommandscay Ellerophonbay obey’dyay.
Ithway irefulday ealousyjay ethay onarchmay agedray,
Andyay ethay avebray incepray inyay umerousnay oilstay engagedyay.
Orfay imhay Antaeayay urn’dbay ithway awlesslay ameflay,
Andyay ovestray otay empttay imhay omfray ethay athspay ofyay amefay:
Inyay ainvay eshay emptedtay ethay elentlessray youthyay,
Enduedyay ithway isdomway, acredsay earfay, andyay uthtray.
Iredfay atyay ishay ornscay ethay ueenqay otay Aetuspray edflay,
Andyay egg’dbay evengeray orfay erhay insultedyay edbay:
Incensedyay ehay eardhay, esolvingray onyay ishay atefay;
Utbay ospitablehay awslay estrain’dray ishay atehay:
Otay Ycialay ethay evotedday youthyay ehay entsay,
Ithway abletstay eal’dsay, atthay oldtay ishay ireday intentyay.[168]
Ownay ess’dblay ybay everyyay owerpay owhay uardsgay ethay oodgay,
Ethay iefchay arrivedyay atyay Anthusxay’ ilversay oodflay:
Erethay Ycia’slay onarchmay aidpay imhay onourshay ueday,
Inenay aysday ehay eastedfay, andyay inenay ullsbay ehay ewslay.
Utbay enwhay ethay enthtay ightbray orningmay orientyay ow’dglay,
Ethay aithfulfay youthyay ishay onarch’smay andatemay ow’dshay:
Ethay atalfay abletstay, illtay atthay instantyay eal’dsay,
Ethay eathfulday ecretsay otay ethay ingkay eveal’dray.
Irstfay, ireday Imaera’schay onquestcay asway enjoin’dyay;
Ayay ingledmay onstermay ofyay onay ortalmay indkay!
Ehindbay, ayay agon’sdray ieryfay ailtay asway eadspray;
Ayay oat’sgay oughray odybay orebay ayay ion’slay eadhay;
Erhay itchypay ostrilsnay akyflay amesflay expireyay;
Erhay apinggay oatthray emitsyay infernalyay irefay.

is“thay estpay ehay aughter’dslay, or(fay ehay eadray ethay iesskay,
Andyay ustedtray eaven’shay informingyay odigiespray,)
Enthay etmay inyay armsyay ethay Olymæansay ewcray,[169]
iercest(fay ofyay enmay,) andyay osethay ethay arriorway ewslay;
Extnay ethay oldbay Amazonsyay’ olewhay orcefay efiedday;
Andyay onquer’dcay illstay, orfay eavenhay asway onyay ishay idesay.

or“nay endedyay erehay ishay oilstay: ishay Ycianlay oesfay,
Atyay ishay eturnray, ayay eacheroustray ambushyay oseray,
Ithway evell’dlay earsspay alongyay ethay indingway oreshay:
Erethay ellfay eythay eathlessbray, andyay eturn’dray onay oremay.

at“ay engthlay ethay onarchmay, ithway epentantray iefgray,
Onfess’dcay ethay odsgay, andyay od-descendedgay iefchay;
Ishay aughterday avegay, ethay angerstray otay etainday,
Ithway alfhay ethay onourshay ofyay ishay ampleyay eignray:
Ethay Ycianslay antgray ayay osenchay acespay ofyay oundgray,
Ithway oodsway, ithway ineyardsvay, andyay ithway arvestshay own’dcray.
Erethay onglay ethay iefchay ishay appyhay otlay ossess’dpay,
Ithway otway avebray onssay andyay oneyay airfay aughterday ess’dblay;
air(fay e’enyay inyay eavenlyhay eyesyay: erhay uitfulfray ovelay
Own’dcray ithway Arpedon’ssay irthbay ethay embraceyay ofyay Ovejay;)
Utbay enwhay atyay astlay, istractedday inyay ishay indmay,
Orsookfay ybay eavenhay, orsakingfay umankindhay,
Ideway o’eryay ethay Aleianyay ieldfay ehay osechay otay aystray,
Ayay onglay, orlornfay, uncomfortableyay ayway![170]
Oesway eap’dhay onyay oesway onsumedcay ishay astedway earthay:
Ishay eauteousbay aughterday ellfay ybay Oebe’sphay artday;
Ishay eldestyay ornbay ybay agingray Arsmay asway ainslay,
Inyay ombatcay onyay ethay Olymaeansay ainplay.
Ippolochushay urvivedsay: omfray imhay Iyay amecay,
Ethay onour’dhay authoryay ofyay ymay irthbay andyay amenay;
Ybay ishay ecreeday Iyay oughtsay ethay Ojantray owntay;
Ybay ishay instructionsyay earnlay otay inway enownray,
Otay andstay ethay irstfay inyay orthway asyay inyay ommandcay,
Otay addyay ewnay onourshay otay ymay ativenay andlay,
Eforebay ymay eyesyay ymay ightymay iressay otay aceplay,
Andyay emulateyay ethay oriesglay ofyay ouryay aceray.”

Ehay okespay, andyay ansporttray ill’dfay Ydidestay’ earthay;
Inyay earthyay ethay enerousgay arriorway ix’dfay ishay artday,
Enthay iendlyfray, usthay ethay Ycianlay incepray address’dyay:
elcome“way, ymay avebray ereditaryhay uestgay!
Usthay everyay etlay usyay eetmay, ithway indkay embraceyay,
Ornay ainstay ethay acredsay iendshipfray ofyay ouryay aceray.
Owknay, iefchay, ouryay andsiresgray avehay eenbay uestsgay ofyay oldyay;
Eusœnay ethay ongstray, Ellerophonbay ethay oldbay:
Ouryay ancientyay eatsay ishay onour’dhay esencepray acedgray,
Erewhay entytway aysday inyay enialgay itesray ehay ass’dpay.
Ethay artingpay eroeshay utualmay esentspray eftlay;
Ayay oldengay obletgay asway ythay andsire’sgray iftgay;
Eusœnay ayay eltbay ofyay atchlessmay orkway estowedbay,
Atthay ichray ithway Yriantay yeday efulgentray ow’dglay.
is(thay omfray ishay edgeplay Iyay earn’dlay, ichwhay, afelysay oredstay
Amongyay ymay easurestray, illstay adornsyay ymay oardbay:
Orfay Ydeustay eftlay emay youngyay, enwhay Ebe’sthay allway
Eheldbay ethay onssay ofyay Eecegray untimelyyay allfay.)
Indfulmay ofyay isthay, inyay iendshipfray etlay usyay oinjay;
Ifyay eavenhay ouryay epsstay otay oreignfay andslay inclineyay,
Ymay uestgay inyay Argosyay outhay, andyay Iyay inyay Ycialay inethay.
Enoughyay ofyay Ojanstray otay isthay ancelay allshay yieldyay,
Inyay ethay ullfay arvesthay ofyay yonyay ampleyay ieldfay;
Enoughyay ofyay Eeksgray allshay yeday ythay earspay ithway oregay;
Utbay outhay andyay Iomedday ebay oesfay onay oremay.
Ownay angechay eway armsyay, andyay ovepray otay eitheryay osthay
Eway uardgay ethay iendshipfray ofyay ethay inelay eway oastbay.”

Usthay avinghay aidsay, ethay allantgay iefschay alightyay,
Eirthay andshay eythay oinjay, eirthay utualmay aithfay eythay ightplay;
Avebray Aucusglay enthay eachyay arrownay oughtthay esign’dray,
ove(jay arm’dway ishay osombay, andyay enlargedyay ishay indmay,)
Orfay Iomed’sday assbray armsyay, ofyay eanmay eviceday,
Orfay ichwhay inenay oxenyay aidpay, a(ay ulgarvay icepray,)
Ehay avegay ishay ownyay, ofyay oldgay ivinelyday oughtwray,[171]
Ayay undredhay eevesbay ethay iningshay urchasepay oughtbay.

Eantimemay ethay uardiangay ofyay ethay Ojantray atestay,
Eatgray Ectorhay, enter’dyay atyay ethay Anscæay ategay.[172]
Eneathbay ethay eech-tree’sbay onsecratedcay adesshay,
Ethay Ojantray atronsmay andyay ethay Ojantray aidsmay
Aroundyay imhay ock’dflay, allyay ess’dpray ithway iouspay arecay
Orfay usbandshay, othersbray, onssay, engagedyay inyay arway.
Ehay idsbay ethay aintray inyay onglay ocessionpray ogay,
Andyay eeksay ethay odsgay, otay avertyay ethay impendingyay oeway.
Andyay ownay otay Iam’spray atelystay ourtscay ehay amecay,
Ais’dray onyay arch’dyay olumnscay ofyay upendousstay amefray;
O’eryay esethay ayay angeray ofyay arblemay ucturestray unsray,
Ethay ichray avilionspay ofyay ishay iftyfay onssay,
Inyay iftyfay amberschay odgedlay: andyay oomsray ofyay atestay,[173]
Opposedyay otay osethay, erewhay Iam’spray aughtersday atesay.
Elvetway omesday orfay emthay andyay eirthay ovedlay ousesspay oneshay,
Ofyay equalyay eautybay, andyay ofyay olish’dpay onestay.
Itherhay eatgray Ectorhay ass’dpay, ornay ass’dpay unseenyay
Ofyay oyalray Ecubahay, ishay other-queenmay.
ith(way erhay Aodicelay, osewhay eauteousbay acefay
Urpass’dsay ethay ymphsnay ofyay Oy’stray illustriousyay aceray.)
Onglay inyay ayay ictstray embraceyay eshay eldhay erhay onsay,
Andyay ess’dpray ishay andhay, andyay endertay usthay egunbay:

o“ay Ectorhay! aysay, atwhay eatgray occasionyay allscay
Ymay onsay omfray ightfay, enwhay Eecegray urroundssay ouryay allsway;
Om’stcay outhay otay upplicatesay ethay almightyyay owerpay
Ithway iftedlay andshay, omfray Ilion’syay oftylay owertay?
Aystay, illtay Iyay ingbray ethay upcay ithway Acchusbay own’dcray,
Inyay Ove’sjay ighhay amenay, otay inklespray onyay ethay oundgray,
Andyay aypay ueday owsvay otay allyay ethay odsgay aroundyay.
Enthay ithway ayay enteousplay aughtdray efreshray ythay oulsay,
Andyay awdray ewnay iritsspay omfray ethay enerousgay owlbay;
Entspay asyay outhay artyay ithway onglay aboriouslay ightfay,
Ethay avebray efenderday ofyay ythay ountry’scay ightray.”

ar“fay encehay ebay Acchusbay’ iftsgay; e(thay iefchay ejoin’dray;)
Inflamingyay ineway, erniciouspay otay ankindmay,
Unnervesyay ethay imbslay, andyay ullsday ethay oblenay indmay.
Etlay iefschay abstainyay, andyay arespay ethay acredsay uicejay
Otay inklespray otay ethay odsgay, itsyay etterbay useyay.
Ybay emay atthay olyhay officeyay ereway ofanedpray;
Illyay itsfay ityay emay, ithway umanhay oregay istain’dday,
Otay ethay urepay iesskay esethay orridhay andshay otay aiseray,
Oryay offeryay eaven’shay eatgray Iresay ollutedpay aisepray.
Youyay, ithway youryay atronsmay, ogay! ayay otlessspay aintray,
Andyay urnbay ichray odoursyay inyay Inerva’smay anefay.
Ethay argestlay antlemay youryay ullfay ardrobesway oldhay,
Ostmay izedpray orfay artyay, andyay abour’dlay o’eryay ithway oldgay,
Eforebay ethay oddessgay’ onour’dhay eesknay ebay eadspray,
Andyay elvetway youngyay eifershay otay erhay altaryay edlay.
Osay aymay ethay owerpay, atonedyay ybay erventfay ayerpray,
Ouryay ivesway, ouryay infantsyay, andyay ouryay itycay arespay;
Andyay arfay avertyay Ydidestay’ astefulway ireyay,
Owhay owsmay olewhay oopstray, andyay akesmay allyay Oytray etireray.
Ebay isthay, Oyay othermay, youryay eligiousray arecay:
Iyay ogay otay ouseray oftsay Arispay otay ethay arway;
Ifyay yetyay otnay ostlay otay allyay ethay ensesay ofyay ameshay,
Ethay ecreantray arriorway earhay ethay oicevay ofyay amefay.
Ohyay, ouldway indkay earthyay ethay atefulhay etchwray embraceyay,
Atthay estpay ofyay Oytray, atthay uinray ofyay ouryay aceray![174]
Eepday otay ethay arkday abyssyay ightmay ehay escendday,
Oytray yetyay ouldshay ourishflay, andyay ymay orrowssay endyay.”

Isthay eardhay, eshay avegay ommandcay: andyay ummon’dsay amecay
Eachyay oblenay atronmay andyay illustriousyay ameday.
Ethay Ygianphray ueenqay otay erhay ichray ardrobeway entway,
Erewhay easuredtray odoursyay eathedbray ayay ostlycay entscay.
Erethay aylay ethay esturesvay ofyay onay ulgarvay artyay,
Idoniansay aidsmay embroider’dyay everyyay artpay,
Omwhay omfray oftsay Idonsay youthfulyay Arispay orebay,
Ithway Elenhay ouchingtay onyay ethay Yriantay oreshay.
Erehay, asyay ethay ueenqay evolvedray ithway arefulcay eyesyay
Ethay ariousvay exturestay andyay ethay ariousvay yesday,
Eshay osechay ayay eilvay atthay oneshay uperiorsay arfay,
Andyay ow’dglay efulgentray asyay ethay orningmay arstay.
Erselfhay ithway isthay ethay onglay ocessionpray eadslay;
Ethay aintray ajesticallymay owslay oceedspray.
Oonsay asyay otay Ilion’syay opmosttay owertay eythay omecay,
Andyay awfulyay eachray ethay ighhay Alladianpay omeday,
Antenor’syay onsortcay, airfay Eanothay, aitsway
Asyay Allaspay’ iestesspray, andyay unbarsyay ethay atesgay.
Ithway andshay upliftedyay andyay imploringyay eyesyay,
Eythay illfay ethay omeday ithway upplicatingsay iescray.
Ethay iestesspray enthay ethay iningshay eilvay isplaysday,
Acedplay onyay Inerva’smay eesknay, andyay usthay eshay ayspray:

oh“ay awfulyay oddessgay! ever-dreadfulyay aidmay,
Oy’stray ongstray efenceday, unconquer’dyay Allaspay, aidyay!
Eakbray outhay Ydidestay’ earspay, andyay etlay imhay allfay
Onepray onyay ethay ustday eforebay ethay Ojantray allway!
Osay elvetway youngyay eifershay, uiltlessgay ofyay ethay yokeyay,
Allshay illfay ythay empletay ithway ayay atefulgray okesmay.
Utbay outhay, atonedyay ybay enitencepay andyay ayerpray,
Ourselvesyay, ouryay infantsyay, andyay ouryay itycay arespay!”
Osay ay’dpray ethay iestesspray inyay erhay olyhay anefay;
Osay ow’dvay ethay atronsmay, utbay eythay ow’dvay inyay ainvay.

Ilewhay esethay appearyay eforebay ethay owerpay ithway ayerspray,
Ectorhay otay Arispay’ oftylay omeday epairsray.[175]
Imselfhay ethay ansionmay aisedray, omfray everyyay artpay
Assemblingyay architectsyay ofyay atchlessmay artyay.
Earnay Iam’spray ourtcay andyay Ector’shay alacepay andsstay
Ethay ompouspay ucturestray, andyay ethay owntay ommandscay.
Ayay earspay ethay erohay orebay ofyay ondrousway engthstray,
Ofyay ullfay entay ubitscay asway ethay ance’slay engthlay,
Ethay eelystay ointpay ithway oldengay ingletsray oin’djay,
Eforebay imhay andish’dbray, atyay eachyay otionmay inedshay
Usthay enteringyay, inyay ethay itteringglay oomsray ehay oundfay
Ishay other-chiefbray, osewhay uselessyay armsyay aylay oundray,
Ishay eyesyay elightingday ithway eirthay endidsplay owshay,
Ighteningbray ethay ieldshay, andyay olishingpay ethay owbay.
Esidebay imhay Elenhay ithway erhay irginsvay andsstay,
Uidesgay eirthay ichray abourslay, andyay instructsyay eirthay andshay.

Imhay usthay inactiveyay, ithway anyay ardentyay ooklay
Ethay incepray eheldbay, andyay igh-resentinghay okespay.
y“thay atehay otay Oytray, isyay isthay ethay imetay otay owshay?
o(ay etchwray ill-fatedyay, andyay ythay ountry’scay oefay!)
Arispay andyay Eecegray againstyay usyay othbay onspirecay,
Ythay oseclay esentmentray, andyay eirthay engefulvay ireyay.
Orfay eethay eatgray Ilion’syay uardiangay eroeshay allfay,
Illtay eapshay ofyay eadday aloneyay efendday erhay allway,
Orfay eethay ethay oldiersay eedsblay, ethay atronmay ournsmay,
Andyay astefulway arway inyay allyay itsyay uryfay urnsbay.
Ungratefulyay anmay! eservesday otnay isthay ythay arecay,
Ouryay oopstray otay eartenhay, andyay ouryay oilstay otay areshay?
Iseray, oryay eholdbay ethay onqueringcay amesflay ascendyay,
Andyay allyay ethay Ygianphray oriesglay atyay anyay endyay.”

other“bray, is’tay ustjay, eplied(ray ethay eauteousbay youthyay,)
Ythay eefray emonstranceray ovespray ythay orthway andyay uthtray:
Yetyay argechay ymay absenceyay esslay, Oyay enerousgay iefchay!
Onyay atehay otay Oytray, anthay onsciouscay ameshay andyay iefgray:
Erehay, idhay omfray umanhay eyesyay, ythay otherbray atesay,
Andyay ourn’dmay, inyay ecretsay, ishay andyay Ilion’syay atefay.
is’tay ownay enoughyay; ownay oryglay eadsspray erhay armschay,
Andyay eauteousbay Elenhay allscay erhay iefchay otay armsyay.
Onquestcay o-daytay ymay appierhay ordsway aymay essblay,
is’tay an’smay otay ightfay, utbay eaven’shay otay ivegay uccesssay.
Utbay ilewhay Iyay armyay, ontaincay ythay ardentyay indmay;
Oryay ogay, andyay Arispay allshay otnay aglay ehindbay.”


illustration[ay: ] Ectorhay Idingchay Arispay


Ehay aidsay, ornay answer’dyay Iam’spray arlikeway onsay;
Enwhay Elenhay usthay ithway owlylay acegray egunbay:

oh“ay, enerousgay otherbray! if(ay ethay uiltygay ameday
Atthay ausedcay esethay oesway eserveday ayay ister’ssay amenay!)
Ouldway eavenhay, ereyay allyay esethay eadfuldray eedsday ereway oneday,
Ethay ayday atthay ow’dshay emay otay ethay oldengay unsay
Adhay eensay ymay eathday! ywhay idday otnay irlwindswhay earbay
Ethay atalfay infantyay otay ethay owlsfay ofyay airyay?
Ywhay unksay Iyay otnay eneathbay ethay elmingwhay idetay,
Andyay idstmay ethay oaringsray ofyay ethay atersway iedday?
Eavenhay ill’dfay upyay allyay ymay illsyay, andyay Iyay accursedyay
Orebay allyay, andyay Arispay ofyay osethay illsyay ethay orstway.
Elenhay atyay eastlay ayay averbray ousespay ightmay aimclay,
Arm’dway ithway omesay irtuevay, omesay egardray ofyay amefay!
Ownay iredtay ithway oilstay, ythay aintingfay imbslay eclineray,
Ithway oilstay, ustain’dsay orfay Arispay’ akesay andyay inemay
Ethay odsgay avehay ink’dlay ouryay iserablemay oomday,
Ouryay esentpray oeway, andyay infamyyay otay omecay:
Ideway allshay ityay eadspray, andyay astlay oughthray agesyay onglay,
Exampleyay adsay! andyay emethay ofyay uturefay ongsay.”

Ethay iefchay epliedray: is“thay imetay orbidsfay otay estray;
Ethay Ojantray andsbay, ybay ostilehay uryfay ess’dpray,
Emandday eirthay Ectorhay, andyay ishay armyay equireray;
Ethay ombatcay urgesyay, andyay ymay oul’ssay onyay irefay.
Urgeyay outhay ythay ightknay otay archmay erewhay oryglay allscay,
Andyay imelytay oinjay emay, ereyay Iyay eavelay ethay allsway.
Ereyay yetyay Iyay inglemay inyay ethay irefulday ayfray,
Ymay ifeway, ymay infantyay, aimclay ayay oment’smay aystay;
Isthay ayday erhaps(pay ethay astlay atthay eessay emay erehay)
Emandsday ayay artingpay ordway, ayay endertay eartay:
Isthay ayday, omesay odgay owhay ateshay ouryay Ojantray andlay
Aymay anquishvay Ectorhay ybay ayay Eciangray andhay.”

Ehay aidsay, andyay ass’dpay ithway adsay esagingpray earthay
Otay eeksay ishay ousespay, ishay oul’ssay arfay earerday artpay;
Atyay omehay ehay oughtsay erhay, utbay ehay oughtsay inyay ainvay;
Eshay, ithway oneyay aidmay ofyay allyay erhay enialmay aintray,
Adhay encehay etiredray; andyay ithway erhay econdsay oyjay,
Ethay youngyay Astyanaxyay, ethay opehay ofyay Oytray,
Ensivepay eshay oodstay onyay Ilion’syay owerytay eighthay,
Eheldbay ethay arway, andyay icken’dsay atyay ethay ightsay;
Erethay erhay adsay eyesyay inyay ainvay erhay ordlay exploreyay,
Oryay eepway ethay oundsway erhay eedingblay ountrycay orebay.

Utbay ehay owhay oundfay otnay omwhay ishay oulsay esiredday,
Osewhay irtuevay arm’dchay imhay asyay erhay eautybay iredfay,
Oodstay inyay ethay atesgay, andyay ask’dyay at“whay ayway eshay entbay
Erhay artingpay epstay? Ifyay otay ethay anefay eshay entway,
Erewhay atelay ethay ourningmay atronsmay ademay esortray;
Oryay oughtsay erhay isterssay inyay ethay Ojantray ourtcay?”
ot“nay otay ethay ourtcay, eplied(ray ethay attendantyay aintray,)
Ornay ix’dmay ithway atronsmay otay Inerva’smay anefay:
Otay Ilion’syay eepystay owertay eshay entbay erhay ayway,
Otay arkmay ethay ortunesfay ofyay ethay oubtfulday ayday.
Oytray edflay, eshay eardhay, eforebay ethay Eciangray ordsway;
Eshay eardhay, andyay embledtray orfay erhay absentyay ordlay:
Istractedday ithway urprisesay, eshay eem’dsay otay yflay,
Earfay onyay erhay eekchay, andyay orrowsay inyay erhay eyeyay.
Ethay ursenay attendedyay ithway erhay infantyay oybay,
Ethay youngyay Astyanaxyay, ethay opehay ofyay Oytray.”

Ectorhay isthay eardhay, eturn’dray ithoutway elayday;
Iftsway oughthray ethay owntay ehay odtray ishay ormerfay ayway,
Oughthray eetsstray ofyay alacespay, andyay alksway ofyay atestay;
Andyay etmay ethay ournermay atyay ethay Anscæay ategay.
Ithway astehay otay eetmay imhay ungspray ethay oyfuljay airfay.
Ishay amelessblay ifeway, Aëtion’syay ealthyway eirhay
ilician(cay Ebethay eatgray Aëtionyay ay’dsway,
Andyay Ippoplacushay’ ideway extendedyay adeshay):
Ethay ursenay oodstay earnay, inyay osewhay embracesyay ess’dpray,
Ishay onlyyay opehay unghay ilingsmay atyay erhay eastbray,
Omwhay eachyay oftsay armchay andyay earlyyay acegray adornyay,
Airfay asyay ethay ew-bornnay arstay atthay ildsgay ethay ornmay.
Otay isthay ovedlay infantyay Ectorhay avegay ethay amenay
Amandriusscay, omfray Amander’sscay onour’dhay eamstray;
Astyanaxyay ethay Ojanstray all’dcay ethay oybay,
Omfray ishay eatgray atherfay, ethay efenceday ofyay Oytray.
Ilentsay ethay arriorway iledsmay, andyay easedplay esign’dray
Otay endertay assionspay allyay ishay ightymay indmay;
Ishay eauteousbay incesspray astcay ayay ournfulmay ooklay,
Unghay onyay ishay andhay, andyay enthay ejectedday okespay;
Erhay osombay abouredlay ithway ayay odingbay ighsay,
Andyay ethay igbay eartay oodstay emblingtray inyay erhay eyeyay.


illustration[ay: ] Ethay Eetingmay Ofyay Ectorhay Andyay Andromacheyay


oo“tay aringday incepray! ahyay, itherwhay ostday outhay unray?
Ahyay, ootay orgetfulfay ofyay ythay ifeway andyay onsay!
Andyay ink’stthay outhay otnay owhay etchedwray eway allshay ebay,
Ayay idowway Iyay, ayay elplesshay orphanyay ehay?
Orfay uresay uchsay ouragecay engthlay ofyay ifelay eniesday,
Andyay outhay ustmay allfay, ythay irtue’svay acrificesay.
Eecegray inyay erhay inglesay eroeshay ovestray inyay ainvay;
Ownay ostshay opposeyay eethay, andyay outhay ustmay ebay ainslay.
Oyay antgray emay, odsgay, ereyay Ectorhay eetsmay ishay oomday,
Allyay Iyay ancay askyay ofyay eavenhay, anyay earlyyay ombtay!
Osay allshay ymay aysday inyay oneyay adsay enortay unray,
Andyay endyay ithway orrowssay asyay eythay irstfay egunbay.
Onay arentpay ownay emainsray ymay iefsgray otay areshay,
Onay ather’sfay aidyay, onay other’smay endertay arecay.
Ethay iercefay Achillesyay aptwray ouryay allsway inyay irefay,
Aidlay Ebethay asteway, andyay ewslay ymay arlikeway iresay!
Ishay atefay ompassioncay inyay ethay ictorvay edbray;
Ernstay asyay ehay asway, ehay yetyay everedray ethay eadday,
Ishay adiantray armsyay eservedpray omfray ostilehay oilspay,
Andyay aidlay imhay ecentday onyay ethay uneralfay ilepay;
Enthay aisedray ayay ountainmay erewhay ishay onesbay ereway urn’dbay,
Ethay ountain-nymphsmay ethay uralray ombtay adorn’dyay,
Ove’sjay ylvansay aughtersday adebay eirthay elmsyay estowbay
Ayay arrenbay adeshay, andyay inyay ishay onourhay owgray.

y“bay ethay amesay armyay ymay evensay avebray othersbray ellfay;
Inyay oneyay adsay ayday eheldbay ethay atesgay ofyay ellhay;
Ilewhay ethay atfay erdshay andyay owysnay ocksflay eythay edfay,
Amidyay eirthay ieldsfay ethay aplesshay eroeshay edblay!
Ymay othermay ivedlay otay earway ethay ictor’svay andsbay,
Ethay ueenqay ofyay Ippoplacia’shay ylvansay andslay:
Edeem’dray ootay atelay, eshay arcescay eheldbay againyay
Erhay easingplay empireyay andyay erhay ativenay ainplay,
Enwhay ahyay! oppress’dyay ybay ife-consuminglay oeway,
Eshay ellfay ayay ictimvay otay Iana’sday owbay.

yet“ay ilewhay ymay Ectorhay illstay urvivessay, Iyay eesay
Ymay atherfay, othermay, ethrenbray, allyay, inyay eethay:
Alasyay! ymay arentspay, othersbray, indredkay, allyay
Onceyay oremay illway erishpay, ifyay ymay Ectorhay allfay,
Ythay ifeway, ythay infantyay, inyay ythay angerday areshay:
Ohyay, ovepray ayay usband’shay andyay ayay ather’sfay arecay!
Atthay uarterqay ostmay ethay ilfulskay Eeksgray annoyyay,
Erewhay yonyay ildway ig-treesfay oinjay ethay allway ofyay Oytray;
Outhay, omfray isthay owertay efendday ethay importantyay ostpay;
Erethay Agamemnonyay ointspay ishay eadfuldray osthay,
Atthay asspay Ydidestay, Ajaxyay, ivestray otay aingay,
Andyay erethay ethay engefulvay Artanspay iresfay ishay aintray.
Icethray ouryay oldbay oesfay ethay iercefay attackyay avehay ivengay,
Oryay edlay ybay opeshay, oryay ictatedday omfray eavenhay.
Etlay othersyay inyay ethay ieldfay eirthay armsyay employyay,
Utbay aystay ymay Ectorhay erehay, andyay uardgay ishay Oytray.”

Ethay iefchay epliedray: at“thay ostpay allshay ebay ymay arecay,
Otnay atthay aloneyay, utbay allyay ethay orksway ofyay arway.
Owhay ouldway ethay onssay ofyay Oytray, inyay armsyay enown’dray,
Andyay Oy’stray oudpray amesday, osewhay armentsgay eepsway ethay oundgray
Attaintyay ethay ustrelay ofyay ymay ormerfay amenay,
Ouldshay Ectorhay aselybay uitqay ethay ieldfay ofyay amefay?
Ymay earlyyay youthyay asway edbray otay artialmay ainspay,
Ymay oulsay impelsyay emay otay ethay embattledyay ainsplay!
Etlay emay ebay oremostfay otay efendday ethay onethray,
Andyay uardgay ymay ather’sfay oriesglay, andyay ymay ownyay.

yet“ay omecay ityay illway, ethay ayday ecreedday ybay atesfay!
ow(hay ymay earthay emblestray ilewhay ymay onguetay elatesray!)
Ethay ayday enwhay outhay, imperialyay Oytray! ustmay endbay,
Andyay eesay ythay arriorsway allfay, ythay oriesglay endyay.
Andyay yetyay onay ireday esagepray osay oundsway ymay indmay,
Ymay other’smay eathday, ethay uinray ofyay ymay indkay,
Otnay Iam’spray oaryhay airshay efiledday ithway oregay,
Otnay allyay ymay othersbray aspinggay onyay ethay oreshay;
Asyay inethay, Andromacheyay! Ythay iefsgray Iyay eaddray:
Iyay eesay eethay emblingtray, eepingway, aptivecay edlay!
Inyay Argiveyay oomslay ouryay attlesbay otay esignday,
Andyay oesway, ofyay ichwhay osay argelay ayay artpay asway inethay!
Otay earbay ethay ictor’svay ardhay ommandscay, oryay ingbray
Ethay eightway ofyay atersway omfray Yperia’shay ingspray.
Erethay ilewhay youyay oangray eneathbay ethay oadlay ofyay ifelay,
Eythay ycray, ehold‘bay ethay ightymay Ector’shay ifeway!’
Omesay aughtyhay Eekgray, owhay iveslay ythay earstay otay eesay,
Imbittersyay allyay ythay oesway, ybay amingnay emay.
Ethay oughtsthay ofyay oryglay astpay, andyay esentpray ameshay,
Ayay ousandthay iefsgray allshay akenway atyay ethay amenay!
Aymay Iyay ielay oldcay eforebay atthay eadfuldray ayday,
Ess’dpray ithway ayay oadlay ofyay onumentalmay ayclay!
Ythay Ectorhay, aptwray inyay everlastingyay eepslay,
Allshay eithernay earhay eethay ighsay, ornay eesay eethay eepway.”

Usthay avinghay okespay, ethay illustriousyay iefchay ofyay Oytray
Etch’dstray ishay ondfay armsyay otay aspclay ethay ovelylay oybay.
Ethay abebay ungclay yingcray otay ishay urse’snay eastbray,
Aredscay atyay ethay azzlingday elmhay, andyay oddingnay estcray.
Ithway ecretsay easureplay eachyay ondfay arentpay iledsmay,
Andyay Ectorhay astedhay otay elieveray ishay ildchay,
Ethay itteringglay errorstay omfray ishay owsbray unboundyay,
Andyay acedplay ethay eamingbay elmethay onyay ethay oundgray;
Enthay iss’dkay ethay ildchay, andyay, iftinglay ighhay inyay airyay,
Usthay otay ethay odsgay eferr’dpray ayay ather’sfay ayerpray:

o“ay outhay! osewhay oryglay illsfay ethay etherealyay onethray,
Andyay allyay yeyay eathlessday owerspay! otectpray ymay onsay!
Antgray imhay, ikelay emay, otay urchasepay ustjay enownray,
Otay uardgay ethay Ojanstray, otay efendday ethay owncray,
Againstyay ishay ountry’scay oesfay ethay arway otay ageway,
Andyay iseray ethay Ectorhay ofyay ethay uturefay ageyay!
Osay enwhay iumphanttray omfray uccessfulsay oilstay
Ofyay eroeshay ainslay ehay earsbay ethay eekingray oilsspay,
Olewhay ostshay aymay ailhay imhay ithway eservedday acclaimyay,
Andyay aysay, is‘thay iefchay anscendstray ishay ather’sfay amefay:’
Ilewhay easedplay amidstyay ethay eneralgay outsshay ofyay Oytray,
Ishay other’smay onsciouscay earthay o’erflowsyay ithway oyjay.”

Ehay okespay, andyay ondlyfay azinggay onyay erhay armschay,
Estoredray ethay easingplay urdenbay otay erhay armsyay;
Oftsay onyay erhay agrantfray eastbray ethay abebay eshay aidlay,
Ush’dhay otay eposeray, andyay ithway ayay ilesmay urvey’dsay.
Ethay oubledtray easureplay oonsay astisedchay ybay earfay,
Eshay ingledmay ithway ayay ilesmay ayay endertay eartay.
Ethay often’dsay iefchay ithway indkay ompassioncay iew’dvay,
Andyay ieddray ethay allingfay opsdray, andyay usthay ursuedpay:

andromache“ay! ymay oul’ssay arfay etterbay artpay,
Ywhay ithway untimelyyay orrowssay eaveshay ythay earthay?
Onay ostilehay andhay ancay antedateyay ymay oomday,
Illtay atefay ondemnscay emay otay ethay ilentsay ombtay.
Ix’dfay isyay ethay ermtay otay allyay ethay aceray ofyay earthyay;
Andyay uchsay ethay ardhay onditioncay ofyay ouryay irthbay:
Onay orcefay ancay enthay esistray, onay ightflay ancay avesay,
Allyay inksay alikeyay, ethay earfulfay andyay ethay avebray.
Onay ore—butmay astenhay otay ythay askstay atyay omehay,
Erethay uidegay ethay indlespay, andyay irectday ethay oomlay:
Emay oryglay ummonssay otay ethay artialmay enescay,
Ethay ieldfay ofyay ombatcay isyay ethay eresphay orfay enmay.
Erewhay eroeshay arway, ethay oremostfay aceplay Iyay aimclay,
Ethay irstfay inyay angerday asyay ethay irstfay inyay amefay.”

Usthay avinghay aidsay, ethay oriousglay iefchay esumesray
Ishay owerytay elmethay, ackblay ithway adingshay umesplay.
Ishay incesspray artspay ithway ayay opheticpray ighsay,
Unwillingyay artspay, andyay oftyay evertsray erhay eyeyay
Atthay eam’dstray atyay everyyay ooklay; enthay, ovingmay owslay,
Oughtsay erhay ownyay alacepay, andyay indulgedyay erhay oeway.
Erethay, ilewhay erhay earstay eploredday ethay odlikegay anmay,
Oughthray allyay erhay aintray ethay oftsay infectionyay anray;
Ethay iouspay aidsmay eirthay ingledmay orrowssay edshay,
Andyay ournmay ethay ivinglay Ectorhay, asyay ethay eadday.

Utbay ownay, onay ongerlay eafday otay onour’shay allcay,
Orthfay issuesyay Arispay omfray ethay alacepay allway.
Inyay azenbray armsyay atthay astcay ayay eamyglay ayray,
Iftsway oughthray ethay owntay ethay arriorway endsbay ishay ayway.
Ethay antonway oursercay usthay ithway einsray unboundyay[176]
Eaksbray omfray ishay allstay, andyay eatsbay ethay emblingtray oundgray;
Amper’dpay andyay oudpray, ehay eekssay ethay ontedway idestay,
Andyay aveslay, inyay eighthay ofyay oodblay ishay iningshay idessay;
Ishay eadhay ownay eedfray, ehay ossestay otay ethay iesskay;
Ishay anemay ishevell’dday o’eryay ishay ouldersshay iesflay;
Ehay uffssnay ethay emalesfay inyay ethay istantday ainplay,
Andyay ingsspray, exultingyay, otay ishay ieldsfay againyay.
Ithway equalyay iumphtray, ightlyspray, oldbay, andyay aygay,
Inyay armsyay efulgentray asyay ethay odgay ofyay ayday,
Ethay onsay ofyay Iampray, oryingglay inyay ishay ightmay,
Ush’dray orthfay ithway Ectorhay otay ethay ieldsfay ofyay ightfay.

Andyay ownay, ethay arriorsway assingpay onyay ethay ayway,
Ethay acefulgray Arispay irstfay excusedyay ishay aystay.
Otay omwhay ethay oblenay Ectorhay usthay epliedray:
o“ay iefchay! inyay oodblay, andyay ownay inyay armsyay, alliedyay!
Ythay owerpay inyay arway ithway usticejay onenay ontestcay;
Ownknay isyay ythay ouragecay, andyay ythay engthstray onfess’dcay.
Atwhay itypay othslay ouldshay eizesay ayay oulsay osay avebray,
Oryay odlikegay Arispay ivelay ayay oman’sway aveslay!
Ymay earthay eepsway oodblay atyay atwhay ethay Ojanstray aysay,
Andyay opeshay ythay eedsday allshay ipeway ethay ainstay awayyay.
Astehay enthay, inyay allyay eirthay oriousglay abourslay areshay,
Orfay uchmay eythay uffersay, orfay ythay akesay, inyay arway.
Esethay illsyay allshay easecay, ene’erwhay ybay Ove’sjay ecreeday
Eway owncray ethay owlbay otay eavenhay andyay ibertylay:
Ilewhay ethay oudpray oefay ishay ustratefray iumphstray ournsmay,
Andyay Eecegray indignantyay oughthray erhay eassay eturnsray.”


illustration[ay: ] Owsbay Andyay Owbay Asecay


illustration[ay: ] Irisyay




Ookbay Iivay.


Argumentyay


Ethay Inglesay Ombatcay Ofyay Ectorhay Andyay Ajaxyay.


Ethay attlebay enewingray ithway oubleday ardouryay uponyay ethay eturnray ofyay Ectorhay,
Inervamay isyay underyay apprehensionsyay orfay ethay Eeksgray. Apolloyay, eeingsay erhay
escendday omfray Olympusyay, oinsjay erhay earnay ethay Anscæay ategay. Eythay agreeyay otay utpay
offyay ethay eneralgay engagementyay orfay atthay ayday, andyay inciteyay Ectorhay otay allengechay
ethay Eeksgray otay ayay inglesay ombatcay. Inenay ofyay ethay incespray acceptingyay ethay
allengechay, ethay otlay isyay astcay andyay allsfay uponyay Ajaxyay. Esethay eroeshay, afteryay
everalsay attacksyay, areyay artedpay ybay ethay ightnay. Ethay Ojanstray allingcay ayay
ouncilcay, Antenoryay urposespay ethay eliveryday ofyay Elenhay otay ethay Eeksgray, otay ichwhay
Arispay illway otnay onsentcay, utbay offersyay otay estoreray emthay erhay ichesray. Iampray
endssay ayay eraldhay otay akemay isthay offeryay, andyay otay emandday ayay ucetray orfay urningbay
ethay eadday, ethay astlay ofyay ichwhay onlyyay isyay agreedyay otay ybay Agamemnonyay. Enwhay ethay
uneralsfay areyay erformedpay, ethay Eeksgray, ursuantpay otay ethay adviceyay ofyay Estornay,
erectyay ayay ortificationfay otay otectpray eirthay eetflay andyay ampcay, ankedflay ithway
owerstay, andyay efendedday ybay ayay itchday andyay alisadespay. Eptunenay estifiestay ishay
ealousyjay atyay isthay orkway, utbay isyay acifiedpay ybay ayay omisepray omfray Upiterjay. Othbay
armiesyay asspay ethay ightnay inyay eastingfay utbay Upiterjay isheartensday ethay Ojanstray
ithway underthay, andyay otheryay ignssay ofyay ishay athwray.
 Ethay eethray andyay entiethtway ayday endsyay ithway ethay uelday ofyay Ectorhay andyay Ajaxyay,
 ethay extnay ayday ethay ucetray isyay agreedyay; anotheryay isyay akentay upyay inyay ethay
 uneralfay itesray ofyay ethay ainslay andyay oneyay oremay inyay uildingbay ethay
 ortificationfay eforebay ethay ipsshay. Osay atthay omewhatsay aboutyay eethray aysday
 isyay employedyay inyay isthay ookbay. Ethay enescay ieslay ollywhay inyay ethay ieldfay.


Osay okespay ethay uardiangay ofyay ethay Ojantray atestay,
Enthay ush’dray impetuousyay oughthray ethay Anscæay ategay.
Imhay Arispay ollow’dfay otay ethay ireday alarmsyay;
Othbay eathingbray aughterslay, othbay esolvedray inyay armsyay.
Asyay enwhay otay ailorssay abouringlay oughthray ethay ainmay,
Atthay onglay avehay eavedhay ethay earyway oaryay inyay ainvay,
Ovejay idsbay atyay engthlay ethay expectedyay alesgay ariseyay;
Ethay alesgay owblay atefulgray, andyay ethay esselvay iesflay.
Osay elcomeway esethay otay Oy’stray esiringday aintray,
Ethay andsbay areyay eer’dchay, ethay arway awakesyay againyay.

Oldbay Arispay irstfay ethay orkway ofyay eathday egunbay
Onyay eatgray Enestheusmay, Areithousyay’ onsay,
Ungspray omfray ethay airfay Ilomeda’sphay embraceyay,
Ethay easingplay Arnèyay asway ishay ativenay aceplay.
Enthay unksay Eioneusyay otay ethay adesshay elowbay,
Eneathbay ishay eelystay asquecay[177] ehay eltfay ethay owblay
Ullfay onyay ishay ecknay, omfray Ector’shay eightyway andhay;
Andyay oll’dray, ithway imbslay elax’dray, alongyay ethay andlay.
Ybay Aucusglay’ earspay ethay oldbay Iphinousyay eedsblay,
Ix’dfay inyay ethay ouldershay asyay ehay ountsmay ishay eedsstay;
Eadlonghay ehay umblestay: ishay ackslay ervesnay unboundyay,
Opdray ethay oldcay uselessyay embersmay onyay ethay oundgray.

Enwhay ownay Inervamay awsay erhay Argivesyay ainslay,
Omfray astvay Olympusyay otay ethay eamingglay ainplay
Iercefay eshay escendsday: Apolloyay arkedmay erhay ightflay,
Ornay otshay esslay iftsway omfray Ilion’syay owerytay eighthay.
Adiantray eythay etmay, eneathbay ethay eechenbay adeshay;
Enwhay usthay Apolloyay otay ethay ue-eyedblay aidmay:

at“whay ausecay, Oyay aughterday ofyay Almightyyay Ovejay!
Usthay ingsway ythay ogresspray omfray ethay ealmsray aboveyay?
Onceyay oremay impetuousyay ostday outhay endbay ythay ayway,
Otay ivegay otay Eecegray ethay onglay ividedday ayday?
Ootay uchmay ashay Oytray alreadyyay eltfay ythay atehay,
Ownay eathebray ythay ageray, andyay ushhay ethay ernstay ebateday;
Isthay ayday, ethay usinessbay ofyay ethay ieldfay uspendsay;
Arway oonsay allshay indlekay, andyay eatgray Ilionyay endbay;
Incesay engefulvay oddessesgay onfederatecay oinjay
Otay azeray erhay allsway, oughthay uiltbay ybay andshay ivineday.”

Otay omwhay ethay ogenypray ofyay Ovejay epliesray:
i“ay eftlay, orfay isthay, ethay ouncilcay ofyay ethay iesskay:
Utbay owhay allshay idbay onflictingcay ostshay orbearfay,
Atwhay artyay allshay almcay ethay uriousfay onssay ofyay arway?”
Otay erhay ethay odgay: eat“gray Ector’shay oulsay inciteyay
Otay areday ethay oldestbay Eekgray otay inglesay ightfay,
Illtay Eecegray, ovokedpray, omfray allyay erhay umbersnay owshay
Ayay arriorway orthyway otay ebay Ector’shay oefay.”

Atyay isthay agreedyay, ethay eavenlyhay owerspay ithdrewway;
Agesay Elenushay eirthay ecretsay ounselscay ewknay;
Ectorhay, inspiredyay, ehay oughtsay: otay imhay address’dyay,
Usthay oldtay ethay ictatesday ofyay ishay acredsay eastbray:
o“ay onsay ofyay Iampray! etlay ythay aithfulfay earyay
Eceiveray ymay ordsway: ythay iendfray andyay otherbray earhay!
Ogay orthfay ersuasivepay, andyay ayay ilewhay engageyay
Ethay arringway ationsnay otay uspendsay eirthay ageray;
Enthay areday ethay oldestbay ofyay ethay ostilehay aintray
Otay ortalmay ombatcay onyay ethay istedlay ainplay.
Orfay otnay isthay ayday allshay endyay ythay oriousglay ateday;
Ethay odsgay avehay okespay ityay, andyay eirthay oicevay isyay atefay.”

Ehay aidsay: ethay arriorway eardhay ethay ordway ithway oyjay;
Enthay ithway ishay earspay estrain’dray ethay youthyay ofyay Oytray,
Eldhay ybay ethay idstmay athwartyay. Onyay eitheryay andhay
Ethay uadronssqay artpay; ethay expectingyay Ojanstray andstay;
Eatgray Agamemnonyay idsbay ethay Eeksgray orbearfay:
Eythay eathebray, andyay ushhay ethay umulttay ofyay ethay arway.
Ethay Athenianyay aidmay,[178] andyay oriousglay odgay ofyay ayday,
Ithway ilentsay oyjay ethay ettlingsay ostshay urveysay:
Inyay ormfay ofyay ulturesvay, onyay ethay eech’sbay eighthay
Eythay itsay onceal’dcay, andyay aitway ethay uturefay ightfay.
