Ilewhay usthay ethay ero’shay iouspay arescay attendyay
Ethay urecay andyay afetysay ofyay ishay oundedway iendfray,
Ojanstray andyay Eeksgray ithway ashingclay ieldsshay engageyay,
Andyay utualmay eathsday areyay ealtday ithway utualmay ageray.
Ornay onglay ethay enchtray oryay oftylay allsway opposeyay;
Ithway odsgay averseyay ethay ill-fatedyay orksway aroseyay;
Eirthay owerspay eglectednay, andyay onay ictimvay ainslay,
Ethay allsway ereway aisedray, ethay enchestray unksay inyay ainvay.

Ithoutway ethay odsgay, owhay ortshay ayay eriodpay andsstay
Ethay oudestpray onumentmay ofyay ortalmay andshay!
Isthay oodstay ilewhay Ectorhay andyay Achillesyay agedray,
Ilewhay acredsay Oytray ethay arringway ostshay engagedyay;
Utbay enwhay erhay onssay ereway ainslay, erhay itycay urn’dbay,
Andyay atwhay urvivedsay ofyay Eecegray otay Eecegray eturn’dray;
Enthay Eptunenay andyay Apolloyay ookshay ethay oreshay,
Enthay Ida’syay ummitssay our’dpay eirthay ateryway orestay;
Esusrhay andyay Odiusrhay enthay uniteyay eirthay illsray,
Aresuscay oaringray ownday ethay onystay illshay,
Epusæsay, Anicusgray, ithway ingledmay orcefay,
Andyay Anthusxay oamingfay omfray ishay uitfulfray ourcesay;
Andyay ulfygay Imoissay, ollingray otay ethay ainmay[224]
Elmetshay, andyay ieldsshay, andyay odlikegay eroeshay ainslay:
Esethay, urn’dtay ybay Usphœbay omfray eirthay ontedway aysway,
Elugedday ethay ampireray inenay ontinualcay aysday;
Ethay eightway ofyay atersway apssay ethay yieldingyay allway,
Andyay otay ethay easay ethay oatingflay ulwarksbay allfay.
Incessantyay ataractscay ethay Undererthay ourspay,
Andyay alfhay ethay iesskay escendday inyay uicyslay owersshay.
Ethay odgay ofyay oceanyay, archingmay ernstay eforebay,
Ithway ishay ugehay identtray oundsway ethay emblingtray oreshay,
Astvay onesstay andyay ilespay omfray eirthay oundationfay eaveshay,
Andyay elmswhay ethay okysmay uinray inyay ethay avesway.
Ownay ooth’dsmay ithway andsay, andyay evell’dlay ybay ethay oodflay,
Onay agmentfray ellstay erewhay onceyay ethay onderway oodstay;
Inyay eirthay oldyay oundsbay ethay iversray ollray againyay,
Ineshay ixt’tway ethay illshay, oryay anderway o’eryay ethay ainplay.[225]

Utbay isthay ethay odsgay inyay aterlay imestay erformpay;
Asyay yetyay ethay ulwarkbay oodstay, andyay avedbray ethay ormstay;
Ethay okesstray yetyay echoedyay ofyay ontendingcay owerspay;
Arway under’dthay atyay ethay atesgay, andyay oodblay istain’dday ethay owerstay.
Otesmay ybay ethay armyay ofyay Ovejay ithway ireday ismayday,
Oseclay ybay eirthay ollowhay ipsshay ethay Eciansgray aylay:
Ector’shay approachyay inyay everyyay indway eythay earhay,
Andyay Ector’shay uryfay everyyay omentmay earfay.
Ehay, ikelay ayay irlwindwhay, oss’dtay ethay atteringscay ongthray,
Ingledmay ethay oopstray, andyay ovedray ethay ieldfay alongyay.
Osay idst’may ethay ogsday andyay untershay’ aringday andsbay,
Iercefay ofyay ishay ightmay, ayay oarbay oryay ionlay andsstay;
Arm’dyay oesfay aroundyay ayay eadfuldray irclecay ormfay,
Andyay issinghay avelinsjay ainray anyay ironyay ormstay:
Ishay owerspay untamedyay, eirthay oldbay assaultyay efyday,
Andyay erewhay ehay urnstay ethay outray isperseday oryay ieday:
Ehay oamsfay, ehay aresglay, ehay oundsbay againstyay emthay allyay,
Andyay ifyay ehay allsfay, ishay ouragecay akesmay imhay allfay.
Ithway equalyay ageray encompass’dyay Ectorhay owsglay;
Exhortsyay ishay armiesyay, andyay ethay enchestray owsshay.
Ethay antingpay eedsstay impatientyay uryfay eathebray,
Andyay ortsnay andyay embletray atyay ethay ulfgay eneathbay;
Ustjay atyay ethay inkbray eythay eighnay, andyay awpay ethay oundgray,
Andyay ethay urftay emblestray, andyay ethay iesskay esoundray.
Eageryay eythay iew’dvay ethay ospectpray arkday andyay eepday,
Astvay asway ethay eaplay, andyay eadlonghay unghay ethay eepstay;
Ethay ottombay arebay, a(ay ormidablefay owshay!)
Andyay istledbray ickthay ithway arpen’dshay akesstay elowbay.
Ethay ootfay aloneyay isthay ongstray efenceday ouldcay orcefay,
Andyay ytray ethay asspay imperviousyay otay ethay orsehay.
Isthay awsay Olydamaspay; owhay, iselyway avebray,
Estrain’dray eatgray Ectorhay, andyay isthay ounselcay avegay:

o“ay outhay, oldbay eaderlay ofyay ethay Ojantray andsbay!
Andyay youyay, onfederatecay iefschay omfray oreignfay andslay!
Atwhay entranceyay erehay ancay umbrouscay ariotschay indfay,
Ethay akesstay eneathbay, ethay Eciangray allsway ehindbay?
Onay asspay oughthray osethay, ithoutway ayay ousandthay oundsway,
Onay acespay orfay ombatcay inyay yonyay arrownay oundsbay.
Oudpray ofyay ethay avoursfay ightymay Ovejay ashay ownshay,
Onyay ertaincay angersday eway ootay ashlyray unray:
Ifyay is’tay ishay illway ouryay aughtyhay oesfay otay ametay,
Ohyay aymay isthay instantyay endyay ethay Eciangray amenay!
Erehay, arfay omfray Argosyay, etlay eirthay eroeshay allfay,
Andyay oneyay eatgray ayday estroyday andyay urybay allyay!
Utbay ouldshay eythay urntay, andyay erehay oppressyay ouryay aintray,
Atwhay opeshay, atwhay ethodsmay ofyay etreatray emainray?
Edgedway inyay ethay enchtray, ybay ouryay ownyay oopstray onfusedcay,
Inyay oneyay omiscuouspray arnagecay ush’dcray andyay uisedbray,
Allyay Oytray ustmay erishpay, ifyay eirthay armsyay evailpray,
Ornay allshay ayay Ojantray ivelay otay elltay ethay aletay.
Earhay enthay, yeyay arriorsway! andyay obeyyay ithway eedspay;
Ackbay omfray ethay enchestray etlay youryay eedsstay ebay edlay;
Enthay allyay alightingyay, edgedway inyay irmfay arrayyay,
Oceedpray onyay ootfay, andyay Ectorhay eadlay ethay ayway.
Osay Eecegray allshay oopstay eforebay ouryay onqueringcay owerpay,
Andyay isthay if(ay Ovejay onsentcay) erhay atalfay ourhay.”


illustration[ay: ] Olydamaspay Advisingyay Ectorhay


Isthay ounselcay easedplay: ethay odlikegay Ectorhay ungspray
Iftsway omfray ishay eatsay; ishay angingclay armouryay ungray.
Ethay ief’schay exampleyay ollow’dfay ybay ishay aintray,
Eachyay uitsqay ishay arcay, andyay issuesyay onyay ethay ainplay,
Ybay ordersyay ictstray ethay arioteerschay enjoin’dyay
Ompelcay ethay ourserscay otay eirthay anksray ehindbay.
Ethay orcesfay artpay inyay ivefay istinguish’dday andsbay,
Andyay allyay obeyyay eirthay everalsay iefschay’ ommandscay.
Ethay estbay andyay avestbray inyay ethay irstfay onspirecay,
Antpay orfay ethay ightfay, andyay eatthray ethay eetflay ithway irefay:
Eatgray Ectorhay oriousglay inyay ethay anvay ofyay esethay,
Olydamaspay, andyay avebray Ebrionescay.
Eforebay ethay extnay ethay acefulgray Arispay inesshay,
Andyay oldbay Alcathousyay, andyay Agenoryay oinsjay.
Ethay onssay ofyay Iampray ithway ethay irdthay appearyay,
Eiphobusday, andyay Elenashay ethay eersay;
Inyay armsyay ithway esethay ethay ightymay Asiusyay oodstay,
Owhay ewdray omfray Yrtacushay ishay oblenay oodblay,
Andyay omwhay Arisba’syay yellowyay ourserscay orebay,
Ethay ourserscay edfay onyay Ellè’ssay indingway oreshay.
Antenor’syay onssay ethay ourthfay attalionbay uidegay,
Andyay eatgray Easænay, ornbay onyay ountfulfay Ideyay.
Ivineday Arpedonsay ethay astlay andbay obey’dyay,
Omwhay Aucusglay andyay Asteropaeusyay aidyay.
Extnay imhay, ethay avestbray, atyay eirthay army’syay eadhay,
Utbay ehay oremay avebray anthay allyay ethay ostshay ehay edlay.

Ownay ithway ompactedcay ieldsshay inyay oseclay arrayyay,
Ethay ovingmay egionslay eedspay eirthay eadlonghay ayway:
Alreadyyay inyay eirthay opeshay eythay irefay ethay eetflay,
Andyay eesay ethay Eciansgray aspinggay atyay eirthay eetfay.

Ilewhay everyyay Ojantray usthay, andyay everyyay aidyay,
Ethay adviceyay ofyay iseway Olydamaspay obey’dyay,
Asiusyay aloneyay, onfidingcay inyay ishay arcay,
Ishay auntedvay ourserscay urgedyay otay eetmay ethay arway.
Unhappyyay erohay! andyay advisedyay inyay ainvay;
Osethay eelswhay eturningray e’ernay allshay arkmay ethay ainplay;
Onay oremay osethay ourserscay ithway iumphanttray oyjay
Estoreray eirthay astermay otay ethay atesgay ofyay Oytray!
Ackblay eathday attendsyay ehindbay ethay Eciangray allway,
Andyay eatgray Idomeneusyay allshay oastbay ythay allfay!
Iercefay otay ethay eftlay ehay ivesdray, erewhay omfray ethay ainplay
Ethay yingflay Eciansgray ovestray eirthay ipsshay otay aingay;
Iftsway oughthray ethay allway eirthay orsehay andyay ariotschay ass’dpay,
Ethay atesgay alf-open’dhay otay eceiveray ethay astlay.
Itherthay, exultingyay inyay ishay orcefay, ehay iesflay:
Ishay ollowingfay osthay ithway amoursclay endray ethay iesskay:
Otay ungeplay ethay Eciansgray eadlonghay inyay ethay ainmay,
Uchsay eirthay oudpray opeshay; utbay allyay eirthay opeshay ereway ainvay!

Otay uardgay ethay atesgay, otway ightymay iefschay attendyay,
Owhay omfray ethay Apithslay’ arlikeway aceray escendday;
Isthay Olypœtespay, eatgray Erithouspay’ eirhay,
Andyay atthay Eonteuslay, ikelay ethay odgay ofyay arway.
Asyay otway alltay oaksyay, eforebay ethay allway eythay iseray;
Eirthay ootsray inyay earthyay, eirthay eadshay amidstyay ethay iesskay:
Osewhay eadingspray armsyay ithway eafylay onourshay own’dcray,
Orbidfay ethay empesttay, andyay otectpray ethay oundgray;
Ighhay onyay ethay illshay appearsyay eirthay atelystay ormfay,
Andyay eirthay eepday ootsray orfay everyay avebray ethay ormstay.
Osay acefulgray esethay, andyay osay ethay ockshay eythay andstay
Ofyay agingray Asiusyay, andyay ishay uriousfay andbay.
Orestesyay, Acamasyay, inyay ontfray appearyay,
Andyay Omausœnay andyay Oonthay oseclay ethay earray:
Inyay ainvay eirthay amoursclay akeshay ethay ambientyay ieldsfay,
Inyay ainvay aroundyay emthay eatbay eirthay ollowhay ieldsshay;
Ethay earlessfay othersbray onyay ethay Eciansgray allcay,
Otay uardgay eirthay aviesnay, andyay efendday ethay allway.
Evenyay enwhay eythay awsay Oy’stray ablesay oopstray impendyay,
Andyay Eecegray umultuoustay omfray erhay owerstay escendday,
Orthfay omfray ethay ortalspay ush’dray ethay intrepidyay airpay,
Opposedyay eirthay eastsbray, andyay oodstay emselvesthay ethay arway.
Osay otway ildway oarsbay ingspray uriousfay omfray eirthay enday,
Ousedray ithway ethay iescray ofyay ogsday andyay oicevay ofyay enmay;
Onyay everyyay idesay ethay acklingcray eestray eythay eartay,
Andyay ootray ethay ubsshray, andyay aylay ethay orestfay arebay;
Eythay ashgnay eirthay uskstay, ithway irefay eirthay eye-ballsyay ollray,
Illtay omesay ideway oundway etslay outyay eirthay ightymay oulsay.
Aroundyay eirthay eadshay ethay istlingwhay avelinsjay ungsay,
Ithway oundingsay okesstray eirthay azenbray argetstay ungray;
Iercefay asway ethay ightfay, ilewhay yetyay ethay Eciangray owerspay
Aintain’dmay ethay allsway, andyay ann’dmay ethay oftylay owerstay:
Otay avesay eirthay eetflay eirthay astlay effortsyay eythay ytray,
Andyay onesstay andyay artsday inyay ingledmay empeststay yflay.

Asyay enwhay arpshay Oreasbay owsblay abroadyay, andyay ingsbray
Ethay earydray interway onyay ishay ozenfray ingsway;
Eneathbay ethay ow-hunglay oudsclay ethay eetsshay ofyay owsnay
Escendday, andyay itenwhay allyay ethay ieldsfay elowbay:
Osay astfay ethay artsday onyay eitheryay armyyay ourpay,
Osay ownday ethay ampiresray ollsray ethay ockyray owershay:
Eavyhay, andyay ickthay, esoundray ethay atter’dbay ieldsshay,
Andyay ethay eafday echoyay attlesray oundray ethay ieldsfay.

Ithway ameshay epulsedray, ithway iefgray andyay uryfay ivendray,
Ethay anticfray Asiusyay usthay accusesyay Eavenhay:
in“ay owerspay immortalyay owhay allshay ownay elievebay?
Ancay osethay ootay atterflay, andyay ancay Ovejay eceiveday?
Atwhay anmay ouldcay oubtday utbay Oy’stray ictoriousvay owerpay
Ouldshay umblehay Eecegray, andyay isthay erhay atalfay ourhay?
Utbay ikelay enwhay aspsway omfray ollowhay anniescray ivedray,
Otay uardgay ethay entranceyay ofyay eirthay ommoncay ivehay,
Arkeningday ethay ockray, ilewhay ithway unweariedyay ingsway
Eythay ikestray ethay assailantsyay, andyay infixyay eirthay ingsstay;
Ayay aceray eterminedday, atthay otay eathday ontendcay:
Osay iercefay esethay Eeksgray eirthay astlay etreatsray efendday.
Odsgay! allshay otway arriorsway onlyyay uardgay eirthay atesgay,
Epelray anyay armyyay, andyay efraudday ethay atesfay?”

Esethay emptyyay accentsyay ingledmay ithway ethay indway,
Ornay ovedmay eatgray Ove’sjay unalterableyay indmay;
Otay odlikegay Ectorhay andyay ishay atchlessmay ightmay
Asway owedyay ethay oryglay ofyay ethay estinedday ightfay.
Ikelay eedsday ofyay armsyay oughthray allyay ethay ortsfay ereway iedtray,
Andyay allyay ethay atesgay ustain’dsay anyay equalyay idetay;
Oughthray ethay onglay allsway ethay onystay owersshay ereway eardhay,
Ethay azeblay ofyay amesflay, ethay ashflay ofyay armsyay appear’dyay.
Ethay iritspay ofyay ayay odgay ymay eastbray inspireyay,
Otay aiseray eachyay actyay otay ifelay, andyay ingsay ithway irefay!
Ilewhay Eecegray unconquer’dyay eptkay aliveyay ethay arway,
Ecuresay ofyay eathday, onfidingcay inyay espairday;
Andyay allyay erhay uardiangay odsgay, inyay eepday ismayday,
Ithway unassistingyay armsyay eploredday ethay ayday.

Evenyay yetyay ethay auntlessday Apithaelay aintainmay
Ethay eadfuldray asspay, andyay oundray emthay eaphay ethay ainslay.
Irstfay Amasusday, ybay Olypœtespay’ eelstay,
Iercedpay oughthray ishay elmet’shay azenbray isorvay, ellfay;
Ethay eaponway ankdray ethay ingledmay ainsbray andyay oregay!
Ethay arriorway inkssay, emendoustray ownay onay oremay!
Extnay Ormenusyay andyay Ylonpay yieldyay eirthay eathbray:
Ornay esslay Eonteuslay ewsstray ethay ieldfay ithway eathday;
Irstfay oughthray ethay eltbay Ippomachushay ehay oredgay,
Enthay uddensay avedway ishay unresistedyay ordsway:
Antiphatesyay, asyay oughthray ethay anksray ehay okebray,
Ethay alchionfay uckstray, andyay atefay ursuedpay ethay okestray:
Iamenusyay, Orestesyay, Enonmay, edblay;
Andyay oundray imhay oseray ayay onumentmay ofyay eadday.
Eantimemay, ethay avestbray ofyay ethay Ojantray ewcray,
Oldbay Ectorhay andyay Olydamaspay, ursuepay;
Iercefay ithway impatienceyay onyay ethay orksway otay allfay,
Andyay apwray inyay ollingray amesflay ethay eetflay andyay allway.
Esethay onyay ethay artherfay ankbay ownay oodstay andyay azedgay,
Ybay Eavenhay alarm’dyay, ybay odigiespray amazedyay:
Ayay ignalsay omenyay opp’dstay ethay assingpay osthay,
Eirthay artialmay uryfay inyay eirthay onderway ostlay.
Ove’sjay irdbay onyay oundingsay inionspay eatbay ethay iesskay;
Ayay eedingblay erpentsay ofyay enormousyay izesay,
Ishay alonstay uss’dtray; aliveyay, andyay urlingcay oundray,
Ehay ungstay ethay irdbay, osewhay oatthray eceivedray ethay oundway:
Admay ithway ethay artsmay, ehay opsdray ethay atalfay eypray,
Inyay airyyay irclescay ingsway ishay ainfulpay ayway,
Oatsflay onyay ethay indsway, andyay endsray ethay eavenhay ithway iescray:
Amidstyay ethay osthay ethay allenfay erpentsay ieslay.
Eythay, alepay ithway errortay, arkmay itsyay iresspay unroll’dyay,
Andyay Ove’sjay ortentpay ithway eatingbay eartshay eholdbay.
Enthay irstfay Olydamaspay ethay ilencesay okebray,
Onglay eigh’dway ethay ignalsay, andyay otay Ectorhay okespay:

ow“hay oftyay, ymay otherbray, ythay eproachray Iyay earbay,
Orfay ordsway ellway eantmay, andyay entimentssay inceresay?
Uetray otay osethay ounselscay ichwhay Iyay udgejay ethay estbay,
Iyay elltay ethay aithfulfay ictatesday ofyay ymay eastbray.
Otay eakspay ishay oughtsthay isyay everyyay eeman’sfray ightray,
Inyay eacepay, inyay arway, inyay ouncilcay, andyay inyay ightfay;
Andyay allyay Iyay ovemay, eferringday otay ythay aysway,
Utbay endstay otay aiseray atthay owerpay ichwhay Iyay obeyyay.
Enthay earhay ymay ordsway, ornay aymay ymay ordsway ebay ainvay!
Eeksay otnay isthay ayday ethay Eciangray ipsshay otay aingay;
Orfay uresay, otay arnway usyay, Ovejay ishay omenyay entsay,
Andyay usthay ymay indmay explainsyay itsyay earclay eventyay:
Ethay ictorvay eagleyay, osewhay inistersay ightflay
Etardsray ouryay osthay, andyay illsfay ouryay eartshay ithway ightfray,
Ismiss’dday ishay onquestcay inyay ethay iddlemay iesskay,
Allow’dyay otay eizesay, utbay otnay ossesspay ethay izepray;
Usthay, oughthay eway irdgay ithway iresfay ethay Eciangray eetflay,
Oughthay esethay oudpray ulwalksbay umbletay atyay ouryay eetfay,
Oilstay unforeseenyay, andyay iercerfay, areyay ecreedday;
Oremay oesway allshay ollowfay, andyay oremay eroeshay eedblay.
Osay odesbay ymay oulsay, andyay idsbay emay usthay adviseyay;
Orfay usthay ayay ilfulskay eersay ouldway eadray ethay iesskay.”

Otay imhay enthay Ectorhay ithway isdainday eturn’dray:
ierce(fay asyay ehay okespay, ishay eyesyay ithway uryfay urn’dbay:)
are“ay esethay ethay aithfulfay ounselscay ofyay ythay onguetay?
Ythay illway isyay artialpay, otnay ythay easonray ongwray:
Oryay ifyay ethay urposepay ofyay ythay earthay outhay entvay,
Uresay eavenhay esumesray ethay ittlelay ensesay ityay entlay.
Atwhay owardcay ounselscay ouldway ythay adnessmay ovemay
Againstyay ethay ordway, ethay illway eveal’dray ofyay Ovejay?
Ethay eadinglay ignsay, ethay irrevocableyay odnay,
Andyay appyhay understhay ofyay ethay avouringfay odgay,
Esethay allshay Iyay ightslay, andyay uidegay ymay averingway indmay
Ybay anderingway irdsbay atthay itflay ithway everyyay indway?
Yeyay agrantsvay ofyay ethay yskay! youryay ingsway extendyay,
Oryay erewhay ethay unssay ariseyay, oryay erewhay escendday;
Otay ightray, otay eftlay, unheededyay aketay youryay ayway,
Ilewhay Iyay ethay ictatesday ofyay ighhay eavenhay obeyyay.
Ithoutway ayay ignsay ishay ordsway ethay avebray anmay awsdray,
Andyay asksyay onay omenyay utbay ishay ountry’scay ausecay.
Utbay ywhay ould’stshay outhay uspectsay ethay ar’sway uccesssay?
Onenay earsfay ityay oremay, asyay onenay omotespray ityay esslay:
Oughthay allyay ouryay iefschay amidstyay yonyay ipsshay expireyay,
Usttray ythay ownyay owardicecay otay escapeyay eirthay irefay.
Oytray andyay erhay onssay aymay indfay ayay eneralgay avegray,
Utbay outhay anstcay ivelay, orfay outhay anstcay ebay ayay aveslay.
Yetyay ouldshay ethay earsfay atthay aryway indmay uggestssay
Eadspray eirthay oldcay oisonpay oughthray ouryay oldierssay’ eastsbray,
Ymay avelinjay ancay evengeray osay asebay ayay artpay,
Andyay eefray ethay oulsay atthay uiversqay inyay ythay earthay.”

Uriousfay ehay okespay, andyay, ushingray otay ethay allway,
Allscay onyay ishay osthay; ishay osthay obeyyay ethay allcay;
Ithway ardouryay ollowfay erewhay eirthay eaderlay iesflay:
Edoublingray amoursclay underthay inyay ethay iesskay.
Ovejay eathesbray ayay irlwindwhay omfray ethay illshay ofyay Ideyay,
Andyay iftsdray ofyay ustday ethay oudedclay avynay idehay;
Ehay illsfay ethay Eeksgray ithway errortay andyay ismayday,
Andyay ivesgay eatgray Ectorhay ethay edestinedpray ayday.
Ongstray inyay emselvesthay, utbay ongerstray inyay ishay aidyay,
Oseclay otay ethay orksway eirthay igidray iegesay eythay aidlay.
Inyay ainvay ethay oundsmay andyay assymay eamsbay efendday,
Ilewhay esethay eythay undermineyay, andyay osethay eythay endray;
Upheavedyay ethay ilespay atthay oppray ethay olidsay allway;
Andyay eapshay onyay eapshay ethay okysmay uinsray allfay.
Eecegray onyay erhay ampartsray andsstay ethay iercefay alarmsyay;
Ethay owdedcray ulwarksbay azeblay ithway avingway armsyay,
Ieldshay ouchingtay ieldshay, ayay onglay efulgentray owray;
Encewhay issinghay artsday, incessantyay, ainray elowbay.
Ethay oldbay Ajacesyay yflay omfray owertay otay owertay,
Andyay ouseray, ithway ameflay ivineday, ethay Eciangray owerpay.
Ethay enerousgay impulseyay everyyay Eekgray obeysyay;
Eatsthray urgeyay ethay earfulfay; andyay ethay aliantvay, aisepray.

ellows“fay inyay armsyay! osewhay eedsday areyay ownknay otay amefay,
Andyay youyay, osewhay ardouryay opeshay anyay equalyay amenay!
Incesay otnay alikeyay enduedyay ithway orcefay oryay artyay;
Eholdbay ayay ayday enwhay eachyay aymay actyay ishay artpay!
Ayay ayday otay irefay ethay avebray, andyay armway ethay oldcay,
Otay aingay ewnay oriesglay, oryay augmentyay ethay oldyay.
Urgeyay osethay owhay andstay, andyay osethay owhay aintfay, exciteyay;
Owndray Ector’shay auntsvay inyay oudlay exhortsyay ofyay ightfay;
Onquestcay, otnay afetysay, illfay ethay oughtsthay ofyay allyay;
Eeksay otnay youryay eetflay, utbay allysay omfray ethay allway;
Osay Ovejay onceyay oremay aymay ivedray eirthay outedray aintray,
Andyay Oytray ielay emblingtray inyay erhay allsway againyay.”

Eirthay ardouryay indleskay allyay ethay Eciangray owerspay;
Andyay ownay ethay onesstay escendday inyay eavierhay owersshay.
Asyay enwhay ighhay Ovejay ishay arpshay artilleryyay ormsfay,
Andyay opesyay ishay oudyclay agazinemay ofyay ormsstay;
Inyay inter’sway eakblay uncomfortableyay eignray,
Ayay owysnay inundationyay ideshay ethay ainplay;
Ehay illsstay ethay indsway, andyay idsbay ethay iesskay otay eepslay;
Enthay ourspay ethay ilentsay empesttay ickthay andyay eepday;
Andyay irstfay ethay ountain-topsmay areyay over’dcay o’eryay,
Enthay ethay eengray ieldsfay, andyay enthay ethay andysay oreshay;
Entbay ithway ethay eightway, ethay oddingnay oodsway areyay eensay,
Andyay oneyay ightbray asteway ideshay allyay ethay orksway ofyay enmay:
Ethay irclingcay eassay, aloneyay absorbingyay allyay,
Inkdray ethay issolvingday eecesflay asyay eythay allfay:
Osay omfray eachyay idesay increasedyay ethay onystay ainray,
Andyay ethay itewhay uinray isesray o’eryay ethay ainplay.

Usthay odlikegay Ectorhay andyay ishay oopstray ontendcay
Otay orcefay ethay ampartsray, andyay ethay atesgay otay endray:
Ornay Oytray ouldcay onquercay, ornay ethay Eeksgray ouldway yieldyay,
Illtay eatgray Arpedonsay ower’dtay amidyay ethay ieldfay;
Orfay ightymay Ovejay inspiredyay ithway artialmay ameflay
Ishay atchlessmay onsay, andyay urgedyay imhay onyay otay amefay.
Inyay armsyay ehay inesshay, onspicuouscay omfray afaryay,
Andyay earsbay aloftyay ishay ampleyay ieldshay inyay airyay;
Ithinway osewhay orbyay ethay ickthay ull-hidesbay ereway oll’dray,
Onderouspay ithway assbray, andyay oundbay ithway uctileday oldgay:
Andyay ilewhay otway ointedpay avelinsjay armyay ishay andshay,
Ajesticmay ovesmay alongyay, andyay eadslay ishay Ycianlay andsbay.

Osay ess’dpray ithway ungerhay, omfray ethay ountain’smay owbray
Escendsday ayay ionlay onyay ethay ocksflay elowbay;
Osay alksstay ethay ordlylay avagesay o’eryay ethay ainplay,
Inyay ullensay ajestymay, andyay ernstay isdainday:
Inyay ainvay oudlay astiffsmay aybay imhay omfray afaryay,
Andyay epherdsshay allgay imhay ithway anyay ironyay arway;
Egardlessray, uriousfay, ehay ursuespay ishay ayway;
Ehay oamsfay, ehay oarsray, ehay endsray ethay antingpay eypray.

Esolvedray alikeyay, ivineday Arpedonsay owsglay
Ithway enerousgay ageray atthay ivesdray imhay onyay ethay oesfay.
Ehay iewsvay ethay owerstay, andyay editatesmay eirthay allfay,
Otay uresay estructionday oomsday ethay aspiringyay allway;
Enthay astingcay onyay ishay iendfray anyay ardentyay ooklay,
Iredfay ithway ethay irstthay ofyay oryglay, usthay ehay okespay:

y“whay oastbay eway, Aucusglay! ouryay extendedyay eignray,[226]
Erewhay Anthusxay’ eamsstray enrichyay ethay Ycianlay ainplay,
Ouryay umerousnay erdshay atthay angeray ethay uitfulfray ieldfay,
Andyay illshay erewhay inesvay eirthay urplepay arvesthay yieldyay,
Ouryay oamingfay owlsbay ithway urerpay ectarnay own’dcray,
Ouryay eastsfay enhancedyay ithway usic’smay ightlyspray oundsay?
Ywhay onyay osethay oresshay areyay eway ithway oyjay urvey’dsay,
Admiredyay asyay eroeshay, andyay asyay odsgay obey’dyay,
Unlessyay eatgray actsyay uperiorsay eritmay ovepray,
Andyay indicatevay ethay ounteousbay owerspay aboveyay?
is’tay oursyay, ethay ignityday eythay ivegay otay acegray;
Ethay irstfay inyay alourvay, asyay ethay irstfay inyay aceplay;
Atthay enwhay ithway onderingway eyesyay ouryay artialmay andsbay
Eholdbay ouryay eedsday anscendingtray ouryay ommandscay,
Uchsay, eythay aymay ycray, eserveday ethay overeignsay atestay,
Omwhay osethay atthay envyyay areday otnay imitateyay!
Ouldcay allyay ouryay arecay eludeyay ethay oomyglay avegray,
Ichwhay aimsclay onay esslay ethay earfulfay andyay ethay avebray,
Orfay ustlay ofyay amefay Iyay ouldshay otnay ainlyvay areday
Inyay ightingfay ieldsfay, ornay urgeyay ythay oulsay otay arway.
Utbay incesay, alasyay! ignobleyay ageyay ustmay omecay,
Iseaseday, andyay eath’sday inexorableyay oomday,
Ethay ifelay, ichwhay othersyay aypay, etlay usyay estowbay,
Andyay ivegay otay amefay atwhay eway otay aturenay oweyay;
Avebray oughthay eway allfay, andyay onour’dhay ifyay eway ivelay,
Oryay etlay usyay oryglay aingay, oryay oryglay ivegay!”

Ehay aidsay; ishay ordsway ethay isteninglay iefchay inspireyay
Ithway equalyay armthway, andyay ouseray ethay arrior’sway irefay;
Ethay oopstray ursuepay eirthay eaderslay ithway elightday,
Ushray otay ethay oefay, andyay aimclay ethay omisedpray ightfay.
Enestheusmay omfray onyay ighhay ethay ormstay eheldbay
Eateningthray ethay ortfay, andyay ackeningblay inyay ethay ieldfay:
Aroundyay ethay allsway ehay azedgay, otay iewvay omfray arfay
Atwhay aidyay appear’dyay otay avertyay ethay approachingyay arway,
Andyay awsay erewhay Eucertay ithway ethay Ajacesyay oodstay,
Ofyay ightfay insatiateyay, odigalpray ofyay oodblay.
Inyay ainvay ehay allscay; ethay inday ofyay elmshay andyay ieldsshay
Ingsray otay ethay iesskay, andyay echoesyay oughthray ethay ieldsfay,
Ethay azenbray ingeshay yflay, ethay allsway esoundray,
Eavenhay emblestray, oarray ethay ountainsmay, understhay allyay ethay oundgray.
Enthay usthay otay Oosthay: ence“hay ithway eedspay e(hay aidsay),
Andyay urgeyay ethay oldbay Ajacesyay otay ouryay aidyay;
Eirthay engthstray, unitedyay, estbay aymay elphay otay earbay
Ethay oodyblay abourslay ofyay ethay oubtfulday arway:
Itherhay ethay Ycianlay incespray endbay eirthay oursecay,
Ethay estbay andyay avestbray ofyay ethay ostilehay orcefay.
Utbay ifyay ootay iercelyfay erethay ethay oesfay ontendcay,
Etlay Elamontay, atyay eastlay, ouryay owerstay efendday,
Andyay Eucertay astehay ithway ishay unerringyay owbay
Otay areshay ethay angerday, andyay epelray ethay oefay.”

Iftsway, atyay ethay ordway, ethay eraldhay eedsspay alongyay
Ethay oftylay ampartsray, oughthray ethay artialmay ongthray,
Andyay indsfay ethay eroeshay athedbay inyay eatsway andyay oregay,
Opposedyay inyay ombatcay onyay ethay ustyday oreshay.
ye“ay aliantvay eaderslay ofyay ouryay arlikeway andsbay!
Youryay aidyay aid(say Oosthay) Eteuspay’ onsay emandsday;
Youryay engthstray, unitedyay, estbay aymay elphay otay earbay
Ethay oodyblay abourslay ofyay ethay oubtfulday arway:
Itherthay ethay Ycianlay incespray endbay eirthay oursecay,
Ethay estbay andyay avestbray ofyay ethay ostilehay orcefay.
Utbay ifyay ootay iercelyfay, erehay, ethay oesfay ontendcay,
Atyay eastlay, etlay Elamontay osethay owerstay efendday,
Andyay Eucertay astehay ithway ishay unerringyay owbay
Otay areshay ethay angerday, andyay epelray ethay oefay.”

Aightstray otay ethay ortfay eatgray Ajaxyay urn’dtay ishay arecay,
Andyay usthay espokebay ishay othersbray ofyay ethay arway:
ow“nay, aliantvay Ycomedelay! exertyay youryay ightmay,
Andyay, avebray Oïleusyay, ovepray youryay orcefay inyay ightfay;
Otay youyay Iyay usttray ethay ortunefay ofyay ethay ieldfay,
Illtay ybay isthay armyay ethay oefay allshay ebay epell’dray:
Atthay oneday, expectyay emay otay ompletecay ethay ayday.
Enthay ithway ishay evenfoldsay ieldshay ehay odestray awayyay.”
Ithway equalyay epsstay oldbay Eucertay ess’dpray ethay oreshay,
Osewhay atalfay owbay ethay ongstray Andionpay orebay.

Ighhay onyay ethay allsway appear’dyay ethay Ycianlay owerspay,
Ikelay omesay ackblay empesttay atheringgay oundray ethay owerstay:
Ethay Eeksgray, oppress’dyay, eirthay utmostyay orcefay uniteyay,
Eparedpray otay abourlay inyay ethay unequalyay ightfay:
Ethay arway enewsray, ix’dmay outsshay andyay oansgray ariseyay;
Umultuoustay amourclay ountsmay, andyay ickensthay inyay ethay iesskay.
Iercefay Ajaxyay irstfay ethay advancingyay osthay invadesyay,
Andyay endssay ethay avebray Epiclesyay otay ethay adesshay,
Arpedon’ssay iendfray. Acrossyay ethay arrior’sway ayway,
Entray omfray ethay allsway, ayay ockyray agmentfray aylay;
Inyay odernmay agesyay otnay ethay ongeststray ainsway
Ouldcay eavehay ethay unwieldyyay urdenbay omfray ethay ainplay:
Ehay oisedpay, andyay ungsway ityay oundray; enthay oss’dtay onyay ighhay,
Ityay ewflay ithway orcefay, andyay abour’dlay upyay ethay yskay;
Ullfay onyay ethay Ycian’slay elmethay underingthay ownday,
Ethay onderouspay uinray ush’dcray ishay atter’dbay owncray.
Asyay ilfulskay iversday omfray omesay airyyay eepstay
Eadlonghay escendday, andyay ootshay intoyay ethay eepday,
Osay allsfay Epiclesyay; enthay inyay oansgray expiresyay,
Andyay urmuringmay otay ethay adesshay ethay oulsay etiresray.

Ilewhay otay ethay ampartsray aringday Aucusglay ewdray,
Omfray Eucer’stay andhay ayay ingedway arrowyay ewflay;
Ethay eardedbay aftshay ethay estinedday assagepay oundfay,
Andyay onyay ishay akednay armyay inflictsyay ayay oundway.
Ethay iefchay, owhay ear’dfay omesay oe’sfay insultingyay oastbay
Ightmay opstay ethay ogresspray ofyay ishay arlikeway osthay,
Onceal’dcay ethay oundway, andyay, eapinglay omfray ishay eighthay
Etiredray eluctantray omfray ethay unfinish’dyay ightfay.
Ivineday Arpedonsay ithway egretray eheldbay
Isabledday Aucusglay owlyslay uitqay ethay ieldfay;
Ishay eatingbay eastbray ithway enerousgay ardouryay owsglay,
Ehay ingsspray otay ightfay, andyay iesflay uponyay ethay oesfay.
Alcmaonyay irstfay asway oom’dday ishay orcefay otay eelfay;
Eepday inyay ishay eastbray ehay ungedplay ethay ointedpay eelstay;
Enthay omfray ethay yawningyay oundway ithway uryfay oretay
Ethay earspay, ursuedpay ybay ushinggay eamsstray ofyay oregay:
Ownday inkssay ethay arriorway ithway ayay underingthay oundsay,
Ishay azenbray armouryay ingsray againstyay ethay oundgray.

Iftsway otay ethay attlementbay ethay ictorvay iesflay,
Ugstay ithway ullfay orcefay, andyay everyyay ervenay appliesyay:
Ityay akesshay; ethay onderouspay onesstay isjointedday yieldyay;
Ethay ollingray uinsray okesmay alongyay ethay ieldfay.
Ayay ightymay eachbray appearsyay; ethay allsway ielay arebay;
Andyay, ikelay ayay elugeday, ushesray inyay ethay arway.
Atyay onceyay oldbay Eucertay awsdray ethay angingtway owbay,
Andyay Ajaxyay endssay ishay avelinjay atyay ethay oefay;
Ix’dfay inyay ishay eltbay ethay eather’dfay eaponway oodstay,
Andyay oughthray ishay ucklerbay ovedray ethay emblingtray oodway;
Utbay Ovejay asway esentpray inyay ethay ireday ebateday,
Otay ieldshay ishay offspringyay, andyay avertyay ishay atefay.
Ethay incepray avegay ackbay, otnay editatingmay ightflay,
Utbay urgingyay engeancevay, andyay everersay ightfay;
Enthay aisedray ithway opehay, andyay iredfay ithway ory’sglay armschay,
Ishay aintingfay uadronssqay otay ewnay uryfay armsway.
o“ay erewhay, yeyay Ycianslay, isyay ethay engthstray youyay oastbay?
Youryay ormerfay amefay andyay ancientyay irtuevay ostlay!
Ethay eachbray ieslay openyay, utbay youryay iefchay inyay ainvay
Attemptsyay aloneyay ethay uardedgay asspay otay aingay:
Uniteyay, andyay oonsay atthay ostilehay eetflay allshay allfay:
Ethay orcefay ofyay owerfulpay unionyay onquerscay allyay.”

Isthay ustjay ebukeray inflamedyay ethay Ycianlay ewcray;
Eythay oinjay, eythay ickenthay, andyay ethay assaultyay enewray:
Unmovedyay ethay embodiedyay Eeksgray eirthay uryfay areday,
Andyay ix’dfay upportsay ethay eightway ofyay allyay ethay arway;
Ornay ouldcay ethay Eeksgray epelray ethay Ycianlay owerspay,
Ornay ethay oldbay Ycianslay orcefay ethay Eciangray owerstay.
Asyay onyay ethay onfinescay ofyay adjoiningyay oundsgray,
Otway ubbornstay ainssway ithway owsblay isputeday eirthay oundsbay;
Eythay ugtay, eythay eatsway; utbay eithernay aingay, ornay yieldyay,
Oneyay ootfay, oneyay inchyay, ofyay ethay ontendedcay ieldfay;
Usthay obstinateyay otay eathday, eythay ightfay, eythay allfay;
Ornay esethay ancay eepkay, ornay osethay ancay inway ethay allway.
Eirthay anlymay eastsbray areyay iercedpay ithway anymay ayay oundway,
Oudlay okesstray areyay eardhay, andyay attlingray armsyay esoundray;
Ethay opiouscay aughterslay overscay allyay ethay oreshay,
Andyay ethay ighhay ampartsray ipdray ithway umanhay oregay.

Asyay enwhay otway alesscay areyay argedchay ithway oubtfulday oadslay,
Omfray idesay otay idesay ethay emblingtray alancebay odsnay,
ile(whay omesay aboriouslay atronmay, ustjay andyay oorpay,
Ithway icenay exactnessyay eighsway erhay oollyway orestay,)
Illtay oisedpay aloftyay, ethay estingray eambay uspendssay
Eachyay equalyay eightway; ornay isthay, ornay atthay, escendsday:[227]
Osay oodstay ethay arway, illtay Ector’shay atchlessmay ightmay,
Ithway atesfay evailingpray, urn’dtay ethay alescay ofyay ightfay.
Iercefay asyay ayay irlwindwhay upyay ethay allsway ehay iesflay,
Andyay iresfay ishay osthay ithway oudlay epeatedray iescray.
advance“ay, yeyay Ojanstray! endlay youryay aliantvay andshay,
Astehay otay ethay eetflay, andyay osstay ethay azingblay andsbray!”
Eythay earhay, eythay unray; andyay, atheringgay atyay ishay allcay,
Aiseray alingscay enginesyay, andyay ascendyay ethay allway:
Aroundyay ethay orksway ayay oodway ofyay itteringglay earsspay
Ootsshay upyay, andyay allyay ethay isingray osthay appearsyay.
Ayay onderouspay onestay oldbay Ectorhay eavedhay otay owthray,
Ointedpay aboveyay, andyay oughray andyay ossgray elowbay:
Otnay otway ongstray enmay ethay enormousyay eightway ouldcay aiseray,
Uchsay enmay asyay ivelay inyay esethay egenerateday aysday:
Yetyay isthay, asyay easyyay asyay ayay ainsway ouldcay earbay
Ethay owysnay eeceflay, ehay oss’dtay, andyay ookshay inyay airyay;
Orfay Ovejay upheldyay, andyay ighten’dlay ofyay itsyay oadlay
Ethay unwieldyyay ockray, ethay abourlay ofyay ayay odgay.
Usthay arm’dyay, eforebay ethay oldedfay atesgay ehay amecay,
Ofyay assymay ubstancesay, andyay upendousstay amefray;
Ithway ironyay arsbay andyay azenbray ingeshay ongstray,
Onyay oftylay eamsbay ofyay olidsay imbertay unghay:
Enthay underingthay oughthray ethay anksplay ithway orcefulfay aysway,
Ivesdray ethay arpshay ockray; ethay olidsay eamsbay ivegay ayway,
Ethay oldsfay areyay atter’dshay; omfray ethay acklingcray oorday
Eaplay ethay esoundingray arsbay, ethay yingflay ingeshay oarray.
Ownay ushingray inyay, ethay uriousfay iefchay appearsyay,
Oomyglay asyay ightnay![228] andyay akesshay otway iningshay earsspay:
Ayay eadfuldray eamglay omfray ishay ightbray armouryay amecay,
Andyay omfray ishay eye-ballsyay ash’dflay ethay ivinglay ameflay.
Ehay ovesmay ayay odgay, esistlessray inyay ishay oursecay,
Andyay eemssay ayay atchmay orfay oremay anthay ortalmay orcefay.
Enthay ouringpay afteryay, oughthray ethay apinggay acespay,
Ayay idetay ofyay Ojanstray owsflay, andyay illsfay ethay aceplay;
Ethay Eeksgray eholdbay, eythay embletray, andyay eythay yflay;
Ethay oreshay isyay eap’dhay ithway eathday, andyay umulttay endsray ethay yskay.


illustration[ay: ] Eekgray Altaryay




Ookbay Iiixay.


Argumentyay.


Ethay Ourthfay Attlebay Ontinuedcay, Inyay Ichwhay Eptunenay Assistsyay Ethay Eeksgray: Ethay
Actsyay Ofyay Idomeneusyay.


Eptunenay, oncernedcay orfay ethay osslay ofyay ethay Eciansgray, uponyay eeingsay ethay
ortificationfay orcedfay ybay Ectorhay, o(whay adhay enteredyay ethay ategay earnay ethay
ationstay ofyay ethay Ajacesyay,) assumesyay ethay apeshay ofyay Alchascay, andyay inspiresyay
osethay eroeshay otay opposeyay imhay: enthay, inyay ethay ormfay ofyay oneyay ofyay ethay eneralsgay,
encouragesyay ethay otheryay Eeksgray owhay adhay etiredray otay eirthay esselsvay. Ethay
Ajacesyay ormfay eirthay oopstray inyay ayay oseclay alanxphay, andyay utpay ayay opstay otay Ectorhay
andyay ethay Ojanstray. Everalsay eedsday ofyay alourvay areyay erformedpay; Erionesmay,
osinglay ishay earspay inyay ethay encounteryay, epairsray otay eeksay anotheryay atyay ethay enttay
ofyay Idomeneusyay: isthay occasionsyay ayay onversationcay etweenbay osethay otway arriorsway,
owhay eturnray ogethertay otay ethay attlebay. Idomeneusyay ignalizessay ishay ouragecay
aboveyay ethay estray; ehay illskay Othryoneusyay, Asiusyay, andyay Alcathousyay: Eiphobusday
andyay Easænay archmay againstyay imhay, andyay atyay engthlay Idomeneusyay etiresray. Enelausmay
oundsway Elenushay, andyay illskay Isanderpay. Ethay Ojanstray areyay epulsedray onyay ethay
eftlay ingway; Ectorhay illstay eepskay ishay oundgray againstyay ethay Ajacesyay, illtay,
eingbay alledgay ybay ethay Ocrianlay ingersslay andyay archersyay, Olydamaspay advisesyay otay
allcay ayay ouncilcay ofyay arway: Ectorhay approvesyay ofyay ishay adviceyay, utbay oesgay irstfay otay
allyray ethay Ojanstray; upbraidsyay Arispay, ejoinsray Olydamaspay, eetsmay Ajaxyay againyay,
andyay enewsray ethay attackyay.
 Ethay eight-and-twentiethyay ayday illstay ontinuescay. Ethay enescay isyay etweenbay
 ethay Eciangray allway andyay ethay ea-shoresay.


Enwhay ownay ethay Undererthay onyay ethay ea-beatsay oastcay
Adhay ix’dfay eatgray Ectorhay andyay ishay onqueringcay osthay,
Ehay eftlay emthay otay ethay atesfay, inyay oodyblay ayfray
Otay oiltay andyay ugglestray oughthray ethay ell-foughtway ayday.
Enthay urn’dtay otay Aciathray omfray ethay ieldfay ofyay ightfay
Osethay eyesyay atthay edshay insufferableyay ightlay,
Otay erewhay ethay Ysiansmay ovepray eirthay artialmay orcefay,
Andyay ardyhay Aciansthray ametay ethay avagesay orsehay;
Andyay erewhay ethay ar-famedfay Ippomolgianhay aysstray,
Enown’dray orfay usticejay andyay orfay engthlay ofyay aysday;[229]
Icethray appyhay aceray! atthay, innocentyay ofyay oodblay,
Omfray ilkmay, innoxiousyay, eeksay eirthay implesay oodfay:
Ovejay eessay elightedday; andyay avoidsyay ethay enescay
Ofyay uiltygay Oytray, ofyay armsyay, andyay yingday enmay:
Onay aidyay, ehay eemsday, otay eitheryay osthay isyay ivengay,
Ilewhay ishay ighhay awlay uspendssay ethay owerspay ofyay Eavenhay.

Eantimemay ethay onarchmay ofyay ethay ateryway ainmay
Observedyay ethay Undererthay, ornay observedyay inyay ainvay.
Inyay Amothraciasay, onyay ayay ountain’smay owbray,
Osewhay avingway oodsway o’erhungyay ethay eepsday elowbay,
Ehay atsay; andyay oundray imhay astcay ishay azureyay eyesyay
Erewhay Ida’syay istymay opstay onfusedlycay iseray;
Elowbay, airfay Ilion’syay itteringglay iresspay ereway eensay;
Ethay owdedcray ipsshay andyay ablesay eassay etweenbay.
Erethay, omfray ethay ystalcray amberschay ofyay ethay ainmay
Emergedyay, ehay atsay, andyay ourn’dmay ishay Argivesyay ainslay.
Atyay Ovejay incensedyay, ithway iefgray andyay uryfay ungstay,
Onepray ownday ethay ockyray eepstay ehay ush’dray alongyay;
Iercefay asyay ehay ass’dpay, ethay oftylay ountainsmay odnay,
Ethay orestfay akesshay; earthyay embledtray asyay ehay odtray,
Andyay eltfay ethay ootstepsfay ofyay ethay immortalyay odgay.
Omfray ealmray otay ealmray eethray ampleyay idesstray ehay ooktay,
Andyay, atyay ethay ourthfay, ethay istantday Aeægay ookshay.

Arfay inyay ethay aybay ishay iningshay alacepay andsstay,
Eternalyay amefray! otnay aisedray ybay ortalmay andshay:
Isthay avinghay each’dray, ishay ass-hoof’dbray eedsstay ehay einsray,
Eetflay asyay ethay indsway, andyay eck’dday ithway oldengay anesmay.
Efulgentray armsyay ishay ightymay imbslay infoldyay,
Immortalyay armsyay ofyay adamantyay andyay oldgay.
Ehay ountsmay ethay arcay, ethay oldengay ourgescay appliesyay,
Ehay itssay uperiorsay, andyay ethay ariotchay iesflay:
Ishay irlingwhay eelswhay ethay assyglay urfacesay eepsway;
Ethay enormousyay onstersmay ollingray o’eryay ethay eepday
Ambolgay aroundyay imhay onyay ethay ateryway ayway,
Andyay eavyhay aleswhay inyay awkwardyay easuresmay ayplay;
Ethay easay ubsidingsay eadsspray ayay evellay ainplay,
Exultsyay, andyay ownsyay ethay onarchmay ofyay ethay ainmay;
Ethay artingpay avesway eforebay ishay ourserscay yflay;
Ethay onderingway atersway eavelay ishay axleyay ydray.

Eepday inyay ethay iquidlay egionsray ieslay ayay avecay,
Etweenbay erewhay Enedostay ethay urgessay avelay,
Andyay ockyray Imbrusyay eaksbray ethay ollingray aveway:
Erethay ethay eatgray ulerray ofyay ethay azureyay oundray
Opp’dstay ishay iftsway ariotchay, andyay ishay eedsstay unboundyay,
Edfay ithway ambrosialyay erbagehay omfray ishay andhay,
Andyay ink’dlay eirthay etlocksfay ithway ayay oldengay andbay,
Infrangibleyay, immortalyay: erethay eythay aystay:
Ethay atherfay ofyay ethay oodsflay ursuespay ishay ayway:
Erewhay, ikelay ayay empesttay, arkeningday eavenhay aroundyay,
Oryay ieryfay elugeday atthay evoursday ethay oundgray,
Ethay impatientyay Ojanstray, inyay ayay oomyglay ongthray,
Embattledyay oll’dray, asyay Ectorhay ush’dray alongyay:
Otay ethay oudlay umulttay andyay ethay arbarousbay ycray
Ethay eavenshay e-echoray, andyay ethay oresshay eplyray:
Eythay owvay estructionday otay ethay Eciangray amenay,
Andyay inyay eirthay opeshay ethay eetsflay alreadyyay ameflay.

Utbay Eptunenay, isingray omfray ethay eassay ofoundpray,
Ethay odgay osewhay earthquakesyay ockray ethay olidsay oundgray,
Ownay earsway ayay ortalmay ormfay; ikelay Alchascay eensay,
Uchsay ishay oudlay oicevay, andyay uchsay ishay anlymay ienmay;
Ishay outsshay incessantyay everyyay Eekgray inspireyay,
Utbay ostmay ethay Ajacesyay, addingyay irefay otay irefay.


illustration[ay: ] Eptunenay Isingray Omfray Ethay Easay


is“’tay yoursyay, Oyay arriorsway, allyay ouryay opeshay otay aiseray:
Ohyay ecollectray youryay ancientyay orthway andyay aisepray!
is’tay yoursyay otay avesay usyay, ifyay youyay easecay otay earfay;
Ightflay, oremay anthay amefulshay, isyay estructiveday erehay.
Onyay otheryay orksway oughthay Oytray ithway uryfay allfay,
Andyay ourpay erhay armiesyay o’eryay ouryay atter’dbay allway:
Erethay Eecegray ashay engthstray: utbay isthay, isthay artpay o’erthrownyay,
Erhay engthstray ereway ainvay; Iyay eaddray orfay youyay aloneyay:
Erehay Ectorhay agesray ikelay ethay orcefay ofyay irefay,
Auntsvay ofyay ishay odsgay, andyay allscay ighhay Ovejay ishay iresay:
Ifyay yetyay omesay eavenlyhay owerpay youryay eastbray exciteyay,
Eathebray inyay youryay eartshay, andyay ingstray youryay armsyay otay ightfay,
Eecegray yetyay aymay ivelay, erhay eaten’dthray eetflay aintainmay:
Andyay Ector’shay orcefay, andyay Ove’sjay ownyay aidyay, ebay ainvay.”

Enthay ithway ishay eptrescay, atthay ethay eepday ontrolscay,
Ehay ouch’dtay ethay iefschay, andyay eel’dstay eirthay anlymay oulssay:
Engthstray, otnay eirthay ownyay, ethay ouchtay ivineday impartsyay,
Omptspray eirthay ightlay imbslay, andyay ellssway eirthay aringday eartshay.
Enthay, asyay ayay alconfay omfray ethay ockyray eighthay,
Erhay uarryqay eensay, impetuousyay atyay ethay ightsay,
Orth-springingfay instantyay, artsday erselfhay omfray ighhay,
Ootsshay onyay ethay ingway, andyay imsskay alongyay ethay yskay:
Uchsay, andyay osay iftsway, ethay owerpay ofyay oceanyay ewflay;
Ethay ideway orizonhay utshay imhay omfray eirthay iewvay.

Ethay inspiringyay odgay Oïleusyay’ activeyay onsay
Erceivedpay ethay irstfay, andyay usthay otay Elamontay:

ome“say odgay, ymay iendfray, omesay odgay inyay umanhay ormfay
Avouringfay escendsday, andyay illsway otay andstay ethay ormstay.
Otnay Alchascay isthay, ethay enerablevay eersay;
Ortshay asyay ehay urnedtay, Iyay awsay ethay owerpay appearyay:
Iyay ark’dmay ishay artingpay, andyay ethay epsstay ehay odtray;
Ishay ownyay ightbray evidenceyay evealsray ayay odgay.
Evenyay ownay omesay energyyay ivineday Iyay areshay,
Andyay eemsay otay alkway onyay ingsway, andyay eadtray inyay airyay!”

ith“way equalyay ardouryay elamon(tay eturnsray)
Ymay oulsay isyay indledkay, andyay ymay osombay urnsbay;
Ewnay isingray iritsspay allyay ymay orcefay alarmyay,
Iftlay eachyay impatientyay imblay, andyay acebray ymay armyay.
Isthay eadyray armyay, unthinkingyay, akesshay ethay artday;
Ethay oodblay ourspay ackbay, andyay ortifiesfay ymay earthay:
Inglysay, ethinksmay, yonyay oweringtay iefchay Iyay eetmay,
Andyay etchstray ethay eadfuldray Ectorhay atyay ymay eetfay.”

Ullfay ofyay ethay odgay atthay urgedyay eirthay urningbay eastbray,
Ethay eroeshay usthay eirthay utualmay armthway express’dyay.
Eptunenay eanwhilemay ethay outedray Eeksgray inspiredyay;
Owhay, eathlessbray, alepay, ithway engthlay ofyay abourslay iredtay,
Antpay inyay ethay ipsshay; ilewhay Oytray otay onquestcay allscay,
Andyay armssway ictoriousvay o’eryay eirthay yieldingyay allsway:
Emblingtray eforebay ethay impendingyay ormstay eythay ielay,
Ilewhay earstay ofyay ageray andstay urningbay inyay eirthay eyeyay.
Eecegray unksay eythay oughtthay, andyay isthay eirthay atalfay ourhay;
Utbay eathebray ewnay ouragecay asyay eythay eelfay ethay owerpay.
Eucertay andyay Eituslay irstfay ishay ordsway exciteyay;
Enthay ernstay Eneleuspay isesray otay ethay ightfay;
Oasthay, Eipyrusday, inyay armsyay enown’dray,
Andyay Erionmay extnay, ethay impulsiveyay uryfay oundfay;
Astlay Estor’snay onsay ethay amesay oldbay ardouryay akestay,
Ilewhay usthay ethay odgay ethay artialmay irefay awakesyay:

oh“ay astinglay infamyyay, ohyay ireday isgraceday
Otay iefschay ofyay igorousvay youthyay, andyay anlymay aceray!
Iyay ustedtray inyay ethay odsgay, andyay youyay, otay eesay
Avebray Eecegray ictoriousvay, andyay erhay avynay eefray:
Ahyay, o—thenay oriousglay ombatcay youyay isclaimday,
Andyay oneyay ackblay ayday oudsclay allyay erhay ormerfay amefay.
Eavenshay! atwhay ayay odigypray esethay eyesyay urveysay,
Unseenyay, unthoughtyay, illtay isthay amazingyay ayday!
Yflay eway atyay engthlay omfray Oy’stray oft-conquer’dyay andsbay?
Andyay allsfay ouryay eetflay ybay uchsay ingloriousyay andshay?
Ayay outray undisciplinedyay, ayay agglingstray aintray,
Otnay ornbay otay oriesglay ofyay ethay ustyday ainplay;
Ikelay ightedfray awnsfay omfray illhay otay illhay ursuedpay,
Ayay eypray otay everyyay avagesay ofyay ethay oodway:
Allshay esethay, osay atelay owhay embledtray atyay youryay amenay,
Invadeyay youryay ampscay, involveyay youryay ipsshay inyay ameflay?
Ayay angechay osay amefulshay, aysay, atwhay ausecay ashay oughtwray?
Ethay oldierssay’ asenessbay, oryay ethay eneral’sgay aultfay?
Oolsfay! illway yeyay erishpay orfay youryay eader’slay icevay;
Ethay urchasepay infamyyay, andyay ifelay ethay icepray?
is’tay otnay youryay ausecay, Achillesyay’ injuredyay amefay:
Another’syay isyay ethay imecray, utbay yoursyay ethay ameshay.
Antgray atthay ouryay iefchay offendyay oughthray ageray oryay ustlay,
Ustmay youyay ebay owardscay, ifyay youryay ing’skay unjustyay?
Eventpray isthay evilyay, andyay youryay ountrycay avesay:
Allsmay oughtthay etrievesray ethay iritsspay ofyay ethay avebray.
Inkthay, andyay ubduesay! onyay astardsday eadday otay amefay
Iyay asteway onay angeryay, orfay eythay eelfay onay ameshay:
Utbay youyay, ethay idepray, ethay owerflay ofyay allyay ouryay osthay,
Ymay earthay eepsway oodblay otay eesay youryay oryglay ostlay!
Ornay eemday isthay ayday, isthay attlebay, allyay youyay oselay;
Ayay ayday oremay ackblay, ayay atefay oremay ilevay, ensuesyay.
Etlay eachyay eflectray, owhay izespray amefay oryay eathbray,
Onyay endlessyay infamyyay, onyay instantyay eathday:
Orfay, olay! ethay atedfay imetay, ethay appointedyay oreshay:
Arkhay! ethay atesgay urstbay, ethay azenbray arriersbay oarray!
Impetuousyay Ectorhay understhay atyay ethay allway;
Ethay ourhay, ethay otspay, otay onquercay, oryay otay allfay.”

Esethay ordsway ethay Eciansgray’ aintingfay eartshay inspireyay,
Andyay isteninglay armiesyay atchcay ethay odlikegay irefay.
Ix’dfay atyay ishay ostpay asway eachyay oldbay Ajaxyay oundfay,
Ithway ell-rangedway uadronssqay onglystray ircledcay oundray:
Osay oseclay eirthay orderyay, osay isposedday eirthay ightfay,
Asyay Allaspay’ elfsay ightmay iewvay ithway ix’dfay elightday;
Oryay adhay ethay odgay ofyay arway inclinedyay ishay eyesyay,
Ethay odgay ofyay arway adhay own’dyay ayay ustjay urprisesay.
Ayay osenchay alanxphay, irmfay, esolvedray asyay atefay,
Escendingday Ectorhay andyay ishay attlebay aitway.
Anyay ironyay enescay eamsglay eadfuldray o’eryay ethay ieldsfay,
Armouryay inyay armouryay ock’dlay, andyay ieldsshay inyay ieldsshay,
Earsspay eanlay onyay earsspay, onyay argetstay argetstay ongthray,
Elmshay uckstay otay elmshay, andyay anmay ovedray anmay alongyay.
Ethay oatingflay umesplay unnumber’dyay aveway aboveyay,
Asyay enwhay anyay earthquakeyay irsstay ethay oddingnay ovegray;
Andyay evell’dlay atyay ethay iesskay ithway ointingpay aysray,
Eirthay andish’dbray anceslay atyay eachyay otionmay azeblay.

Usthay eathingbray eathday, inyay erribletay arrayyay,
Ethay oseclay ompactedcay egionslay urgedyay eirthay ayway:
Iercefay eythay ovedray onyay, impatientyay otay estroyday;
Oytray argedchay ethay irstfay, andyay Ectorhay irstfay ofyay Oytray.
Asyay omfray omesay ountain’smay aggycray oreheadfay orntay,
Ayay ock’sray oundray agmentfray iesflay, ithway uryfay ornebay,
ich(whay omfray ethay ubbornstay onestay ayay orrenttay endsray,)
Ecipitatepray ethay onderouspay assmay escendsday:
Omfray eepstay otay eepstay ethay ollingray uinray oundsbay;
Atyay everyyay ockshay ethay acklingcray oodway esoundsray;
Illstay atheringgay orcefay, ityay okessmay; andyay urgedyay amainyay,
Irlswhay, eapslay, andyay understhay ownday, impetuousyay otay ethay ainplay:
Erethay ops—sostay Ectorhay. Eirthay olewhay orcefay ehay ovedpray,[230]
Esistlessray enwhay ehay agedray, andyay, enwhay ehay opp’dstay, unmovedyay.

Onyay imhay ethay arway isyay entbay, ethay artsday areyay edshay,
Andyay allyay eirthay alchionsfay aveway aroundyay ishay eadhay:
Epulsedray ehay andsstay, ornay omfray ishay andstay etiresray;
Utbay ithway epeatedray outsshay ishay armyyay iresfay.
ojans“tray! ebay irmfay; isthay armyay allshay akemay youryay ayway
Oughthray yonyay uaresqay odybay, andyay atthay ackblay arrayyay:
Andstay, andyay ymay earspay allshay outray eirthay atteringscay owerpay,
Ongstray asyay eythay eemsay, embattledyay ikelay ayay owertay;
Orfay ehay atthay Uno’sjay eavenlyhay osombay armsway,
Ethay irstfay ofyay odsgay, isthay ayday inspiresyay ouryay armsyay.”

Ehay aidsay; andyay ousedray ethay oulsay inyay everyyay eastbray:
Urgedyay ithway esireday ofyay amefay, eyondbay ethay estray,
Orthfay arch’dmay Eiphobusday; utbay, archingmay, eldhay
Eforebay ishay aryway epsstay ishay ampleyay ieldshay.
Oldbay Erionmay aim’dyay ayay okestray or(nay aim’dyay ityay ideway);
Ethay itteringglay avelinjay iercedpay ethay oughtay ull-hidebay;
Utbay iercedpay otnay oughthray: unfaithfulyay otay ishay andhay,
Ethay ointpay okebray ortshay, andyay arkledspay inyay ethay andsay.
Ethay Ojantray arriorway, ouch’dtay ithway imelytay earfay,
Onyay ethay aisedray orbyay otay istanceday orebay ethay earspay.
Ethay Eekgray, etreatingray, ourn’dmay ishay ustratefray owblay,
Andyay ursedcay ethay eacheroustray ancelay atthay aredspay ayay oefay;
Enthay otay ethay ipsshay ithway urlysay eedspay ehay entway,
Otay eeksay ayay urersay avelinjay inyay ishay enttay.

Eanwhilemay ithway isingray ageray ethay attlebay owsglay,
Ethay umulttay ickensthay, andyay ethay amourclay owsgray.
Ybay Eucer’stay armyay ethay arlikeway Imbriusyay eedsblay,
Ethay onsay ofyay Entormay, ichray inyay enerousgay eedsstay.
Ereyay yetyay otay Oytray ethay onssay ofyay Eecegray ereway edlay,
Inyay airfay Edaeuspay’ erdantvay asturespay edbray,
Ethay youthyay adhay eltdway, emoteray omfray ar’sway alarmsyay,
Andyay estblay inyay ightbray Edesicaste’smay armsyay:
is(thay ymphnay, ethay uitfray ofyay Iam’spray avish’dray oyjay,
Alliedyay ethay arriorway otay ethay ousehay ofyay Oytray:)
Otay Oytray, enwhay oryglay all’dcay ishay armsyay, ehay amecay,
Andyay atch’dmay ethay avestbray ofyay erhay iefschay inyay amefay:
Ithway Iam’spray onssay, ayay uardiangay ofyay ethay onethray,
Ehay ivedlay, elovedbay andyay onour’dhay asyay ishay ownyay.
Imhay Eucertay iercedpay etweenbay ethay oatthray andyay earyay:
Ehay oansgray eneathbay ethay Elamoniantay earspay.
Asyay omfray omesay ar-seenfay ountain’smay airyyay owncray,
Ubduedsay ybay eelstay, ayay alltay ashyay umblestay ownday,
Andyay oilssay itsyay erdantvay essestray onyay ethay oundgray;
Osay allsfay ethay youthyay; ishay armsyay ethay allfay esoundray.
Enthay Eucertay ushingray otay espoilday ethay eadday,
Omfray Ector’shay andhay ayay iningshay avelinjay edflay:
Ehay awsay, andyay unn’dshay ethay eathday; ethay orcefulfay artday
Ungsay onyay, andyay iercedpay Amphimachus’syay earthay,
Eatusctay’ onsay, ofyay Eptune’snay orcefulfay inelay;
Ainvay asway ishay ouragecay, andyay ishay aceray ivineday!
Ostratepray ehay allsfay; ishay angingclay armsyay esoundray,
Andyay ishay oadbray ucklerbay understhay onyay ethay oundgray.
Otay eizesay ishay eamybay elmhay ethay ictorvay iesflay,
Andyay ustjay adhay astenedfay onyay ethay azzlingday izepray,
Enwhay Ajaxyay’ anlymay armyay ayay avelinjay ungflay;
Ullfay onyay ethay ield’sshay oundray ossbay ethay eaponway ungray;
Ehay eltfay ethay ockshay, ornay oremay asway oom’dday otay eelfay,
Ecuresay inyay ailmay, andyay eath’dshay inyay iningshay eelstay.
Epulsedray ehay yieldsyay; ethay ictorvay Eeksgray obtainyay
Ethay oilsspay ontestedcay, andyay earbay offyay ethay ainslay.
Etweenbay ethay eaderslay ofyay ethay Athenianyay inelay,
ichius(stay ethay avebray, Enestheusmay ethay ivineday,)
Eploredday Amphimachusyay, adsay objectyay! ieslay;
Imbriusyay emainsray ethay iercefay Ajacesyay’ izepray.
Asyay otway imgray ionslay earbay acrossyay ethay awnlay,
Atch’dsnay omfray evouringday oundshay, ayay aughter’dslay awnfay.
Inyay eirthay ellfay awsjay igh-liftinghay oughthray ethay oodway,
Andyay inklingspray allyay ethay ubsshray ithway opsdray ofyay oodblay;
Osay esethay, ethay iefchay: eatgray Ajaxyay omfray ethay eadday
Ipsstray ishay ightbray armsyay; Oïleusyay opslay ishay eadhay:
Oss’dtay ikelay ayay allbay, andyay irl’dwhay inyay airyay awayyay,
Atyay Ector’shay eetfay ethay orygay isagevay aylay.

Ethay odgay ofyay oceanyay, iredfay ithway ernstay isdainday,
Andyay iercedpay ithway orrowsay orfay ishay andsongray ainslay,
Inspiresyay ethay Eciangray eartshay, onfirmscay eirthay andshay,
Andyay eathesbray estructionday onyay ethay Ojantray andsbay.
Iftsway asyay ayay irlwindwhay ushingray otay ethay eetflay,
Ehay indsfay ethay ance-famedlay Idomenyay ofyay Etecray,
Ishay ensivepay owbray ethay enerousgay arecay express’dyay
Ithway ichwhay ayay oundedway oldiersay ouch’dtay ishay eastbray,
Omwhay inyay ethay ancechay ofyay arway ayay avelinjay oretay,
Andyay ishay adsay omradescay omfray ethay attlebay orebay;
Imhay otay ethay urgeonssay ofyay ethay ampcay ehay entsay:
Atthay officeyay aidpay, ehay issuedyay omfray ishay enttay
Iercefay orfay ethay ightfay: otay omwhay ethay odgay egunbay,
Inyay Oasthay’ oicevay, Andræmon’syay aliantvay onsay,
Owhay uledray erewhay Alydon’scay itewhay ocksray ariseyay,
Andyay Euron’splay alkychay iffsclay emblazeyay ethay iesskay:

ere’s“whay ownay ethay imperiousyay auntvay, ethay aringday oastbay,
Ofyay Eecegray ictoriousvay, andyay oudpray Ilionyay ostlay?”

Otay omwhay ethay ingkay: on“ay Eecegray onay ameblay ebay ownthray;
Armsyay areyay erhay adetray, andyay arway isyay allyay erhay ownyay.
Erhay ardyhay eroeshay omfray ethay ell-foughtway ainsplay
Ornay earfay ithholdsway, ornay amefulshay othslay etainsday:
is’tay eavenhay, alasyay! andyay Ove’sjay all-powerfulyay oomday,
Atthay arfay, arfay istantday omfray ouryay ativenay omehay
Illsway usyay otay allfay ingloriousyay! Ohyay, ymay iendfray!
Onceyay oremostfay inyay ethay ightfay, illstay onepray otay endlay
Oryay armsyay oryay ounselscay, ownay erformpay ythay estbay,
Andyay atwhay outhay anstcay otnay inglysay, urgeyay ethay estray.”

Usthay ehay: andyay usthay ethay odgay osewhay orcefay ancay akemay
Ethay olidsay obe’sglay eternalyay asisbay akeshay:
ah“ay! evernay aymay ehay eesay ishay ativenay andlay,
Utbay eedfay ethay ulturesvay onyay isthay atefulhay andstray,
Owhay eekssay ignoblyyay inyay ishay ipsshay otay aystay,
Ornay aresday otay ombatcay onyay isthay ignalsay ayday!
Orfay isthay, eholdbay! inyay orridhay armsyay Iyay ineshay,
Andyay urgeyay ythay oulsay otay ivalray actsyay ithway inemay.
Ogethertay etlay usyay attlebay onyay ethay ainplay;
Otway, otnay ethay orstway; ornay evenyay isthay uccoursay ainvay:
Otnay ainvay ethay eakestway, ifyay eirthay orcefay uniteyay;
Utbay oursyay, ethay avestbray avehay onfess’dcay inyay ightfay.”

Isthay aidsay, ehay ushesray erewhay ethay ombatcay urnsbay;
Iftsway otay ishay enttay ethay Etancray ingkay eturnsray:
Omfray encethay, otway avelinsjay itteringglay inyay ishay andhay,
Andyay adclay inyay armsyay atthay ighten’dlay allyay ethay andstray,
Iercefay onyay ethay oefay ethay impetuousyay erohay ovedray,
Ikelay ightninglay urstingbay omfray ethay armyay ofyay Ovejay,
Ichwhay otay alepay anmay ethay athwray ofyay eavenhay eclaresday,
Oryay errifiestay ethay offendingyay orldway ithway arsway;
Inyay eamystray arklesspay, indlingkay allyay ethay iesskay,
Omfray olepay otay olepay ethay ailtray ofyay oryglay iesflay:
Usthay ishay ightbray armouryay o’eryay ethay azzledday ongthray
Eam’dglay eadfuldray, asyay ethay onarchmay ash’dflay alongyay.

Imhay, earnay ishay enttay, Erionesmay attendsyay;
Omwhay usthay ehay uestionsqay: ever“ay estbay ofyay iendsfray!
Oyay aysay, inyay everyyay artyay ofyay attlebay ill’dskay,
Atwhay oldshay ythay ouragecay omfray osay avebray ayay ieldfay?
Onyay omesay importantyay essagemay artyay outhay oundbay,
Oryay eedsblay ymay iendfray ybay omesay unhappyyay oundway?
Ingloriousyay erehay, ymay oulsay abhorsyay otay aystay,
Andyay owsglay ithway ospectspray ofyay thay’ approachingyay ayday.”

o“ay incepray! eriones(may epliesray) osewhay arecay
Eadslay orthfay ethay embattledyay onssay ofyay Etecray otay arway;
Isthay eaksspay ymay iefgray: isthay eadlesshay ancelay Iyay ieldway;
Ethay estray ieslay ootedray inyay ayay Ojantray ieldshay.”

Otay omwhay ethay Etancray: enter“ay, andyay eceiveray
Ethay ontedway eaponsway; osethay ymay enttay ancay ivegay;
Earsspay Iyay avehay orestay, and(ay Ojantray anceslay allyay,)
Atthay edshay ayay ustrelay oundray ethay illuminedyay allway,
Oughthay Iyay, isdainfulday ofyay ethay istantday arway,
Ornay usttray ethay artday, ornay aimyay ethay uncertainyay earspay,
Yetyay andhay otay andhay Iyay ightfay, andyay oilspay ethay ainslay;
Andyay encethay esethay ophiestray, andyay esethay armsyay Iyay aingay.
Enteryay, andyay eesay onyay eapshay ethay elmetshay oll’dray,
Andyay igh-hunghay earsspay, andyay ieldsshay atthay ameflay ithway oldgay.”

or“nay ainvay aid(say Erionmay) areyay ouryay artialmay oilstay;
Eway ootay ancay oastbay ofyay onay ignobleyay oilsspay:
Utbay osethay ymay ipshay ontainscay; encewhay istantday arfay,
Iyay ightfay onspicuouscay inyay ethay anvay ofyay arway,
Atwhay eednay Iyay oremay? Ifyay anyyay Eekgray erethay ebay
Owhay owsknay otnay Erionmay, Iyay appealyay otay eethay.”

Otay isthay, Idomeneusyay: e“thay ieldsfay ofyay ightfay
Avehay ovedpray ythay alourvay, andyay unconquer’dyay ightmay:
Andyay ereway omesay ambushyay orfay ethay oesfay esign’dday,
Evenyay erethay ythay ouragecay ouldway otnay aglay ehindbay:
Inyay atthay arpshay ervicesay, ingledsay omfray ethay estray,
Ethay earfay ofyay eachyay, oryay alourvay, andsstay onfess’dcay.
Onay orcefay, onay irmnessfay, ethay alepay owardcay owsshay;
Ehay iftsshay ishay aceplay: ishay olourcay omescay andyay oesgay:
Ayay oppingdray eatsway eepscray oldcay onyay everyyay artpay;
Againstyay ishay osombay eatsbay ishay uiveringqay earthay;
Errortay andyay eathday inyay ishay ildway eye-ballsyay arestay;
Ithway atteringchay eethtay ehay andsstay, andyay iffeningstay airhay,
Andyay ookslay ayay oodlessblay imageyay ofyay espairday!
Otnay osay ethay ave—stillbray auntlessday, illstay ethay amesay,
Unchangedyay ishay olourcay, andyay unmovedyay ishay amefray:
Omposedcay ishay oughtthay, eterminedday isyay ishay eyeyay,
Andyay ix’dfay ishay oulsay, otay onquercay oryay otay ieday:
Ifyay aughtyay isturbday ethay enourtay ofyay ishay eastbray,
is’tay utbay ethay ishway otay ikestray eforebay ethay estray.

in“ay uchsay assaysyay ythay amelessblay orthway isyay ownknay,
Andyay everyyay artyay ofyay angerousday arway ythay ownyay.
Ybay ancechay ofyay ightfay ateverwhay oundsway youyay orebay,
Osethay oundsway ereway oriousglay allyay, andyay allyay eforebay;
Uchsay asyay aymay eachtay, as’tway illstay ythay avebray elightday
Opposet’ay ythay osombay erewhay ythay oremostfay ightfay.
Utbay ywhay, ikelay infantsyay, oldcay otay onour’shay armschay,
Andstay eway otay alktay, enwhay oryglay allscay otay armsyay?
O—fromgay ymay onquer’dcay earsspay ethay oicestchay aketay,
Andyay otay eirthay ownersyay endsay emthay oblynay ackbay.”

Iftsway atyay ethay ordway oldbay Erionmay atch’dsnay ayay earspay
Andyay, eathingbray aughterslay, ollow’dfay otay ethay arway.
Osay Arsmay armipotentyay invadesyay ethay ainplay,
e(thay ideway estroyerday ofyay ethay aceray ofyay anmay,)
Errortay, ishay est-belovedbay onsay, attendsyay ishay oursecay,
Arm’dyay ithway ernstay oldnessbay, andyay enormousyay orcefay;
Ethay idepray ofyay aughtyhay arriorsway otay onfoundcay,
Andyay aylay ethay engthstray ofyay yrantstay onyay ethay oundgray:
Omfray Acethray eythay yflay, all’dcay otay ethay ireday alarmsyay
Ofyay arringway Egyansphlay, andyay Ephyrianyay armsyay;
Invokedyay ybay othbay, elentlessray eythay isposeday,
Otay esethay adglay onquestcay, urderousmay outray otay osethay.
Osay arch’dmay ethay eaderslay ofyay ethay Etancray aintray,
Andyay eirthay ightbray armsyay otshay orrorhay o’eryay ethay ainplay.

Enthay irstfay akespay Erionmay: all“shay eway oinjay ethay ightray,
Oryay ombatcay inyay ethay entrecay ofyay ethay ightfay?
Oryay otay ethay eftlay ouryay ontedway uccoursay endlay?
Azardhay andyay amefay allyay artspay alikeyay attendyay.”

ot“nay inyay ethay entrecay idomen(ay epliedray:)
Ouryay ablestyay ieftainschay ethay ainmay attlebay uidegay;
Eachyay odlikegay Ajaxyay akesmay atthay ostpay ishay arecay,
Andyay allantgay Eucertay ealsday estructionday erethay,
Ill’dskay oryay ithway aftsshay otay allgay ethay istantday ieldfay,
Oryay earbay oseclay attlebay onyay ethay oundingsay ieldshay.
Esethay ancay ethay ageray ofyay aughtyhay Ectorhay ametay:
Afesay inyay eirthay armsyay, ethay avynay earsfay onay ameflay,
Illtay Ovejay imselfhay escendsday, ishay oltsbay otay edshay,
Andyay urlhay ethay azingblay uinray atyay ouryay eadhay.
Eatgray ustmay ehay ebay, ofyay oremay anthay umanhay irthbay,
Ornay eedfay ikelay ortalsmay onyay ethay uitsfray ofyay earthyay.
Imhay eithernay ocksray ancay ushcray, ornay eelstay ancay oundway,
Omwhay Ajaxyay ellsfay otnay onyay ethay ensanguinedyay oundgray.
Inyay andingstay ightfay ehay atesmay Achillesyay’ orcefay,
Excell’dyay aloneyay inyay iftnesssway inyay ethay oursecay.
Enthay otay ethay eftlay ouryay eadyray armsyay applyyay,
Andyay ivelay ithway oryglay, oryay ithway oryglay ieday.”

Ehay aidsay: andyay Erionmay otay thay’ appointedyay aceplay,
Iercefay asyay ethay odgay ofyay attlesbay, urgedyay ishay acepay.
Oonsay asyay ethay oefay ethay iningshay iefschay eheldbay
Ushray ikelay ayay ieryfay orrenttay o’eryay ethay ieldfay,
Eirthay orcefay embodiedyay inyay ayay idetay eythay ourpay;
Ethay isingray ombatcay oundssay alongyay ethay oreshay.
Asyay arringway indsway, inyay Iriussay’ ultrysay eignray,
Omfray ifferentday uartersqay eepsway ethay andysay ainplay;
Onyay everyyay idesay ethay ustyday irlwindswhay iseray,
Andyay ethay ydray ieldsfay areyay iftedlay otay ethay iesskay:
Usthay ybay espairday, opehay, ageray, ogethertay ivendray,
Etmay ethay ackblay ostshay, andyay, eetingmay, arken’dday eavenhay.
Allyay eadfuldray aredglay ethay ironyay acefay ofyay arway,
Istledbray ithway uprightyay earsspay, atthay ash’dflay afaryay;
Ireday asway ethay eamglay ofyay eastplatesbray, elmshay, andyay ieldsshay,
Andyay olish’dpay armsyay emblazedyay ethay amingflay ieldsfay:
Emendoustray enescay! atthay eneralgay orrorhay avegay,
Utbay ouch’dtay ithway oyjay ethay osomsbay ofyay ethay avebray.

Aturn’ssay eatgray onssay inyay iercefay ontentioncay iedvay,
Andyay owdscray ofyay eroeshay inyay eirthay angeryay iedday.
Ethay iresay ofyay earthyay andyay eavenhay, ybay Etisthay onway
Otay owncray ithway oryglay Eleuspay’ odlikegay onsay,
Ill’dway otnay estructionday otay ethay Eciangray owerspay,
Utbay aredspay awhileyay ethay estinedday Ojantray owerstay;
Ilewhay Eptunenay, isingray omfray ishay azureyay ainmay,
Arr’dway onyay ethay ingkay ofyay eavenhay ithway ernstay isdainday,
Andyay eathedbray evengeray, andyay iredfay ethay Eciangray aintray.
Odsgay ofyay oneyay ourcesay, ofyay oneyay etherealyay aceray,
Alikeyay ivineday, andyay eavenhay eirthay ativenay aceplay;
Utbay Ovejay ethay eatergray; irst-bornfay ofyay ethay iesskay,
Andyay oremay anthay enmay, oryay odsgay, upremelysay iseway.
Orfay isthay, ofyay Ove’sjay uperiorsay ightmay afraidyay,
Eptunenay inyay umanhay ormfay onceal’dcay ishay aidyay.
Esethay owerspay enfoldyay ethay Eekgray andyay Ojantray aintray
Inyay arway andyay iscord’sday adamantineyay ainchay,
Indissolublyyay ongstray: ethay atalfay ietay
Isyay etch’dstray onyay othbay, andyay oseclay ompell’dcay eythay ieday.

Eadfuldray inyay armsyay, andyay owngray inyay ombatscay eygray,
Ethay oldbay Idomeneusyay ontrolscay ethay ayday.
Irstfay ybay ishay andhay Othryoneusyay asway ainslay,
Ell’dsway ithway alsefay opeshay, ithway admay ambitionyay ainvay;
All’dcay ybay ethay oicevay ofyay arway otay artialmay amefay,
Omfray ighhay Abesuscay’ istantday allsway ehay amecay;
Assandra’scay ovelay ehay oughtsay, ithway oastsbay ofyay owerpay,
Andyay omisedpray onquestcay asway ethay offer’dpray owerday.
Ethay ingkay onsentedcay, ybay ishay auntsvay abusedyay;
Ethay ingkay onsentedcay, utbay ethay atesfay efusedray.
Oudpray ofyay imselfhay, andyay ofyay ethay imaginedyay idebray,
Ethay ieldfay ehay easuredmay ithway ayay argerlay idestray.
Imhay asyay ehay alk’dstay, ethay Etancray avelinjay oundfay;
Ainvay asway ishay eastplatebray otay epelray ethay oundway:
Ishay eamdray ofyay oryglay ostlay, ehay ungedplay otay ellhay;
Ishay armsyay esoundedray asyay ethay oasterbay ellfay.
Ethay eatgray Idomeneusyay estridesbay ethay eadday;
and“ay usthay e(hay iescray) eholdbay ythay omisepray edspay!
Uchsay isyay ethay elphay ythay armsyay otay Ilionyay ingbray,
Andyay uchsay ethay ontractcay ofyay ethay Ygianphray ingkay!
Ouryay offersyay ownay, illustriousyay incepray! eceiveray;
Orfay uchsay anyay aidyay atwhay illway otnay Argosyay ivegay?
Otay onquercay Oytray, ithway oursyay ythay orcesfay oinjay,
Andyay ountcay Atridesyay’ airestfay aughterday inethay.
Eantimemay, onyay urtherfay ethodsmay otay adviseyay,
Omecay, ollowfay otay ethay eetflay ythay ewnay alliesyay;
Erethay earhay atwhay Eecegray ashay onyay erhay artpay otay aysay.”
Ehay okespay, andyay agg’ddray ethay orygay orsecay awayyay.
Isthay Asiusyay iew’dvay, unableyay otay ontaincay,
Eforebay ishay ariotchay arringway onyay ethay ainplay:
is(hay owdedcray ourserscay, otay ishay uiresqay onsign’dcay,
Impatientyay antedpay onyay ishay ecknay ehindbay:)
Otay engeancevay isingray ithway ayay uddensay ingspray,
Ehay opedhay ethay onquestcay ofyay ethay Etancray ingkay.
Ethay aryway Etancray, asyay ishay oefay ewdray earnay,
Ullfay onyay ishay oatthray ischargedday ethay orcefulfay earspay:
Eneathbay ethay inchay ethay ointpay asway eensay otay ideglay,
Andyay itter’dglay, extantyay atyay ethay urtherfay idesay.
Asyay enwhay ethay ountain-oakmay, oryay oplarpay alltay,
Oryay inepay, itfay astmay orfay omesay eatgray admiralyay,
Oansgray otay ethay oft-heavedyay axeyay, ithway anymay ayay oundway,
Enthay eadsspray ayay engthlay ofyay uinray o’eryay ethay oundgray:
Osay unksay oudpray Asiusyay inyay atthay eadfuldray ayday,
Andyay etch’dstray eforebay ishay uch-lovedmay ourserscay aylay.
Ehay indsgray ethay ustday istain’dday ithway eamingstray oregay,
Andyay, iercefay inyay eathday, ieslay oamingfay onyay ethay oreshay.
Eprivedday ofyay otionmay, iffstay ithway upidstay earfay,
Andsstay allyay aghastyay ishay emblingtray arioteerchay,
Ornay unsshay ethay oefay, ornay urnstay ethay eedsstay awayyay,
Utbay allsfay ansfix’dtray, anyay unresistingyay eypray:
Iercedpay ybay Antilochusyay, ehay antspay eneathbay
Ethay atelystay arcay, andyay abourslay outyay ishay eathbray.
Usthay Asiusyay’ eedsstay eir(thay ightymay astermay onegay)
Emainray ethay izepray ofyay Estor’snay youthfulyay onsay.

Abb’dstay atyay ethay ightsay, Eiphobusday ewdray ighnay,
Andyay ademay, ithway orcefay, ethay engefulvay eaponway yflay.
Ethay Etancray awsay; andyay, oopingstay, ausedcay otay anceglay
Omfray ishay opeslay ieldshay ethay isappointedday ancelay.
Eneathbay ethay aciousspay argetay, a(ay azingblay oundray,
Ickthay ithway ull-hidesbay andyay azenbray orbitsyay oundbay,
Onyay ishay aisedray armyay ybay otway ongstray acesbray ay’dstay,)
Ehay aylay ollectedcay inyay efensiveday adeshay.
O’eryay ishay afesay eadhay ethay avelinjay idlyyay ungsay,
Andyay onyay ethay inklingtay ergevay oremay aintlyfay ungray.
Evenyay enthay ethay earspay ethay igorousvay armyay onfess’dcay,
Andyay iercedpay, obliquelyyay, ingkay Ypsenor’shay eastbray:
Arm’dway inyay ishay iverlay, otay ethay oundgray ityay orebay
Ethay iefchay, ishay eople’spay uardiangay ownay onay oremay!

ot“nay unattendedyay e(thay oudpray Ojantray iescray)
Ornay unrevengedyay, amentedlay Asiusyay ieslay:
Orfay eethay, oughthray ell’shay ackblay ortalspay andstay isplay’dday,
Isthay atemay allshay oyjay ythay elancholymay adeshay.”

Eart-piercinghay anguishyay, atyay ethay aughtyhay oastbay,
Ouch’dtay everyyay Eekgray, utbay Estor’snay onsay ethay ostmay.
Ievedgray asyay ehay asway, ishay iouspay armsyay attendyay,
Andyay ishay oadbray ucklerbay ieldsshay ishay aughter’dslay iendfray:
Illtay adsay Ecistheusmay andyay Alastoryay orebay
Ishay onour’dhay odybay otay ethay entedtay oreshay.

Ornay yetyay omfray ightfay Idomeneusyay ithdrawsway;
Esolvedray otay erishpay inyay ishay ountry’scay ausecay,
Oryay indfay omesay oefay, omwhay eavenhay andyay ehay allshay oomday
Otay ailway ishay atefay inyay eath’sday eternalyay oomglay.
Ehay eessay Alcathousyay inyay ethay ontfray aspireyay:
Eatgray Yetesæsay asway ethay ero’shay iresay;
Ishay ousespay Ippodamehay, ivinelyday airfay,
Anchisesyay’ eldestyay opehay, andyay arlingday arecay:
Owhay arm’dchay erhay arentspay’ andyay erhay usband’shay earthay
Ithway eautybay, ensesay, andyay everyyay orkway ofyay artyay:
Ehay onceyay ofyay Ilion’syay youthyay ethay oveliestlay oybay,
Ethay airestfay eshay ofyay allyay ethay airfay ofyay Oytray.
Ybay Eptunenay ownay ethay aplesshay erohay iesday,
Owhay overscay ithway ayay oudclay osethay eauteousbay eyesyay,
Andyay ettersfay everyyay imblay: yetyay entbay otay eetmay
Ishay atefay ehay andsstay; ornay unsshay ethay ancelay ofyay Etecray.
Ix’dfay asyay omesay olumncay, oryay eep-rootedday oakyay,
Ilewhay ethay indsway eepslay; ishay eastbray eceivedray ethay okestray.
Eforebay ethay onderouspay okestray ishay orsletcay yieldsyay,
Onglay usedyay otay ardway ethay eathday inyay ightingfay ieldsfay.
Ethay ivenray armouryay endssay ayay arringjay oundsay;
Ishay abouringlay earthay eaveshay ithway osay ongstray ayay oundbay,
Ethay onglay ancelay akesshay, andyay ibratesvay inyay ethay oundway;
Astfay owingflay omfray itsyay ourcesay, asyay onepray ehay aylay,
Ife’slay urplepay idetay impetuousyay ush’dgay awayyay.

Enthay Idomenyay, insultingyay o’eryay ethay ainslay:
ehold“bay, Eiphobusday! ornay auntvay inyay ainvay:
Eesay! onyay oneyay Eekgray eethray Ojantray ostsghay attendyay;
Isthay, ymay irdthay ictimvay, otay ethay adesshay Iyay endsay.
Approachingyay ownay ythay oastedbay ightmay approveyay,
Andyay ytray ethay owesspray ofyay ethay eedsay ofyay Ovejay.
Omfray Ovejay, enamour’dyay ofyay ayay ortalmay ameday,
Eatgray Inosmay, uardiangay ofyay ishay ountrycay, amecay:
Eucalionday, amelessblay incepray, asway Inosmay’ eirhay;
Ishay irst-bornfay Iyay, ethay irdthay omfray Upiterjay:
O’eryay aciousspay Etecray, andyay erhay oldbay onssay, Iyay eignray,
Andyay encethay ymay ipsshay ansporttray emay oughthray ethay ainmay:
Ordlay ofyay ayay osthay, o’eryay allyay ymay osthay Iyay ineshay,
Ayay ourgescay otay eethay, ythay atherfay, andyay ythay inelay.”

Ethay Ojantray eardhay; uncertainyay oryay otay eetmay,
Aloneyay, ithway enturousvay armsyay ethay ingkay ofyay Etecray,
Oryay eeksay auxiliaryay orcefay; atyay engthlay ecreedday
Otay allcay omesay erohay otay artakepay ethay eedday,
Orthwithfay Easænay isesray otay ishay oughtthay:
Orfay imhay inyay Oy’stray emotestray ineslay ehay oughtsay,
Erewhay ehay, incensedyay atyay artialpay Iampray, andsstay,
Andyay eessay uperiorsay ostspay inyay eanermay andshay.
Otay imhay, ambitiousyay ofyay osay eatgray anyay aidyay,
Ethay oldbay Eiphobusday approach’dyay, andyay aidsay:

ow“nay, Ojantray incepray, employyay ythay iouspay armsyay,
Ifyay e’eryay ythay osombay eltfay airfay onour’shay armschay.
Alcathousyay iesday, ythay otherbray andyay ythay iendfray;
Omecay, andyay ethay arrior’sway ovedlay emainsray efendday.
Eneathbay ishay arescay ythay earlyyay youthyay asway ain’dtray,
Oneyay abletay edfay youyay, andyay oneyay oofray ontain’dcay.
Isthay eedday otay iercefay Idomeneusyay eway oweyay;
Astehay, andyay evengeray ityay onyay thay’ insultingyay oefay.”

Easænay eardhay, andyay orfay ayay acespay esign’dray
Otay endertay itypay allyay ishay anlymay indmay;
Enthay isingray inyay ishay ageray, ehay urnsbay otay ightfay:
Ethay Eekgray awaitsyay imhay ithway ollectedcay ightmay.
Asyay ethay ellfay oarbay, onyay omesay oughray ountain’smay eadhay,
Arm’dyay ithway ildway errorstay, andyay otay aughterslay edbray,
Enwhay ethay oudlay usticsray iseray, andyay outshay omfray arfay,
Attendsyay ethay umulttay, andyay expectsyay ethay arway;
O’eryay ishay entbay ackbay ethay istlybray orrorshay iseray;
Iresfay eamstray inyay ightninglay omfray ishay anguinesay eyesyay,
Ishay oamingfay uskstay othbay ogsday andyay enmay engageyay;
Utbay ostmay ishay untershay ouseray ishay ightymay ageray:
Osay oodstay Idomeneusyay, ishay avelinjay ookshay,
Andyay etmay ethay Ojantray ithway ayay oweringlay ooklay.
Antilochusyay, Eipyrusday, ereway earnay,
Ethay youthfulyay offspringyay ofyay ethay odgay ofyay arway,
Erionmay, andyay Aphareusyay, inyay ieldfay enown’dray:
Otay esethay ethay arriorway entsay ishay oicevay aroundyay.
ellows“fay inyay armsyay! youryay imelytay aidyay uniteyay;
Olay, eatgray Easænay ushesray otay ethay ightfay:
Ungspray omfray ayay odgay, andyay oremay anthay ortalmay oldbay;
Ehay eshfray inyay youthyay, andyay Iyay inyay armsyay owngray oldyay.
Elseyay ouldshay isthay andhay, isthay ourhay ecideday ethay ifestray,
Ethay eatgray isputeday, ofyay oryglay, oryay ofyay ifelay.”

Ehay okespay, andyay allyay, asyay ithway oneyay oulsay, obey’dyay;
Eirthay iftedlay ucklersbay astcay ayay eadfuldray adeshay
Aroundyay ethay iefchay. Easænay ootay emandsday
Thay’ assistingyay orcesfay ofyay ishay ativenay andsbay;
Arispay, Eiphobusday, Agenoryay, oinjay;
o-aids(cay andyay aptainscay ofyay ethay Ojantray inelay;)
Inyay orderyay ollowfay allyay thay’ embodiedyay aintray,
Ikelay Ida’syay ocksflay oceedingpray o’eryay ethay ainplay;
Eforebay ishay eecyflay arecay, erectyay andyay oldbay,
Alksstay ethay oudpray amray, ethay atherfay ofyay ethay oldbay.
Ithway oyjay ethay ainsway urveyssay emthay, asyay ehay eadslay
Otay ethay oolcay ountainsfay, oughthray ethay ell-knownway eadsmay:
Osay oysjay Easænay, asyay ishay ativenay andbay
Ovesmay onyay inyay ankray, andyay etchesstray o’eryay ethay andlay.

Oundray eaddray Alcathousyay ownay ethay attlebay oseray;
Onyay everyyay idesay ethay eelystay irclecay owsgray;
Ownay atter’dbay east-platesbray andyay ack’dhay elmetshay ingray,
Andyay o’eryay eirthay eadshay unheededyay avelinsjay ingsay.
Aboveyay ethay estray, otway oweringtay iefschay appearyay,
Erethay eatgray Idomeneusyay, Easænay erehay.
Ikelay odsgay ofyay arway, ispensingday atefay, eythay oodstay,
Andyay urn’dbay otay enchdray ethay oundgray ithway utualmay oodblay.
Ethay Ojantray eaponway izz’dwhay alongyay inyay airyay;
Ethay Etancray awsay, andyay unn’dshay ethay azenbray earspay:
Entsay omfray anyay armyay osay ongstray, ethay issivemay oodway
Uckstay eepday inyay earthyay, andyay uiver’dqay erewhay ityay oodstay.
Utbay Oenomasyay eceivedray ethay Etan’scray okestray;
Ethay orcefulfay earspay ishay ollowhay orsletcay okebray,
Ityay ipp’dray ishay ellybay ithway ayay astlyghay oundway,
Andyay oll’dray ethay okingsmay entrailsyay onyay ethay oundgray.
Etch’dstray onyay ethay ainplay, ehay obssay awayyay ishay eathbray,
Andyay, uriousfay, aspsgray ethay oodyblay ustday inyay eathday.
Ethay ictorvay omfray ishay eastbray ethay eaponway earstay;
Ishay oilsspay ehay ouldcay otnay, orfay ethay owershay ofyay earsspay.
Oughthay ownay unfityay anyay activeyay arway otay ageway,
Eavyhay ithway umbrouscay armsyay, iffstay ithway oldcay ageyay,
Ishay istlesslay imbslay unableyay orfay ethay oursecay,
Inyay andingstay ightfay ehay yetyay aintainsmay ishay orcefay;
Illtay aintfay ithway abourlay, andyay ybay oesfay epell’dray,
Ishay iredtay owslay epsstay ehay agsdray omfray offyay ethay ieldfay.
Eiphobusday eheldbay imhay asyay ehay ass’dpay,
Andyay, iredfay ithway atehay, ayay artingpay avelinjay astcay:
Ethay avelinjay err’dyay, utbay eldhay itsyay oursecay alongyay,
Andyay iercedpay Ascalaphusyay, ethay avebray andyay youngyay:
Ethay onsay ofyay Arsmay ellfay aspinggay onyay ethay oundgray,
Andyay ash’dgnay ethay ustday, allyay oodyblay ithway ishay oundway.

Ornay ewknay ethay uriousfay atherfay ofyay ishay allfay;
Igh-thronedhay amidstyay ethay eatgray Olympianyay allhay,
Onyay oldengay oudsclay thay’ immortalyay ynodsay atesay;
Etain’dday omfray oodyblay arway ybay Ovejay andyay Atefay.

Ownay, erewhay inyay ustday ethay eathlessbray erohay aylay,
Orfay ainslay Ascalaphusyay ommencedcay ethay ayfray,
Eiphobusday otay eizesay ishay elmethay iesflay,
Andyay omfray ishay emplestay endsray ethay itteringglay izepray;
Aliantvay asyay Arsmay, Erionesmay ewdray earnay,
Andyay onyay ishay oadedlay armyay ischargedday ishay earspay:
Ehay opsdray ethay eightway, isabledday ithway ethay ainpay;
Ethay ollowhay elmethay ingsray againstyay ethay ainplay.
Iftsway asyay ayay ulturevay eapinglay onyay ishay eypray,
Omfray ishay orntay armyay ethay Eciangray entray awayyay
Ethay eekingray avelinjay, andyay ejoin’dray ishay iendsfray.
Ishay oundedway otherbray oodgay Olitespay endstay;
Aroundyay ishay aistway ishay iouspay armsyay ehay ewthray,
Andyay omfray ethay ageray ofyay attlebay entlygay ewdray:
Imhay ishay iftsway ourserscay, onyay ishay endidsplay arcay,
Aptray omfray ethay esseninglay underthay ofyay ethay arway;
Otay Oytray eythay ovedray imhay, oaninggray omfray ethay oreshay,
Andyay inklingspray, asyay ehay ass’dpay, ethay andssay ithway oregay.

Eanwhilemay eshfray aughterslay athesbay ethay anguinesay oundgray,
Eapshay allfay onyay eapshay, andyay eavenhay andyay earthyay esoundray.
Oldbay Aphareusyay ybay eatgray Easænay edblay;
Asyay owardtay ethay iefchay ehay urn’dtay ishay aringday eadhay,
Ehay iercedpay ishay oatthray; ethay endingbay eadhay, epress’dday
Eneathbay ishay elmethay, odsnay uponyay ishay eastbray;
Ishay ieldshay eversedray o’eryay ethay allenfay arriorway ieslay,
Andyay everlastingyay umberslay ealssay ishay eyesyay.
Antilochusyay, asyay Oonthay urn’dtay imhay oundray,
Anspiercedtray ishay ackbay ithway ayay ishonestday oundway:
Ethay ollowhay einvay, atthay otay ethay ecknay extendsyay
Alongyay ethay inechay, ishay eageryay avelinjay endsray:
Upinesay ehay allsfay, andyay otay ishay ocialsay aintray
Eadsspray ishay imploringyay armsyay, utbay eadsspray inyay ainvay.
