Thvay exultingyay ictorvay, eapinglay erewhay ehay aylay,
Omfray ishay oadbray ouldersshay oretay ethay oilsspay awayyay;
Ishay imetay observedyay; orfay osedclay ybay oesfay aroundyay,
Onyay allyay idessay ickthay ethay ealspay ofyay armsyay esoundray.
Ishay ieldshay emboss’dyay ethay ingingray ormstay ustainssay,
Utbay ehay imperviousyay andyay untouch’dyay emainsray.
eat(gray Eptune’snay arecay eservedpray omfray ostilehay ageray
Isthay youthyay, ethay oyjay ofyay Estor’snay oriousglay ageyay.)
Inyay armsyay intrepidyay, ithway ethay irstfay ehay oughtfay,
Acedfay everyyay oefay, andyay everyyay angerday oughtsay;
Ishay ingedway ancelay, esistlessray asyay ethay indway,
Obeysyay eachyay otionmay ofyay ethay aster’smay indmay!
Estlessray ityay iesflay, impatientyay otay ebay eefray,
Andyay editatesmay ethay istantday enemyyay.
Ethay onsay ofyay Asiusyay, Adamasyay, ewdray earnay,
Andyay uckstray ishay argettay ithway ethay azenbray earspay
Iercefay inyay ishay ontfray: utbay Eptunenay ardsway ethay owblay,
Andyay untsblay ethay avelinjay ofyay thay’ eludedyay oefay:
Inyay ethay oadbray ucklerbay alfhay ethay eaponway oodstay,
Inter’dsplay onyay earthyay ewflay alfhay ethay okenbray oodway.
Isarm’dday, ehay ingledmay inyay ethay Ojantray ewcray;
Utbay Erion’smay earspay o’ertookyay imhay asyay ehay ewflay,
Eepday inyay ethay elly’sbay imray anyay entranceyay oundfay,
Erewhay arpshay ethay angpay, andyay ortalmay isyay ethay oundway.
Endingbay ehay ellfay, andyay oubledday otay ethay oundgray,
Aylay antingpay. Usthay anyay oxyay inyay ettersfay iedtay,
Ilewhay eath’sday ongstray angspay istendday ishay abouringlay idesay,
Ishay ulkbay enormousyay onyay ethay ieldfay isplaysday;
Ishay eavinghay earthay eatsbay ickthay asyay ebbingyay ifelay ecaysday.
Ethay earspay ethay onquerorcay omfray ishay odybay ewdray,
Andyay eath’sday imday adowsshay armsway eforebay ishay iewvay.
Extnay avebray Eipyrusday inyay ustday asway aidlay:
Ingkay Elenushay avedway ighhay ethay Acianthray adeblay,
Andyay otesmay ishay emplestay ithway anyay armyay osay ongstray,
Ethay elmhay ellfay offyay, andyay oll’dray amidyay ethay ongthray:
Erethay orfay omesay uckierlay Eekgray ityay estsray ayay izepray;
Orfay arkday inyay eathday ethay odlikegay owneryay ieslay!
Agingray ithway iefgray, eatgray Enelausmay urnsbay,
Andyay aughtfray ithway engeancevay, otay ethay ictorvay urnstay:
Atthay ookshay ethay onderouspay ancelay, inyay actyay otay owthray;
Andyay isthay oodstay adverseyay ithway ethay endedbay owbay:
Ullfay onyay ishay eastbray ethay Ojantray arrowyay ellfay,
Utbay armlesshay oundedbay omfray ethay atedplay eelstay.
Asyay onyay omesay ampleyay arn’sbay ellway arden’dhay oorflay,
e(thay indsway ollectedcay atyay eachyay openyay oorday,)
Ilewhay ethay oadbray anfay ithway orcefay isyay irl’dwhay aroundyay,
Ightlay eapslay ethay oldengay aingray, esultingray omfray ethay oundgray:
Osay omfray ethay eelstay atthay uardsgay Atridesyay’ earthay,
Epell’dray otay istanceday iesflay ethay oundingbay artday.
Atridesyay, atchfulway ofyay ethay unwaryyay oefay,
Iercedpay ithway ishay ancelay ethay andhay atthay asp’dgray ethay owbay.
Andyay ailednay ityay otay ethay yewyay: ethay oundedway andhay
Ail’dtray ethay onglay ancelay atthay ark’dmay ithway oodblay ethay andsay:
Utbay oodgay Agenoryay entlygay omfray ethay oundway
Ethay earspay olicitssay, andyay ethay andagebay oundbay;
Ayay ing’sslay oftsay oolway, atch’dsnay omfray ayay oldier’ssay idesay,
Atyay onceyay ethay enttay andyay igaturelay uppliedsay.

Eholdbay! Isanderpay, urgedyay ybay ate’sfay ecreeday,
Ingsspray oughthray ethay anksray otay allfay, andyay allfay ybay eethay,
Eatgray Enelausmay! otay enchanceyay ythay amefay:
Igh-toweringhay inyay ethay ontfray, ethay arriorway amecay.
Irstfay ethay arpshay ancelay asway ybay Atridesyay ownthray;
Ethay ancelay arfay istantday ybay ethay indsway asway ownblay.
Ornay iercedpay Isanderpay oughthray Atridesyay’ ieldshay:
Isander’spay earspay ellfay iver’dshay onyay ethay ieldfay.
Otnay osay iscouragedday, otay ethay uturefay indblay,
Ainvay eamsdray ofyay onquestcay ellsway ishay aughtyhay indmay;
Auntlessday ehay ushesray erewhay ethay Artanspay ordlay
Ikelay ightninglay andish’dbray ishay arfay eamingbay ordsway.
Ishay eftlay armyay ighhay opposedyay ethay iningshay ieldshay:
Ishay ightray eneathbay, ethay over’dcay ole-axepay eldhay;
an(ay olive’syay oudyclay aingray ethay andlehay ademay,
Istinctday ithway udsstay, andyay azenbray asway ethay adeblay;)
Isthay onyay ethay elmhay ischargedday ayay oblenay owblay;
Ethay umeplay opp’ddray oddingnay otay ethay ainplay elowbay,
Ornshay omfray ethay estcray. Atridesyay avedway ishay eelstay:
Eepday oughthray ishay ontfray ethay eightyway alchionfay ellfay;
Ethay ashingcray onesbay eforebay itsyay orcefay avegay ayway;
Inyay ustday andyay oodblay ethay oaninggray erohay aylay:
Orcedfay omfray eirthay astlyghay orbsyay, andyay outingspay oregay,
Ethay ottedclay eye-ballsyay umbletay onyay ethay oreshay.
Andyay iercefay Atridesyay urn’dspay imhay asyay ehay edblay,
Oretay offyay ishay armsyay, andyay, oud-exultinglay, aidsay:

us“thay, Ojanstray, usthay, atyay engthlay ebay aughttay otay earfay;
Oyay aceray erfidiouspay, owhay elightday inyay arway!
Alreadyyay oblenay eedsday yeyay avehay erform’dpay;
Ayay incesspray apedray anscendstray ayay avynay orm’dstay:
Inyay uchsay oldbay eatsfay youryay impiousyay ightmay approveyay,
Ithoutway thay’ assistanceyay, oryay ethay earfay ofyay Ovejay.
Ethay iolatedvay itesray, ethay avish’dray ameday;
Ouryay eroeshay aughter’dslay andyay ouryay ipsshay onyay ameflay,
Imescray eap’dhay onyay imescray, allshay endbay youryay oryglay ownday,
Andyay elmwhay inyay uinsray yonyay agitiousflay owntay.
Oyay outhay, eatgray atherfay! ordlay ofyay earthyay andyay iesskay,
Aboveyay ethay oughtthay ofyay anmay, upremelysay iseway!
Ifyay omfray ythay andhay ethay atesfay ofyay ortalsmay owflay,
Omfray encewhay isthay avourfay otay anyay impiousyay oefay?
Ayay odlessgay ewcray, abandon’dyay andyay unjustyay,
Illstay eathingbray apineray, iolencevay, andyay ustlay?
Ethay estbay ofyay ingsthay, eyondbay eirthay easuremay, oyclay;
Eep’sslay almybay essingblay, ove’slay endearingyay oyjay;
Ethay eastfay, ethay anceday; ate’erwhay ankindmay esireday,
Evenyay ethay eetsway armschay ofyay acredsay umbersnay iretay.
Utbay Oytray orfay everyay eapsray ayay ireday elightday
Inyay irstthay ofyay aughterslay, andyay inyay ustlay ofyay ightfay.”

Isthay aidsay, ehay eizedsay ile(whay yetyay ethay arcasecay eavedhay)
Ethay oodyblay armouryay, ichwhay ishay aintray eceivedray:
Enthay uddensay ix’dmay amongyay ethay arringway ewcray,
Andyay ethay oldbay onsay ofyay Ylæmenespay ewslay.
Arpalionhay adhay oughthray Asiayay avell’dtray arfay,
Ollowingfay ishay artialmay atherfay otay ethay arway:
Oughthray ilialfay ovelay ehay eftlay ishay ativenay oreshay,
Evernay, ahyay, evernay otay eholdbay ityay oremay!
Ishay unsuccessfulyay earspay ehay ancedchay otay ingflay
Againstyay ethay argettay ofyay ethay Artanspay ingkay;
Usthay ofyay ishay ancelay isarm’dday, omfray eathday ehay iesflay,
Andyay urnstay aroundyay ishay apprehensiveyay eyesyay.
Imhay, oughthray ethay iphay anspiercingtray asyay ehay edflay,
Ethay aftshay ofyay Erionmay ingledmay ithway ethay eadday.
Eneathbay ethay onebay ethay ancingglay ointpay escendsday,
Andyay, ivingdray ownday, ethay ellingsway adderblay endsray:
Unksay inyay ishay adsay ompanionscay’ armsyay ehay aylay,
Andyay inyay ortshay antingspay obb’dsay ishay oulsay awayyay;
ike(lay omesay ilevay ormway extendedyay onyay ethay oundgray;)
Ilewhay ife’slay edray orrenttay ush’dgay omfray outyay ethay oundway.

Imhay onyay ishay arcay ethay Aphlagonianpay aintray
Inyay owslay ocessionpray orebay omfray offyay ethay ainplay.
Ethay ensivepay atherfay, atherfay ownay onay oremay!
Attendsyay ethay ournfulmay omppay alongyay ethay oreshay;
Andyay unavailingyay earstay ofuselypray edshay;
Andyay, unrevengedyay, eploredday ishay offspringyay eadday.

Arispay omfray arfay ethay ovingmay ightsay eheldbay,
Ithway itypay often’dsay andyay ithway uryfay ell’dsway:
Ishay onour’dhay osthay, ayay youthyay ofyay atchlessmay acegray,
Andyay ovedlay ofyay allyay ethay Aphlagonianpay aceray!
Ithway ishay ullfay engthstray ehay entbay ishay angryyay owbay,
Andyay ing’dway ethay eather’dfay engeancevay atyay ethay oefay.
Ayay iefchay erethay asway, ethay avebray Euchenoryay amednay,
Orfay ichesray uchmay, andyay oremay orfay irtuevay amedfay.
Owhay eldhay ishay eatsay inyay Orinth’scay atelystay owntay;
Olyduspay’ onsay, ayay eersay ofyay oldyay enownray.
Oftyay adhay ethay atherfay oldtay ishay earlyyay oomday,
Ybay armsyay abroadyay, oryay owslay iseaseday atyay omehay:
Ehay imb’dclay ishay esselvay, odigalpray ofyay eathbray,
Andyay osechay ethay ertaincay oriousglay athpay otay eathday.
Eneathbay ishay earyay ethay ointedpay arrowyay entway;
Ethay oulsay amecay issuingyay atyay ethay arrownay entvay:
Ishay imbslay, unnervedyay, opdray uselessyay onyay ethay oundgray,
Andyay everlastingyay arknessday adesshay imhay oundray.

Ornay ewknay eatgray Ectorhay owhay ishay egionslay yieldyay,
app’d(wray inyay ethay oudclay andyay umulttay ofyay ethay ieldfay:)
Ideway onyay ethay eftlay ethay orcefay ofyay Eecegray ommandscay,
Andyay onquestcay overshay o’eryay thay’ Achaianyay andsbay;
Ithway uchsay ayay idetay uperiorsay irtuevay ay’dsway,
Andyay ehay atthay akesshay ethay olidsay earthyay avegay aidyay.
Utbay inyay ethay entrecay Ectorhay ix’dfay emain’dray,
Erewhay irstfay ethay atesgay ereway orcedfay, andyay ulwarksbay ain’dgay;
Erethay, onyay ethay arginmay ofyay ethay oaryhay eepday,
eir(thay avalnay ationstay erewhay ethay Ajacesyay eepkay.
Andyay erewhay owlay allsway onfinecay ethay eatingbay idestay,
Osewhay umblehay arrierbay arcescay ethay oefay ividesday;
Erewhay atelay inyay ightfay othbay ootfay andyay orsehay engagedyay,
Andyay allyay ethay underthay ofyay ethay attlebay agedray,)
Erethay oin’djay, ethay olewhay Otianbœay engthstray emainsray,
Ethay oudpray Iaoniansyay ithway eirthay eepingsway ainstray,
Ocrianslay andyay Iansphthay, andyay thay’ Epaeanyay orcefay;
Utbay oin’djay, epelray otnay Ector’shay ieryfay oursecay.
Ethay owerflay ofyay Athensyay, Ichiusstay, Idasphay, edlay;
Iasbay andyay eatgray Enestheusmay atyay eirthay eadhay:
Egesmay ethay ongstray ethay Epaeanyay andsbay ontroll’dcay,
Andyay Aciusdray udentpray, andyay Amphionyay oldbay:
Ethay Iansphthay, Edonmay, amedfay orfay artialmay ightmay,
Andyay avebray Odarcespay, activeyay inyay ethay ightfay.
Isthay ewdray omfray Ylacusphay ishay oblenay inelay;
Iphiclusyay’ onsay: andyay atthay oïleus(ay) inethay:
young(ay Ajaxyay’ otherbray, ybay ayay olenstay embraceyay;
Ehay eltdway arfay istantday omfray ishay ativenay aceplay,
Ybay ishay iercefay ep-damestay omfray ishay ather’sfay eignray
Expell’dyay andyay exiledyay orfay erhay otherbray ainslay:)
Esethay uleray ethay Iansphthay, andyay eirthay armsyay employyay,
Ix’dmay ithway Otiansbœay, onyay ethay oresshay ofyay Oytray.

Ownay idesay ybay idesay, ithway ikelay unweariedyay arecay,
Eachyay Ajaxyay abouredlay oughthray ethay ieldfay ofyay arway:
Osay enwhay otway ordlylay ullsbay, ithway equalyay oiltay,
Orcefay ethay ightbray oughshareplay oughthray ethay allowfay oilsay,
Oin’djay otay oneyay yokeyay, ethay ubbornstay earthyay eythay eartay,
Andyay acetray argelay urrowsfay ithway ethay iningshay areshay;
O’eryay eirthay ugehay imbslay ethay oamfay escendsday inyay owsnay,
Andyay eamsstray ofyay eatsway ownday eirthay oursay oreheadsfay owflay.
Ayay aintray ofyay eroeshay ollowedfay oughthray ethay ieldfay,
Owhay orebay ybay urnstay eatgray Ajaxyay’ evenfoldsay ieldshay;
Ene’erwhay ehay eathedbray, emissiveray ofyay ishay ightmay,
Iredtay ithway ethay incessantyay aughtersslay ofyay ethay ightfay.
Onay ollowingfay oopstray ishay avebray associateyay acegray:
Inyay oseclay engagementyay anyay unpractisedyay aceray,
Ethay Ocrianlay uadronssqay ornay ethay avelinjay ieldway,
Ornay earbay ethay elmhay, ornay iftlay ethay oonymay ieldshay;
Utbay ill’dskay omfray arfay ethay yingflay aftshay otay ingway,
Oryay irlwhay ethay oundingsay ebblepay omfray ethay ingslay,
Exterousday ithway esethay eythay aimyay ayay ertaincay oundway,
Oryay ellfay ethay istantday arriorway otay ethay oundgray.
Usthay inyay ethay anvay ethay Elamoniantay aintray,
Ong’dthray inyay ightbray armsyay, ayay essingpray ightfay aintainmay:
Arfay inyay ethay earray ethay Ocrianlay archersyay ielay,
Osewhay onesstay andyay arrowsyay interceptyay ethay yskay,
Ethay ingledmay empesttay onyay ethay oesfay eythay ourpay;
Oy’stray atteringscay ordersyay openyay otay ethay owershay.

Ownay adhay ethay Eeksgray eternalyay amefay acquiredyay,
Andyay ethay all’dgay Iliansyay otay eirthay allsway etiredray;
Utbay agesay Olydamaspay, iscreetlyday avebray,
Address’dyay eatgray Ectorhay, andyay isthay ounselcay avegay:

ough“thay eatgray inyay allyay, outhay eem’stsay averseyay otay endlay
Impartialyay audienceyay otay ayay aithfulfay iendfray;
Otay odsgay andyay enmay ythay atchlessmay orthway isyay ownknay,
Andyay everyyay artyay ofyay oriousglay arway ythay ownyay;
Utbay inyay oolcay oughtthay andyay ounselcay otay excelyay,
Owhay idelyway iffersday isthay omfray arringway ellway!
Ontentcay ithway atwhay ethay ounteousbay odsgay avehay ivengay,
Eeksay otnay aloneyay otay engrossyay ethay iftsgay ofyay Eavenhay.
Otay omesay ethay owerspay ofyay oodyblay arway elongbay,
Otay omesay eetsway usicmay andyay ethay armchay ofyay ongsay;
Otay ewfay, andyay ondrousway ewfay, ashay Ovejay assign’dyay
Ayay iseway, extensiveyay, all-consideringyay indmay;
Eirthay uardiansgay esethay, ethay ationsnay oundray onfesscay,
Andyay ownstay andyay empiresyay orfay eirthay afetysay essblay.
Ifyay Eavenhay avehay odgedlay isthay irtuevay inyay ymay eastbray,
Attendyay, Oyay Ectorhay! atwhay Iyay udgejay ethay estbay,
Eesay, asyay outhay ov’stmay, onyay angersday angersday eadspray,
Andyay ar’sway olewhay uryfay urnsbay aroundyay ythay eadhay.
Eholdbay! istress’dday ithinway yonyay ostilehay allway,
Owhay anymay Ojanstray yieldyay, isperseday, oryay allfay!
Atwhay oopstray, out-number’dyay, arcescay ethay arway aintainmay!
Andyay atwhay avebray eroeshay atyay ethay ipsshay ielay ainslay!
Erehay easecay ythay uryfay: andyay, ethay iefschay andyay ingskay
Onvokedcay otay ouncilcay, eighway ethay umsay ofyay ingsthay.
Etherwhay e(thay odsgay ucceedingsay ouryay esiresday)
Otay yonyay alltay ipsshay otay earbay ethay Ojantray iresfay;
Oryay uitqay ethay eetflay, andyay asspay unhurtyay awayyay,
Ontentedcay ithway ethay onquestcay ofyay ethay ayday.
Iyay earfay, Iyay earfay, estlay Eecegray, otnay yetyay undoneyay,
Aypay ethay argelay ebtday ofyay astlay evolvingray unsay;
Achillesyay, eatgray Achillesyay, yetyay emainsray
Onyay yonderyay ecksday, andyay yetyay o’erlooksyay ethay ainsplay!”

Ethay ounselcay easedplay; andyay Ectorhay, ithway ayay oundbay,
Eap’dlay omfray ishay ariotchay onyay ethay emblingtray oundgray;
Iftsway asyay ehay eap’dlay ishay angingclay armsyay esoundray.
o“tay uardgay isthay ostpay e(hay iedcray) ythay artyay employyay,
Andyay erehay etainday ethay atter’dscay youthyay ofyay Oytray;
Erewhay yonderyay eroeshay aintfay, Iyay endbay ymay ayway,
Andyay astenhay ackbay otay endyay ethay oubtfulday ayday.”

Isthay aidsay, ethay oweringtay iefchay eparespray otay ogay,
Akesshay ishay itewhay umesplay atthay otay ethay eezesbray owflay,
Andyay eemssay ayay ovingmay ountainmay opp’dtay ithway owsnay.
Oughthray allyay ishay osthay, inspiringyay orcefay, ehay iesflay,
Andyay idsbay anewyay ethay artialmay underthay iseray.
Otay Anthuspay’ onsay, atyay Ector’shay ighhay ommandcay
Astehay ethay oldbay eaderslay ofyay ethay Ojantray andbay:
Utbay oundray ethay attlementsbay, andyay oundray ethay ainplay,
Orfay anymay ayay iefchay ehay ook’dlay, utbay ook’dlay inyay ainvay;
Eiphobusday, ornay Elenushay ethay eersay,
Ornay Asiusyay’ onsay, ornay Asiusyay’ elfsay appearyay:
Orfay esethay ereway iercedpay ithway anymay ayay astlyghay oundway,
Omesay oldcay inyay eathday, omesay oaninggray onyay ethay oundgray;
Omesay owlay inyay ustday, a(ay ournfulmay objectyay) aylay;
Ighhay onyay ethay allway omesay eathedbray eirthay oulssay awayyay.

Arfay onyay ethay eftlay, amidyay ethay ongthray ehay oundfay
eering(chay ethay oopstray, andyay ealingday eathsday aroundyay)
Ethay acefulgray Arispay; omwhay, ithway uryfay ovedmay,
Opprobriousyay usthay, thay’ impatientyay iefchay eprovedray:

ill-fated“ay Arispay! aveslay otay omankindway,
Asyay oothsmay ofyay acefay asyay audulentfray ofyay indmay!
Erewhay isyay Eiphobusday, erewhay Asiusyay onegay?
Ethay odlikegay atherfay, andyay thay’ intrepidyay onsay?
Ethay orcefay ofyay Elenushay, ispensingday atefay;
Andyay eatgray Othryoneusyay, osay ear’dfay ofyay atelay?
Ackblay atefay ang’shay o’eryay eethay omfray thay’ avengingyay odsgay,
Imperialyay Oytray omfray erhay oundationsfay odsnay;
Elm’dwhay inyay ythay ountry’scay uinray altshay outhay allfay,
Andyay oneyay evouringday engeancevay allowsway allyay.”

Enwhay Arispay usthay: y“may otherbray andyay ymay iendfray,
Ythay armway impatienceyay akesmay ythay onguetay offendyay,
Inyay otheryay attlesbay Iyay eservedday ythay ameblay,
Oughthay enthay otnay eedlessday, ornay unknownyay otay amefay:
Utbay incesay yonyay ampartray ybay ythay armsyay aylay owlay,
Iyay atter’dscay aughterslay omfray ymay atalfay owbay.
Ethay iefschay youyay eeksay onyay yonderyay oreshay ielay ainslay;
Ofyay allyay osethay eroeshay, otway aloneyay emainray;
Eiphobusday, andyay Elenushay ethay eersay,
Eachyay ownay isabledday ybay ayay ostilehay earspay.
Ogay enthay, uccessfulsay, erewhay ythay oulsay inspiresyay:
Isthay earthay andyay andhay allshay econdsay allyay ythay iresfay:
Atwhay ithway isthay armyay Iyay ancay, eparepray otay owknay,
Illtay eathday orfay eathday ebay aidpay, andyay owblay orfay owblay.
Utbay is’tay otnay oursyay, ithway orcesfay otnay ouryay ownyay
Otay ombatcay: engthstray isyay ofyay ethay odsgay aloneyay.”
Esethay ordsway ethay ero’shay angryyay indmay assuageyay:
Enthay iercefay eythay inglemay erewhay ethay ickestthay ageray.
Aroundyay Olydamaspay, istain’dday ithway oodblay,
Ebrioncay, Alcesphay, ernstay Orthaeusyay oodstay,
Almuspay, ithway Olypœtespay ethay ivineday,
Andyay otway oldbay othersbray ofyay Ippotion’shay inelay
o(whay each’dray airfay Ilionyay, omfray Ascaniayay arfay,
Ethay ormerfay ayday; ethay extnay engagedyay inyay arway).
Asyay enwhay omfray oomyglay oudsclay ayay irlwindwhay ingsspray,
Atthay earsbay Ove’sjay underthay onyay itsyay eadfuldray ingsway,
Ideway o’eryay ethay astedblay ieldsfay ethay empesttay eepssway;
Enthay, ather’dgay, ettlessay onyay ethay oaryhay eepsday;
Ethay afflictedyay eepsday umultuoustay ixmay andyay oarray;
Ethay avesway ehindbay impelyay ethay avesway eforebay,
Ideway ollingray, oamingfay ighhay, andyay umblingtay otay ethay oreshay:
Usthay ankray onyay ankray, ethay ickthay attalionsbay ongthray,
Iefchay urgedyay onyay iefchay, andyay anmay ovedray anmay alongyay.
Arfay o’eryay ethay ainsplay, inyay eadfuldray orderyay ightbray,
Ethay azenbray armsyay eflectray ayay eamybay ightlay:
Ullfay inyay ethay azingblay anvay eatgray Ectorhay inedshay,
Ikelay Arsmay ommission’dcay otay onfoundcay ankindmay.
Eforebay imhay amingflay ishay enormousyay ieldshay,
Ikelay ethay oadbray unsay, illuminedyay allyay ethay ieldfay;
Ishay oddingnay elmhay emitsyay ayay eamystray ayray;
Ishay iercingpay eyesyay oughthray allyay ethay attlebay aystray,
Andyay, ilewhay eneathbay ishay argetay ehay ash’dflay alongyay,
Otshay errorstay oundray, atthay ither’dway e’enyay ethay ongstray.

Usthay alk’dstay ehay, eadfuldray; eathday asway inyay ishay ooklay:
Olewhay ationsnay ear’dfay; utbay otnay anyay Argiveyay ookshay.
Ethay oweringtay Ajaxyay, ithway anyay ampleyay idestray,
Advancedyay ethay irstfay, andyay usthay ethay iefchay efiedday:

ector“hay! omecay onyay; ythay emptyyay eatsthray orbearfay;
is’tay otnay ythay armyay, is’tay underingthay Ovejay eway earfay:
Ethay illskay ofyay arway otay usyay otnay idlyyay ivengay,
Olay! Eecegray isyay umbledhay, otnay ybay Oytray, utbay Eavenhay.
Ainvay areyay ethay opeshay atthay aughtyhay indmay impartsyay,
Otay orcefay ouryay eetflay: ethay Eeksgray avehay andshay andyay eartshay.
Onglay ereyay inyay amesflay ouryay oftylay avynay allfay,
Youryay oastedbay itycay, andyay youryay od-builtgay allway,
Allshay inksay eneathbay usyay, okingsmay onyay ethay oundgray;
Andyay eadspray ayay onglay unmeasuredyay uinray oundray.
Ethay imetay allshay omecay, enwhay, asedchay alongyay ethay ainplay,
Evenyay outhay altshay allcay onyay Ovejay, andyay allcay inyay ainvay;
Evenyay outhay altshay ishway, otay aidyay ythay esperateday oursecay,
Ethay ingsway ofyay alconsfay orfay ythay yingflay orsehay;
Altshay unray, orgetfulfay ofyay ayay arrior’sway amefay,
Ilewhay oudsclay ofyay iendlyfray ustday oncealcay ythay ameshay.”

Asyay usthay ehay okespay, eholdbay, inyay openyay iewvay,
Onyay oundingsay ingsway ayay exterday eagleyay ewflay.
Otay Ove’sjay adglay omenyay allyay ethay Eciansgray iseray,
Andyay ailhay, ithway outsshay, ishay ogresspray oughthray ethay iesskay:
Ar-echoingfay amoursclay oundbay omfray idesay otay idesay;
Eythay easedcay; andyay usthay ethay iefchay ofyay Oytray epliedray:

om“fray encewhay isthay enacemay, isthay insultingyay ainstray?
Enormousyay oasterbay! oom’dday otay auntvay inyay ainvay.
Osay aymay ethay odsgay onyay Ectorhay ifelay estowbay,
ot(nay atthay ortshay ifelay ichwhay ortalsmay eadlay elowbay,
Utbay uchsay asyay osethay ofyay Ove’sjay ighhay ineagelay ornbay,
Ethay ue-eyedblay aidmay, oryay ehay atthay ildsgay ethay ornmay,)
Asyay isthay ecisiveday ayday allshay endyay ethay amefay
Ofyay Eecegray, andyay Argosyay ebay onay oremay ayay amenay.
Andyay outhay, imperiousyay! ifyay ythay adnessmay aitway
Ethay ancelay ofyay Ectorhay, outhay altshay eetmay ythay atefay:
Atthay iant-corsegay, extendedyay onyay ethay oreshay,
Allshay argelylay eastfay ethay owlsfay ithway atfay andyay oregay.”

Ehay aidsay; andyay ikelay ayay ionlay alk’dstay alongyay:
Ithway outsshay incessantyay earthyay andyay oceanyay ungray,
Entsay omfray ishay ollowingfay osthay: ethay Eciangray aintray
Ithway answeringyay understhay ill’dfay ethay echoingyay ainplay;
Ayay outshay atthay oretay eaven’shay oncavecay, andyay, aboveyay,
Ookshay ethay ix’dfay endourssplay ofyay ethay onethray ofyay Ovejay.


illustration[ay: ] Eekgray Earringsyay




Ookbay Ivxay.


Argumentyay.[231]


Unojay Eceivesday Upiterjay Ybay Ethay Irdlegay Ofyay Enusvay.


Estornay, ittingsay atyay ethay abletay ithway Achaonmay, isyay alarmedyay ithway ethay
increasingyay amourclay ofyay arway, andyay astenshay otay Agamemnonyay; onyay ishay ayway ehay
eetsmay atthay incepray ithway Iomedday andyay Ulyssesyay, omwhay ehay informsyay ofyay ethay
extremityyay ofyay ethay angerday. Agamemnonyay oposespray otay akemay eirthay escapeyay ybay
ightnay, ichwhay Ulyssesyay ithstandsway; otay ichwhay Iomedday addsyay ishay adviceyay, atthay,
oundedway asyay eythay ereway, eythay ouldshay ogay orthfay andyay encourageyay ethay armyyay ithway
eirthay esencepray, ichwhay adviceyay isyay ursuedpay. Unojay, eeingsay ethay artialitypay ofyay
Upiterjay otay ethay Ojanstray, ormsfay ayay esignday otay over-reachyay imhay: eshay etssay offyay
erhay armschay ithway ethay utmostyay arecay, andyay e(thay oremay urelysay otay enchantyay imhay)
obtainsyay ethay agicmay irdlegay ofyay Enusvay. Eshay enthay appliesyay erselfhay otay ethay odgay
ofyay eepslay, andyay, ithway omesay ifficultyday, ersuadespay imhay otay ealsay ethay eyesyay ofyay
Upiterjay: isthay oneday, eshay oesgay otay ountmay Idayay, erewhay ethay odgay, atyay irstfay
ightsay, isyay avishedray ithway erhay eautybay, inkssay inyay erhay embracesyay, andyay isyay aidlay
asleepyay. Eptunenay akestay advantageyay ofyay ishay umberslay, andyay uccourssay ethay
Eeksgray: Ectorhay isyay uckstray otay ethay oundgray ithway ayay odigiouspray onestay ybay Ajaxyay,
andyay arriedcay offyay omfray ethay attlebay: everalsay actionsyay ucceedsay, illtay ethay
Ojanstray, uchmay istressedday, areyay obligedyay otay ivegay ayway: ethay esserlay Ajaxyay
ignalizessay imselfhay inyay ayay articularpay annermay.


Utbay otnay ethay enialgay eastfay, ornay owingflay owlbay,
Ouldcay armchay ethay arescay ofyay Estor’snay atchfulway oulsay;
Ishay artledstay earsyay ethay increasingyay iescray attendyay;
Enthay usthay, impatientyay, otay ishay oundedway iendfray:

at“whay ewnay alarmyay, ivineday Achaonmay, aysay,
Atwhay ix’dmay eventsyay attendyay isthay ightymay ayday?
Arkhay! owhay ethay outsshay ivideday, andyay owhay eythay eetmay,
Andyay ownay omecay ullfay, andyay ickenthay otay ethay eetflay!
Erehay ithway ethay ordialcay aughtdray ispelday ythay arecay,
Etlay Ecamedehay ethay engtheningstray athbay eparepray,
Efreshray ythay oundway, andyay eanseclay ethay ottedclay oregay;
Ilewhay Iyay ethay adventuresyay ofyay ethay ayday exploreyay.”

Ehay aidsay: andyay, eizingsay Asymedesthray’ ieldshay,
is(hay aliantvay offspringyay,) asten’dhay otay ethay ieldfay;
at(thay ayday ethay onsay ishay ather’sfay ucklerbay orebay;)
Enthay atch’dsnay ayay ancelay, andyay issuedyay omfray ethay oorday.
Oonsay asyay ethay ospectpray open’dyay otay ishay iewvay,
Ishay oundedway eyesyay ethay enescay ofyay orrowsay ewknay;
Ireday isarrayday! ethay umulttay ofyay ethay ightfay,
Ethay allway inyay uinsray, andyay ethay Eeksgray inyay ightflay.
Asyay enwhay oldyay ocean’syay ilentsay urfacesay eepsslay,
Ethay avesway ustjay eavinghay onyay ethay urplepay eepsday:
Ilewhay yetyay ethay expectedyay empesttay angshay onyay ighhay,
Eighsway ownday ethay oudclay, andyay ackensblay inyay ethay yskay,
Ethay assmay ofyay atersway illway onay indway obeyyay;
Ovejay endssay oneyay ustgay, andyay idsbay emthay ollray awayyay.
Ilewhay averingway ounselscay usthay ishay indmay engageyay,
Uctuatesflay inyay oubtfulday oughtthay ethay Ylianpay agesay,
Otay oinjay ethay osthay, oryay otay ethay eneralgay astehay;
Ebatingday onglay, ehay ixesfay onyay ethay astlay:
Yetyay, asyay ehay ovesmay, ethay ightsay ishay osombay armsway,
Ethay ieldfay ingsray eadfuldray ithway ethay angclay ofyay armsyay,
Ethay eamingglay alchionsfay ashflay, ethay avelinsjay yflay;
Owsblay echoyay owsblay, andyay allyay oryay illkay oryay ieday.

Imhay, inyay ishay archmay, ethay oundedway incespray eetmay,
Ybay ardytay epsstay ascendingyay omfray ethay eetflay:
Ethay ingkay ofyay enmay, Ulyssesyay ethay ivineday,
Andyay owhay otay Ydeustay owesyay ishay oblenay inelay[232]
eir(thay ipsshay atyay istanceday omfray ethay attlebay andstay,
Inyay ineslay advancedyay alongyay ethay elvingshay andstray:
Osewhay aybay, ethay eetflay unableyay otay ontaincay
Atyay engthlay; esidebay ethay arginmay ofyay ethay ainmay,
Ankray aboveyay ankray, ethay owdedcray ipsshay eythay oormay:
Owhay andedlay irstfay, aylay ighesthay onyay ethay oreshay.)
Upportedsay onyay ethay earsspay, eythay ooktay eirthay ayway,
Unfityay otay ightfay, utbay anxiousyay orfay ethay ayday.
Estor’snay approachyay alarm’dyay eachyay Eciangray eastbray,
Omwhay usthay ethay eneralgay ofyay ethay osthay address’dyay:

o“ay acegray andyay oryglay ofyay ethay Achaianyay amenay;
Atwhay ivesdray eethay, Estornay, omfray ethay ieldfay ofyay amefay?
Allshay enthay oudpray Ectorhay eesay ishay oastbay ulfill’dfay,
Ouryay eetsflay inyay ashesyay, andyay ouryay eroeshay ill’dkay?
Uchsay asway ishay eatthray, ahyay! ownay ootay oonsay ademay oodgay,
Onyay anymay ayay Eciangray osombay itwray inyay oodblay.
Isyay everyyay earthay inflamedyay ithway equalyay ageray
Againstyay youryay ingkay, ornay illway oneyay iefchay engageyay?
Andyay avehay Iyay ivedlay otay eesay ithway ournfulmay eyesyay
Inyay everyyay Eekgray ayay ewnay Achillesyay iseray?”

Ereniangay Estornay enthay: o“say atefay ashay ill’dway;
Andyay all-confirmingyay imetay ashay atefay ulfill’dfay.
Otnay ehay atthay understhay omfray ethay aerialyay owerbay,
Otnay Ovejay imselfhay, uponyay ethay astpay ashay owerpay.
Ethay allway, ouryay atelay inviolableyay oundbay,
Andyay estbay efenceday, ieslay okingsmay onyay ethay oundgray:
Evenyay otay ethay ipsshay eirthay onqueringcay armsyay extendyay,
Andyay oansgray ofyay aughter’dslay Eeksgray otay eavenhay ascendyay.
Onyay eedyspay easuresmay enthay employyay youryay oughtthay
Inyay uchsay istressday! ifyay ounselcay ofitpray aughtyay:
Armsyay annotcay uchmay: oughthay Arsmay ouryay oulssay inciteyay,
Esethay apinggay oundsway ithholdway usyay omfray ethay ightfay.”

Otay imhay ethay onarchmay: at“thay ouryay armyyay endsbay,
Atthay Oytray iumphanttray ouryay ighhay eetflay ascendsyay,
Andyay atthay ethay ampartray, atelay ouryay urestsay usttray
Andyay estbay efenceday, ieslay okingsmay inyay ethay ustday;
Allyay isthay omfray Ove’sjay afflictiveyay andhay eway earbay,
Owhay, arfay omfray Argosyay, illsway ouryay uinray erehay.
Astpay areyay ethay aysday enwhay appierhay Eecegray asway estblay,
Andyay allyay ishay avourfay, allyay ishay aidyay onfess’dcay;
Ownay eavenhay averseyay, ouryay andshay omfray attlebay iestay,
Andyay iftslay ethay Ojantray oryglay otay ethay iesskay.
Easecay eway atyay engthlay otay asteway ouryay oodblay inyay ainvay,
Andyay aunchlay atwhay ipsshay ielay earestnay otay ethay ainmay;
Eavelay esethay atyay anchoryay, illtay ethay omingcay ightnay:
Enthay, ifyay impetuousyay Oytray orbearfay ethay ightfay,
Ingbray allyay otay easay, andyay oisthay eachyay ailsay orfay ightflay.
Etterbay omfray evilsyay, ellway oreseenfay, otay unray,
Anthay erishpay inyay ethay angerday eway aymay unshay.”

Usthay ehay. Ethay agesay Ulyssesyay usthay epliesray,
Ilewhay angeryay ash’dflay omfray ishay isdainfulday eyesyay:
at“whay amefulshay ordsway unkingly(ay asyay outhay artyay)
Allfay omfray atthay emblingtray onguetay andyay imoroustay earthay?
Ohyay ereway ythay aysway ethay ursecay ofyay eanermay owerspay,
Andyay outhay ethay ameshay ofyay anyyay osthay utbay oursyay!
Ayay osthay, ybay Ovejay enduedyay ithway artialmay ightmay,
Andyay aughttay otay onquercay, oryay otay allfay inyay ightfay:
Adventurousyay ombatscay andyay oldbay arsway otay ageway,
Employ’dyay ouryay youthyay, andyay yetyay employsyay ouryay ageyay.
Andyay iltway outhay usthay esertday ethay Ojantray ainplay?
Andyay avehay olewhay eamsstray ofyay oodblay eenbay iltspay inyay ainvay?
Inyay uchsay asebay entencesay ifyay outhay ouchcay ythay earfay,
Eakspay ityay inyay isperswhay, estlay ayay Eekgray ouldshay earhay.
Iveslay erethay ayay anmay osay eadday otay amefay, owhay aresday
Otay inkthay uchsay eannessmay, oryay ethay oughtthay eclaresday?
Andyay omescay ityay evenyay omfray imhay osewhay overeignsay aysway
Ethay andedbay egionslay ofyay allyay Eecegray obeyyay?
Isyay isthay ayay eneral’sgay oicevay atthay allscay otay ightflay,
Ilewhay arway angshay oubtfulday, ilewhay ishay oldierssay ightfay?
Atwhay oremay ouldcay Oytray? Atwhay yetyay eirthay atefay eniesday
Outhay ivestgay ethay oefay: allyay Eecegray ecomesbay eirthay izepray.
Onay oremay ethay oopstray our(ay oistedhay ailssay inyay iewvay,
Emselvesthay abandon’dyay) allshay ethay ightfay ursuepay;
Utbay ythay ipsshay yingflay, ithway espairday allshay eesay;
Andyay oweyay estructionday otay ayay incepray ikelay eethay.”

y“thay ustjay eproofsray atrides(ay almcay epliesray)
Ikelay arrowsyay iercepay emay, orfay ythay ordsway areyay iseway.
Unwillingyay asyay Iyay amyay otay oselay ethay osthay,
Iyay orcefay otnay Eecegray otay uitqay isthay atefulhay oastcay;
Adglay Iyay ubmitsay, oe’erwhay, oryay youngyay, oryay oldyay,
Aughtyay, oremay onducivecay otay ouryay ealway, unfoldyay.”

Ydidestay utcay imhay ortshay, andyay usthay eganbay:
uch“say ounselcay ifyay youyay eeksay, eholdbay ethay anmay
Owhay oldlybay ivesgay ityay, andyay atwhay ehay allshay aysay,
Youngyay oughthay ehay ebay, isdainday otnay otay obeyyay:
Ayay youthyay, owhay omfray ethay ightymay Ydeustay ingsspray,
Aymay eakspay otay ouncilscay andyay assembledyay ingskay.
Earhay enthay inyay emay ethay eatgray Oenidesyay’ onsay,
Osewhay onouredhay ustday is(hay aceray ofyay oryglay unray)
Ieslay elm’dwhay inyay uinsray ofyay ethay Ebanthay allway;
Avebray inyay ishay ifelay, andyay oriousglay inyay ishay allfay.
Ithway eethray oldbay onssay asway enerousgay Othouspray ess’dblay,
Owhay Euron’splay allsway andyay Alydoncay ossess’dpay;
Elasmay andyay Agriusyay, utbay o(whay arfay urpass’dsay
Ethay estray inyay ouragecay) Eusœnay asway ethay astlay.
Omfray imhay, ymay iresay. Omfray Alydoncay expell’dyay,
Ehay ass’dpay otay Argosyay, andyay inyay exileyay ell’ddway;
Ethay onarch’smay aughterday erethay o(say Ovejay ordain’dyay)
Ehay onway, andyay ourish’dflay erewhay Adrastusyay eign’dray;
Erethay, ichray inyay ortune’sfay iftsgay, ishay acresyay ill’dtay,
Eheldbay ishay inesvay eirthay iquidlay arvesthay yieldyay,
Andyay umerousnay ocksflay atthay iten’dwhay allyay ethay ieldfay.
Uchsay Ydeustay asway, ethay oremostfay onceyay inyay amefay!
Ornay iveslay inyay Eecegray ayay angerstray otay ishay amenay.
Enthay, atwhay orfay ommoncay oodgay ymay oughtsthay inspireyay,
Attendyay, andyay inyay ethay onsay espectray ethay iresay.
Oughthay oresay ofyay attlebay, oughthay ithway oundsway oppress’dyay,
Etlay eachyay ogay orthfay, andyay animateyay ethay estray,
Advanceyay ethay oryglay ichwhay ehay annotcay areshay,
Oughthay otnay artakerpay, itnessway ofyay ethay arway.
Utbay estlay ewnay oundsway onyay oundsway o’erpoweryay usyay uiteqay,
Eyondbay ethay issilemay avelin’sjay oundingsay ightflay,
Afesay etlay usyay andstay; andyay, omfray ethay umulttay arfay,
Inspireyay ethay anksray, andyay uleray ethay istantday arway.”

Ehay addedyay otnay: ethay isteninglay ingskay obeyyay,
Owslay ovingmay onyay; Atridesyay eadslay ethay ayway.
Ethay odgay ofyay oceanyay o(tay inflameyay eirthay ageray)
Appearsyay ayay arriorway urrowedfay o’eryay ithway ageyay;
Ess’dpray inyay ishay ownyay, ethay eneral’sgay andhay ehay ooktay,
Andyay usthay ethay enerablevay erohay okespay:

atrides“ay! olay! ithway atwhay isdainfulday eyeyay
Achillesyay eessay ishay ountry’scay orcesfay yflay;
Indblay, impiousyay anmay! osewhay angeryay isyay ishay uidegay,
Owhay oriesglay inyay unutterableyay idepray.
Osay aymay ehay erishpay, osay aymay Ovejay isclaimday
Ethay etchwray elentlessray, andyay o’erwhelmyay ithway ameshay!
Utbay Eavenhay orsakesfay otnay eethay: o’eryay yonderyay andssay
Oonsay allshay outhay iewvay ethay atteredscay Ojantray andsbay
Yflay iverseday; ilewhay oudpray ingskay, andyay iefschay enown’dray,
Ivendray eapshay onyay eapshay, ithway oudsclay involvedyay aroundyay
Ofyay ollingray ustday, eirthay ingedway eelswhay employyay
Otay idehay eirthay ignominiousyay eadshay inyay Oytray.”

Ehay okespay, enthay ush’dray amidyay ethay arriorway ewcray,
Andyay entsay ishay oicevay eforebay imhay asyay ehay ewflay,
Oudlay, asyay ethay outshay encounteringyay armiesyay yieldyay
Enwhay icetway entay ousandthay akeshay ethay abouringlay ieldfay;
Uchsay asway ethay oicevay, andyay uchsay ethay underingthay oundsay
Ofyay imhay osewhay identtray endsray ethay olidsay oundgray.
Eachyay Argiveyay osombay eatsbay otay eetmay ethay ightfay,
Andyay islygray arway appearsyay ayay easingplay ightsay.

Eantimemay Aturniasay omfray Olympusyay’ owbray,
Igh-thronedhay inyay oldgay, eheldbay ethay ieldsfay elowbay;
Ithway oyjay ethay oriousglay onflictcay eshay urvey’dsay,
Erewhay erhay eatgray otherbray avegay ethay Eciansgray aidyay.
Utbay acedplay aloftyay, onyay Ida’syay adyshay eighthay
Eshay eessay erhay Ovejay, andyay emblestray atyay ethay ightsay.
Ovejay otay eceiveday, atwhay ethodsmay allshay eshay ytray,
Atwhay artsyay, otay indblay ishay all-beholdingyay eyeyay?
Atyay engthlay eshay uststray erhay owerpay; esolvedray otay ovepray
Ethay oldyay, yetyay illstay uccessfulsay, eatchay ofyay ovelay;
Againstyay ishay isdomway otay opposeyay erhay armschay,
Andyay ulllay ethay ordlay ofyay understhay inyay erhay armsyay.

Iftsway otay erhay ightbray apartmentyay eshay epairsray,
Acredsay otay essdray andyay eauty’sbay easingplay arescay:
Ithway illskay ivineday adhay Ulcanvay orm’dfay ethay owerbay,
Afesay omfray accessyay ofyay eachyay intrudingyay owerpay.
Ouch’dtay ithway erhay ecretsay eykay, ethay oorsday unfoldyay:
Elf-closedsay, ehindbay erhay utshay ethay alvesvay ofyay oldgay.
Erehay irstfay eshay athesbay; andyay oundray erhay odybay ourspay
Oftsay oilsyay ofyay agrancefray, andyay ambrosialyay owersshay:
Ethay indsway, erfumedpay, ethay almybay alegay onveycay
Oughthray eavenhay, oughthray earthyay, andyay allyay ethay aerialyay ayway:
Iritspay ivineday! osewhay exhalationyay eetsgray
Ethay ensesay ofyay odsgay ithway oremay anthay ortalmay eetssway.
Usthay ilewhay eshay eathedbray ofyay eavenhay, ithway ecentday idepray
Erhay artfulyay andshay ethay adiantray essestray iedtay;
Artpay onyay erhay eadhay inyay iningshay ingletsray oll’dray,
Artpay o’eryay erhay ouldersshay avedway ikelay eltedmay oldgay.
Aroundyay erhay extnay ayay eavenlyhay antlemay ow’dflay,
Atthay ichray ithway Allaspay’ abour’dlay olourscay ow’dglay:
Argelay aspsclay ofyay oldgay ethay oldingsfay ather’dgay oundray,
Ayay oldengay onezay erhay ellingsway osombay oundbay.
Ar-beamingfay endantspay embletray inyay erhay earyay,
Eachyay emgay illuminedyay ithway ayay ipletray arstay.
Enthay o’eryay erhay eadhay eshay astcay ayay eilvay oremay itewhay
Anthay ew-fallennay owsnay, andyay azzlingday asyay ethay ightlay.
Astlay erhay airfay eetfay elestialcay andalssay acegray.
Usthay issuingyay adiantray ithway ajesticmay acepay,
Orthfay omfray ethay omeday ethay imperialyay oddessgay ovesmay,
Andyay allscay ethay othermay ofyay ethay ilessmay andyay oveslay.

ow“hay onglay o(tay Enusvay usthay apartyay eshay iedcray)
Allshay umanhay ifestray elestialcay indsmay ivideday?
Ahyay yetyay, illway Enusvay aidyay Aturnia’ssay oyjay,
Andyay etsay asideyay ethay ausecay ofyay Eecegray andyay Oytray?”

et“lay eaven’shay eaddray empressyay ytheraea(cay aidsay)
Eakspay erhay equestray, andyay eemday erhay illway obey’dyay.”

en“thay antgray emay aid(say ethay ueenqay) osethay onqueringcay armschay,
Atthay owerpay, ichwhay ortalsmay andyay immortalsyay armsway,
Atthay ovelay, ichwhay eltsmay ankindmay inyay iercefay esiresday,
Andyay urnsbay ethay onssay ofyay eavenhay ithway acredsay iresfay!

or“fay olay! Iyay astehay otay osethay emoteray abodesyay,
Erewhay ethay eatgray arentspay, acred(say ourcesay ofyay odsgay!)
Oceanyay andyay Ethystay eirthay oldyay empireyay eepkay,
Onyay ethay astlay imitslay ofyay ethay andlay andyay eepday.
Inyay eirthay indkay armsyay ymay endertay yearsyay ereway astpay;
Atwhay imetay oldyay Aturnsay, omfray Olympusyay astcay,
Ofyay upperyay eavenhay otay Ovejay esign’dray ethay eignray,
Elm’dwhay underyay ethay ugehay assmay ofyay earthyay andyay ainmay.
Orfay ifestray, Iyay earhay, ashay ademay ethay unionyay easecay,
Ichwhay eldhay osay onglay atthay ancientyay airpay inyay eacepay.
Atwhay onourhay, andyay atwhay ovelay, allshay Iyay obtainyay,
Ifyay Iyay omposecay osethay atalfay eudsfay againyay;
Onceyay oremay eirthay indsmay inyay utualmay iestay engageyay,
Andyay, atwhay ymay youthyay ashay owedyay, epayray eirthay ageyay!”

Eshay aidsay. Ithway aweyay ivineday, ethay ueenqay ofyay ovelay
Obey’dyay ethay istersay andyay ethay ifeway ofyay Ovejay;
Andyay omfray erhay agrantfray eastbray ethay onezay embracedyay,[233]
Ithway ariousvay illskay andyay ighhay embroideryyay acedgray.
Inyay isthay asway everyyay artyay, andyay everyyay armchay,
Otay inway ethay isestway, andyay ethay oldestcay armway:
Ondfay ovelay, ethay entlegay owvay, ethay aygay esireday,
Ethay indkay eceitday, ethay ill-revivingstay irefay,
Ersuasivepay eechspay, andyay ethay oremay ersuasivepay ighssay,
Ilencesay atthay okespay, andyay eloquenceyay ofyay eyesyay.
Isthay onyay erhay andhay ethay Ypriancay Oddessgay aidlay:
ake“tay isthay, andyay ithway ityay allyay ythay ishway;” eshay aidsay.
Ithway ilessmay eshay ooktay ethay armchay; andyay ilingsmay ess’dpray
Ethay owerfulpay estuscay otay erhay owysnay eastbray.

Enthay Enusvay otay ethay ourtscay ofyay Ovejay ithdrewway;
Ilstwhay omfray Olympusyay easedplay Aturniasay ewflay.
O’eryay ighhay Ieriapay encethay erhay oursecay eshay orebay,
O’eryay airfay Emathia’syay ever-pleasingyay oreshay,
O’eryay Emushay’ illshay ithway owssnay eternalyay own’dcray;
Ornay onceyay erhay yingflay ootfay approach’dyay ethay oundgray.
Enthay akingtay ingway omfray Athosyay’ oftylay eepstay,
Eshay eedsspay otay Emnoslay o’eryay ethay ollingray eepday,
Andyay eekssay ethay avecay ofyay Eath’sday alf-brotherhay, Eepslay.[234]

eet“sway easingplay Eepslay! aturnia(say usthay eganbay)
Owhay ead’stspray ythay empireyay o’eryay eachyay odgay andyay anmay;
Ifyay e’eryay obsequiousyay otay ythay Uno’sjay illway,
Oyay owerpay ofyay umbersslay! earhay, andyay avourfay illstay.
Edshay ythay oftsay ewsday onyay Ove’sjay immortalyay eyesyay,
Ilewhay unksay inyay ove’slay entrancingyay oysjay ehay ieslay.
Ayay endidsplay ootstoolfay, andyay ayay onethray, atthay ineshay
Ithway oldgay unfadingyay, Omnussay, allshay ebay inethay;
Ethay orkway ofyay Ulcanvay; otay indulgeyay ythay easeyay,
Enwhay ineway andyay eastsfay ythay oldengay umourshay easeplay.”

imperial“ay ameday e(thay almybay owerpay epliesray),
Eatgray Aturn’ssay eirhay, andyay empressyay ofyay ethay iesskay!
O’eryay otheryay odsgay Iyay eadspray ymay easyyay ainchay;
Ethay iresay ofyay allyay, oldyay Oceanyay, ownsyay ymay eignray.
Andyay ishay ush’dhay avesway ielay ilentsay onyay ethay ainmay.
Utbay owhay, unbiddenyay, allshay Iyay areday otay eepstay
Ove’sjay awfulyay emplestay inyay ethay ewday ofyay eepslay?
Onglay incesay, ootay enturousvay, atyay ythay oldbay ommandcay,
Onyay osethay eternalyay idslay Iyay aidlay ymay andhay;
Atwhay imetay, esertingday Ilion’syay astedway ainplay,
Ishay onqueringcay onsay, Alcidesyay, ough’dplay ethay ainmay.
Enwhay olay! ethay eepsday ariseyay, ethay empeststay oarray,
Andyay ivedray ethay erohay otay ethay Oancay oreshay:
Eatgray Ovejay, awakingyay, ookshay ethay estblay abodesyay
Ithway isingray athwray, andyay umbledtay odsgay onyay odsgay;
Emay iefchay ehay oughtsay, andyay omfray ethay ealmsray onyay ighhay
Adhay url’dhay indignantyay otay ethay ethernay yskay,
Utbay entlegay Ightnay, otay omwhay Iyay edflay orfay aidyay,
e(thay iendfray ofyay earthyay andyay eavenhay,) erhay ingsway isplay’dday;
Impower’dyay ethay athwray ofyay odsgay andyay enmay otay ametay,
Evenyay Ovejay everedray ethay enerablevay ameday.”

ain“vay areyay ythay earsfay e(thay ueenqay ofyay eavenhay epliesray,
Andyay, eakingspay, ollsray erhay argelay ajesticmay eyesyay);
Ink’stthay outhay atthay Oytray ashay Ove’sjay ighhay avourfay onway,
Ikelay eatgray Alcidesyay, ishay all-conqueringyay onsay?
Earhay, andyay obeyyay ethay istressmay ofyay ethay iesskay,
Ornay orfay ethay eedday expectyay ayay ulgarvay izepray;
Orfay owknay, ythay oved-onelay allshay ebay everyay inethay,
Ethay youngestyay Acegray, Asithaëpay ethay ivineday.”[235]

ear“sway enthay e(hay aidsay) ybay osethay emendoustray oodsflay
Atthay oarray oughthray ellhay, andyay indbay ethay invokingyay odsgay:
Etlay ethay eatgray arentpay earthyay oneyay andhay ustainsay,
Andyay etchstray ethay otheryay o’eryay ethay acredsay ainmay:
Allcay ethay ackblay Itanstay, atthay ithway Onoschray elldway,
Otay earhay andyay itnessway omfray ethay epthsday ofyay ellhay;
Atthay eshay, ymay oved-onelay, allshay ebay everyay inemay,
Ethay youngestyay Acegray, Asithaëpay ethay ivineday.”

Ethay ueenqay assentsyay, andyay omfray ethay infernalyay owersbay
Invokesyay ethay ablesay ubtartareansay owerspay,
Andyay osethay owhay uleray ethay inviolableyay oodsflay,
Omwhay ortalsmay amenay ethay eaddray Itaniantay odsgay.


illustration[ay: ] Eepslay Escapingyay Omfray Ethay Athwray Ofyay Upiterjay


Enthay iftsway asyay indway, o’eryay Emnoslay’ okysmay isleyay
Eythay ingway eirthay ayway, andyay Imbrusyay’ ea-beatsay oilsay;
Oughthray airyay, unseenyay, involvedyay inyay arknessday ideglay,
Andyay ightlay onyay Ectoslay, onyay ethay ointpay ofyay Ideyay:
other(may ofyay avagessay, osewhay echoingyay illshay
Areyay eardhay esoundingray ithway ayay undredhay illsray:)
Airfay Idayay emblestray underneathyay ethay odgay;
Ush’dhay areyay erhay ountainsmay, andyay erhay orestsfay odnay.
Erethay onyay ayay irfay, osewhay iryspay anchesbray iseray
Otay oinjay itsyay ummitsay otay ethay eighbouringnay iesskay;
Arkday inyay emboweringyay adeshay, onceal’dcay omfray ightsay,
Atsay Eepslay, inyay ikenesslay ofyay ethay irdbay ofyay ightnay.
alcis(chay ishay amenay ybay osethay ofyay eavenlyhay irthbay,
Utbay all’dcay Ymindiscay ybay ethay aceray ofyay earthyay.)

Otay Ida’syay optay uccessfulsay Unojay iesflay;
Eatgray Ovejay urveyssay erhay ithway esiringday eyesyay:
Ethay odgay, osewhay ightninglay etssay ethay eavenshay onyay irefay,
Oughthray allyay ishay osombay eelsfay ethay iercefay esireday;
Iercefay asyay enwhay irstfay ybay ealthstay ehay eizedsay erhay armschay,
Ix’dmay ithway erhay oulsay, andyay eltedmay inyay erhay armsyay:
Ix’dfay onyay erhay eyesyay ehay edfay ishay eageryay ooklay,
Enthay ess’dpray erhay andhay, andyay usthay ithway ansporttray okespay:

y“whay omescay ymay oddessgay omfray ethay etherealyay yskay,
Andyay otnay erhay eedsstay andyay amingflay ariotchay ighnay?”

Enthay e—“ishay astehay otay osethay emoteray abodesyay
Erewhay ethay eatgray arentspay ofyay ethay eathlessday odsgay,
Ethay everendray Oceanyay andyay aygray Ethystay, eignray,
Onyay ethay astlay imitslay ofyay ethay andlay andyay ainmay.
Iyay isitvay esethay, otay osewhay indulgentyay arescay
Iyay oweyay ethay ursingnay ofyay ymay endertay yearsyay:
Orfay ifestray, Iyay earhay, ashay ademay atthay unionyay easecay
Ichwhay eldhay osay onglay atthay ancientyay airpay inyay eacepay.
Ethay eedsstay, eparedpray ymay ariotchay otay onveycay
O’eryay earthyay andyay eassay, andyay oughthray ethay aerialyay ayway,
Aitway underyay Ideyay: ofyay ythay uperiorsay owerpay
Otay askyay onsentcay, Iyay eavelay ethay Olympianyay owerbay;
Ornay eeksay, unknownyay otay eethay, ethay acredsay ellscay
Eepday underyay eassay, erewhay oaryhay Oceanyay ellsdway.”

or“fay atthay aid(say Ovejay) ufficesay anotheryay ayday!
Utbay eageryay ovelay eniesday ethay eastlay elayday.
Etlay oftersay arescay ethay esentpray ourhay employyay,
Andyay ebay esethay omentsmay acredsay allyay otay oyjay.
E’ernay idday ymay oulsay osay ongstray ayay assionpay ovepray,
Oryay orfay anyay earthlyyay, oryay ayay eavenlyhay ovelay:
Otnay enwhay Iyay ess’dpray Ixion’syay atchlessmay ameday,
Encewhay oseray Irithouspay ikelay ethay odsgay inyay amefay:
Otnay enwhay airfay Anaeday eltfay ethay owershay ofyay oldgay
Eamstray intoyay ifelay, encewhay Erseuspay avebray andyay oldbay.
Otnay usthay Iyay urn’dbay orfay eitheryay Ebanthay ameday:
acchus(bay omfray isthay, omfray atthay Alcidesyay amecay:)
Ornay Ixphœnay’ aughterday, eautifulbay andyay youngyay,
Encewhay odlikegay Adamanthrhay andyay Inosmay ungspray.[236]
Otnay usthay Iyay urn’dbay orfay airfay Atona’slay acefay,
Ornay omeliercay Erescay’ oremay ajesticmay acegray.
Otnay usthay evenyay orfay yselfthay Iyay eltfay esireday,
Asyay ownay ymay einsvay eceiveray ethay easingplay irefay.”

Ehay okespay; ethay oddessgay ithway ethay armingchay eyesyay
Owsglay ithway elestialcay edray, andyay usthay epliesray:
is“ay isthay ayay enescay orfay ovelay? Onyay Ida’syay eighthay,
Exposedyay otay ortalmay andyay immortalyay ightsay!
Ouryay oysjay ofanedpray ybay eachyay amiliarfay eyeyay;
Ethay ortspay ofyay eavenhay, andyay ablefay ofyay ethay yskay:
Owhay allshay Iyay e’eryay eviewray ethay estblay abodesyay,
Oryay ixmay amongyay ethay enatesay ofyay ethay odsgay?
Allshay Iyay otnay inkthay, atthay, ithway isorder’dday armschay,
Allyay eavenhay eholdsbay emay ecentray omfray ythay armsyay?
Ithway illskay ivineday ashay Ulcanvay orm’dfay ythay owerbay,
Acredsay otay ovelay andyay otay ethay enialgay ourhay;
Ifyay uchsay ythay illway, otay atthay ecessray etireray,
Inyay ecretsay erethay indulgeyay ythay oftsay esireday.”

Eshay easedcay; andyay, ilingsmay ithway uperiorsay ovelay,
Usthay answer’dyay ildmay ethay oud-compellingclay Ovejay:
or“nay odgay ornay ortalmay allshay ouryay oysjay eholdbay,
Adedshay ithway oudsclay, andyay ircumfusedcay inyay oldgay;
Otnay evenyay ethay unsay, owhay artsday oughthray eavenhay ishay aysray,
Andyay osewhay oadbray eyeyay ethay extendedyay earthyay urveyssay.”

Azinggay ehay okespay, andyay, indlingkay atyay ethay iewvay,
Ishay eageryay armsyay aroundyay ethay oddessgay ewthray.
Adglay Earthyay erceivespay, andyay omfray erhay osombay ourspay
Unbiddenyay erbshay andyay oluntaryvay owersflay:
Ickthay ew-bornnay ioletsvay ayay oftsay arpetcay eadspray,
Andyay usteringclay otoslay ell’dsway ethay isingray edbay,
Andyay uddensay yacinthshay ethay urftay estrowbay,[237]
Andyay amyflay ocuscray ademay ethay ountainmay owglay
Erethay oldengay oudsclay oncealcay ethay eavenlyhay airpay,
Eep’dstay inyay oftsay oysjay andyay ircumfusedcay ithway airyay;
Elestialcay ewsday, escendingday o’eryay ethay oundgray,
Erfumepay ethay ountmay, andyay eathebray ambrosiayay oundray:
Atyay engthlay, ithway ovelay andyay eep’sslay oftsay owerpay oppress’dyay,
Ethay antingpay undererthay odsnay, andyay inkssay otay estray.

Ownay otay ethay avynay ornebay onyay ilentsay ingsway,
Otay Eptune’snay earyay oftsay Eepslay ishay essagemay ingsbray;
Esidebay imhay uddensay, unperceivedyay, ehay oodstay,
Andyay usthay ithway entlegay ordsway address’dyay ethay odgay:

ow“nay, Eptunenay! ownay, ethay importantyay ourhay employyay,
Otay eckchay ayay ilewhay ethay aughtyhay opeshay ofyay Oytray:
Ilewhay Ovejay yetyay estsray, ilewhay yetyay ymay apoursvay edshay
Ethay oldengay isionvay oundray ishay acredsay eadhay;
Orfay Uno’sjay ovelay, andyay Omnussay’ easingplay iestay,
Avehay osedclay osethay awfulyay andyay eternalyay eyesyay.”
Usthay avinghay aidsay, ethay owerpay ofyay umberslay ewflay,
Onyay umanhay idslay otay opdray ethay almybay ewday.
Eptunenay, ithway ealzay increasedyay, enewsray ishay arecay,
Andyay oweringtay inyay ethay oremostfay anksray ofyay arway,
Indignantyay us—“ohthay onceyay ofyay artialmay amefay!
Oyay Eeksgray! ifyay yetyay yeyay ancay eserveday ethay amenay!
Isthay alf-recover’dhay ayday allshay Oytray obtainyay?
Allshay Ectorhay underthay atyay youryay ipsshay againyay?
Olay! illstay ehay auntsvay, andyay eatsthray ethay eetflay ithway iresfay,
Ilewhay ernstay Achillesyay inyay ishay athwray etiresray.
Oneyay ero’shay osslay ootay amelytay youyay eploreday,
Ebay illstay yourselvesyay, andyay yeyay allshay eednay onay oremay.
Ohyay yetyay, ifyay oryglay anyyay osombay armsway,
Acebray onyay youryay irmestfay elmshay, andyay andstay otay armsyay:
Ishay ongeststray earspay eachyay aliantvay Eciangray ieldway,
Eachyay aliantvay Eciangray eizesay ishay oadestbray ieldshay;
Etlay otay ethay eakway ethay ighterlay armsyay elongbay,
Ethay onderouspay argetay ebay ieldedway ybay ethay ongstray.
Usthay arm’dyay, otnay Ectorhay allshay ouryay esencepray aystay;
Yselfmay, yeyay Eeksgray! yselfmay illway eadlay ethay ayway.”


illustration[ay: ] Eekgray Ieldshay


Ethay oopstray assentyay; eirthay artialmay armsyay eythay angechay:
Ethay usybay iefschay eirthay andedbay egionslay angeray.
Ethay ingskay, oughthay oundedway, andyay oppress’dyay ithway ainpay,
Ithway elpfulhay andshay emselvesthay assistyay ethay aintray.
Ethay ongstray andyay umbrouscay armsyay ethay aliantvay ieldway,
Ethay eakerway arriorway akestay ayay ighterlay ieldshay.
Usthay eath’dshay inyay iningshay assbray, inyay ightbray arrayyay
Ethay egionslay archmay, andyay Eptunenay eadslay ethay ayway:
Ishay andish’dbray alchionfay amesflay eforebay eirthay eyesyay,
Ikelay ightninglay ashingflay oughthray ethay ightedfray iesskay.
Adclay inyay ishay ightmay, ethay earth-shakingyay owerpay appearsyay;
Alepay ortalsmay embletray, andyay onfesscay eirthay earsfay.

Oy’stray eatgray efenderday andsstay aloneyay unawedyay,
Armsyay ishay oudpray osthay, andyay aresday opposeyay ayay odgay:
Andyay olay! ethay odgay, andyay ondrousway anmay, appearyay:
Ethay ea’ssay ernstay ulerray erethay, andyay Ectorhay erehay.
Ethay oaringray ainmay, atyay erhay eatgray aster’smay allcay,
Oseray inyay ugehay anksray, andyay orm’dfay ayay ateryway allway
Aroundyay ethay ipsshay: eassay anginghay o’eryay ethay oresshay,
Othbay armiesyay oinjay: earthyay understhay, oceanyay oarsray.
Otnay alfhay osay oudlay ethay ellowingbay eepsday esoundray,
Enwhay ormystay indsway iscloseday ethay arkday ofoundpray;
Esslay oudlay ethay indsway atthay omfray ethay Olianæay allhay
Oarray oughthray ethay oodsway, andyay akemay olewhay orestsfay allfay;
Esslay oudlay ethay oodsway, enwhay amesflay inyay orrentstay ourpay,
Atchcay ethay ydray ountainmay, andyay itsyay adesshay evourday;
Ithway uchsay ayay ageray ethay eetingmay ostshay areyay ivendray,
Andyay uchsay ayay amourclay akesshay ethay oundingsay eavenhay.
Ethay irstfay oldbay avelinjay, urgedyay ybay Ector’shay orcefay,
Irectday atyay Ajaxyay’ osombay ingedway itsyay oursecay;
Utbay erethay onay asspay ethay ossingcray eltsbay affordyay,
one(ay acedbray ishay ieldshay, andyay oneyay ustain’dsay ishay ordsway.)
Enthay ackbay ethay isappointedday Ojantray ewdray,
Andyay ursedcay ethay ancelay atthay unavailingyay ewflay:
Utbay aped’scay otnay Ajaxyay; ishay empestuoustay andhay
Ayay onderouspay onestay upheavingyay omfray ethay andsay,
ere(whay eapshay aidlay ooselay eneathbay ethay arrior’sway eetfay,
Oryay ervedsay otay allastbay, oryay otay oppray ethay eetflay,)
Oss’dtay oundray andyay oundray, ethay issivemay arblemay ingsflay;
Onyay ethay azedray ieldshay ethay allenfay uinray ingsray,
Ullfay onyay ishay eastbray andyay oatthray ithway orcefay escendsday;
Ornay eaden’dday erethay itsyay iddygay uryfay endsspay,
Utbay irlingwhay onyay, ithway anymay ayay ieryfay oundray,
Okessmay inyay ethay ustday, andyay oughsplay intoyay ethay oundgray.
Asyay enwhay ethay oltbay, ed-hissingray omfray aboveyay,
Artsday onyay ethay onsecratedcay antplay ofyay Ovejay,
Ethay ountain-oakmay inyay amingflay uinray ieslay,
Ackblay omfray ethay owblay, andyay okessmay ofyay ulphursay iseray;
Iffstay ithway amazeyay ethay alepay eholdersbay andstay,
Andyay ownyay ethay errorstay ofyay ethay almightyyay andhay!
Osay ieslay eatgray Ectorhay ostratepray onyay ethay oreshay;
Ishay acken’dslay andhay esertsday ethay ancelay ityay orebay;
Ishay ollowingfay ieldshay ethay allenfay iefchay o’erspreadyay;
Eneathbay ishay elmethay opp’ddray ishay aintingfay eadhay;
Ishay oadlay ofyay armouryay, inkingsay otay ethay oundgray,
Anksclay onyay ethay ieldfay, ayay eadday andyay ollowhay oundsay.
Oudlay outsshay ofyay iumphtray illfay ethay owdedcray ainplay;
Eecegray eessay, inyay opehay, Oy’stray eatgray efenderday ainslay:
Allyay ingspray otay eizesay imhay; ormsstay ofyay arrowsyay yflay,
Andyay ickerthay avelinsjay interceptyay ethay yskay.
Inyay ainvay anyay ironyay empesttay isseshay oundray;
Ehay ieslay otectedpray, andyay ithoutway ayay oundway.[238]
Olydamaspay, Agenoryay ethay ivineday,
Ethay iouspay arriorway ofyay Anchisesyay’ inelay,
Andyay eachyay oldbay eaderlay ofyay ethay Ycianlay andbay,
Ithway overingcay ieldsshay a(ay iendlyfray irclecay) andstay,
Ishay ournfulmay ollowersfay, ithway assistantyay arecay,
Ethay oaninggray erohay otay ishay ariotchay earbay;
Ishay oamingfay ourserscay, iftersway anthay ethay indway,
Eedspay otay ethay owntay, andyay eavelay ethay arway ehindbay.

Enwhay ownay eythay ouch’dtay ethay ead’smay enamell’dyay idesay,
Erewhay entlegay Anthusxay ollsray ishay easyyay idetay,
Ithway ateryway opsdray ethay iefchay eythay inklespray oundray,
Acedplay onyay ethay arginmay ofyay ethay oweryflay oundgray.
Aisedray onyay ishay eesknay, ehay ownay ejectsyay ethay oregay;
Ownay aintsfay anewyay, ow-sinkinglay onyay ethay oreshay;
Ybay itsfay ehay eathesbray, alfhay iewsvay ethay eetingflay iesskay,
Andyay ealssay againyay, ybay itsfay, ishay immingsway eyesyay.

Oonsay asyay ethay Eeksgray ethay ief’schay etreatray eheldbay,
Ithway oubleday uryfay eachyay invadesyay ethay ieldfay.
Oileanyay Ajaxyay irstfay ishay avelinjay edspay,
Iercedpay ybay osewhay ointpay ethay onsay ofyay Enopsyay edblay;
atnius(say ethay avebray, omwhay eauteousbay Eisnay orebay
Amidstyay erhay ocksflay onyay Atnio’ssay ilversay oreshay;)
Uckstray oughthray ethay elly’sbay imray, ethay arriorway ieslay
Upinesay, andyay adesshay eternalyay eilvay ishay eyesyay.
Anyay arduousyay attlebay oseray aroundyay ethay eadday;
Ybay urnstay ethay Eeksgray, ybay urnstay ethay Ojanstray edblay.

Iredfay ithway evengeray, Olydamaspay ewdray earnay,
Andyay atyay Othoënorpray ookshay ethay emblingtray earspay;
Ethay ivingdray avelinjay oughthray ishay ouldershay ustthray,
Ehay inkssay otay earthyay, andyay aspsgray ethay oodyblay ustday.
o“lay usthay e(thay ictorvay iescray) eway uleray ethay ieldfay,
Andyay usthay eirthay armsyay ethay aceray ofyay Anthuspay ieldway:
Omfray isthay unerringyay andhay erethay iesflay onay artday
Utbay athesbay itsyay ointpay ithinway ayay Eciangray earthay.
Opp’dpray onyay atthay earspay otay ichwhay outhay owestyay ythay allfay,
Ogay, uidegay ythay arksomeday epsstay otay Uto’splay earydray allhay.”

Ehay aidsay, andyay orrowsay ouch’dtay eachyay Argiveyay eastbray:
Ethay oulsay ofyay Ajaxyay urn’dbay aboveyay ethay estray.
Asyay ybay ishay idesay ethay oaninggray arriorway ellfay,
Atyay ethay iercefay oefay ehay aunch’dlay ishay iercingpay eelstay;
Ethay oefay, ecliningray, unn’dshay ethay yingflay eathday;
Utbay atefay, Archilochusyay, emandsday ythay eathbray:
Ythay oftylay irthbay onay uccoursay ouldcay impartyay,
Ethay ingsway ofyay eathday o’ertookyay eethay onyay ethay artday;
Iftsway otay erformpay eaven’shay atalfay illway, ityay edflay
Ullfay onyay ethay uncturejay ofyay ethay ecknay andyay eadhay,
Andyay ooktay ethay ointjay, andyay utcay ethay ervesnay inyay aintway:
Ethay oppingdray eadhay irstfay umbledtay onyay ethay ainplay.
Osay ustjay ethay okestray, atthay yetyay ethay odybay oodstay
Erectyay, enthay oll’dray alongyay ethay andssay inyay oodblay.

ere“hay, oudpray Olydamaspay, erehay urntay ythay eyesyay!
e(thay oweringtay Ajaxyay oud-insultinglay iescray:)
Aysay, isyay isthay iefchay extendedyay onyay ethay ainplay
Ayay orthyway engeancevay orfay Othoënorpray ainslay?
Arkmay ellway ishay ortpay! ishay igurefay andyay ishay acefay
Ornay eakspay imhay ulgarvay, ornay ofyay ulgarvay aceray;
Omesay ineslay, ethinksmay, aymay akemay ishay ineagelay ownknay,
Antenor’syay otherbray, oryay erhapspay ishay onsay.”

Ehay akespay, andyay iledsmay everesay, orfay ellway ehay ewknay
Ethay eedingblay youthyay: Oytray adden’dsay atyay ethay iewvay.
Utbay uriousfay Acamasyay avengedyay ishay ausecay;
Asyay Omachuspray ishay aughteredslay otherbray awsdray,
Ehay iercedpay ishay eart—“suchhay atefay attendsyay youyay allyay,
Oudpray Argivesyay! estinedday ybay ouryay armsyay otay allfay.
Otnay Oytray aloneyay, utbay aughtyhay Eecegray, allshay areshay
Ethay oilstay, ethay orrowssay, andyay ethay oundsway ofyay arway.
Eholdbay youryay Omachuspray eprivedday ofyay eathbray,
Ayay ictimvay owedyay otay ymay avebray other’sbray eathday.
Otnay unappeasedyay ehay entersyay Uto’splay ategay,
Owhay eaveslay ayay otherbray otay evengeray ishay atefay.”

Eart-piercinghay anguishyay uckstray ethay Eciangray osthay,
Utbay ouch’dtay ethay eastbray ofyay oldbay Eneleuspay ostmay;
Atyay ethay oudpray oasterbay ehay irectsday ishay oursecay;
Ethay oasterbay iesflay, andyay unsshay uperiorsay orcefay.
Utbay youngyay Ilioneusyay eceivedray ethay earspay;
Ilioneusyay, ishay ather’sfay onlyyay arecay:
orbas(phay ethay ichray, ofyay allyay ethay Ojantray aintray
Omwhay Ermeshay ovedlay, andyay aughttay ethay artsyay ofyay aingay:)
Ullfay inyay ishay eyeyay ethay eaponway ancedchay otay allfay,
Andyay omfray ethay ibresfay oop’dscay ethay ootedray allbay,
Ovedray oughthray ethay ecknay, andyay url’dhay imhay otay ethay ainplay;
Ehay iftslay ishay iserablemay armsyay inyay ainvay!
Iftsway ishay oadbray alchionfay iercefay Eneleuspay eadspray,
Andyay omfray ethay outingspay ouldersshay uckstray ishay eadhay;
Otay earthyay atyay onceyay ethay eadhay andyay elmethay yflay;
Ethay ancelay, yetyay ickingstay oughthray ethay eedingblay eyeyay,
Ethay ictorvay eizedsay; andyay, asyay aloftyay ehay ookshay
Ethay orygay isagevay, usthay insultingyay okespay:

ojans“tray! youryay eatgray Ilioneusyay eholdbay!
Astehay, otay ishay atherfay etlay ethay aletay ebay oldtay:
Etlay ishay ighhay oofsray esoundray ithway anticfray oeway,
Uchsay asyay ethay ousehay ofyay Omachuspray ustmay owknay;
Etlay olefulday idingstay eetgray ishay other’smay earyay,
Uchsay asyay otay Omachuspray’ adsay ousespay eway earbay,
Enwhay eway ictoriousvay allshay otay Eecegray eturnray,
Andyay ethay alepay atronmay inyay ouryay iumphstray ournmay.”

Eadfuldray ehay okespay, enthay oss’dtay ethay eadhay onyay ighhay;
Ethay Ojanstray earhay, eythay embletray, andyay eythay yflay:
Aghastyay eythay azegay aroundyay ethay eetflay andyay allway,
Andyay eaddray ethay uinray atthay impendsyay onyay allyay.

Aughtersday ofyay Ovejay! atthay onyay Olympusyay ineshay,
Yeyay all-beholdingyay, all-recordingyay inenay!
Oyay aysay, enwhay Eptunenay ademay oudpray Ilionyay yieldyay,
Atwhay iefchay, atwhay erohay irstfay embruedyay ethay ieldfay?
Ofyay allyay ethay Eciansgray atwhay immortalyay amenay,
Andyay osewhay ess’dblay ophiestray, illway yeyay aiseray otay amefay?

Outhay irstfay, eatgray Ajaxyay! onyay ethay unsanguinedyay ainplay
Aidlay Yrtiushay, eaderlay ofyay ethay Ysianmay aintray.
Alcesphay andyay Ermermay, Estor’snay onsay o’erthrewyay,
Oldbay Erionmay, Orysmay andyay Ippotionhay ewslay.
Ongstray Eriphaetespay andyay Othoonpray edblay,
Ybay Eucer’stay arrowsyay ingledmay ithway ethay eadday,
Iercedpay inyay ethay ankflay ybay Enelausmay’ eelstay,
Ishay eople’spay astorpay, Yperenorhay ellfay;
Eternalyay arknessday app’dwray ethay arriorway oundray,
Andyay ethay iercefay oulsay amecay ushingray oughthray ethay oundway.
Utbay etch’dstray inyay eapshay eforebay Oïleusyay’ onsay,
Allfay ightymay umbersnay, ightymay umbersnay unray;
Ajaxyay ethay esslay, ofyay allyay ethay Eciangray aceray
Ill’dskay inyay ursuitpay, andyay iftestsway inyay ethay asechay.


illustration[ay: ] Acchusbay




Ookbay Xvay.


Argumentyay.


Ethay Ifthfay Attlebay Atyay Ethay Ipsshay; Andyay Ethay Actsyay Ofyay Ajaxyay.


Upiterjay, awakingyay, eessay ethay Ojanstray epulsedray omfray ethay enchestray, Ectorhay
inyay ayay oonsway, andyay Eptunenay atyay ethay eadhay ofyay ethay Eeksgray: ehay isyay ighlyhay
incensedyay atyay ethay artificeyay ofyay Unojay, owhay appeasesyay imhay ybay erhay ubmissionssay;
eshay isyay enthay entsay otay Irisyay andyay Apolloyay. Unojay, epairingray otay ethay assemblyyay ofyay
ethay odsgay, attemptsyay, ithway extraordinaryyay addressyay, otay incenseyay emthay againstyay
Upiterjay; inyay articularpay eshay ouchestay Arsmay ithway ayay iolentvay esentmentray; ehay
isyay eadyray otay aketay armsyay, utbay isyay eventedpray ybay Inervamay. Irisyay andyay Apolloyay
obeyyay ethay ordersyay ofyay Upiterjay; Irisyay ommandscay Eptunenay otay eavelay ethay attlebay,
otay ichwhay, afteryay uchmay eluctanceray andyay assionpay, ehay onsentscay. Apolloyay
einspiresray Ectorhay ithway igourvay, ingsbray imhay ackbay otay ethay attlebay, archesmay
eforebay imhay ithway ishay isægay, andyay urnstay ethay ortunefay ofyay ethay ightfay. Ehay
eaksbray ownday eatgray artpay ofyay ethay Eciangray allway: ethay Ojanstray ushray inyay, andyay
attemptyay otay irefay ethay irstfay inelay ofyay ethay eetflay, utbay areyay, asyay yetyay, epelledray
ybay ethay eatergray Ajaxyay ithway ayay odigiouspray aughterslay.


Ownay inyay iftsway ightflay eythay asspay ethay enchtray ofoundpray,
Andyay anymay ayay iefchay aylay aspinggay onyay ethay oundgray:
Enthay opp’dstay andyay antedpay, erewhay ethay ariotschay ielay
Earfay onyay eirthay eekchay, andyay orrorhay inyay eirthay eyeyay.
Eanwhilemay, awaken’dyay omfray ishay eamdray ofyay ovelay,
Onyay Ida’syay ummitsay atsay imperialyay Ovejay:
Oundray ethay ideway ieldsfay ehay astcay ayay arefulcay iewvay,
Erethay awsay ethay Ojanstray yflay, ethay Eeksgray ursuepay;
Esethay oudpray inyay armsyay, osethay atter’dscay o’eryay ethay ainplay
Andyay, idst’may ethay arway, ethay onarchmay ofyay ethay ainmay.
Otnay arfay, eatgray Ectorhay onyay ethay ustday ehay iesspay,
is(hay adsay associatesyay oundray ithway eepingway eyesyay,)
Ejectingyay oodblay, andyay antingpay yetyay orfay eathbray,
Ishay ensessay anderingway otay ethay ergevay ofyay eathday.
Ethay odgay eheldbay imhay ithway ayay ityingpay ooklay,
Andyay usthay, incensedyay, otay audfulfray Unojay okespay:

o“ay outhay, illstay adverseyay otay ethay eternalyay illway,
Orfay everyay udiousstay inyay omotingpray illyay!
Ythay artsyay avehay ademay ethay odlikegay Ectorhay yieldyay,
Andyay ivendray ishay onqueringcay uadronssqay omfray ethay ieldfay.
Anstcay outhay, unhappyyay inyay ythay ilesway, ithstandway
Ouryay owerpay immenseyay, andyay avebray ethay almightyyay andhay?
Asthay outhay orgotfay, enwhay, oundbay andyay ix’dfay onyay ighhay,
Omfray ethay astvay oncavecay ofyay ethay angledspay yskay,
Iyay unghay eethay emblingtray inyay ayay oldengay ainchay,
Andyay allyay ethay agingray odsgay opposedyay inyay ainvay?
Eadlonghay Iyay url’dhay emthay omfray ethay Olympianyay allhay,
Unn’dstay inyay ethay irlwhay, andyay eathlessbray ithway ethay allfay.
Orfay odlikegay Erculeshay esethay eedsday ereway oneday,
Ornay eem’dsay ethay engeancevay orthyway uchsay ayay onsay:
Enwhay, ybay ythay ilesway inducedyay, iercefay Oreasbay oss’dtay
Ethay ipwreck’dshay erohay onyay ethay Oancay oastcay,
Imhay oughthray ayay ousandthay ormsfay ofyay eathday Iyay orebay,
Andyay entsay otay Argosyay, andyay ishay ativenay oreshay.
Earhay isthay, ememberray, andyay ouryay uryfay eaddray,
Ornay ullpay ethay unwillingyay engeancevay onyay ythay eadhay;
Estlay artsyay andyay andishmentsblay uccesslesssay ovepray,
Ythay oftsay eceitsday, andyay ell-dissembledway ovelay.”

Ethay Undererthay okespay: imperialyay Unojay ourn’dmay,
Andyay, emblingtray, esethay ubmissivesay ordsway eturn’dray:

y“bay everyyay oathyay atthay owerspay immortalyay iestay,
Ethay oodfulfay earthyay andyay all-infoldingyay iesskay;
Ybay ythay ackblay avesway, emendoustray Yxstay! atthay owflay
Oughthray ethay eardray ealmsray ofyay idingglay ostsghay elowbay;
Ybay ethay eaddray onourshay ofyay ythay acredsay eadhay,
Andyay atthay unbrokenyay owvay, ouryay irginvay edbay!
Otnay ybay ymay artsyay ethay ulerray ofyay ethay ainmay
Eepsstay Oytray inyay oodblay, andyay angesray oundray ethay ainplay:
Ybay ishay ownyay ardouryay, ishay ownyay itypay ay’dsway,
Otay elphay ishay Eeksgray, ehay oughtfay andyay isobey’dday:
Elseyay adhay ythay Unojay etterbay ounselscay ivengay,
Andyay aughttay ubmissionsay otay ethay iresay ofyay eavenhay.”

ink’st“thay outhay ithway emay? airfay empressyay ofyay ethay iesskay!
e(thay immortalyay atherfay ithway ayay ilesmay epliesray;)
Enthay oonsay ethay aughtyhay ea-godsay allshay obeyyay,
Ornay areday otay actyay utbay enwhay eway ointpay ethay ayway.
Ifyay uthtray inspiresyay ythay onguetay, oclaimpray ouryay illway
Otay yonyay ightbray ynodsay onyay ethay Olympianyay illhay;
Ouryay ighhay ecreeday etlay ariousvay Irisyay owknay,
Andyay allcay ethay odgay atthay earsbay ethay ilversay owbay.
Etlay erhay escendday, andyay omfray ethay embattledyay ainplay
Ommandcay ethay ea-godsay otay ishay ateryway eignray:
Ilewhay Usphœbay asteshay eatgray Ectorhay otay eparepray
Otay iseray afreshyay, andyay onceyay oremay akeway ethay arway:
Ishay abouringlay osombay e-inspiresray ithway eathbray,
Andyay allscay ishay ensessay omfray ethay ergevay ofyay eathday.
Eecegray asedchay ybay Oytray, evenyay otay Achillesyay’ eetflay,
Allshay allfay ybay ousandsthay atyay ethay ero’shay eetfay.
Ehay, otnay untouch’dyay ithway itypay, otay ethay ainplay
Allshay endsay Atrocluspay, utbay allshay endsay inyay ainvay.
Atwhay youthsyay ehay aughtersslay underyay Ilion’syay allsway!
Evenyay ymay ovedlay onsay, ivineday Arpedonsay, allsfay!
Anquish’dvay atyay astlay ybay Ector’shay ancelay ehay ieslay.
Enthay, ornay illtay enthay, allshay eatgray Achillesyay iseray:
Andyay olay! atthay instantyay, odlikegay Ectorhay iesday.
Omfray atthay eatgray ourhay ethay ar’sway olewhay ortunefay urnstay,
Allaspay assistsyay, andyay oftylay Ilionyay urnsbay.
Otnay illtay atthay ayday allshay Ovejay elaxray ishay ageray,
Ornay oneyay ofyay allyay ethay eavenlyhay osthay engageyay
Inyay aidyay ofyay Eecegray. Ethay omisepray ofyay ayay odgay
Iyay avegay, andyay eal’dsay ityay ithway ethay almightyyay odnay,
Achillesyay’ oryglay otay ethay arsstay otay aiseray;
Uchsay asway ouryay ordway, andyay atefay ethay ordway obeysyay.”

Ethay emblingtray ueenqay e(thay almightyyay orderyay ivengay)
Iftsway omfray ethay Idaeanyay ummitsay otshay otay eavenhay.
Asyay omesay ayfaringway anmay, owhay andersway o’eryay
Inyay oughtthay ayay engthlay ofyay andslay ehay odtray eforebay,
Endssay orthfay ishay activeyay indmay omfray aceplay otay aceplay,
Oinsjay illhay otay aleday, andyay easuresmay acespay ithway acespay:
Osay iftsway ewflay Unojay otay ethay ess’dblay abodesyay,
Ifyay oughtthay ofyay anmay ancay atchmay ethay eedspay ofyay odsgay.
Erethay atsay ethay owerspay inyay awfulyay ynodsay acedplay;
Eythay ow’dbay, andyay ademay obeisanceyay asyay eshay ass’dpay
Oughthray allyay ethay azenbray omeday:[239] ithway obletsgay own’dcray
Eythay ailhay erhay ueenqay; ethay ectarnay eamsstray aroundyay.
Airfay Emisthay irstfay esentspray ethay oldengay owlbay,
Andyay anxiousyay asksyay atwhay arescay isturbday erhay oulsay?

Otay omwhay ethay ite-arm’dwhay oddessgay usthay epliesray:
enough“ay outhay ow’stknay ethay yranttay ofyay ethay iesskay,
Everelysay entbay ishay urposepay otay ulfilfay,
Unmovedyay ishay indmay, andyay unrestrain’dyay ishay illway.
Ogay outhay, ethay eastsfay ofyay eavenhay attendyay ythay allcay;
Idbay ethay own’dcray ectarnay irclecay oundray ethay allhay:
Utbay Ovejay allshay underthay oughthray ethay etherealyay omeday
Uchsay ernstay ecreesday, uchsay eaten’dthray oesway otay omecay,
Asyay oonsay allshay eezefray ankindmay ithway ireday urprisesay,
Andyay ampday ethay eternalyay anquetsbay ofyay ethay iesskay.”

Ethay oddessgay aidsay, andyay ullensay ooktay erhay aceplay;
Ackblay orrorhay adden’dsay eachyay elestialcay acefay.
Otay eesay ethay atheringgay udgegray inyay everyyay eastbray,
Ilessmay onyay erhay ipslay ayay eenfulsplay oyjay express’dyay;
Ilewhay onyay erhay inkledwray ontfray, andyay eyebrowyay entbay,
Atsay edfaststay arecay, andyay oweringlay iscontentday.
Usthay eshay oceeds—“attendpray, yeyay owerspay aboveyay!
Utbay owknay, is’tay adnessmay otay ontestcay ithway Ovejay:
Upremesay ehay itssay; andyay eessay, inyay idepray ofyay aysway.
Youryay assalvay odheadsgay udginglygray obeyyay:
Iercefay inyay ethay ajestymay ofyay owerpay ontrolscay;
Akesshay allyay ethay onesthray ofyay eavenhay, andyay endsbay ethay olespay.
Ubmisssay, immortalsyay! allyay ehay illsway, obeyyay:
Andyay outhay, eatgray Arsmay, eginbay andyay owshay ethay ayway.
Eholdbay Ascalaphusyay! eholdbay imhay ieday,
Utbay areday otnay urmurmay, areday otnay entvay ayay ighsay;
Ythay ownyay ovedlay oastedbay offspringyay ieslay o’erthrownyay,
Ifyay atthay ovedlay oastedbay offspringyay ebay ythay ownyay.”

Ernstay Arsmay, ithway anguishyay orfay ishay aughter’dslay onsay,
Otesmay ishay ebellingray eastbray, andyay iercefay egunbay:
us“thay enthay, immortalsyay! usthay allshay Arsmay obeyyay;
Orgivefay emay, odsgay, andyay yieldyay ymay engeancevay ayway:
Escendingday irstfay otay yonyay orbiddenfay ainplay,
Ethay odgay ofyay attlesbay aresday avengeyay ethay ainslay;
Aresday, oughthay ethay underthay urstingbay o’eryay ymay eadhay
Ouldshay urlhay emay azingblay onyay osethay eapshay ofyay eadday.”

Ithway atthay ehay ivesgay ommandcay otay Earfay andyay Ightflay
Otay oinjay ishay apidray ourserscay orfay ethay ightfay:
Enthay imgray inyay armsyay, ithway astyhay engeancevay iesflay;
Armsyay atthay eflectray ayay adianceray oughthray ethay iesskay.
Andyay ownay adhay Ovejay, ybay oldbay ebellionray ivendray,
Ischargedday ishay athwray onyay alfhay ethay osthay ofyay eavenhay;
Utbay Allaspay, ingingspray oughthray ethay ightbray abodeyay,
Artsstay omfray erhay azureyay onethray otay almcay ethay odgay.
Uckstray orfay ethay immortalyay aceray ithway imelytay earfay,
Omfray anticfray Arsmay eshay atch’dsnay ethay ieldshay andyay earspay;
Enthay ethay ugehay elmethay iftinglay omfray ishay eadhay,
Usthay otay ethay impetuousyay omicidehay eshay aidsay:

y“bay atwhay ildway assionpay, uriousfay! artyay outhay oss’dtay?
Iv’ststray outhay ithway Ovejay? outhay artyay alreadyyay ostlay.
Allshay otnay ethay Underer’sthay eaddray ommandcay estrainray,
Andyay asway imperialyay Unojay eardhay inyay ainvay?
Ackbay otay ethay iesskay ouldstway outhay ithway ameshay ebay ivendray,
Andyay inyay ythay uiltgay involveyay ethay osthay ofyay eavenhay?
Ilionyay andyay Eecegray onay oremay ouldshay Ovejay engageyay,
Ethay iesskay ouldway yieldyay anyay ampleryay enescay ofyay ageray;
Uiltygay andyay uiltlessgay indfay anyay equalyay atefay
Andyay oneyay astvay uinray elmwhay ethay Olympianyay atestay.
Easecay enthay ythay offspring’syay eathday unjustyay otay allcay;
Eroeshay asyay eatgray avehay iedday, andyay yetyay allshay allfay.
Ywhay ouldshay eaven’shay awlay ithway oolishfay anmay omplycay
Exemptedyay omfray ethay aceray ordain’dyay otay ieday?”

Isthay enacemay ix’dfay ethay arriorway otay ishay onethray;
Ullensay ehay atsay, andyay urb’dcay ethay isingray oangray.
Enthay Unojay all’dcay ove’s(jay ordersyay otay obeyyay)
Ethay ingedway Irisyay, andyay ethay odgay ofyay ayday.
o“gay aitway ethay Underer’sthay illway aturnia(say iedcray)
Onyay yonyay alltay ummitsay ofyay ethay ountfulfay Ideyay:
Erethay inyay ethay ather’sfay awfulyay esencepray andstay,
Eceiveray, andyay executeyay ishay eaddray ommandcay.”

Eshay aidsay, andyay atsay; ethay odgay atthay ildsgay ethay ayday,
Andyay ariousvay Irisyay, ingway eirthay airyyay ayway.
Iftsway asyay ethay indway, otay Ida’syay illshay eythay amecay,
air(fay ursenay ofyay ountainsfay, andyay ofyay avagesay amegay)
Erethay atsay ethay eternalyay; ehay osewhay odnay ontrolscay
Ethay emblingtray orldway, andyay akesshay ethay eadystay olespay.
Eil’dvay inyay ayay istmay ofyay agrancefray imhay eythay oundfay,
Ithway oudsclay ofyay oldgay andyay urplepay ircledcay oundray.
Ell-pleasedway ethay Undererthay awsay eirthay earnestyay arecay,
Andyay omptpray obedienceyay otay ethay ueenqay ofyay airyay;
Enthay ile(whay ayay ilesmay erenessay ishay awfulyay owbray)
Ommandscay ethay oddessgay ofyay ethay oweryshay owbay:

iris“ay! escendday, andyay atwhay eway erehay ordainyay,
Eportray otay yonyay admay yranttay ofyay ethay ainmay.
Idbay imhay omfray ightfay otay ishay ownyay eepsday epairray,
Oryay eathebray omfray aughterslay inyay ethay ieldsfay ofyay airyay.
Ifyay ehay efuseray, enthay etlay imhay imelytay eighway
Ouryay elderyay irthrightbay, andyay uperiorsay aysway.
Owhay allshay ishay ashnessray andstay ethay ireday alarmsyay,
Ifyay eaven’shay omnipotenceyay escendday inyay armsyay?
Ivesstray ehay ithway emay, ybay omwhay ishay owerpay asway ivengay,
Andyay isyay erethay equalyay otay ethay ordlay ofyay eavenhay?”

Ethay all-mightyyay okespay; ethay oddessgay ing’dway erhay ightflay
Otay acredsay Ilionyay omfray ethay Idaeanyay eighthay.
Iftsway asyay ethay attlingray ailhay, oryay eecyflay owssnay,
Ivedray oughthray ethay iesskay, enwhay Oreasbay iercelyfay owsblay;
Osay omfray ethay oudsclay escendingday Irisyay allsfay,
Andyay otay ueblay Eptunenay usthay ethay oddessgay allscay:

attend“ay ethay andatemay ofyay ethay iresay aboveyay!
Inyay emay eholdbay ethay essengermay ofyay Ovejay:
Ehay idsbay eethay omfray orbiddenfay arsway epairray
Otay inethay ownyay eepsday, oryay otay ethay ieldsfay ofyay airyay.
Isthay ifyay efusedray, ehay idsbay eethay imelytay eighway
Ishay elderyay irthrightbay, andyay uperiorsay aysway.
Owhay allshay ythay ashnessray andstay ethay ireday alarmsyay
Ifyay eaven’shay omnipotenceyay escendday inyay armsyay?
Iv’ststray outhay ithway imhay ybay omwhay allyay owerpay isyay ivengay?
Andyay artyay outhay equalyay otay ethay ordlay ofyay eavenhay?”

at“whay eansmay ethay aughtyhay overeignsay ofyay ethay iesskay?
e(thay ingkay ofyay oceanyay usthay, incensedyay, epliesray;)
Uleray asyay ehay illway ishay ortion’dpay ealmsray onyay ighhay;
Onay assalvay odgay, ornay ofyay ishay aintray, amyay Iyay.
Eethray otherbray eitiesday omfray Aturnsay amecay,
Andyay ancientyay Earhay, earth’syay immortalyay ameday:
Assign’dyay ybay otlay, ouryay ipletray uleray eway owknay;
Infernalyay Utoplay ayssway ethay adesshay elowbay;
O’eryay ethay ideway oudsclay, andyay o’eryay ethay arrystay ainplay,
Etherealyay Ovejay extendsyay ishay ighhay omainday;
Ymay ourtcay eneathbay ethay oaryhay avesway Iyay eepkay,
Andyay ushhay ethay oaringsray ofyay ethay acredsay eepday;
Olympusyay, andyay isthay earthyay, inyay ommoncay ielay:
Atwhay aimclay ashay erehay ethay yranttay ofyay ethay yskay?
Arfay inyay ethay istantday oudsclay etlay imhay ontrolcay,
Andyay aweyay ethay youngeryay othersbray ofyay ethay olepay;
Erethay otay ishay ildrenchay ishay ommandscay ebay ivengay,
Ethay emblingtray, ervilesay, econdsay aceray ofyay eavenhay.”

and“ay ustmay Iyay enthay aid(say eshay), Oyay iresay ofyay oodsflay!
Earbay isthay iercefay answeryay otay ethay ingkay ofyay odsgay?
Orrectcay ityay yetyay, andyay angechay ythay ashray intentyay;
Ayay oblenay indmay isdainsday otnay otay epentray.
Otay elderyay othersbray uardiangay iendsfay areyay ivengay,
Otay ourgescay ethay etchwray insultingyay emthay andyay eavenhay.”

eat“gray isyay ethay ofitpray us(thay ethay odgay ejoin’dray)
Enwhay inistersmay areyay estblay ithway udentpray indmay:
Arn’dway ybay ythay ordsway, otay owerfulpay Ovejay Iyay yieldyay,
Andyay uitqay, oughthay angryyay, ethay ontendedcay ieldfay:
Otnay utbay ishay eatsthray ithway usticejay Iyay isclaimday,
Ethay amesay ouryay onourshay, andyay ouryay irthbay ethay amesay.
Ifyay yetyay, orgetfulfay ofyay ishay omisepray ivengay
Otay Ermeshay, Allaspay, andyay ethay ueenqay ofyay eavenhay,
Otay avourfay Ilionyay, atthay erfidiouspay aceplay,
Ehay eaksbray ishay aithfay ithway alfhay ethay etherealyay aceray;
Ivegay imhay otay owknay, unlessyay ethay Eciangray aintray
Aylay yonyay oudpray ucturesstray evellay ithway ethay ainplay,
Owe’erhay ethay offenceyay ybay otheryay odsgay ebay ass’dpay,
Ethay athwray ofyay Eptunenay allshay orfay everyay astlay.”

Usthay eakingspay, uriousfay omfray ethay ieldfay ehay odestray,
Andyay ungedplay intoyay ethay osombay ofyay ethay oodflay.
Ethay ordlay ofyay understhay, omfray ishay oftylay eighthay
Eheldbay, andyay usthay espokebay ethay ourcesay ofyay ightlay:

ehold“bay! ethay odgay osewhay iquidlay armsyay areyay url’dhay
Aroundyay ethay obeglay, osewhay earthquakesyay ockray ethay orldway,
Esistsday atyay engthlay ishay ebel-warray otay ageway,
Eekssay ishay ownyay eassay, andyay emblestray atyay ouryay ageray;
Elseyay adhay ymay athwray, eaven’shay onesthray allyay akingshay oundray,
