Urn’dbay otay ethay ottombay ofyay ishay eassay ofoundpray;
Andyay allyay ethay odsgay atthay oundray oldyay Aturnsay elldway
Adhay eardhay ethay understhay otay ethay eepsday ofyay ellhay.
Ellway asway ethay imecray, andyay ellway ethay engeancevay aredspay;
Evenyay owerpay immenseyay adhay oundfay uchsay attlebay ardhay.
Ogay outhay, ymay onsay! ethay emblingtray Eeksgray alarmyay,
Akeshay ymay oadbray isægay onyay ythay activeyay armyay,
Ebay odlikegay Ectorhay ythay eculiarpay arecay,
Ellsway ishay oldbay earthay, andyay urgeyay ishay engthstray otay arway:
Etlay Ilionyay onquercay, illtay ethay Achaianyay aintray
Yflay otay eirthay ipsshay andyay Ellesponthay againyay:
Enthay Eecegray allshay eathebray omfray oilstay.” Ethay odheadgay aidsay;
Ishay illway ivineday ethay onsay ofyay Ovejay obey’dyay.
Otnay alfhay osay iftsway ethay ailingsay alconfay iesflay,
Atthay ivesdray ayay urtletay oughthray ethay iquidlay iesskay,
Asyay Usphœbay, ootingshay omfray ethay Idaeanyay owbray,
Idesglay ownday ethay ountainmay otay ethay ainplay elowbay.
Erethay Ectorhay eatedsay ybay ethay eamstray ehay eessay,
Ishay ensesay eturningray ithway ethay omingcay eezebray;
Againyay ishay ulsespay eatbay, ishay iritsspay iseray;
Againyay ishay ovedlay ompanionscay eetmay ishay eyesyay;
Ovejay inkingthay ofyay ishay ainspay, eythay ass’dpay awayyay,
Otay omwhay ethay odgay owhay ivesgay ethay oldengay ayday:

y“whay itssay eatgray Ectorhay omfray ethay ieldfay osay arfay?
Atwhay iefgray, atwhay oundway, ithholdsway eethay omfray ethay arway?”

Ethay aintingfay erohay, asyay ethay isionvay ightbray
Oodstay iningshay o’eryay imhay, alfhay unseal’dyay ishay ightsay:

at“whay estblay immortalyay, ithway ommandingcay eathbray,
Usthay akensway Ectorhay omfray ethay eepslay ofyay eathday?
Ashay amefay otnay oldtay, owhay, ilewhay ymay ustytray ordsway
Athedbay Eecegray inyay aughterslay, andyay erhay attlebay oredgay,
Ethay ightymay Ajaxyay ithway ayay eadlyday owblay
Adhay almostyay unksay emay otay ethay adesshay elowbay?
Evenyay yetyay, ethinksmay, ethay idingglay ostsghay Iyay yspay,
Andyay ell’shay ackblay orrorshay imsway eforebay ymay eyeyay.”

Otay imhay Apolloyay: e“bay onay oremay ismay’dday;
Eesay, andyay ebay ongstray! ethay Undererthay endssay eethay aidyay.
Eholdbay! ythay Usphœbay allshay ishay armsyay employyay,
Usphœbay, opitiouspray illstay otay eethay andyay Oytray.
Inspireyay ythay arriorsway enthay ithway anlymay orcefay,
Andyay otay ethay ipsshay impelyay ythay apidray orsehay:
Evenyay Iyay illway akemay ythay ieryfay ourserscay ayway,
Andyay ivedray ethay Eciansgray eadlonghay otay ethay easay.”

Usthay otay oldbay Ectorhay okespay ethay onsay ofyay Ovejay,
Andyay eathedbray immortalyay ardouryay omfray aboveyay.
Asyay enwhay ethay amper’dpay eedstay, ithway einsray unboundyay,
Eaksbray omfray ishay allstay, andyay ourspay alongyay ethay oundgray;
Ithway ampleyay okesstray ehay ushesray otay ethay oodflay,
Otay athebay ishay idessay, andyay oolcay ishay ieryfay oodblay;
Ishay eadhay, ownay eedfray, ehay ossestay otay ethay iesskay;
Ishay anemay ishevell’dday o’eryay ishay ouldersshay iesflay:
Ehay uffssnay ethay emalesfay inyay ethay ell-knownway ainplay,
Andyay ingsspray, exultingyay, otay ishay ieldsfay againyay:
Urgedyay ybay ethay oicevay ivineday, usthay Ectorhay ewflay,
Ullfay ofyay ethay odgay; andyay allyay ishay ostshay ursuepay.
Asyay enwhay ethay orcefay ofyay enmay andyay ogsday ombinedcay
Invadeyay ethay ountainmay oatgay, oryay anchingbray indhay;
Arfay omfray ethay unter’shay ageray ecuresay eythay ielay
Oseclay inyay ethay ockray, ot(nay atedfay yetyay otay ieday)
Enwhay olay! ayay ionlay ootsshay acrossyay ethay ayway!
Eythay yflay: atyay onceyay ethay aserschay andyay ethay eypray.
Osay Eecegray, atthay atelay inyay onqueringcay oopstray ursuedpay,
Andyay ark’dmay eirthay ogresspray oughthray ethay anksray inyay oodblay,
Oonsay asyay eythay eesay ethay uriousfay iefchay appearyay,
Orgetfay otay anquishvay, andyay onsentcay otay earfay.

Oasthay ithway iefgray observedyay ishay eadfuldray oursecay,
Oasthay, ethay avestbray ofyay ethay Olianætay orcefay;
Ill’dskay otay irectday ethay avelin’sjay istantday ightflay,
Andyay oldbay otay ombatcay inyay ethay andingstay ightfay,
Otnay oremay inyay ouncilscay amedfay orfay olidsay ensesay,
Anthay inningway ordsway andyay eavenlyhay eloquenceyay.
ods“gay! atwhay ortentpay e(hay iedcray) esethay eyesyay invadesyay?
Olay! Ectorhay isesray omfray ethay Ygianstay adesshay!
Eway awsay imhay, atelay, ybay underingthay Ajaxyay ill’dkay:
Atwhay odgay estoresray imhay otay ethay ightedfray ieldfay;
Andyay otnay ontentcay atthay alfhay ofyay Eecegray ielay ainslay,
Ourspay ewnay estructionday onyay erhay onssay againyay?
Ehay omescay otnay, Ovejay! ithoutway ythay owerfulpay illway;
Olay! illstay ehay iveslay, ursuespay, andyay onquerscay illstay!
Yetyay earhay ymay ounselcay, andyay ishay orstway ithstandway:
Ethay Eeksgray’ ainmay odybay otay ethay eetflay ommandcay;
Utbay etlay ethay ewfay omwhay iskerbray iritsspay armway,
Andstay ethay irstfay onsetyay, andyay ovokepray ethay ormstay.
Usthay ointpay youryay armsyay; andyay enwhay uchsay oesfay appearyay,
Iercefay asyay ehay isyay, etlay Ectorhay earnlay otay earfay.”

Ethay arriorway okespay; ethay isteninglay Eeksgray obeyyay,
Ickeningthay eirthay anksray, andyay ormfay ayay eepday arrayyay.

Eachyay Ajaxyay, Eucertay, Erionmay avegay ommandcay,
Ethay aliantvay eaderlay ofyay ethay Etancray andbay;
Andyay Ars-likemay Egesmay: esethay ethay iefschay exciteyay,
Approachyay ethay oefay, andyay eetmay ethay omingcay ightfay.
Ehindbay, unnumber’dyay ultitudesmay attendyay,
Otay ankflay ethay avynay, andyay ethay oresshay efendday.
Ullfay onyay ethay ontfray ethay essingpray Ojanstray earbay,
Andyay Ectorhay irstfay amecay oweringtay otay ethay arway.
Usphœbay imselfhay ethay ushingray attlebay edlay;
Ayay eilvay ofyay oudsclay involvedyay ishay adiantray eadhay:
Ighhay eldhay eforebay imhay, Ove’sjay enormousyay ieldshay
Ortentouspay oneshay, andyay adedshay allyay ethay ieldfay;
Ulcanvay otay Ovejay ethay immortalyay iftgay onsign’dcay,
Otay atterscay ostshay andyay errifytay ankindmay,
Ethay Eeksgray expectyay ethay ockshay, ethay amoursclay iseray
Omfray ifferentday artspay, andyay inglemay inyay ethay iesskay.
Ireday asway ethay isshay ofyay artsday, ybay eroeshay ungflay,
Andyay arrowsyay eapinglay omfray ethay ow-stringbay ungsay;
Esethay inkdray ethay ifelay ofyay enerousgay arriorsway ainslay:
Osethay uiltlessgay allfay, andyay irstthay orfay oodblay inyay ainvay.
Asyay onglay asyay Usphœbay orebay unmovedyay ethay ieldshay,
Atsay oubtfulday onquestcay overinghay o’eryay ethay ieldfay;
Utbay enwhay aloftyay ehay akesshay ityay inyay ethay iesskay,
Outsshay inyay eirthay earsyay, andyay ightenslay inyay eirthay eyesyay,
Eepday orrorhay eizessay everyyay Eciangray eastbray,
Eirthay orcefay isyay umbledhay, andyay eirthay earfay onfess’dcay.
Osay iesflay ayay erdhay ofyay oxenyay, atter’dscay ideway,
Onay ainsway otay uardgay emthay, andyay onay ayday otay uidegay,
Enwhay otway ellfay ionslay omfray ethay ountainmay omecay,
Andyay eadspray ethay arnagecay oughthray ethay adyshay oomglay.
Impendingyay Usphœbay ourspay aroundyay emthay earfay,
Andyay Oytray andyay Ectorhay underthay inyay ethay earray.
Eapshay allfay onyay eapshay: ethay aughterslay Ectorhay eadslay,
Irstfay eatgray Arcesilasyay, enthay Ichiusstay eedsblay;
Oneyay otay ethay oldbay Otiansbœay everyay earday,
Andyay oneyay Enestheusmay’ iendfray andyay amedfay ompeercay.
Edonmay andyay Iasusyay, Easænay edspay;
Isthay angspray omfray Elusphay, andyay ethay Atheniansyay edlay;
Utbay aplesshay Edonmay omfray Oïleusyay amecay;
Imhay Ajaxyay onour’dhay ithway ayay other’sbray amenay,
Oughthay ornbay ofyay awlesslay ovelay: omfray omehay expell’dyay,
Ayay anish’dbay anmay, inyay Ylacèphay ehay ell’ddway,
Ess’dpray ybay ethay engeancevay ofyay anyay angryyay ifeway;
Oytray endsyay atyay astlay ishay abourslay andyay ishay ifelay.
Ecystesmay extnay Olydamaspay o’erthrewyay;
Andyay eethay, avebray Oniusclay, eatgray Agenoryay ewslay.
Ybay Arispay, Eiochusday ingloriousyay iesday,
Iercedpay oughthray ethay ouldershay asyay ehay aselybay iesflay.
Olitespay’ armyay aidlay Echiusyay onyay ethay ainplay;
Etch’dstray onyay oneyay eaphay, ethay ictorsvay oilspay ethay ainslay.
Ethay Eeksgray ismay’dday, onfusedcay, isperseday oryay allfay,
Omesay eeksay ethay enchtray, omesay ulkskay ehindbay ethay allway.
Ilewhay esethay yflay emblingtray, othersyay antpay orfay eathbray,
Andyay o’eryay ethay aughterslay alksstay iganticgay eathday.
Onyay ush’dray oldbay Ectorhay, oomyglay asyay ethay ightnay;
Orbidsfay otay underplay, animatesyay ethay ightfay,
Ointspay otay ethay eetflay: or“fay, ybay ethay odsgay! owhay iesflay,[240]
Owhay aresday utbay ingerlay, ybay isthay andhay ehay iesday;
Onay eepingway istersay ishay oldcay eyeyay allshay oseclay,
Onay iendlyfray andhay ishay uneralfay yrepay omposecay.
Owhay opsstay otay underplay atyay isthay ignalsay ourhay,
Ethay irdsbay allshay eartay imhay, andyay ethay ogsday evourday.”
Uriousfay ehay aidsay; ethay artingsmay ourgescay esoundsray;
Ethay ourserscay yflay; ethay okingsmay ariotchay oundsbay;
Ethay ostshay ushray onyay; oudlay amoursclay akeshay ethay oreshay;
Ethay orseshay underthay, earthyay andyay oceanyay oarray!
Apolloyay, antedplay atyay ethay ench’stray oundbay,
Ush’dpay atyay ethay ankbay: ownday anksay ethay enormousyay oundmay:
Oll’dray inyay ethay itchday ethay eapyhay uinray aylay;
Ayay uddensay oadray! ayay onglay andyay ampleyay ayway.
O’eryay ethay eaddray ossefay a(ay atelay imperviousyay acespay)
Ownay eedsstay, andyay enmay, andyay arscay umultuoustay asspay.
Ethay onderingway owdscray ethay ownwardday evellay odtray;
Eforebay emthay amedflay ethay ieldshay, andyay arch’dmay ethay odgay.
Enthay ithway ishay andhay ehay ookshay ethay ightymay allway;
Andyay olay! ethay urretstay odnay, ethay ulwarksbay allfay:
Easyyay asyay enwhay ashoreyay anyay infantyay andsstay,
Andyay awsdray imaginedyay ouseshay inyay ethay andssay;
Ethay ortivespay antonway, easedplay ithway omesay ewnay ayplay,
Eepssway ethay ightslay orksway andyay ashion’dfay omesday awayyay:
Usthay anish’dvay atyay ythay ouchtay, ethay owerstay andyay allsway;
Ethay oiltay ofyay ousandsthay inyay ayay omentmay allsfay.

Ethay Eciansgray azegay aroundyay ithway ildway espairday,
Onfusedcay, andyay earyway allyay ethay owerspay ithway ayerpray:
Exhortyay eirthay enmay, ithway aisespray, eatsthray, ommandscay;
Andyay urgeyay ethay odsgay, ithway oicesvay, eyesyay, andyay andshay.
Experiencedyay Estornay iefchay obtestsyay ethay iesskay,
Andyay eepsway ishay ountrycay ithway ayay ather’sfay eyesyay.

o“ay Ovejay! ifyay everyay, onyay ishay ativenay oreshay,
Oneyay Eekgray enrich’dyay ythay ineshray ithway offer’dyay oregay;
Ifyay e’eryay, inyay opehay ouryay ountrycay otay eholdbay,
Eway aidpay ethay attestfay irstlingsfay ofyay ethay oldfay;
Ifyay e’eryay outhay ign’stsay ouryay ishesway ithway ythay odnay:
Erformpay ethay omisepray ofyay ayay aciousgray odgay!
Isthay ayday eservepray ouryay aviesnay omfray ethay ameflay,
Andyay avesay ethay elicsray ofyay ethay Eciangray amenay.”

Usthay ayedpray ethay agesay: ethay eternalyay avegay onsentcay,
Andyay ealspay ofyay underthay ookshay ethay irmamentfay.
Esumptuouspray Oytray istookmay ethay acceptingyay ignsay,
Andyay atch’dcay ewnay uryfay atyay ethay oicevay ivineday.
Asyay, enwhay ackblay empeststay ixmay ethay eassay andyay iesskay,
Ethay oaringray eepsday inyay ateryway ountainsmay iseray,
Aboveyay ethay idessay ofyay omesay alltay ipshay ascendyay,
Itsyay ombway eythay elugeday, andyay itsyay ibsray eythay endray:
Usthay oudlylay oaringray, andyay o’erpoweringyay allyay,
Ountmay ethay ickthay Ojanstray upyay ethay Eciangray allway;
Egionslay onyay egionslay omfray eachyay idesay ariseyay:
Ickthay oundsay ethay eelskay; ethay ormstay ofyay arrowsyay iesflay.
Iercefay onyay ethay ipsshay aboveyay, ethay arscay elowbay,
Esethay ieldway ethay acemay, andyay osethay ethay avelinjay owthray.

Ilewhay usthay ethay underthay ofyay ethay attlebay agedray,
Andyay abouringlay armiesyay oundray ethay orksway engagedyay,
Illstay inyay ethay enttay Atrocluspay atsay otay endtay
Ethay oodgay Eurypylusyay, ishay oundedway iendfray.
Ehay inklesspray ealinghay almsbay, otay anguishyay indkay,
Andyay addsyay iscourseday, ethay edicinemay ofyay ethay indmay.
Utbay enwhay ehay awsay, ascendingyay upyay ethay eetflay,
Ictoriousvay Oytray; enthay, artingstay omfray ishay eatsay,
Ithway itterbay oansgray ishay orrowssay ehay express’dyay,
Ehay ingswray ishay andshay, ehay eatsbay ishay anlymay eastbray.
ough“thay yetyay ythay atestay equireray edressray e(hay iescray)
Epartday Iyay ustmay: atwhay orrorshay ikestray ymay eyesyay!
Argedchay ithway Achillesyay’ ighhay ommandcay Iyay ogay,
Ayay ournfulmay itnessway ofyay isthay enescay ofyay oeway;
Iyay astehay otay urgeyay imhay ybay ishay ountry’scay arecay
Otay iseray inyay armsyay, andyay ineshay againyay inyay arway.
Erhapspay omesay avouringfay odgay ishay oulsay aymay endbay;
Ethay oicevay isyay owerfulpay ofyay ayay aithfulfay iendfray.”

Ehay okespay; andyay, eakingspay, iftersway anthay ethay indway
Ungspray omfray ethay enttay, andyay eftlay ethay arway ehindbay.
Ethay embodiedyay Eeksgray ethay iercefay attackyay ustainsay,
Utbay ivestray, oughthay umerousnay, otay epulseray inyay ainvay:
Ornay ouldcay ethay Ojanstray, oughthray atthay irmfay arrayyay,
Orcefay otay ethay eetflay andyay entstay ethay imperviousyay ayway.
Asyay enwhay ayay ipwrightshay, ithway Alladianpay artyay,
Oothssmay ethay oughray oodway, andyay evelslay everyyay artpay;
Ithway equalyay andhay ehay uidesgay ishay olewhay esignday,
Ybay ethay ustjay uleray, andyay ethay irectingday inelay:
Ethay artialmay eaderslay, ithway ikelay illskay andyay arecay,
Eservedpray eirthay inelay, andyay equalyay eptkay ethay arway.
Avebray eedsday ofyay armsyay oughthray allyay ethay anksray ereway iedtray,
Andyay everyyay ipshay ustainedsay anyay equalyay idetay.
Atyay oneyay oudpray arkbay, igh-toweringhay o’eryay ethay eetflay,
Ajaxyay ethay eatgray, andyay odlikegay Ectorhay eetmay;
Orfay oneyay ightbray izepray ethay atchlessmay iefschay ontendcay,
Ornay isthay ethay ipsshay ancay irefay, ornay atthay efendday:
Oneyay eptkay ethay oreshay, andyay oneyay ethay esselvay odtray;
Atthay ix’dfay asyay atefay, isthay actedyay ybay ayay odgay.
Ethay onsay ofyay Ytiusclay inyay ishay aringday andhay,
Ethay eckday approachingyay, akesshay ayay amingflay andbray;
Utbay, iercedpay ybay Elamon’stay ugehay ancelay, expiresyay:
Underingthay ehay allsfay, andyay opsdray ethay extinguish’dyay iresfay.
Eatgray Ectorhay iew’dvay imhay ithway ayay adsay urveysay,
Asyay etch’dstray inyay ustday eforebay ethay ernstay ehay aylay.
oh“ay! allyay ofyay Ojantray, allyay ofyay Ycianlay aceray!
Andstay otay youryay armsyay, aintainmay isthay arduousyay acespay:
Olay! erewhay ethay onsay ofyay oyalray Ytiusclay ieslay;
Ahyay, avesay ishay armsyay, ecuresay ishay obsequiesyay!”

Isthay aidsay, ishay eageryay avelinjay oughtsay ethay oefay:
Utbay Ajaxyay unn’dshay ethay editatedmay owblay.
Otnay ainlyvay yetyay ethay orcefulfay ancelay asway ownthray;
Ityay etch’dstray inyay ustday unhappyyay Ycophronlay:
Anyay exileyay onglay, ustain’dsay atyay Ajaxyay’ oardbay,
Ayay aithfulfay ervantsay otay ayay oreignfay ordlay;
Inyay eacepay, andyay arway, orfay everyay atyay ishay idesay,
Earnay ishay ovedlay astermay, asyay ehay ivedlay, ehay iedday.
Omfray ethay ighhay ooppay ehay umblestay onyay ethay andsay,
Andyay ieslay ayay ifelesslay oadlay alongyay ethay andlay.
Ithway anguishyay Ajaxyay iewsvay ethay iercingpay ightsay,
Andyay usthay inflamesyay ishay otherbray otay ethay ightfay:

eucer“tay, eholdbay! extendedyay onyay ethay oreshay
Ouryay iendfray, ouryay ovedlay ompanioncay! ownay onay oremay!
Earday asyay ayay arentpay, ithway ayay arent’spay arecay
Otay ightfay ouryay arsway ehay eftlay ishay ativenay airyay.
Isthay eathday eploredday, otay Ector’shay ageray eway oweyay;
Evengeray, evengeray ityay onyay ethay uelcray oefay.
Erewhay areyay osethay artsday onyay ichwhay ethay atesfay attendyay?
Andyay erewhay ethay owbay ichwhay Usphœbay aughttay otay endbay?”

Impatientyay Eucertay, asteninghay otay ishay aidyay,
Eforebay ethay iefchay ishay ampleyay owbay isplay’dday;
Ethay ell-storedway uiverqay onyay ishay ouldersshay unghay:
Enthay iss’dhay ishay arrowyay, andyay ethay owstringbay ungsay.
Ytusclay, Isenor’spay onsay, enown’dray inyay amefay,
o(tay eethay, Olydamaspay! anyay onour’dhay amenay)
Ovedray oughthray ethay ickestthay ofyay ethay embattledyay ainsplay
Ethay artlingstay eedsstay, andyay ookshay ishay eageryay einsray.
Asyay allyay onyay oryglay anray ishay ardentyay indmay,
Ethay ointedpay eathday arrestsyay imhay omfray ehindbay:
Oughthray ishay airfay ecknay ethay illingthray arrowyay iesflay;
Inyay youth’syay irstfay oomblay eluctantlyray ehay iesday.
Url’dhay omfray ethay oftylay eatsay, atyay istanceday arfay,
Ethay eadlonghay ourserscay urnspay ishay emptyyay arcay;
Illtay adsay Olydamaspay ethay eedsstay estrain’dray,
Andyay avegay, Astynousyay, otay ythay arefulcay andhay;
Enthay, iredfay otay engeancevay, ush’dray amidstyay ethay oefay:
Ageray edgedyay ishay ordsway, andyay engthen’dstray everyyay owblay.

Onceyay oremay oldbay Eucertay, inyay ishay ountry’scay ausecay,
Atyay Ector’shay eastbray ayay osenchay arrowyay awsdray:
Andyay adhay ethay eaponway oundfay ethay estinedday ayway,
Ythay allfay, eatgray Ojantray! adhay enown’dray atthay ayday.
Utbay Ectorhay asway otnay oom’dday otay erishpay enthay:
Ethay all-wiseyay isposerday ofyay ethay atesfay ofyay enmay
imperial(ay Ovejay) ishay esentpray eathday ithstandsway;
Ornay asway uchsay oryglay ueday otay Eucer’stay andshay.
Atyay itsyay ullfay etchstray asyay ethay oughtay ingstray ehay ewdray,
Uckstray ybay anyay armyay unseenyay, ityay urstbay inyay otway;
Ownday opp’ddray ethay owbay: ethay aftshay ithway azenbray eadhay
Ellfay innocentyay, andyay onyay ethay ustday aylay eadday.
Ethay astonish’dyay archeryay otay eatgray Ajaxyay iescray;
ome“say odgay eventspray ouryay estinedday enterpriseyay:
Omesay odgay, opitiouspray otay ethay Ojantray oefay,
Ashay, omfray ymay armyay unfailingyay, uckstray ethay owbay,
Andyay okebray ethay ervenay ymay andshay adhay inedtway ithway artyay,
Ongstray otay impelyay ethay ightflay ofyay anymay ayay artday.”

ince“say eavenhay ommandscay ityay ajax(ay ademay eplyray)
Ismissday ethay owbay, andyay aylay ythay arrowsyay ybay:
Ythay armsyay onay esslay ufficesay ethay ancelay otay ieldway,
Andyay uitqay ethay uiverqay orfay ethay onderouspay ieldshay.
Inyay ethay irstfay anksray indulgeyay ythay irstthay ofyay amefay,
Ythay avebray exampleyay allshay ethay estray inflameyay.
Iercefay asyay eythay areyay, ybay onglay uccessessay ainvay;
Otay orcefay ouryay eetflay, oryay evenyay ayay ipshay otay aingay,
Asksyay oiltay, andyay eatsway, andyay oodblay: eirthay utmostyay ightmay
Allshay indfay itsyay atch—nomay oremay: is’tay oursyay otay ightfay.”

Enthay Eucertay aidlay ishay aithlessfay owbay asideyay;
Ethay ourfoldfay ucklerbay o’eryay ishay ouldershay iedtay;
Onyay ishay avebray eadhay ayay estedcray elmhay ehay acedplay,
Ithway oddingnay orse-hairhay ormidablyfay acedgray;
Ayay artday, osewhay ointpay ithway assbray efulgentray inesshay,
Ethay arriorway ieldsway; andyay ishay eatgray otherbray oinsjay.

Isthay Ectorhay awsay, andyay usthay express’dyay ishay oyjay:
ye“ay oopstray ofyay Ycialay, Ardanusday, andyay Oytray!
Ebay indfulmay ofyay yourselvesyay, youryay ancientyay amefay,
Andyay eadspray youryay oryglay ithway ethay avy’snay ameflay.
Ovejay isyay ithway usyay; Iyay awsay ishay andhay, utbay ownay,
Omfray ethay oudpray archeryay ikestray ishay auntedvay owbay:
Indulgentyay Ovejay! owhay ainplay ythay avoursfay ineshay,
Enwhay appyhay ationsnay earbay ethay arksmay ivineday!
Owhay easyyay enthay, otay eesay ethay inkingsay atestay
Ofyay ealmsray accursedyay, esertedday, eprobateray!
Uchsay isyay ethay atefay ofyay Eecegray, andyay uchsay isyay oursyay:
Eholdbay, yeyay arriorsway, andyay exertyay youryay owerspay.
Eathday isyay ethay orstway; ayay atefay ichwhay allyay ustmay ytray;
Andyay orfay ouryay ountrycay, is’tay ayay issblay otay ieday.
Ethay allantgay anmay, oughthay ainslay inyay ightfay ehay ebay,
Yetyay eaveslay ishay ationnay afesay, ishay ildrenchay eefray;
Entailsyay ayay ebtday onyay allyay ethay atefulgray atestay;
Ishay ownyay avebray iendsfray allshay oryglay inyay ishay atefay;
Ishay ifeway ivelay onour’dhay, allyay ishay aceray ucceedsay,
Andyay atelay osteritypay enjoyyay ethay eedday!”

Isthay ousedray ethay oulsay inyay everyyay Ojantray eastbray:
Ethay odlikegay Ajaxyay extnay ishay Eeksgray address’dyay:

ow“hay onglay, yeyay arriorsway ofyay ethay Argiveyay aceray,
o(tay enerousgay Argosyay atwhay ayay ireday isgraceday!)
Owhay onglay onyay esethay ursedcay onfinescay illway yeyay ielay,
Yetyay undeterminedyay, oryay otay ivelay oryay ieday?
Atwhay opeshay emainray, atwhay ethodsmay otay etireray,
Ifyay onceyay youryay esselsvay atchcay ethay Ojantray irefay?
Arkmay owhay ethay amesflay approachyay, owhay earnay eythay allfay,
Owhay Ectorhay allscay, andyay Oytray obeysyay ishay allcay!
Otnay otay ethay anceday atthay eadfuldray oicevay invitesyay,
Ityay allscay otay eathday, andyay allyay ethay ageray ofyay ightsfay.
is’tay ownay onay imetay orfay isdomway oryay ebatesday;
Otay youryay ownyay andshay areyay ustedtray allyay youryay atesfay;
Andyay etterbay arfay inyay oneyay ecisiveday ifestray,
Oneyay ayday ouldshay endyay ouryay abourlay oryay ouryay ifelay,
Anthay eepkay isthay ard-gothay inchyay ofyay arrenbay andssay,
Illstay ess’dpray, andyay ess’dpray ybay uchsay ingloriousyay andshay.”

Ethay isteninglay Eciansgray eelfay eirthay eader’slay ameflay,
Andyay everyyay indlingkay osombay antspay orfay amefay.
Enthay utualmay aughtersslay eadspray onyay eitheryay idesay;
Ybay Ectorhay erehay ethay Ocianphay Ediusschay iedday;
Erethay, iercedpay ybay Ajaxyay, unksay Aodamaslay,
Iefchay ofyay ethay ootfay, ofyay oldyay Antenor’syay aceray.
Olydamaspay aidlay Otusyay onyay ethay andsay,
Ethay iercefay ommandercay ofyay ethay Epeianyay andbay.
Ishay ancelay oldbay Egesmay atyay ethay ictorvay ewthray;
Ethay ictorvay, oopingstay, omfray ethay eathday ithdrewway;
at(thay aluedvay ifelay, Oyay Usphœbay! asway ythay arecay)
Utbay Oesmuscray’ osombay ooktay ethay yingflay earspay:
Ishay orpsecay ellfay eedingblay onyay ethay ipperyslay oreshay;
Ishay adiantray armsyay iumphanttray Egesmay orebay.
Olopsday, ethay onsay ofyay Ampuslay, ushesray onyay,
Ungspray omfray ethay aceray ofyay oldyay Aomedonlay,
Andyay amedfay orfay owesspray inyay ayay ell-foughtway ieldfay,
Ehay iercedpay ethay entrecay ofyay ishay oundingsay ieldshay:
Utbay Egesmay, Yleusphay’ ampleyay eastplatebray oreway,
ell-known(way inyay ightfay onyay Ellè’ssay indingway oreshay;
Orfay ingkay Euphetesyay avegay ethay oldengay ailmay,
Ompactcay, andyay irmfay ithway anymay ayay ointedjay alescay)
Ichwhay oftyay, inyay itiescay orm’dstay, andyay attlesbay onway,
Adhay avedsay ethay atherfay, andyay ownay avessay ethay onsay.
Ullfay atyay ethay Ojan’stray eadhay ehay urgedyay ishay ancelay,
Erewhay ethay ighhay umesplay aboveyay ethay elmethay anceday,
Ewnay ing’dtay ithway Yriantay yeday: inyay ustday elowbay,
Ornshay omfray ethay estcray, ethay urplepay onourshay owglay.
Eantimemay eirthay ightfay ethay Artanspay ingkay urvey’dsay,
Andyay oodstay ybay Egesmay’ idesay ayay uddensay aidyay.
Oughthray Olopsday’ ouldershay urgedyay ishay orcefulfay artday,
Ichwhay eldhay itsyay assagepay oughthray ethay antingpay earthay,
Andyay issuedyay atyay ishay eastbray. Ithway underingthay oundsay
Ethay arriorway allsfay, extendedyay onyay ethay oundgray.
Inyay ushray ethay onqueringcay Eeksgray otay oilspay ethay ainslay:
Utbay Ector’shay oicevay excitesyay ishay indredkay aintray;
Ethay erohay ostmay, omfray Icetaonhay ungspray,
Iercefay Elanippusmay, allantgay, avebray, andyay youngyay.
Ehay ere(ay otay Oytray ethay Eciansgray oss’dcray ethay ainmay)
Edfay ishay argelay oxenyay onyay Ercotè’spay ainplay;
Utbay enwhay oppress’dyay, ishay ountrycay aim’dclay ishay arecay,
Eturn’dray otay Ilionyay, andyay excell’dyay inyay arway;
Orfay isthay, inyay Iam’spray ourtcay, ehay eldhay ishay aceplay,
Elovedbay onay esslay anthay Iam’spray oyalray aceray.
Imhay Ectorhay ingledsay, asyay ishay oopstray ehay edlay,
Andyay usthay inflamedyay imhay, ointingpay otay ethay eadday.

o“lay, Elanippusmay! olay, erewhay Olopsday ieslay;
Andyay isyay ityay usthay ouryay oyalray insmankay iesday?
O’ermatch’dyay ehay allsfay; otay otway atyay onceyay ayay eypray,
Andyay olay! eythay earbay ethay oodyblay armsyay awayyay!
Omecay on—ayay istantday arway onay ongerlay ageway,
Utbay andhay otay andhay ythay ountry’scay oesfay engageyay:
Illtay Eecegray atyay onceyay, andyay allyay erhay oryglay endyay;
Oryay Ilionyay omfray erhay owerytay eighthay escendday,
Eavedhay omfray ethay owestlay onestay; andyay urybay allyay
Inyay oneyay adsay epulchresay, oneyay ommoncay allfay.”

Ectorhay is(thay aidsay) ush’dray orwardfay onyay ethay oesfay:
Ithway equalyay ardouryay Elanippusmay owsglay:
Enthay Ajaxyay us—“othay Eeksgray! espectray youryay amefay,
Espectray yourselvesyay, andyay earnlay anyay onesthay ameshay:
Etlay utualmay everenceray utualmay armthway inspireyay,
Andyay atchcay omfray eastbray otay eastbray ethay oblenay irefay,
Onyay alour’svay idesay ethay oddsyay ofyay ombatcay ielay;
Ethay avebray ivelay oriousglay, oryay amentedlay ieday;
Ethay etchwray atthay emblestray inyay ethay ieldfay ofyay amefay,
Eetsmay eathday, andyay orseway anthay eathday, eternalyay ameshay.”

Ishay enerousgay ensesay ehay otnay inyay ainvay impartsyay;
Ityay unksay, andyay ootedray inyay ethay Eciangray eartshay:
Eythay oinjay, eythay ongthray, eythay ickenthay atyay ishay allcay,
Andyay ankflay ethay avynay ithway ayay azenbray allway;
Ieldsshay ouchingtay ieldsshay, inyay orderyay azeblay aboveyay,
Andyay opstay ethay Ojanstray, oughthay impell’dyay ybay Ovejay.
Ethay ieryfay Artanspay irstfay, ithway oudlay applauseyay.
Armsway ethay oldbay onsay ofyay Estornay inyay ishay ausecay.
is“ay erethay e(hay aidsay) inyay armsyay ayay youthyay ikelay youyay,
Osay ongstray otay ightfay, osay activeyay otay ursuepay?
Ywhay andstay youyay istantday, ornay attemptyay ayay eedday?
Iftlay ethay oldbay ancelay, andyay akemay omesay Ojantray eedblay.”

Ehay aidsay; andyay ackwardbay otay ethay ineslay etiredray;
Orthfay ush’dray ethay youthyay ithway artialmay uryfay iredfay,
Eyondbay ethay oremostfay anksray; ishay ancelay ehay ewthray,
Andyay oundray ethay ackblay attalionsbay astcay ishay iewvay.
Ethay oopstray ofyay Oytray ecederay ithway uddensay earfay,
Ilewhay ethay iftsway avelinjay iss’dhay alongyay inyay airyay.
Advancingyay Elanippusmay etmay ethay artday
Ithway ishay oldbay eastbray, andyay eltfay ityay inyay ishay earthay:
Underingthay ehay allsfay; ishay allingfay armsyay esoundray,
Andyay ishay oadbray ucklerbay ingsray againstyay ethay oundgray.
Ethay ictorvay eapslay uponyay ishay ostratepray izepray:
Usthay onyay ayay oeray ethay ell-breath’dway eaglebay iesflay,
Andyay endsray ishay idesay, esh-bleedingfray ithway ethay artday
Ethay istantday unterhay entsay intoyay ishay earthay.
Observingyay Ectorhay otay ethay escueray ewflay;
Oldbay asyay ehay asway, Antilochusyay ithdrewway.
Osay enwhay ayay avagesay, angingray o’eryay ethay ainplay,
Ashay orntay ethay epherd’sshay ogday, oryay epherd’sshay ainsway,
Ilewhay onsciouscay ofyay ethay eedday, ehay aresglay aroundyay,
Andyay earshay ethay atheringgay ultitudemay esoundray,
Imelytay ehay iesflay ethay yet-untastedyay oodfay,
Andyay ainsgay ethay iendlyfray eltershay ofyay ethay oodway:
Osay earsfay ethay youthyay; allyay Oytray ithway outsshay ursuepay,
Ilewhay onesstay andyay artsday inyay ingledmay empesttay ewflay;
Utbay enter’dyay inyay ethay Eciangray anksray, ehay urnstay
Ishay anlymay eastbray, andyay ithway ewnay uryfay urnsbay.

Ownay onyay ethay eetflay ethay idestay ofyay Ojanstray ovedray,
Iercefay otay ulfilfay ethay ernstay ecreesday ofyay Ovejay:
Ethay iresay ofyay odsgay, onfirmingcay Etisthay’ ayerpray,
Ethay Eciangray ardouryay uench’dqay inyay eepday espairday;
Utbay iftslay otay oryglay Oy’stray evailingpray andsbay,
Ellssway allyay eirthay eartshay, andyay engthensstray allyay eirthay andshay.
Onyay Ida’syay optay ehay aitsway ithway onginglay eyesyay,
Otay iewvay ethay avynay azingblay otay ethay iesskay;
Enthay, ornay illtay enthay, ethay alescay ofyay arway allshay urntay,
Ethay Ojanstray yflay, andyay onquer’dcay Ilionyay urnbay.
Esethay atesfay evolvedray inyay ishay almightyyay indmay,
Ehay aisesray Ectorhay otay ethay orkway esign’dday,
Idsbay imhay ithway oremay anthay ortalmay uryfay owglay,
Andyay ivesdray imhay, ikelay ayay ightninglay, onyay ethay oefay.
Osay Arsmay, enwhay umanhay imescray orfay engeancevay allcay,
Akesshay ishay ugehay avelinjay, andyay olewhay armiesyay allfay.
Otnay ithway oremay ageray ayay onflagrationcay ollsray,
Apswray ethay astvay ountainsmay, andyay involvesyay ethay olespay.
Ehay oamsfay ithway athwray; eneathbay ishay oomyglay owbray
Ikelay ieryfay eteorsmay ishay edray eye-ballsyay owglay:
Ethay adiantray elmethay onyay ishay empletay urnsbay,
Avesway enwhay ehay odsnay, andyay ightenslay asyay ehay urnstay:
Orfay Ovejay ishay endoursplay oundray ethay iefchay adhay ownthray,
Andyay astcay ethay azeblay ofyay othbay ethay ostshay onyay oneyay.
Unhappyyay oriesglay! orfay ishay atefay asway earnay,
Ueday otay ernstay Allaspay, andyay Elidespay’ earspay:
Yetyay Ovejay eferr’dday ethay eathday ehay asway otay aypay,
Andyay avegay atwhay atefay allow’dyay, ethay onourshay ofyay ayay ayday!

Ownay allyay onyay irefay orfay amefay, ishay eastbray, ishay eyesyay
Urnbay atyay eachyay oefay, andyay inglesay everyyay izepray;
Illstay atyay ethay osestclay anksray, ethay ickestthay ightfay,
Ehay ointspay ishay ardouryay, andyay exertsyay ishay ightmay.
Ethay Eciangray alanxphay, ovelessmay asyay ayay owertay,
Onyay allyay idessay atter’dbay, yetyay esistsray ishay owerpay:
Osay omesay alltay ockray o’erhangsyay ethay oaryhay ainmay,[241]
Ybay indsway assail’dyay, ybay illowsbay eatbay inyay ainvay,
Unmovedyay ityay earshay, aboveyay, ethay empesttay owblay,
Andyay eessay ethay ateryway ountainsmay eakbray elowbay.
Irtgay inyay urroundingsay amesflay, ehay eemssay otay allfay
Ikelay irefay omfray Ovejay, andyay urstsbay uponyay emthay allyay:
Urstsbay asyay ayay aveway atthay omfray ethay oudclay impendsyay,
Andyay, ell’dsway ithway empeststay, onyay ethay ipshay escendsday;
Itewhay areyay ethay ecksday ithway oamfay; ethay indsway aloudyay
Owlhay o’eryay ethay astsmay, andyay ingsay oughthray everyyay oudshray:
Alepay, emblingtray, iredtay, ethay ailorssay eezefray ithway earsfay;
Andyay instantyay eathday onyay everyyay aveway appearsyay.
Osay alepay ethay Eeksgray ethay eyesyay ofyay Ectorhay eetmay,
Ethay iefchay osay understhay, andyay osay akesshay ethay eetflay.

Asyay enwhay ayay ionlay, ushingray omfray ishay enday,
Amidstyay ethay ainplay ofyay omesay ide-water’dway enfay,
ere(whay umerousnay oxenyay, asyay atyay easeyay eythay eedfay,
Atyay argelay expatiateyay o’eryay ethay ankerray eadmay)
Eapslay onyay ethay erdshay eforebay ethay erdsman’shay eyesyay;
Ethay emblingtray erdsmanhay arfay otay istanceday iesflay;
Omesay ordlylay ullbay e(thay estray ispersedday andyay edflay)
Ehay inglessay outyay; arrestsyay, andyay ayslay imhay eadday.
Usthay omfray ethay ageray ofyay Ove-likejay Ectorhay ewflay
Allyay Eecegray inyay eapshay; utbay oneyay ehay eizedsay, andyay ewslay:
Ycenianmay Eriphespay, ayay ightymay amenay,
Inyay isdomway eatgray, inyay armsyay ellway ownknay otay amefay;
Ethay inistermay ofyay ernstay Eurystheusyay’ ireyay
Againstyay Alcidesyay, Opreuscay asway ishay iresay:
Ethay onsay edeem’dray ethay onourshay ofyay ethay aceray,
Ayay onsay asyay enerousgay asyay ethay iresay asway asebay;
O’eryay allyay ishay ountry’scay youthyay onspicuouscay arfay
Inyay everyyay irtuevay, oryay ofyay eacepay oryay arway:
Utbay oom’dday otay Ector’shay ongerstray orcefay otay yieldyay!
Againstyay ethay arginmay ofyay ishay ampleyay ieldshay
Ehay uckstray ishay astyhay ootfay: ishay eelshay up-sprungyay;
Upinesay ehay ellfay; ishay azenbray elmethay ungray.
Onyay ethay allenfay iefchay ethay invadingyay Ojantray ess’dpray,
Andyay ungedplay ethay ointedpay avelinjay inyay ishay eastbray.
Ishay irclingcay iendsfray, owhay ovestray otay uardgay ootay atelay
Ethay unhappyyay erohay, edflay, oryay aredshay ishay atefay.

Asedchay omfray ethay oremostfay inelay, ethay Eciangray aintray
Ownay anmay ethay extnay, ecedingray owardtay ethay ainmay:
Edgedway inyay oneyay odybay atyay ethay entstay eythay andstay,
All’dway oundray ithway ernsstay, ayay oomyglay, esperateday andbay.
Ownay anlymay ameshay orbidsfay ethay ingloriousyay ightflay;
Ownay earfay itselfyay onfinescay emthay otay ethay ightfay:
Anmay ouragecay eathesbray inyay anmay; utbay Estornay ostmay
e(thay agesay eserverpray ofyay ethay Eciangray osthay)
Exhortsyay, adjuresyay, otay uardgay esethay utmostyay oresshay;
Andyay ybay eirthay arentspay, ybay emselvesthay imploresyay.

oh“ay iendsfray! ebay enmay: youryay enerousgay eastsbray inflameyay
Ithway utualmay onourhay, andyay ithway utualmay ameshay!
Inkthay ofyay youryay opeshay, youryay ortunesfay; allyay ethay arecay
Youryay ivesway, youryay infantsyay, andyay youryay arentspay areshay:
Inkthay ofyay eachyay ivinglay ather’sfay everendray eadhay;
Inkthay ofyay eachyay ancestoryay ithway oryglay eadday;
Absentyay, ybay emay eythay eakspay, ybay emay eythay uesay,
Eythay askyay eirthay afetysay, andyay eirthay amefay, omfray youyay:
Ethay odsgay eirthay atesfay onyay isthay oneyay actionyay aylay,
Andyay allyay areyay ostlay, ifyay youyay esertday ethay ayday.”

Ehay okespay, andyay oundray imhay eathedbray eroichay iresfay;
Inervamay econdssay atwhay ethay agesay inspiresyay.
Ethay istmay ofyay arknessday Ovejay aroundyay emthay ewthray
Eshay ear’dclay, estoringray allyay ethay arway otay iewvay;
Ayay uddensay ayray otshay eamingbay o’eryay ethay ainplay,
Andyay ow’dshay ethay oresshay, ethay avynay, andyay ethay ainmay:
Ectorhay eythay awsay, andyay allyay owhay yflay, oryay ightfay,
Ethay enescay ide-openingway otay ethay azeblay ofyay ightlay,
Irstfay ofyay ethay ieldfay eatgray Ajaxyay ikesstray eirthay eyesyay,
Ishay ortpay ajesticmay, andyay ishay ampleyay izesay:
Ayay onderouspay acemay ithway udsstay ofyay ironyay own’dcray,
Ullfay entytway ubitscay onglay, ehay ingssway aroundyay;
Ornay ightsfay, ikelay othersyay, ix’dfay otay ertaincay andsstay
Utbay ookslay ayay ovingmay owertay aboveyay ethay andsbay;
Ighhay onyay ethay ecksday ithway astvay iganticgay idestray,
Ethay odlikegay erohay alksstay omfray idesay otay idesay.
Osay enwhay ayay orsemanhay omfray ethay ateryway eadmay
ill’d(skay inyay ethay anagemay ofyay ethay oundingbay eedstay)
Ivesdray ourfay airfay ourserscay, actisedpray otay obeyyay,
Otay omesay eatgray itycay oughthray ethay ublicpay ayway;
Afesay inyay ishay artyay, asyay idesay ybay idesay eythay unray,
Ehay iftsshay ishay eatsay, andyay aultsvay omfray oneyay otay oneyay;
Andyay ownay otay isthay, andyay ownay otay atthay ehay iesflay;
Admiringyay umbersnay ollowfay ithway eirthay eyesyay.

Omfray ipshay otay ipshay usthay Ajaxyay iftlysway ewflay,
Onay esslay ethay onderway ofyay ethay arringway ewcray.
Asyay uriousfay, Ectorhay under’dthay eatsthray aloudyay,
Andyay ush’dray enragedyay eforebay ethay Ojantray owdcray;
Enthay iftsway invadesyay ethay ipsshay, osewhay eakybay orespray
Aylay ank’dray ontiguouscay onyay ethay endingbay oresshay;
Osay ethay ongstray eagleyay omfray ishay airyyay eighthay,
Owhay arksmay ethay anssway’ oryay anescray’ embodiedyay ightflay,
Oopsstay ownday impetuousyay, ilewhay eythay ightlay orfay oodfay,
Andyay, oopingstay, arkensday ithway ishay ingsway ethay oodflay.
Ovejay eadslay imhay onyay ithway ishay almightyyay andhay,
Andyay eathesbray iercefay iritsspay inyay ishay ollowingfay andbay.
Ethay arringway ationsnay eetmay, ethay attlebay oarsray,
Ickthay eatsbay ethay ombatcay onyay ethay oundingsay orespray.
Outhay ouldstway avehay oughtthay, osay uriousfay asway eirthay irefay,
Onay orcefay ouldcay ametay emthay, andyay onay oiltay ouldcay iretay;
Asyay ifyay ewnay igourvay omfray ewnay ightsfay eythay onway,
Andyay ethay onglay attlebay asway utbay enthay egunbay.
Eecegray, yetyay unconquer’dyay, eptkay aliveyay ethay arway,
Ecuresay ofyay eathday, onfidingcay inyay espairday:
Oytray inyay oudpray opeshay alreadyyay iew’dvay ethay ainmay
Ightbray ithway ethay azeblay, andyay edray ithway eroeshay ainslay:
Ikelay engthstray isyay eltfay omfray opehay, andyay omfray espairday,
Andyay eachyay ontendscay, asyay ishay ereway allyay ethay arway.

as’tway outhay, oldbay Ectorhay! osewhay esistlessray andhay
Irstfay eizedsay ayay ipshay onyay atthay ontestedcay andstray;
Ethay amesay ichwhay eadday Otesilaüspray orebay,[242]
Ethay irstfay atthay ouch’dtay ethay unhappyyay Ojantray oreshay:
Orfay isthay inyay armsyay ethay arringway ationsnay oodstay,
Andyay athedbay eirthay enerousgay eastsbray ithway utualmay oodblay.
Onay oomray otay oisepay ethay ancelay oryay endbay ethay owbay;
Utbay andhay otay andhay, andyay anmay otay anmay, eythay owgray:
Oundedway, eythay oundway; andyay eeksay eachyay other’syay eartshay
Ithway alchionsfay, axesyay, ordssway, andyay orten’dshay artsday.
Ethay alchionsfay ingray, ieldsshay attleray, axesyay oundsay,
Ordssway ashflay inyay airyay, oryay itterglay onyay ethay oundgray;
Ithway eamingstray oodblay ethay ipperyslay oresshay areyay yedday,
Andyay aughter’dslay eroeshay ellsway ethay eadfuldray idetay.

Illstay agingray, Ectorhay ithway ishay ampleyay andhay
Aspsgray ethay ighhay ernstay, andyay ivesgay isthay oudlay ommandcay:


illustration[ay: ] Ajaxyay Efendingday Ethay Eekgray Ipsshay


aste“hay, ingbray ethay amesflay! atthay oiltay ofyay entay onglay yearsyay
Isyay inishedfay; andyay ethay ayday esiredday appearsyay!
Isthay appyhay ayday ithway acclamationsyay eetgray,
Ightbray ithway estructionday ofyay yonyay ostilehay eetflay.
Ethay oward-counselscay ofyay ayay imoroustay ongthray
Ofyay everendray otardsday eck’dchay ouryay oryglay onglay:
Ootay onglay Ovejay ull’dlay usyay ithway ethargiclay armschay,
Utbay ownay inyay ealspay ofyay underthay allscay otay armsyay:
Inyay isthay eatgray ayday ehay ownscray ouryay ullfay esiresday,
Akesway allyay ouryay orcefay, andyay econdssay allyay ouryay iresfay.”

Ehay oke—thespay arriorsway atyay ishay iercefay ommandcay
Ourpay ayay ewnay elugeday onyay ethay Eciangray andbay.
Evenyay Ajaxyay ausedpay, o(say ickthay ethay avelinsjay yflay,)
Epp’dstay ackbay, andyay oubtedday oryay otay ivelay oryay ieday.
Yetyay, erewhay ethay oarsyay areyay acedplay, ehay andsstay otay aitway
Atwhay iefchay approachingyay aresday attemptyay ishay atefay:
Evenyay otay ethay astlay ishay avalnay argechay efendsday,
Ownay akesshay ishay earspay, ownay iftslay, andyay ownay otendspray;
Evenyay yetyay, ethay Eeksgray ithway iercingpay outsshay inspiresyay,
Amidstyay attacksyay, andyay eathsday, andyay artsday, andyay iresfay.

o“ay iendsfray! Oyay eroeshay! amesnay orfay everyay earday,
Onceyay onssay ofyay Arsmay, andyay underboltsthay ofyay arway!
Ahyay! yetyay ebay indfulmay ofyay youryay oldyay enownray,
Youryay eatgray orefathersfay’ irtuesvay andyay youryay ownyay.
Atwhay aidsyay expectyay youyay inyay isthay utmostyay aitstray?
Atwhay ulwarksbay isingray etweenbay youyay andyay atefay?
Onay aidsyay, onay ulwarksbay youryay etreatray attendyay,
Onay iendsfray otay elphay, onay itycay otay efendday.
Isthay otspay isyay allyay youyay avehay, otay oselay oryay eepkay;
Erethay andstay ethay Ojanstray, andyay erehay ollsray ethay eepday.
is’tay ostilehay oundgray youyay eadtray; youryay ativenay andslay
Arfay, arfay omfray encehay: youryay atesfay areyay inyay youryay andshay.”

Agingray ehay okespay; ornay urtherfay astesway ishay eathbray,
Utbay urnstay ishay avelinjay otay ethay orkway ofyay eathday.
Ate’erwhay oldbay Ojantray arm’dyay ishay aringday andshay,
Againstyay ethay ablesay ipsshay, ithway amingflay andsbray,
Osay ellway ethay iefchay ishay avalnay eaponway edspay,
Ethay ucklesslay arriorway atyay ishay ernstay aylay eadday:
Ullfay elvetway, ethay oldestbay, inyay ayay omentmay ellfay,
Entsay ybay eatgray Ajaxyay otay ethay adesshay ofyay ellhay.


illustration[ay: ] Astorcay Andyay Olluxpay




Ookbay Ixvay.


Argumentyay


Ethay Ixthsay Attlebay, Ethay Actsyay Andyay Eathday Ofyay Atrocluspay


Atrocluspay in(ay ursuancepay ofyay ethay equestray ofyay Estornay inyay ethay eleventhyay ookbay)
entreatsyay Achillesyay otay uffersay imhay otay ogay otay ethay assistanceyay ofyay ethay Eeksgray
ithway Achillesyay’ oopstray andyay armouryay. Ehay agreesyay otay ityay, utbay atyay ethay amesay imetay
argeschay imhay otay ontentcay imselfhay ithway escuingray ethay eetflay, ithoutway urtherfay
ursuitpay ofyay ethay enemyyay. Ethay armouryay, orseshay, oldierssay, andyay officersyay areyay
escribedday. Achillesyay offersyay ayay ibationlay orfay ethay uccesssay ofyay ishay iendfray,
afteryay ichwhay Atrocluspay eadslay ethay Yrmidonsmay otay attlebay. Ethay Ojanstray, atyay
ethay ightsay ofyay Atrocluspay inyay Achillesyay’ armouryay, akingtay imhay orfay atthay erohay,
areyay astcay intoyay ethay uttermostyay onsternationcay; ehay eatsbay emthay offyay omfray ethay
esselsvay, Ectorhay imselfhay iesflay, Arpedonsay isyay illedkay, oughthay Upiterjay asway
averseyay otay ishay atefay. Everalsay otheryay articularspay ofyay ethay attlebay areyay
escribedday; inyay ethay eathay ofyay ichwhay, Atrocluspay, eglectingnay ethay ordersyay ofyay
Achillesyay, ursuespay ethay oefay otay ethay allsway ofyay Oytray, erewhay Apolloyay epulsesray
andyay isarmsday imhay, Euphorbusyay oundsway imhay, andyay Ectorhay illskay imhay, ichwhay
oncludescay ethay ookbay.


Osay arr’dway othbay armiesyay onyay ethay ensanguinedyay oreshay,
Ilewhay ethay ackblay esselsvay okedsmay ithway umanhay oregay.
Eantimemay Atrocluspay otay Achillesyay iesflay;
Ethay eamingstray earstay allfay opiouscay omfray ishay eyesyay.
Otnay asterfay, icklingtray otay ethay ainsplay elowbay,
Omfray ethay alltay ockray ethay ablesay atersway owflay.
Ivineday Elidespay, ithway ompassioncay ovedmay.
Usthay okespay, indulgentyay, otay ishay estbay elovedbay:[243]

atroclus“pay, aysay, atwhay iefgray ythay osombay earsbay,
Atthay owsflay osay astfay inyay esethay unmanlyyay earstay?
Onay irlgay, onay infantyay omwhay ethay othermay eepskay
Omfray erhay ovedlay eastbray, ithway onderfay assionpay eepsway;
Otnay oremay ethay other’smay oulsay, atthay infantyay armsway,
Ungclay otay erhay eesknay, andyay eachingray atyay erhay armsyay,
Anthay outhay asthay inemay! Ohyay elltay emay, otay atwhay endyay
Ythay eltingmay orrowssay usthay ursuepay ythay iendfray?

iev’st“gray outhay orfay emay, oryay orfay ymay artialmay andbay?
Oryay omecay adsay idingstay omfray ouryay ativenay andlay?
Ouryay athersfay ivelay our(ay irstfay, ostmay endertay arecay),
Ythay oodgay Enoetiusmay eathesbray ethay italvay airyay,
Andyay oaryhay Eleuspay yetyay extendsyay ishay aysday;
Easedplay inyay eirthay ageyay otay earhay eirthay ildren’schay aisepray.
Oryay aymay omesay eanermay ausecay ythay itypay aimclay?
Erhapspay yonyay elicsray ofyay ethay Eciangray amenay,
Oom’dday inyay eirthay ipsshay otay inksay ybay irefay andyay ordsway,
Andyay aypay ethay orfeitfay ofyay eirthay aughtyhay ordlay?
Ate’erwhay ethay ausecay, evealray ythay ecretsay arecay,
Andyay eakspay osethay orrowssay ichwhay ayay iendfray ouldway areshay.”
Ayay ighsay atthay instantyay omfray ishay osombay okebray,
Anotheryay ollow’dfay, andyay Atrocluspay okespay:

et“lay Eecegray atyay engthlay ithway itypay ouchtay ythay eastbray,
Yselfthay ayay Eekgray; andyay, onceyay, ofyay Eeksgray ethay estbay!
Olay! everyyay iefchay atthay ightmay erhay atefay eventpray,
Ieslay iercedpay ithway oundsway, andyay eedingblay inyay ishay enttay:
Eurypylusyay, Ydidestay, Atreusyay’ onsay,
Andyay iseway Ulyssesyay, atyay ethay avynay oangray,
Oremay orfay eirthay ountry’scay oundsway anthay orfay eirthay ownyay.
Eirthay ainpay oftsay artsyay ofyay armacyphay ancay easeyay,
Ythay eastbray aloneyay onay enitiveslay appeaseyay.
Aymay evernay ageray ikelay inethay ymay oulsay enslaveyay,
Oyay eatgray inyay ainvay! unprofitablyyay avebray!
Ythay ountrycay ightedslay inyay erhay astlay istressday,
Atwhay iendfray, atwhay anmay, omfray eethay allshay opehay edressray?
O—mennay unbornyay, andyay agesyay yetyay ehindbay,
Allshay ursecay atthay iercefay, atthay unforgivingyay indmay.

o“ay anmay unpityingyay! ifyay ofyay anmay ythay aceray;
Utbay uresay outhay ing’stspray otnay omfray ayay oftsay embraceyay,
Ornay everyay amorousyay erohay ausedcay ythay irthbay,
Ornay everyay endertay oddessgay oughtbray eethay orthfay:
Omesay uggedray ock’sray ardhay entrailsyay avegay eethay ormfay,
Andyay agingray eassay oducedpray eethay inyay ayay ormstay,
Ayay oulsay ellway uitingsay atthay empestuoustay indkay,
Osay oughray ythay annersmay, osay untamedyay ythay indmay.

if“ay omesay ireday oracleyay ythay eastbray alarmyay,
Ifyay aughtyay omfray Ovejay, oryay Etisthay, opstay ythay armyay,
Omesay eambay ofyay omfortcay yetyay onyay Eecegray aymay ineshay,
Ifyay Iyay utbay eadlay ethay Yrmidonianmay inelay:
Adclay inyay ythay eadfuldray armsyay ifyay Iyay appearyay,
Oudpray Oytray allshay embletray, andyay esertday ethay arway;
Ithoutway ythay ersonpay Eecegray allshay inway ethay ayday,
Andyay ythay eremay imageyay asechay erhay oesfay awayyay.
Ess’dpray ybay eshfray orcesfay, erhay o’erlabour’dyay aintray
Allshay uitqay ethay ipsshay, andyay Eecegray espireray againyay.”
Usthay, indblay otay atefay! ithway upplicatingsay eathbray,
Outhay egg’stbay ishay armsyay, andyay inyay ishay armsyay ythay eathday.
Unfortunatelyyay oodgay! ayay odingbay ighsay
Ythay iendfray eturn’dray; andyay ithway ityay, isthay eplyray:
atroclus“pay! ythay Achillesyay owsknay onay earsfay;
Ornay ordsway omfray Ovejay ornay oraclesyay ehay earshay;
Ornay aughtyay ayay other’smay autioncay ancay uggestsay;
Ethay yrant’stay idepray ieslay ootedray inyay ymay eastbray.
Ymay ongswray, ymay ongswray, ymay onstantcay oughtthay engageyay,
Osethay, ymay olesay oraclesyay, inspireyay ymay ageray:
Iyay ademay imhay yranttay: avegay imhay owerpay otay ongwray
Evenyay emay: Iyay eltfay ityay; andyay allshay eelfay ityay onglay.
Ethay aidmay, ymay ack-eyedblay aidmay, ehay orcedfay awayyay,
Ueday otay ethay oilstay ofyay anymay ayay ell-foughtway ayday;
Ueday otay ymay onquestcay ofyay erhay ather’sfay eignray;
Ueday otay ethay otesvay ofyay allyay ethay Eciangray aintray.
Omfray emay ehay orcedfay erhay; emay, ethay oldbay andyay avebray,
Isgracedday, ishonour’dday, ikelay ethay eanestmay aveslay.
Utbay earbay eway is—thethay ongswray Iyay ievegray areyay astpay;
is’tay imetay ouryay uryfay ouldshay elentray atyay astlay:
Iyay ix’dfay itsyay ateday; ethay ayday Iyay ish’dway appearsyay:
Owhay Ectorhay otay ymay ipsshay ishay attlebay earsbay,
Ethay amesflay ymay eyesyay, ethay outsshay invadeyay ymay earsyay.
Ogay enthay, Atrocluspay! ourtcay airfay onour’shay armschay
Inyay Oy’stray amedfay ieldsfay, andyay inyay Achillesyay’ armsyay:
Eadlay orthfay ymay artialmay Yrmidonsmay otay ightfay,
Ogay avesay ethay eetsflay, andyay onquercay inyay ymay ightray.
Eesay ethay inthay elicsray ofyay eirthay affledbay andbay
Atyay ethay astlay edgeyay ofyay yonyay esertedday andlay!
Eholdbay allyay Ilionyay onyay eirthay ipsshay escendsday;
Owhay ethay oudclay ackensblay, owhay ethay ormstay impendsyay!
Ityay asway otnay usthay, enwhay, atyay ymay ightsay amazedyay,
Oytray awsay andyay embledtray, asyay isthay elmethay azedblay:
Adhay otnay ethay injuriousyay ingkay ouryay iendshipfray ostlay,
Yonyay ampleyay enchtray adhay uriedbay alfhay erhay osthay.
Onay ampscay, onay ulwarksbay ownay ethay Ojanstray earfay,
Osethay areyay otnay eadfuldray, onay Achillesyay erethay;
Onay ongerlay amesflay ethay ancelay ofyay Ydeustay’ onsay;
Onay oremay youryay eneralgay allscay ishay eroeshay onyay:
Ectorhay, aloneyay, Iyay earhay; ishay eadfuldray eathbray
Ommandscay youryay aughterslay, oryay oclaimspray youryay eathday.
Yetyay ownay, Atrocluspay, issueyay otay ethay ainplay:
Ownay avesay ethay ipsshay, ethay isingray iresfay estrainray,
Andyay ivegay ethay Eeksgray otay isitvay Eecegray againyay.
Utbay eedhay ymay ordsway, andyay arkmay ayay iend’sfray ommandcay,
Owhay uststray ishay amefay andyay onourshay inyay ythay andhay,
Andyay omfray ythay eedsday expectsyay ethay Achaianyay osthay
Allshay enderray ackbay ethay eauteousbay aidmay ehay ostlay:
Ageray uncontroll’dyay oughthray allyay ethay ostilehay ewcray,
Utbay ouchtay otnay Ectorhay, Ectorhay isyay ymay ueday.
Oughthay Ovejay inyay underthay ouldshay ommandcay ethay arway,
Ebay ustjay, onsultcay ymay oryglay, andyay orbearfay.
Ethay eetflay onceyay avedsay, esistday omfray urtherfay asechay,
Ornay eadlay otay Ilion’syay allsway ethay Eciangray aceray;
Omesay adverseyay odgay ythay ashnessray aymay estroyday;
Omesay odgay, ikelay Usphœbay, everyay indkay otay Oytray.
Etlay Eecegray, edeem’dray omfray isthay estructiveday aitstray,
Oday erhay ownyay orkway; andyay eavelay ethay estray otay atefay.
Oyay! ouldway otay allyay ethay immortalyay owerspay aboveyay,
Apolloyay, Allaspay, andyay almightyyay Ovejay!
Atthay otnay oneyay Ojantray ightmay ebay eftlay aliveyay,
Andyay otnay ayay Eekgray ofyay allyay ethay aceray urvivesay:
Ightmay onlyyay eway ethay astvay estructionday unshay,
Andyay onlyyay eway estroyday ethay accursedyay owntay!”
Uchsay onferencecay eldhay ethay iefschay; ilewhay onyay ethay andstray
Eatgray Ovejay ithway onquestcay own’dcray ethay Ojantray andbay.
Ajaxyay onay oremay ethay oundingsay ormstay ustain’dsay,
Osay ickthay ethay artsday anyay ironyay empesttay ain’dray:
Onyay ishay iredtay armyay ethay eightyway ucklerbay unghay;
Ishay ollowhay elmhay ithway allingfay avelinsjay ungray;
Ishay eathbray, inyay uickqay ortshay antingspay, omescay andyay oesgay;
Andyay ainfulpay eatsway omfray allyay ishay embersmay owsflay.
Entspay andyay o’erpower’dyay, ehay arelybay eathesbray atyay ostmay;
Yetyay arcescay anyay armyyay irsstay imhay omfray ishay ostpay;
Angersday onyay angersday allyay aroundyay imhay owglay,
Andyay oiltay otay oiltay, andyay oeway ucceedssay otay oeway.

Aysay, Usesmay, onedthray aboveyay ethay arrystay amefray,
Owhay irstfay ethay avynay azedblay ithway Ojantray ameflay?

Ernstay Ectorhay avedway ishay ordsway, andyay andingstay earnay,
Erewhay uriousfay Ajaxyay iedplay ishay ashenyay earspay,
Ullfay onyay ethay ancelay ayay okestray osay ustlyjay edspay,
Atthay ethay oadbray alchionfay opp’dlay itsyay azenbray eadhay;
Ishay ointlesspay earspay ethay arriorway akesshay inyay ainvay;
Ethay azenbray eadhay allsfay oundingsay onyay ethay ainplay.
Eatgray Ajaxyay awsay, andyay own’dyay ethay andhay ivineday;
Onfessingcay Ovejay, andyay emblingtray atyay ethay ignsay,
Arn’dway ehay etreatsray. Enthay iftsway omfray allyay idessay ourpay
Ethay issinghay andsbray; ickthay eamsstray ethay ieryfay owershay;
O’eryay ethay ighhay ernstay ethay urlingcay olumesvay iseray,
Andyay eetsshay ofyay ollingray okesmay involveyay ethay iesskay.

Ivineday Achillesyay iew’dvay ethay isingray amesflay,
Andyay otesmay ishay ighthay, andyay usthay aloudyay exclaimsyay:
arm“ay, armyay, Atrocluspay! Olay, ethay azeblay aspiresyay!
Ethay owingglay oceanyay eddensray ithway ethay iresfay.
Armyay, ereyay ouryay esselsvay atchcay ethay eadingspray ameflay;
Armyay, ereyay ethay Eciansgray ebay onay oremay ayay amenay;
Iyay astehay otay ingbray ethay oops.”—thetray erohay aidsay;
Ethay iendfray ithway ardouryay andyay ithway oyjay obey’dyay.

Ehay asedcay ishay imbslay inyay assbray; andyay irstfay aroundyay
Ishay anlymay egslay, ithway ilversay ucklesbay oundbay
Ethay aspingclay eavesgray; enthay otay ishay eastbray appliesyay
Ethay amingflay uirasscay ofyay ayay ousandthay yesday;
Emblazedyay ithway udsstay ofyay oldgay ishay alchionfay oneshay
Inyay ethay ichray eltbay, asyay inyay ayay arrystay onezay:
Achillesyay’ ieldshay ishay ampleyay ouldersshay eadspray,
Achillesyay’ elmethay oddednay o’eryay ishay eadhay:
Adorn’dyay inyay allyay ishay erribletay arrayyay,
Ehay ash’dflay aroundyay intolerableyay ayday.
Aloneyay untouch’dyay, Elidespay’ avelinjay andsstay,
Otnay otay ebay oisedpay utbay ybay Elidespay’ andshay:
Omfray Elion’spay adyshay owbray ethay antplay entireyay
Oldyay Ironchay entray, andyay apedshay ityay orfay ishay iresay;
Osewhay on’ssay eatgray armyay aloneyay ethay eaponway ieldsway,
Ethay eathday ofyay eroeshay, andyay ethay eaddray ofyay ieldsfay.


illustration[ay: ] Ucklesbay


Ethay avebray Automedonyay an(ay onour’dhay amenay,
Ethay econdsay otay ishay ordlay inyay ovelay andyay amefay,
Inyay eacepay ishay iendfray, andyay artnerpay ofyay ethay arway)
Ethay ingedway ourserscay arness’dhay otay ethay arcay;
Anthusxay andyay Aliusbay, ofyay immortalyay eedbray,
Ungspray omfray ethay indway, andyay ikelay ethay indway inyay eedspay.
Omwhay ethay ing’dway arpyhay, iftsway Odargepay, orebay,
Ybay Ephyrzay egnantpray onyay ethay eezybray oreshay:
Iftsway Edasuspay asway addedyay otay eirthay idesay,
once(ay eatgray Aëtion’syay, ownay Achillesyay’ idepray)
Owhay, ikelay inyay engthstray, inyay iftnesssway, andyay inyay acegray,
Ayay ortalmay oursercay atch’dmay ethay immortalyay aceray.

Achillesyay eedsspay omfray enttay otay enttay, andyay armsway
Ishay ardyhay Yrmidonsmay otay oodblay andyay armsyay.
Allyay eathingbray eathday, aroundyay ethay iefchay eythay andstay,
Ayay imgray, errifictay, ormidablefay andbay:
Imgray asyay oraciousvay olvesway, atthay eeksay ethay ingsspray[244]
Enwhay aldingscay irstthay eirthay urningbay owelsbay ingswray;
Enwhay omesay alltay agstay, esh-slaughteredfray inyay ethay oodway,
Ashay ench’ddray eirthay ideway insatiateyay oatsthray ithway oodblay,
Otay ethay ackblay ountfay eythay ushray, ayay ideoushay ongthray,
Ithway aunchpay istendedday, andyay ithway ollinglay onguetay,
Irefay illsfay eirthay eyeyay, eirthay ackblay awsjay elchbay ethay oregay,
Andyay orgedgay ithway aughterslay illstay eythay irstthay orfay oremay.
Ikelay uriousfay, ush’dray ethay Yrmidonianmay ewcray,
Uchsay eirthay eaddray engthstray, andyay uchsay eirthay eathfulday iewvay.

Ighhay inyay ethay idstmay ethay eatgray Achillesyay andsstay,
Irectsday eirthay orderyay, andyay ethay arway ommandscay.
Ehay, ovedlay ofyay Ovejay, adhay aunch’dlay orfay Ilion’syay oresshay
Ullfay iftyfay esselsvay, ann’dmay ithway iftyfay oarsyay:
Ivefay osenchay eaderslay ethay iercefay andsbay obeyyay,
Imselfhay upremesay inyay alourvay, asyay inyay aysway.

Irstfay arch’dmay Enestheusmay, ofyay elestialcay irthbay,
Erivedday omfray eethay, osewhay atersway ashway ethay earthyay,
Ivineday Erchiusspay! Ove-descendedjay oodflay!
Ayay ortalmay othermay ixingmay ithway ayay odgay.
Uchsay asway Enestheusmay, utbay iscall’dmay ybay amefay
Ethay onsay ofyay Orusbay, atthay espousedyay ethay ameday.

Eudorusyay extnay; omwhay Olymelepay ethay aygay,
Amedfay inyay ethay acefulgray anceday, oducedpray o-daytay.
Erhay, yslay Elleniuscay ovedlay: onyay erhay ouldway azegay,
Asyay ithway iftsway epstay eshay orm’dfay ethay unningray azemay:
Otay erhay ighhay amberchay omfray Iana’sday uireqay,
Ethay odgay ursuedpay erhay, urgedyay, andyay own’dcray ishay irefay.
Ethay onsay onfess’dcay ishay ather’sfay eavenlyhay aceray,
Andyay eir’dhay ishay other’smay iftnesssway inyay ethay asechay.
Ongstray Echecleusyay, ess’dblay inyay allyay osethay armschay
Atthay easedplay ayay odgay, ucceededsay otay erhay armsyay;
Otnay onsciouscay ofyay osethay oveslay, onglay idhay omfray amefay,
Ithway iftsgay ofyay icepray ehay oughtsay andyay onway ethay ameday;
Erhay ecretsay offspringyay otay erhay iresay eshay arebay;
Erhay iresay aress’dcay imhay ithway ayay arent’spay arecay.

Isanderpay ollow’dfay; atchlessmay inyay ishay artyay
Otay ingway ethay earspay, oryay aimyay ethay istantday artday;
Onay andhay osay uresay ofyay allyay ethay Emathianyay inelay,
Oryay ifyay ayay urersay, eatgray Atrocluspay! inethay.

Ethay ourthfay ybay Ixphœnay’ avegray ommandcay asway acedgray,
Aerceslay’ aliantvay offspringyay edlay ethay astlay.

Oonsay asyay Achillesyay ithway uperiorsay arecay
Adhay all’dcay ethay iefschay, andyay order’dyay allyay ethay arway,
Isthay ernstay emembranceray otay ishay oopstray ehay avegay:
ye“ay ar-famedfay Yrmidonsmay, yeyay iercefay andyay avebray!
Inkthay ithway atwhay eatsthray youyay aredday ethay Ojantray ongthray,
Inkthay atwhay eproachray esethay earsyay enduredyay osay onglay;
ern‘stay onsay ofyay Eleuspay, us(thay yeyay usedyay otay aysay,
Ilewhay estlessray, agingray, inyay youryay ipsshay youyay aylay)
Ohyay ursednay ithway allgay, unknowingyay owhay otay yieldyay;
Osewhay ageray efraudsday usyay ofyay osay amedfay ayay ieldfay:
Ifyay atthay ireday uryfay ustmay orfay everyay urnbay,
Atwhay akemay eway erehay? Eturnray, yeyay iefschay, eturnray!’
Uchsay ereway youryay ords—nowway, arriorsway! ievegray onay oremay,
Olay erethay ethay Ojanstray; athebay youryay ordssway inyay oregay!
Isthay ayday allshay ivegay youyay allyay youryay oulsay emandsday,
Utglay allyay youryay eartshay, andyay earyway allyay youryay andshay!”


illustration[ay: ] Ianaday


Usthay ilewhay ehay ousedray ethay irefay inyay everyyay eastbray,
Oseclay andyay oremay oseclay ethay isteninglay ohortscay ess’dpray;
Anksray edgedway inyay anksray; ofyay armsyay ayay eelystay ingray
Illstay owsgray, andyay eadsspray, andyay ickensthay oundray ethay ingkay.
Asyay enwhay ayay irclingcay allway ethay uilderbay ormsfay,
Ofyay engthstray efensiveday againstyay indway andyay ormsstay,
Ompactedcay onesstay ethay ickeningthay orkway omposecay,
Andyay oundray imhay ideway ethay isingray ucturestray owsgray:
Osay elmhay otay elmhay, andyay estcray otay estcray eythay ongthray,
Ieldshay urgedyay onyay ieldshay, andyay anmay ovedray anmay alongyay;
Ickthay, undistinguish’dyay umesplay, ogethertay oin’djay,
Oatflay inyay oneyay easay, andyay aveway eforebay ethay indway.

Arfay o’eryay ethay estray inyay itteringglay omppay appearyay,
Erethay oldbay Automedonyay, Atrocluspay erehay;
Othersbray inyay armsyay, ithway equalyay uryfay iredfay;
Otway iendsfray, otway odiesbay ithway oneyay oulsay inspiredyay.

Utbay indfulmay ofyay ethay odsgay, Achillesyay entway
Otay ethay ichray offercay inyay ishay adyshay enttay;
Erethay aylay onyay eapshay ishay ariousvay armentsgay oll’dray,
Andyay ostlycay ursfay, andyay arpetscay iffstay ithway oldgay,
e(thay esentspray ofyay ethay ilver-footedsay ameday)
Omfray encethay ehay ooktay ayay owlbay, ofyay antiqueyay amefray,
Ichwhay evernay anmay adhay ainedstay ithway uddyray ineway,
Ornay aisedray inyay offeringsyay otay ethay owerpay ivineday,
Utbay Eleuspay’ onsay; andyay Eleuspay’ onsay otay onenay
Adhay aisedray inyay offeringsyay, utbay otay Ovejay aloneyay.
Isthay ingedtay ithway ulphursay, acredsay irstfay otay ameflay,
Ehay urgedpay; andyay ash’dway ityay inyay ethay unningray eamstray.
Enthay eansedclay ishay andshay; andyay ixingfay orfay ayay acespay
Ishay eyesyay onyay eavenhay, ishay eetfay uponyay ethay aceplay
Ofyay acrificesay, ethay urplepay aughtdray ehay our’dpay
Orthfay inyay ethay idstmay; andyay usthay ethay odgay imploredyay:

o“ay outhay upremesay! igh-thronedhay allyay eighthay aboveyay!
Oyay eatgray Elasgicpay, Odonaeanday Ovejay!
Owhay idst’may urroundingsay ostsfray, andyay apoursvay illchay,
Esid’stpray onyay eakblay Odona’sday ocalvay illhay:
ose(whay ovesgray ethay Ellisay, aceray austereyay! urroundsay,
Eirthay eetfay unwash’dyay, eirthay umbersslay onyay ethay oundgray;
Owhay earhay, omfray ustlingray oaksyay, ythay arkday ecreesday;
Andyay atchcay ethay atesfay, ow-whisperedlay inyay ethay eezebray;)
Earhay, asyay ofyay oldyay! Outhay av’stgay, atyay Etisthay’ ayerpray,
Oryglay otay emay, andyay otay ethay Eeksgray espairday.
Olay, otay ethay angersday ofyay ethay ightingfay ieldfay
Ethay estbay, ethay earestday ofyay ymay iendsfray, Iyay yieldyay,
Oughthay illstay eterminedday, otay ymay ipsshay onfinedcay;
Atrocluspay onegay, Iyay aystay utbay alfhay ehindbay.
Ohyay! ebay ishay uardgay ythay ovidentialpray arecay,
Onfirmcay ishay earthay, andyay ingstray ishay armyay otay arway:
Ess’dpray ybay ishay inglesay orcefay etlay Ectorhay eesay
Ishay amefay inyay armsyay otnay owingyay allyay otay emay.
Utbay enwhay ethay eetsflay areyay avedsay omfray oesfay andyay irefay,
Etlay imhay ithway onquestcay andyay enownray etireray;
Eservepray ishay armsyay, eservepray ishay ocialsay aintray,
Andyay afesay eturnray imhay otay esethay eyesyay againyay!”

Eatgray Ovejay onsentscay otay alfhay ethay ief’schay equestray,
Utbay eaven’shay eternalyay oomday eniesday ethay estray;
Otay eefray ethay eetflay asway antedgray otay ishay ayerpray;
Ishay afesay eturnray, ethay indsway ispersedday inyay airyay.
Ackbay otay ishay enttay ethay ernstay Achillesyay iesflay,
Andyay aitsway ethay ombatcay ithway impatientyay eyesyay.

Eanwhilemay ethay oopstray eneathbay Atrocluspay’ arecay,
Invadeyay ethay Ojanstray, andyay ommencecay ethay arway.
Asyay aspsway, ovokedpray ybay ildrenchay inyay eirthay ayplay,
Ourpay omfray eirthay ansionsmay ybay ethay oadbray ighwayhay,
Inyay armssway ethay uiltlessgay avellertray engageyay,
Etwhay allyay eirthay ingsstay, andyay allcay orthfay allyay eirthay ageray:
Allyay iseray inyay armsyay, andyay, ithway ayay eneralgay ycray,
Assertyay eirthay axenway omesday, andyay uzzingbay ogenypray.
Usthay omfray ethay entstay ethay erventfay egionlay armssway,
Osay oudlay eirthay amoursclay, andyay osay eenkay eirthay armsyay:
Eirthay isingray ageray Atrocluspay’ eathbray inspiresyay,
Owhay usthay inflamesyay emthay ithway eroichay iresfay:

o“ay arriorsway, artnerspay ofyay Achillesyay’ aisepray!
Ebay indfulmay ofyay youryay eedsday inyay ancientyay aysday;
Youryay odlikegay astermay etlay youryay actsyay oclaimpray,
Andyay addyay ewnay oriesglay otay ishay ightymay amenay.
Inkthay youryay Achillesyay eessay youyay ightfay: ebay avebray,
Andyay umblehay ethay oudpray onarchmay omwhay youyay avesay.”

Oyfuljay eythay eardhay, andyay indlingkay asyay ehay okespay,
Ewflay otay ethay eetflay, involvedyay inyay irefay andyay okesmay.
Omfray oreshay otay oreshay ethay oublingday outsshay esoundray,
Ethay ollowhay ipsshay eturnray ayay eeperday oundsay.
Ethay arway oodstay illstay, andyay allyay aroundyay emthay azedgay,
Enwhay eatgray Achillesyay’ iningshay armouryay azedblay:
Oytray awsay, andyay oughtthay ethay eaddray Achillesyay ighnay,
Atyay onceyay eythay eesay, eythay embletray, andyay eythay yflay.

Enthay irstfay ythay earspay, ivineday Atrocluspay! ewflay,
Erewhay ethay arway agedray, andyay erewhay ethay umulttay ewgray.
Oseclay otay ethay ernstay ofyay atthay amedfay ipshay ichwhay orebay
Unbless’dyay Otesilauspray otay Ilion’syay oreshay,
Ethay eatgray Onianpæay, oldbay Yrechmespay oodstay;
o(whay edlay ishay andsbay omfray Axiusyay’ indingway oodflay;)
Ishay oulder-bladeshay eceivesray ethay atalfay oundway;
Ethay oaninggray arriorway antspay uponyay ethay oundgray.
Ishay oopstray, atthay eesay eirthay ountry’scay oryglay ainslay,
Yflay iverseday, atter’dscay o’eryay ethay istantday ainplay.
Atrocluspay’ armyay orbidsfay ethay eadingspray iresfay,
Andyay omfray ethay alf-burn’dhay ipshay oudpray Oytray etiresray;
Ear’dclay omfray ethay okesmay ethay oyfuljay avynay ieslay;
Inyay eapshay onyay eapshay ethay oefay umultuoustay iesflay;
Iumphanttray Eecegray erhay escuedray ecksday ascendsyay,
Andyay oudlay acclaimyay ethay arrystay egionray endsray.
Osay enwhay ickthay oudsclay enwrapyay ethay ountain’smay eadhay,
O’eryay eaven’shay expanseyay ikelay oneyay ackblay eilingcay eadspray;
Uddensay ethay Undererthay, ithway ayay ashingflay ayray,
Urstsbay oughthray ethay arknessday, andyay etslay ownday ethay ayday:
Ethay illshay ineshay outyay, ethay ocksray inyay ospectpray iseray,
Andyay eamsstray, andyay alesvay, andyay orestsfay, ikestray ethay eyesyay;
Ethay ilingsmay enescay ideway opensyay otay ethay ightsay,
Andyay allyay ethay unmeasuredyay etheryay amesflay ithway ightlay.

Utbay Oytray epulsedray, andyay atter’dscay o’eryay ethay ainsplay,
Orcedfay omfray ethay avynay, yetyay ethay ightfay aintainsmay.
Ownay everyyay Eekgray omesay ostilehay erohay ewslay,
Utbay illstay ethay oremostfay, oldbay Atrocluspay ewflay:
Asyay Areilycusyay adhay urn’dtay imhay oundray,
Arpshay inyay ishay ighthay ehay eltfay ethay iercingpay oundway;
Ethay azen-pointedbray earspay, ithway igourvay ownthray,
Ethay ighthay ansfix’dtray, andyay okebray ethay ittlebray onebay:
Eadlonghay ehay ellfay. Extnay, Oasthay asway ythay ancechay;
Ythay eastbray, unarm’dyay, eceivedray ethay Artanspay ancelay.
Ylidesphay’ artday as(ay Amphidusyay ewdray ighnay)
Ishay owblay eventedpray, andyay anspiercedtray ishay ighthay,
Oretay allyay ethay awnbray, andyay entray ethay ervesnay awayyay;
Inyay arknessday, andyay inyay eathday, ethay arriorway aylay.

Inyay equalyay armsyay otway onssay ofyay Estornay andstay,
Andyay otway oldbay othersbray ofyay ethay Ycianlay andbay:
Ybay eatgray Antilochusyay, Atymniusyay iesday,
Iercedpay inyay ethay ankflay, amentedlay youthyay! ehay ieslay,
Indkay Arismay, eedingblay inyay ishay other’sbray oundway,
Efendsday ethay eathlessbray arcasecay onyay ethay oundgray;
Uriousfay ehay iesflay, ishay urderermay otay engageyay:
Utbay odlikegay Asimedthray eventspray ishay ageray,
Etweenbay ishay armyay andyay ouldershay aimsyay ayay owblay;
Ishay armyay allsfay outingspay onyay ethay ustday elowbay:
Ehay inkssay, ithway endlessyay arknessday over’dcay o’eryay:
Andyay entsvay ishay oulsay, effusedyay ithway ushinggay oregay.

Ainslay ybay otway othersbray, usthay otway othersbray eedblay,
Arpedon’ssay iendsfray, Amisodarusyay’ eedsay;
Amisodarusyay, owhay, ybay Uriesfay edlay,
Ethay anebay ofyay enmay, abhorr’dyay Imaerachay edbray;
Ill’dskay inyay ethay artday inyay ainvay, ishay onssay expireyay,
Andyay aypay ethay orfeitfay ofyay eirthay uiltygay iresay.

Opp’dstay inyay ethay umulttay Eobulusclay ieslay,
Eneathbay Oïleusyay’ armyay, ayay ivinglay izepray;
Ayay ivinglay izepray otnay onglay ethay Ojantray oodstay;
Ethay irstythay alchionfay ankdray ishay eekingray oodblay:
Ungedplay inyay ishay oatthray ethay okingsmay eaponway ieslay;
Ackblay eathday, andyay atefay unpityingyay, ealsay ishay eyesyay.

Amidyay ethay anksray, ithway utualmay irstthay ofyay amefay,
Yconlay ethay avebray, andyay iercefay Eneleuspay amecay;
Inyay ainvay eirthay avelinsjay atyay eachyay otheryay ewflay,
Ownay, etmay inyay armsyay, eirthay eageryay ordssway eythay ewdray.
Onyay ethay umedplay estcray ofyay ishay Otianbœay oefay
Ethay aringday Yconlay aim’dyay ayay oblenay owblay;
Ethay ordsway okebray ortshay; utbay ishay, Eneleuspay edspay
Ullfay onyay ethay uncturejay ofyay ethay ecknay andyay eadhay:
Ethay eadhay, ividedday ybay ayay okestray osay ustjay,
Unghay ybay ethay inskay; ethay odybay unksay otay ustday.

O’ertakenyay Eamasnay ybay Erionmay eedsblay,
Iercedpay oughthray ethay ouldershay asyay ehay ountsmay ishay eedsstay;
Ackbay omfray ethay arcay ehay umblestay otay ethay oundgray:
Ishay immingsway eyesyay eternalyay adesshay urroundsay.

Extnay Erymasyay asway oom’dday ishay atefay otay eelfay,
Ishay open’dyay outhmay eceivedray ethay Etancray eelstay:
Eneathbay ethay ainbray ethay ointpay ayay assagepay oretay,
Ash’dcray ethay inthay onesbay, andyay own’ddray ethay eethtay inyay oregay:
Ishay outhmay, ishay eyesyay, ishay ostrilsnay, ourpay ayay oodflay;
Ehay obssay ishay oulsay outyay inyay ethay ushgay ofyay oodblay.

Asyay enwhay ethay ocksflay eglectednay ybay ethay ainsway,
Oryay idskay, oryay ambslay, ielay atter’dscay o’eryay ethay ainplay,
Ayay ooptray ofyay olvesway ethay unguardedyay argechay urveysay,
Andyay endray ethay emblingtray, unresistingyay eypray:
Usthay onyay ethay oefay ethay Eeksgray impetuousyay amecay;
Oytray edflay, unmindfulyay ofyay erhay ormerfay amefay.

Utbay illstay atyay Ectorhay odlikegay Ajaxyay aim’dyay,
Illstay, ointedpay atyay ishay eastbray, ishay avelinjay amedflay.
Ethay Ojantray iefchay, experiencedyay inyay ethay ieldfay,
O’eryay ishay oadbray ouldersshay eadspray ethay assymay ieldshay,
Observedyay ethay ormstay ofyay artsday ethay Eciansgray ourpay,
Andyay onyay ishay ucklerbay aughtcay ethay ingingray owershay:
Ehay eessay orfay Eecegray ethay alescay ofyay onquestcay iseray,
Yetyay opsstay, andyay urnstay, andyay avessay ishay ovedlay alliesyay.

Asyay enwhay ethay andhay ofyay Ovejay ayay empesttay ormsfay,
Andyay ollsray ethay oudclay otay ackenblay eavenhay ithway ormsstay,
Arkday o’eryay ethay ieldsfay ethay ascendingyay apourvay iesflay,
Andyay adesshay ethay unsay, andyay otsblay ethay oldengay iesskay:
Osay omfray ethay ipsshay, alongyay ethay uskyday ainplay,
Ireday Ightflay andyay Errortay ovedray ethay Ojantray aintray.
Evenyay Ectorhay edflay; oughthray eadshay ofyay isarrayday
Ethay ieryfay ourserscay orcedfay eirthay ordlay awayyay:
Ilewhay arfay ehindbay ishay Ojanstray allfay onfusedcay;
Edgedway inyay ethay enchtray, inyay oneyay astvay arnagecay uisedbray:
Ariotschay onyay ariotschay ollray: ethay ashingclay okesspay
Ockshay; ilewhay ethay addingmay eedsstay eakbray ortshay eirthay yokesyay.
Inyay ainvay eythay abourlay upyay ethay eepystay oundmay;
Eirthay arioteerschay ielay oamingfay onyay ethay oundgray.
Iercefay onyay ethay earray, ithway outsshay Atrocluspay iesflay;
Umultuoustay amourclay illsfay ethay ieldsfay andyay iesskay;
Ickthay iftsdray ofyay ustday involveyay eirthay apidray ightflay;
Oudsclay iseray onyay oudsclay, andyay eavenhay isyay atch’dsnay omfray ightsay.
Ethay affrightedyay eedsstay eirthay yingday ordslay astcay ownday,
Ourscay o’eryay ethay ieldsfay, andyay etchstray otay eachray ethay owntay.
Oudlay o’eryay ethay outray asway eardhay ethay ictor’svay ycray,
Erewhay ethay arway eedsblay, andyay erewhay ethay ickestthay ieday,
Erewhay orsehay andyay armsyay, andyay ariotschay ielay o’erthrownyay,
Andyay eedingblay eroeshay underyay axlesyay oangray.
Onay opstay, onay eckchay, ethay eedsstay ofyay Eleuspay ewknay:
Omfray ankbay otay ankbay ethay immortalyay ourserscay ewflay.
Igh-boundinghay o’eryay ethay ossefay, ethay irlingwhay arcay
Okessmay oughthray ethay anksray, o’ertakesyay ethay yingflay arway,
Andyay understhay afteryay Ectorhay; Ectorhay iesflay,
Atrocluspay akesshay ishay ancelay; utbay atefay eniesday.
Otnay ithway esslay oisenay, ithway esslay impetuousyay orcefay,
Ethay idetay ofyay Ojanstray urgeyay eirthay esperateday oursecay,
Anthay enwhay inyay autumnyay Ovejay ishay uryfay ourspay,
Andyay earthyay isyay oadenlay ithway incessantyay owersshay;
en(whay uiltygay ortalsmay eakbray ethay eternalyay awslay,
Oryay udgesjay, ibedbray, etraybay ethay ighteousray ausecay;)
Omfray eirthay eepday edsbay ehay idsbay ethay iversray iseray,
Andyay opensyay allyay ethay ood-gatesflay ofyay ethay iesskay:
Ethay impetuousyay orrentstay omfray eirthay illshay obeyyay,
Olewhay ieldsfay areyay own’ddray, andyay ountainsmay eptsway awayyay;
Oudlay oarsray ethay elugeday illtay ityay eetsmay ethay ainmay;
Andyay emblingtray anmay eessay allyay ishay abourslay ainvay!

Andyay ownay ethay iefchay e(thay oremostfay oopstray epell’dray)
Ackbay otay ethay ipsshay ishay estinedday ogresspray eldhay,
Orebay ownday alfhay Oytray inyay ishay esistlessray ayway,
Andyay orcedfay ethay outedray anksray otay andstay ethay ayday.
Etweenbay ethay acespay erewhay ilversay Imoissay owsflay,
Erewhay aylay ethay eetsflay, andyay erewhay ethay ampiresray oseray,
Allyay imgray inyay ustday andyay oodblay Atrocluspay andsstay,
Andyay urnstay ethay aughterslay onyay ethay onqueringcay andsbay.
Irstfay Onouspray iedday eneathbay ishay ieryfay artday,
Ichwhay iercedpay elowbay ethay ieldshay ishay aliantvay earthay.
Estorthay asway extnay, owhay awsay ethay iefchay appearyay,
Andyay ellfay ethay ictimvay ofyay ishay owardcay earfay;
Unkshray upyay ehay atsay, ithway ildway andyay aggardhay eyeyay,
Ornay oodstay otay ombatcay, ornay adhay orcefay otay yflay;
Atrocluspay ark’dmay imhay asyay ehay unn’dshay ethay arway,
Andyay ithway unmanlyyay emblingstray ookshay ethay arcay,
Andyay opp’ddray ethay owingflay einsray. Imhay ixt’tway ethay awsjay,
Ethay avelinjay icksstay, andyay omfray ethay ariotchay awsdray.
Asyay onyay ayay ockray atthay overhangsyay ethay ainmay,
Anyay angleryay, udiousstay ofyay ethay inelay andyay anecay,
Omesay ightymay ishfay awsdray antingpay otay ethay oreshay:
Otnay ithway esslay easeyay ethay arbedbay avelinjay orebay
Ethay apinggay astardday; asyay ethay earspay asway ookshay,
Ehay ellfay, andyay ifelay ishay eartlesshay eastbray orsookfay.

Extnay onyay Eryalusyay ehay iesflay; ayay onestay,
Argelay asyay ayay ockray, asway ybay ishay uryfay ownthray:
Ullfay onyay ishay owncray ethay onderouspay agmentfray ewflay,
Andyay urstbay ethay elmhay, andyay eftclay ethay eadhay inyay otway:
Onepray otay ethay oundgray ethay eathlessbray arriorway ellfay,
Andyay eathday involvedyay imhay ithway ethay adesshay ofyay ellhay.
Enthay owlay inyay ustday Epaltesyay, Echiusyay, ielay;
Ipheasyay, Evippusyay, Olymeluspay, ieday;
Amphoterusyay andyay Erymasyay ucceedsay;
Andyay astlay Epolemustlay andyay Yrespay eedblay.
Ere’erwhay ehay ovesmay, ethay owinggray aughtersslay eadspray
Inyay eapshay onyay eapshay ayay onumentmay ofyay eadday.

Enwhay ownay Arpedonsay ishay avebray iendsfray eheldbay
Ovellinggray inyay ustday, andyay aspinggay onyay ethay ieldfay,
Ithway isthay eproachray ishay yingflay osthay ehay armsway:
oh“ay ainstay otay onourhay! ohyay isgraceday otay armsyay!
Orsakefay, ingloriousyay, ethay ontendedcay ainplay;
Isthay andhay unaidedyay allshay ethay arway ustainsay:
Ethay asktay ebay inemay isthay ero’shay engthstray otay ytray,
Owhay owsmay olewhay oopstray, andyay akesmay anyay armyyay yflay.”

Ehay akespay: andyay, eakingspay, eapslay omfray offyay ethay arcay:
Atrocluspay ightslay, andyay ernlystay aitsway ethay arway.
Asyay enwhay otway ulturesvay onyay ethay ountain’smay eighthay
Oopstay ithway esoundingray inionspay otay ethay ightfay;
Eythay uffcay, eythay eartay, eythay aiseray ayay eamingscray ycray;
Ethay esertday echoesyay, andyay ethay ocksray eplyray:
Ethay arriorsway usthay opposedyay inyay armsyay, engageyay
Ithway equalyay amoursclay, andyay ithway equalyay ageray.

Ovejay iew’dvay ethay ombatcay: osewhay eventyay oreseenfay,
Ehay usthay espokebay ishay istersay andyay ishay ueenqay:
e“thay ourhay awsdray onyay; ethay estiniesday ordainyay,[245]
Ymay odlikegay onsay allshay esspray ethay Ygianphray ainplay:
Alreadyyay onyay ethay ergevay ofyay eathday ehay andsstay,
Ishay ifelay isyay owedyay otay iercefay Atrocluspay’ andshay,
Atwhay assionspay inyay ayay arent’spay eastbray ebateday!
Aysay, allshay Iyay atchsnay imhay omfray impendingyay atefay,
Andyay endsay imhay afesay otay Ycialay, istantday arfay
Omfray allyay ethay angersday andyay ethay oilstay ofyay arway;
Oryay otay ishay oomday ymay avestbray offspringyay yieldyay,
Andyay attenfay, ithway elestialcay oodblay, ethay ieldfay?”

Enthay usthay ethay oddessgay ithway ethay adiantray eyesyay:
at“whay ordsway areyay esethay, Oyay overeignsay ofyay ethay iesskay!
Ortshay isyay ethay ateday escribedpray otay ortalmay anmay;
Allshay Ovejay orfay oneyay extendyay ethay arrownay anspay,
Osewhay oundsbay ereway ix’dfay eforebay ishay aceray eganbay?
Owhay anymay onssay ofyay odsgay, oredoom’dfay otay eathday,
Eforebay oudpray Ilionyay ustmay esignray eirthay eathbray!
Ereway inethay exemptyay, ebateday ouldway iseray aboveyay,
Andyay urmuringmay owerspay ondemncay eirthay artialpay Ovejay.
Ivegay ethay oldbay iefchay ayay oriousglay atefay inyay ightfay;
Andyay enwhay ethay ascendingyay oulsay ashay ing’dway erhay ightflay,
Etlay Eepslay andyay Eathday onveycay, ybay ythay ommandcay,
Ethay eathlessbray odybay otay ishay ativenay andlay.
Ishay iendsfray andyay eoplepay, otay ishay uturefay aisepray,
Ayay arblemay ombtay andyay yramidpay allshay aiseray,
Andyay astinglay onourshay otay ishay ashesyay ivegay;
Ishay amefay is(’tay allyay ethay eadday ancay avehay) allshay ivelay.”

Eshay aidsay: ethay oud-compellerclay, overcomeyay,
Assentsyay otay atefay, andyay atifiesray ethay oomday.
Enthay ouch’dtay ithway iefgray, ethay eepingway eavenshay istill’dday
Ayay owershay ofyay oodblay o’eryay allyay ethay atalfay ieldfay:
Ethay odgay, ishay eyesyay avertingyay omfray ethay ainplay,
Amentslay ishay onsay, edestinedpray otay ebay ainslay,
Arfay omfray ethay Ycianlay oresshay, ishay appyhay ativenay eignray.
Ownay etmay inyay armsyay, ethay ombatantscay appearyay;
Eachyay eavedhay ethay ieldshay, andyay oisedpay ethay iftedlay earspay;
Omfray ongstray Atrocluspay’ andhay ethay avelinjay edflay,
Andyay ass’dpay ethay oingray ofyay aliantvay Asymedthray;
Ethay ervesnay unbracedyay onay oremay ishay ulkbay ustainsay,
Ehay allsfay, andyay allingfay itesbay ethay oodyblay ainplay.
Otway oundingsay artsday ethay Ycianlay eaderlay ewthray:
Ethay irstfay aloofyay ithway erringyay uryfay ewflay,
Ethay extnay anspiercedtray Achillesyay’ ortalmay eedstay,
Ethay enerousgay Edasuspay ofyay Ebanthay eedbray:
Ix’dfay inyay ethay oulder’sshay ointjay, ehay eel’dray aroundyay,
Oll’dray inyay ethay oodyblay ustday, andyay aw’dpay ethay ipperyslay oundgray.
Ishay uddensay allfay ethay entangledyay arnesshay okebray;
Eachyay axleyay ackledcray, andyay ethay ariotchay ookshay:
Enwhay oldbay Automedonyay, otay isengageday
Ethay artingstay ourserscay, andyay estrainray eirthay ageray,
Ividesday ethay acestray ithway ishay ordsway, andyay eedfray
Ethay encumberedyay ariotchay omfray ethay yingday eedstay:
Ethay estray ovemay onyay, obedientyay otay ethay einray:
Ethay arcay ollsray owlyslay o’eryay ethay ustyday ainplay.

Ethay oweringtay iefschay otay iercerfay ightfay advanceyay:
Andyay irstfay Arpedonsay irl’dwhay ishay eightyway ancelay,
Ichwhay o’eryay ethay arrior’sway ouldershay ooktay itsyay oursecay,
Andyay entspay inyay emptyyay airyay itsyay yingday orcefay.
Otnay osay Atrocluspay’ ever-erringnay artday;
Aim’dyay atyay ishay eastbray ityay iercedpay ayay ortalmay artpay,
Erewhay ethay ongstray ibresfay indbay ethay olidsay earthay.
Enthay asyay ethay ountainmay oakyay, oryay oplarpay alltay,
Oryay inepay it(fay astmay orfay omesay eatgray admiralyay)
Odsnay otay ethay axeyay, illtay ithway ayay oaninggray oundsay
Ityay inkssay, andyay eadsspray itsyay onourshay onyay ethay oundgray,
Usthay ellfay ethay ingkay; andyay aidlay onyay earthyay upinesay,
Eforebay ishay ariotchay etch’dstray ishay ormfay ivineday:
Ehay asp’dgray ethay ustday istain’dday ithway eamingstray oregay,
Andyay, alepay inyay eathday, aylay oaninggray onyay ethay oreshay.
Osay ieslay ayay ullbay eneathbay ethay ion’slay awspay,
Ilewhay ethay imgray avagesay indsgray ithway oamyfay awsjay
Ethay emblingtray imbslay, andyay uckssay ethay okingsmay oodblay;
Eepday oansgray, andyay ollowhay oarsray, ebellowray oughthray ethay oodway.

Enthay otay ethay eaderlay ofyay ethay Ycianlay andbay
Ethay yingday iefchay address’dyay ishay astlay ommandcay;
aucus“glay, ebay oldbay; ythay asktay ebay irstfay otay areday
