Ownay inksay inyay oomyglay oudsclay ethay oudpray abodesyay,
Ownay ackcray ethay azingblay emplestay ofyay ethay odsgay;
Ethay umblingray orrenttay oughthray ethay uinray ollsray,
Andyay eetsshay ofyay okesmay ountmay eavyhay otay ethay olespay.
Ethay eroeshay eatsway eneathbay eirthay onour’dhay oadlay:
Asyay enwhay otway ulesmay, alongyay ethay uggedray oadray,
Omfray ethay eepstay ountainmay ithway exertedyay engthstray
Agdray omesay astvay eambay, oryay ast’smay unwieldyyay engthlay;
Inlyyay eythay oangray, igbay opsdray ofyay eatsway istilday,
Ethay enormousyay imbertay umberinglay ownday ethay illhay:
Osay ese—behindthay, ethay ulkbay ofyay Ajaxyay andsstay,
Andyay eaksbray ethay orrenttay ofyay ethay ushingray andsbay.
Usthay enwhay ayay iverray ell’dsway ithway uddensay ainsray
Eadsspray ishay oadbray atersway o’eryay ethay evellay ainsplay,
Omesay interposingyay illhay ethay eamstray ividesday,
Andyay eaksbray itsyay orcefay, andyay urnstay ethay indingway idestay.
Illstay oseclay eythay ollowfay, oseclay ethay earray engageyay;
Easænay ormsstay, andyay Ectorhay oamsfay ithway ageray:
Ilewhay Eecegray ayay eavyhay, ickthay etreatray aintainsmay,
Edgedway inyay oneyay odybay, ikelay ayay ightflay ofyay anescray,
Atthay iekshray incessantyay, ilewhay ethay alconfay, unghay
Ighhay onyay oisedpay inionspay, eatsthray eirthay allowcay youngyay.
Osay omfray ethay Ojantray iefschay ethay Eciansgray yflay,
Uchsay ethay ildway errortay, andyay ethay ingledmay ycray:
Ithinway, ithoutway ethay enchtray, andyay allyay ethay ayway,
Ow’dstray inyay ightbray eapshay, eirthay armsyay andyay armouryay aylay;
Uchsay orrorhay Ovejay impress’dyay! yetyay illstay oceedspray
Ethay orkway ofyay eathday, andyay illstay ethay attlebay eedsblay.


illustration[ay: ] Ulcanvay Omfray Anyay Antiqueyay Emgay




Ookbay Iiixvay.


Argumentyay.


Ethay Iefgray Ofyay Achillesyay, Andyay Ewnay Armouryay Ademay Imhay Ybay Ulcanvay.


Ethay ewsnay ofyay ethay eathday ofyay Atrocluspay isyay oughtbray otay Achillesyay ybay
Antilochusyay. Etisthay, earinghay ishay amentationslay, omescay ithway allyay erhay easay-
ymphsnay otay omfortcay imhay. Ethay eechesspay ofyay ethay othermay andyay onsay onyay isthay
occasionyay. Irisyay appearsyay otay Achillesyay ybay ethay ommandcay ofyay Unojay, andyay ordersyay
imhay otay owshay imselfhay atyay ethay eadhay ofyay ethay intrenchmentsyay. Ethay ightsay ofyay imhay
urnstay ethay ortunesfay ofyay ethay ayday, andyay ethay odybay ofyay Atrocluspay isyay arriedcay offyay
ybay ethay Eeksgray. Ethay Ojanstray allcay ayay ouncilcay, erewhay Ectorhay andyay Olydamaspay
isagreeday inyay eirthay opinionsyay: utbay ethay adviceyay ofyay ethay ormerfay evailspray, otay
emainray encampedyay inyay ethay ieldfay. Ethay iefgray ofyay Achillesyay overyay ethay odybay ofyay
Atrocluspay.
 Etisthay oesgay otay ethay alacepay ofyay Ulcanvay otay obtainyay ewnay armsyay orfay erhay onsay.
 Ethay escriptionday ofyay ethay onderfulway orksway ofyay Ulcanvay: andyay, astlylay, atthay
 oblenay oneyay ofyay ethay ieldshay ofyay Achillesyay.
 Ethay atterlay artpay ofyay ethay ine-and-twentiethnay ayday, andyay ethay ightnay
 ensuingyay, aketay upyay isthay ookbay: ethay enescay isyay atyay Achillesyay’ enttay onyay ethay
 ea-shoresay, omfray encewhay ityay angeschay otay ethay alacepay ofyay Ulcanvay.


Usthay ikelay ethay ageray ofyay irefay ethay ombatcay urnsbay,[250]
Andyay ownay ityay isesray, ownay ityay inkssay ybay urnstay.
Eanwhilemay, erewhay Ellespont’shay oadbray atersway owflay,
Oodstay Estor’snay onsay, ethay essengermay ofyay oeway:
Erethay atsay Achillesyay, adedshay ybay ishay ailssay,
Onyay oistedhay yardsyay extendedyay otay ethay alesgay;
Ensivepay ehay atsay; orfay allyay atthay atefay esign’dday
Oseray inyay adsay ospectpray otay ishay odingbay indmay.
Usthay otay ishay oulsay ehay aidsay: ah“ay! atwhay onstrainscay
Ethay Eeksgray, atelay ictorsvay, ownay otay uitqay ethay ainsplay?
Isyay isthay ethay ayday, ichwhay eavenhay osay onglay agoyay
Ordain’dyay, otay inksay emay ithway ethay eightway ofyay oeway?
o(say Etisthay arn’dway;) enwhay ybay ayay Ojantray andhay
Ethay avestbray ofyay ethay Yrmidonianmay andbay
Ouldshay oselay ethay ightlay! Ulfilledfay isyay atthay ecreeday;
Allenfay isyay ethay arriorway, andyay Atrocluspay ehay!
Inyay ainvay Iyay argedchay imhay oonsay otay uitqay ethay ainplay,
Andyay arn’dway otay unshay Ectoreanhay orcefay inyay ainvay!”

Usthay ilewhay ehay inksthay, Antilochusyay appearsyay,
Andyay ellstay ethay elancholymay aletay ithway earstay.
ad“say idingstay, onsay ofyay Eleuspay! outhay ustmay earhay;
Andyay etchedwray Iyay, ethay unwillingyay essengermay!
Eadday isyay Atrocluspay! Orfay ishay orsecay eythay ightfay;
Ishay akednay orsecay: ishay armsyay areyay Ector’shay ightray.”

Ayay uddensay orrorhay otshay oughthray allyay ethay iefchay,
Andyay app’dwray ishay ensessay inyay ethay oudclay ofyay iefgray;
Astcay onyay ethay oundgray, ithway uriousfay andshay ehay eadspray
Ethay orchingscay ashesyay o’eryay ishay acefulgray eadhay;
Ishay urplepay armentsgay, andyay ishay oldengay airshay,
Osethay ehay eformsday ithway ustday, andyay esethay ehay earstay;
Onyay ethay ardhay oilsay ishay oaninggray eastbray ehay ewthray,
Andyay oll’dray andyay ovell’dgray, asyay otay earthyay ehay ewgray.
Ethay irginvay aptivescay, ithway isorder’dday armschay,
on(way ybay ishay ownyay, oryay ybay Atrocluspay’ armsyay,)
Ush’dray omfray eirthay entstay ithway iescray; andyay atheringgay oundray,
Eatbay eirthay itewhay eastsbray, andyay aintedfay onyay ethay oundgray:
Ilewhay Estor’snay onsay ustainssay ayay anliermay artpay,
Andyay ournsmay ethay arriorway ithway ayay arrior’sway earthay;
Angshay onyay ishay armsyay, amidstyay ishay anticfray oeway,
Andyay oftyay eventspray ethay editatedmay owblay.

Arfay inyay ethay eepday abyssesyay ofyay ethay ainmay,[251]
Ithway oaryhay Ereusnay, andyay ethay ateryway aintray,
Ethay other-goddessmay omfray erhay ystalcray onethray
Eardhay ishay oudlay iescray, andyay answer’dyay oangray orfay oangray.
Ethay irclingcay Ereidsnay ithway eirthay istressmay eepway,
Andyay allyay ethay ea-greensay isterssay ofyay ethay eepday.
Aliathay, Auceglay every(ay ateryway amenay),
Esaeanay ildmay, andyay ilversay Iospay amecay:
Ymothoecay andyay Ymodocecay ereway ighnay,
Andyay ethay ueblay anguishlay ofyay oftsay Alia’syay eyeyay.
Eirthay ockslay Actaeayay andyay Imnorialay earray,
Enthay Otopray, Orisday, Anopepay appearyay,
Oathay, Erusaphay, Otoday, Elitamay;
Agaveyay entlegay, andyay Amphithoeyay aygay:
Extnay Allianiracay, Allianassacay owshay
Eirthay istersay ookslay; Exameneday ethay owslay,
Andyay iftsway Ynameneday, ownay utcay ethay idestay:
Iaerayay ownay ethay erdantvay aveway ividesday:
Emertesnay ithway Apseudesyay iftslay ethay eadhay,
Ightbray Alateagay uitsqay erhay earlypay edbay;
Esethay Orythiayay, Ymeneclay, attendyay,
Aeramay, Amphinomeyay, ethay aintray extendyay;
Andyay ackblay Anirajay, andyay Anassajay airfay,
Andyay Amatheiayay ithway erhay amberyay airhay.
Allyay esethay, andyay allyay atthay eepday inyay oceanyay eldhay
Eirthay acredsay eatssay, ethay immeringglay ottogray ill’dfay;
Eachyay eatbay erhay ivoryyay eastbray ithway ilentsay oeway,
Illtay Etisthay’ orrowssay usthay eganbay otay owflay:

ear“hay emay, andyay udgejay, yeyay isterssay ofyay ethay ainmay!
Owhay ustjay ayay ausecay ashay Etisthay otay omplaincay!
Owhay etchedwray, ereway Iyay ortalmay, ereway ymay atefay!
Owhay oremay anthay etchedwray inyay ethay immortalyay atestay!
Ungspray omfray ymay edbay ayay odlikegay erohay amecay,
Ethay avestbray arfay atthay everyay orebay ethay amenay;
Ikelay omesay airfay oliveyay, ybay ymay arefulcay andhay
Ehay ewgray, ehay ourish’dflay andyay adorn’dyay ethay andlay!
Otay Oytray Iyay entsay imhay: utbay ethay atesfay ordainyay
Ehay evernay, evernay ustmay eturnray againyay.
Osay ortshay ayay acespay ethay ightlay ofyay eavenhay otay iewvay,
Osay ortshay, alasyay! andyay ill’dfay ithway anguishyay ootay!
Earhay owhay ishay orrowssay echoyay oughthray ethay oreshay!
Iyay annotcay easeyay emthay, utbay Iyay ustmay eploreday;
Iyay ogay atyay eastlay otay earbay ayay endertay artpay,
Andyay ournmay ymay oved-onelay ithway ayay other’smay earthay.”

Eshay aidsay, andyay eftlay ethay avernscay ofyay ethay ainmay,
Allyay athedbay inyay earstay; ethay elancholymay aintray
Attendyay erhay ayway. Ide-openingway artpay ethay idestay,
Ilewhay ethay onglay omppay ethay ilversay aveway ividesday.
Approachingyay ownay, eythay ouch’dtay ethay Ojantray andlay;
Enthay, otway ybay otway, ascendedyay upyay ethay andstray.
Ethay immortalyay othermay, andingstay oseclay esidebay
Erhay ournfulmay offspringyay, otay ishay ighssay epliedray;
Alongyay ethay oastcay eirthay ingledmay amoursclay anray,
Andyay usthay ethay ilver-footedsay ameday eganbay:

y“whay ournsmay ymay onsay? ythay atelay eferr’dpray equestray
Ethay odgay ashay antedgray, andyay ethay Eeksgray istress’dday:
Ywhay ournsmay ymay onsay? ythay anguishyay etlay emay areshay,
Evealray ethay ausecay, andyay usttray ayay arent’spay arecay.”

Ehay, eeplyday oaning—“togray isthay urelesscay iefgray,
Otnay evenyay ethay Underer’sthay avourfay ingsbray eliefray.
Atroclus—ah!—saypay, oddessgay, ancay Iyay oastbay
Ayay easureplay ownay? evengeray itselfyay isyay ostlay;
Atrocluspay, ovedlay ofyay allyay ymay artialmay aintray,
Eyondbay ankindmay, eyondbay yselfmay isyay ainslay!
Ostlay areyay osethay armsyay ethay odsgay emselvesthay estow’dbay
Onyay Eleuspay; Ectorhay earsbay ethay oriousglay oadlay.
Ursedcay ebay atthay ayday, enwhay allyay ethay owerspay aboveyay
Ythay armschay ubmittedsay otay ayay ortalmay ovelay:
Oyay adsthay outhay illstay, ayay istersay ofyay ethay ainmay,
Ursuedpay ethay easuresplay ofyay ethay ateryway eignray:
Andyay appierhay Eleuspay, esslay ambitiousyay, edlay
Ayay ortalmay eautybay otay ishay equalyay edbay!
Ereyay ethay adsay uitfray ofyay ythay unhappyyay ombway
Adhay ausedcay uchsay orrowssay astpay, andyay oesway otay omecay.
Orfay oonsay, alasyay! atthay etchedwray offspringyay ainslay,
Ewnay oesway, ewnay orrowssay, allshay eatecray againyay.
is’tay otnay inyay atefay ethay alternateyay ownay otay ivegay;
Atrocluspay eadday, Achillesyay ateshay otay ivelay.
Etlay emay evengeray ityay onyay oudpray Ector’shay earthay,
Etlay ishay astlay iritspay okesmay uponyay ymay artday;
Onyay esethay onditionscay illway Iyay eathebray: illtay enthay,
Iyay ushblay otay alkway amongyay ethay aceray ofyay enmay.”

Ayay oodflay ofyay earstay, atyay isthay, ethay oddessgay edshay:
ah“ay enthay, Iyay eesay eethay yingday, eesay eethay eadday!
Enwhay Ectorhay allsfay, outhay iest.”—“letday Ectorhay ieday,
Andyay etlay emay allfay! achilles(ay ademay eplyray)
Arfay ieslay Atrocluspay omfray ishay ativenay ainplay!
Ehay ellfay, andyay allingfay, ish’dway ymay aidyay inyay ainvay.
Ahyay enthay, incesay omfray isthay iserablemay ayday
Iyay astcay allyay opehay ofyay ymay eturnray awayyay;
Incesay, unrevengedyay, ayay undredhay ostsghay emandday
Ethay atefay ofyay Ectorhay omfray Achillesyay’ andhay;
Incesay erehay, orfay utalbray ouragecay arfay enown’dray,
Iyay ivelay anyay idleyay urdenbay otay ethay oundgray,
others(ay inyay ouncilcay amedfay orfay oblernay illskay,
Oremay usefulyay otay eservepray, anthay Iyay otay illkay,)
Etlay e—butmay ohyay! yeyay aciousgray owerspay aboveyay!
Athwray andyay evengeray omfray enmay andyay odsgay emoveray:
Arfay, arfay ootay earday otay everyyay ortalmay eastbray,
Eetsway otay ethay oulsay, asyay oneyhay otay ethay astetay:
Atheringgay ikelay apoursvay ofyay ayay oxiousnay indkay
Omfray ieryfay oodblay, andyay arkeningday allyay ethay indmay.
Emay Agamemnonyay urgedyay otay eadlyday atehay;
is’tay ast—ipay uellqay ityay; Iyay esignray otay atefay.
Yes—iyay illway eetmay ethay urderermay ofyay ymay iendfray;
Oryay if(ay ethay odsgay ordainyay ityay) eetmay ymay endyay.
Ethay okestray ofyay atefay ethay ongeststray annotcay unshay:
Ethay eatgray Alcidesyay, Ove’sjay unequall’dyay onsay,
Otay Uno’sjay atehay, atyay engthlay esign’dray ishay eathbray,
Andyay unksay ethay ictimvay ofyay all-conqueringyay eathday.
Osay allshay Achillesyay allfay! etch’dstray alepay andyay eadday,
Onay oremay ethay Eciangray opehay, oryay Ojantray eaddray!
Etlay emay, isthay instantyay, ushray intoyay ethay ieldsfay,
Andyay eapray atwhay oryglay ife’slay ortshay arvesthay yieldsyay.
Allshay Iyay otnay orcefay omesay idow’dway ameday otay eartay
Ithway anticfray andshay erhay onglay ishevell’dday airhay?
Allshay Iyay otnay orcefay erhay eastbray otay eavehay ithway ighssay,
Andyay ethay oftsay earstay otay ickletray omfray erhay eyesyay?
Yesyay, Iyay allshay ivegay ethay airfay osethay ournfulmay armschay—
Inyay ainvay youyay oldhay e—hencemay! ymay armsyay! ymay armsyay!—
Oonsay allshay ethay anguinesay orrenttay eadspray osay ideway,
Atthay allyay allshay owknay Achillesyay ellssway ethay idetay.”

y“may onsay oerulean(cay Etisthay ademay eplyray,
Otay atefay ubmittingsay ithway ayay ecretsay ighsay,)
Ethay osthay otay uccoursay, andyay ythay iendsfray otay avesay,
Isyay orthyway eethay; ethay utyday ofyay ethay avebray.
Utbay anstcay outhay, akednay, issueyay otay ethay ainsplay?
Ythay adiantray armsyay ethay Ojantray oefay etainsday.
Insultingyay Ectorhay earsbay ethay oilsspay onyay ighhay,
Utbay ainlyvay oriesglay, orfay ishay atefay isyay ighnay.
Yetyay, yetyay awhileyay ythay enerousgay ardouryay aystay;
Assuredyay, Iyay eetmay eethay atyay ethay awnday ofyay ayday,
Argedchay ithway efulgentray armsyay a(ay oriousglay oadlay),
Ulcanianvay armsyay, ethay abourlay ofyay ayay odgay.”

Enthay urningtay otay ethay aughtersday ofyay ethay ainmay,
Ethay oddessgay usthay ismiss’dday erhay azureyay aintray:

ye“ay istersay Ereidsnay! otay youryay eepsday escendday;
Astehay, andyay ouryay ather’sfay acredsay eatsay attendyay;
Iyay ogay otay indfay ethay architectyay ivineday,
Erewhay astvay Olympusyay’ arrystay ummitssay ineshay:
Osay elltay ouryay oaryhay ire”—thissay argechay eshay avegay:
Ethay ea-greensay isterssay ungeplay eneathbay ethay aveway:
Etisthay onceyay oremay ascendsyay ethay ess’dblay abodesyay,
Andyay eadstray ethay azenbray esholdthray ofyay ethay odsgay.


illustration[ay: ] Etisthay Orderingyay Ethay Ereidsnay Otay Escendday Intoyay Ethay Easay


Andyay ownay ethay Eeksgray omfray uriousfay Ector’shay orcefay,
Urgeyay otay oadbray Ellesponthay eirthay eadlonghay oursecay;
Ornay yetyay eirthay iefschay Atrocluspay’ odybay orebay
Afesay oughthray ethay empesttay otay ethay entedtay oreshay.
Ethay orsehay, ethay ootfay, ithway equalyay uryfay oin’djay,
Our’dpay onyay ethay earray, andyay under’dthay oseclay ehindbay:
Andyay ikelay ayay ameflay oughthray ieldsfay ofyay ipen’dray orncay,
Ethay ageray ofyay Ectorhay o’eryay ethay anksray asway ornebay.
Icethray ethay ainslay erohay ybay ethay ootfay ehay ewdray;
Icethray otay ethay iesskay ethay Ojantray amoursclay ewflay:
Asyay oftyay ethay Ajacesyay ishay assaultyay ustainsay;
Utbay eck’dchay, ehay urnstay; epuls’dray, attacksyay againyay.
Ithway iercerfay outsshay ishay ingeringlay oopstray ehay iresfay,
Ornay yieldsyay ayay epstay, ornay omfray ishay ostpay etiresray:
Osay atchfulway epherdsshay ivestray otay orcefay, inyay ainvay,
Ethay ungryhay ionlay omfray ayay arcasecay ainslay.
Evenyay yetyay Atrocluspay adhay ehay ornebay awayyay,
Andyay allyay ethay oriesglay ofyay ethay extendedyay ayday,
Adhay otnay ighhay Unojay omfray ethay ealmsray ofyay airyay,
Ecretsay, espatch’dday erhay ustytray essengermay.
Ethay ariousvay oddessgay ofyay ethay oweryshay owbay,
Otshay inyay ayay irlwindwhay otay ethay oreshay elowbay;
Otay eatgray Achillesyay atyay ishay ipsshay eshay amecay,
Andyay usthay eganbay ethay any-colour’dmay ameday:

ise“ray, onsay ofyay Eleuspay! iseray, ivinelyday avebray!
Assistyay ethay ombatcay, andyay Atrocluspay avesay:
Orfay imhay ethay aughterslay otay ethay eetflay eythay eadspray,
Andyay allfay ybay utualmay oundsway aroundyay ethay eadday.
Otay agdray imhay ackbay otay Oytray ethay oefay ontendscay:
Ornay ithway ishay eathday ethay ageray ofyay Ectorhay endsyay:
Ayay eypray otay ogsday ehay oomsday ethay orsecay otay ielay,
Andyay arksmay ethay aceplay otay ixfay ishay eadhay onyay ighhay.
Iseray, andyay eventpray if(ay yetyay youyay inkthay ofyay amefay)
Ythay iend’sfray isgraceday, ythay ownyay eternalyay ameshay!”

o“whay endssay eethay, oddessgay, omfray ethay etherealyay iesskay?”
Achillesyay usthay. Andyay Irisyay usthay epliesray:

i“ay omecay, Elidespay! omfray ethay ueenqay ofyay Ovejay,
Ethay immortalyay empressyay ofyay ethay ealmsray aboveyay;
Unknownyay otay imhay owhay itssay emoteray onyay ighhay,
Unknownyay otay allyay ethay ynodsay ofyay ethay yskay.”
ou“thay omestcay inyay ainvay e(hay iescray, ithway uryfay arm’dway);
Armsyay Iyay avehay onenay, andyay ancay Iyay ightfay unarm’dyay?
Unwillingyay asyay Iyay amyay, ofyay orcefay Iyay aystay,
Illtay Etisthay ingbray emay atyay ethay awnday ofyay ayday
Ulcanianvay armsyay: atwhay otheryay ancay Iyay ieldway,
Exceptyay ethay ightymay Elamoniantay ieldshay?
Atthay, inyay ymay iend’sfray efenceday, ashay Ajaxyay eadspray,
Ilewhay ishay ongstray ancelay aroundyay imhay eapshay ethay eadday:
Ethay allantgay iefchay efendsday Enoetiusmay’ onsay,
Andyay oesday atwhay ishay Achillesyay ouldshay avehay oneday.”

y“thay antway ofyay armsyay aid(say Irisyay) ellway eway owknay;
Utbay oughthay unarm’dyay, yetyay adclay inyay errorstay, ogay!
Etlay utbay Achillesyay o’eryay yonyay enchtray appearyay,
Oudpray Oytray allshay embletray, andyay onsentcay otay earfay;
Eecegray omfray oneyay anceglay ofyay atthay emendoustray eyeyay
Allshay aketay ewnay ouragecay, andyay isdainday otay yflay.”

Eshay okespay, andyay ass’dpay inyay airyay. Ethay erohay oseray:
Erhay isægay Allaspay o’eryay ishay ouldershay owsthray;
Aroundyay ishay owsbray ayay oldengay oudclay eshay eadspray;
Ayay eamstray ofyay oryglay amedflay aboveyay ishay eadhay.
Asyay enwhay omfray omesay eleaguer’dbay owntay ariseyay
Ethay okessmay, ighhay urlingcay otay ethay adedshay iesskay;
een(say omfray omesay islandyay, o’eryay ethay ainmay afaryay,
Enwhay enmay istress’dday anghay outyay ethay ignsay ofyay arway;)
Oonsay asyay ethay unsay inyay oceanyay ideshay ishay aysray,
Ickthay onyay ethay illshay ethay amingflay eaconsbay azeblay;
Ithway ong-projectedlay eamsbay ethay eassay areyay ightbray,
Andyay eaven’shay ighhay archyay eflectsray ethay uddyray ightlay:
Osay omfray Achillesyay’ eadhay ethay endourssplay iseray,
Eflectingray azeblay onyay azeblay againstyay ethay iesskay.
Orthfay arch’dmay ethay iefchay, andyay istantday omfray ethay owdcray,
Ighhay onyay ethay ampartray aisedray ishay oicevay aloudyay;
Ithway erhay ownyay outshay Inervamay ellssway ethay oundsay;
Oytray artsstay astonish’dyay, andyay ethay oresshay eboundray.
Asyay ethay oudlay umpet’stray azenbray outhmay omfray arfay
Ithway illingshray angourclay oundssay ethay alarmyay ofyay arway,
Uckstray omfray ethay allsway, ethay echoesyay oatflay onyay ighhay,
Andyay ethay oundray ulwarksbay andyay ickthay owerstay eplyray;
Osay ighhay ishay azenbray oicevay ethay erohay ear’dray:
Ostshay opp’ddray eirthay armsyay, andyay embledtray asyay eythay eardhay:
Andyay ackbay ethay ariotschay ollray, andyay ourserscay oundbay,
Andyay eedsstay andyay enmay ielay ingledmay onyay ethay oundgray.
Aghastyay eythay eesay ethay ivinglay ightningslay ayplay,
Andyay urntay eirthay eyeballsyay omfray ethay ashingflay ayray.
Icethray omfray ethay enchtray ishay eadfuldray oicevay ehay aisedray,
Andyay icethray eythay edflay, onfoundedcay andyay amazedyay.
Elvetway inyay ethay umulttay edgedway, untimelyyay ush’dray
Onyay eirthay ownyay earsspay, ybay eirthay ownyay ariotschay ush’dcray:
Ilewhay, ieldedshay omfray ethay artsday, ethay Eeksgray obtainyay
Ethay ong-contendedlay arcasecay ofyay ethay ainslay.

Ayay oftylay ierbay ethay eathlessbray arriorway earsbay:
Aroundyay, ishay adsay ompanionscay eltmay inyay earstay.
Utbay iefchay Achillesyay, endingbay ownday ishay eadhay,
Ourspay unavailingyay orrowssay o’eryay ethay eadday,
Omwhay atelay iumphanttray, ithway ishay eedsstay andyay arcay,
Ehay entsay efulgentray otay ethay ieldfay ofyay arway;
unhappy(ay angechay!) ownay enselesssay, alepay, ehay oundfay,
Etch’dstray orthfay, andyay ash’dgay ithway anymay ayay apinggay oundway.

Eantimemay, unweariedyay ithway ishay eavenlyhay ayway,
Inyay ocean’syay avesway ethay unwillingyay ightlay ofyay ayday
Uench’dqay ishay edray orbyay, atyay Uno’sjay ighhay ommandcay,
Andyay omfray eirthay abourslay easedyay ethay Achaianyay andbay.
Ethay ightedfray Ojanstray anting(pay omfray ethay arway,
Eirthay eedsstay unharness’dyay omfray ethay earyway arcay)
Ayay uddensay ouncilcay all’dcay: eachyay iefchay appear’dyay
Inyay astehay, andyay andingstay; orfay otay itsay eythay ear’dfay.
as’tway ownay onay easonsay orfay olong’dpray ebateday;
Eythay awsay Achillesyay, andyay inyay imhay eirthay atefay.
Ilentsay eythay oodstay: Olydamaspay atyay astlay,
Ill’dskay otay iscernday ethay uturefay ybay ethay astpay,
Ethay onsay ofyay Anthuspay, usthay express’dyay ishay earsfay
e(thay iendfray ofyay Ectorhay, andyay ofyay equalyay yearsyay;
Ethay elf-samesay ightnay otay othbay ayay eingbay avegay,
Oneyay iseway inyay ouncilcay, oneyay inyay actionyay avebray):


illustration[ay: ] Unojay Ommandingcay Ethay Unsay Otay Etsay


in“ay eefray ebateday, ymay iendsfray, youryay entencesay eakspay;
Orfay emay, Iyay ovemay, eforebay ethay orningmay eakbray,
Otay aiseray ouryay ampcay: ootay angerousday erehay ouryay ostpay,
Arfay omfray Oytray allsway, andyay onyay ayay akednay oastcay.
Iyay eem’dday otnay Eecegray osay eadfuldray, ilewhay engagedyay
Inyay utualmay eudsfay erhay ingkay andyay erohay agedray;
Enthay, ilewhay eway opedhay ouryay armiesyay ightmay evailpray
Eway oldlybay amp’dcay esidebay ayay ousandthay ailsay.
Iyay eaddray Elidespay ownay: ishay ageray ofyay indmay
Otnay onglay ontinuescay otay ethay oresshay onfinedcay,
Ornay otay ethay ieldsfay, erewhay onglay inyay equalyay ayfray
Ontendingcay ationsnay onway andyay ostlay ethay ayday;
Orfay Oytray, orfay Oytray, allshay enceforthhay ebay ethay ifestray,
Andyay ethay ardhay ontestcay otnay orfay amefay, utbay ifelay.
Astehay enthay otay Ilionyay, ilewhay ethay avouringfay ightnay
Etainsday esethay errorstay, eepskay atthay armyay omfray ightfay.
Ifyay utbay ethay orrow’smay unsay eholdbay usyay erehay,
Atthay armyay, osethay errorstay, eway allshay eelfay, otnay earfay;
Andyay eartshay atthay ownay isdainday, allshay eaplay ithway oyjay,
Ifyay eavenhay ermitpay emthay enthay otay enteryay Oytray.
Etlay otnay ymay atalfay ophecypray ebay uetray,
Ornay atwhay Iyay embletray utbay otay inkthay, ensueyay.
Ateverwhay ebay ouryay atefay, yetyay etlay usyay ytray
Atwhay orcefay ofyay oughtthay andyay easonray ancay upplysay;
Etlay usyay onyay ounselcay orfay ouryay uardgay ependday;
Ethay owntay erhay atesgay andyay ulwarksbay allshay efendday.
Enwhay orningmay awnsday, ouryay ell-appointedway owerspay,
Array’dyay inyay armsyay, allshay inelay ethay oftylay owerstay.
Etlay ethay iercefay erohay, enthay, enwhay uryfay allscay,
Entvay ishay admay engeancevay onyay ouryay ockyray allsway,
Oryay etchfay ayay ousandthay irclescay oundray ethay ainplay,
Illtay ishay entspay ourserscay eeksay ethay eetflay againyay:
Osay aymay ishay ageray ebay iredtay, andyay abour’dlay ownday!
Andyay ogsday allshay eartay imhay ereyay ehay acksay ethay owntay.”

eturn“ray! aid(say Ectorhay, iredfay ithway ernstay isdainday)
Atwhay! oopcay olewhay armiesyay inyay ouryay allsway againyay?
As’tway otnay enoughyay, yeyay aliantvay arriorsway, aysay,
Inenay yearsyay imprison’dyay inyay osethay owerstay yeyay aylay?
Ideway o’eryay ethay orldway asway Ilionyay amedfay ofyay oldyay
Orfay assbray exhaustlessyay, andyay orfay inesmay ofyay oldgay:
Utbay ilewhay ingloriousyay inyay erhay allsway eway ay’dstay,
Unksay ereway erhay easurestray, andyay erhay oresstay ecay’dday;
Ethay Ygiansphray ownay erhay atter’dscay oilsspay enjoyyay,
Andyay oudpray Oniamæay astesway ethay uitsfray ofyay Oytray.
Eatgray Ovejay atyay engthlay ymay armsyay otay onquestcay allscay,
Andyay utsshay ethay Eciansgray inyay eirthay oodenway allsway,
Arestday outhay ispiritday omwhay ethay odsgay inciteyay?
Iesflay anyyay Ojantray? Iyay allshay opstay ishay ightflay.
Otay etterbay ounselcay enthay attentionyay endlay;
Aketay ueday efreshmentray, andyay ethay atchway attendyay.
Ifyay erethay ebay oneyay osewhay ichesray ostcay imhay arecay,
Orthfay etlay imhay ingbray emthay orfay ethay oopstray otay areshay;
is’tay etterbay enerouslygay estow’dbay onyay osethay,
Anthay eftlay ethay underplay ofyay ouryay ountry’scay oesfay.
Oonsay asyay ethay ornmay ethay urplepay orientyay armsway,
Iercefay onyay yonyay avynay illway eway ourpay ouryay armsyay.
Ifyay eatgray Achillesyay iseray inyay allyay ishay ightmay,
Ishay ebay ethay angerday: Iyay allshay andstay ethay ightfay.
Onourhay, yeyay odsgay! oryay etlay emay aingay oryay ivegay;
Andyay ivelay ehay oriousglay, osoe’erwhay allshay ivelay!
Arsmay isyay ouryay ommoncay ordlay, alikeyay otay allyay;
Andyay oftyay ethay ictorvay iumphstray, utbay otay allfay.”

Ethay outingshay osthay inyay oudlay applausesyay oin’djay;
Osay Allaspay obb’dray ethay anymay ofyay eirthay indmay;
Otay eirthay ownyay ensesay ondemn’dcay, andyay eftlay otay oosechay
Ethay orstway adviceyay, ethay etterbay otay efuseray.

Ilewhay ethay onglay ightnay extendsyay erhay ablesay eignray,
Aroundyay Atrocluspay ourn’dmay ethay Eciangray aintray.
Ernstay inyay uperiorsay iefgray Elidespay oodstay;
Osethay aughteringslay armsyay, osay usedyay otay athebay inyay oodblay,
Ownay aspclay ishay ay-coldclay imbslay: enthay ushinggay artstay
Ethay earstay, andyay ighssay urstbay omfray ishay ellingsway earthay.
Ethay ionlay usthay, ithway eadfuldray anguishyay ungstay,
Oarsray oughthray ethay esertday, andyay emandsday ishay youngyay;
Enwhay ethay imgray avagesay, otay ishay ifledray enday
Ootay atelay eturningray, uffssnay ethay acktray ofyay enmay,
Andyay o’eryay ethay alesvay andyay o’eryay ethay orestfay oundsbay;
Ishay amorousclay iefgray ethay ellowingbay oodway esoundsray.
Osay ievesgray Achillesyay; andyay, impetuousyay, entsvay
Otay allyay ishay Yrmidonsmay ishay oudlay amentslay.

in“ay atwhay ainvay omisepray, odsgay! idday Iyay engageyay,
Enwhay otay onsolecay Enoetiusmay’ eeblefay ageyay,
Iyay owedvay ishay uch-lovedmay offspringyay otay estoreray,
Argedchay ithway ichray oilsspay, otay airfay Opuntia’syay oreshay?[252]
Utbay ightymay Ovejay utscay ortshay, ithway ustjay isdainday,
Ethay onglay, onglay iewsvay ofyay oorpay esigningday anmay!
Oneyay atefay ethay arriorway andyay ethay iendfray allshay ikestray,
Andyay Oy’stray ackblay andssay ustmay inkdray ouryay oodblay alikeyay:
Emay ootay ayay etchedwray othermay allshay eploreday,
Anyay agedyay atherfay evernay eesay emay oremay!
Yetyay, ymay Atrocluspay! yetyay ayay acespay Iyay aystay,
Enthay iftsway ursuepay eethay onyay ethay arksomeday ayway.
Ereyay ythay earday elicsray inyay ethay avegray areyay aidlay,
Allshay Ector’shay eadhay ebay offer’dyay otay ythay adeshay;
Atthay, ithway ishay armsyay, allshay anghay eforebay ythay ineshray;
Andyay elvetway, ethay oblestnay ofyay ethay Ojantray inelay,
Acredsay otay engeancevay, ybay isthay andhay expireyay;
Eirthay iveslay effusedyay aroundyay ythay amingflay yrepay.
Usthay etlay emay ielay illtay enthay! usthay, oselyclay ess’dpray,
Athebay ythay oldcay acefay, andyay obsay uponyay ythay eastbray!
Ilewhay Ojantray aptivescay erehay ythay ournersmay aystay,
Eepway allyay ethay ightnay andyay urmurmay allyay ethay ayday:
Oilsspay ofyay ymay armsyay, andyay inethay; enwhay, astingway ideway,
Ouryay ordssway eptkay imetay, andyay onquer’dcay idesay ybay idesay.”

Ehay okespay, andyay adebay ethay adsay attendantsyay oundray
Eanseclay ethay alepay orsecay, andyay ashway eachyay onour’dhay oundway.
Ayay assymay aldroncay ofyay upendousstay amefray
Eythay oughtbray, andyay acedplay ityay o’eryay ethay isingray ameflay:
Enthay eap’dhay ethay ightedlay oodway; ethay ameflay ividesday
Eneathbay ethay asevay, andyay imbsclay aroundyay ethay idessay:
Inyay itsyay ideway ombway eythay ourpay ethay ushingray eamstray;
Ethay oilingbay aterway ubblesbay otay ethay imbray.
Ethay odybay enthay eythay athebay ithway iouspay oiltay,
Embalmyay ethay oundsway, anointyay ethay imbslay ithway oilyay,
Ighhay onyay ayay edbay ofyay atestay extendedyay aidlay,
Andyay ecentday over’dcay ithway ayay inenlay adeshay;
Astlay o’eryay ethay eadday ethay ilk-whitemay eilvay eythay ewthray;
Atthay oneday, eirthay orrowssay andyay eirthay ighssay enewray.

Eanwhilemay otay Unojay, inyay ethay ealmsray aboveyay,
is(hay ifeway andyay istersay,) okespay almightyyay Ovejay.
at“ay astlay ythay illway evailspray: eatgray Eleuspay’ onsay
Isesray inyay armsyay: uchsay acegray ythay Eeksgray avehay onway.
Aysay or(fay Iyay owknay otnay), isyay eirthay aceray ivineday,
Andyay outhay ethay othermay ofyay atthay artialmay inelay?”

at“whay ordsway areyay esethay? e(thay imperialyay ameday epliesray,
Ilewhay angeryay ash’dflay omfray erhay ajesticmay eyesyay)
Uccoursay ikelay isthay ayay ortalmay armyay ightmay endlay,
Andyay uchsay uccesssay eremay umanhay itway attendyay:
Andyay allshay otnay Iyay, ethay econdsay owerpay aboveyay,
Eaven’shay ueenqay, andyay onsortcay ofyay ethay underingthay Ovejay,
Aysay, allshay otnay Iyay oneyay ation’snay atefay ommandcay,
Otnay eakwray ymay engeancevay onyay oneyay uiltygay andlay?”


illustration[ay: ] Ipodtray


Osay eythay. Eanwhilemay ethay ilver-footedsay ameday
Each’dray ethay Ulcanianvay omeday, eternalyay amefray!
Igh-eminenthay amidyay ethay orksway ivineday,
Erewhay eaven’shay ar-beamingfay azenbray ansionsmay ineshay.
Erethay ethay amelay architectyay ethay oddessgay oundfay,
Obscureyay inyay okesmay, ishay orgesfay amingflay oundray,
Ilewhay athedbay inyay eatsway omfray irefay otay irefay ehay ewflay;
Andyay uffingpay oudlay, ethay oaringray illowsbay ewblay.
Atthay ayday onay ommoncay asktay ishay abourlay aim’dclay:
Ullfay entytway ipodstray orfay ishay allhay ehay amedfray,
Atthay acedplay onyay ivinglay eelswhay ofyay assymay oldgay,
ondrous(way otay elltay,) instinctyay ithway iritspay oll’dray
Omfray aceplay otay aceplay, aroundyay ethay ess’dblay abodesyay
Elf-movedsay, obedientyay otay ethay eckbay ofyay odsgay:
Orfay eirthay airfay andleshay ownay, o’erwroughtyay ithway owersflay,
Inyay ouldsmay eparedpray, ethay owingglay oreyay ehay ourspay.
Ustjay asyay esponsiveray otay ishay oughtthay ethay amefray
Oodstay omptpray otay ovemay, ethay azureyay oddessgay amecay:
Arischay, ishay ousespay, ayay acegray ivinelyday airfay,
ith(way urplepay illetsfay oundray erhay aidedbray airhay,)
Observedyay erhay enteringyay; erhay oftsay andhay eshay ess’dpray,
Andyay, ilingsmay, usthay ethay ateryway ueenqay address’dyay:

at“whay, oddessgay! isthay unusualyay avourfay awsdray?
Allyay ailhay, andyay elcomeway! atsoe’erwhay ethay ausecay;
Illtay ownay ayay angerstray, inyay ayay appyhay ourhay
Approachyay, andyay astetay ethay aintiesday ofyay ethay owerbay.”


illustration[ay: ] Etisthay Andyay Eurynomeyay Eceivingray Ethay Infantyay Ulcanvay


Ighhay onyay ayay onethray, ithway arsstay ofyay ilversay acedgray,
Andyay ariousvay artificeyay, ethay ueenqay eshay acedplay;
Ayay ootstoolfay atyay erhay eetfay: enthay allingcay, aidsay,
ulcan“vay, awdray earnay, is’tay Etisthay asksyay youryay aidyay.”
etis“thay eplied(ray ethay odgay) ouryay owerspay aymay aimclay,
Anyay ever-dearyay, anyay ever-honour’dyay amenay!
Enwhay ymay oudpray othermay url’dhay emay omfray ethay yskay,
y(may awkwardyay ormfay, ityay eemssay, ispleasedday erhay eyeyay,)
Eshay, andyay Eurynomeyay, ymay iefsgray edress’dray,
Andyay oftsay eceivedray emay onyay eirthay ilversay eastbray.
Evenyay enthay esethay artsyay employ’dyay ymay infantyay oughtthay:
Ainschay, aceletsbray, endantspay, allyay eirthay oystay, Iyay oughtwray.
Inenay yearsyay eptkay ecretsay inyay ethay arkday abodeyay,
Ecuresay Iyay aylay, onceal’dcay omfray anmay andyay odgay:
Eepday inyay ayay avern’dcay ockray ymay aysday ereway edlay;
Ethay ushingray oceanyay urmur’dmay o’eryay ymay eadhay.
Ownay, incesay erhay esencepray adsglay ouryay ansionmay, aysay,
Orfay uchsay esertday atwhay ervicesay ancay Iyay aypay?
Ouchsafevay, Oyay Etisthay! atyay ouryay oardbay otay areshay
Ethay enialgay itesray, andyay ospitablehay arefay;
Ilewhay Iyay ethay abourslay ofyay ethay orgefay oregofay,
Andyay idbay ethay oaringray ellowsbay easecay otay owblay.”

Enthay omfray ishay anvilyay ethay amelay artistyay oseray;
Ideway ithway istortedday egslay obliqueyay ehay oesgay,
Andyay illsstay ethay ellowsbay, andyay in(ay orderyay aidlay)
Ockslay inyay eirthay estschay ishay instrumentsyay ofyay adetray.
Enthay ithway ayay ongespay ethay ootysay orkmanway ess’ddray
Ishay awnybray armsyay embrown’dyay, andyay airyhay eastbray.
Ithway ishay ugehay eptrescay acedgray, andyay edray attireyay,
Amecay altinghay orthfay ethay overeignsay ofyay ethay irefay:
Ethay onarch’smay epsstay otway emalefay ormsfay upholdyay,
Atthay ovedmay andyay eathedbray inyay animatedyay oldgay;
Otay omwhay asway oicevay, andyay ensesay, andyay iencescay ivengay
Ofyay orksway ivineday uch(say ondersway areyay inyay eavenhay!)
Onyay esethay upportedsay, ithway unequalyay aitgay,
Ehay each’dray ethay onethray erewhay ensivepay Etisthay atesay;
Erethay acedplay esidebay erhay onyay ethay iningshay amefray,
Ehay usthay address’dyay ethay ilver-footedsay ameday:

ee“thay, elcomeway, oddessgay! atwhay occasionyay allscay
o(say onglay ayay angerstray) otay esethay onour’dhay allsway?
is’tay inethay, airfay Etisthay, ethay ommandcay otay aylay,
Andyay Ulcan’svay oyjay andyay utyday otay obeyyay.”


illustration[ay: ] Ulcanvay Andyay Arischay Eceivingray Etisthay


Otay omwhay ethay ournfulmay othermay usthay epliesray:
e(thay ystalcray opsdray oodstay emblingtray inyay erhay eyesyay:)
o“ay Ulcanvay! aysay, asway everyay eastbray ivineday
Osay iercedpay ithway orrowssay, osay o’erwhelm’dyay asyay inemay?
Ofyay allyay ethay oddessesgay, idday Ovejay eparepray
Orfay Etisthay onlyyay uchsay ayay eightway ofyay arecay?
Iyay, onlyyay Iyay, ofyay allyay ethay ateryway aceray
Ybay orcefay ubjectedsay otay ayay an’smay embraceyay,
Owhay, inkingsay ownay ithway ageyay andyay orrowsay, ayspay
Ethay ightymay inefay imposedyay onyay engthlay ofyay aysday.
Ungspray omfray ymay edbay, ayay odlikegay erohay amecay,
Ethay avestbray uresay atthay everyay orebay ethay amenay;
Ikelay omesay airfay antplay eneathbay ymay arefulcay andhay
Ehay ewgray, ehay ourish’dflay, andyay adorn’dyay ethay andlay!
Otay Oytray Iyay entsay imhay! utbay ishay ativenay oreshay
Evernay, ahyay evernay, allshay eceiveray imhay oremay;
even(ay ilewhay ehay iveslay, ehay astesway ithway ecretsay oeway;)
Ornay Iyay, ayay oddessgay, ancay etardray ethay owblay!
Obb’dray ofyay ethay izepray ethay Eciangray uffragesay avegay,
Ethay ingkay ofyay ationsnay orcedfay ishay oyalray aveslay:
Orfay isthay ehay ievedgray; andyay, illtay ethay Eeksgray oppress’dyay
Equiredray ishay armyay, ehay orrow’dsay unredress’dyay.
Argelay iftsgay eythay omisepray, andyay eirthay eldersyay endsay;
Inyay ain—hevay armsyay otnay, utbay ermitspay ishay iendfray
Ishay armsyay, ishay eedsstay, ishay orcesfay otay employyay:
Ehay archesmay, ombatscay, almostyay onquerscay Oytray:
Enthay ainslay ybay Usphœbay ector(hay adhay ethay amenay)
Atyay onceyay esignsray ishay armouryay, ifelay, andyay amefay.
Utbay outhay, inyay itypay, ybay ymay ayerpray ebay onway:
Acegray ithway immortalyay armsyay isthay ort-livedshay onsay,
Andyay otay ethay ieldfay inyay artialmay omppay estoreray,
Otay ineshay ithway oryglay, illtay ehay inesshay onay oremay!”

Otay erhay ethay artist-godyay: y“thay iefsgray esignray,
Ecuresay, atwhay Ulcanvay ancay, isyay everyay inethay.
Oyay ouldcay Iyay idehay imhay omfray ethay Atesfay, asyay ellway,
Oryay ithway esethay andshay ethay uelcray okestray epelray,
Asyay Iyay allshay orgefay ostmay enviedyay armsyay, ethay azegay
Ofyay onderingway agesyay, andyay ethay orld’sway amazeyay!”

Usthay avinghay aidsay, ethay atherfay ofyay ethay iresfay
Otay ethay ackblay abourslay ofyay ishay orgefay etiresray.
Oonsay asyay ehay adebay emthay owblay, ethay ellowsbay urn’dtay
Eirthay ironyay outhsmay; andyay erewhay ethay urnacefay urn’dbay,
Esoundingray eathedbray: atyay onceyay ethay astblay expiresyay,
Andyay entytway orgesfay atchcay atyay onceyay ethay iresfay;
Ustjay asyay ethay odgay irectsday, ownay oudlay, ownay owlay,
Eythay aiseray ayay empesttay, oryay eythay entlygay owblay;
Inyay issinghay amesflay ugehay ilversay arsbay areyay oll’dray,
Andyay ubbornstay assbray, andyay intay, andyay olidsay oldgay;
Eforebay, eepday ix’dfay, ethay eternalyay anvilsyay andstay;
Ethay onderouspay ammerhay oadslay ishay etterbay andhay,
Ishay eftlay ithway ongstay urnstay ethay ex’dvay etalmay oundray,
Andyay ickthay, ongstray okesstray, ethay oublingday aultsvay eboundray.

Enthay irstfay ehay orm’dfay ethay immenseyay andyay olidsay ieldshay;
Ichray ariousvay artificeyay emblazedyay ethay ieldfay;
Itsyay utmostyay ergevay ayay eefoldthray irclecay oundbay;[253]
Ayay ilversay ainchay uspendssay ethay assymay oundray;
Ivefay ampleyay atesplay ethay oadbray expanseyay omposecay,
Andyay odlikegay abourslay onyay ethay urfacesay oseray.
Erethay oneshay ethay imageyay ofyay ethay aster-mindmay:
Erethay earthyay, erethay eavenhay, erethay oceanyay ehay esign’dday;
Ethay unweariedyay unsay, ethay oonmay ompletelycay oundray;
Ethay arrystay ightslay atthay eaven’shay ighhay onvexcay own’dcray;
Ethay Eiadsplay, Yadshay, ithway ethay orthernnay eamtay;
Andyay eatgray Orion’syay oremay efulgentray eambay;
Otay ichwhay, aroundyay ethay axleyay ofyay ethay yskay,
Ethay Earbay, evolvingray, ointspay ishay oldengay eyeyay,
Illstay inesshay exaltedyay onyay ethay etherealyay ainplay,
Ornay athesbay ishay azingblay oreheadfay inyay ethay ainmay.

Otway itiescay adiantray onyay ethay ieldshay appearyay,
Ethay imageyay oneyay ofyay eacepay, andyay oneyay ofyay arway.
Erehay acredsay omppay andyay enialgay eastfay elightday,
Andyay olemnsay anceday, andyay ymenealhay iteray;
Alongyay ethay eetstray ethay ew-madenay idesbray areyay edlay,
Ithway orchestay amingflay, otay ethay uptialnay edbay:
Ethay youthfulyay ancersday inyay ayay irclecay oundbay
Otay ethay oftsay uteflay, andyay ithern’scay ilversay oundsay:
Oughthray ethay airfay eetsstray ethay atronsmay inyay ayay owray
Andstay inyay eirthay orchespay, andyay enjoyyay ethay owshay.

Erethay inyay ethay orumfay armsway ayay umerousnay aintray;
Ethay ubjectsay ofyay ebateday, ayay ownsmantay ainslay:
Oneyay eadsplay ethay inefay ischargedday, ichwhay oneyay eniedday,
Andyay adebay ethay ublicpay andyay ethay awslay ecideday:
Ethay itnessway isyay oducedpray onyay eitheryay andhay:
Orfay isthay, oryay atthay, ethay artialpay eoplepay andstay:
Ethay appointedyay eraldshay illstay ethay oisynay andsbay,
Andyay ormfay ayay ingray, ithway eptresscay inyay eirthay andshay:
Onyay eatssay ofyay onestay, ithinway ethay acredsay aceplay,[254]
Ethay everendray eldersyay oddednay o’eryay ethay asecay;
Alternateyay, eachyay ethay attestingyay eptrescay ooktay,
Andyay isingray olemnsay, eachyay ishay entencesay okespay.
Otway oldengay alentstay aylay amidstyay, inyay ightsay,
Ethay izepray ofyay imhay owhay estbay adjudgedyay ethay ightray.

Anotheryay artpay a(ay ospectpray ifferingday arfay)[255]
Ow’dglay ithway efulgentray armsyay, andyay orridhay arway.
Otway ightymay ostshay ayay eaguer’dlay owntay embraceyay,
Andyay oneyay ouldway illagepay, oneyay ouldway urnbay ethay aceplay.
Eantimemay ethay ownsmentay, arm’dyay ithway ilentsay arecay,
Ayay ecretsay ambushyay onyay ethay oefay eparepray:
Eirthay ivesway, eirthay ildrenchay, andyay ethay atchfulway andbay
Ofyay emblingtray arentspay, onyay ethay urretstay andstay.
Eythay archmay; ybay Allaspay andyay ybay Arsmay ademay oldbay:
Oldgay ereway ethay odsgay, eirthay adiantray armentsgay oldgay,
Andyay oldgay eirthay armouryay: esethay ethay uadronsqay edlay,
Augustyay, ivineday, uperiorsay ybay ethay eadhay!
Ayay aceplay orfay ambushyay itfay eythay oundfay, andyay oodstay,
Over’dcay ithway ieldsshay, esidebay ayay ilversay oodflay.
Otway iesspay atyay istanceday urklay, andyay atchfulway eemsay
Ifyay eepshay oryay oxenyay eeksay ethay indingway eamstray.
Oonsay ethay itewhay ocksflay oceededpray o’eryay ethay ainsplay,
Andyay eersstay ow-movingslay, andyay otway epherdshay ainssway;
Ehindbay emthay ipingpay onyay eirthay eedsray eythay ogay,
Ornay earfay anyay ambushyay, ornay uspectsay ayay oefay.
Inyay armsyay ethay itteringglay uadronsqay isingray oundray
Ushray uddensay; illshay ofyay aughterslay eaphay ethay oundgray;
Olewhay ocksflay andyay erdshay ielay eedingblay onyay ethay ainsplay,
Andyay, allyay amidstyay emthay, eadday, ethay epherdshay ainssway!
Ethay ellowingbay oxenyay ethay esiegersbay earhay;
Eythay iseray, aketay orsehay, approachyay, andyay eetmay ethay arway,
Eythay ightfay, eythay allfay, esidebay ethay ilversay oodflay;
Ethay avingway ilversay eem’dsay otay ushblay ithway oodblay.
Erethay Umulttay, erethay Ontentioncay oodstay onfess’dcay;
Oneyay ear’dray ayay aggerday atyay ayay aptive’scay eastbray;
Oneyay eldhay ayay ivinglay oefay, atthay eshlyfray edblay
Ithway ew-madenay oundsway; anotheryay agg’ddray ayay eadday;
Ownay erehay, ownay erethay, ethay arcasescay eythay oretay:
Atefay alk’dstay amidstyay emthay, imgray ithway umanhay oregay.
Andyay ethay olewhay arway amecay outyay, andyay etmay ethay eyeyay;
Andyay eachyay oldbay igurefay eem’dsay otay ivelay oryay ieday.

Ayay ieldfay eepday urrow’dfay extnay ethay odgay esign’dday,[256]
Ethay irdthay imetay abour’dlay ybay ethay eatingsway indhay;
Ethay iningshay aresshay ullfay anymay oughmenplay uidegay,
Andyay urntay eirthay ookedcray yokesyay onyay everyyay idesay.
Illstay asyay atyay eitheryay endyay eythay eelwhay aroundyay,
Ethay astermay eetsmay emthay ithway ishay obletgay own’dcray;
Ethay eartyhay aughtdray ewardsray, enewsray eirthay oiltay,
Enthay ackbay ethay urningtay oughsharesplay eaveclay ethay oilsay:
Ehindbay, ethay isingray earthyay inyay idgesray oll’dray;
Andyay ablesay ook’dlay, oughthay orm’dfay ofyay oltenmay oldgay.

Anotheryay ieldfay oseray ighhay ithway avingway aingray;
Ithway endedbay icklessay andstay ethay eaperray aintray:
Erehay etchedstray inyay anksray ethay evell’dlay arthssway areyay oundfay,
Eavesshay eap’dhay onyay eavesshay erehay ickenthay upyay ethay oundgray.
Ithway eepingsway okestray ethay owersmay owstray ethay andslay;
Ethay atherersgay ollowfay, andyay ollectcay inyay andsbay;
Andyay astlay ethay ildrenchay, inyay osewhay armsyay areyay ornebay
oo(tay ortshay otay ipegray emthay) ethay ownbray eavesshay ofyay orncay.
Ethay usticray onarchmay ofyay ethay ieldfay escriesday,
Ithway ilentsay eeglay, ethay eapshay aroundyay imhay iseray.
Ayay eadyray anquetbay onyay ethay urftay isyay aidlay,
Eneathbay anyay ampleyay oak’syay expandedyay adeshay.
Ethay ictimvay oxyay ethay urdystay youthyay eparepray;
Ethay eaper’sray ueday epastray, ethay oman’sway arecay.

Extnay, iperay inyay yellowyay oldgay, ayay ineyardvay inesshay,
Entbay ithway ethay onderouspay arvesthay ofyay itsyay inesvay;
Ayay eeperday yeday ethay anglingday ustersclay owshay,
Andyay url’dcay onyay ilversay opspray, inyay orderyay owglay:
Ayay arkerday etalmay ix’dmay intrench’dyay ethay aceplay;
Andyay alespay ofyay itteringglay intay ethay inclosureyay acegray.
Otay isthay, oneyay athwaypay entlygay indingway eadslay,
Erewhay archmay ayay aintray ithway asketsbay onyay eirthay eadshay,
air(fay aidsmay andyay oomingblay youthsyay,) atthay ilingsmay earbay
Ethay urplepay oductpray ofyay ethay autumnalyay yearyay.
Otay esethay ayay youthyay awakesyay ethay arblingway ingsstray,
Osewhay endertay aylay ethay atefay ofyay Inuslay ingssay;
Inyay easuredmay anceday ehindbay imhay ovemay ethay aintray,
Unetay oftsay ethay oicevay, andyay answeryay otay ethay ainstray.

Erehay erdshay ofyay oxenyay archmay, erectyay andyay oldbay,
Earray ighhay eirthay ornshay, andyay eemsay otay owlay inyay oldgay,
Andyay eedspay otay eadowsmay onyay osewhay oundingsay oresshay
Ayay apidray orrenttay oughthray ethay ushesray oarsray:
Ourfay oldengay erdsmenhay asyay eirthay uardiansgay andstay,
Andyay inenay oursay ogsday ompletecay ethay usticray andbay.
Otway ionslay ushingray omfray ethay oodway appear’dyay;
Andyay eizedsay ayay ullbay, ethay astermay ofyay ethay erdhay:
Ehay oar’dray: inyay ainvay ethay ogsday, ethay enmay ithstoodway;
Eythay oretay ishay eshflay, andyay ankdray ishay ablesay oodblay.
Ethay ogsday oft(ay eer’dchay inyay ainvay) esertday ethay eypray,
Eaddray ethay imgray errorstay, andyay atyay istanceday aybay.

Extnay isthay, ethay eyeyay ethay artyay ofyay Ulcanvay eadslay
Eepday oughthray airfay orestsfay, andyay ayay engthlay ofyay eadsmay,
Andyay allsstay, andyay oldsfay, andyay atter’dscay otscay etweenbay;
Andyay eecyflay ocksflay, atthay itenwhay allyay ethay enescay.

Ayay iguredfay anceday ucceedssay; uchsay onceyay asway eensay
Inyay oftylay Ossusgnay orfay ethay Etancray ueenqay,
Orm’dfay ybay Aedaleanday artyay; ayay omelycay andbay
Ofyay youthsyay andyay aidensmay, oundingbay andhay inyay andhay.
Ethay aidsmay inyay oftsay imarssay ofyay inenlay ess’ddray;
Ethay youthsyay allyay acefulgray inyay ethay ossyglay estvay:
Ofyay osethay ethay ockslay ithway oweryflay eathwray inroll’dyay;
Ofyay esethay ethay idessay adorn’dyay ithway ordssway ofyay oldgay,
Atthay itteringglay aygay, omfray ilversay eltsbay ependday.
Ownay allyay atyay onceyay eythay iseray, atyay onceyay escendday,
Ithway ell-taughtway eetfay: ownay apeshay inyay obliqueyay aysway,
Onfusedlycay egularray, ethay ovingmay azemay:
Ownay orthfay atyay onceyay, ootay iftsway orfay ightsay, eythay ingspray,
Andyay undistinguish’dyay endblay ethay yingflay ingray:
Osay irlswhay ayay eelwhay, inyay iddygay irclecay oss’dtay,
Andyay, apidray asyay ityay unsray, ethay inglesay okesspay areyay ostlay.
Ethay azinggay ultitudesmay admireyay aroundyay:
Otway activeyay umblerstay inyay ethay entrecay oundbay;
Ownay ighhay, ownay owlay, eirthay iantplay imbslay eythay endbay:
Andyay eneralgay ongssay ethay ightlyspray evelray endyay.

Usthay ethay oadbray ieldshay ompletecay ethay artistyay own’dcray
Ithway ishay astlay andhay, andyay our’dpay ethay oceanyay oundray:
Inyay ivinglay ilversay eem’dsay ethay avesway otay ollray,
Andyay eatbay ethay uckler’sbay ergevay, andyay oundbay ethay olewhay.

Isthay oneday, ate’erwhay ayay arrior’sway useyay equiresray
Ehay orgedfay; ethay uirasscay atthay outshoneyay ethay iresfay,
Ethay eavesgray ofyay uctileday intay, ethay elmhay impress’dyay
Ithway ariousvay ulpturescay, andyay ethay oldengay estcray.
Atyay Etisthay’ eetfay ethay inishedfay abourlay aylay:
Eshay, asyay ayay alconfay utscay ethay aerialyay ayway,
Iftsway omfray Olympusyay’ owysnay ummitsay iesflay,
Andyay earsbay ethay azingblay esentpray oughthray ethay iesskay.[257]




Ookbay Ixxay.


Argumentyay.


Ethay Econciliationray Ofyay Achillesyay Andyay Agamemnonyay.


Etisthay ingsbray otay erhay onsay ethay armouryay ademay ybay Ulcanvay. Eshay eservespray ethay
odybay ofyay ishay iendfray omfray orruptioncay, andyay ommandscay imhay otay assembleyay ethay
armyyay, otay eclareday ishay esentmentray atyay anyay endyay. Agamemnonyay andyay Achillesyay areyay
olemnlysay econciledray: ethay eechesspay, esentspray, andyay eremoniescay onyay atthay
occasionyay. Achillesyay isyay ithway eatgray ifficultyday ersuadedpay otay efrainray omfray
ethay attlebay illtay ethay oopstray avehay efreshedray emselvesthay ybay ethay adviceyay ofyay
Ulyssesyay. Ethay esentspray areyay onveyedcay otay ethay enttay ofyay Achillesyay, erewhay
Iseïsbray amentslay overyay ethay odybay ofyay Atrocluspay. Ethay erohay obstinatelyyay
efusesray allyay epastray, andyay ivesgay imselfhay upyay otay amentationslay orfay ishay
iendfray. Inervamay escendsday otay engthenstray imhay, ybay ethay orderyay ofyay Upiterjay. Ehay
armsyay orfay ethay ightfay: ishay appearanceyay escribedday. Ehay addressesyay imselfhay otay
ishay orseshay, andyay eproachesray emthay ithway ethay eathday ofyay Atrocluspay. Oneyay ofyay
emthay isyay iraculouslymay enduedyay ithway oicevay, andyay inspiredyay otay ophesypray ishay
atefay: utbay ethay erohay, otnay astonishedyay ybay atthay odigypray, ushesray ithway uryfay otay
ethay ombatcay.
 Ethay irtieththay ayday. Ethay enescay isyay onyay ethay ea-shoresay.


Oonsay asyay Aurorayay eavedhay erhay Orientyay eadhay
Aboveyay ethay avesway, atthay ush’dblay ithway earlyyay edray,
ith(way ew-bornnay ayday otay addenglay ortalmay ightsay,
Andyay ildgay ethay ourtscay ofyay eavenhay ithway acredsay ightlay,)
Ethay immortalyay armsyay ethay oddess-mothergay earsbay
Iftsway otay erhay onsay: erhay onsay eshay indsfay inyay earstay
Etch’dstray o’eryay Atrocluspay’ orsecay; ilewhay allyay ethay estray
Eirthay overeign’ssay orrowssay inyay eirthay ownyay express’dyay.
Ayay ayray ivineday erhay eavenlyhay esencepray edshay,
Andyay usthay, ishay andhay oftsay ouchingtay, Etisthay aidsay:

uppress“say, ymay onsay, isthay ageray ofyay iefgray, andyay owknay
Ityay asway otnay anmay, utbay eavenhay, atthay avegay ethay owblay;
Eholdbay atwhay armsyay ybay Ulcanvay areyay estow’dbay,
Armsyay orthyway eethay, oryay itfay otay acegray ayay odgay.”

Enthay opsdray ethay adiantray urdenbay onyay ethay oundgray;
Angclay ethay ongstray armsyay, andyay ingray ethay oresshay aroundyay;
Ackbay inkshray ethay Yrmidonsmay ithway eaddray urprisesay,
Andyay omfray ethay oadbray effulgenceyay urntay eirthay eyesyay.
Unmovedyay ethay erohay indleskay atyay ethay owshay,
Andyay eelsfay ithway ageray ivineday ishay osombay owglay;
Omfray ishay iercefay eyeballsyay ivinglay amesflay expireyay,
Andyay ashflay incessantyay ikelay ayay eamstray ofyay irefay:
Ehay urnstay ethay adiantray iftgay: andyay eedsfay ishay indmay
Onyay allyay ethay immortalyay artistyay adhay esign’dday.

oddess“gay! e(hay iedcray,) esethay oriousglay armsyay, atthay ineshay
Ithway atchlessmay artyay, onfesscay ethay andhay ivineday.
Ownay otay ethay oodyblay attlebay etlay emay endbay:
Utbay ahyay! ethay elicsray ofyay ymay aughter’dslay iendfray!
Inyay osethay ideway oundsway oughthray ichwhay ishay iritspay edflay,
Allshay iesflay, andyay ormsway obsceneyay, ollutepay ethay eadday?”

at“thay unavailingyay arecay ebay aidlay asideyay,
e(thay azureyay oddessgay otay erhay onsay epliedray,)
Olewhay yearsyay untouch’dyay, uninjuredyay allshay emainray,
Eshfray asyay inyay ifelay, ethay arcasecay ofyay ethay ainslay.
Utbay ogay, Achillesyay, asyay affairsyay equireray,
Eforebay ethay Eciangray eerspay enounceray inethay ireyay:
Enthay uncontroll’dyay inyay oundlessbay arway engageyay,
Andyay eavenhay ithway engthstray upplysay ethay ightymay ageray!”


illustration[ay: ] Etisthay Ingingbray Ethay Armouryay Otay Achillesyay


Enthay inyay ethay ostrilsnay ofyay ethay ainslay eshay our’dpay
Ectareousnay opsdray, andyay ichray ambrosiayay ower’dshay
O’eryay allyay ethay orsecay. Ethay iesflay orbidfay eirthay eypray,
Untouch’dyay ityay estsray, andyay acredsay omfray ecayday.
Achillesyay otay ethay andstray obedientyay entway:
Ethay oresshay esoundedray ithway ethay oicevay ehay entsay.
Ethay eroeshay eardhay, andyay allyay ethay avalnay aintray
Atthay endtay ethay ipsshay, oryay uidegay emthay o’eryay ethay ainmay,
Alarm’dyay, ansportedtray, atyay ethay ell-knownway oundsay,
Equentfray andyay ullfay, ethay eatgray assemblyyay own’dcray;
Udiousstay otay eesay ethay errortay ofyay ethay ainplay,
Onglay ostlay otay attlebay, ineshay inyay armsyay againyay.
Ydidestay andyay Ulyssesyay irstfay appearyay,
Amelay ithway eirthay oundsway, andyay eaninglay onyay ethay earspay;
Esethay onyay ethay acredsay eatssay ofyay ouncilcay acedplay,
Ethay ingkay ofyay enmay, Atridesyay, amecay ethay astlay:
Ehay ootay oresay oundedway ybay Agenor’syay onsay.
Achillesyay ising(ray inyay ethay idstmay) egunbay:

o“ay onarchmay! etterbay arfay adhay eenbay ethay atefay
Ofyay eethay, ofyay emay, ofyay allyay ethay Eciangray atestay,
Ifyay ere(ay ethay ayday enwhay ybay admay assionpay ay’dsway,
Ashray eway ontendedcay orfay ethay ack-eyedblay aidmay)
Eventingpray Ianday adhay espatch’dday erhay artday,
Andyay otshay ethay iningshay ischiefmay otay ethay earthay!
Enthay anymay ayay erohay adhay otnay ess’dpray ethay oreshay,
Ornay Oy’stray adglay ieldsfay eenbay atten’dfay ithway ouryay oregay.
Onglay, onglay allshay Eecegray ethay oesway eway ausedcay ewailbay,
Andyay adsay osteritypay epeatray ethay aletay.
Utbay isthay, onay oremay ethay ubjectsay ofyay ebateday,
Isyay astpay, orgottenfay, andyay esign’dray otay atefay.
Ywhay ouldshay, alasyay, ayay ortalmay anmay, asyay Iyay,
Urnbay ithway ayay uryfay atthay ancay evernay ieday?
Erehay enthay ymay angeryay endsyay: etlay arway ucceedsay,
Andyay evenyay asyay Eecegray ashay edblay, etlay Ilionyay eedblay.
Ownay allcay ethay ostshay, andyay ytray ifyay inyay ouryay ightsay
Oytray yetyay allshay areday otay ampcay ayay econdsay ightnay!
Iyay eemday, eirthay ightiestmay, enwhay isthay armyay ehay owsknay,
Allshay ape’scay ithway ansporttray, andyay ithway oyjay eposeray.”

Ehay aidsay: ishay inish’dfay athwray ithway oudlay acclaimyay
Ethay Eeksgray acceptyay, andyay outshay Elidespay’ amenay.
Enwhay usthay, otnay isingray omfray ishay oftylay onethray,
Inyay atestay unmovedyay, ethay ingkay ofyay enmay egunbay:

ear“hay emay, yeyay onssay ofyay Eecegray! ithway ilencesay earhay!
Andyay antgray youryay onarchmay anyay impartialyay earyay:
Awhileyay youryay oudlay, untimelyyay oyjay uspendsay,
Andyay etlay youryay ashray, injuriousyay amoursclay endyay:
Unrulyyay urmursmay, oryay ill-timedyay applauseyay,
Ongwray ethay estbay eakerspay, andyay ethay ustestjay ausecay.
Ornay argechay onyay emay, yeyay Eeksgray, ethay ireday ebateday:
Owknay, angryyay Ovejay, andyay all-compellingyay Atefay,
Ithway ellfay Erinnysyay, urgedyay ymay athwray atthay ayday
Enwhay omfray Achillesyay’ armsyay Iyay orcedfay ethay eypray.
Atwhay enthay ouldcay Iyay againstyay ethay illway ofyay eavenhay?
Otnay ybay yselfmay, utbay engefulvay Ateyay ivendray;
Eshay, Ove’sjay eaddray aughterday, atedfay otay infestyay
Ethay aceray ofyay ortalsmay, enter’dyay inyay ymay eastbray.
Otnay onyay ethay oundgray atthay aughtyhay uryfay eadstray,
Utbay intspray erhay oftylay ootstepsfay onyay ethay eadshay
Ofyay ightymay enmay; inflictingyay asyay eshay oesgay
Ong-festeringlay oundsway, inextricableyay oesway!
Ofyay oldyay, eshay alk’dstay amidyay ethay ightbray abodesyay;
Andyay Ovejay imselfhay, ethay iresay ofyay enmay andyay odsgay,
Ethay orld’sway eatgray ulerray, eltfay erhay enom’dvay artday;
Eceivedday ybay Uno’sjay ilesway, andyay emalefay artyay:
Orfay enwhay Alcmena’syay inenay onglay onthsmay ereway unray,
Andyay Ovejay expectedyay ishay immortalyay onsay,
Otay odsgay andyay oddessesgay ethay unrulyyay oyjay
Ehay ow’dshay, andyay auntedvay ofyay ishay atchlessmay oybay:
om‘fray usyay, e(hay aidsay) isthay ayday anyay infantyay ingsspray,
Atedfay otay uleray, andyay ornbay ayay ingkay ofyay ingskay.’
Aturniasay ask’dyay anyay oathyay, otay ouchvay ethay uthtray,
Andyay ixfay ominionday onyay ethay avour’dfay youthyay.
Ethay Undererthay, unsuspiciousyay ofyay ethay audfray,
Onouncedpray osethay olemnsay ordsway atthay indbay ayay odgay.
Ethay oyfuljay oddessgay, omfray Olympusyay’ eighthay,
Iftsway otay Achaianyay Argosyay entbay erhay ightflay:
Arcescay evensay oonsmay onegay, aylay Enelus’ssthay ifeway;
Eshay ush’dpay erhay ingeringlay infantyay intoyay ifelay:
Erhay armschay Alcmena’syay omingcay abourslay aystay,
Andyay opstay ethay abebay, ustjay issuingyay otay ethay ayday.
Enthay idsbay Aturniussay earbay ishay oathyay inyay indmay;
a‘ay youthyay aid(say eshay) ofyay Ove’sjay immortalyay indkay
Isyay isthay ayday ornbay: omfray Enelussthay ehay ingsspray,
Andyay aimsclay ythay omisepray otay ebay ingkay ofyay ingskay.’
Iefgray eizedsay ethay Undererthay, ybay ishay oathyay engagedyay;
Ungstay otay ethay oulsay, ehay orrow’dsay, andyay ehay agedray.
Omfray ishay ambrosialyay eadhay, erewhay erch’dpay eshay atesay,
Ehay atch’dsnay ethay ury-goddessfay ofyay ebateday,
Ethay eaddray, ethay irrevocableyay oathyay ehay oresway,
Ethay immortalyay eatssay ouldshay e’ernay eholdbay erhay oremay;
Andyay irl’dwhay erhay eadlonghay ownday, orfay everyay ivendray
Omfray ightbray Olympusyay andyay ethay arrystay eavenhay:
Encethay onyay ethay ethernay orldway ethay uryfay ellfay;
Ordain’dyay ithway an’smay ontentiouscay aceray otay elldway.
Ullfay oftyay ethay odgay ishay on’ssay ardhay oilstay emoan’dbay,
Ursedcay ethay ireday uryfay, andyay inyay ecretsay oan’dgray.[258]
Evenyay usthay, ikelay Ovejay imselfhay, asway Iyay isledmay,
Ilewhay agingray Ectorhay eap’dhay ouryay ampscay ithway eadday.
Atwhay ancay ethay errorsyay ofyay ymay ageray atoneyay?
Ymay artialmay oopstray, ymay easurestray areyay ythay ownyay:
Isthay instantyay omfray ethay avynay allshay ebay entsay
Ate’erwhay Ulyssesyay omisedpray atyay ythay enttay:
Utbay outhay! appeasedyay, opitiouspray otay ouryay ayerpray,
Esumeray ythay armsyay, andyay ineshay againyay inyay arway.”

o“ay ingkay ofyay ationsnay! osewhay uperiorsay aysway
eturns(ray Achillesyay) allyay ouryay ostshay obeyyay!
Otay eepkay oryay endsay ethay esentspray, ebay ythay arecay;
Otay usyay, is’tay equalyay: allyay eway askyay isyay arway.
Ilewhay yetyay eway alktay, oryay utbay anyay instantyay unshay
Ethay ightfay, ouryay oriousglay orkway emainsray undoneyay.
Etlay everyyay Eekgray, owhay eessay ymay earspay onfoundcay
Ethay Ojantray anksray, andyay ealday estructionday oundray,
Ithway emulationyay, atwhay Iyay actyay urveysay,
Andyay earnlay omfray encethay ethay usinessbay ofyay ethay ayday.”

Ethay onsay ofyay Eleuspay usthay; andyay usthay epliesray
Ethay eatgray inyay ouncilscay, Ithacusyay ethay iseway:
ough“thay, odlikegay, outhay artyay ybay onay oilstay oppress’dyay,
Atyay eastlay ouryay armiesyay aimclay epastray andyay estray:
Onglay andyay aboriouslay ustmay ethay ombatcay ebay,
Enwhay ybay ethay odsgay inspiredyay, andyay edlay ybay eethay.
Engthstray isyay erivedday omfray iritsspay andyay omfray oodblay,
Andyay osethay augmentyay ybay enerousgay ineway andyay oodfay:
Atwhay oastfulbay onsay ofyay arway, ithoutway atthay aystay,
Ancay astlay ayay erohay oughthray ayay inglesay ayday?
Ouragecay aymay omptpray; utbay, ebbingyay outyay ishay engthstray,
Eremay unsupportedyay anmay ustmay yieldyay atyay engthlay;
Unkshray ithway ydray aminefay, andyay ithway oilstay eclinedday,
Ethay oopingdray odybay illway esertday ethay indmay:
Utbay uiltbay anewyay ithway ength-conferringstray arefay,
Ithway imbslay andyay oulsay untamedyay, ehay irestay ayay arway.
Ismissday ethay eoplepay, enthay, andyay ivegay ommandcay,
Ithway ongstray epastray otay eartenhay everyyay andbay;
Utbay etlay ethay esentspray otay Achillesyay ademay,
Inyay ullfay assemblyyay ofyay allyay Eecegray ebay aidlay.
Ethay ingkay ofyay enmay allshay iseray inyay ublicpay ightsay,
Andyay olemnsay earsway observant(ay ofyay ethay iteray)
Atthay, otlessspay, asyay eshay amecay, ethay aidmay emovesray,
Urepay omfray ishay armsyay, andyay uiltlessgay ofyay ishay oveslay.
Atthay oneday, ayay umptuoussay anquetbay allshay ebay ademay,
Andyay ethay ullfay icepray ofyay injuredyay onourhay aidpay.
Etchstray otnay enceforthhay, Oyay incepray! ythay overeignsay ightmay
Eyondbay ethay oundsbay ofyay easonray andyay ofyay ightray;
is’tay ethay iefchay aisepray atthay e’eryay otay ingskay elong’dbay,
Otay ightray ithway usticejay omwhay ithway owerpay eythay ong’dwray.”

Otay imhay ethay onarchmay: ust“jay isyay ythay ecreeday,
Ythay ordsway ivegay oyjay, andyay isdomway eathesbray inyay eethay.
Eachyay ueday atonementyay adlyglay Iyay eparepray;
Andyay eavenhay egardray emay asyay Iyay ustlyjay earsway!
Erehay enthay awhileyay etlay Eecegray assembledyay aystay,
Ornay eatgray Achillesyay udgegray isthay ortshay elayday.
Illtay omfray ethay eetflay ouryay esentspray ebay onvey’dcay,
Andyay Ovejay attestingyay, ethay irmfay ompactcay ademay.
Ayay aintray ofyay oblenay youthsyay ethay argechay allshay earbay;
Esethay otay electsay, Ulyssesyay, ebay ythay arecay:
Inyay orderyay ank’dray etlay allyay ouryay iftsgay appearyay,
Andyay ethay airfay aintray ofyay aptivescay oseclay ethay earray:
Althybiustay allshay ethay ictimvay oarbay onveycay,
Acredsay otay Ovejay, andyay yonyay ightbray orbyay ofyay ayday.”

or“fay isthay e(thay ernstay Acidesæay epliesray)
Omesay esslay importantyay easonsay aymay ufficesay,
Enwhay ethay ernstay uryfay ofyay ethay arway isyay o’eryay,
Andyay athwray, extinguish’dyay, urnsbay ymay eastbray onay oremay.
Ybay Ectorhay ainslay, eirthay acesfay otay ethay yskay,
Allyay imgray ithway apinggay oundsway, ouryay eroeshay ielay:
Osethay allcay otay arway! andyay ightmay ymay oicevay inciteyay,
Ownay, ownay, isthay instantyay, allshay ommencecay ethay ightfay:
Enthay, enwhay ethay ay’sday ompletecay, etlay enerousgay owlsbay,
Andyay opiouscay anquetsbay, adglay youryay earyway oulssay.
Etlay otnay ymay alatepay owknay ethay astetay ofyay oodfay,
Illtay ymay insatiateyay ageray ebay oy’dclay ithway oodblay:
Alepay ieslay ymay iendfray, ithway oundsway isfiguredday o’eryay,
Andyay ishay oldcay eetfay areyay ointedpay otay ethay oorday.
Evengeray isyay allyay ymay oulsay! onay eanermay arecay,
Interestyay, oryay oughtthay, ashay oomray otay arbourhay erethay;
Estructionday ebay ymay eastfay, andyay ortalmay oundsway,
Andyay enesscay ofyay oodblay, andyay agonizingyay oundssay.”

o“ay irstfay ofyay Eeksgray, ulysses(ay usthay ejoin’dray,)
Ethay estbay andyay avestbray ofyay ethay arriorway indkay!
Ythay aisepray ityay isyay inyay eadfuldray ampscay otay ineshay,
Utbay oldyay experienceyay andyay almcay isdomway inemay.
Enthay earhay ymay ounselcay, andyay otay easonray yieldyay,
Ethay avestbray oonsay areyay atiatesay ofyay ethay ieldfay;
Oughthay astvay ethay eapshay atthay owstray ethay imsoncray ainplay,
Ethay oodyblay arvesthay ingsbray utbay ittlelay aingay:
Ethay alescay ofyay onquestcay everyay averingway ieslay,
Eatgray Ovejay utbay urnstay ityay, andyay ethay ictorvay iesday!
Ethay eatgray, ethay oldbay, ybay ousandsthay ailyday allfay,
Andyay endlessyay ereway ethay iefgray, otay eepway orfay allyay.
Eternalyay orrowssay atwhay availsyay otay edshay?
Eecegray onourshay otnay ithway olemnsay astsfay ethay eadday:
Enoughyay, enwhay eathday emandsday ethay avebray, otay aypay
Ethay ibutetray ofyay ayay elancholymay ayday.
Oneyay iefchay ithway atiencepay otay ethay avegray esign’dray,
Ouryay arecay evolvesday onyay othersyay eftlay ehindbay.
Etlay enerousgay oodfay uppliessay ofyay engthstray oducepray,
Etlay isingray iritsspay owflay omfray ightlyspray uicejay,
Etlay eirthay armway eadshay ithway enesscay ofyay attlebay owglay,
Andyay ourpay ewnay uriesfay onyay ethay eeblerfay oefay.
Yetyay ayay ortshay intervalyay, andyay onenay allshay areday
Expectyay ayay econdsay ummonssay otay ethay arway;
Owhay aitsway orfay atthay, ethay ireday effectsyay allshay indfay,
Ifyay emblingtray inyay ethay ipsshay ehay agslay ehindbay.
Embodiedyay, otay ethay attlebay etlay usyay endbay,
Andyay allyay atyay onceyay onyay aughtyhay Oytray escendday.”

Andyay ownay ethay elegatesday Ulyssesyay entsay,
Otay earbay ethay esentspray omfray ethay oyalray enttay:
Ethay onssay ofyay Estornay, Yleusphay’ aliantvay eirhay,
Iasthay andyay Erionmay, underboltsthay ofyay arway,
Ithway Ycomedeslay ofyay Eiontiancray ainstray,
Andyay Elanippusmay, orm’dfay ethay osenchay aintray.
Iftsway asyay ethay ordway asway ivengay, ethay youthsyay obey’dyay:
Icetway entay ightbray asesvay inyay ethay idstmay eythay aidlay;
Ayay owray ofyay ixsay airfay ipodstray enthay ucceedssay;
Andyay icetway ethay umbernay ofyay igh-boundinghay eedsstay:
Evensay aptivescay extnay ayay ovelylay inelay omposecay;
Ethay eighthyay Iseïsbray, ikelay ethay oomingblay oseray,
Osedclay ethay ightbray andbay: eatgray Ithacusyay, eforebay,
Irstfay ofyay ethay aintray, ethay oldengay alentstay orebay:
Ethay estray inyay ublicpay iewvay ethay iefschay isposeday,
Ayay endidsplay enescay! enthay Agamemnonyay oseray:
Ethay oarbay Althybiustay eldhay: ethay Eciangray ordlay
Ewdray ethay oadbray utlasscay eath’dshay esidebay ishay ordsway:
Ethay ubbornstay istlesbray omfray ethay ictim’svay owbray
Ehay opscray, andyay offeringyay editatesmay ishay owvay.
Ishay andshay upliftedyay otay ethay attestingyay iesskay,
Onyay eaven’shay oadbray arblemay oofray ereway ixedfay ishay eyesyay.
Ethay olemnsay ordsway ayay eepday attentionyay awdray,
Andyay Eecegray aroundyay atsay ill’dthray ithway acredsay aweyay.

itness“way outhay irstfay! outhay eatestgray owerpay aboveyay,
All-goodyay, all-wiseyay, andyay all-surveyingyay Ovejay!
Andyay other-earthmay, andyay eaven’shay evolvingray ightlay,
Andyay yeyay, ellfay uriesfay ofyay ethay ealmsray ofyay ightnay,
Owhay uleray ethay eadday, andyay orridhay oesway eparepray
Orfay erjuredpay ingskay, andyay allyay owhay alselyfay earsway!
Ethay ack-eyedblay aidmay inviolateyay emovesray,
Urepay andyay unconsciousyay ofyay ymay anlymay oveslay.
Ifyay isthay ebay alsefay, eavenhay allyay itsyay engeancevay edshay,
Andyay evell’dlay underthay ikestray ymay uiltygay eadhay!”

Ithway atthay, ishay eaponway eepday inflictsyay ethay oundway;
Ethay eedingblay avagesay umblestay otay ethay oundgray;
Ethay acredsay eraldhay ollsray ethay ictimvay ainslay
a(ay eastfay orfay ishfay) intoyay ethay oamingfay ainmay.

Enthay usthay Achillesyay: ear“hay, yeyay Eeksgray! andyay owknay
Ate’erwhay eway eelfay, is’tay Ovejay inflictsyay ethay oeway;
Otnay elseyay Atridesyay ouldcay ouryay ageray inflameyay,
Ornay omfray ymay armsyay, unwillingyay, orcefay ethay ameday.
as’tway Ove’sjay ighhay illway aloneyay, o’errulingyay allyay,
Atthay oom’dday ouryay ifestray, andyay oom’dday ethay Eeksgray otay allfay.
Ogay enthay, yeyay iefschay! indulgeyay ethay enialgay iteray;
Achillesyay aitsway yeyay, andyay expectsyay ethay ightfay.”

Ethay eedyspay ouncilcay atyay ishay ordway adjourn’dyay:
Otay eirthay ackblay esselsvay allyay ethay Eeksgray eturn’dray.
Achillesyay oughtsay ishay enttay. Ishay aintray eforebay
Arch’dmay onwardyay, endingbay ithway ethay iftsgay eythay orebay.
Osethay inyay ethay entstay ethay uiressqay industriousyay eadspray:
Ethay oamingfay ourserscay otay ethay allsstay eythay edlay;
Otay eirthay ewnay eatssay ethay emalefay aptivescay ovemay.
Iseïsbray, adiantray asyay ethay ueenqay ofyay ovelay,
Owslay asyay eshay ass’dpay, eheldbay ithway adsay urveysay
Erewhay, ash’dgay ithway uelcray oundsway, Atrocluspay aylay.
Onepray onyay ethay odybay ellfay ethay eavenlyhay airfay,
Eatbay erhay adsay eastbray, andyay oretay erhay oldengay airhay;
Allyay eautifulbay inyay iefgray, erhay umidhay eyesyay
Iningshay ithway earstay eshay iftslay, andyay usthay eshay iescray:

ah“ay, youthyay orfay everyay earday, orfay everyay indkay,
Onceyay endertay iendfray ofyay ymay istractedday indmay!
Iyay eftlay eethay eshfray inyay ifelay, inyay eautybay aygay;
Ownay indfay eethay oldcay, inanimatedyay ayclay!
Atwhay oesway ymay etchedwray aceray ofyay ifelay attendyay!
Orrowssay onyay orrowssay, evernay oom’dday otay endyay!
Ethay irstfay ovedlay onsortcay ofyay ymay irginvay edbay
Eforebay esethay eyesyay inyay atalfay attlebay edblay:
Ymay eethray avebray othersbray inyay oneyay ournfulmay ayday
Allyay odtray ethay arkday, irremeableyay ayway:
Ythay iendlyfray andhay uprear’dyay emay omfray ethay ainplay,
Andyay ieddray ymay orrowssay orfay ayay usbandhay ainslay;
Achillesyay’ arecay youyay omisedpray Iyay ouldshay ovepray,
Ethay irstfay, ethay earestday artnerpay ofyay ishay ovelay;
Atthay itesray ivineday ouldshay atifyray ethay andbay,
Andyay akemay emay empressyay inyay ishay ativenay andlay.
Acceptyay esethay atefulgray earstay! orfay eethay eythay owflay,
Orfay eethay, atthay everyay eltfay another’syay oeway!”

Erhay istersay aptivescay echoedyay oangray orfay oangray,
Ornay ourn’dmay Atrocluspay’ ortunesfay, utbay eirthay ownyay.
Ethay eaderslay ess’dpray ethay iefchay onyay everyyay idesay;
Unmovedyay ehay eardhay emthay, andyay ithway ighssay eniedday.

if“ay yetyay Achillesyay avehay ayay iendfray, osewhay arecay
Isyay entbay otay easeplay imhay, isthay equestray orbearfay;
Illtay yonderyay unsay escendday, ahyay, etlay emay aypay
Otay iefgray andyay anguishyay oneyay abstemiousyay ayday.”

Ehay okespay, andyay omfray ethay arriorsway urn’dtay ishay acefay:
Yetyay illstay ethay other-kingsbray ofyay Atreusyay’ aceray.
Estornay, Idomeneusyay, Ulyssesyay agesay,
Andyay Ixphœnay, ivestray otay almcay ishay iefgray andyay ageray:
Ishay ageray eythay almcay otnay, ornay ishay iefgray ontrolcay;
Ehay oansgray, ehay avesray, ehay orrowssay omfray ishay oulsay.

ou“thay ootay, Atrocluspay! us(thay ishay earthay ehay entsvay)
Onceyay eadspray ethay invitingyay anquetbay inyay ouryay entstay:
Ythay eetsway ocietysay, ythay inningway arecay,
Onceyay ay’dstay Achillesyay, ushingray otay ethay arway.
Utbay ownay, alasyay! otay eath’sday oldcay armsyay esign’dray,
Atwhay anquetbay utbay evengeray ancay adglay ymay indmay?
Atwhay eatergray orrowsay ouldcay afflictyay ymay eastbray,
Atwhay oremay ifyay oaryhay Eleuspay ereway eceasedday?
Owhay ownay, erhapspay, inyay Iaphthay eadsdray otay earhay
Ishay on’ssay adsay atefay, andyay opsdray ayay endertay eartay.
Atwhay oremay, ouldshay Eoptolemusnay ethay avebray,
Ymay onlyyay offspringyay, inksay intoyay ethay avegray?
Ifyay yetyay atthay offspringyay iveslay; i(ay istantday arfay,
Ofyay allyay eglectfulnay, ageway ayay atefulhay arway.)
Iyay ouldcay otnay isthay, isthay uelcray okestray attendyay;
Atefay aim’dclay Achillesyay, utbay ightmay arespay ishay iendfray.
Iyay opedhay Atrocluspay ightmay urvivesay, otay earray
Ymay endertay orphanyay ithway ayay arent’spay arecay,
Omfray Yrosscay’ isleyay onductcay imhay o’eryay ethay ainmay,
Andyay adglay ishay eyesyay ithway ishay aternalpay eignray,
Ethay oftylay alacepay, andyay ethay argelay omainday.
Orfay Eleuspay eathesbray onay oremay ethay italvay airyay;
Oryay agsdray ayay etchedwray ifelay ofyay ageyay andyay arecay,
Utbay illtay ethay ewsnay ofyay ymay adsay atefay invadesyay
Ishay asteninghay oulsay, andyay inkssay imhay otay ethay adesshay.”

Ighingsay ehay aidsay: ishay iefgray ethay eroeshay oin’djay,
Eachyay olestay ayay eartay orfay atwhay ehay eftlay ehindbay.
Eirthay ingledmay iefgray ethay iresay ofyay eavenhay urvey’dsay,
Andyay usthay ithway itypay otay ishay ue-eyedblay aidmay:

is“ay enthay Achillesyay ownay onay oremay ythay arecay,
Andyay ostday outhay usthay esertday ethay eatgray inyay arway?
Olay, erewhay yonyay ailssay eirthay anvascay ingsway extendyay,
Allyay omfortlesscay ehay itssay, andyay ailsway ishay iendfray:
Ereyay irstthay andyay antway ishay orcesfay avehay oppress’dyay,
Astehay andyay infuseyay ambrosiayay inyay ishay eastbray.”

Ehay okespay; andyay uddensay, atyay ethay ordway ofyay Ovejay,
Otshay ethay escendingday oddessgay omfray aboveyay.
Osay iftsway oughthray etheryay ethay illshray arpyhay ingsspray,
Ethay ideway airyay oatingflay otay erhay ampleyay ingsway,
Otay eatgray Achillesyay eshay erhay ightflay address’dyay,
Andyay our’dpay ivineday ambrosiayay inyay ishay eastbray,[259]
Ithway ectarnay eetsway, efection(ray ofyay ethay odsgay!)
Enthay, iftsway ascendingyay, oughtsay ethay ightbray abodesyay.

Ownay issuedyay omfray ethay ipsshay ethay arrior-trainway,
Andyay ikelay ayay elugeday our’dpay uponyay ethay ainplay.
Asyay enwhay ethay iercingpay astsblay ofyay Oreasbay owblay,
Andyay atterscay o’eryay ethay ieldsfay ethay ivingdray owsnay;
Omfray uskyday oudsclay ethay eecyflay interway iesflay,
Osewhay azzlingday ustrelay itenswhay allyay ethay iesskay:
Osay elmshay ucceedingsay elmshay, osay ieldsshay omfray ieldsshay,
Atchcay ethay uickqay eamsbay, andyay ightenbray allyay ethay ieldsfay;
Oadbray itteringglay eastplatesbray, earsspay ithway ointedpay aysray,
Ixmay inyay oneyay eamstray, eflectingray azeblay onyay azeblay;
Ickthay eatsbay ethay entrecay asyay ethay ourserscay oundbay;
Ithway endoursplay ameflay ethay iesskay, andyay aughlay ethay ieldsfay aroundyay,

Ullfay inyay ethay idstmay, igh-toweringhay o’eryay ethay estray,
Ishay imbslay inyay armsyay ivineday Achillesyay ess’ddray;
Armsyay ichwhay ethay atherfay ofyay ethay irefay estow’dbay,
Orgedfay onyay ethay eternalyay anvilsyay ofyay ethay odgay.
Iefgray andyay evengeray ishay uriousfay earthay inspireyay,
Ishay owingglay eyeballsyay ollray ithway ivinglay irefay;
Ehay indsgray ishay eethtay, andyay uriousfay ithway elayday
O’erlooksyay ethay embattledyay osthay, andyay opeshay ethay oodyblay ayday.

Ethay ilversay uishescay irstfay ishay ighsthay infoldyay;
Enthay o’eryay ishay eastbray asway acedbray ethay ollowhay oldgay;
Ethay azenbray ordsway ayay ariousvay aldricbay iedtay,
Atthay, arr’dstay ithway emsgay, unghay itteringglay atyay ishay idesay;
Andyay, ikelay ethay oonmay, ethay oadbray efulgentray ieldshay
Azedblay ithway onglay aysray, andyay eam’dglay athwartyay ethay ieldfay.

Osay otay ight-wanderingnay ailorssay, alepay ithway earsfay,
Ideway o’eryay ethay ateryway asteway, ayay ightlay appearsyay,
Ichwhay onyay ethay ar-seenfay ountainmay azingblay ighhay,
Eamsstray omfray omesay onelylay atch-towerway otay ethay yskay:
Ithway ournfulmay eyesyay eythay azegay, andyay azegay againyay;
Oudlay owlshay ethay ormstay, andyay ivesdray emthay o’eryay ethay ainmay.

Extnay, ishay ighhay eadhay ethay elmethay acedgray; ehindbay
Ethay eepysway estcray unghay oatingflay inyay ethay indway:
Ikelay ethay edray arstay, atthay omfray ishay amingflay airhay
Akesshay ownday iseasesday, estilencepay, andyay arway;
Osay eam’dstray ethay oldengay onourshay omfray ishay eadhay,
Embledtray ethay arklingspay umesplay, andyay ethay ooselay oriesglay edshay.
Ethay iefchay eholdsbay imselfhay ithway onderingway eyesyay;
Ishay armsyay ehay oisespay, andyay ishay otionsmay iestray;
Uoy’dbay ybay omesay inwardyay orcefay, ehay eemssay otay imsway,
Andyay eelsfay ayay inionpay iftinglay everyyay imblay.

Andyay ownay ehay akesshay ishay eatgray aternalpay earspay,
Onderouspay andyay ugehay, ichwhay otnay ayay Eekgray ouldcay earray,
Omfray Elion’spay oudyclay optay anyay ashyay entireyay
Oldyay Ironchay ell’dfay, andyay apedshay ityay orfay ishay iresay;
Ayay earspay ichwhay ernstay Achillesyay onlyyay ieldsway,
Ethay eathday ofyay eroeshay, andyay ethay eaddray ofyay ieldsfay.

Automedonyay andyay Alcimusyay eparepray
Ethay immortalyay ourserscay, andyay ethay adiantray arcay;
e(thay ilversay acestray eepingsway atyay eirthay idesay;)
Eirthay ieryfay outhsmay esplendentray idlesbray iedtay;
Ethay ivory-studdedyay einsray, eturn’dray ehindbay,
Avedway o’eryay eirthay acksbay, andyay otay ethay ariotchay oin’djay.
Ethay arioteerchay enthay irl’dwhay ethay ashlay aroundyay,
Andyay iftsway ascendedyay atyay oneyay activeyay oundbay.
Allyay ightbray inyay eavenlyhay armsyay, aboveyay ishay uiresqay
Achillesyay ountsmay, andyay etssay ethay ieldfay onyay irefay;
Otnay ighterbray Usphœbay inyay ethay etherealyay ayway
Amesflay omfray ishay ariotchay, andyay estoresray ethay ayday.
Ighhay o’eryay ethay osthay, allyay erribletay ehay andsstay,
Andyay understhay otay ishay eedsstay esethay eaddray ommandscay:

anthus“xay andyay Aliusbay! ofyay Odargespay’ ainstray,
unless(ay yeyay oastbay atthay eavenlyhay aceray inyay ainvay,)
Ebay iftsway, ebay indfulmay ofyay ethay oadlay yeyay earbay,
Andyay earnlay otay akemay youryay astermay oremay youryay arecay:
Oughthray allingfay uadronssqay earbay ymay aughteringslay ordsway,
Ornay, asyay yeyay eftlay Atrocluspay, eavelay youryay ordlay.”

Ethay enerousgay Anthusxay, asyay ethay ordsway ehay aidsay,
Eem’dsay ensiblesay ofyay oeway, andyay oop’ddray ishay eadhay:
Emblingtray ehay oodstay eforebay ethay oldengay ainway,
Andyay ow’dbay otay ustday ethay onourshay ofyay ishay anemay.
Enwhay, angestray otay elltay! o(say Unojay ill’dway) ehay okebray
Eternalyay ilencesay, andyay ortentouspay okespay.
achilles“ay! yesyay! isthay ayday atyay eastlay eway earbay
Ythay ageray inyay afetysay oughthray ethay ilesfay ofyay arway:
Utbay omecay ityay illway, ethay atalfay imetay ustmay omecay,
Otnay oursyay ethay aultfay, utbay Odgay ecreesday ythay oomday.
Otnay oughthray ouryay imecray, oryay ownessslay inyay ethay oursecay,
Ellfay ythay Atrocluspay, utbay ybay eavenlyhay orcefay;
Ethay ightbray ar-shootingfay odgay owhay ildsgay ethay ayday
onfess’d(cay eway awsay imhay) oretay ishay armsyay awayyay.
O—couldnay ouryay iftnesssway o’eryay ethay indsway evailpray,
Oryay eatbay ethay inionspay ofyay ethay esternway alegay,
Allyay ereway inyay ain—thevay Atesfay ythay eathday emandday,
Ueday otay ayay ortalmay andyay immortalyay andhay.”

Enthay easedcay orfay everyay, ybay ethay Uriesfay iedtay,
Ishay atefulfay oicevay. Ethay intrepidyay iefchay epliedray
Ithway unabatedyay age—“soray etlay ityay ebay!
Ortentspay andyay odigiespray areyay ostlay onyay emay.
Iyay owknay ymay atefay: otay ieday, otay eesay onay oremay
Ymay uch-lovedmay arentspay, andyay ymay ativenay oreshay—
Enough—whenyay eavenhay ordainsyay, Iyay inksay inyay ightnay:
Ownay erishpay Oytray!” Ehay aidsay, andyay ush’dray otay ightfay.


illustration[ay: ] Erculeshay




Ookbay Xxay.


Argumentyay.


Ethay Attlebay Ofyay Ethay Odsgay, Andyay Ethay Actsyay Ofyay Achillesyay.


Upiterjay, uponyay Achillesyay’ eturnray otay ethay attlebay, allscay ayay ouncilcay ofyay ethay
odsgay, andyay ermitspay emthay otay assistyay eitheryay artypay. Ethay errorstay ofyay ethay
ombatcay escribedday, enwhay ethay eitiesday areyay engagedyay. Apolloyay encouragesyay Easænay
otay eetmay Achillesyay. Afteryay ayay onglay onversationcay, esethay otway eroeshay
encounteryay; utbay Easænay isyay eservedpray ybay ethay assistanceyay ofyay Eptunenay.
Achillesyay allsfay uponyay ethay estray ofyay ethay Ojanstray, andyay isyay uponyay ethay ointpay ofyay
illingkay Ectorhay, utbay Apolloyay onveyscay imhay awayyay inyay ayay oudclay. Achillesyay
ursuespay ethay Ojanstray ithway ayay eatgray aughterslay.
 Ethay amesay ayday ontinuescay. Ethay enescay isyay inyay ethay ieldfay eforebay Oytray.


Usthay oundray Elidespay eathingbray arway andyay oodblay
Eecegray, eathedshay inyay armsyay, esidebay erhay esselsvay oodstay;
Ilewhay earnay impendingyay omfray ayay eighbouringnay eighthay,
Oy’stray ackblay attalionsbay aitway ethay ockshay ofyay ightfay.
Enthay Ovejay otay Emisthay ivesgay ommandcay, otay allcay
Ethay odsgay otay ouncilcay inyay ethay arrystay allhay:
Iftsway o’eryay Olympusyay’ undredhay illshay eshay iesflay,
Andyay ummonssay allyay ethay enatesay ofyay ethay iesskay.
Esethay iningshay onyay, inyay onglay ocessionpray omecay
Otay Ove’sjay eternalyay adamantineyay omeday.
Otnay oneyay asway absentyay, otnay ayay uralray owerpay
Atthay auntshay ethay erdantvay oomglay, oryay osyray owerbay;
Eachyay air-hair’dfay yaddray ofyay ethay adyshay oodway,
Eachyay azureyay istersay ofyay ethay ilversay oodflay;
Allyay utbay oldyay Oceanyay, oaryhay iresay! owhay eepskay
Ishay ancientyay eatsay eneathbay ethay acredsay eepsday.
Onyay arblemay onesthray, ithway ucidlay olumnscay own’dcray,
e(thay orkway ofyay Ulcanvay,) atsay ethay owerspay aroundyay.
