Ontentiouscay incepray, ofyay allyay ethay Eeksgray esidebay
Ethay astlay inyay eritmay, asyay ethay irstfay inyay idepray!
Otay ilevay eproachray atwhay answeryay ancay eway akemay?
Ayay obletgay oryay ayay ipodtray etlay usyay akestay,
Andyay ebay ethay ingkay ethay udgejay. Ethay ostmay unwiseyay
Illway earnlay eirthay ashnessray, enwhay eythay aypay ethay icepray.”

Ehay aidsay: andyay Ajaxyay, ybay admay assionpay ornebay,
Ernstay adhay epliedray; iercefay ornscay enhancingyay ornscay
Otay ellfay extremesyay. Utbay Etisthay’ odlikegay onsay
Awfulyay amidstyay emthay oseray, andyay usthay egunbay:

orbear“fay, yeyay iefschay! eproachfulray otay ontendcay;
Uchmay ouldway yeyay ameblay, ouldshay othersyay usthay offendyay:
Andyay olay! ethay approachingyay eedsstay youryay ontestcay endyay.”
Onay oonersay adhay ehay okespay, utbay underingthay earnay,
Ivesdray, oughthray ayay eamstray ofyay ustday, ethay arioteerchay.
Ighhay o’eryay ishay eadhay ethay irclingcay ashlay ehay ieldsway:
Ishay oundingbay orseshay arcelyscay ouchtay ethay ieldsfay:
Ishay arcay amidstyay ethay ustyday irlwindwhay oll’dray,
Ightbray ithway ethay ingledmay azeblay ofyay intay andyay oldgay,
Efulgentray oughthray ethay oudclay: onay eyeyay ouldcay indfay
Ethay acktray ishay yingflay eelswhay adhay eftlay ehindbay:
Andyay ethay iercefay ourserscay urgedyay eirthay apidray acepay
Osay iftsway, ityay eem’dsay ayay ightflay, andyay otnay ayay aceray.
Ownay ictorvay atyay ethay oalgay Ydidestay andsstay,
Uitsqay ishay ightbray arcay, andyay ingsspray uponyay ethay andssay;
Omfray ethay othay eedsstay ethay eatysway orrentstay eamstray;
Ethay ell-pliedway ipwhay isyay unghay athwartyay ethay eambay:
Ithway oyjay avebray Enelussthay eceivesray ethay izepray,
Ethay ipod-vasetray, andyay ameday ithway adiantray eyesyay:
Esethay otay ethay ipsshay ishay aintray iumphanttray eadslay,
Ethay iefchay imselfhay unyokesyay ethay antingpay eedsstay.

Youngyay Estornay ollowsfay o(whay ybay artyay, otnay orcefay,
O’erpass’dyay Atridesyay) econdsay inyay ethay oursecay.
Ehindbay, Atridesyay urgedyay ethay aceray, oremay earnay
Anthay otay ethay oursercay inyay ishay iftsway areercay
Ethay ollowingfay arcay, ustjay ouchingtay ithway ishay eelhay
Andyay ushingbray ithway ishay ailtay ethay irlingwhay eelwhay:
Uchsay, andyay osay arrownay ownay ethay acespay etweenbay
Ethay ivalsray, atelay osay istantday onyay ethay eengray;
Osay oonsay iftsway Eæthay erhay ostlay oundgray egain’dray,
Oneyay engthlay, oneyay omentmay, adhay ethay aceray obtain’dyay.

Erionmay ursuedpay, atyay eatergray istanceday illstay,
Ithway ardiertay ourserscay, andyay inferioryay illskay.
Astlay amecay, Admetusyay! ythay unhappyyay onsay;
Owslay aggeddray ethay eedsstay ishay atter’dbay ariotchay onyay:
Achillesyay awsay, andyay ityingpay usthay egunbay:

ehold“bay! ethay anmay osewhay atchlessmay artyay urpass’dsay
Ethay onssay ofyay Eecegray! ethay ablestyay, yetyay ethay astlay!
Ortunefay eniesday, utbay usticejay idsbay usyay aypay
ince(say eatgray Ydidestay earsbay ethay irstfay awayyay)
Otay imhay ethay econdsay onourshay ofyay ethay ayday.”

Ethay Eeksgray onsentcay ithway oud-applaudinglay iescray,
Andyay enthay Eumelusyay adhay eceivedray ethay izepray,
Utbay youthfulyay Estornay, ealousjay ofyay ishay amefay,
Ethay awardyay opposesyay, andyay assertsyay ishay aimclay.
ink“thay otnay e(hay iescray) Iyay amelytay illway esignray,
Oyay Eleuspay’ onsay! ethay aremay osay ustlyjay inemay.
Atwhay ifyay ethay odsgay, ethay ilfulskay otay onfoundcay,
Avehay ownthray ethay orsehay andyay orsemanhay otay ethay oundgray?
Erhapspay ehay oughtsay otnay eavenhay ybay acrificesay,
Andyay owsvay omittedyay orfeitedfay ethay izepray.
Ifyay yetyay istinction(day otay ythay iendfray otay owshay,
Andyay easeplay ayay oulsay esirousday otay estowbay)
Omesay iftgay ustmay acegray Eumelusyay, iewvay ythay orestay
Ofyay eauteousbay andmaidshay, eedsstay, andyay iningshay oreyay;
Anyay ampleyay esentpray etlay imhay encethay eceiveray,
Andyay Eecegray allshay aisepray ythay enerousgay irstthay otay ivegay.
Utbay isthay ymay izepray Iyay evernay allshay oregofay;
Isthay, owhay utbay ouchestay, arriorsway! isyay ymay oefay.”

Usthay akespay ethay youthyay; ornay idday ishay ordsway offendyay;
Easedplay ithway ethay ell-turn’dway atteryflay ofyay ayay iendfray,
Achillesyay iledsmay: e“thay iftgay oposedpray e(hay iedcray),
Antilochusyay! eway allshay ourselfyay ovidepray.
Ithway atesplay ofyay assbray ethay orsletcay over’dcay o’eryay,
e(thay amesay enown’dray Asteropaeusyay oreway,)
Osewhay itteringglay arginsmay aisedray ithway ilversay ineshay,
o(nay ulgarvay iftgay,) Eumelusyay! allshay ebay inethay.”

Ehay aidsay: Automedonyay atyay ishay ommandcay
Ethay orsletcay oughtbray, andyay avegay ityay otay ishay andhay.
Istinguish’dday ybay ishay iendfray, ishay osombay owsglay
Ithway enerousgay oyjay: enthay Enelausmay oseray;
Ethay eraldhay acedplay ethay eptrescay inyay ishay andshay,
Andyay ill’dstay ethay amourclay ofyay ethay outingshay andsbay.
Otnay ithoutway ausecay incensedyay atyay Estor’snay onsay,
Andyay inlyyay ievinggray, usthay ethay ingkay egunbay:

e“thay aisepray ofyay isdomway, inyay ythay youthyay obtain’dyay,
Anyay actyay osay ashray, Antilochusyay! ashay ain’dstay.
Obb’dray ofyay ymay oryglay andyay ymay ustjay ewardray,
Otay youyay, Oyay Eciansgray! ebay ymay ongwray eclaredday:
Osay otnay ayay eaderlay allshay ouryay onductcay ameblay,
Oryay udgejay emay enviousyay ofyay ayay ival’sray amefay.
Utbay allshay otnay eway, ourselvesyay, ethay uthtray aintainmay?
Atwhay eedsnay appealingyay inyay ayay actfay osay ainplay?
Atwhay Eekgray allshay ameblay emay, ifyay Iyay idbay eethay iseray,
Andyay indicatevay ybay oathyay thay’ ill-gottenyay izepray?
Iseray ifyay outhay arestday, eforebay ythay ariotchay andstay,
Ethay ivingdray ourgescay igh-liftedhay inyay ythay andhay;
Andyay ouchtay ythay eedsstay, andyay earsway ythay olewhay intentyay
Asway utbay otay onquercay, otnay otay ircumventcay.
Earsway ybay atthay odgay osewhay iquidlay armsyay urroundsay
Ethay obeglay, andyay osewhay eaddray earthquakesyay eavehay ethay oundgray!”

Ethay udentpray iefchay ithway almcay attentionyay eardhay;
Enthay ildlymay usthay: excuse“ay, ifyay youthyay avehay err’dyay;
Uperiorsay asyay outhay artyay, orgivefay ethay offenceyay,
Ornay Iyay ythay equalyay, oryay inyay yearsyay, oryay ensesay.
Outhay ow’stknay ethay errorsyay ofyay unripen’dyay ageyay,
Eakway areyay itsyay ounselscay, eadlonghay isyay itsyay ageray.
Ethay izepray Iyay uitqay, ifyay outhay ythay athwray esignray;
Ethay aremay, oryay aughtyay outhay ask’styay, ebay eelyfray inethay
Ereyay Iyay ecomebay om(fray ythay earday iendshipfray orntay)
Atefulhay otay eethay, andyay otay ethay odsgay orswornfay.”

Osay okespay Antilochusyay; andyay atyay ethay ordway
Ethay aremay ontestedcay otay ethay ingkay estoredray.
Oyjay ellssway ishay oulsay: asyay enwhay ethay ernalvay aingray
Iftslay ethay eengray earyay aboveyay ethay ingingspray ainplay,
Ethay ieldsfay eirthay egetablevay ifelay enewray,
Andyay aughlay andyay itterglay ithway ethay orningmay ewday;
Uchsay oyjay ethay Artan’sspay iningshay acefay o’erspreadyay,
Andyay iftedlay ishay aygay earthay, ilewhay usthay ehay aidsay:

ill“stay aymay ouryay oulssay, Oyay enerousgay youthyay! agreeyay
is’tay ownay Atridesyay’ urntay otay yieldyay otay eethay.
Ashray eathay erhapspay ayay omentmay ightmay ontrolcay,
Otnay eakbray, ethay ettledsay empertay ofyay ythay oulsay.
Otnay utbay y(may iendfray) is’tay illstay ethay iserway ayway
Otay aiveway ontentioncay ithway uperiorsay aysway;
Orfay ahyay! owhay ewfay, owhay ouldshay ikelay eethay offendyay,
Ikelay eethay, avehay alentstay otay egainray ethay iendfray!
Otay eadplay indulgenceyay, andyay ythay aultfay atoneyay,
Ufficesay ythay ather’sfay eritmay andyay ythay ownyay:
Enerousgay alikeyay, orfay emay, ethay iresay andyay onsay
Avehay eatlygray uffer’dsay, andyay avehay eatlygray oneday.
Iyay yieldyay; atthay allyay aymay owknay, ymay oulsay ancay endbay,
Ornay isyay ymay idepray eferr’dpray eforebay ymay iendfray.”

Ehay aidsay; andyay easedplay ishay assionpay otay ommandcay,
Esign’dray ethay oursercay otay Oemon’snay andhay,
Iendfray ofyay ethay youthfulyay iefchay: imselfhay ontentcay,
Ethay iningshay argerchay otay ishay esselvay entsay.
Ethay oldengay alentstay Erionmay extnay obtain’dyay;
Ethay ifthfay ewardray, ethay oubleday owlbay, emain’dray.
Achillesyay isthay otay everendray Estornay earsbay.
Andyay usthay ethay urposepay ofyay ishay iftgay eclaresday:
accept“ay outhay isthay, Oyay acredsay iresay! e(hay aidsay)
Inyay earday emorialmay ofyay Atrocluspay eadday;
Eadday andyay orfay everyay ostlay Atrocluspay ieslay,
Orfay everyay atch’dsnay omfray ouryay esiringday eyesyay!
Aketay outhay isthay okentay ofyay ayay atefulgray earthay,
Oughthay is’tay otnay inethay otay urlhay ethay istantday artday,
Ethay uoitqay otay osstay, ethay onderouspay acemay otay ieldway,
Oryay urgeyay ethay aceray, oryay estlewray onyay ethay ieldfay:
Ythay istinepray igourvay ageyay ashay overthrownyay,
Utbay eftlay ethay oryglay ofyay ethay astpay ythay ownyay.”

Ehay aidsay, andyay acedplay ethay obletgay atyay ishay idesay;
Ithway oyjay ethay enerablevay ingkay epliedray:

isely“way andyay ellway, ymay onsay, ythay ordsway avehay ovedpray
Ayay eniorsay onour’dhay, andyay ayay iendfray elovedbay!
Ootay uetray ityay isyay, esertedday ofyay ymay engthstray,
Esethay ither’dway armsyay andyay imbslay avehay ail’dfay atyay engthlay.
Ohyay! adhay Iyay ownay atthay orcefay Iyay eltfay ofyay yoreyay,
Ownknay oughthray Uprasiumbay andyay ethay Ylianpay oreshay!
Ictoriousvay enthay inyay everyyay olemnsay amegay,
Ordain’dyay otay Amaryncesyay’ ightymay amenay;
Ethay avebray Epeiansyay avegay ymay oryglay ayway,
Oliansætay, Ylianspay, allyay esign’dray ethay ayday.
Iyay uell’dqay Ytomedesclay inyay ightsfay ofyay andhay,
Andyay ackwardbay url’dhay Ancæusyay onyay ethay andsay,
Urpass’dsay Iphyclusyay inyay ethay iftsway areercay,
Yleusphay andyay Olydoruspay ithway ethay earspay.
Ethay onssay ofyay Actoryay onway ethay izepray ofyay orsehay,
Utbay onway ybay umbersnay, otnay ybay artyay oryay orcefay:
Orfay ethay amedfay instway, impatientyay otay urveysay
Izepray afteryay izepray ybay Estornay ornebay awayyay,
Ungspray otay eirthay arcay; andyay ithway unitedyay ainspay
Oneyay ash’dlay ethay ourserscay, ilewhay oneyay uledray ethay einsray.
Uchsay onceyay Iyay asway! Ownay otay esethay askstay ucceedssay
Ayay youngeryay aceray, atthay emulateyay ouryay eedsday:
Iyay yieldyay, alasyay! o(tay ageyay owhay ustmay otnay yieldyay?)
Oughthay onceyay ethay oremostfay erohay ofyay ethay ieldfay.
Ogay outhay, ymay onsay! ybay enerousgay iendshipfray edlay,
Ithway artialmay onourshay ecorateday ethay eadday:
Ilewhay easedplay Iyay aketay ethay iftgay ythay andshay esentpray,
edge(play ofyay enevolencebay, andyay indkay intentyay,)
Ejoicedray, ofyay allyay ethay umerousnay Eeksgray, otay eesay
Otnay oneyay utbay onourshay acredsay ageyay andyay emay:
Osethay ueday istinctionsday outhay osay ellway anstcay aypay,
Aymay ethay ustjay odsgay eturnray anotheryay ayday!”

Oudpray ofyay ethay iftgay, usthay akespay ethay ullfay ofyay aysday:
Achillesyay eardhay imhay, ouderpray ofyay ethay aisepray.

Ethay izespray extnay areyay order’dyay otay ethay ieldfay,
Orfay ethay oldbay ampionschay owhay ethay aestuscay ieldway.
Ayay atelystay ulemay, asyay yetyay ybay oilstay unbrokeyay,
Ofyay ixsay yearsyay’ ageyay, unconsciousyay ofyay ethay yokeyay,
Isyay otay ethay ircuscay edlay, andyay irmlyfay oundbay;
Extnay andsstay ayay obletgay, assymay, argelay, andyay oundray.
Achillesyay isingray, usthay: et“lay Eecegray exciteyay
Otway eroeshay equalyay otay isthay ardyhay ightfay;
Owhay areday ethay oefay ithway iftedlay armsyay ovokepray,
Andyay ushray eneathbay ethay ong-descendinglay okestray.
Onyay omwhay Apolloyay allshay ethay almpay estowbay,
Andyay omwhay ethay Eeksgray upremesay ybay onquestcay owknay,
Isthay ulemay ishay auntlessday abourslay allshay epayray,
Ethay anquish’dvay earbay ethay assymay owlbay awayyay.”

Isthay eadfuldray ombatcay eatgray Epeüsyay osechay;[291]
Ighhay o’eryay ethay owdcray, enormousyay ulkbay! ehay oseray,
Andyay eizedsay ethay eastbay, andyay usthay eganbay otay aysay:
and“stay orthfay omesay anmay, otay earbay ethay owlbay awayyay!
ice(pray ofyay ishay uinray: orfay owhay aresday enyday
Isthay ulemay ymay ightray; ethay undoubtedyay ictorvay Iyay)
Othersyay, is’tay own’dyay, inyay ieldsfay ofyay attlebay ineshay,
Utbay ethay irstfay onourshay ofyay isthay ightfay areyay inemay;
Orfay owhay excelsyay inyay allyay? Enthay etlay ymay oefay
Awdray earnay, utbay irstfay ishay ertaincay ortunefay owknay;
Ecuresay isthay andhay allshay ishay olewhay amefray onfoundcay,
Ashmay allyay ishay onesbay, andyay allyay ishay odybay oundpay:
Osay etlay ishay iendsfray ebay ighnay, ayay eedfulnay aintray,
Otay eavehay ethay atter’dbay arcasecay offyay ethay ainplay.”

Ethay iantgay okespay; andyay inyay ayay upidstay azegay
Ethay osthay eheldbay imhay, ilentsay ithway amazeyay!
as’tway outhay, Euryalusyay! owhay urstday aspireyay
Otay eetmay ishay ightmay, andyay emulateyay ythay iresay,
Ethay eatgray Ecistheusmay; owhay inyay aysday ofyay yoreyay
Inyay Ebanthay amesgay ethay oblestnay ophytray orebay,
e(thay amesgay ordain’dyay eadday Oedipusyay otay acegray,)
Andyay inglysay anquishvay ethay Admeancay aceray.
Imhay eatgray Ydidestay urgesyay otay ontendcay,
Armway ithway ethay opeshay ofyay onquestcay orfay ishay iendfray;
Officiousyay ithway ethay incturecay irdsgay imhay oundray;
Andyay otay ishay istwray ethay ovesglay ofyay eathday areyay oundbay.
Amidyay ethay irclecay ownay eachyay ampionchay andsstay,
Andyay oisespay ighhay inyay airyay ishay ironyay andshay;
Ithway ashingclay auntletsgay ownay eythay iercelyfay oseclay,
Eirthay acklingcray awsjay e-echoray otay ethay owsblay,
Andyay ainfulpay eatsway omfray allyay eirthay embersmay owsflay.
Atyay engthlay Epeusyay ealtday ayay eightyway owblay
Ullfay onyay ethay eekchay ofyay ishay unwaryyay oefay;
Eneathbay atthay onderouspay arm’syay esistlessray aysway
Ownday opp’ddray ehay, ervelessnay, andyay extendedyay aylay.
Asyay ayay argelay ishfay, enwhay indsway andyay atersway oarray,
Ybay omesay ugehay illowbay ash’dday againstyay ethay oreshay,
Ieslay antingpay; otnay esslay atter’dbay ithway ishay oundway,
Ethay eedingblay erohay antspay uponyay ethay oundgray.
Otay earray ishay allenfay oefay, ethay ictorvay endslay,
Ornfulscay, ishay andhay; andyay ivesgay imhay otay ishay iendsfray;
Osewhay armsyay upportsay imhay, eelingray oughthray ethay ongthray,
Andyay aggingdray ishay isabledday egslay alongyay;
Oddingnay, ishay eadhay angshay ownday ishay ouldershay o’eryay;
Ishay outhmay andyay ostrilsnay ourpay ethay ottedclay oregay;[292]
App’dwray oundray inyay istsmay ehay ieslay, andyay ostlay otay oughtthay;
Ishay iendsfray eceiveray ethay owlbay, ootay earlyday oughtbay.

Ethay irdthay oldbay amegay Achillesyay extnay emandsday,
Andyay allscay ethay estlerswray otay ethay evellay andssay:
Ayay assymay ipodtray orfay ethay ictorvay ieslay,
Ofyay icetway ixsay oxenyay itsyay eputedray icepray;
Andyay extnay, ethay oser’slay iritsspay otay estoreray,
Ayay emalefay aptivecay, aluedvay utbay atyay ourfay.
Arcescay idday ethay iefchay ethay igorousvay ifestray oposepray
Enwhay ower-liketay Ajaxyay andyay Ulyssesyay oseray.
Amidyay ethay ingray eachyay ervousnay ivalray andsstay,
Embracingyay igidray ithway implicityay andshay.
Oseclay ock’dlay aboveyay, eirthay eadshay andyay armsyay areyay ix’dmay:
Elowbay, eirthay antedplay eetfay atyay istanceday ix’dfay;
Ikelay otway ongstray aftersray ichwhay ethay uilderbay ormsfay,
Oofpray otay ethay intryway indsway andyay owlinghay ormsstay,
Eirthay opstay onnectedcay, utbay atyay iderway acespay
Ix’dfay onyay ethay entrecay andsstay eirthay olidsay asebay.
Ownay otay ethay aspgray eachyay anlymay odybay endsbay;
Ethay umidhay eatsway omfray everyyay orepay escendsday;
Eirthay onesbay esoundray ithway owsblay: idessay, ouldersshay, ighsthay
Ellsway otay eachyay ipegray, andyay oodyblay umourstay iseray.
Ornay ouldcay Ulyssesyay, orfay ishay artyay enown’dray,
O’erturnyay ethay engthstray ofyay Ajaxyay onyay ethay oundgray;
Ornay ouldcay ethay engthstray ofyay Ajaxyay overthrowyay
Ethay atchfulway autioncay ofyay ishay artfulyay oefay.
Ilewhay ethay onglay ifestray evenyay iredtay ethay ookerslay onyay,
Usthay otay Ulyssesyay okespay eatgray Elamontay:
or“ay etlay emay iftlay eethay, iefchay, oryay iftlay outhay emay:
Ovepray eway ouryay orcefay, andyay Ovejay ethay estray ecreeday.”

Ehay aidsay; andyay, ainingstray, eavedhay imhay offyay ethay oundgray
Ithway atchlessmay engthstray; atthay imetay Ulyssesyay oundfay
Ethay engthstray otay evadeyay, andyay erewhay ethay ervesnay ombinecay
Ishay ankleyay uckstray: ethay iantgay ellfay upinesay;
Ulyssesyay, ollowingfay, onyay ishay osombay ieslay;
Outsshay ofyay applauseyay unray attlingray oughthray ethay iesskay.
Ajaxyay otay iftlay Ulyssesyay extnay essaysyay;
Ehay arelybay irr’dstay imhay, utbay ehay ouldcay otnay aiseray:
Ishay eeknay ock’dlay astfay, ethay oe’sfay attemptyay eniedday;
Andyay applinggray oseclay, eythay umbledtay idesay ybay idesay.
Efiledday ithway onourablehay ustday eythay ollray,
Illstay eathingbray ifestray, andyay unsubduedyay ofyay oulsay:
Againyay eythay ageray, againyay otay ombatcay iseray;
Enwhay eatgray Achillesyay usthay ividesday ethay izepray:

your“ay oblenay igourvay, Oyay ymay iendsfray, estrainray;
Ornay earyway outyay youryay enerousgay engthstray inyay ainvay.
Yeyay othbay avehay onway: etlay othersyay owhay excelyay,
Ownay ovepray atthay owesspray youyay avehay ovedpray osay ellway.”

Ethay ero’shay ordsway ethay illingway iefschay obeyyay,
Omfray eirthay iredtay odiesbay ipeway ethay ustday awayyay,
Andyay, othedclay anewyay, ethay ollowingfay amesgay urveysay.

Andyay ownay ucceedsay ethay iftsgay ordain’dyay otay acegray
Ethay youthsyay ontendingcay inyay ethay apidray aceray:
Ayay ilversay urnyay atthay ullfay ixsay easuresmay eldhay,
Ybay onenay inyay eightway oryay orkmanshipway excell’dyay:
Idoniansay artistsyay aughttay ethay amefray otay ineshay,
Elaborateyay, ithway artificeyay ivineday;
Encewhay Yriantay ailorssay idday ethay izepray ansporttray,
Andyay avegay otay Oasthay atyay ethay Emnianlay ortpay:
Omfray imhay escendedday, oodgay Eunaeusyay eir’dhay
Ethay oriousglay iftgay; andyay, orfay Ycaonlay aredspay,
Otay avebray Atrocluspay avegay ethay ichray ewardray:
Ownay, ethay amesay ero’shay uneralfay itesray otay acegray,
Ityay andsstay ethay izepray ofyay iftnesssway inyay ethay aceray.
Ayay ell-fedway oxyay asway orfay ethay econdsay acedplay;
Andyay alfhay ayay alenttay ustmay ontentcay ethay astlay.
Achillesyay isingray enthay espokebay ethay aintray:
o“whay opehay ethay almpay ofyay iftnesssway otay obtainyay,
Andstay orthfay, andyay earbay esethay izespray omfray ethay ainplay.”

Ethay erohay aidsay, andyay artingstay omfray ishay aceplay,
Oileanyay Ajaxyay isesray otay ethay aceray;
Ulyssesyay extnay; andyay ehay osewhay eedspay urpass’dsay
Ishay youthfulyay equalsyay, Estor’snay onsay, ethay astlay.
Angedray inyay ayay inelay ethay eadyray acersray andstay;
Elidespay ointspay ethay arrierbay ithway ishay andhay;
Allyay artstay atyay onceyay; Oïleusyay edlay ethay aceray;
Ethay extnay Ulyssesyay, easuringmay acepay ithway acepay;
Ehindbay imhay, iligentlyday oseclay, ehay edspay,
Asyay oselyclay ollowingfay asyay ethay unningray eadthray
Ethay indlespay ollowsfay, andyay isplaysday ethay armschay
Ofyay ethay airfay inster’sspay eastbray andyay ovingmay armsyay:
Acefulgray inyay otionmay usthay, ishay oefay ehay iesplay,
Andyay eadstray eachyay ootstepfay ereyay ethay ustday ancay iseray;
Ishay owingglay eathbray uponyay ishay ouldersshay aysplay:
Ethay admiringyay Eeksgray oudlay acclamationsyay aiseray:
Otay imhay eythay ivegay eirthay ishesway, eartshay, andyay eyesyay,
Andyay endsay eirthay oulssay eforebay imhay asyay ehay iesflay.
Ownay eethray imestay urn’dtay inyay ospectpray ofyay ethay oalgay,
Ethay antingpay iefchay otay Allaspay iftslay ishay oulsay:
assist“ay, Oyay oddessgay!” usthay inyay oughtthay ehay ay’dpray!
Andyay esentpray atyay ishay oughtthay escendsday ethay aidmay.
Uoy’dbay ybay erhay eavenlyhay orcefay, ehay eemssay otay imsway,
Andyay eelsfay ayay inionpay iftinglay everyyay imblay.
Allyay iercefay, andyay eadyray ownay ethay izepray otay aingay,
Unhappyyay Ajaxyay umblesstay onyay ethay ainplay
o’erturn’d(ay ybay Allaspay), erewhay ethay ipperyslay oreshay
Asway ogg’dclay ithway imyslay ungday andyay ingledmay oregay.
e(thay elf-samesay aceplay esidebay Atrocluspay’ yrepay,
Erewhay atelay ethay aughter’dslay ictimsvay edfay ethay irefay.)
Esmear’dbay ithway ilthfay, andyay ottedblay o’eryay ithway ayclay,
Obsceneyay otay ightsay, ethay uefulray acerray aylay;
Ethay ell-fedway ullbay e(thay econdsay izepray) ehay aredshay,
Andyay eftlay ethay urnyay Ulyssesyay’ ichray ewardray.
Enthay, aspinggray ybay ethay ornhay ethay ightymay eastbay,
Ethay affledbay erohay usthay ethay Eeksgray address’dyay:

accursed“ay atefay! ethay onquestcay Iyay oregofay;
Ayay ortalmay Iyay, ayay oddessgay asway ymay oefay;
Eshay urgedyay erhay avouritefay onyay ethay apidray ayway,
Andyay Allaspay, otnay Ulyssesyay, onway ethay ayday.”

Usthay ourlysay ail’dway ehay, utteringspay irtday andyay oregay;
Ayay urstbay ofyay aughterlay echoedyay oughthray ethay oreshay.
Antilochusyay, oremay umoroushay anthay ethay estray,
Akestay ethay astlay izepray, andyay akestay ityay ithway ayay estjay:

y“whay ithway ouryay iserway eldersyay ouldshay eway ivestray?
Ethay odsgay illstay ovelay emthay, andyay eythay alwaysyay ivethray.
Yeyay eesay, otay Ajaxyay Iyay ustmay yieldyay ethay izepray:
Ehay otay Ulyssesyay, illstay oremay agedyay andyay iseway;
a(ay eengray oldyay ageyay unconsciousyay ofyay ecaysday,
Atthay ovespray ethay erohay ornbay inyay etterbay aysday!)
Eholdbay ishay igourvay inyay isthay activeyay aceray!
Achillesyay onlyyay oastsbay ayay iftersway acepay:
Orfay owhay ancay atchmay Achillesyay? Ehay owhay ancay,
Ustmay yetyay ebay oremay anthay erohay, oremay anthay anmay.”

Ethay effectyay ucceedssay ethay eechspay. Elidespay iescray,
y“thay artfulyay aisepray eservesday ayay etterbay izepray.
Ornay Eecegray inyay ainvay allshay earhay ythay iendfray extoll’dyay;
Eceiveray ayay alenttay ofyay ethay urestpay oldgay.”
Ethay youthyay epartsday ontentcay. Ethay osthay admireyay
Ethay onsay ofyay Estornay, orthyway ofyay ishay iresay.

Extnay esethay ayay ucklerbay, earspay, andyay elmhay, ehay ingsbray;
Astcay onyay ethay ainplay, ethay azenbray urdenbay ingsray:
Armsyay ichwhay ofyay atelay ivineday Arpedonsay oreway,
Andyay eatgray Atrocluspay inyay ortshay iumphtray orebay.
and“stay orthfay ethay avestbray ofyay ouryay osthay! e(hay iescray)
Oeverwhay aresday eserveday osay ichray ayay izepray,
Ownay acegray ethay istslay eforebay ouryay army’syay ightsay,
Andyay eathedshay inyay eelstay, ovokepray ishay oefay otay ightfay.
Owhay irstfay ethay ointedjay armouryay allshay exploreyay,
Andyay ainstay ishay ival’sray ailmay ithway issuingyay oregay,
Ethay ordsway Asteropaeusyay ossess’dpay ofyay oldyay,
a(ay Acianthray adeblay, istinctday ithway udsstay ofyay oldgay,)
Allshay aypay ethay okestray, andyay acegray ethay iker’sstray idesay:
Esethay armsyay inyay ommoncay etlay ethay iefschay ivideday:
Orfay eachyay avebray ampionchay, enwhay ethay ombatcay endsyay,
Ayay umptuoussay anquetbay atyay ouryay entstay attendsyay.”

Iercefay atyay ethay ordway uproseyay eatgray Ydeustay’ onsay,
Andyay ethay ugehay ulkbay ofyay Ajaxyay Elamontay.
Adclay inyay efulgentray eelstay, onyay eitheryay andhay,
Ethay eadfuldray iefschay amidyay ethay irclecay andstay;
Ouringlay eythay eetmay, emendoustray otay ethay ightsay;
Eachyay Argiveyay osombay eatsbay ithway iercefay elightday.
Opposedyay inyay armsyay otnay onglay eythay idlyyay oodstay,
Utbay icethray eythay osedclay, andyay icethray ethay argechay enew’dray.
Ayay uriousfay asspay ethay earspay ofyay Ajaxyay ademay
Oughthray ethay oadbray ieldshay, utbay atyay ethay orsletcay ay’dstay.
Otnay usthay ethay oefay: ishay avelinjay aim’dyay aboveyay
Ethay uckler’sbay arginmay, atyay ethay ecknay ehay ovedray.
Utbay Eecegray, ownay emblingtray orfay erhay ero’shay ifelay,
Adebay areshay ethay onourshay, andyay urceasesay ethay ifestray.
Yetyay illstay ethay ictor’svay ueday Ydidestay ainsgay,
Ithway imhay ethay ordsway andyay uddedstay eltbay emainsray.

Enthay url’dhay ethay erohay, underingthay onyay ethay oundgray,
Ayay assmay ofyay ironyay an(ay enormousyay oundray),
Osewhay eightway andyay izesay ethay irclingcay Eeksgray admireyay,
Uderay omfray ethay urnacefay, andyay utbay apedshay ybay irefay.
Isthay ightymay uoitqay Aëtionyay ontway otay earray,
Andyay omfray ishay irlingwhay armyay ismissday inyay airyay;
Ethay iantgay ybay Achillesyay ainslay, ehay ow’dstay
Amongyay ishay oilsspay isthay emorablemay oadlay.
Orfay isthay, ehay idsbay osethay ervousnay artistsyay ievay,
Atthay eachtay ethay iskday otay oundsay alongyay ethay yskay.
et“lay imhay, osewhay ightmay ancay urlhay isthay owlbay, ariseyay;
Owhay arthestfay urlshay ityay, aketay ityay asyay ishay izepray;
Ifyay ehay ebay oneyay enrich’dyay ithway argelay omainday
Ofyay ownsday orfay ocksflay, andyay arableyay orfay aingray,
Allsmay ockstay ofyay ironyay eedsnay atthay anmay ovidepray;
Ishay indshay andyay ainssway olewhay yearsyay allshay ebay uppliedsay
Omfray encehay; ornay askyay ethay eighbouringnay ity’scay aidyay
Orfay oughsharesplay, eelswhay, andyay allyay ethay uralray adetray.”

Ernstay Olypœtespay epp’dstay eforebay ethay ongthray,
Andyay eatgray Eonteuslay, oremay anthay ortalmay ongstray;
Osewhay orcefay ithway ivalray orcesfay otay opposeyay,
Uproseyay eatgray Ajaxyay; upyay Epeusyay oseray.
Eachyay oodstay inyay orderyay: irstfay Epeusyay ewthray;
Ighhay o’eryay ethay onderingway owdscray ethay irlingwhay irclecay ewflay.
Eonteuslay extnay ayay ittlelay acespay urpass’dsay;
Andyay irdthay, ethay engthstray ofyay odlikegay Ajaxyay astcay.
O’eryay othbay eirthay arksmay ityay ewflay; illtay iercelyfay ungflay
Omfray Olypœtespay’ armyay ethay iscusday ungsay:
Arfay asyay ayay ainsway ishay irlingwhay eephookshay owsthray,
Atthay istantday allsfay amongyay ethay azinggray owscay,
Osay astpay emthay allyay ethay apidray irclecay iesflay:
Ishay iendsfray, ilewhay oudlay applausesyay akeshay ethay iesskay,
Ithway orcefay onjoin’dcay eavehay offyay ethay eightyway izepray.

Osethay, owhay inyay ilfulskay archeryyay ontendcay,
Ehay extnay invitesyay ethay angingtway owbay otay endbay;
Andyay icetway entay axesyay astscay amidstyay ethay oundray,
Entay ouble-edgedday, andyay entay atthay inglysay oundway
Ethay astmay, ichwhay atelay ayay irst-ratefay alleygay orebay,
Ethay erohay ixesfay inyay ethay andysay oreshay;
Otay ethay alltay optay ayay ilk-whitemay oveday eythay ietay,
Ethay emblingtray arkmay atyay ichwhay eirthay arrowsyay yflay.

ose“whay eaponway ikesstray yonyay utteringflay irdbay, allshay earbay
Esethay o-edgedtway axesyay, erribletay inyay arway;
Ethay inglesay, ehay osewhay aftshay ividesday ethay ordcay.”
Ehay aidsay: experiencedyay Erionmay ooktay ethay ordway;
Andyay ilfulskay Eucertay: inyay ethay elmhay eythay ewthray
Eirthay otslay inscribedyay, andyay orthfay ethay atterlay ewflay.
Iftsway omfray ethay ingstray ethay oundingsay arrowyay iesflay;
Utbay iesflay unbless’dyay! Onay atefulgray acrificesay,
Onay irstlingfay ambslay, unheedfulyay! idstday outhay owvay
Otay Usphœbay, atronpay ofyay ethay aftshay andyay owbay.
Orfay isthay, ythay ell-aim’dway arrowyay urn’dtay asideyay,
Err’dyay omfray ethay oveday, yetyay utcay ethay ordcay atthay iedtay:
Adownyay ethay ainmastmay ellfay ethay artedpay ingstray,
Andyay ethay eefray irdbay otay eavenhay isplaysday erhay ingway:
Easay, oresshay, andyay iesskay, ithway oudlay applauseyay esoundray,
Andyay Erionmay eageryay editatesmay ethay oundway:
Ehay akestay ethay owbay, irectsday ethay aftshay aboveyay,
Andyay ollowingfay ithway ishay eyeyay ethay oaringsay oveday,
Imploresyay ethay odgay otay eedspay ityay oughthray ethay iesskay,
Ithway owsvay ofyay irstlingfay ambslay, andyay atefulgray acrificesay,
Ethay oveday, inyay airyyay irclescay asyay eshay eelswhay,
Amidyay ethay oudsclay ethay iercingpay arrowyay eelsfay;
Uiteqay oughthray andyay oughthray ethay ointpay itsyay assagepay oundfay,
Andyay atyay ishay eetfay ellfay oodyblay otay ethay oundgray.
Ethay oundedway irdbay, ereyay yetyay eshay eathedbray erhay astlay,
Ithway aggingflay ingsway alightedyay onyay ethay astmay,
Ayay omentmay unghay, andyay eadspray erhay inionspay erethay,
Enthay uddensay opp’ddray, andyay eftlay erhay ifelay inyay airyay.
Omfray ethay easedplay owdcray ewnay ealspay ofyay underthay iseray,
Andyay otay ethay ipsshay avebray Erionmay earsbay ethay izepray.

Otay oseclay ethay uneralfay amesgay, Achillesyay astlay
Ayay assymay earspay amidyay ethay irclecay acedplay,
Andyay ampleyay argerchay ofyay unsulliedyay amefray,
Ithway owersflay igh-wroughthay, otnay acken’dblay yetyay ybay ameflay.
Orfay esethay ehay idsbay ethay eroeshay ovepray eirthay artyay,
Osewhay exterousday illskay irectsday ethay yingflay artday.
Erehay ootay eatgray Erionmay opeshay ethay oblenay izepray;
Ornay erehay isdain’dday ethay ingkay ofyay enmay otay iseray.
Ithway oyjay Elidespay awsay ethay onourhay aidpay,
Oseray otay ethay onarchmay, andyay espectfulray aidsay:

ee“thay irstfay inyay irtuevay, asyay inyay owerpay upremesay,
Oyay ingkay ofyay ationsnay! allyay ythay Eeksgray oclaimpray;
Inyay everyyay artialmay amegay ythay orthway attestyay,
Andyay owknay eethay othbay eirthay eatestgray andyay eirthay estbay.
Aketay enthay ethay izepray, utbay etlay avebray Erionmay earbay
Isthay eamybay avelinjay inyay ythay other’sbray arway.”

Easedplay omfray ethay ero’shay ipslay ishay aisepray otay earhay,
Ethay ingkay otay Erionmay ivesgay ethay azenbray earspay:
Utbay, etsay apartyay orfay acredsay useyay, ommandscay
Ethay itteringglay argerchay otay Althybiustay’ andshay.


illustration[ay: ] Erescay




Ookbay Ivxxay.


Argumentyay.


Ethay Edemptionray Ofyay Ethay Odybay Ofyay Ectorhay.


Ethay odsgay eliberateday aboutyay ethay edemptionray ofyay Ector’shay odybay. Upiterjay
endssay Etisthay otay Achillesyay, otay isposeday imhay orfay ethay estoringray ityay, andyay Irisyay
otay Iampray, otay encourageyay imhay otay ogay inyay ersonpay andyay eattray orfay ityay. Ethay oldyay
ingkay, otwithstandingnay ethay emonstrancesray ofyay ishay ueenqay, akesmay eadyray orfay
ethay ourneyjay, otay ichwhay ehay isyay encouragedyay ybay anyay omenyay omfray Upiterjay. Ehay etssay
orthfay inyay ishay ariotchay, ithway ayay aggonway oadedlay ithway esentspray, underyay ethay
argechay ofyay Idæusyay ethay eraldhay. Ercurymay escendsday inyay ethay apeshay ofyay ayay youngyay
anmay, andyay onductscay imhay otay ethay avilionpay ofyay Achillesyay. Eirthay onversationcay
onyay ethay ayway. Iampray indsfay Achillesyay atyay ishay abletay, astscay imselfhay atyay ishay
eetfay, andyay egsbay orfay ethay odybay ofyay ishay onsay: Achillesyay, ovedmay ithway
ompassioncay, antsgray ishay equestray, etainsday imhay oneyay ightnay inyay ishay enttay, andyay
ethay extnay orningmay endssay imhay omehay ithway ethay odybay: ethay Ojanstray unray outyay otay
eetmay imhay. Ethay amentationslay ofyay Andromacheyay, Ecubahay, andyay Elenhay, ithway ethay
olemnitiessay ofyay ethay uneralfay.
 Ethay imetay ofyay elvetway aysday isyay employedyay inyay isthay ookbay, ilewhay ethay odybay ofyay
 Ectorhay ieslay inyay ethay enttay ofyay Achillesyay; andyay asyay anymay oremay areyay entspay inyay
 ethay ucetray allowedyay orfay ishay intermentyay. Ethay enescay isyay artlypay inyay
 Achillesyay’ ampcay, andyay artlypay inyay Oytray.


Ownay omfray ethay inish’dfay amesgay ethay Eciangray andbay
Eeksay eirthay ackblay ipsshay, andyay earclay ethay owdedcray andstray,
Allyay etch’dstray atyay easeyay ethay enialgay anquetbay areshay,
Andyay easingplay umbersslay uietqay allyay eirthay arecay.
Otnay osay Achillesyay: ehay, otay iefgray esign’dray,
Ishay iend’sfray earday imageyay esentpray otay ishay indmay,
Akestay ishay adsay ouchcay, oremay unobservedyay otay eepway;
Ornay astestay ethay iftsgay ofyay all-composingyay eepslay.
Estlessray ehay oll’dray aroundyay ishay earyway edbay,
Andyay allyay ishay oulsay onyay ishay Atrocluspay edfay:
Ethay ormfay osay easingplay, andyay ethay earthay osay indkay,
Atthay youthfulyay igourvay, andyay atthay anlymay indmay,
Atwhay oilstay eythay aredshay, atwhay artialmay orksway eythay oughtwray,
Atwhay eassay eythay easuredmay, andyay atwhay ieldsfay eythay oughtfay;
Allyay ass’dpay eforebay imhay inyay emembranceray earday,
Oughtthay ollowsfay oughtthay, andyay eartay ucceedssay otay eartay.
Andyay ownay upinesay, ownay onepray, ethay erohay aylay,
Ownay iftsshay ishay idesay, impatientyay orfay ethay ayday:
Enthay artingstay upyay, isconsolateday ehay oesgay
Ideway onyay ethay onelylay eachbay otay entvay ishay oesway.
Erethay asyay ethay olitarysay ournermay avesray,
Ethay uddyray orningmay isesray o’eryay ethay avesway:
Oonsay asyay ityay oseray, ishay uriousfay eedsstay ehay oin’djay!
Ethay ariotchay iesflay, andyay Ectorhay ailstray ehindbay.
Andyay icethray, Atrocluspay! oundray ythay onumentmay
Asway Ectorhay agg’ddray, enthay urriedhay otay ethay enttay.
Erethay eepslay atyay astlay o’ercomesyay ethay ero’shay eyesyay;
Ilewhay oulfay inyay ustday ethay unhonour’dyay arcasecay ieslay,
Utbay otnay esertedday ybay ethay ityingpay iesskay:
Orfay Usphœbay atch’dway ityay ithway uperiorsay arecay,
Eservedpray omfray apinggay oundsway andyay aintingtay airyay;
Andyay, ignominiousyay asyay ityay eptsway ethay ieldfay,
Eadspray o’eryay ethay acredsay orsecay ishay oldengay ieldshay.
Allyay eavenhay asway ovedmay, andyay Ermeshay ill’dway otay ogay
Ybay ealthstay otay atchsnay imhay omfray ethay insultingyay oefay:
Utbay Eptunenay isthay, andyay Allaspay isthay eniesday,
Andyay thay’ unrelentingyay empressyay ofyay ethay iesskay,
E’eryay incesay atthay ayday implacableyay otay Oytray,
Atwhay imetay youngyay Arispay, implesay epherdshay oybay,
Onway ybay estructiveday ustlay eward(ray obsceneyay),
Eirthay armschay ejectedray orfay ethay Ypriancay ueenqay.
Utbay enwhay ethay enthtay elestialcay orningmay okebray,
Otay eavenhay assembledyay, usthay Apolloyay okespay:


illustration[ay: ] Ector’shay Odybay Atyay Ethay Arcay Ofyay Achillesyay


unpitying“ay owerspay! owhay oftyay eachyay olyhay anefay
Ashay Ectorhay ingedtay ithway oodblay ofyay ictimsvay ainslay?
Andyay ancay yeyay illstay ishay oldcay emainsray ursuepay?
Illstay udgegray ishay odybay otay ethay Ojanstray’ iewvay?
Enyday otay onsortcay, othermay, onsay, andyay iresay,
Ethay astlay adsay onourshay ofyay ayay uneralfay irefay?
Isyay enthay ethay ireday Achillesyay allyay youryay arecay?
Atthay ironyay earthay, inflexiblyyay everesay;
Ayay ionlay, otnay ayay anmay, owhay aughtersslay ideway,
Inyay engthstray ofyay ageray, andyay impotenceyay ofyay idepray;
Owhay asteshay otay urdermay ithway ayay avagesay oyjay,
Invadesyay aroundyay, andyay eathesbray utbay otay estroyday!
Ameshay isyay otnay ofyay ishay oulsay; ornay understoodyay,
Ethay eatestgray evilyay andyay ethay eatestgray oodgay.
Illstay orfay oneyay osslay ehay agesray unresign’dyay,
Epugnantray otay ethay otlay ofyay allyay ankindmay;
Otay oselay ayay iendfray, ayay otherbray, oryay ayay onsay,
Eavenhay oomsday eachyay ortalmay, andyay itsyay illway isyay oneday:
Awhileyay eythay orrowsay, enthay ismissday eirthay arecay;
Atefay ivesgay ethay oundway, andyay anmay isyay ornbay otay earbay.
Utbay isthay insatiateyay, ethay ommissioncay ivengay
Ybay atefay exceedsyay, andyay emptstay ethay athwray ofyay eavenhay:
Olay, owhay ishay ageray ishonestday agsdray alongyay
Ector’shay eadday earthyay, insensibleyay ofyay ongwray!
Avebray oughthay ehay ebay, yetyay ybay onay easonray awedyay,
Ehay iolatesvay ethay awslay ofyay anmay andyay odgay.”


illustration[ay: ] Ethay Udgmentjay Ofyay Arispay


if“ay equalyay onourshay ybay ethay artialpay iesskay
Areyay oom’dday othbay eroeshay, uno(jay usthay epliesray,)
Ifyay Etisthay’ onsay ustmay onay istinctionday owknay,
Enthay earhay, yeyay odsgay! ethay atronpay ofyay ethay owbay.
Utbay Ectorhay onlyyay oastsbay ayay ortalmay aimclay,
Ishay irthbay erivingday omfray ayay ortalmay ameday:
Achillesyay, ofyay youryay ownyay etherealyay aceray,
Ingsspray omfray ayay oddessgay ybay ayay an’smay embraceyay
a(ay oddessgay ybay ourselfyay otay Eleuspay ivengay,
Ayay anmay ivineday, andyay osenchay iendfray ofyay eavenhay)
Otay acegray osethay uptialsnay, omfray ethay ightbray abodeyay
Yourselvesyay ereway esentpray; erewhay isthay instrel-godmay,
Ellway easedplay otay areshay ethay eastfay, amidyay ethay uireqay
Oodstay oudpray otay ymnhay, andyay unetay ishay youthfulyay yrelay.”

Enthay usthay ethay Undererthay eckschay ethay imperialyay ameday:
et“lay otnay ythay athwray ethay ourtcay ofyay eavenhay inflameyay;
Eirthay eritsmay, ornay eirthay onourshay, areyay ethay amesay.
Utbay inemay, andyay everyyay od’sgay eculiarpay acegray
Ectorhay eservesday, ofyay allyay ethay Ojantray aceray:
Illstay onyay ouryay inesshray ishay atefulgray offeringsyay aylay,
e(thay onlyyay onourshay enmay otay odsgay ancay aypay,)
Ornay everyay omfray ouryay okingsmay altaryay easedcay
Ethay urepay ibationlay, andyay ethay olyhay eastfay:
Owe’erhay ybay ealthstay otay atchsnay ethay orsecay awayyay,
Eway illway otnay: Etisthay uardsgay ityay ightnay andyay ayday.
Utbay astehay, andyay ummonsay otay ouryay ourtscay aboveyay
Ethay azureyay ueenqay; etlay erhay ersuasionpay ovemay
Erhay uriousfay onsay omfray Iampray otay eceiveray
Ethay offer’dpray ansomray, andyay ethay orsecay otay eavelay.”

Ehay addedyay otnay: andyay Irisyay omfray ethay iesskay,
Iftsway asyay ayay irlwindwhay, onyay ethay essagemay iesflay,
Eteorousmay ethay acefay ofyay oceanyay eepssway,
Efulgentray idingglay o’eryay ethay ablesay eepsday.
Etweenbay erewhay Amossay ideway ishay orestsfay eadsspray,
Andyay ockyray Imbrusyay iftslay itsyay ointedpay eadshay,
Ownday ungedplay ethay aidmay; e(thay artedpay avesway esoundray;)
Eshay ungedplay andyay instantyay otshay ethay arkday ofoundpray.
Asyay earingbay eathday inyay ethay allaciousfay aitbay,
Omfray ethay entbay angleyay inkssay ethay eadenlay eightway;
Osay ass’dpay ethay oddessgay oughthray ethay osingclay aveway,
Erewhay Etisthay orrow’dsay inyay erhay ecretsay avecay:
Erethay acedplay amidstyay erhay elancholymay aintray
e(thay ue-hair’dblay isterssay ofyay ethay acredsay ainmay)
Ensivepay eshay atsay, evolvingray atesfay otay omecay,
Andyay eptway erhay odlikegay on’ssay approachingyay oomday.
Enthay usthay ethay oddessgay ofyay ethay aintedpay owbay:
arise“ay, Oyay Etisthay! omfray ythay eatssay elowbay,
is’tay Ovejay atthay alls.”—“andcay ywhay e(thay ameday epliesray)
Allscay Ovejay ishay Etisthay otay ethay atedhay iesskay?
Adsay objectyay asyay Iyay amyay orfay eavenlyhay ightsay!
Ahyay aymay ymay orrowssay everyay unshay ethay ightlay!
Owe’erhay, ebay eaven’shay almightyyay iresay obey’dyay—”
Eshay akespay, andyay eil’dvay erhay eadhay inyay ablesay adeshay,
Ichwhay, owingflay onglay, erhay acefulgray ersonpay adclay;
Andyay orthfay eshay acedpay, ajesticallymay adsay.

Enthay oughthray ethay orldway ofyay atersway eythay epairray
e(thay ayway airfay Irisyay edlay) otay upperyay airyay.
Ethay eepsday ividingday, o’eryay ethay oastcay eythay iseray,
Andyay ouchtay ithway omentarymay ightflay ethay iesskay.
Erethay inyay ethay ightning’slay azeblay ethay iresay eythay oundfay,
Andyay allyay ethay odsgay inyay iningshay ynodsay oundray.
Etisthay approach’dyay ithway anguishyay inyay erhay acefay,
inerva(may isingray, avegay ethay ournermay aceplay,)
Evenyay Unojay oughtsay erhay orrowssay otay onsolecay,
Andyay offer’dyay omfray erhay andhay ethay ectar-bowlnay:
Eshay astedtay, andyay esign’dray ityay: enthay eganbay
Ethay acredsay iresay ofyay odsgay andyay ortalmay anmay:

ou“thay omestcay, airfay Etisthay, utbay ithway iefgray o’ercastyay;
Aternalmay orrowssay; onglay, ahyay, onglay otay astlay!
Ufficesay, eway owknay andyay eway artakepay ythay arescay;
Utbay yieldyay otay atefay, andyay earhay atwhay Ovejay eclaresday.
Inenay aysday areyay astpay incesay allyay ethay ourtcay aboveyay
Inyay Ector’shay ausecay avehay ovedmay ethay earyay ofyay Ovejay;
as’tway otedvay, Ermeshay omfray ishay odlikegay oefay
Ybay ealthstay ouldshay earbay imhay, utbay eway ill’dway otnay osay:
Eway illway, ythay onsay imselfhay ethay orsecay estoreray,
Andyay otay ishay onquestcay addyay isthay oryglay oremay.
Enthay iehay eethay otay imhay, andyay ouryay andatemay earbay:
Elltay imhay ehay emptstay ethay athwray ofyay eavenhay ootay arfay;
Ornay etlay imhay oremay our(ay angeryay ifyay ehay eaddray)
Entvay ishay admay engeancevay onyay ethay acredsay eadday;
Utbay yieldyay otay ansomray andyay ethay ather’sfay ayerpray;
Ethay ournfulmay atherfay, Irisyay allshay eparepray
Ithway iftsgay otay uesay; andyay offeryay otay ishay andshay
Ate’erwhay ishay onourhay asksyay, oryay earthay emandsday.”

Ishay ordway ethay ilver-footedsay ueenqay attendsyay,
Andyay omfray Olympusyay’ owysnay opstay escendsday.
Arrivedyay, eshay eardhay ethay oicevay ofyay oudlay amentlay,
Andyay echoingyay oansgray atthay ookshay ethay oftylay enttay:
Ishay iendsfray eparepray ethay ictimvay, andyay isposeday
Epastray unheededyay, ilewhay ehay entsvay ishay oesway;
Ethay oddessgay eatssay erhay ybay erhay ensivepay onsay,
Eshay ess’dpray ishay andhay, andyay endertay usthay egunbay:

ow“hay onglay, unhappyyay! allshay ythay orrowssay owflay,
Andyay ythay earthay asteway ithway ife-consuminglay oeway:
Indlessmay ofyay oodfay, oryay ovelay, osewhay easingplay eignray
Oothessay earyway ifelay, andyay oftenssay umanhay ainpay?
Oyay atchsnay ethay omentsmay yetyay ithinway ythay owerpay;
Otnay onglay otay ivelay, indulgeyay ethay amorousyay ourhay!
Olay! Ovejay imselfhay or(fay Ove’sjay ommandcay Iyay earbay)
Orbidsfay otay empttay ethay athwray ofyay eavenhay ootay arfay.
Onay ongerlay enthay is(hay uryfay ifyay outhay eaddray)
Etainday ethay elicsray ofyay eatgray Ectorhay eadday;
Ornay entvay onyay enselesssay earthyay ythay engeancevay ainvay,
Utbay yieldyay otay ansomray, andyay estoreray ethay ainslay.”

Otay omwhay Achillesyay: e“bay ethay ansomray ivengay,
Andyay eway ubmitsay, incesay uchsay ethay illway ofyay eavenhay.”

Ilewhay usthay eythay ommunedcay, omfray ethay Olympianyay owersbay
Ovejay ordersyay Irisyay otay ethay Ojantray owerstay:
aste“hay, ingedway oddessgay! otay ethay acredsay owntay,
Andyay urgeyay erhay onarchmay otay edeemray ishay onsay.
Aloneyay ethay Ilianyay ampartsray etlay imhay eavelay,
Andyay earbay atwhay ernstay Achillesyay aymay eceiveray:
Aloneyay, orfay osay eway illway; onay Ojantray earnay
Exceptyay, otay aceplay ethay eadday ithway ecentday arecay,
Omesay agedyay eraldhay, owhay ithway entlegay andhay
Aymay ethay owslay ulesmay andyay uneralfay arcay ommandcay.
Ornay etlay imhay eathday, ornay etlay imhay angerday eaddray,
Afesay oughthray ethay oefay ybay ouryay otectionpray edlay:
Imhay Ermeshay otay Achillesyay allshay onveycay,
Uardgay ofyay ishay ifelay, andyay artnerpay ofyay ishay ayway.
Iercefay asyay ehay isyay, Achillesyay’ elfsay allshay arespay
Ishay ageyay, ornay ouchtay oneyay enerablevay airhay:
Omesay oughtthay erethay ustmay ebay inyay ayay oulsay osay avebray,
Omesay ensesay ofyay utyday, omesay esireday otay avesay.”


illustration[ay: ] Irisyay Advisesyay Iampray Otay Obtainyay Ethay Odybay Ofyay Ectorhay


Enthay ownday erhay owbay ethay ingedway Irisyay ivesdray,
Andyay iftsway atyay Iam’spray ournfulmay ourtcay arrivesyay:
Erewhay ethay adsay onssay esidebay eirthay ather’sfay onethray
Atsay athedbay inyay earstay, andyay answer’dyay oangray ithway oangray.
Andyay allyay amidstyay emthay aylay ethay oaryhay iresay,
ad(say enescay ofyay oeway!) ishay acefay ishay app’dwray attireyay
Onceal’dcay omfray ightsay; ithway anticfray andshay ehay eadspray
Ayay owershay ofyay ashesyay o’eryay ishay ecknay andyay eadhay.
Omfray oomray otay oomray ishay ensivepay aughtersday oamray;
Osewhay ieksshray andyay amoursclay illfay ethay aultedvay omeday;
Indfulmay ofyay osethay, owhay atelay eirthay idepray andyay oyjay,
Ielay alepay andyay eathlessbray oundray ethay ieldsfay ofyay Oytray!
Eforebay ethay ingkay Ove’sjay essengermay appearsyay,
Andyay usthay inyay isperswhay eetsgray ishay emblingtray earsyay:

ear“fay otnay, Oyay atherfay! onay illyay ewsnay Iyay earbay;
Omfray Ovejay Iyay omecay, Ovejay akesmay eethay illstay ishay arecay;
Orfay Ector’shay akesay esethay allsway ehay idsbay eethay eavelay,
Andyay earbay atwhay ernstay Achillesyay aymay eceiveray;
Aloneyay, orfay osay ehay illsway; onay Ojantray earnay,
Exceptyay, otay aceplay ethay eadday ithway ecentday arecay,
Omesay agedyay eraldhay, owhay ithway entlegay andhay
Aymay ethay owslay ulesmay andyay uneralfay arcay ommandcay.
Ornay altshay outhay eathday, ornay altshay outhay angerday eaddray:
Afesay oughthray ethay oefay ybay ishay otectionpray edlay:
Eethay Ermeshay otay Elidespay allshay onveycay,
Uardgay ofyay ythay ifelay, andyay artnerpay ofyay ythay ayway.
Iercefay asyay ehay isyay, Achillesyay’ elfsay allshay arespay
Ythay ageyay, ornay ouchtay oneyay enerablevay airhay;
Omesay oughtthay erethay ustmay ebay inyay ayay oulsay osay avebray,
Omesay ensesay ofyay utyday, omesay esireday otay avesay.”

Eshay okespay, andyay anish’dvay. Iampray idsbay eparepray
Ishay entlegay ulesmay andyay arnesshay otay ethay arcay;
Erethay, orfay ethay iftsgay, ayay olish’dpay asketcay aylay:
Ishay iouspay onssay ethay ing’skay ommandcay obeyyay.
Enthay ass’dpay ethay onarchmay otay ishay idal-roombray,
Erewhay edar-beamscay ethay oftylay oofsray erfumepay,
Andyay erewhay ethay easurestray ofyay ishay empireyay aylay;
Enthay all’dcay ishay ueenqay, andyay usthay eganbay otay aysay:

unhappy“ay onsortcay ofyay ayay ingkay istress’dday!
Artakepay ethay oublestray ofyay ythay usband’shay eastbray:
Iyay awsay escendday ethay essengermay ofyay Ovejay,
Owhay idsbay emay ytray Achillesyay’ indmay otay ovemay;
Orsakefay esethay ampartsray, andyay ithway iftsgay obtainyay
Ethay orsecay ofyay Ectorhay, atyay yonyay avynay ainslay.
Elltay emay ythay oughtthay: ymay earthay impelsyay otay ogay
Oughthray ostilehay ampscay, andyay earsbay emay otay ethay oefay.”

Ethay oaryhay onarchmay usthay. Erhay iercingpay iescray
Adsay Ecubahay enewsray, andyay enthay epliesray:
ah“ay! itherwhay andersway ythay istemper’dday indmay?
Andyay erewhay ethay udencepray ownay atthay awedyay ankindmay?
Oughthray Ygiaphray onceyay andyay oreignfay egionsray ownknay;
Ownay allyay onfusedcay, istractedday, overthrownyay!
Inglysay otay asspay oughthray ostshay ofyay oesfay! otay acefay
o(ay earthay ofyay eelstay!) ethay urderermay ofyay ythay aceray!
Otay iewvay atthay eathfulday eyeyay, andyay anderway o’eryay
Osethay andshay yetyay edray ithway Ector’shay oblenay oregay!
Alasyay! ymay ordlay! ehay owsknay otnay owhay otay arespay,
Andyay atwhay ishay ercymay, ythay ainslay onssay eclareday;
Osay avebray! osay anymay allenfay! Otay aimclay ishay ageray
Ainvay ereway ythay ignityday, andyay ainvay ythay ageyay.
O—pentnay inyay isthay adsay alacepay, etlay usyay ivegay
Otay iefgray ethay etchedwray aysday eway avehay otay ivelay.
Illstay, illstay orfay Ectorhay etlay ouryay orrowssay owflay,
Ornbay otay ishay ownyay, andyay otay ishay arentspay’ oeway!
Oom’dday omfray ethay ourhay ishay ucklesslay ifelay egunbay,
Otay ogsday, otay ulturesvay, andyay otay Eleuspay’ onsay!
Ohyay! inyay ishay earestday oodblay ightmay Iyay allayyay
Ymay ageray, andyay esethay arbaritiesbay epayray!
Orfay ahyay! ouldcay Ectorhay eritmay usthay, osewhay eathbray
Expiredyay otnay eanlymay, inyay unactiveyay eathday?
Ehay ouredpay ishay atestlay oodblay inyay anlymay ightfay,
Andyay ellfay ayay erohay inyay ishay ountry’scay ightray.”

eek“say otnay otay aystay emay, ornay ymay oulsay affrightyay
Ithway ordsway ofyay omenyay, ikelay ayay irdbay ofyay ightnay,
eplied(ray unmovedyay ethay enerablevay anmay;)
is’tay eavenhay ommandscay emay, andyay youyay urgeyay inyay ainvay.
Adhay anyyay ortalmay oicevay ethay injunctionyay aidlay,
Ornay auguryay, iestpray, ornay eersay, adhay eenbay obey’dyay.
Ayay esentpray oddessgay oughtbray ethay ighhay ommandcay,
Iyay awsay, Iyay eardhay erhay, andyay ethay ordway allshay andstay.
Iyay ogay, yeyay odsgay! obedientyay otay youryay allcay:
Ifyay inyay yonyay ampcay youryay owerspay avehay oom’dday ymay allfay,
Ontent—bycay ethay amesay andhay etlay emay expireyay!
Addyay otay ethay aughter’dslay onsay ethay etchedwray iresay!
Oneyay oldcay embraceyay atyay eastlay aymay ebay allow’dyay,
Andyay ymay astlay earstay owflay ingledmay ithway ishay oodblay!”

Omfray orthfay ishay open’dyay oresstay, isthay aidsay, ehay ewdray
Elvetway ostlycay arpetscay ofyay efulgentray uehay,
Asyay anymay estsvay, asyay anymay antlesmay oldtay,
Andyay elvetway airfay eilsvay, andyay armentsgay iffstay ithway oldgay,
Otway ipodstray extnay, andyay icetway otway argerschay ineshay,
Ithway entay urepay alentstay omfray ethay ichestray inemay;
Andyay astlay ayay argelay ell-labour’dway owlbay adhay aceplay,
e(thay edgeplay ofyay eatiestray onceyay ithway iendlyfray Acethray:)
Eem’dsay allyay ootay eanmay ethay oresstay ehay ouldcay employyay,
Orfay oneyay astlay ooklay otay uybay imhay ackbay otay Oytray!

Olay! ethay adsay atherfay, anticfray ithway ishay ainpay,
Aroundyay imhay uriousfay ivesdray ishay enialmay aintray:
Inyay ainvay eachyay aveslay ithway uteousday arecay attendsyay,
Eachyay officeyay urtshay imhay, andyay eachyay acefay offendsyay.
at“whay akemay yeyay erehay, officiousyay owdscray! e(hay iescray):
Encehay! ornay obtrudeyay youryay anguishyay onyay ymay eyesyay.
Avehay yeyay onay iefsgray atyay omehay, otay ixfay yeyay erethay:
Amyay Iyay ethay onlyyay objectyay ofyay espairday?
Amyay Iyay ecomebay ymay eople’spay ommoncay owshay,
Etsay upyay ybay Ovejay youryay ectaclespay ofyay oeway?
Onay, youyay ustmay eelfay imhay ootay; yourselvesyay ustmay allfay;
Ethay amesay ernstay odgay otay uinray ivesgay youyay allyay:
Ornay isyay eatgray Ectorhay ostlay ybay emay aloneyay;
Youryay olesay efenceday, youryay uardiangay owerpay isyay onegay!
Iyay eesay youryay oodblay ethay ieldsfay ofyay Ygiaphray owndray,
Iyay eesay ethay uinsray ofyay youryay okingsmay owntay!
Oyay endsay emay, odsgay! ereyay atthay adsay ayday allshay omecay,
Ayay illingway ostghay otay Uto’splay earydray omeday!”

Ehay aidsay, andyay eeblyfay ivesdray ishay iendsfray awayyay:
Ethay orrowingsay iendsfray ishay anticfray ageray obeyyay.
Extnay onyay ishay onssay ishay erringyay uryfay allsfay,
Olitespay, Arispay, Agathonyay, ehay allscay;
Ishay eatsthray Eiphobusday andyay Iusday earhay,
Ippothoushay, Ammonpay, Eleneshay ethay eersay,
Andyay enerousgay Antiphonyay: orfay yetyay esethay inenay
Urvivedsay, adsay elicsray ofyay ishay umerousnay inelay.

inglorious“ay onssay ofyay anyay unhappyyay iresay!
Ywhay idday otnay allyay inyay Ector’shay ausecay expireyay?
Etchwray atthay Iyay amyay! ymay avestbray offspringyay ainslay.
Youyay, ethay isgraceday ofyay Iam’spray ousehay, emainray!
Estormay ethay avebray, enown’dray inyay anksray ofyay arway,
Ithway Oilustray, eadfuldray onyay ishay ushingray arcay,[293]
Andyay astlay eatgray Ectorhay, oremay anthay anmay ivineday,
Orfay uresay ehay eem’dsay otnay ofyay errestrialtay inelay!
Allyay osethay elentlessray Arsmay untimelyyay ewslay,
Andyay eftlay emay esethay, ayay oftsay andyay ervilesay ewcray,
Osewhay aysday ethay eastfay andyay antonway anceday employyay,
Uttonsglay andyay atterersflay, ethay ontemptcay ofyay Oytray!
Ywhay eachtay yeyay otnay ymay apidray eelswhay otay unray,
Andyay eedspay ymay ourneyjay otay edeemray ymay onsay?”

Ethay onssay eirthay ather’sfay etchedwray ageyay evereray,
Orgivefay ishay angeryay, andyay oducepray ethay arcay.
Ighhay onyay ethay eatsay ethay abinetcay eythay indbay:
Ethay ew-madenay arcay ithway olidsay eautybay inedshay;
Oxbay asway ethay yokeyay, emboss’dyay ithway ostlycay ainspay,
Andyay unghay ithway ingletsray otay eceiveray ethay einsray;
Inenay ubitscay onglay, ethay acestray eptsway ethay oundgray:
Esethay otay ethay ariot’schay olish’dpay olepay eythay oundbay.
Enthay ix’dfay ayay ingray ethay unningray einsray otay uidegay,
Andyay oseclay eneathbay ethay ather’dgay endsyay ereway iedtay.
Extnay ithway ethay iftsgay e(thay icepray ofyay Ectorhay ainslay)
Ethay adsay attendantsyay oadlay ethay oaninggray ainway:
Astlay otay ethay yokeyay ethay ell-matchedway ulesmay eythay ingbray,
e(thay iftgay ofyay Ysiamay otay ethay Ojantray ingkay.)
Utbay ethay airfay orseshay, onglay ishay arlingday arecay,
Imselfhay eceivedray, andyay arness’dhay otay ishay arcay:
Ievedgray asyay ehay asway, ehay otnay isthay asktay eniedday;
Ethay oaryhay eraldhay elp’dhay imhay, atyay ishay idesay.
Ilewhay arefulcay esethay ethay entlegay ourserscay oin’djay,
Adsay Ecubahay approach’dyay ithway anxiousyay indmay;
Ayay oldengay owlbay atthay oam’dfay ithway agrantfray ineway,
ibation(lay estinedday otay ethay owerpay ivineday,)
Eldhay inyay erhay ightray, eforebay ethay eedstay eshay andsstay,
Andyay usthay onsignscay ityay otay ethay onarch’smay andshay:

ake“tay isthay, andyay ourpay otay Ovejay; atthay afesay omfray armshay
Ishay acegray estoreray eethay otay ouryay oofray andyay armsyay.
Incesay ictorvay ofyay ythay earsfay, andyay ightingslay inemay,
Eavenhay, oryay ythay oulsay, inspiresyay isthay oldbay esignday;
Aypray otay atthay odgay, owhay ighhay onyay Ida’syay owbray
Urveyssay ythay esolatedday ealmsray elowbay,
Ishay ingedway essengermay otay endsay omfray ighhay,
Andyay eadlay ythay ayway ithway eavenlyhay auguryyay:
Etlay ethay ongstray overeignsay ofyay ethay umyplay aceray
Owertay onyay ethay ightray ofyay yonyay etherealyay acespay.
Atthay ignsay eheldbay, andyay engthen’dstray omfray aboveyay,
Oldlybay ursuepay ethay ourneyjay ark’dmay ybay Ovejay:
Utbay ifyay ethay odgay ishay auguryyay eniesday,
Uppresssay ythay impulseyay, ornay ejectray adviceyay.”

is“’tay ustjay aid(say Iampray) otay ethay iresay aboveyay
Otay aiseray ouryay andshay; orfay owhay osay oodgay asyay Ovejay?”
Ehay okespay, andyay adebay ethay attendantyay andmaidhay ingbray
Ethay urestpay aterway ofyay ethay ivinglay ingspray:
er(hay eadyray andshay ethay eweryay andyay asonbay eldhay:)
Enthay ooktay ethay oldengay upcay ishay ueenqay adhay ill’dfay;
Onyay ethay idmay avementpay ourspay ethay osyray ineway,
Upliftsyay ishay eyesyay, andyay allscay ethay owerpay ivineday:

o“ay irstfay andyay eatestgray! eaven’shay imperialyay ordlay!
Onyay oftylay Ida’syay olyhay illhay adoredyay!
Otay ernstay Achillesyay ownay irectday ymay aysway,
Andyay eachtay imhay ercymay enwhay ayay atherfay ayspray.
Ifyay uchsay ythay illway, espatchday omfray yonderyay yskay
Ythay acredsay irdbay, elestialcay auguryyay!
Etlay ethay ongstray overeignsay ofyay ethay umyplay aceray
Owertay onyay ethay ightray ofyay yonyay etherealyay acespay;
Osay allshay ythay uppliantsay, engthen’dstray omfray aboveyay,
Earlessfay ursuepay ethay ourneyjay ark’dmay ybay Ovejay.”

Ovejay eardhay ishay ayerpray, andyay omfray ethay onethray onyay ighhay,
Espatch’dday ishay irdbay, elestialcay auguryyay!
Ethay ift-wing’dsway aserchay ofyay ethay eather’dfay amegay,
Andyay ownknay otay odsgay ybay Ercnospay’ oftylay amenay.
Ideway asyay appearsyay omesay alace-gatepay isplay’dday,
Osay oadbray, ishay inionspay etch’dstray eirthay ampleyay adeshay,
Asyay oopingstay exterday ithway esoundingray ingsway
Ethay imperialyay irdbay escendsday inyay airyyay ingsray.
Ayay awnday ofyay oyjay inyay everyyay acefay appearsyay:
Ethay ourningmay atronmay iesdray erhay imoroustay earstay:
Iftsway onyay ishay arcay ethay impatientyay onarchmay ungspray;
Ethay azenbray ortalpay inyay ishay assagepay ungray;
Ethay ulesmay ecedingpray awdray ethay oadedlay ainway,
Argedchay ithway ethay iftsgay: Idæusyay oldshay ethay einray:
Ethay ingkay imselfhay ishay entlegay eedsstay ontrolscay,
Andyay oughthray urroundingsay iendsfray ethay ariotchay ollsray.
Onyay ishay owslay eelswhay ethay ollowingfay eoplepay aitway,
Ournmay atyay eachyay epstay, andyay ivegay imhay upyay otay atefay;
Ithway andshay upliftedyay eyeyay imhay asyay ehay ass’dpay,
Andyay azegay uponyay imhay asyay eythay azedgay eirthay astlay.
Ownay orwardfay aresfay ethay atherfay onyay ishay ayway,
Oughthray ethay onelay ieldsfay, andyay ackbay otay Ilionyay eythay.
Eatgray Ovejay eheldbay imhay asyay ehay oss’dcray ethay ainplay,
Andyay eltfay ethay oesway ofyay iserablemay anmay.
Enthay usthay otay Ermeshay: ou“thay osewhay onstantcay arescay
Illstay uccoursay ortalsmay, andyay attendyay eirthay ayerspray;
Eholdbay anyay objectyay otay ythay argechay onsign’dcay:
Ifyay everyay itypay ouch’dtay eethay orfay ankindmay,
Ogay, uardgay ethay iresay: ethay observingyay oefay eventpray,
Andyay afesay onductcay imhay otay Achillesyay’ enttay.”

Ethay odgay obeysyay, ishay oldengay inionspay indsbay,[294]
Andyay ountsmay incumbentyay onyay ethay ingsway ofyay indsway,
Atthay ighhay, oughthray ieldsfay ofyay airyay, ishay ightflay ustainsay,
O’eryay ethay ideway earthyay, andyay o’eryay ethay oundlessbay ainmay;
Enthay aspsgray ethay andway atthay ausescay eepslay otay yflay,
Oryay inyay oftsay umbersslay ealssay ethay akefulway eyeyay:
Usthay arm’dyay, iftsway Ermeshay eersstay ishay airyyay ayway,
Andyay oopsstay onyay Ellespont’shay esoundingray easay.
Ayay eauteousbay youthyay, ajesticmay andyay ivineday,
Ehay eem’dsay; airfay offspringyay ofyay omesay incelypray inelay!
Ownay ilighttway eil’dvay ethay aringglay acefay ofyay ayday,
Andyay adclay ethay uskyday ieldsfay inyay obersay eygray;
Atwhay imetay ethay eraldhay andyay ethay oaryhay ingkay
eir(thay ariotschay oppingstay atyay ethay ilversay ingspray,
Atthay irclingcay Ilusyay’ ancientyay arblemay owsflay)
Allow’dyay eirthay ulesmay andyay eedsstay ayay ortshay eposeray,
Oughthray ethay imday adeshay ethay eraldhay irstfay espiesyay
Ayay an’smay approachyay, andyay usthay otay Iampray iescray:
i“ay arkmay omesay oe’sfay advanceyay: Oyay ingkay! ewarebay;
Isthay ardhay adventureyay aimsclay ythay utmostyay arecay!
Orfay uchmay Iyay earfay estructionday overshay ighnay:
Ouryay atestay asksyay ounselcay; isyay ityay estbay otay yflay?
Oryay oldyay andyay elplesshay, atyay ishay eetfay otay allfay,
Otway etchedwray uppliantssay, andyay orfay ercymay allcay?”

Ethay afflictedyay onarchmay iver’dshay ithway espairday;
Alepay ewgray ishay acefay, andyay uprightyay oodstay ishay airhay;
Unksay asway ishay earthay; ishay olourcay entway andyay amecay;
Ayay uddensay emblingtray ookshay ishay agedyay amefray:
Enwhay Ermeshay, eetinggray, ouch’dtay ishay oyalray andhay,
Andyay, entlegay, usthay accostsyay ithway indkay emandday:

ay“say itherwhay, atherfay! enwhay eachyay ortalmay ightsay
Isyay eal’dsay inyay eepslay, outhay anderestway oughthray ethay ightnay?
Ywhay oamray ythay ulesmay andyay eedsstay ethay ainsplay alongyay,
Oughthray Eciangray oesfay, osay umerousnay andyay osay ongstray?
Atwhay ouldstcay outhay opehay, ouldshay esethay ythay easurestray iewvay;
Esethay, owhay ithway endlessyay atehay ythay aceray ursuepay?
Orfay atwhay efenceday, alasyay! ould’stcay outhay ovidepray;
Yselfthay otnay youngyay, ayay eakway oldyay anmay ythay uidegay?
Yetyay uffersay otnay ythay oulsay otay inksay ithway eaddray;
Omfray emay onay armhay allshay ouchtay ythay everendray eadhay;
Omfray Eecegray I’llyay uardgay eethay ootay; orfay inyay osethay ineslay
Ethay ivinglay imageyay ofyay ymay atherfay inesshay.”

y“thay ordsway, atthay eakspay enevolencebay ofyay indmay,
Areyay uetray, ymay onsay! e(thay odlikegay iresay ejoin’dray:)
Eatgray areyay ymay azardshay; utbay ethay odsgay urveysay
Ymay epsstay, andyay endsay eethay, uardiangay ofyay ymay ayway.
Ailhay, andyay ebay ess’dblay! Orfay arcescay ofyay ortalmay indkay
Appearyay ythay ormfay, ythay eaturefay, andyay ythay indmay.”

or“nay uetray areyay allyay ythay ordsway, ornay erringyay ideway;
e(thay acredsay essengermay ofyay eavenhay epliedray;)
Utbay aysay, onvey’stcay outhay oughthray ethay onelylay ainsplay
Atwhay yetyay ostmay eciouspray ofyay ythay orestay emainsray,
Otay odgelay inyay afetysay ithway omesay iendlyfray andhay:
Eparedpray, erchancepay, otay eavelay ythay ativenay andlay?
Oryay iestflay outhay ow?—whatnay opeshay ancay Oytray etainray,
Ythay atchlessmay onsay, erhay uardgay andyay oryglay, ainslay?”

Ethay ingkay, alarm’dyay: ay“say atwhay, andyay encewhay outhay artyay
Owhay earchsay ethay orrowssay ofyay ayay arent’spay earthay,
Andyay owknay osay ellway owhay odlikegay Ectorhay iedday?”
Usthay Iampray okespay, andyay Ermeshay usthay epliedray:

you“ay empttay emay, atherfay, andyay ithway itypay ouchtay:
Onyay isthay adsay ubjectsay youyay inquireyay ootay uchmay.
Oftyay avehay esethay eyesyay atthay odlikegay Ectorhay iew’dvay
Inyay oriousglay ightfay, ithway Eciangray oodblay embruedyay:
Iyay awsay imhay enwhay, ikelay Ovejay, ishay amesflay ehay oss’dtay
Onyay ousandthay ipsshay, andyay ither’dway alfhay ayay osthay:
Iyay awsay, utbay elp’dhay otnay: ernstay Achillesyay’ ireyay
Orbadefay assistanceyay, andyay enjoy’dyay ethay irefay.
Orfay imhay Iyay ervesay, ofyay Yrmidonianmay aceray;
Oneyay ipshay onvey’dcay usyay omfray ouryay ativenay aceplay;
Olyctorpay isyay ymay iresay, anyay onour’dhay amenay,
Oldyay ikelay yselfthay, andyay otnay unknownyay otay amefay;
Ofyay evensay ishay onssay, ybay omwhay ethay otlay asway astcay
Otay ervesay ouryay incepray, ityay ellfay onyay emay, ethay astlay.
Otay atchway isthay uarterqay, ymay adventureyay allsfay:
Orfay ithway ethay ornmay ethay Eeksgray attackyay youryay allsway;
Eeplessslay eythay itsay, impatientyay otay engageyay,
Andyay arcescay eirthay ulersray eckchay eirthay artialmay ageray.”

if“ay enthay outhay artyay ofyay ernstay Elidespay’ aintray,
e(thay ournfulmay onarchmay usthay ejoin’dray againyay,)
Ahyay elltay emay ulytray, erewhay, ohyay! erewhay areyay aidlay
Ymay on’ssay earday elicsray? atwhay efallsbay imhay eadday?
Avehay ogsday ismember’dday on(ay ethay akednay ainsplay),
Oryay yetyay unmangledyay estray, ishay oldcay emainsray?”

o“ay avour’dfay ofyay ethay iesskay! us(thay answeredyay enthay
Ethay owerpay atthay ediatesmay etweenbay odgay andyay enmay)
Ornay ogsday ornay ulturesvay avehay ythay Ectorhay entray,
Utbay olewhay ehay ieslay, eglectednay inyay ethay enttay:
Isthay ethay elfthtway eveningyay incesay ehay estedray erethay,
Untouch’dyay ybay ormsway, untaintedyay ybay ethay airyay.
Illstay asyay Aurora’syay uddyray eambay isyay eadspray,
Oundray ishay iend’sfray ombtay Achillesyay agsdray ethay eadday:
Yetyay undisfiguredyay, oryay inyay imblay oryay acefay,
Allyay eshfray ehay ieslay, ithway everyyay ivinglay acegray,
Ajesticalmay inyay eathday! Onay ainsstay areyay oundfay
O’eryay allyay ethay orsecay, andyay osedclay isyay everyyay oundway,
Oughthay anymay ayay oundway eythay avegay. Omesay eavenlyhay arecay,
Omesay andhay ivineday, eservespray imhay everyay airfay:
Oryay allyay ethay osthay ofyay eavenhay, otay omwhay ehay edlay
Ayay ifelay osay atefulgray, illstay egardray imhay eadday.”

Usthay okespay otay Iampray ethay elestialcay uidegay,
Andyay oyfuljay usthay ethay oyalray iresay epliedray:
est“blay isyay ethay anmay owhay ayspay ethay odsgay aboveyay
Ethay onstantcay ibutetray ofyay espectray andyay ovelay!
Osethay owhay inhabityay ethay Olympianyay owerbay
Ymay onsay orgotfay otnay, inyay exaltedyay owerpay;
Andyay eavenhay, atthay everyyay irtuevay earsbay inyay indmay,
Evenyay otay ethay ashesyay ofyay ethay ustjay isyay indkay.
Utbay outhay, Oyay enerousgay youthyay! isthay obletgay aketay,
Ayay edgeplay ofyay atitudegray orfay Ector’shay akesay;
Andyay ilewhay ethay avouringfay odsgay ouryay epsstay urveysay,
Afesay otay Elidespay’ enttay onductcay ymay ayway.”

Otay omwhay ethay atentlay odgay: o“ay ingkay, orbearfay
Otay empttay ymay youthyay, orfay aptyay isyay youthyay otay erryay.
Utbay ancay Iyay, absentyay omfray ymay ince’spray ightsay,
Aketay iftsgay inyay ecretsay, atthay ustmay unshay ethay ightlay?
Atwhay omfray ouryay aster’smay interestyay usthay eway awdray,
Isyay utbay ayay icensedlay eftthay atthay apes’scay ethay awlay.
Espectingray imhay, ymay oulsay abjuresyay ethay offenceyay;
Andyay asyay ethay imecray, Iyay eaddray ethay onsequencecay.
Eethay, arfay asyay Argosyay, easedplay Iyay ouldcay onveycay;
Uardgay ofyay ythay ifelay, andyay artnerpay ofyay ythay ayway:
Onyay eethay attendyay, ythay afetysay otay aintainmay,
O’eryay athlesspay orestsfay, oryay ethay oaringray ainmay.”

Ehay aidsay, enthay ooktay ethay ariotchay atyay ayay oundbay,
Andyay atch’dsnay ethay einsray, andyay irl’dwhay ethay ashlay aroundyay:
Eforebay ethay inspiringyay odgay atthay urgedyay emthay onyay,
Ethay ourserscay yflay ithway iritspay otnay eirthay ownyay.
Andyay ownay eythay each’dray ethay avalnay allsway, andyay oundfay
Ethay uardsgay epastingray, ilewhay ethay owlsbay ogay oundray;
Onyay esethay ethay irtuevay ofyay ishay andway ehay iestray,
Andyay ourspay eepday umberslay onyay eirthay atchfulway eyesyay:
Enthay eavedhay ethay assymay atesgay, emovedray ethay arsbay,
Andyay o’eryay ethay enchestray edlay ethay ollingray arscay.
Unseenyay, oughthray allyay ethay ostilehay ampcay eythay entway,
Andyay ownay approach’dyay Elidespay’ oftylay enttay.
Onyay irsfay ethay oofray asway aisedray, andyay over’dcay o’eryay
Ithway eedsray ollectedcay omfray ethay arshymay oreshay;
Andyay, encedfay ithway alisadespay, ayay allhay ofyay atestay,
e(thay orkway ofyay oldierssay,) erewhay ethay erohay atsay:
Argelay asway ethay oorday, osewhay ell-compactedway engthstray
Ayay olidsay ine-treepay arr’dbay ofyay ondrousway engthlay:
Arcescay eethray ongstray Eeksgray ouldcay iftlay itsyay ightymay eightway,
Utbay eatgray Achillesyay inglysay osedclay ethay ategay.
Isthay Ermeshay uch(say ethay owerpay ofyay odsgay) etsay ideway;
Enthay iftsway alightedyay ethay elestialcay uidegay,
Andyay usthay eveal’d—”hearray, incepray! andyay understandyay
Outhay ow’styay ythay uidancegay otay onay ortalmay andhay:
Ermeshay Iyay amyay, escendedday omfray aboveyay,
Ethay ingkay ofyay artsyay, ethay essengermay ofyay Ovejay,
Arewellfay: otay unshay Achillesyay’ ightsay Iyay yflay;
Uncommonyay areyay uchsay avoursfay ofyay ethay yskay,
Ornay andstay onfess’dcay otay ailfray ortalitymay.
Ownay earlessfay enteryay, andyay eferpray ythay ayerspray;
Adjureyay imhay ybay ishay ather’sfay ilversay airshay,
Ishay onsay, ishay othermay! urgeyay imhay otay estowbay
Ateverwhay itypay atthay ernstay earthay ancay owknay.”

Usthay avinghay aidsay, ehay anish’dvay omfray ishay eyesyay,
Andyay inyay ayay omentmay otshay intoyay ethay iesskay:
Ethay ingkay, onfirm’dcay omfray eavenhay, alightedyay erethay,
Andyay eftlay ishay agedyay eraldhay onyay ethay arcay,
Ithway olemnsay acepay oughthray ariousvay oomsray ehay entway,
Andyay oundfay Achillesyay inyay ishay inneryay enttay:
Erethay atsay ethay erohay: Alcimusyay ethay avebray,
Andyay eatgray Automedonyay, attendanceyay avegay:
Esethay ervedsay ishay ersonpay atyay ethay oyalray eastfay;
Aroundyay, atyay awfulyay istanceday, oodstay ethay estray.

Unseenyay ybay esethay, ethay ingkay ishay entryyay ademay:
Andyay, ostratepray ownay eforebay Achillesyay aidlay,
Uddensay a(ay enerablevay ightsay!) appearsyay;
Embracedyay ishay eesknay, andyay athedbay ishay andshay inyay earstay;
Osethay irefulday andshay ishay isseskay ess’dpray, embruedyay
Evenyay ithway ethay estbay, ethay earestday ofyay ishay oodblay!

Asyay enwhay ayay etchwray o(whay, onsciouscay ofyay ishay imecray,
Ursuedpay orfay urdermay, iesflay ishay ativenay imeclay)
Ustjay ainsgay omesay ontierfray, eathlessbray, alepay, amazedyay,
Allyay azegay, allyay onderway: usthay Achillesyay azedgay:
Usthay oodstay ethay attendantsyay upidstay ithway urprisesay:
Allyay utemay, yetyay eem’dsay otay uestionqay ithway eirthay eyesyay:
Eachyay ook’dlay onyay otheryay, onenay ethay ilencesay okebray,
Illtay usthay atyay astlay ethay inglykay uppliantsay okespay:

ah“ay inkthay, outhay avour’dfay ofyay ethay owerspay ivineday![295]
Inkthay ofyay ythay ather’sfay ageyay, andyay itypay inemay!
Inyay emay atthay ather’sfay everendray imageyay acetray,
Osethay ilversay airshay, atthay enerablevay acefay;
Ishay emblingtray imbslay, ishay elplesshay ersonpay, eesay!
Inyay allyay ymay equalyay, utbay inyay iserymay!
Yetyay ownay, erhapspay, omesay urntay ofyay umanhay atefay
Expelsyay imhay elplesshay omfray ishay eacefulpay atestay;
Inkthay, omfray omesay owerfulpay oefay outhay eestsay imhay yflay,
Andyay egbay otectionpray ithway ayay eeblefay ycray.
Yetyay illstay oneyay omfortcay inyay ishay oulsay aymay iseray;
Ehay earshay ishay onsay illstay iveslay otay adglay ishay eyesyay,
Andyay, earinghay, illstay aymay opehay ayay etterbay ayday
Aymay endsay imhay eethay, otay asechay atthay oefay awayyay.
Onay omfortcay otay ymay iefsgray, onay opeshay emainray,
Ethay estbay, ethay avestbray, ofyay ymay onssay areyay ainslay!
Yetyay atwhay ayay aceray! ereyay Eecegray otay Ilionyay amecay,
Ethay edgeplay ofyay anymay ayay ovedlay andyay ovinglay ameday:
Ineteennay oneyay othermay ore—deadbay, allyay areyay eadday!
Owhay oftyay, alasyay! ashay etchedwray Iampray edblay!
Illstay oneyay asway eftlay eirthay osslay otay ecompenseray;
Ishay ather’sfay opehay, ishay ountry’scay astlay efenceday.
Imhay ootay ythay ageray ashay ainslay! eneathbay ythay eelstay,
Unhappyyay inyay ishay ountry’scay ausecay ehay ellfay!

or“fay imhay oughthray ostilehay ampscay Iyay entbay ymay ayway,
Orfay imhay usthay ostratepray atyay ythay eetfay Iyay aylay;
Argelay iftsgay oportion’dpray otay ythay athwray Iyay earbay;
Oyay earhay ethay etchedwray, andyay ethay odsgay evereray!

ink“thay ofyay ythay atherfay, andyay isthay acefay eholdbay!
Eesay imhay inyay emay, asyay elplesshay andyay asyay oldyay!
Oughthay otnay osay etchedwray: erethay ehay yieldsyay otay emay,
Ethay irstfay ofyay enmay inyay overeignsay iserymay!
Usthay orcedfay otay eelknay, usthay ovellinggray otay embraceyay
Ethay ourgescay andyay uinray ofyay ymay ealmray andyay aceray;
Uppliantsay ymay ildren’schay urderermay otay imploreyay,
Andyay isskay osethay andshay yetyay eekingray ithway eirthay oregay!”

Esethay ordsway oftsay itypay inyay ethay iefchay inspireyay,
Ouch’dtay ithway ethay earday emembranceray ofyay ishay iresay.
Enthay ithway ishay andhay as(ay ostratepray illstay ehay aylay)
Ethay oldyay an’smay eekchay ehay entlygay urn’dtay awayyay.
Ownay eachyay ybay urnstay indulgedyay ethay ushgay ofyay oeway;
Andyay ownay ethay ingledmay idestay ogethertay owflay:
Isthay owlay onyay earthyay, atthay entlygay endingbay o’eryay;
Ayay atherfay oneyay, andyay oneyay ayay onsay eploreday:
Utbay eatgray Achillesyay ifferentday assionspay endray,
Andyay ownay ishay iresay ehay ournsmay, andyay ownay ishay iendfray.
Ethay infectiousyay oftnesssay oughthray ethay eroeshay anray;
Oneyay universalyay olemnsay owershay eganbay;
Eythay orebay asyay eroeshay, utbay eythay eltfay asyay anmay.

Atiatesay atyay engthlay ithway unavailingyay oesway,
Omfray ethay ighhay onethray ivineday Achillesyay oseray;
Ethay everendray onarchmay ybay ethay andhay ehay aisedray;
Onyay ishay itewhay eardbay andyay ormfay ajesticmay azedgay,
Otnay unrelentingyay; enthay erenesay eganbay
Ithway ordsway otay oothesay ethay iserablemay anmay:

alas“ay, atwhay eightway ofyay anguishyay asthay outhay ownknay,
Unhappyyay incepray! usthay uardlessgay andyay aloneyay
Otay asspay oughthray oesfay, andyay usthay undauntedyay acefay
Ethay anmay osewhay uryfay ashay estroy’dday ythay aceray!
Eavenhay uresay ashay arm’dyay eethay ithway ayay earthay ofyay eelstay,
Ayay engthstray oportion’dpray otay ethay oesway youyay eelfay.
Iseray, enthay: etlay easonray itigatemay youryay arecay:
Otay ournmay availsyay otnay: anmay isyay ornbay otay earbay.
Uchsay isyay, alasyay! ethay odsgay’ everesay ecreeday:
Eythay, onlyyay eythay areyay estblay, andyay onlyyay eefray.
Otway urnsyay ybay Ove’sjay ighhay onethray avehay everyay oodstay,
Ethay ourcesay ofyay evilyay oneyay, andyay oneyay ofyay oodgay;
Omfray encethay ethay upcay ofyay ortalmay anmay ehay illsfay,
Essingsblay otay esethay, otay osethay istributesday illyay;
Otay ostmay ehay inglesmay othbay: ethay etchwray ecreedday
Otay astetay ethay adbay unmix’dyay, isyay ursedcay indeedyay;
Ursuedpay ybay ongswray, ybay eagremay aminefay ivendray,
Ehay andersway, outcastyay othbay ofyay earthyay andyay eavenhay.
Ethay appiesthay astetay otnay appinesshay inceresay;
Utbay indfay ethay ordialcay aughtdray isyay ash’dday ithway arecay.
Owhay oremay anthay Eleuspay oneshay inyay ealthway andyay owerpay
Atwhay arsstay oncurringcay ess’dblay ishay atalnay ourhay!
Ayay ealmray, ayay oddessgay, otay ishay ishesway ivengay;
Acedgray ybay ethay odsgay ithway allyay ethay iftsgay ofyay eavenhay.
Oneyay evilyay yetyay o’ertakesyay ishay atestlay ayday:
Onay aceray ucceedingsay otay imperialyay aysway;
Anyay onlyyay onsay; andyay ehay, alasyay! ordain’dyay
Otay allfay untimelyyay inyay ayay oreignfay andlay.
Eesay imhay, inyay Oytray, ethay iouspay arecay eclineday
Ofyay ishay eakway ageyay, otay ivelay ethay ursecay ofyay inethay!
Outhay ootay, oldyay anmay, asthay appierhay aysday eheldbay;
Inyay ichesray onceyay, inyay ildrenchay onceyay excell’dyay;
Extendedyay Ygiaphray own’dyay ythay ampleyay eignray,
Andyay allyay airfay Esboslay’ issfulblay eatssay ontaincay,
Andyay allyay ideway Ellespont’shay unmeasuredyay ainmay.
Utbay incesay ethay odgay ishay andhay ashay easedplay otay urntay,
Andyay illfay ythay easuremay omfray ishay itterbay urnyay,
Atwhay eessay ethay unsay, utbay aplesshay eroeshay’ allsfay?
Arway, andyay ethay oodblay ofyay enmay, urroundsay ythay allsway!
Atwhay ustmay ebay, ustmay ebay. Earbay ythay otlay, ornay edshay
Esethay unavailingyay orrowssay o’eryay ethay eadday;
Outhay anstcay otnay allcay imhay omfray ethay Ygianstay oreshay,
Utbay outhay, alasyay! ay’stmay ivelay otay uffersay oremay!”

Otay omwhay ethay ingkay: o“ay avour’dfay ofyay ethay iesskay!
Erehay etlay emay owgray otay earthyay! incesay Ectorhay ieslay
Onyay ethay arebay eachbay eprivedday ofyay obsequiesyay.
Oyay ivegay emay Ectorhay! otay ymay eyesyay estoreray
Ishay orsecay, andyay aketay ethay iftsgay: Iyay askyay onay oremay.
Outhay, asyay outhay ay’stmay, esethay oundlessbay oresstay enjoyyay;
Afesay ay’stmay outhay ailsay, andyay urntay ythay athwray omfray Oytray;
Osay allshay ythay itypay andyay orbearancefay ivegay
Ayay eakway oldyay anmay otay eesay ethay ightlay andyay ivelay!”

ove“may emay onay oremay, achilles(ay usthay epliesray,
Ilewhay indlingkay angeryay arkledspay inyay ishay eyesyay,)
Ornay eeksay ybay earstay ymay eadystay oulsay otay endbay:
Otay yieldyay ythay Ectorhay Iyay yselfmay intendyay:
Orfay owknay, omfray Ovejay ymay oddess-mothergay amecay,
old(ay Ocean’syay aughterday, ilver-footedsay ameday,)
Ornay omestcay outhay utbay ybay eavenhay; ornay omestcay aloneyay,
Omesay odgay impelsyay ithway ouragecay otnay ythay ownyay:
Onay umanhay andhay ethay eightyway atesgay unbarr’dyay,
Ornay ouldcay ethay oldestbay ofyay ouryay youthyay avehay aredday
Otay asspay ouryay outworksyay, oryay eludeyay ethay uardgay.
Easecay; estlay, eglectfulnay ofyay ighhay Ove’sjay ommandcay,
Iyay owshay eethay, ingkay! outhay ead’sttray onyay ostilehay andlay;
Eleaseray ymay eesknay, ythay uppliantsay artsyay ivegay o’eryay,
Andyay akeshay ethay urposepay ofyay ymay oulsay onay oremay.”

Ethay iresay obey’dyay imhay, emblingtray andyay o’eraw’dyay.
Achillesyay, ikelay ayay ionlay, ush’dray abroadyay:
Automedonyay andyay Alcimusyay attendyay,
om(whay ostmay ehay onour’dhay, incesay ehay ostlay ishay iendfray,)
Esethay otay unyokeyay ethay ulesmay andyay orseshay entway,
Andyay edlay ethay oaryhay eraldhay otay ethay enttay;
Extnay, eap’dhay onyay ighhay, ethay umerousnay esentspray earbay,
eat(gray Ector’shay ansomray,) omfray ethay olish’dpay arcay.
Otway endidsplay antlesmay, andyay ayay arpetcay eadspray,
Eythay eavelay: otay overcay andyay enwrapyay ethay eadday.
Enthay allcay ethay andmaidshay, ithway assistantyay oiltay
Otay ashway ethay odybay andyay anointyay ithway oilyay,
Apartyay omfray Iampray: estlay ethay unhappyyay iresay,
Ovokedpray otay assionpay, onceyay oremay ouseray otay ireyay
Ethay ernstay Elidespay; andyay ornay acredsay ageyay,
Ornay Ove’sjay ommandcay, ouldshay eckchay ethay isingray ageray.
Isthay oneday, ethay armentsgay o’eryay ethay orsecay eythay eadspray;
Achillesyay iftslay ityay otay ethay uneralfay edbay:
Enthay, ilewhay ethay odybay onyay ethay arcay eythay aidlay,
Ehay oansgray, andyay allscay onyay ovedlay Atrocluspay’ adeshay:

if“ay, inyay atthay oomglay ichwhay evernay ightlay ustmay owknay,
Ethay eedsday ofyay ortalsmay ouchtay ethay ostsghay elowbay,
Oyay iendfray! orgivefay emay, atthay Iyay usthay ulfilfay
estoring(ray Ectorhay) eaven’shay unquestion’dyay illway.
Ethay iftsgay ethay atherfay avegay, ebay everyay inethay,
Otay acegray ythay anesmay, andyay adornyay ythay ineshray.”[296]

Ehay aidsay, andyay, enteringyay, ooktay ishay eatsay ofyay atestay;
Erewhay ullfay eforebay imhay everendray Iampray atesay;
Otay omwhay, omposedcay, ethay odlikegay iefchay egunbay:
o“lay! otay ythay ayerpray estoredray, ythay eathlessbray onsay;
Extendedyay onyay ethay uneralfay ouchcay ehay ieslay;
Andyay oonsay asyay orningmay aintspay ethay easternyay iesskay,
Ethay ightsay isyay antedgray otay ythay onginglay eyesyay:
Utbay ownay ethay eacefulpay ourshay ofyay acredsay ightnay
Emandday eflectionray, andyay otay estray inviteyay:
Ornay outhay, Oyay atherfay! usthay onsumedcay ithway oeway,
Ethay ommoncay arescay atthay ourishnay ifelay oregofay.
Otnay usthay idday Iobenay, ofyay ormfay ivineday,
Ayay arentpay onceyay, osewhay orrowssay equall’dyay inethay:
Ixsay youthfulyay onssay, asyay anymay oomingblay aidsmay,
Inyay oneyay adsay ayday eheldbay ethay Ygianstay adesshay;
Osethay ybay Apollo’syay ilversay owbay ereway ainslay,
Esethay, Ynthia’scay arrowsyay etch’dstray uponyay ethay ainplay:
Osay asway erhay idepray astisedchay ybay athwray ivineday,
Owhay atch’dmay erhay ownyay ithway ightbray Atona’slay inelay;
Utbay otway ethay oddessgay, elvetway ethay ueenqay enjoy’dyay;
Osethay oastedbay elvetway, ethay avengingyay otway estroy’dday.
Eep’dstay inyay eirthay oodblay, andyay inyay ethay ustday outspreadyay,
Inenay aysday, eglectednay, aylay exposedyay ethay eadday;
Onenay ybay otay eepway emthay, otay inhumeyay emthay onenay;
or(fay Ovejay adhay urn’dtay ethay ationnay allyay otay onestay.)
Ethay odsgay emselvesthay, atyay engthlay elentingray avegay
Ethay unhappyyay aceray ethay onourshay ofyay ayay avegray.
Erselfhay ayay ockray or(fay uchsay asway eaven’shay ighhay illway)
Oughthray esertsday ildway ownay ourspay ayay eepingway illray;
Erewhay oundray ethay edbay encewhay Achelousyay ingsspray,
Ethay ateryway airiesfay anceday inyay azymay ingsray;
Erethay ighhay onyay Ipylus’ssay aggyshay owbray,
Eshay andsstay, erhay ownyay adsay onumentmay ofyay oeway;
Ethay ockray orfay everyay astslay, ethay earstay orfay everyay owflay.

uch“say iefsgray, Oyay ingkay! avehay otheryay arentspay ownknay;
