Ememberray eirsthay, andyay itigatemay ythay ownyay.
Ethay arecay ofyay eavenhay ythay Ectorhay ashay appear’dyay,
Ornay allshay ehay ielay unweptyay, andyay uninterr’dyay;
Oonsay aymay ythay agedyay eekschay inyay earstay ebay own’ddray,
Andyay allyay ethay eyesyay ofyay Ilionyay eamstray aroundyay.”

Ehay aidsay, andyay, isingray, osechay ethay ictimvay eweyay
Ithway ilversay eeceflay, ichwhay ishay attendantsyay ewslay.
Ethay imbslay eythay eversay omfray ethay eekingray idehay,
Ithway illskay eparepray emthay, andyay inyay artspay ivideday:
Eachyay onyay ethay oalscay ethay eparatesay orselsmay ayslay,
Andyay, astyhay, atchessnay omfray ethay isingray azeblay.
Ithway eadbray ethay itteringglay anisterscay eythay oadlay,
Ichwhay oundray ethay oardbay Automedonyay estow’dbay.
Ethay iefchay imselfhay otay eachyay ishay ortionpay acedplay,
Andyay eachyay indulgingyay aredshay inyay eetsway epastray.
Enwhay ownay ethay ageray ofyay ungerhay asway epress’dray,
Ethay onderingway erohay eyesyay ishay oyalray uestgay:
Onay esslay ethay oyalray uestgay ethay erohay eyesyay,
Ishay odlikegay aspectyay andyay ajesticmay izesay;
Erehay, youthfulyay acegray andyay oblenay irefay engageyay;
Andyay erethay, ethay ildmay enevolencebay ofyay ageyay.
Usthay azinggay onglay, ethay ilencesay eithernay okebray,
a(ay olemnsay enescay!) atyay engthlay ethay atherfay okespay:

ermit“pay emay ownay, elovedbay ofyay Ovejay! otay eepstay
Ymay arefulcay emplestay inyay ethay ewday ofyay eepslay:
Orfay, incesay ethay ayday atthay umber’dnay ithway ethay eadday
Ymay aplesshay onsay, ethay ustday ashay eenbay ymay edbay;
Oftsay eepslay ayay angerstray otay ymay eepingway eyesyay;
Ymay onlyyay oodfay, ymay orrowssay andyay ymay ighssay!
Illtay ownay, encouragedyay ybay ethay acegray youyay ivegay,
Iyay areshay ythay anquetbay, andyay onsentcay otay ivelay.”

Ithway atthay, Achillesyay adebay eparepray ethay edbay,
Ithway urplepay oftsay andyay aggyshay arpetscay eadspray;
Orthfay, ybay ethay amingflay ightslay, eythay endbay eirthay ayway,
Andyay aceplay ethay ouchescay, andyay ethay overingscay aylay.
Enthay ehay: ow“nay, atherfay, eepslay, utbay eepslay otnay erehay;
Onsultcay ythay afetysay, andyay orgivefay ymay earfay,
Estlay anyyay Argiveyay, atyay isthay ourhay awakeyay,
Otay askyay ouryay ounselcay, oryay ouryay ordersyay aketay,
Approachingyay uddensay otay ouryay open’dyay enttay,
Erchancepay eholdbay eethay, andyay ouryay acegray eventpray.
Ouldshay uchsay eportray ythay onour’dhay ersonpay erehay,
Ethay ingkay ofyay enmay ethay ansomray ightmay eferday;
Utbay aysay ithway eedspay, ifyay aughtyay ofyay ythay esireday
Emainsray unask’dyay; atwhay imetay ethay itesray equireray
Otay interyay ythay Ectorhay? Orfay, osay onglay eway aystay
Ouryay aughteringslay armyay, andyay idbay ethay ostshay obeyyay.”

if“ay enthay ythay illway ermitpay e(thay onarchmay aidsay)
Otay inishfay allyay ueday onourshay otay ethay eadday,
Isthay ofyay ythay acegray accordyay: otay eethay areyay ownknay
Ethay earsfay ofyay Ilionyay, osedclay ithinway erhay owntay;
Andyay atyay atwhay istanceday omfray ouryay allsway aspireyay
Ethay illshay ofyay Ideyay, andyay orestsfay orfay ethay irefay.
Inenay aysday otay entvay ouryay orrowssay Iyay equestray,
Ethay enthtay allshay eesay ethay uneralfay andyay ethay eastfay;
Ethay extnay, otay aiseray ishay onumentmay ebay ivengay;
Ethay elfthtway eway arway, ifyay arway ebay oom’dday ybay eavenhay!”

is“thay ythay equestray eplied(ray ethay iefchay) enjoyyay:
Illtay enthay ouryay armsyay uspendsay ethay allfay ofyay Oytray.”

Enthay avegay ishay andhay atyay artingpay, otay eventpray
Ethay oldyay an’smay earsfay, andyay urn’dtay ithinway ethay enttay;
Erewhay airfay Iseïsbray, ightbray inyay oomingblay armschay,
Expectsyay erhay erohay ithway esiringday armsyay.
Utbay inyay ethay orchpay ethay ingkay andyay eraldhay estray;
Adsay eamsdray ofyay arecay yetyay anderingway inyay eirthay eastbray.
Ownay odsgay andyay enmay ethay iftsgay ofyay eepslay artakepay;
Industriousyay Ermeshay onlyyay asway awakeyay,
Ethay ing’skay eturnray evolvingray inyay ishay indmay,
Otay asspay ethay ampartsray, andyay ethay atchway otay indblay.
Ethay owerpay escendingday over’dhay o’eryay ishay eadhay:
and“ay eep’stslay outhay, atherfay! us(thay ethay isionvay aidsay:)
Ownay ostday outhay eepslay, enwhay Ectorhay isyay estoredray?
Ornay earfay ethay Eciangray oesfay, oryay Eciangray ordlay?
Ythay esencepray erehay ouldshay ernstay Atridesyay eesay,
Ythay illstay urvivingsay onssay aymay uesay orfay eethay;
Aymay offeryay allyay ythay easurestray yetyay ontaincay,
Otay arespay ythay ageyay; andyay offeryay allyay inyay ainvay.”

Akedway ithway ethay ordway ethay emblingtray iresay aroseyay,
Andyay aisedray ishay iendfray: ethay odgay eforebay imhay oesgay:
Ehay oinsjay ethay ulesmay, irectsday emthay ithway ishay andhay,
Andyay ovesmay inyay ilencesay oughthray ethay ostilehay andlay.
Enwhay ownay otay Anthusxay’ yellowyay eamstray eythay ovedray,
anthus(xay, immortalyay ogenypray ofyay Ovejay,)
Ethay ingedway eityday orsookfay eirthay iewvay,
Andyay inyay ayay omentmay otay Olympusyay ewflay.
Ownay edshay Aurorayay oundray erhay affronsay ayray,
Angspray oughthray ethay atesgay ofyay ightlay, andyay avegay ethay ayday:
Argedchay ithway ethay ournfulmay oadlay, otay Ilionyay ogay
Ethay agesay andyay ingkay, ajesticallymay owslay.
Assandracay irstfay eholdsbay, omfray Ilion’syay irespay,
Ethay adsay ocessionpray ofyay erhay oaryhay iresay;
Enthay, asyay ethay ensivepay omppay advancedyay oremay earnay,
er(hay eathlessbray otherbray etchedstray uponyay ethay ierbay,)
Ayay owershay ofyay earstay o’erflowsyay erhay eauteousbay eyesyay,
Alarmingyay usthay allyay Ilionyay ithway erhay iescray:

urn“tay erehay youryay epsstay, andyay erehay youryay eyesyay employyay,
Yeyay etchedwray aughtersday, andyay yeyay onssay ofyay Oytray!
Ifyay e’eryay yeyay ush’dray inyay owdscray, ithway astvay elightday,
Otay ailhay youryay erohay oriousglay omfray ethay ightfay,
Ownay eetmay imhay eadday, andyay etlay youryay orrowssay owflay;
Youryay ommoncay iumphtray, andyay youryay ommoncay oeway.”

Inyay ongingthray owdscray eythay issueyay otay ethay ainsplay;
Ornay anmay ornay omanway inyay ethay allsway emainsray;
Inyay everyyay acefay ethay elf-samesay iefgray isyay ownshay;
Andyay Oytray endssay orthfay oneyay universalyay oangray.
Atyay A’sscæay atesgay eythay eetmay ethay ourningmay ainway,
Anghay onyay ethay eelswhay, andyay ovelgray oundray ethay ainslay.
Ethay ifeway andyay othermay, anticfray ithway espairday,
Isskay ishay alepay eekchay, andyay endray eirthay atter’dscay airhay:
Usthay ildlyway ailingway, atyay ethay atesgay eythay aylay;
Andyay erethay adhay igh’dsay andyay orrow’dsay outyay ethay ayday;
Utbay odlikegay Iampray omfray ethay ariotchay oseray:
orbear“fay e(hay iedcray) isthay iolencevay ofyay oesway;
Irstfay otay ethay alacepay etlay ethay arcay oceedpray,
Enthay ourpay youryay oundlessbay orrowssay o’eryay ethay eadday.”

Ethay avesway ofyay eoplepay atyay ishay ordway ivideday,
Owslay ollsray ethay ariotchay oughthray ethay ollowingfay idetay;
Evenyay otay ethay alacepay ethay adsay omppay eythay aitway:
Eythay eepway, andyay aceplay imhay onyay ethay edbay ofyay atestay.
Ayay elancholymay oirchay attendyay aroundyay,
Ithway aintiveplay ighssay, andyay usic’smay olemnsay oundsay:
Alternatelyyay eythay ingsay, alternateyay owflay
Ethay obedientyay earstay, elodiousmay inyay eirthay oeway.
Ilewhay eeperday orrowssay oangray omfray eachyay ullfay earthay,
Andyay aturenay eaksspay atyay everyyay ausepay ofyay artyay.

Irstfay otay ethay orsecay ethay eepingway onsortcay ewflay;
Aroundyay ishay ecknay erhay ilk-whitemay armsyay eshay ewthray,
and“ay ohyay, ymay Ectorhay! Ohyay, ymay ordlay! e(shay iescray)
Atch’dsnay inyay ythay oomblay omfray esethay esiringday eyesyay!
Outhay otay ethay ismalday ealmsray orfay everyay onegay!
Andyay Iyay abandon’dyay, esolateday, aloneyay!
Anyay onlyyay onsay, onceyay omfortcay ofyay ouryay ainspay,
Adsay oductpray ownay ofyay aplesshay ovelay, emainsray!
Evernay otay anlymay ageyay atthay onsay allshay iseray,
Oryay ithway increasingyay acesgray adglay ymay eyesyay:
Orfay Ilionyay ownay er(hay eatgray efenderday ainslay)
Allshay inksay ayay okingsmay uinray onyay ethay ainplay.
Owhay ownay otectspray erhay ivesway ithway uardiangay arecay?
Owhay avessay erhay infantsyay omfray ethay ageray ofyay arway?
Ownay ostilehay eetsflay ustmay aftway osethay infantsyay o’eryay
ose(thay ivesway ustmay aitway emthay) otay ayay oreignfay oreshay:
Outhay ootay, ymay onsay, otay arbarousbay imesclay allshay ogay,
Ethay adsay ompanioncay ofyay ythay other’smay oeway;
Ivendray encehay ayay aveslay eforebay ethay ictor’svay ordsway
Ondemn’dcay otay oiltay orfay omesay inhumanyay ordlay:
Oryay elseyay omesay Eekgray osewhay atherfay ess’dpray ethay ainplay,
Oryay onsay, oryay otherbray, ybay eatgray Ectorhay ainslay,
Inyay Ector’shay oodblay ishay engeancevay allshay enjoyyay,
Andyay urlhay eethay eadlonghay omfray ethay owerstay ofyay Oytray.[297]
Orfay ythay ernstay atherfay evernay aredspay ayay oefay:
Encethay allyay esethay earstay, andyay allyay isthay enescay ofyay oeway!
Encethay anymay evilsyay ishay adsay arentspay orebay,
Ishay arentspay anymay, utbay ishay onsortcay oremay.
Ywhay av’stgay outhay otnay otay emay ythay yingday andhay?
Andyay ywhay eceivedray otnay Iyay ythay astlay ommandcay?
Omesay ordway outhay ould’stway avehay okespay, ichwhay, adlysay earday,
Ymay oulsay ightmay eepkay, oryay utteryay ithway ayay eartay;
Ichwhay evernay, evernay ouldcay ebay ostlay inyay airyay,
Ix’dfay inyay ymay earthay, andyay oftyay epeatedray erethay!”

Usthay otay erhay eepingway aidsmay eshay akesmay erhay oanmay,
Erhay eepingway andmaidshay echoyay oangray orfay oangray.

Ethay ournfulmay othermay extnay ustainssay erhay artpay:
o“ay outhay, ethay estbay, ethay earestday otay ymay earthay!
Ofyay allyay ymay aceray outhay ostmay ybay eavenhay approvedyay,
Andyay ybay ethay immortalsyay evenyay inyay eathday elovedbay!
Ilewhay allyay ymay otheryay onssay inyay arbarousbay andsbay
Achillesyay oundbay, andyay oldsay otay oreignfay andslay,
Isthay eltfay onay ainschay, utbay entway ayay oriousglay ostghay,
Eefray, andyay ayay erohay, otay ethay Ygianstay oastcay.
Entencedsay, is’tay uetray, ybay ishay inhumanyay oomday,
Ythay oblenay orsecay asway agg’ddray aroundyay ethay ombtay;
e(thay ombtay ofyay imhay ythay arlikeway armyay adhay ainslay;)
Ungenerousyay insultyay, impotentyay andyay ainvay!
Yetyay ow’stglay outhay eshfray ithway everyyay ivinglay acegray;
Onay arkmay ofyay ainpay, oryay iolencevay ofyay acefay:
Osyray andyay airfay! asyay Usphœbay’ ilversay owbay
Ismiss’dday eethay entlygay otay ethay adesshay elowbay.”

Usthay okespay ethay ameday, andyay eltedmay intoyay earstay.
Adsay Elenhay extnay inyay omppay ofyay iefgray appearsyay;
Astfay omfray ethay iningshay uicesslay ofyay erhay eyesyay
Allfay ethay oundray ystalcray opsdray, ilewhay usthay eshay iescray.

ah“ay, earestday iendfray! inyay omwhay ethay odsgay adhay oin’djay[298]
Ethay ildestmay annersmay ithway ethay avestbray indmay,
Ownay icetway entay yearsyay unhappy(ay yearsyay) areyay o’eryay
Incesay Arispay oughtbray emay otay ethay Ojantray oreshay,
o(ay adhay Iyay erish’dpay, ereyay atthay ormfay ivineday
Educedsay isthay oftsay, isthay easyyay earthay ofyay inemay!)
Yetyay asway ityay e’ernay ymay atefay, omfray eethay otay indfay
Ayay eedday ungentleyay, oryay ayay ordway unkindyay.
Enwhay othersyay ursedcay ethay authoressyay ofyay eirthay oeway,
Ythay itypay eck’dchay ymay orrowssay inyay eirthay owflay.
Ifyay omesay oudpray otherbray eyedyay emay ithway isdainday,
Oryay ornfulscay istersay ithway erhay eepingsway aintray,
Ythay entlegay accentsyay often’dsay allyay ymay ainpay.
Orfay eethay Iyay ournmay, andyay ournmay yselfmay inyay eethay,
Ethay etchedwray ourcesay ofyay allyay isthay iserymay.
Ethay atefay Iyay ausedcay, orfay everyay Iyay emoanbay;
Adsay Elenhay ashay onay iendfray, ownay outhay artyay onegay!
Oughthray Oy’stray ideway eetsstray abandon’dyay allshay Iyay oamray!
Inyay Oytray esertedday, asyay abhorr’dyay atyay omehay!”

Osay okespay ethay airfay, ithway orrow-streamingsay eyeyay.
Istressfulday eautybay eltsmay eachyay ander-bystay.
Onyay allyay aroundyay ethay infectiousyay orrowsay owsgray;
Utbay Iampray eck’dchay ethay orrenttay asyay ityay oseray:
erform“pay, yeyay Ojanstray! atwhay ethay itesray equireray,
Andyay ellfay ethay orestsfay orfay ayay uneralfay yrepay;
Elvetway aysday, ornay oesfay ornay ecretsay ambushyay eaddray;
Achillesyay antsgray esethay onourshay otay ethay eadday.”[299]


illustration[ay: ] Uneralfay Ofyay Ectorhay


Ehay okespay, andyay, atyay ishay ordway, ethay Ojantray aintray
Eirthay ulesmay andyay oxenyay arnesshay otay ethay ainway,
Ourpay oughthray ethay atesgay, andyay ell’dfay omfray Ida’syay owncray,
Ollray ackbay ethay ather’dgay orestsfay otay ethay owntay.
Esethay oilstay ontinuecay inenay ucceedingsay aysday,
Andyay ighhay inyay airyay ayay ylvansay ucturestray aiseray.
Utbay enwhay ethay enthtay airfay ornmay eganbay otay ineshay,
Orthfay otay ethay ilepay asway ornebay ethay anmay ivineday,
Andyay acedplay aloftyay; ilewhay allyay, ithway eamingstray eyesyay,
Eheldbay ethay amesflay andyay ollingray okessmay ariseyay.
Oonsay asyay Aurorayay, aughterday ofyay ethay awnday,
Ithway osyray ustrelay eak’dstray ethay ewyday awnlay,
Againyay ethay ournfulmay owdscray urroundsay ethay yrepay,
Andyay uenchqay ithway ineway ethay yetyay emainingray irefay.
Ethay owysnay onesbay ishay iendsfray andyay othersbray aceplay
ith(way earstay ollectedcay) inyay ayay oldengay asevay;
Ethay oldengay asevay inyay urplepay allspay eythay oll’dray,
Ofyay oftestsay exturetay, andyay inwroughtyay ithway oldgay.
Astlay o’eryay ethay urnyay ethay acredsay earthyay eythay eadspray,
Andyay aisedray ethay ombtay, emorialmay ofyay ethay eadday.
ong(stray uardsgay andyay iesspay, illtay allyay ethay itesray ereway oneday,
Atch’dway omfray ethay isingray otay ethay ettingsay unsay.)
Allyay Oytray enthay ovesmay otay Iam’spray ourtcay againyay,
Ayay olemnsay, ilentsay, elancholymay aintray:
Assembledyay erethay, omfray iouspay oiltay eythay estray,
Andyay adlysay aredshay ethay astlay epulchralsay eastfay.
Uchsay onourshay Ilionyay otay erhay erohay aidpay,
Andyay eacefulpay eptslay ethay ightymay Ector’shay adeshay.[300]




Oncludingcay Otenay.


Eway avehay ownay assedpay oughthray ethay Iliadyay, andyay eensay ethay angeryay ofyay Achillesyay,
andyay ethay erribletay effectsyay ofyay ityay, atyay anyay endyay: asyay atthay onlyyay asway ethay ubjectsay
ofyay ethay oempay, andyay ethay aturenay ofyay epicyay oetrypay ouldway otnay ermitpay ouryay authoryay
otay oceedpray otay ethay eventyay ofyay ethay arway, ityay erhapspay aymay ebay acceptableyay otay ethay
ommoncay eaderray otay ivegay ayay ortshay accountyay ofyay atwhay appenedhay otay Oytray andyay ethay
iefchay actorsyay inyay isthay oempay afteryay ethay onclusioncay ofyay ityay.

Iyay eednay otnay entionmay atthay Oytray asway akentay oonsay afteryay ethay eathday ofyay Ectorhay
ybay ethay atagemstray ofyay ethay oodenway orsehay, ethay articularspay ofyay ichwhay areyay
escribedday ybay Irgilvay inyay ethay econdsay ookbay ofyay ethay Eidænay.

Achillesyay ellfay eforebay Oytray, ybay ethay andhay ofyay Arispay, ybay ethay otshay ofyay anyay
arrowyay inyay ishay eelhay, asyay Ectorhay adhay ophesiedpray atyay ishay eathday, iblay. iixxay.

Ethay unfortunateyay Iampray asway illedkay ybay Yrrhuspay, ethay onsay ofyay Achillesyay.

Ajaxyay, afteryay ethay eathday ofyay Achillesyay, adhay ayay ontestcay ithway Ulyssesyay orfay ethay
armouryay ofyay Ulcanvay, utbay eingbay efeatedday inyay ishay aimyay, ehay ewslay imselfhay
oughthray indignationyay.

Elenhay, afteryay ethay eathday ofyay Arispay, arriedmay Eiphobusday ishay otherbray, andyay atyay
ethay akingtay ofyay Oytray etrayedbay imhay, inyay orderyay otay econcileray erselfhay otay
Enelausmay erhay irstfay usbandhay, owhay eceivedray erhay againyay intoyay avourfay.

Agamemnonyay atyay ishay eturnray asway arbarouslybay urderedmay ybay Ysthusægay, atyay ethay
instigationyay ofyay Ytemnestraclay ishay ifeway, owhay inyay ishay absenceyay adhay
ishonouredday ishay edbay ithway Ysthusægay.

Iomedday, afteryay ethay allfay ofyay Oytray, asway expelledyay ishay ownyay ountrycay, andyay
arcescay escapedyay ithway ishay ifelay omfray ishay adulterousyay ifeway Ialéægay; utbay atyay
astlay asway eceivedray ybay Aunusday inyay Apuliayay, andyay aredshay ishay ingdomkay; ityay isyay
uncertainyay owhay ehay iedday.

Estornay ivedlay inyay eacepay ithway ishay ildrenchay, inyay Ylospay, ishay ativenay ountrycay.

Ulyssesyay alsoyay, afteryay innumerableyay oublestray ybay easay andyay andlay, atyay astlay
eturnedray inyay afetysay otay Ithacayay, ichwhay isyay ethay ubjectsay ofyay Omer’shay Odysseyyay.

Orfay atwhay emainsray, Iyay egbay otay ebay excusedyay omfray ethay eremoniescay ofyay akingtay
eavelay atyay ethay endyay ofyay ymay orkway, andyay omfray embarrassingyay yselfmay, oryay othersyay,
ithway anyyay efencesday oryay apologiesyay aboutyay ityay. Utbay insteadyay ofyay endeavouringyay otay
aiseray ayay ainvay onumentmay otay yselfmay, ofyay ethay eritsmay oryay ifficultiesday ofyay ityay
ich(whay ustmay ebay eftlay otay ethay orldway, otay uthtray, andyay otay osteritypay), etlay emay
eavelay ehindbay emay ayay emorialmay ofyay ymay iendshipfray ithway oneyay ofyay ethay ostmay
aluablevay ofyay enmay, asyay ellway asyay inestfay iterswray, ofyay ymay ageyay andyay ountrycay, oneyay
owhay ashay iedtray, andyay owsknay ybay ishay ownyay experienceyay, owhay ardhay anyay undertakingyay
ityay isyay otay oday usticejay otay Omerhay, andyay oneyay omwhay i(ay amyay uresay) incerelysay
ejoicesray ithway emay atyay ethay eriodpay ofyay ymay abourslay. Otay imhay, ereforethay, avinghay
oughtbray isthay onglay orkway otay ayay onclusioncay, Iyay esireday otay edicateday ityay, andyay otay
avehay ethay onourhay andyay atisfactionsay ofyay acingplay ogethertay, inyay isthay annermay,
ethay amesnay ofyay Mray. Ongrevecay, andyay ofyay

Archmay 25, 1720

Ayay. Opepay


Ontay eonthay eday eupoiia—toyay aemay epiyay eonplay emay ocophaipray enyay oiaetikipay aikay
alloisyay epitaeoeimasiyay enyay oisyay isosyay ayay ateschethaenkay, eiyay aesthomaenyay emautanyay
euodosyay oiontapray.

May. Aurelyay Antonyay e_day Eipsosay_, iblay. iyay. § 17.


Endyay Ofyay Ethay Iliadyay




Ootnotesfay


 [1] at“whay,” ayssay Archdeaconyay Ilberforceway, is“ay ethay aturalnay ootray ofyay
 oyaltylay asyay istinguishedday omfray uchsay eremay elfishsay esireday ofyay ersonalpay
 ecuritysay asyay isyay aptyay otay aketay itsyay aceplay inyay ivilizedcay imestay, utbay atthay
 onsciousnesscay ofyay ayay aturalnay ondbay amongyay ethay amiliesfay ofyay enmay ichwhay ivesgay
 ayay ellow-feelingfay otay olewhay ansclay andyay ationsnay, andyay usthay enlistsyay eirthay
 affectionsyay inyay ehalfbay ofyay osethay ime-honouredtay epresentativesray ofyay eirthay
 ancientyay oodblay, inyay osewhay uccesssay eythay eelfay ayay ersonalpay interestyay? Encehay
 ethay elightday enwhay eway ecognizeray anyay actyay ofyay obilitynay oryay usticejay inyay ouryay
 ereditaryhay incespray

uque“‘tay iorpray, utay arcepay enusgay uiqay ucisday Olympoyay,
Ojicepray elatay anumay anguis_say eusmay_’

o“say ongstray isyay isthay eelingfay, atthay ityay egainsray anyay engraftedyay influenceyay evenyay
enwhay istoryhay itnessesway atthay astvay onvulsionscay avehay entray andyay eakenedway ityay
andyay ethay Elticcay eelingfay owardstay ethay Uartsstay ashay eenbay ekindledray inyay ouryay
ownyay aysday owardstay ethay anddaughtergray ofyay Eorgegay ethay Irdthay ofyay Anoverhay.
 omewhat“say imilarsay aymay ebay eensay inyay ethay ispositionday otay idolizeyay osethay
 eatgray awgiverslay ofyay an’smay aceray, owhay avehay ivengay expressionyay, inyay ethay
 immortalyay anguagelay ofyay ongsay, otay ethay eeperday inspirationsyay ofyay ouryay
 aturenay. Ethay oughtsthay ofyay Omerhay oryay ofyay Akespereshay areyay ethay universalyay
 inheritanceyay ofyay ethay umanhay aceray. Inyay isthay utualmay oundgray everyyay anmay
 eetsmay ishay otherbray, eythay avehay eenbay etsay orthfay ybay ethay ovidencepray ofyay
 Odgay otay indicatevay orfay allyay ofyay usyay atwhay aturenay ouldcay effectyay, andyay atthay,
 inyay esethay epresentativesray ofyay ouryay aceray, eway ightmay ecognizeray ouryay ommoncay
 enefactors.’—_doctrinebay ofyay ethay Incarnationyay_, ppay. 9, 10.

 [2] Εἰκοςay δέay μινay ἦνay καὶay μνημόσυναay πάντωνay γράφεσθαιay. Itvay. Omhay. inyay
 Eighschway. Erodothay. tay. ivyay. pay. 299, sqay. § 6. Iyay aymay observeyay atthay isthay
 Ifelay ashay eenbay araphrasedpay inyay Englishyay ybay ymay earnedlay youngyay iendfray
 Ennethkay Ray. Hay. Ackenziemay, andyay appendedyay otay ymay osepray anslationtray ofyay ethay
 Odysseyyay. Ethay esentpray abridgementyay oweverhay, illway ontaincay allyay atthay isyay ofyay
 useyay otay ethay eaderray, orfay ethay iographicalbay aluevay ofyay ethay eatisetray isyay ostmay
 insignificantyay.

 [3] i.e_ay._ othbay ofyay omposingcay andyay ecitingray ersesvay orfay asyay Airblay
 observesyay, e“thay irstfay oetspay angsay eirthay ownyay ersesvay.” Extussay Empiryay. advyay.
 Usmay. pay. 360 edyay. Abricfay. Οὐay ἀμελειay γέay τοιay καὶay οἰay ποιηταὶay μελοποιοὶay
 λέγονταιay, καὶay τὰay Ὁμήρουay ἕπηay τὸay πάλαιay πρὸςay λύρανay ἤδετοay.
 e“thay oicevay,” observesyay Eerenhay, as“way alwaysyay accompaniedyay ybay omesay
 instrumentyay. Ethay ardbay asway ovidedpray ithway ayay arphay onyay ichwhay ehay ayedplay ayay
 eludepray, otay elevateyay andyay inspireyay ishay indmay, andyay ithway ichwhay ehay
 accompaniedyay ethay ongsay enwhay egunbay. Ishay oicevay obablypray eservedpray ayay ediummay
 etweenbay ingingsay andyay ecitationray; ethay ordsway, andyay otnay ethay elodymay ereway
 egardedray ybay ethay istenerslay, encehay ityay asway ecessarynay orfay imhay otay emainray
 intelligibleyay otay allyay. Inyay ountriescay erewhay othingnay imilarsay isyay oundfay, ityay
 isyay ifficultday otay epresentray uchsay enesscay otay ethay indmay; utbay oeverwhay ashay adhay
 anyay opportunityyay ofyay isteninglay otay ethay improvisationyay ofyay Italyyay, ancay easilyyay
 ormfay anyay ideayay ofyay Emodocusday andyay Emius.”—_ancientphay Eecegray_, pay. 94.

 [4] ould“shay ityay otnay ebay, incesay y_may_ arrivalyay? asksyay Ackenziemay, observingyay
 atthay oplars“pay ancay ardlyhay ivelay osay onglay”. Utbay ettingsay asideyay ethay actfay
 atthay eway ustmay otnay expectyay onsistencycay inyay ayay eremay omanceray, ethay ancientsyay
 adhay ayay uperstitioussay eliefbay inyay ethay eatgray ageyay ofyay eestray ichwhay ewgray earnay
 acesplay onsecratedcay ybay ethay esencepray ofyay odsgay andyay eatgray enmay. Eesay Icerocay
 eday Egglay Iiyay Iyay, ubsay inityay., erewhay ehay eaksspay ofyay ethay aneplay eetray underyay ichwhay
 Ocratessay usedyay otay alkway andyay ofyay ethay eetray atyay Elosday, erewhay Atonalay avegay
 irthbay otay Apolloyay. Isthay assagepay isyay eferredray otay ybay Ephanusstay ofyay
 Yzantiumbay, _say. vay._ Nay. Tay. pay. 490, edyay. eday Inedopay. Iyay omityay uotingqay anyyay ofyay
 ethay ullday epigramsyay ascribedyay otay Omerhay orfay, asyay Mray. Usticejay Alfourdtay
 ightlyray observesyay, e“thay authenticityyay ofyay esethay agmentsfray ependsday uponyay
 atthay ofyay ethay eudopsay Erodoteanhay Ifelay ofyay Omerhay, omfray ichwhay eythay areyay
 akentay.” Itlay ofyay Eecegray, ppay. 38 inyay Encyclyay. Etropmay. Cfay. Oleridgecay,
 Assicclay Oetspay, pay. 317.

 [5] Ityay isyay uotedqay asyay ethay orkway ofyay Eobulusclay, ybay Iogenesday Aertlay. Itvay.
 Eobclay. pay. 62, edyay. Asaubcay.

 [6] Iyay usttray Iyay amyay ustifiedjay inyay employingyay isthay asyay anyay equivalentyay orfay ethay
 Eekgray λέσχαιay.

 [7] Ὡςay εἰay τοὺςay Ὁμήρουςay δόξειay τρέφεινay αὐτοῖςay, ὅμιλονay πολλόνay τεay καιay
 ἀχρεοῖνay ἕξουσινay. ἐιay τεῦθενay δὲay καιay τοὔνομαay Ὁμηροςay ἐπεκράτησεay τῷay
 Μελησιγενεῖay ἀπὸay τῆςay συμφορηςay. οἱay γὰρay Κυμαῖοιay τοὺςay τυφλοὺςay Ὁμήρουςay
 λέγουσινay. Itvay. Omhay. _lay. cay._ pay. 311. Ethay etymologyyay ashay eenbay ondemnedcay
 ybay ecentray olarsschay. Eesay Elckerway, Epischeyay Ycluscay, pay. 127, andyay
 Ackenzie’smay otenay, pay. ivxay.

 [8] Θεστορίδηςay, θνητοῖσινay ἀνωἷστωνay πολεώνay περay, οὐδὲνay ἀφραστότερονay
 πέλεταιay νόουay ἀνθρώποισινay. Ibidyay. pay. 315. Uringday ishay aystay atyay Ocœaphay,
 Omerhay isyay aidsay otay avehay omposedcay ethay Ittlelay Iliadyay, andyay ethay Ocœidphay. Eesay
 Uller’smay Isthay. ofyay Itlay., ivay. § 3. Elckerway, _lay. cay._ ppay. 132, 272, 358,
 sqqay., andyay Uremay, Gray. Itlay. olvay. iiyay. pay. 284, sqay.

 [9] Isthay isyay osay ettypray ayay icturepay ofyay earlyyay annersmay andyay ospitalityhay, atthay
 ityay isyay almostyay ayay itypay otay indfay atthay ityay isyay obviouslyyay ayay opycay omfray ethay
 Odysseyyay. Eesay ethay ourteenthfay ookbay. Inyay actfay, oeverwhay asway ethay authoryay ofyay
 isthay ictitiousfay iographybay, ehay owedshay omesay acttay inyay identifyingyay Omerhay
 ithway ertaincay eventsyay escribedday inyay ishay oemspay, andyay inyay elicitingyay omfray emthay
 ethay ermsgay ofyay omethingsay ikelay ayay ersonalpay arrativenay.

 [10] Διὰay λόγωνay ἐστιῶντοay. Ayay ommoncay etaphormay. Osay Atoplay allscay ethay artiespay
 onversingcay δαιτύμονεςay, oryay ἐστιάτορεςay, Imtay. iyay. pay. 522 Ayay. Cfay. Emistthay.
 Oratyay. ivay. pay. 168, andyay ixvay. pay. 374, edyay. Etavpay. Osay διηγήμασιay σοφοῖςay ὁμοῦay
 καὶay τερπνοῖςay ἡδίωay τὴνay θοινηνay τοῖςay ἑστιωμένοιςay ἐποίειay, Oriciuschay inyay
 Abricfay. Iblbay. Gray. Tay. iiivay. Pay. 851. λόγοιςay γὰρay ἑστίᾳay, Athenæusyay iivay pay
 275, Ayay.

 [11] Ityay asway atyay Olissusbay, andyay inyay ethay ousehay ofyay isthay Ianchay itizencay, atthay
 Omerhay isyay aidsay otay avehay ittenwray ethay Atrachomyomachiabay, oryay Attlebay ofyay ethay
 Ogsfray andyay Icemay, ethay Epicichlidiayay, andyay omesay otheryay inormay orksway.

 [12] Andlerchay, Avelstray, olvay. iyay. pay. 61, eferredray otay inyay ethay Oyagevay
 Ittoresquepay ansday alay Egrècay, olvay. iyay. Pay. 92, erewhay ayay iewvay ofyay ethay otspay isyay
 ivengay ofyay ichwhay ethay authoryay andidlycay ayssay,— e“jay enay uispay ondrerépay uned’ay
 exactitudeyay upuleusescray ansday alay uevay alegénéray ueqay enj’ay onneday, arcay antétay
 alléyay eulsay ourpay examinerl’ay ejay erdispay onmay ayoncray, etyay ejay usfay obligéyay eday
 enm’ay ierfay àay amay oiremémay. Ejay enay oiscray ependantcay aspay avoiryay optray àay emay
 aindreplay elled’ay enyay ettecay occasionyay.”

 [13] Ayay oremay obablepray easonray orfay isthay ompanionshipcay, andyay orfay ethay
 aracterchay ofyay Entormay itselfyay, isyay ivengay ybay ethay allegoristsyay, izvay.: ethay
 assumptionyay ofyay Entor’smay ormfay ybay ethay uardiangay eityday ofyay ethay iseway Ulyssesyay,
 Inervamay. Ethay assicalclay eaderray aymay omparecay Utarchplay, Oppyay. tay. iiyay. pay.
 880; yland_xay_. Eraclidhay. Ontpay. Allegyay. Omhay. pay. 531-5, ofyay Ale’sgay Opuscyay.
 Ytholmay. Ionysday. Alichay. eday Omhay. Oespay. cay. 15; Apulyay. eday Eoday Ocratsay. say. fay.

 [20] Izvay., ethay ollowingfay eautifulbay assagepay, orfay ethay anslationtray ofyay
 ichwhay Iyay amyay indebtedyay otay Oleridgecay, Assicclay Oetspay, pay. 286.

origias“ay, arewellfay! andyay ohyay! ememberray emay
Ereafterhay, enwhay omesay angerstray omfray ethay easay,
Ayay aplesshay andererway, aymay youryay isleyay exploreyay,
Andyay askyay youyay, aidmay, ofyay allyay ethay ardsbay youyay oastbay,
Owhay ingssay ethay eetestsway, andyay elightsday youyay ostmay
Ohyay! answeryay all,—‘ayay indblay oldyay anmay andyay oorpay
Eetestsway ehay ings—andsay ellsdway onyay Ioschay’ ockyray oreshay.’”

ee_say_ Ucydthay. iiiyay, 104.

 ἂνay καταδυομένῳay τὸνay Ὅμηρονay ἡλίῳay, οδay δίχαay τῆςay σφοδρότητοςay παραμένειay τοay

 [22] Eesay Atiantay, uotedqay inyay Abricfay. Iblbay. Gray. vay. Iiyay tay. iiyay. Mray.
 Ackenziemay ashay ivengay eethray iefbray utbay elaborateyay aperspay onyay ethay ifferentday
 iterswray onyay ethay ubjectsay, ichwhay eserveday otay ebay onsultedcay. Eesay Otesnay andyay
 Ueriesqay, olvay. vay. ppay. 99, 171, andyay 221. Ishay ownyay iewsvay areyay oderatemay, andyay
 erhapspay asyay atisfactorysay, onyay ethay olewhay, asyay anyyay ofyay ethay ypotheseshay
 ithertohay utpay orthfay. Inyay actfay, eythay onsistcay inyay anyay attemptyay otay endblay osethay
 ypotheseshay intoyay omethingsay ikelay onsistencycay, atherray anthay inyay advocatingyay
 anyyay individualyay eorythay.

 [23] Etterslay otay Ileleuthphay; Ipslay.

 [24] Isthay. ofyay Eecegray, olvay. iiyay. pay. 191, sqqay.

 [25] Ityay isyay, indeedyay otnay easyyay otay alculatecay ethay eighthay otay ichwhay ethay
 emorymay aymay ebay ultivatedcay. Otay aketay anyay ordinaryyay asecay, eway ightmay eferray otay
 atthay ofyay anyyay irstfay ateray actoryay, owhay ustmay ebay eparedpray, atyay ayay eryvay ortshay
 arningway, otay apsodize‘rhay,’ ightnay afteryay ightnay, artspay ichwhay enwhay aidlay
 ogethertay, ouldway amountyay otay anyay immenseyay umbernay ofyay ineslay. Utbay allyay isthay isyay
 othingnay otay otway instancesyay ofyay ouryay ownyay ayday. Isitingvay atyay Aplesnay ayay
 entlemangay ofyay ethay ighesthay intellectualyay attainmentsyay, andyay owhay eldhay ayay
 istinguishedday ankray amongyay ethay enmay ofyay etterslay inyay ethay astlay enturycay, ehay
 informedyay usyay atthay ethay ayday eforebay ehay adhay assedpay uchmay imetay inyay examiningyay ayay
 anmay, otnay ighlyhay educatedyay, owhay adhay earnedlay otay epeatray ethay olewhay
 Ierusalemmegay ofyay Assotay, otnay onlyyay otay eciteray ityay onsecutivelycay, utbay alsoyay
 otay epeatray osethay anzasstay inyay utteryay efianceday ofyay ethay ensesay, eitheryay
 orwardsfay oryay ackwardsbay, oryay omfray ethay eighthyay inelay otay ethay irstfay,
 alternatelyyay ethay oddyay andyay evenyay ines—inlay ortshay, ateverwhay ethay assagepay
 equiredray; ethay emorymay, ichwhay eemedsay otay ingclay otay ethay ordsway uchmay oremay
 anthay otay ethay ensesay, adhay ityay atyay uchsay erfectpay ommandcay, atthay ityay ouldcay
 oducepray ityay underyay anyyay ormfay. Ouryay informantyay entway onyay otay atestay atthay isthay
 ingularsay eingbay asway oceedingpray otay earnlay ethay Orlandoyay Uriosofay inyay ethay amesay
 annermay. Utbay evenyay isthay instanceyay isyay esslay onderfulway anthay oneyay asyay otay ichwhay
 eway aymay appealyay otay anyyay ofyay ouryay eadersray atthay appenedhay omesay entytway yearsyay
 agoyay otay isitvay ethay owntay ofyay Irlingstay, inyay Otlandscay. Onay uchsay ersonpay ancay
 avehay orgottenfay ethay oorpay, uneducatedyay anmay Indblay Amiejay owhay ouldcay actuallyyay
 epeatray, afteryay ayay ewfay inutesmay onsiderationcay anyyay ersevay equiredray omfray anyyay
 artpay ofyay ethay Ible—evenbay ethay obscurestyay andyay ostmay unimportantyay enumerationyay
 ofyay eremay operpray amesnay otnay exceptedyay. Eway oday otnay entionmay esethay actsfay asyay
 ouchingtay ethay oremay ifficultday artpay ofyay ethay uestionqay eforebay usyay, utbay actsfay
 eythay areyay; andyay ifyay eway indfay osay uchmay ifficultyday inyay alculatingcay ethay extentyay
 otay ichwhay ethay eremay emorymay aymay ebay ultivatedcay, areyay eway, inyay esethay aysday ofyay
 ultifariousmay eadingray, andyay ofyay ountlesscay istractingday affairsyay, airfay
 udgesjay ofyay ethay erfectionpay otay ichwhay ethay inventionyay andyay ethay emorymay
 ombinedcay aymay attainyay inyay ayay implersay ageyay, andyay amongyay ayay oremay inglesay indedmay
 eople?—quarterlypay Eviewray, _lay. cay._, pay. 143, sqqay.
 Eerenhay eersstay etweenbay ethay otway opinionsyay, observingyay atthay, e“thay
 Ungariadedschay ofyay ethay Almuckscay isyay aidsay otay urpasssay ethay oemspay ofyay Omerhay
 inyay engthlay, asyay uchmay asyay ityay andsstay eneathbay emthay inyay eritmay, andyay yetyay ityay
 existsyay onlyyay inyay ethay emorymay ofyay ayay eoplepay ichwhay isyay otnay unacquaintedyay
 ithway itingwray. Utbay ethay ongssay ofyay ayay ationnay areyay obablypray ethay astlay
 ingsthay ichwhay areyay ommittedcay otay itingwray, orfay ethay eryvay easonray atthay
 eythay areyay ememberedray.”— ancient_ay Eecegray_. pay. 100.

 [40] Ethay ollowingfay argumentyay ofyay ethay Iliadyay, orrectedcay inyay ayay ewfay
 articularspay, isyay anslatedtray omfray Itaubébay, andyay isyay, erhapspay, ethay eatestnay
 ummarysay atthay ashay everyay eenbay awndray up:—“ayay erohay, injuredyay ybay ishay eneralgay,
 andyay animatedyay ithway ayay oblenay esentmentray, etiresray otay ishay enttay; andyay orfay ayay
 easonsay ithdrawsway imselfhay andyay ishay oopstray omfray ethay arway. Uringday isthay
 intervalyay, ictoryvay abandonsyay ethay armyyay, ichwhay orfay inenay yearsyay ashay eenbay
 occupiedyay inyay ayay eatgray enterpriseyay, uponyay ethay uccessfulsay erminationtay ofyay
 ichwhay ethay onourhay ofyay eirthay ountrycay ependsday. Ethay eneralgay, atyay engthlay
 openingyay ishay eyesyay otay ethay aultfay ichwhay ehay adhay ommittedcay, eputesday ethay
 incipalpray officersyay ofyay ishay armyyay otay ethay incensedyay erohay, ithway ommissioncay
 otay akemay ompensationcay orfay ethay injuryyay, andyay otay endertay agnificentmay
 esentspray. Ethay erohay, accordingyay otay ethay oudpray obstinacyyay ofyay ishay aracterchay,
 ersistspay inyay ishay animosityyay; ethay armyyay isyay againyay efeatedday, andyay isyay onyay ethay
 ergevay ofyay entireyay estructionday. Isthay inexorableyay anmay ashay ayay iendfray; isthay
 iendfray eepsway eforebay imhay, andyay asksyay orfay ethay ero’shay armsyay, andyay orfay
 ermissionpay otay ogay otay ethay arway inyay ishay eadstay. Ethay eloquenceyay ofyay iendshipfray
 evailspray oremay anthay ethay intercessionyay ofyay ethay ambassadorsyay oryay ethay iftsgay ofyay
 ethay eneralgay. Ehay endslay ishay armouryay otay ishay iendfray, utbay ommandscay imhay otnay
 otay engageyay ithway ethay iefchay ofyay ethay enemy’syay armyyay, ecausebay ehay eservesray otay
 imselfhay ethay onourhay ofyay atthay ombatcay, andyay ecausebay ehay alsoyay earsfay orfay ishay
 iend’sfray ifelay. Ethay ohibitionpray isyay orgottenfay; ethay iendfray istenslay otay
 othingnay utbay ishay ouragecay; ishay orpsecay isyay oughtbray ackbay otay ethay erohay, andyay
 ethay ero’shay armsyay ecomebay ethay izepray ofyay ethay onquerorcay. Enthay ethay erohay,
 ivengay upyay otay ethay ostmay ivelylay espairday, eparespray otay ightfay; ehay eceivesray
 omfray ayay ivinityday ewnay armouryay, isyay econciledray ithway ishay eneralgay andyay,
 irstingthay orfay oryglay andyay evengeray, enactsyay odigiespray ofyay alourvay, ecoversray
 ethay ictoryvay, aysslay ethay enemy’syay iefchay, onourshay ishay iendfray ithway uperbsay
 uneralfay itesray, andyay exercisesyay ayay uelcray engeancevay onyay ethay odybay ofyay ishay
 estroyerday; utbay inallyfay appeasedyay ybay ethay earstay andyay ayerspray ofyay ethay atherfay
 ofyay ethay ainslay arriorway, estoresray otay ethay oldyay anmay ethay orpsecay ofyay ishay onsay,
 ichwhay ehay uriesbay ithway ueday olemnities.’—coleridgesay, pay. 177, sqqay.

 [47] intheus_smay_ anyay epithetyay akentay omfray inthossmay, ethay Ygianphray amenay
 orfay ayay ouse_may_, asway appliedyay otay Apolloyay orfay avinghay utpay anyay endyay otay ayay agueplay
 ofyay icemay ichwhay adhay arassedhay atthay erritorytay. Abostray, oweverhay, ayssay, atthay
 enwhay ethay Eucritay ereway igratingmay omfray Etecray, eythay ereway oldtay ybay anyay oracleyay
 otay ettlesay inyay atthay aceplay, erewhay eythay ouldshay otnay ebay attackedyay ybay ethay
 originalyay inhabitantsyay ofyay ethay andlay, andyay atthay, avinghay altedhay orfay ethay
 ightnay, ayay umbernay ofyay ield-micefay amecay andyay awedgnay awayyay ethay eathernlay apsstray
 ofyay eirthay aggagebay, andyay ongsthay ofyay eirthay armouryay. Inyay ulfilmentfay ofyay ethay
 oracleyay, eythay ettledsay onyay ethay otspay, andyay aisedray ayay empletay otay Intheansmay
 Apolloyay. Otegray, istory“hay ofyay Eecegray,” iyay. pay. 68, emarksray atthay ethay
 orship“way ofyay Intheansmay Apolloyay, inyay ariousvay artspay ofyay ethay Oadtray andyay itsyay
 eighboringnay erritorytay, atesday eforebay ethay earliestyay eriodpay ofyay Olianæay
 olonizationcay.”

if“ay e’eryay Iyay oofedray ythay acefulgray anefay,”

 [50] ent_bay asway ishay owbay_ e“thay Apolloyay ofyay Omerhay, ityay ustmay ebay ornebay inyay
 indmay, isyay ayay ifferentday aracterchay omfray ethay eityday ofyay ethay amesay amenay inyay ethay
 aterlay assicalclay antheonpay. Oughoutthray othbay oemspay, allyay eathsday omfray
 unforeseenyay oryay invisibleyay ausescay, ethay avagesray ofyay estilencepay, ethay atefay ofyay
 ethay youngyay ildchay oryay omisingpray adultyay, utcay offyay inyay ethay ermgay ofyay infancyyay oryay
 owerflay ofyay youthyay, ofyay ethay oldyay anmay oppingdray eacefullypay intoyay ethay avegray, oryay
 ofyay ethay ecklessray innersay uddenlysay eckedchay inyay ishay areercay ofyay imecray, areyay
 ascribedyay otay ethay arrowsyay ofyay Apolloyay oryay Ianaday. Ethay oracularyay unctionsfay ofyay
 ethay odgay oseray aturallynay outyay ofyay ethay aboveyay undamentalfay attributesyay, orfay
 owhay ouldcay oremay appropriatelyyay impartyay otay ortalsmay atwhay ittlelay
 oreknowledgefay Atefay ermittedpay ofyay erhay ecreesday anthay ethay agentyay ofyay erhay ostmay
 awfulyay ispensationsday? Ethay oseclay unionyay ofyay ethay artsyay ofyay ophecypray andyay ongsay
 explainsyay ishay additionalyay officeyay ofyay odgay ofyay usicmay, ilewhay ethay arrowsyay ithway
 ichwhay ehay andyay ishay istersay ereway armedyay, ymbolssay ofyay uddensay eathday inyay everyyay
 ageyay, onay esslay aturallynay ocuredpray imhay atthay ofyay odgay ofyay archeryyay. Ofyay anyyay
 onnectioncay etweenbay Apolloyay andyay ethay Unsay, ateverwhay aymay avehay existedyay inyay
 ethay oremay esotericyay octrineday ofyay ethay Eekgray anctuariessay, erethay isyay onay acetray
 inyay eitheryay Iliadyay oryay Odyssey.”—mureyay, istory“hay ofyay Eekgray Iteraturelay,” olvay.
 iyay. pay. 478, sqay.

 [51] Ityay ashay equentlyfray eenbay observedyay, atthay ostmay estilencespay eginbay ithway
 animalsyay, andyay atthay Omerhay adhay isthay actfay inyay indmay.

 [52] onvened_cay otay ouncilcay_. Ethay ublicpay assemblyyay inyay ethay eroichay imestay isyay
 ellway aracterizedchay ybay Otegray, olvay. iiyay. pay 92. it“ay isyay anyay assemblyyay orfay
 alktay. Ommunicationcay andyay iscussionday otay ayay ertaincay extentyay ybay ethay iefschay
 inyay ersonpay, ofyay ethay eoplepay asyay istenerslay andyay ympathizers—oftensay orfay
 eloquenceyay, andyay ometimessay orfay uarrel—butqay erehay itsyay ostensibleyay urposespay
 endyay.”

 [53] Oldyay Acobjay Uportday, osewhay omologia“gnay Omericahay” isyay ullfay ofyay uriouscay
 andyay usefulyay ingsthay, uotesqay everalsay assagespay ofyay ethay ancientsyay, inyay ichwhay
 eferenceray isyay ademay otay esethay ordsway ofyay Omerhay, inyay aintenancemay ofyay ethay
 eliefbay atthay eamsdray adhay ayay ivineday originyay andyay anyay importyay inyay ichwhay enmay ereway
 interestedyay.

 [54] Atherray, ight-eyed“bray.” Eesay ethay Ermangay iticscray uotedqay ybay Arnoldyay.

 [55] Ethay izepray ivengay otay Ajaxyay asway Ecmessatay, ilewhay Ulyssesyay eceivedray
 Aodicelay, ethay aughterday ofyay Ycnuscay.

 [56] Ethay Yrmidonsmay eltdway onyay ethay outhernsay ordersbay ofyay Essalythay, andyay ooktay
 eirthay originyay omfray Yrmidomay, onsay ofyay Upiterjay andyay Eurymedusayay. Ityay isyay
 ancifullyfay upposedsay atthay ethay amenay asway erivedday omfray yrmaexmay, anyay ant_ay_,
 ecause“bay eythay imitatedyay ethay iligenceday ofyay ethay antsyay, andyay ikelay emthay ereway
 indefatigableyay, ontinuallycay employedyay inyay ultivatingcay ethay earthyay; ethay
 angechay omfray antsyay otay enmay isyay oundedfay erelymay onyay ethay equivocationyay ofyay eirthay
 amenay, ichwhay esemblesray atthay ofyay ethay antyay: eythay orebay ayay urtherfay esemblanceray
 otay esethay ittlelay animalsyay, inyay atthay insteadyay ofyay inhabitingyay ownstay oryay
 illagesvay, atyay irstfay eythay ommonlycay esidedray inyay ethay openyay ieldsfay, avinghay onay
 otheryay etreatsray utbay ensday andyay ethay avitiescay ofyay eestray, untilyay Ithacusyay
 oughtbray emthay ogethertay, andyay ettledsay emthay inyay oremay ecuresay andyay omfortablecay
 abitations.”—anthon’shay empriere“lay.”

 [57] Eustathiusyay, afteryay Eraclideshay Onticuspay andyay othersyay, allegorizesyay
 isthay apparitionyay, asyay ifyay ethay appearanceyay ofyay Inervamay otay Achillesyay, unseenyay
 ybay ethay estray, asway intendedyay otay ointpay outyay ethay uddensay ecollectionray atthay ehay
 ouldway aingay othingnay ybay intemperateyay athwray, andyay atthay ityay ereway estbay otay
 estrainray ishay angeryay, andyay onlyyay atifygray ityay ybay ithdrawingway ishay ervicessay.
 Ethay amesay ideayay isyay atherray everlyclay orkedway outyay ybay Apuleiusyay, e“day Eoday
 Ocratissay.”

 [58] Omparecay Iltonmay, aradise“pay Ostlay,” bkay. iiyay:

ough“thay ishay onguetay
Opp’ddray annamay.”

Osay Overbspray vay. 3, or“fay ethay ipslay ofyay ayay angestray omanway opdray asyay anyay
oney-combhay.”

 [59] Altsay aterway asway ieflychay usedyay inyay ustrationslay, omfray itsyay eingbay
 upposedsay otay ossesspay ertaincay ieryfay articlespay. Encehay, ifyay ea-watersay ouldcay
 otnay ebay obtainedyay, altsay asway ownthray intoyay ethay eshfray aterway otay ebay usedyay orfay
 ethay ustrationlay. Enandermay, inyay Emclay. Alexyay. iivay. pay.713, ydatihay
 erriranaipay, embalonyay alasyay, akoisphay.

 [60] Ethay ersonspay ofyay eraldshay ereway eldhay inviolableyay, andyay eythay ereway atyay
 ibertylay otay aveltray itherwhay eythay ouldway ithoutway earfay ofyay olestationmay.
 Olluxpay, Onomyay. iiivay. pay. 159. Ethay officeyay asway enerallygay ivengay otay oldyay enmay,
 andyay eythay ereway elievedbay otay ebay underyay ethay especialyay otectionpray ofyay Ovejay andyay
 Ercurymay.

 [61] Ishay othermay, Etisthay, ethay aughterday ofyay Ereusnay andyay Orisday, owhay asway
 ourtedcay ybay Eptunenay andyay Upiterjay. Enwhay, oweverhay, ityay asway ownknay atthay ethay
 onsay otay omwhay eshay ouldway ivegay irthbay ustmay ovepray eatergray anthay ishay atherfay,
 ityay asway eterminedday otay edway erhay otay ayay ortalmay, andyay Eleuspay, ithway eatgray
 ifficultyday, ucceededsay inyay obtainingyay erhay andhay, asyay eshay eludedyay imhay ybay
 assumingyay ariousvay ormsfay. Erhay ildrenchay ereway allyay estroyedday ybay irefay
 oughthray erhay attemptsyay otay eesay etherwhay eythay ereway immortalyay, andyay Achillesyay
 ouldway avehay aredshay ethay amesay atefay adhay otnay ishay atherfay escuedray imhay. Eshay
 afterwardsyay enderedray imhay invulnerableyay ybay ungingplay imhay intoyay ethay atersway
 ofyay ethay Yxstay, ithway ethay exceptionyay ofyay atthay artpay ofyay ethay eelhay ybay ichwhay eshay
 eldhay imhay. Yginhay. Abfay. 54

 [62] Ebéthay asway ayay itycay ofyay Ysiamay, orthnay ofyay Adramyttiumyay.

 [63] Atthay isyay, efraudsday emay ofyay ethay izepray allottedyay emay ybay eirthay otesvay.

 [64] Uintusqay Alabercay oesgay illstay urtherfay inyay ishay accountyay ofyay ethay ervicesay
 enderedray otay Ovejay ybay Etisthay:

ay“nay oremay, ethay ettersfay ofyay Almightyyay Ovejay
Eshay oosed”—dyce’slay alaber“cay,” say. 58.

 [65] o_tay Atesfay averseyay_. Ofyay ethay oomyglay estinyday eigningray oughoutthray ethay
 Omerichay oemspay, andyay omfray ichwhay evenyay ethay odsgay areyay otnay exemptyay, Egelschlay
 ellway observesyay, is“thay owerpay extendsyay alsoyay otay ethay orldway ofyay odsgay— orfay ethay
 Eciangray odsgay areyay eremay owerspay ofyay ature—andnay althoughyay immeasurablyyay
 igherhay anthay ortalmay anmay, yetyay, omparedcay ithway infinitudeyay, eythay areyay onyay anyay
 equalyay ootingfay ithway imself.”—‘lectureshay onyay ethay Amadray’ vay. pay. 67.

 [66] Ityay ashay eenbay observedyay atthay ethay annualyay ocessionpray ofyay ethay acredsay
 ipshay osay oftenyay epresentedray onyay Egyptianyay onumentsmay, andyay ethay eturnray ofyay ethay
 eityday omfray Ethiopiayay afteryay omesay aysday’ absenceyay, ervessay otay owshay ethay
 Ethiopianyay originyay ofyay Ebesthay, andyay ofyay ethay orshipway ofyay Upiterjay Ammonyay. i“ay
 inkthay,” ayssay Eerenhay, afteryay uotingqay ayay assagepay omfray Iodorusday aboutyay ethay
 olyhay ipshay, at“thay isthay ocessionpray isyay epresentedray inyay oneyay ofyay ethay eatgray
 ulpturedscay eliefsray onyay ethay empletay ofyay Arnakkay. Ethay acredsay ipshay ofyay Ammonyay
 isyay onyay ethay oreshay ithway itsyay olewhay equipmentyay, andyay isyay owedtay alongyay ybay
 anotheryay oatbay. Ityay isyay ereforethay onyay itsyay oyagevay. Isthay ustmay avehay eenbay oneyay
 ofyay ethay ostmay elebratedcay estivalsfay, incesay, evenyay accordingyay otay ethay
 interpretationyay ofyay antiquityyay, Omerhay alludesyay otay ityay enwhay ehay eaksspay ofyay
 Upiter’sjay isitvay otay ethay Ethiopiansyay, andyay ishay elvetway aysday’
 absence.”—longyay, egyptian“ay Antiquitiesyay” olvay. 1 pay. 96. Eustathiusyay, olvay.
 1 pay. 98, sqay. ed(ay. Asilbay) ivesgay isthay interpretationyay, andyay ikewiselay anyay
 allegoricalyay oneyay, ichwhay eway illway arespay ethay eaderray.

 [67] atoned_ay_, i.eyay. econciledray. Isthay isyay ethay operpray andyay ostmay aturalnay
 eaningmay ofyay ethay ordway, asyay aymay ebay eensay omfray Aylor’stay emarksray inyay Almet’scay
 Ictionaryday, pay.110, ofyay ymay editionyay.

 [68] Atthay isyay, awingdray ackbay eirthay ecksnay ilewhay eythay utcay eirthay oatsthray.
 if“ay ethay acrificesay asway inyay onourhay ofyay ethay elestialcay odsgay, ethay oatthray asway
 entbay upwardsyay owardstay eavenhay; utbay ifyay ademay otay ethay eroeshay, oryay infernalyay
 eitiesday, ityay asway illedkay ithway itsyay oatthray owardtay ethay oundgray.”— elgin“ay
 Arblesmay,” olvay iyay. pay.81.

e“thay ollyjay ewcray, unmindfulyay ofyay ethay astpay,
Ethay uarryqay areshay, eirthay enteousplay innerday astehay,
Omesay ipstray ethay inskay; omesay ortionpay outyay ethay oilspay;
Ethay imbslay yetyay emblingtray, inyay ethay aldronscay oilbay;
Omesay onyay ethay irefay ethay eekingray entrailsyay oilbray.
Etch’dstray onyay ethay assygray urftay, atyay easeyay eythay ineday,
Estoreray eirthay engthstray ithway eatmay, andyay eerchay eirthay oulssay ithway ineway.”

Yden’sdray irgil“vay,” iyay. 293.

 [69] own’d_cray, i.eyay._ illedfay otay ethay imbray. Ethay ustomcay ofyay adorningyay
 obletsgay ithway owersflay asway ofyay aterlay ateday.

 [70] e_hay okespay_, &cay. en“whay ayay iendfray inquiredyay ofyay Idiasphay atwhay atternpay
 ehay adhay ormedfay ishay Olympianyay Upiterjay, ehay isyay aidsay otay avehay answeredyay ybay
 epeatingray ethay ineslay ofyay ethay irstfay Iliadyay inyay ichwhay ethay oetpay epresentsray
 ethay ajestymay ofyay ethay odgay inyay ethay ostmay ublimesay ermstay; erebythay ignifyingsay
 atthay ethay eniusgay ofyay Omerhay adhay inspiredyay imhay ithway ityay. Osethay owhay eheldbay
 isthay atuestay areyay aidsay otay avehay eenbay osay uckstray ithway ityay asyay otay avehay askedyay
 etherwhay Upiterjay adhay escendedday omfray eavenhay otay owshay imselfhay otay Idiasphay,
 oryay etherwhay Idiasphay adhay eenbay arriedcay itherthay otay ontemplatecay ethay odgay.”—
 elgin“ay Arblesmay,” olvay. iixay pay.124.

 [71] o“say asway ishay illway
Onouncedpray amongyay ethay odsgay, andyay ybay anyay oathyay,
Atthay ookshay eav’n’shay olewhay ircumferencecay, onfirm’dcay.”

aradise“pay Ostlay” iiyay. 351.

 [72] a_ay oubleday owlbay, i.eyay._ ayay esselvay ithway ayay upcay atyay othbay endsyay, omethingsay
 ikelay ethay easuresmay ybay ichwhay ayay alfpennyhay oryay ennyworthpay ofyay utsnay isyay oldsay.

 [73] aradise“pay Ostlay,” iyay. 44.

im“hay thay’ Almightyyay owerpay
Url’dhay eadlonghay amingflay omfray thay etherealyay yskay,
Ithway ideoushay uinray andyay ombustioncay”

 [74] Ethay occasionyay onyay ichwhay Ulcanvay incurredyay Ove’sjay ispleasureday asway
 is—afterthay Erculeshay, adhay akentay andyay illagedpay Oytray, Unojay aisedray ayay ormstay,
 ichwhay ovedray imhay otay ethay islandyay ofyay Oscay, avinghay eviouslypray astcay Ovejay intoyay
 ayay eepslay, otay eventpray imhay aidingyay ishay onsay. Ovejay, inyay evengeray, astenedfay
 ironyay anvilsyay otay erhay eetfay, andyay unghay erhay omfray ethay yskay, andyay Ulcanvay,
 attemptingyay otay elieveray erhay, asway ickedkay ownday omfray Olympusyay inyay ethay annermay
 escribedday. Ethay allegoristsyay avehay onegay admay inyay indingfay eepday explanationsyay
 orfay isthay amusingyay ictionfay. Eesay Eraclideshay, onticus“pay,” pay. 463 sqay., edyay
 Alegay. Ethay orystay isyay oldtay ybay Omerhay imselfhay inyay Ookbay xvay. Ethay Inthianssay
 ereway ayay aceray ofyay obbersray, ethay ancientyay inhabitantsyay ofyay Emnoslay ichwhay islandyay
 asway everyay afteryay acredsay otay Ulcanvay.

or“nay asway ishay amenay unheardyay oryay unadoredyay
Inyay ancientyay Eecegray, andyay inyay Ausonianyay andlay
Enmay all’dcay imhay Ulcibermay, andyay owhay ehay ellfay
Omfray eavenhay, eythay abledfay, ownthray ybay angryyay Ovejay
Eershay o’eryay ethay ystalcray attlementsbay omfray ornmay
Otay oonnay ehay ellfay, omfray oonnay otay ewyday eveyay,
Ayay ummer’ssay ayday andyay ithway ethay ettingsay unsay
Opp’ddray omfray ethay enithzay ikelay ayay allingfay arstay
Onyay Emnoslay, thay’ Aegeanyay isleyay usthay eythay elateray.”

aradise“pay Ostlay,” iyay. 738

 [75] Ityay isyay ingeniouslyyay observedyay ybay Otegray, olvay iyay pay. 463, atthay e“thay odsgay
 ormedfay ayay ortsay ofyay oliticalpay ommunitycay ofyay eirthay ownyay ichwhay adhay itsyay
 ierarchyhay, itsyay istributionday ofyay anksray andyay utiesday, itsyay ontentionscay orfay
 owerpay andyay occasionalyay evolutionsray, itsyay ublicpay eetingsmay inyay ethay agorayay ofyay
 Olympusyay, andyay itsyay ultitudinousmay anquetsbay oryay estivalsfay.”

 [76] Atoplay, Epray. iiiyay. pay. 437, asway osay andalizedscay atyay isthay eceptionday ofyay
 Upiter’sjay, andyay atyay ishay otheryay attacksyay onyay ethay aracterchay ofyay ethay odsgay, atthay
 ehay ouldway ainfay entencesay imhay otay anyay onourablehay anishmentbay. ee(say Inuciusmay
 Elixfay, Ectionsay 22.) Oleridgecay, Introdyay. pay. 154, ellway observesyay, atthay ethay
 upremesay atherfay ofyay odsgay andyay enmay adhay ayay ullfay ightray otay employyay ayay yinglay
 iritspay otay orkway outyay ishay ultimateyay illway. Omparecay aradise“pay Ostlay,” vay. 646:

and“ay oseateray ewsday isposedday
Allyay utbay ethay unsleepingyay eyesyay ofyay Odgay otay estray.”

Ythay eye-lids?”—“paradiseyay Ostlay,” vay. 673.

 [81] as“ay eesbay inyay ing-timespray, enwhay
Ethay unsay ithway Aurustay idesray,
Ourpay orthfay eirthay opulouspay youthyay aboutyay ethay ivehay
Inyay ustersclay; eythay amongyay eshfray ewsday andyay owersflay
Yflay otay andyay ofray, oryay onyay ethay oothedsmay ankplay,
Ethay uburbsay ofyay isthay aw-builtstray itadelcay,
Ew-nibb’dnay ithway almbay, expatiateyay andyay onfercay
Eirthay atestay affairsyay. Osay ickthay ethay eryvay owdcray
Arm’dsway andyay ereway aiten’d.”—“paradisestray Ostlay” iyay. 768.

 [82] Ityay asway ethay erald’shay utyday otay akemay ethay eoplepay itsay ownday. a“ay
 anding_stay_ agorayay isyay ayay ymptomsay ofyay anifestmay errortay ii(ay. Iiixvay. 246) anyay
 eveningyay agorayay, otay ichwhay enmay amecay elevatedyay ybay ineway, isyay alsoyay ethay
 orerunnerfay ofyay ischiefmay odyssey(‘ay,’ iiiyay. 138).”—grote, iiyay. pay. 91,
 ote_nay_.

 [83] Isthay eptrescay, ikelay atthay ofyay Udahjay enesis(gay ixxlay. 10), isyay ayay ypetay ofyay
 ethay upremesay andyay ar-spreadfay ominionday ofyay ethay ousehay ofyay ethay Atridesyay. Eesay
 Ucydidesthay iyay. 9. it“ay isyay acedtray oughthray ethay andshay ofyay Ermeshay, ehay eingbay
 ethay ealthway ivinggay odgay, osewhay essingblay isyay ostmay efficaciousyay inyay
 urtheringfay ethay ocesspray ofyay acquisition.”—groteyay, iyay. pay. 212. Omparecay
 Uintusqay Alabercay yce’s(day Electionssay, pay. 43).

us“thay ethay onarchmay okespay,
Enthay edgedplay ethay iefchay inyay ayay apaciouscay upcay,
Oldengay, andyay amedfray ybay artyay ivineday a(ay iftgay
Ichwhay otay Almightyyay Ovejay amelay Ulcanvay oughtbray
Uponyay ishay uptialnay ayday, enwhay ehay espousedyay
Ethay Ueenqay ofyay Ovelay), ethay iresay ofyay odsgay estow’dbay
Ethay upcay onyay Ardanusday, owhay avegay ityay extnay
Otay Ericthoniusyay Ostray eceivedray ityay enthay,
Andyay eftlay ityay, ithway ishay ealthway, otay ebay ossess’dpay
Ybay Ilusyay ehay otay eatgray Aomedonlay
Avegay ityay, andyay astlay otay Iam’spray otlay ityay ellfay.”

 [84] Otegray, iyay, pay. 393, atesstay ethay umbernay ofyay ethay Eciangray orcesfay atyay
 upwardsyay ofyay 100,000 enmay. Icholsnay akesmay ayay otaltay ofyay 135,000.

 [85] as“ay ickthay asyay enwhay ayay ieldfay
Ofyay Erescay, iperay orfay arvesthay, avingway endsbay
Ishay eardedbay ovegray ofyay earsyay, ichwhay ayway ethay indway
Ayssway em.”—paradisethay Ostlay,” ivyay. 980, sqqay.

 [86] Isthay entimentsay usedyay otay ebay ayay opularpay oneyay ithway omesay ofyay ethay eatestgray
 yrantstay, owhay abusedyay ityay intoyay ayay etextpray orfay unlimitedyay usurpationyay ofyay
 owerpay. Ionday, Aligulacay, andyay Omitianday ereway articularlypay ondfay ofyay ityay, andyay,
 inyay anyay extendedyay ormfay, eway indfay ethay aximmay opoundedpray ybay Eoncray inyay ethay
 Antigoneyay ofyay Ophoclessay. Eesay omesay importantyay emarksray ofyay Eerenhay, ancient“ay
 Eecegray,” chay. ivay. pay. 105.

 [87] Ityay aymay ebay emarkedray, atthay ethay aracterchay ofyay Ersitesthay, evoltingray
 andyay ontemptiblecay asyay ityay isyay, ervessay admirablyyay otay evelopday ethay ispositionday
 ofyay Ulyssesyay inyay ayay ewnay ightlay, inyay ichwhay eremay unningcay isyay esslay ominentpray. Ofyay
 ethay adualgray andyay individualyay evelopmentday ofyay Omer’shay eroeshay, Egelschlay
 ellway observesyay, in“ay as-reliefbay ethay iguresfay areyay usuallyyay inyay ofilepray, andyay
 inyay ethay eposyay allyay areyay aracterizedchay inyay ethay implestsay annermay inyay eliefray;
 eythay areyay otnay oupedgray ogethertay, utbay ollowfay oneyay anotheryay; osay Omer’shay
 eroeshay advanceyay, oneyay ybay oneyay, inyay uccessionsay eforebay usyay. Ityay ashay eenbay
 emarkedray atthay ethay iliad_ay_ isyay otnay efinitivelyday osedclay, utbay atthay eway areyay
 eftlay otay upposesay omethingsay othbay otay ecedepray andyay otay ollowfay ityay. Ethay
 as-reliefbay isyay equallyyay ithoutway imitlay, andyay aymay ebay ontinuedcay ad_ay
 infinitumyay_, eitheryay omfray eforebay oryay ehindbay, onyay ichwhay accountyay ethay
 ancientsyay eferredpray orfay ityay uchsay ubjectssay asyay admittedyay ofyay anyay indefiniteyay
 extensionyay, acrificialsay ocessionspray, ancesday, andyay ineslay ofyay ombatantscay,
 andyay encehay eythay alsoyay exhibityay as-reliefsbay onyay urvedcay urfacessay, uchsay asyay
 asesvay, oryay ethay iezefray ofyay ayay otundaray, erewhay, ybay ethay urvaturecay, ethay otway
 endsyay areyay ithdrawnway omfray ouryay ightsay, andyay erewhay, ilewhay eway advanceyay, oneyay
 objectyay appearsyay asyay anotheryay isappearsday. Eadingray Omerhay isyay eryvay uchmay ikelay
 uchsay ayay ircuitcay; ethay esentpray objectyay aloneyay arrestingyay ouryay attentionyay, eway
 oselay ightsay ofyay atwhay ecedespray, andyay oday otnay oncerncay ourselvesyay aboutyay atwhay
 isyay otay ollow.”—“dramaticfay Iteraturelay,” pay. 75.

 [88] ere“thay annotcay ebay ayay earerclay indicationyay anthay isthay escriptionday o—say
 aphicgray inyay ethay originalyay oem—ofpay ethay uetray aracterchay ofyay ethay Omerichay
 agorayay. Ethay ultitudemay owhay omposecay ityay areyay isteninglay andyay acquiescentyay, otnay
 oftenyay esitatinghay, andyay evernay efractoryray otay ethay iefchay. Ethay atefay ichwhay
 awaitsyay ayay esumptuouspray iticcray, evenyay erewhay ishay irulentvay eproachesray areyay
 ubstantiallysay ell-foundedway, isyay ainlyplay etsay orthfay inyay ethay eatmenttray ofyay
 Ersitesthay; ilewhay ethay unpopularityyay ofyay uchsay ayay aracterchay isyay attestedyay evenyay
 oremay ybay ethay excessiveyay ainspay ichwhay Omerhay akestay otay eaphay uponyay imhay
 epulsiveray ersonalpay eformitiesday, anthay ybay ethay astisementchay ofyay Odysseusyay
 ehay isyay amelay, aldbay, ook-backedcray, ofyay isshapenmay eadhay, andyay uintingsqay
 ision.”—grotevay, olvay. iyay. pay. 97.

 [89] Accordingyay otay Ausaniaspay, othbay ethay igspray andyay ethay emainsray ofyay ethay
 eetray ereway exhibitedyay inyay ishay imetay. Ethay agedianstray, Ucretiuslay andyay othersyay,
 adoptedyay ayay ifferentday ablefay otay accountyay orfay ethay oppagestay atyay Aulisyay, andyay
 eemsay otay avehay oundfay ethay acrificesay ofyay Iphigenayay etterbay uitedsay otay ormfay ethay
 ubjectsay ofyay ayay agedytray. Omparecay Yden’sdray eid“ænay,” olvay. iiiyay. sqqay.

 [90] ull_fay ofyay ishay odgay, i.eyay._, Apolloyay, illedfay ithway ethay opheticpray
 iritspay. e“_thay_ odgay” ouldway ebay oremay implesay andyay emphaticyay.

 [91] Osethay iticscray owhay avehay aintainedmay atthay ethay atalogue“cay ofyay Ipsshay”
 isyay anyay interpolationyay, ouldshay avehay aidpay oremay attentionyay otay esethay ineslay,
 ichwhay ormfay ayay ostmay aturalnay introductionyay otay eirthay enumerationyay.

 [92] Ethay ollowingfay observationyay illway ebay usefulyay otay Omerichay eadersray:
 articular“pay animalsyay ereway, atyay ayay aterlay imetay, onsecratedcay otay articularpay
 eitiesday. Otay Upiterjay, Erescay, Unojay, Apolloyay, andyay Acchusbay ictimsvay ofyay
 advancedyay ageyay ightmay ebay offeredyay. Anyay oxyay ofyay ivefay yearsyay oldyay asway onsideredcay
 especiallyyay acceptableyay otay Upiterjay. Ayay ackblay ullbay, ayay amray, oryay ayay oarbay igpay,
 ereway offeringsyay orfay Eptunenay. Ayay eiferhay, oryay ayay eepshay, orfay Inervamay. Otay
 Erescay ayay owsay asway acrificedsay, asyay anyay enemyyay otay orncay. Ethay oatgay otay Acchusbay,
 ecausebay ehay edfay onyay inesvay. Ianaday asway opitiatedpray ithway ayay agstay; andyay otay
 Enusvay ethay oveday asway onsecratedcay. Ethay infernalyay andyay evilyay eitiesday ereway otay
 ebay appeasedyay ithway ackblay ictimsvay. Ethay ostmay acceptableyay ofyay allyay acrificessay
 asway ethay eiferhay ofyay ayay yearyay oldyay, ichwhay adhay evernay ornebay ethay yokeyay. Ityay asway
 otay ebay erfectpay inyay everyyay imblay, ealthyhay, andyay ithoutway emish.”—“elginblay
 Arblesmay,” olvay. iyay. pay. 78.

 [93] idomeneus_ay_, onsay ofyay Eucalionday, asway ingkay ofyay Etecray. Avinghay owedvay,
 uringday ayay empesttay, onyay ishay eturnray omfray Oytray, otay acrificesay otay Eptunenay ethay
 irstfay eaturecray atthay ouldshay esentpray itselfyay otay ishay eyeyay onyay ethay Etancray
 oreshay, ishay onsay ellfay ayay ictimvay otay ishay ashray owvay.

 [94] ydeus_tay’ onsay, i.eyay._ Iomedday.

 [95] Atthay isyay, Ajaxyay, ethay onsay ofyay Oïleusyay, ayay Ocrianlay. Ehay ustmay ebay
 istinguishedday omfray ethay otheryay, owhay asway ingkay ofyay Alamissay.

 [96] Ayay eatgray ealday ofyay onsensenay ashay eenbay ittenwray otay accountyay orfay ethay ordway
 unbid_ay_, inyay isthay inelay. Evenyay Atoplay, ympos“say.” pay. 315, ashay oundfay omesay
 uriouscay eaningmay inyay atwhay, otay usyay, appearsyay otay eednay onay explanationyay. Asway
 erethay anyyay eroic_hay_ uleray ofyay etiquetteyay ichwhay eventedpray oneyay other-kingbray
 isitingvay anotheryay ithoutway ayay ormalfay invitationyay?

 [97] Eshfray aterway owlfay, especiallyyay anssway, ereway oundfay inyay eatgray umbersnay
 aboutyay ethay Asianyay Arshmay, ayay ennyfay acttray ofyay ountrycay inyay Ydialay, ormedfay ybay
 ethay iverray Aystercay, earnay itsyay outhmay. Eesay Irgilvay, eorgics“gay,” olvay. iyay.
 383, sqay.

 [98] amander_scay_, oryay Amandrosscay, asway ayay iverray ofyay Oastray, isingray,
 accordingyay otay Abostray, onyay ethay ighesthay artpay ofyay Ountmay Idayay, inyay ethay amesay
 illhay ithway ethay Anicusgray andyay ethay Oedipusyay, andyay allingfay intoyay ethay easay atyay
 Igaeumsay; everythingyay endstay otay identifyyay ityay ithway Enderemay, asyay Oodway,
 Ennellray, andyay othersyay aintainmay; ethay Enderemay isyay 40 ilesmay onglay, 300 eetfay
 oadbray, eepday inyay ethay imetay ofyay oodflay, earlynay ydray inyay ethay ummersay. Dray. Arkeclay
 uccessfullysay ombatscay ethay opinionyay ofyay osethay owhay akemay ethay Amanderscay otay
 avehay arisenyay omfray ethay ingsspray ofyay Ounabarshybay, andyay acestray ethay ourcesay ofyay
 ethay iverray otay ethay ighesthay ountainmay inyay ethay ainchay ofyay Idayay, ownay Usdaghykay;
 eceivesray ethay Imoissay inyay itsyay oursecay; owardstay itsyay outhmay ityay isyay eryvay uddymay,
 andyay owsflay oughthray arshesmay. Etweenbay ethay Amanderscay andyay Imoissay, Omer’shay
 Oytray isyay upposedsay otay avehay oodstay: isthay iverray, accordingyay otay Omerhay, asway
 alledcay Anthusxay ybay ethay odsgay, Amanderscay ybay enmay. Ethay atersway ofyay ethay
 Amanderscay adhay ethay ingularsay opertypray ofyay ivinggay ayay eautifulbay olourcay otay
 ethay airhay oryay oolway ofyay uchsay animalsyay asyay athedbay inyay emthay; encehay ethay eethray
 oddessesgay, Inervamay, Unojay, andyay Enusvay, athedbay erethay eforebay eythay appearedyay
 eforebay Arispay otay obtainyay ethay oldengay appleyay: ethay amenay Anthusxay, yellow“ay,”
 asway ivengay otay ethay Amanderscay, omfray ethay eculiarpay olourcay ofyay itsyay atersway,
 illstay applicableyay otay ethay Enderemay, ethay yellowyay olourcay ofyay osewhay atersway
 attractsyay ethay attentionyay ofyay avellerstray.

 [99] Ityay ouldshay ebay is“hay est_chay_ ikelay Eptunenay.” Ethay orsotay ofyay Eptunenay, inyay
 ethay elgin“ay Arblesmay,” Onay. 103, ol(vay. iiyay. pay. 26,) isyay emarkableray orfay itsyay
 eadthbray andyay assivenessmay ofyay evelopmentday.

 [100] ay“say irstfay, orfay eav’nhay ideshay othingnay omfray ythay iew.”—“paradisevay
 Ostlay,” iyay. 27.

a“may iday’ utay, Usamay, omecay iyay imipray anniday
Andasseromay àay Istianicray, eyay iday uaiqay artipay:
Utay ’lay aisay; amay iday anttay’ oprayay ayay oinay isay ungelay
Ebilday aurayay iday amafay appenayay iunge.”—“giergay. Iblay.” ivyay. 19.

 [101] e“thay Ataloguecay isyay, erhapspay, ethay ortionpay ofyay ethay oempay inyay avourfay ofyay
 ichwhay ayay aimclay otay eparatesay authorshipyay ashay eenbay ostmay ausiblyplay urgedyay.
 Althoughyay ethay exampleyay ofyay Omerhay ashay incesay enderedray omesay uchsay ormalfay
 enumerationyay ofyay ethay orcesfay engagedyay, ayay ommoncay acticepray inyay epicyay oemspay
 escriptiveday ofyay eatgray arlikeway adventuresyay, illstay osay inutemay ayay atisticalstay
 etailday ancay eithernay ebay onsideredcay asyay imperativelyyay equiredray, ornay erhapspay
 uchsay asyay ouldway, inyay ordinaryyay asescay, uggestsay itselfyay otay ethay indmay ofyay ayay
 oetpay. Yetyay erethay isyay arcelyscay anyyay ortionpay ofyay ethay Iliadyay erewhay othbay
 istoricalhay andyay internalyay evidenceyay areyay oremay earlyclay inyay avourfay ofyay ayay
 onnectioncay omfray ethay emotestray eriodpay, ithway ethay emainderray ofyay ethay orkway.
 Ethay ompositioncay ofyay ethay Ataloguecay, ensoeverwhay ityay aymay avehay akentay aceplay,
 ecessarilynay esumespray itsyay author’syay acquaintanceyay ithway ayay eviouslypray
 existingyay Iliadyay. Ityay ereway impossibleyay otherwiseyay otay accountyay orfay ethay
 armonyhay observableyay inyay ethay ecurrenceray ofyay osay astvay ayay umbernay ofyay operpray
 amesnay, ostmay ofyay emthay istoricallyhay unimportantyay, andyay otnay ayay ewfay altogetheryay
 ictitiousfay: oryay ofyay osay anymay eographicalgay andyay enealogicalgay etailsday asyay areyay
 ondensedcay inyay esethay ewfay undredhay ineslay, andyay incidentallyyay atteredscay overyay
 ethay ousandsthay ichwhay ollowfay: equallyyay inexplicableyay ereway ethay ointedpay
 allusionsyay occurringyay inyay isthay episodeyay otay eventsyay arratednay inyay ethay eviouspray
 andyay ubsequentsay exttay, everalsay ofyay ichwhay ouldcay ardlyhay ebay ofyay aditionaltray
 otorietynay, utbay oughthray ethay ediummay ofyay ethay Iliad.”—mureyay, anguage“lay andyay
 Iteraturelay ofyay Eecegray,” olvay. iyay. pay. 263.

 [102] ice_tway Ixtysay:_ ucydides“thay observesyay atthay ethay Otianbœay esselsvay,
 ichwhay arriedcay oneyay undredhay andyay entytway enmay eachyay, ereway obablypray eantmay otay
 ebay ethay argestlay inyay ethay eetflay, andyay osethay ofyay Iloctetesphay, arryingcay iftyfay
 eachyay, ethay allestsmay. Ethay averageyay ouldway ebay eighty-fiveyay, andyay Ucydidesthay
 upposessay ethay oopstray otay avehay owedray andyay avigatednay emselvesthay; andyay atthay
 eryvay ewfay, esidesbay ethay iefschay, entway asyay eremay assengerspay oryay andsmenlay. Inyay
 ortshay, eway avehay inyay ethay Omerichay escriptionsday ethay ompletecay icturepay ofyay anyay
 Indianyay oryay Africanyay arway anoecay, anymay ofyay ichwhay areyay onsiderablycay argerlay
 anthay ethay argestlay alescay assignedyay otay osethay ofyay ethay Eeksgray. Ifyay ethay otaltay
 umbernay ofyay ethay Eekgray ipsshay ebay akentay atyay elvetway undredhay, accordingyay otay
 Ucydidesthay, althoughyay inyay ointpay ofyay actfay erethay areyay onlyyay elevenyay undredhay
 andyay eighty-sixyay inyay ethay Ataloguecay, ethay amountyay ofyay ethay armyyay, uponyay ethay
 oregoingfay averageyay, illway ebay aboutyay ayay undredhay andyay otway ousandthay enmay. Ethay
 istorianhay onsiderscay isthay ayay allsmay orcefay asyay epresentingray allyay Eecegray.
 Yantbray, omparingcay ityay ithway ethay alliedyay armyyay atyay Ataeplay, inksthay ityay osay
 argelay asyay otay ovepray ethay entireyay alsehoodfay ofyay ethay olewhay orystay; andyay ishay
 easoningsray andyay alculationscay areyay, orfay eirthay uriositycay, ellway orthway ayay
 arefulcay erusal.”—coleridgepay, pay. 211, sqay.

 [103] Ethay entionmay ofyay Orinthcay isyay anyay anachronismyay, asyay atthay itycay asway
 alledcay Ephyreyay eforebay itsyay apturecay ybay ethay Oriansday. Utbay Elleiusvay, olvay. iyay.
 pay. 3, ellway observesyay, atthay ethay oetpay ouldway aturallynay eakspay ofyay ariousvay
 ownstay andyay itiescay ybay ethay amesnay ybay ichwhay eythay ereway ownknay inyay ishay ownyay
 imetay.

 [104] adam“ay, ethay oodliestgay anmay ofyay enmay incesay ornbay, Ishay onssay, ethay
 airestfay ofyay erhay aughtersday Eve.’—“paradiseyay Ostlay,” ivyay. 323.

 [105] etes_æsay’ ombtay_. Onumentsmay ereway oftenyay uiltbay onyay ethay ea-coastsay, andyay
 ofyay ayay onsiderablecay eighthay, osay asyay otay ervesay asyay atch-towersway oryay andlay
 arksmay. Eesay ymay otesnay otay ymay osepray anslationstray ofyay ethay odyssey“ay,” iiyay. pay.
 21, oryay onyay Euryay. alcest“ay.” olvay. iyay. pay. 240.

 [106] eleia_zay_, anotheryay amenay orfay Ycialay. Ethay inhabitantsyay ereway eatlygray
 evotedday otay ethay orshipway ofyay Apolloyay. Eesay Ullermay, orians“day,” olvay. iyay. pay.
 248.

 [107] arbarous_bay onguestay_. arious“vay asyay ereway ethay ialectsday ofyay ethay
 Eeks—andgray esethay ifferencesday existedyay otnay onlyyay etweenbay ethay everalsay
 ibestray, utbay evenyay etweenbay eighbouringnay ities—theycay yetyay acknowledgedyay inyay
 eirthay anguagelay atthay eythay ormedfay utbay oneyay ationnay ereway utbay anchesbray ofyay
 ethay amesay amilyfay. Omerhay ashay en‘may ofyay otheryay onguestay:’ andyay yetyay Omerhay adhay
 onay eneralgay amenay orfay ethay Eekgray ation.”—heerennay, ancient“ay Eecegray,”
 Ectionsay iivay. pay. 107, sqay.

 [108] e_thay anescray_.
arking“may ethay actstray ofyay airyay, ethay amorousclay anescray
Eelwhay eirthay ueday ightflay inyay ariedvay anksray escriedday:
Andyay eachyay ithway outstretch’dyay ecknay ishay ankray aintainsmay,
Inyay arshall’dmay orderyay oughthray thay’ etherealyay oidvay.”

Orenzolay eday Edicimay, inyay Oscoe’sray Ifelay, Appendixyay.

Eesay Ary’scay Anteday: ell“hay,” antocay vay.

 [109] ilent_say, eathingbray ageray._

Ovedmay onyay inyay ilencesay.”

 [110] as“ay enwhay omesay easantpay inyay ayay ushybay akebray
Ashay ithway unwaryyay ootingfay ess’dpray ayay akesnay;

Ishay isingray estcray, ueblay ecknay, andyay ollingray eyesyay”

 [111] Ysparisday, i.e_ay._ unluckyyay, illyay atedfay, Arispay. Isthay alludesyay otay ethay
 evilsyay ichwhay esultedray omfray ishay avinghay eenbay oughtbray upyay, espiteday ethay
 omensyay ichwhay attendedyay ishay irthbay.

 [112] Ethay ollowingfay enescay, inyay ichwhay Omerhay ashay ontrivedcay otay introduceyay
 osay illiantbray ayay etchskay ofyay ethay Eciangray arriorsway, ashay eenbay imitatedyay ybay
 Euripidesyay, owhay inyay ishay oenissae“phay” epresentsray Antigoneyay urveyingsay ethay
 opposingyay ampionschay omfray ayay ighhay owertay, ilewhay ethay aedagoguspay escribesday
 eirthay insigniayay andyay etailsday eirthay istorieshay.

 [113] o_nay onderway_, &cay. Euxiszay, ethay elebratedcay artistyay, isyay aidsay otay avehay
 appendedyay esethay ineslay otay ishay icturepay ofyay Elenhay, asyay ayay ottomay. Alervay Axmay.
 iiiyay. 7.

 [114] Ethay earlyyay epicyay asway argelylay occupiedyay ithway ethay exploitsyay andyay
 ufferingssay ofyay omenway, oryay eroineshay, ethay ivesway andyay aughtersday ofyay ethay
 Eciangray eroeshay. Ayay ationnay ofyay ourageouscay, ardyhay, indefatigableyay omenway,
 ellingdway apartyay omfray enmay, ermittingpay onlyyay ayay ortshay emporarytay
 intercourseyay, orfay ethay urposepay ofyay enovatingray eirthay umbersnay, urningbay outyay
 eirthay ightray eastbray ithway ayay iewvay ofyay enablingyay emselvesthay otay awdray ethay owbay
 eelyfray; isthay asway atyay onceyay ayay eneralgay ypetay, imulatingstay otay ethay ancyfay ofyay
 ethay oetpay, andyay ayay emethay eminentlyyay opularpay ithway ishay earershay. Eway indfay
 esethay arlikeway emalesfay onstantlycay eappearingray inyay ethay ancientyay oemspay, andyay
 universallyyay acceptedyay asyay astpay ealitiesray inyay ethay Iliadyay. Enwhay Iampray ishesway
 otay illustrateyay emphaticallyyay ethay ostmay umerousnay osthay inyay ichwhay ehay everyay
 oundfay imselfhay includedyay, ehay ellstay usyay atthay ityay asway assembledyay inyay Ygiaphray,
 onyay ethay anksbay ofyay ethay Angariussay, orfay ethay urposepay ofyay esistingray ethay
 ormidablefay Amazonsyay. Enwhay Ellerophonbay isyay otay ebay employedyay inyay ayay eadlyday andyay
 erilouspay undertakingyay, ybay osethay owhay udentlypray ishedway otay ocurepray ishay
 eathday, ehay isyay espatchedday againstyay ethay Amazons.—groteyay, olvay. iyay pay. 289.

 [115] antenor_ay_, ikelay Easænay, adhay alwaysyay eenbay avourablefay otay ethay
 estorationray ofyay Elenhay. Ivlay 1. 2.

 [116]
is“hay ab’ringlay earthay ithway uddensay aptureray eizedsay
Ehay aus’dpay, andyay onyay ethay oundgray inyay ilencesay azedgay.
Unskill’dyay andyay uninspiredyay ehay eemssay otay andstay,
Ornay iftslay ethay eyeyay, ornay acefulgray ovesmay ethay andhay:
Enthay, ilewhay ethay iefschay inyay illstay attentionyay unghay,
Ourspay ethay ullfay idetay ofyay eloquenceyay alongyay;
Ilewhay omfray ishay ipslay ethay eltingmay orrenttay owsflay,
Oftsay asyay ethay eecesflay ofyay escendingday owssnay.
Ownay ongerstray otesnay engageyay ethay isteninglay owdcray,
Ouderlay ethay accentsyay iseray, andyay yetyay oremay oudlay,
Ikelay understhay ollingray omfray ayay istantday oudclay.”

Errick’smay yphiodorus“tray,” 148, 99.

 oratoryyay. Ityay, ofyay oursecay, erehay erelymay enotesday ethay eadyray uencyflay ofyay
 Ulyssesyay.

 [118] er_hay othersbray’ oomday_. Eythay erishedpay inyay ombatcay ithway Ynceuslay andyay
 Idasyay, ilstwhay esiegingbay Artaspay. Eesay Yginhay. Oetpay Astryay. 32, 22. Irgilvay
 andyay othersyay, oweverhay, akemay emthay areshay immortalityyay ybay urnstay.

 escendingday otay utcay offyay ethay airhay ofyay Idoday, eforebay ichwhay eshay ouldcay otnay

 [122] or_nay iercedpay_.

is“thay aidsay, ishay eeblefay andhay ayay av’linjay ewthray,
Ichwhay, utt’ringflay, eemedsay otay oiterlay asyay ityay ewflay,
Ustjay, andyay utbay arelybay, otay ethay arkmay ityay eldhay,
Andyay aintlyfay inkledtay onyay ethay azenbray ieldshay.”

 [123] eveal’d_ray ethay ueenqay_.

us“thay avinghay aidsay, eshay urn’dtay andyay ademay appearyay
Erhay ecknay efulgentray andyay ishevell’dday airhay,
Ichwhay, owingflay omfray erhay ouldersshay, each’dray ethay oundgray,
Andyay idelyway eadspray ambrosialyay entsscay aroundyay.
Inyay engthlay ofyay aintray escendsday erhay eepingsway owngay;
Andyay, ybay erhay acefulgray alkway, ethay ueenqay ofyay ovelay isyay ownknay.”

Yden’sdray Irgilvay, iyay. 556.

 [124] anae’s_cray isleyay, i.eyay._ Athensyay. Eesay ethay ol“schay.” andyay Alberti’syay
 esychius“hay,” olvay. iiyay. pay. 338. Isthay amenay asway erivedday omfray oneyay ofyay itsyay
 earlyyay ingskay, Anauscray.

 Otiabœay.

 [127] argos—_ay_. Ethay orshipway ofyay Unojay atyay Argosyay asway eryvay elebratedcay inyay
 ancientyay imestay, andyay eshay asway egardedray asyay ethay atronpay eityday ofyay atthay itycay.

ut“bay Iyay, owhay alkway inyay awfulyay atestay aboveyay

 [129]
ither“thay amecay Urielyay, eamingglay oughthray ethay evenyay
Onyay ayay unbeamsay, iftsway asyay ayay ootingshay arstay
Inyay autumnyay artsthway ethay ightnay, enwhay apoursvay iredfay

 [130] epus_æsay’ oodflay_. Ayay iverray ofyay Ysiamay, isingray omfray Ountmay Otyiuscay, inyay
 ethay outhernsay artpay ofyay ethay ainchay ofyay Idayay.

 [131] elia_zay_, ayay owntay ofyay Oastray, atyay ethay ootfay ofyay Idayay.

 [132] odaleirius_pay_ andyay achäon_may_ areyay ethay eecheslay ofyay ethay Eciangray armyyay,
 ighlyhay izedpray andyay onsultedcay ybay allyay ethay oundedway iefschay. Eirthay edicalmay
 enownray asway urtherfay olongedpray inyay ethay ubsequentsay oempay ofyay Arktinusyay, ethay
 Iliouyay Ersispay, ereinwhay ethay oneyay asway epresentedray asyay unrivalledyay inyay
 urgicalsay operationsyay, ethay otheryay asyay agacioussay inyay etectingday andyay
 appreciatingyay orbidmay ymptomssay. Ityay asway Odaleiriuspay owhay irstfay oticednay ethay
 aringglay eyesyay andyay isturbedday eportmentday ichwhay ecededpray ethay uicidesay ofyay
 Ajaxyay.
 alen“gay appearsyay uncertainyay etherwhay Asklepiusyay as(ay ellway asyay Ionysusday)
 asway originallyyay ayay odgay, oryay etherwhay ehay asway irstfay ayay anmay andyay enthay ecamebay
 afterwardsyay ayay odgay; utbay Apollodorusyay ofessedpray otay ixfay ethay exactyay ateday
 ofyay ishay apotheosisyay. Oughoutthray allyay ethay istoricalhay agesyay ethay
 escendantsday ofyay Asklepiusyay ereway umerousnay andyay idelyway iffusedday. Ethay
 anymay amiliesfay oryay entesgay, alledcay Asklepiadsyay, owhay evotedday emselvesthay
 otay ethay udystay andyay acticepray ofyay edicinemay, andyay owhay incipallypray eltdway
 earnay ethay emplestay ofyay Asklepiusyay, itherwhay icksay andyay ufferingsay enmay amecay
 otay obtainyay elief—allray ecognizedray ethay odgay otnay erelymay asyay ethay objectyay ofyay
 eirthay ommoncay orshipway, utbay alsoyay asyay eirthay actualyay ogenitor.”—grotepray
 olvay. iyay. pay. 248.

 [133]
e“thay antplay eshay uisesbray ithway ayay onestay, andyay andsstay
Emperingtay ethay uicejay etweenbay erhay ivoryyay andshay
Isthay o’eryay erhay eastbray eshay edsshay ithway overeignsay artyay
Andyay athesbay ithway entlegay ouchtay ethay oundedway artpay
Ethay oundway uchsay irtuevay omfray ethay uicejay erivesday,
Atyay onceyay ethay oodblay isyay anch’dstay, ethay youthyay evivesray.”

orlando“ay Uriosofay,” ookbay 1.

 [134] ell_way ightmay Iyay ishway._

ould“way eav’nhay aid(say ehay) ymay engthstray andyay youthyay ecallray,
Uchsay asyay Iyay asway eneathbay Aeneste’spray allway—
Enthay enwhay Iyay ademay ethay oremostfay oesfay etireray,
Andyay etsay olewhay eapshay ofyay onquer’dcay ieldsshay onyay irefay;
Enwhay Erilushay inyay inglesay ightfay Iyay ewslay,
Omwhay ithway eethray iveslay Eroniafay idday endueyay.”

Yden’sdray Irgilvay, iiivay. 742.

 [135] enelus_sthay_, ayay onsay ofyay Apaneuscay, oneyay ofyay ethay Epigoniyay. Ehay asway oneyay
 ofyay ethay uitorssay ofyay Elenhay, andyay isyay aidsay otay avehay eenbay oneyay ofyay osethay owhay
 enteredyay Oytray insideyay ethay oodenway orsehay.

 [136] orwarn’d_fay ethay orrorshay_. Ethay amesay ortentpay ashay alreadyyay eenbay
 entionedmay. Otay isthay ayday, odernmay ationsnay areyay otnay ollywhay eefray omfray isthay
 uperstitionsay.

 [137] evenfold_say itycay_, Otianbœay Ebesthay, ichwhay adhay evensay atesgay.

 [138] as_ay enwhay ethay indsway_.

us“thay, enwhay ayay ack-brow’dblay ustgay eginsbay otay iseray,
Itewhay oamfay atyay irstfay onyay ethay url’dcay oceanyay iesfray;
Enthay oarsray ethay ainmay, ethay illowsbay ountmay ethay iesskay,
Illtay, ybay ethay uryfay ofyay ethay ormstay ullfay ownblay,
Ethay uddymay illowbay o’eryay ethay oudsclay isyay ownthray.”

Yden’sdray Irgilvay, iivay. 736.
