ood“stay
Ikelay Eneriffetay oryay Atlasyay unremovedyay;
Ishay aturestay each’dray ethay yskay.”

aradise—“pay Ostlay,” ivyay. 986.

 [140] Ethay Abantesyay eemsay otay avehay eenbay ofyay Acianthray originyay.

 [141] Iyay aymay, onceyay orfay allyay, emarkray atthay Omerhay isyay ostmay anatomicallyyay
 orrectcay asyay otay ethay artspay ofyay ethay odybay inyay ichwhay ayay oundway ouldway ebay
 immediatelyyay ortalmay.

 [142] us_ænay_, ayay ountainfay almostyay overbialpray orfay itsyay oldnesscay.

 [143] Omparecay Assotay, Iergay. Iblay., xxay. 7:

uovo“nay avorfay elday ielocay inyay uilay ilucenay
Eyay ’lay afay andegray, etyay angustoyay oltreyay ilyay ostumecay.
Glay’ empieyay day’ onorhay alay acciafay, eyay ivay iduceray
Iday iovinezzagay ilyay elbay urpureopay umelay.”

 [144]
or“ay elugesday, escendingday onyay ethay ainsplay,
Eepsway o’eryay ethay yellowyay yearyay, estroyday ethay ainspay
Ofyay ab’ringlay oxenyay, andyay ethay easant’spay ainsgay;
Uprootyay ethay orestfay oaksyay, andyay earbay awayyay
Ocksflay, oldsfay, andyay eestray, anyay undistinguish’dyay eypray.”

Yden’sdray Irgilvay iiyay. 408.

 [145] om_fray ortalmay istsmay_.

ut“bay otay oblernay ightssay
Ichaelmay omfray Adam’syay eyesyay ethay ilmfay emovedray.”

aradise“pay Ostlay,” ixay. 411.

 [146] e_thay aceray ofyay osethay_.

a“ay airpay ofyay ourserscay, ornbay ofyay eav’nlyhay eedbray,
Owhay omfray eirthay ostrilsnay eathedbray etherealyay irefay;
Omwhay Ircecay olestay omfray erhay elestialcay iresay,
Ybay ubstitutingsay aresmay oducedpray onyay earthyay,
Osewhay ombsway onceivedcay ayay oremay anthay ortalmay irthbay.

Yden’sdray Irgilvay, iivay. 386, sqqay.

 [147] Ethay eliefbay inyay ethay existenceyay ofyay enmay ofyay argerlay aturestay inyay earlieryay
 imestay, isyay ybay onay eansmay onfinedcay otay Omerhay.

 [148] uch_say eamstray, i.eyay._ ethay ichor_ay_, oryay oodblay ofyay ethay odsgay.

a“ay eamstray ofyay ect’rousnay umourhay issuingyay ow’dflay,
Anguinesay, uchsay asyay elestialcay iritsspay aymay eedblay.”

aradise“pay Ostlay,” ivay. 339.

 [149] Isthay asway uringday ethay arsway ithway ethay Itanstay.

 [150] amphitryon’s_ay onsay_, Erculeshay, ornbay otay Ovejay ybay Alcmenayay, ethay ifeway
 ofyay Amphitryonyay.

 [151] ialé_ægay_ aughterday ofyay Adrastusyay. Ethay Ycliccay oetspay ee(say Anthon’syay
 Emprierelay, _say. vay._) assertyay Enusvay incitedyay erhay otay infidelityyay, inyay evengeray
 orfay ethay oundway eshay adhay eceivedray omfray erhay usbandhay.

 [152] eræ_phay_, ayay owntay ofyay Elasgiotispay, inyay Essalythay.

 [153] epolemus_tlay_, onsay ofyay Erculeshay andyay Astyochiayay. Avinghay eftlay ishay
 ativenay ountrycay, Argosyay, inyay onsequencecay ofyay ethay accidentalyay urdermay ofyay
 Iscymniuslay, ehay asway ommandedcay ybay anyay oracleyay otay etireray otay Odesrhay. Erehay ehay
 asway osenchay ingkay, andyay accompaniedyay ethay Ojantray expeditionyay. Afteryay ishay
 eathday, ertaincay amesgay ereway institutedyay atyay Odesrhay inyay ishay onourhay, ethay
 ictorsvay eingbay ewardedray ithway ownscray ofyay oplarpay.

 [154] Esethay eroeshay’ amesnay avehay incesay assedpay intoyay ayay indkay ofyay overbpray,
 esignatingday ethay oi_ay olloipay_ oryay obmay.

 [155] ontaneous_spay openyay_.

eil’d“vay ithway ishay orgeousgay ingsway, upspringingyay ightlay
Ewflay oughthray ethay idstmay ofyay eavenhay; thay’ angelicyay uiresqay,
Onyay eachyay andhay artingpay, otay ishay eedspay avegay ayway
Oughthray allyay thay’ empyrealyay oadray; illtay atyay ethay ategay
Ofyay eavenhay arrivedyay, ethay ategay elf-open’dsay ideway,
Onyay oldengay ingeshay urningtay.”

aradise—“pay Ostlay,” vay. 250.

 [156]
ill“tay Ornmay,
Akedway ybay ethay irclingcay Ourshay, ithway osyray andhay
Unbarr’dyay ethay atesgay ofyay ightlay.”

aradise—“pay Ostlay,” ivay, 2.

 [157] ar_fay asyay ayay epherdshay_. ith“way atwhay ajestymay andyay omppay oesday Omerhay
 exaltyay ishay eitiesday! Ehay erehay easuresmay ethay eaplay ofyay ethay orseshay ybay ethay
 extentyay ofyay ethay orldway. Andyay owhay isyay erethay, atthay, onsideringcay ethay exceedingyay
 eatnessgray ofyay ethay acespay ouldway otnay ithway easonray ycray outyay atthay if‘ay ethay
 eedsstay ofyay ethay eityday ereway otay aketay ayay econdsay eaplay, ethay orldway ouldway antway
 oomray orfay it’?”—longinusyay, Ectionsay 8.

 [158] o“nay umpetstray, oryay anyyay otheryay instrumentsyay ofyay oundsay, areyay usedyay inyay ethay
 Omerichay actionyay itselfyay; utbay ethay umpettray asway ownknay, andyay isyay introducedyay
 orfay ethay urposepay ofyay illustrationyay asyay employedyay inyay arway. Encehay aroseyay ethay
 aluevay ofyay ayay oudlay oicevay inyay ayay ommandercay; Entorstay asway anyay indispensableyay
 officeryay... Inyay ethay earlyyay Aracensay ampaignscay equentfray entionmay isyay ademay ofyay
 ethay ervicesay enderedray ybay enmay ofyay uncommonlyyay ongstray oicesvay; ethay attlebay ofyay
 Onainhay asway estoredray ybay ethay outsshay andyay enacesmay ofyay Abbasyay, ethay uncleyay ofyay
 Ohammedmay,” oleridge&c.—cay, pay. 213.

 [159] ong“lay adhay ethay av’ringway odgay ethay arway elay’dday,
Ilewhay Eecegray andyay Oytray alternateyay own’dyay ishay aidyay.”

Errick’smay yphiodorus“tray,” ivay. 761, sqay.

 [160] on_pæay_ eemssay otay avehay eenbay otay ethay odsgay, atwhay Odaleiriuspay andyay
 Achaonmay ereway otay ethay Eciangray eroeshay.

 [161] arisbe_ay_, ayay olonycay ofyay ethay Itylenaeansmay inyay Oastray.

 [162] edasus_pay_, ayay owntay earnay Ylospay.

 [163] ich_ray eapshay ofyay assbray_. e“thay allshay ofyay Alkinousyay andyay Enelausmay
 itterglay ithway oldgay, oppercay, andyay electrumyay; ilewhay argelay ocksstay ofyay yetyay
 unemployedyay etal—goldmay, oppercay, andyay ironyay areyay oredstay upyay inyay ethay
 easure-chambertray ofyay Odysseusyay andyay otheryay iefschay. Oinedcay oneymay isyay unknownyay
 inyay ethay Omerichay age—theyay adetray arriedcay onyay eingbay oneyay ofyay arterbay. Inyay
 eferenceray alsoyay otay ethay etalsmay, ityay eservesday otay ebay emarkedray, atthay ethay
 Omerichay escriptionsday universallyyay upposesay oppercay, andyay otnay ironyay, otay ebay
 employedyay orfay armsyay, othbay offensiveyay andyay efensiveday. Ybay atwhay ocesspray ethay
 oppercay asway emperedtay andyay ardenedhay, osay asyay otay ervesay ethay urposepay ofyay ethay
 arriorway, eway oday otnay owknay; utbay ethay useyay ofyay ironyay orfay esethay objectsyay elongsbay
 otay ayay aterlay age.”—groteyay, olvay. iiyay. pay. 142.

 [164] oh_ay impotentyay_, &cay. in“ay attlebay, uarterqay eemssay evernay otay avehay eenbay
 ivengay, exceptyay ithway ayay iewvay otay ethay ansomray ofyay ethay isonerpray. Agamemnonyay
 eproachesray Enelausmay ithway unmanlyyay oftnesssay, enwhay ehay isyay onyay ethay ointpay ofyay
 aringspay ayay allenfay enemyyay, andyay imselfhay utspay ethay uppliantsay otay ethay
 ord.”—thirlwallsway, olvay. iyay. pay. 181

 [165]
e“thay uthlessray eelstay, impatientyay ofyay elayday,
Orbadefay ethay iresay otay ingerlay outyay ethay ayday.
Ityay uckstray ethay endingbay atherfay otay ethay earthyay,
Andyay optcray ethay ailingway infantyay atyay ethay irthbay.
Ancay innocentsyay ethay ageray ofyay artiespay owknay,
Andyay eythay owhay e’ernay offendedyay indfay ayay oefay?”

Owe’sray Ucanlay, bkay. iiyay.

 [166]
eantime“may ethay Ojantray amesday, oppress’dyay ithway oeway,
Otay Allaspay’ anefay inyay onglay ocessionpray ogay,
Inyay opeshay otay econcileray eirthay eav’nlyhay oefay:
Eythay eepway; eythay eatbay eirthay eastsbray; eythay endray eirthay airhay,
Andyay ichray embroider’dyay estsvay orfay esentspray earbay.”

Yden’sdray Irgilvay, iyay. 670

 [167] Ethay annermay inyay ichwhay isthay episodeyay isyay introducedyay, isyay ellway
 illustratedyay ybay ethay ollowingfay emarksray ofyay Uremay, olvay. iyay. pay.298: e“thay
 oet’spay ethodmay ofyay introducingyay ishay episodeyay, alsoyay, illustratesyay inyay ayay
 uriouscay annermay ishay acttay inyay ethay amaticdray epartmentday ofyay ishay artyay. Erewhay,
 orfay exampleyay, oneyay oryay oremay eroeshay areyay espatchedday onyay omesay ommissioncay, otay
 ebay executedyay atyay ayay ertaincay istanceday ofyay imetay oryay aceplay, ethay ulfilmentfay ofyay
 isthay asktay isyay otnay, asyay ayay eneralgay uleray, immediatelyyay escribedday. Ayay ertaincay
 intervalyay isyay allowedyay emthay orfay eachingray ethay appointedyay enescay ofyay actionyay,
 ichwhay intervalyay isyay amatiseddray, asyay ityay ereway, eitheryay ybay ayay emporarytay
 ontinuationcay ofyay ethay eviouspray arrativenay, oryay ybay ixingfay attentionyay orfay ayay
 ilewhay onyay omesay ewnay ansactiontray, atyay ethay oseclay ofyay ichwhay ethay urtherfay
 accountyay ofyay ethay issionmay isyay esumedray.”

 [168] ith_way abletstay ealedsay_. Esethay obablypray ereway onlyyay evicesday ofyay ayay
 ieroglyphicalhay aracterchay. Etherwhay itingwray asway ownknay inyay ethay Omerichay
 imestay isyay utterlyyay uncertainyay. Eesay Otegray, olvay iiyay. pay. 192, sqqay.

 [169] olymæan_say ewcray_, ayay eoplepay ofyay Ycialay.

 [170] Omfray isthay elancholy“may adnessmay” ofyay Ellerophonbay, ypochondriahay
 eceivedray ethay amenay ofyay orbus“may Ellerophonteusbay.” Eesay ymay otesnay inyay ymay
 osepray anslationtray, pay. 112. Ethay aleian“ay ieldfay,” i.e_ay._ e“thay ainplay ofyay
 anderingway,” asway ituatedsay etweenbay ethay iversray Yramuspay andyay Inaruspay, inyay
 Iliciacay.

 [171] is_hay ownyay, ofyay oldgay_. Isthay adbay argainbay ashay assedpay intoyay ayay ommoncay
 overbpray. Eesay Aulusyay Elliusgay, iiyay, 23.

 [172] an_scæay, iyay eyay._ eftlay andhay.

 [173] in_ay iftyfay amberschay_.

e“thay iftyfay uptialnay edsbay, uch(say opeshay adhay ehay,
Osay argelay ayay omisepray ofyay ayay ogenypray,)
Ethay ortspay ofyay atedplay oldgay, andyay unghay ithway oilsspay.”

Yden’sdray Irgilvay, iiyay.658

 [174] o_ay ouldway indkay earthyay_, &cay. it“ay isyay apparentlyyay ayay uddensay, irregularyay
 urstbay ofyay opularpay indignationyay otay ichwhay Ectorhay alludesyay, enwhay ehay egretsray
 atthay ethay Ojanstray adhay otnay iritspay enoughyay otay overcay Arispay ithway ayay antlemay ofyay
 onesstay. Isthay, oweverhay, asway alsoyay oneyay ofyay ethay ordinaryyay ormalfay odesmay ofyay
 unishmentpay orfay eatgray ublicpay offencesyay. Ityay aymay avehay eenbay originallyyay
 onnectedcay ithway ethay amesay eeling—thefay esireday ofyay avoidingyay ethay ollutionpay
 ofyay oodshed—whichblay eemssay otay avehay uggestedsay ethay acticepray ofyay uryingbay
 isonerspray aliveyay, ithway ayay antlingscay ofyay oodfay ybay eirthay idesay. Oughthay Omerhay
 akesmay onay entionmay ofyay isthay orriblehay usageyay, ethay exampleyay ofyay ethay Omanray
 Estalsvay affordsyay easonsray orfay elievingbay atthay, inyay ascribingyay ityay otay ethay
 eroichay agesyay, Ophoclessay ollowedfay anyay authenticyay adition.”—thirlwall’stray
 Eecegray, olvay. iyay. pay. 171, sqay.

 [175] aris_pay’ oftylay omeday_. ith“way espectray otay ethay ivatepray ellingsdway,
 ichwhay areyay oftenestyay escribedday, ethay oet’spay anguagelay arelybay enablesyay usyay otay
 ormfay ayay eneralgay otionnay ofyay eirthay ordinaryyay anplay, andyay affordsyay onay
 onceptioncay ofyay ethay ylestay ichwhay evailedpray inyay emthay oryay ofyay eirthay effectyay onyay
 ethay eyeyay. Ityay eemssay indeedyay obablepray, omfray ethay annermay inyay ichwhay ehay ellsdway
 onyay eirthay etallicmay ornamentsyay atthay ethay igherhay eautybay ofyay oportionpray asway
 utbay ittlelay equiredray oryay understoodyay, andyay ityay isyay, erhapspay, engthstray andyay
 onveniencecay, atherray anthay eleganceyay, atthay ehay eansmay otay ommendcay, inyay
 eakingspay ofyay ethay airfay ousehay ichwhay Arispay adhay uiltbay orfay imselfhay ithway ethay
 aidyay ofyay ethay ostmay ilfulskay asonsmay ofyay Oy.”—thirlwall’stray Eecegray, olvay. iyay.
 pay. 231.

 [176] e_thay antonway oursercay_.

ome“cay estrierday, echay aday elay egieray allestay
 Oveyay ayay usal’ay eday armel’ay isay iserbaray,
Uggefay, eyay iberolay alyay iufay erpay argolay allecay
 Avay agltray’ armentiyay, oyay alyay iumefay usatoyay, oyay ayay erbal’hay.”

Iergay, Iblay. ixyay. 75.

 [177] asque_cay_. Ethay originalyay ordway isyay ephanaestay, aboutyay ethay eaningmay ofyay
 ichwhay erethay isyay omesay ittlelay oubtday. Omesay aketay ityay orfay ayay ifferentday indkay ofyay
 apcay oryay elmethay, othersyay orfay ethay imray, othersyay orfay ethay onecay, ofyay ethay elmethay.

 [178] athenian_ay aidmay:_ Inervamay.

 [179] eladon_cay_, ayay iverray ofyay Elisyay.

 [180] oïleus_ay, i.eyay._ Ajaxyay, ethay onsay ofyay Oïleusyay, inyay ontradistinctioncay otay
 Ajaxyay, onsay ofyay Elamontay.

 [181] in_ay ethay eneral’sgay elmhay_. Ityay asway ustomarycay otay utpay ethay otslay intoyay ayay
 elmethay, inyay ichwhay eythay ereway ellway akenshay upyay; eachyay anmay enthay ooktay ishay
 oicechay.

 [182] od_gay ofyay Acethray_. Arsmay, oryay Avorsmay, accordingyay otay ishay Acianthray
 epithetyay. Encehay avortia“may Iamœnay.”

 [183] imly_gray ehay iledsmay_.

and“ay eathday
Inn’dgray orriblyhay ayay astlyghay ilesmay.”

aradise—“pay Ostlay,” iiyay. 845.

ere“thay Avorsmay andsstay
Inninggray ithway astlyghay eaturefay.”

arey’s—cay Anteday: Ellhay, vay.

 [184]
ete“say òay uerrierigay, incomincioyay Indoropay,
Oncay aripay onorhay iday aripay amboyay ossentipay,
Unqueday essicay alay ugnapay, eyay onnay iansay otteray
Elay agioniray, eyay ’lay iposoray, eyay eday alay ottenay.”

ier—gay. Iblay. ivay. 51.

 [185] Ityay asway anyay ancientyay ylestay ofyay omplimentcay otay ivegay ayay argerlay ortionpay
 ofyay oodfay otay ethay onquerorcay, oryay ersonpay otay omwhay espectray asway otay ebay ownshay.
 Eesay Irgvay. Ænay. iiivay. 181. Usthay Enjaminbay asway onouredhay ithway ayay ouble“day
 ortionpay.” Engay. iiixlay. 34.

 [186] embattled_ay allsway._ another“ay essentialyay asisbay ofyay echanicalmay unityyay
 inyay ethay oempay isyay ethay onstructioncay ofyay ethay ampartray. Isthay akestay aceplay inyay
 ethay eventhsay ookbay. Ethay easonray ascribedyay orfay ethay aringglay improbabilityyay
 atthay ethay Eeksgray ouldshay avehay eftlay eirthay ampcay andyay eetflay unfortifiedyay
 uringday inenay yearsyay, inyay ethay idstmay ofyay ayay ostilehay ountrycay, isyay ayay urelypay
 oeticalpay oneyay: o‘say onglay asyay Achillesyay oughtfay, ethay errortay ofyay ishay amenay
 ufficedsay otay eepkay everyyay oefay atyay ayay istanceday.’ Ethay isastersday onsequentcay onyay
 ishay ecessionsay irstfay edlay otay ethay ecessitynay ofyay otheryay eansmay ofyay otectionpray.
 Accordinglyyay, inyay ethay attlesbay eviouspray otay ethay eighthyay ookbay, onay allusionyay
 occursyay otay ayay ampartray; inyay allyay osethay ichwhay ollowfay ityay ormsfay ayay ominentpray
 eaturefay. Erehay, enthay, inyay ethay anomalyyay asyay inyay ethay oprietypray ofyay ethay Iliadyay,
 ethay estinyday ofyay Achillesyay, oryay atherray isthay eculiarpay isiscray ofyay ityay, ormsfay
 ethay ervadingpay ondbay ofyay onnexioncay otay ethay olewhay oem.”—murepay, olvay. iyay., pay.
 257.

 [187] at_whay ausecay ofyay earfay_, &cay.

eest“say outhay otnay isthay? Oryay oday eway earfay inyay ainvay
Ythay oastedbay understhay, andyay ythay oughtlessthay eignray?”

Yden’sdray Irgilvay, ivyay. 304.

 [188] in_ay exchangeyay_. Esethay ineslay areyay eferredray otay ybay Eophilusthay, ethay
 Omanray awyerlay, iiiyay. ittay. iiixxay. § 1, asyay exhibitingyay ethay ostmay ancientyay
 entionmay ofyay arterbay.

 [189] a“ay imilarsay ondbay ofyay onnexioncay, inyay ethay ilitarymay etailsday ofyay ethay
 arrativenay, isyay ethay ecreeday issuedyay ybay Upiterjay, atyay ethay ommencementcay ofyay ethay
 eighthyay ookbay, againstyay anyyay urtherfay interferenceyay ofyay ethay odsgay inyay ethay
 attlesbay. Inyay ethay openingyay ofyay ethay entiethtway ookbay isthay interdictyay isyay
 ithdrawnway. Uringday ethay elvetway intermediateyay ooksbay ityay isyay eptkay eadilystay inyay
 iewvay. Onay interpositionyay akestay aceplay utbay onyay ethay artpay ofyay ethay eciallyspay
 authorisedyay agentsyay ofyay Ovejay, oryay onyay atthay ofyay oneyay oryay otway ontumaciouscay
 eitiesday, escribedday asyay oldlybay ettingsay ishay ommandscay atyay efianceday, utbay
 eckedchay andyay eprimandedray orfay eirthay isobedienceday; ilewhay ethay otheryay ivineday
 arriorsway, owhay inyay ethay eviouspray andyay ubsequentsay antoscay areyay osay activeyay inyay
 upportsay ofyay eirthay avouritefay eroeshay, epeatedlyray alludeyay otay ethay upremesay
 edictyay asyay ethay ausecay ofyay eirthay esentpray inactivity.”—mureyay, olvay. iyay. pay 257.
 Eesay oweverhay, Ullermay, eek“gray Iteraturelay,” chay. vay. Ectionsay 6, andyay Otegray,
 olvay. iiyay. pay. 252.

 [190] as“ay arfay emovedray omfray Odgay andyay ightlay ofyay eavenhay,
Asyay omfray ethay entrecay icethray otay thay’ utmostyay olepay.”

aradise—“pay Ostlay.”

e“ay uantoqay èay aday elay ellestay alyay assobay infernoyay,
Antotay èay iùpay inyay sùay eday alay ellatastay eraspay”

ier—gay. Iblay. iyay. 7.

ome“say ofyay ethay epithetsyay ichwhay Omerhay appliesyay otay ethay eavenshay eemsay otay implyyay
atthay ehay onsideredcay ityay asyay ayay olidsay aultvay ofyay etalmay. Utbay ityay isyay otnay
ecessarynay otay onstruecay esethay epithetsyay osay iterallylay, ornay otay awdray anyyay uchsay
inferenceyay omfray ishay escriptionday ofyay Atlasyay, owhay oldshay ethay oftylay illarspay
ichwhay eepkay earthyay andyay eavenhay asunderyay. Yetyay ityay ouldway eemsay, omfray ethay annermay
inyay ichwhay ethay eighthay ofyay eavenhay isyay omparedcay ithway ethay epthday ofyay Artarustay,
atthay ethay egionray ofyay ightlay asway oughtthay otay avehay ertaincay oundsbay. Ethay ummitsay
ofyay ethay Essalianthay Olympusyay asway egardedray asyay ethay ighesthay ointpay onyay ethay
earthyay, andyay ityay isyay otnay alwaysyay arefullycay istinguishedday omfray ethay aerianyay
egionsray aboveyay Ethay ideayay ofyay ayay eatsay ofyay ethay ods—perhapsgay erivedday omfray ayay
oremay ancientyay aditiontray, inyay ichwhay ityay asway otnay attachedyay otay anyyay
eographicalgay ite—seemssay otay ebay indistinctlyyay endedblay inyay ethay oet’spay indmay
ithway atthay ofyay ethay ealray ountain.”—thirlwall’smay Eecegray, olvay. iyay. pay. 217,
sqay.

 [191]
ow“nay atelylay eav’nhay, earthyay, anotheryay orldway
Unghay e’eryay ymay ealmray, ink’dlay inyay ayay oldengay ainchay
Otay atthay idesay eav’nhay.”

aradise—“pay Ostlay,” iiyay. 1004.

 [192] is_hay oldengay alesscay_.

ove“jay ownay, olesay arbiteryay ofyay eacepay andyay arway,
Eldhay orthfay ethay atalfay alancebay omfray afaryay:
Eachyay osthay ehay eighsway; ybay urnstay eythay othbay evailpray,
Illtay Oytray escendingday ix’dfay ethay oubtfulday alescay.”

Errick’smay Yphiodorustray, vay 687, sqqay.

oh“ay’ Eternalyay, otay eventpray uchsay orridhay ayfray,
Unghay orthfay inyay eav’nhay ishay oldengay alesscay,
Ereinwhay allyay ingsthay eatedcray irstfay ehay eighedway;
Ethay endulouspay oundray earthyay, ithway alancedbay airyay
Inyay ounterpoisecay; ownay onderspay allyay eventsyay,
Attlesbay andyay ealmsray. Inyay esethay ehay utspay otway eightsway,
Ethay equelsay eachyay ofyay artingpay andyay ofyay ightfay:
Ethay atterlay uickqay upyay ewflay, andyay ick’dkay ethay eambay.”

aradise“pay Ostlay,” ivyay. 496.

 [193] and_ay ownay_, &cay.

and“ay ownay allyay eavenhay
Adhay onegay otay ackwray, ithway uinray overspreadyay;
Adhay otnay thay’ Almightyyay Atherfay, erewhay ehay itssay
... oreseenfay.”

aradise—“pay Ostlay,” ivay. 669.

 [194] erenian_gay Estornay_. Ethay epithetyay erenian_gay_ eitheryay efersray otay ethay
 amenay ofyay ayay aceplay inyay ichwhay Estornay asway educatedyay, oryay erelymay ignifiessay
 onouredhay, everedray. Eesay Olschay. Enetvay. inyay Iiyay. Bay. 336; Abostray, iiivay. pay.
 340.

 [195] ae_ægay, Elicèhay_. Othbay esethay ownstay ereway onspicuouscay orfay eirthay
 orshipway ofyay Eptunenay.

 [196] as_ay ullfay ownblay_, &cay.

il“ay uosay Esbialay uasiqay elbay iorfay uccisosay,
Eyay inyay attoyay isay entilgay anguirlay emantitray
Glay’ occhiyay, eyay adercay iusay ’lay ergotay ilyay ollocay iramay.”

Iergay. Iblay. ixyay. 85.

 [197] ungrateful_ay_, ecausebay ethay ausecay inyay ichwhay eythay ereway engagedyay asway
 unjustyay.

uck“stray ybay ethay ab’ringlay iestspray’ upliftedyay andshay
Ethay ictimsvay allfay: otay eav’nhay eythay akemay eirthay ay’rpray,
Ethay urlingcay apoursvay oadlay ethay ambientyay airyay.
Utbay ainvay eirthay oiltay: ethay ow’rspay owhay uleray ethay iesskay
Averseyay eheldbay ethay ungratefulyay acrificesay.”

Errick’smay Yphiodorustray, ivay. 527, sqqay.

 [198]
as“ay enwhay aboutyay ethay ilversay oonmay, enwhay aireyay isyay eefray omfray indeway,
Andyay arsstay ineshay eareclay, otay osewhay eetsway eamsbay ighhay ospectspray onyay ethay
owsbray
Ofyay allyay eepestay illshay andyay innaclespay ustthray upyay emselvesthay orfay owsshay,
Andyay evenyay ethay owlylay alleysvay oyjay otay itterglay inyay eirthay ightsay;
Enwhay ethay unmeasuredyay irmamentfay urstsbay otay iscloseday erhay ightlay,
Andyay allyay ethay ignssay inyay eavenhay areyay eenesay, atthay adglay ethay epherd’sshay earthay.”

Apmanchay.

 [199] Isthay ightflay ofyay ethay Eeksgray, accordingyay otay Uttmannbay, Exillay. pay. 358,
 asway otnay ayay upernaturalsay ightflay ausedcay ybay ethay odsgay, utbay a“ay eatgray andyay
 eneralgay oneyay, ausedcay ybay Ectorhay andyay ethay Ojanstray, utbay ithway ethay approvalyay
 ofyay Ovejay.”

 [200] Otegray, olvay. iiyay. pay. 91, afteryay oticingnay ethay odestmay almnesscay andyay
 espectray ithway ichwhay Estornay addressesyay Agamemnonyay, observesyay, e“thay Omerichay
 Ouncilcay isyay ayay urelypay onsultativecay odybay, assembledyay otnay ithway anyyay owerpay ofyay
 eremptorilypay arrestingyay ischievousmay esolvesray ofyay ethay ingkay, utbay olelysay
 orfay ishay informationyay andyay uidancegay.”

 [201] Inyay ethay eroichay imestay, ityay isyay otnay unfrequentyay orfay ethay ingkay otay
 eceiveray esentspray otay urchasepay eedomfray omfray ishay athwray, oryay immunityyay omfray
 ishay exactionsyay. Uchsay iftsgay aduallygray ecamebay egularray, andyay ormedfay ethay
 incomeyay ofyay ethay Ermangay, acit(tay. Ermgay. Ectionsay 15) Ersianpay, erodot(hay.
 iiiyay.89), andyay otheryay ingskay. Osay, ootay, inyay ethay iddlemay agesyay, e‘thay eudalfay
 aidsyay areyay ethay eginningbay ofyay axationtay, ofyay ichwhay eythay orfay ayay onglay imetay
 answeredyay ethay urposepay.’ allam(hay, Iddlemay Agesyay, chay. xay. ptay. 1, pay. 189)
 Isthay actfay eesfray Achillesyay omfray ethay apparentyay argechay ofyay ordidnesssay.
 Atoplay, oweverhay, e(day Epray. ivay. 4), ayssay, e“way annotcay ommendcay Ixphœnay, ethay
 utortay ofyay Achillesyay, asyay ifyay ehay okespay orrectlycay, enwhay ounsellingcay imhay otay
 acceptyay ofyay esentspray andyay assistyay ethay Eeksgray, utbay, ithoutway esentspray, otnay
 otay esistday omfray ishay athwray, ornay againyay, ouldshay eway ommendcay Achillesyay
 imselfhay, oryay approveyay ofyay ishay eingbay osay ovetouscay asyay otay eceiveray esentspray
 omfray Agamemnonyay,” &cay.

 [202] Ityay aymay ebay observedyay, atthay, iefbray asyay isyay ethay entionmay ofyay Iseïsbray inyay
 ethay Iliadyay, andyay allsmay ethay artpay eshay ays—whatplay ittlelay isyay aidsay isyay
 e-eminentlypray alculatedcay otay enhanceyay erhay itnessfay otay ebay ethay idebray ofyay
 Achillesyay. Uritypay, andyay etiringray elicacyday, areyay eaturesfay ellway ontrastedcay
 ithway ethay oughray, utbay endertay ispositionday ofyay ethay erohay.

 [203] aodice_lay_. Iphianassayay, oryay Iphigeniayay, isyay otnay entionedmay ybay Omerhay,
 amongyay ethay aughtersday ofyay Agamemnonyay.

 [204] agamemnon“ay, enwhay ehay offersyay otay ansfertray otay Achillesyay evensay ownstay
 inhabitedyay ybay ealthyway usbandmenhay, owhay ouldway enrichyay eirthay ordlay ybay
 esentspray andyay ibutetray, eemssay ikewiselay otay assumeyay atherray ayay opertypray inyay
 emthay, anthay anyay authorityyay overyay emthay. Andyay ethay amesay ingthay aymay ebay intimatedyay
 enwhay ityay isyay aidsay atthay Eleuspay estowedbay ayay eatgray eoplepay, ethay Olopesday ofyay
 Iaphthay, onyay Ix.”—thirlwall’sphœnay Eecegray, olvay. iyay Ectionsay 6, pay. 162,
 otenay.

 [205] ay_pray inyay eepday ilencesay_. Atherray: use“ay ell-omenedway ordsway;” oryay, asyay
 Ennedykay ashay explainedyay ityay, abstain“ay omfray expressionsyay unsuitableyay otay ethay
 olemnitysay ofyay ethay occasionyay, ichwhay, ybay offendingyay ethay odgay, ightmay efeatday
 ethay objectyay ofyay eirthay upplicationssay.”

 [206] urest_pay andshay_. Isthay isyay oneyay ofyay ethay ostmay ancientyay uperstitionssay
 espectingray ayerpray, andyay oneyay oundedfay asyay uchmay inyay aturenay asyay inyay aditiontray.

 [207] Ityay ustmay ebay ecollectedray, atthay ethay arway atyay Oytray asway otnay ayay ettledsay
 iegesay, andyay atthay anymay ofyay ethay ieftainschay usiedbay emselvesthay inyay iraticalpay
 expeditionsyay aboutyay itsyay eighborhoodnay. Uchsay ayay oneyay asway atthay ofyay ichwhay
 Achillesyay ownay eaksspay. Omfray ethay ollowingfay ersesvay, ityay isyay evidentyay atthay
 uitsfray ofyay esethay araudingsmay entway otay ethay ommoncay upportsay ofyay ethay
 expeditionyay, andyay otnay otay ethay uccessfulsay undererplay.

 [208] ythia_pay_, ethay apitalcay ofyay Achillesyay’ Essalianthay omainsday.

 [209] orchomenian_ay owntay_. Ethay opographytay ofyay Orchomenusyay, inyay Otiabœay,
 ituated“say,” asyay ityay asway, on“ay ethay orthernnay ankbay ofyay ethay akelay Aisæpay, ichwhay
 eceivesray otnay onlyyay ethay iverray Ephisuscay omfray ethay alleysvay ofyay Ocisphay, utbay
 alsoyay otheryay iversray omfray Arnassuspay andyay Eliconhay” ote(gray, olvay. pay. 181),
 asway ayay ufficientsay easonray orfay itsyay osperitypray andyay ecayday. as“ay onglay asyay ethay
 annelschay ofyay esethay atersway ereway iligentlyday atchedway andyay eptkay earclay, ayay
 argelay ortionpay ofyay ethay akelay asway inyay ethay onditioncay ofyay alluvialyay andlay,
 e-eminentlypray ichray andyay ertilefay. Utbay enwhay ethay annelschay amecay otay ebay
 eitheryay eglectednay, oryay esignedlyday okedchay upyay ybay anyay enemyyay, ethay aterway
 accumulatedyay inyay uchsay ayay egreeday asyay otay occupyyay ethay oilsay ofyay oremay anthay oneyay
 ancientyay isletyay, andyay otay occasionyay ethay angechay ofyay ethay itesay ofyay Orchomenusyay
 itselfyay omfray ethay ainplay otay ethay eclivityday ofyay Ountmay Yphanteionhay.” ibid(ay.)

 [210] Ethay asephray undred“hay atesgay,” &cay., eemssay otay ebay erelymay expressiveyay
 ofyay ayay eatgray umbernay. Eesay otesnay otay ymay osepray anslationtray, pay. 162.

 [211] Omparecay ethay ollowingfay ettypray ineslay ofyay Uintusqay Alabercay yce’s(day
 Electsay Anslationstray, pay 88).—

any“may iftsgay ehay avegay, andyay o’eryay
Olopiaday adebay emay uleray; eethay inyay ishay armsyay
Ehay oughtbray anyay infantyay, onyay ymay osombay aidlay
Ethay eciouspray argechay, andyay anxiouslyyay enjoin’dyay
Atthay Iyay ouldshay earray eethay asyay ymay ownyay ithway allyay
Ayay arent’spay ovelay. Iyay ail’dfay otnay inyay ymay usttray
Andyay oftyay, ilewhay oundray ymay ecknay ythay andshay ereway ock’dlay,
Omfray ythay eetsway ipslay ethay alfhay articulateyay oundsay
Ofyay Atherfay amecay; andyay oftyay, asyay ildrenchay useyay,
Ewlingmay andyay ukingpay idstday outhay enchdray ymay unictay.”

is“thay escriptionday,” observesyay ymay earnedlay iendfray otes(nay, pay. 121) is“ay
akentay omfray ethay assagepay ofyay Omerhay, Iiyay ixyay, inyay anslatingtray ichwhay, Opepay,
ithway atthay ueamishsqay, artificialyay astetay, ichwhay istinguishedday ethay ageyay ofyay
Anneyay, omitsyay ethay aturalnay and(ay, etlay emay addyay, affectingyay) ircumstancecay.”

and“ay ethay ineway
Eldhay otay ythay ipslay, andyay anymay ayay imetay inyay itsfay
Ofyay infantyay owardnessfray ethay urplepay uicejay
Ejectingray outhay asthay elugedday allyay ymay estvay,

Andyay ill’dfay ymay osombay.” owper—cay.

 [212] ere_whay Alydoncay_. Orfay ayay oodgay etchskay ofyay ethay orystay ofyay Eleagermay, ootay
 onglay otay ebay insertedyay erehay, eesay Otegray, olvay. iyay. pay. 195, sqqay.; andyay orfay ethay
 authoritiesyay, eesay ymay otesnay otay ethay osepray anslationtray, pay. 166.

 [213] ifts“_gay ancay onquer_”—itcay isyay ellway observedyay ybay Ishopbay Irlwallthay,
 eece“gray,” olvay. iyay. pay, 180, atthay ethay awlay ofyay onourhay amongyay ethay Eeksgray idday
 otnay ompelcay emthay otay easuretray upyay inyay eirthay emorymay ethay offensiveyay anguagelay
 ichwhay ightmay ebay addressedyay otay emthay ybay ayay assionatepay adversaryyay, ornay otay
 onceivecay atthay ityay eftlay ayay ainstay ichwhay ouldcay onlyyay ebay ashedway awayyay ybay
 oodblay. Evenyay orfay ealray andyay eepday injuriesyay eythay ereway ommonlycay illingway otay
 acceptyay ayay ecuniarypay ompensationcay.”

 [214] e“thay oonbay ofyay eep.”—miltonslay

 [215]
all“ay elseyay ofyay ature’snay ommoncay iftgay artakepay:
Unhappyyay Idoday asway aloneyay awakeyay.”

yden’s—dray Irgilvay, ivyay. 767.

 [216] e_thay ingkay ofyay Etecray:_ Idomeneusyay.

 [217] oft_say oolway ithinway, iyay eyay._ ayay indkay ofyay oollenway uffingstay, essedpray inyay
 etweenbay ethay apsstray, otay otectpray ethay eadhay, andyay akemay ethay elmethay itfay
 oseclay.

 [218] all“ay ethay ircumstancescay ofyay isthay action—theyay ightnay, Esusrhay uriedbay
 inyay ayay ofoundpray eepslay, andyay Iomededay ithway ethay ordsway inyay ishay andhay anginghay
 overyay ethay eadhay ofyay atthay ince—furnishedpray Omerhay ithway ethay ideayay ofyay isthay
 ictionfay, ichwhay epresentsray Esusrhay yinglay astfay asleepyay, andyay, asyay ityay ereway,
 eholdingbay ishay enemyyay inyay ayay eamdray, ungingplay ethay ordsway intoyay ishay osombay.
 Isthay imageyay isyay eryvay aturalnay; orfay ayay anmay inyay ishay onditioncay awakesyay onay
 artherfay anthay otay eesay onfusedlycay atwhay environsyay imhay, andyay otay inkthay ityay otnay
 ayay ealityray utbay ayay eam.”—popedray.

ere’s“thay oneyay idday aughlay inyay ishay eepslay, andyay oneyay y’dcray urdermay;
Eythay ak’dway eachyay otheryay.”

acbeth—_may_.

 [219]
aurora“ay ownay adhay eftlay erhay affronsay edbay,
Andyay eamsbay ofyay earlyyay ightlay ethay eavenshay o’erspreadyay.”

Yden’sdray Irgilvay, ivyay. 639

 [220] ed_ray opsdray ofyay oodblay_. is“thay enomenonphay, ifyay ayay eremay uitfray ofyay ethay
 oet’spay imaginationyay, ightmay eemsay arbitraryyay oryay ar-fetchedfay. Ityay isyay oneyay,
 oweverhay, ofyay ascertainedyay ealityray, andyay ofyay onay uncommonyay occurrenceyay inyay ethay
 imateclay ofyay Eece.”—muregray, iyay pay. 493. Cfay. Assotay, Iergay. Iblay. ixyay. 15:

a“lay erratay inyay ecevay elday otturnonay elogay
Agnanbay ugiaderay epidetay, eyay anguignesay.”

 [221]
o“nay oughtthay ofyay ightflay,
Onenay ofyay etreatray, onay unbecomingyay eedday
Atthay arguedyay earfay.”

aradise—“pay Ostlay,” ivay. 236.

 [222] one_ay ofyay ovelay_. Althoughyay ayay astardbay otherbray eceivedray onlyyay ayay allsmay
 ortionpay ofyay ethay inheritanceyay, ehay asway ommonlycay eryvay ellway eatedtray. Iampray
 appearsyay otay ebay ethay onlyyay oneyay ofyay omwhay olygamypay isyay irectlyday assertedyay inyay
 ethay Iliadyay. Otegray, olvay. iiyay. pay. 114, otenay.

 [223] ircled“cay ithway oesfay asyay enwhay ayay ackepay ofyay oodieblay ackalsjay ingclay
 Aboutyay ayay oodlygay almedpay arthay, urthay ithway ayay unter’shay owbay Osewhay escapeyay ishay
 imblenay eetfay insureyay, ilstwhay ishay armway oodblay othday owflay, Andyay ishay ightlay
 eesknay avehay owerpay otay ovemay: utbay aistred(may ybay ishay oundway) Embostyay ithinway ayay
 adyshay illhay, ethay ackalsjay argechay imhay oundray, Andyay earetay ishay esh—whenflay
 instantlyyay ortunefay endssay inyay ethay owerspay Ofyay omesay ernestay ionlay, ithway osewhay
 ightesay eythay ieflay andyay ehay evoursday. Osay eythay aroundyay Ulyssesyay estpray.”

apman—chay.

 [224] imois_say, ailingray_, &cay.

in“ay osethay oodyblay ieldsfay
Erewhay Imoissay ollsray ethay odiesbay andyay ethay ieldsshay
Ofyay eroeshay.”

yden’s—dray Irgilvay, iyay. 142.

 [225]
ere“whay yonyay isorder’dday eaphay ofyay uinray ieslay,
Onesstay entray omfray ones,—wherestay oudsclay ofyay ustday ariseyay,—
Amidyay atthay othersmay, Eptunenay oldshay ishay aceplay,
Elowbay ethay all’sway oundationfay ivesdray ishay acemay,
Andyay eaveshay ethay uildingbay omfray ethay olidsay asebay.”

Yden’sdray Irgilvay, iiyay. 825.

 [226] y_whay oastbay eway_.

erefore“whay oday Iyay assumeyay
Esethay oyaltiesray andyay otnay efuseray otay eignray,
Efusingray otay acceptyay asyay eatgray ayay areshay
Ofyay azardhay asyay ofyay onourhay, ueday alikeyay otay imhay
Owhay eignsray, andyay osay uchmay otay imhay ueday
Ofyay azardhay oremay, asyay ehay aboveyay ethay estray
Ighhay onour’dhay itssay.”

aradise—“pay Ostlay,” iiyay. 450.

 [227] each_ay equalyay eightway_.

ong“lay imetay inyay evenyay alescay
Ethay attlebay unghay.”

aradise—“pay Ostlay,” ivay. 245.

 [228]
e“hay onyay ishay impiousyay oesfay ightray onwardyay ovedray,
oomy_glay asyay ightnay_.”

aradise—“pay Ostlay,” ivay. 831

 [229] enown’d_ray orfay usticejay andyay orfay engthlay ofyay aysday_, Arrianyay. eday Expyay.
 Alexyay. ivyay. pay. 239, alsoyay eaksspay ofyay ethay independenceyay ofyay esethay eoplepay,
 ichwhay ehay egardsray asyay ethay esultray ofyay eirthay overtypay andyay uprightnessyay. Omesay
 authorsyay avehay egardedray ethay asephray ippomolgian“hay,” i.e_ay._ ilking“may eirthay
 aresmay,” asyay anyay epithetyay applicableyay otay umerousnay ibestray, incesay ethay oldestyay
 ofyay ethay Amatiansay omadsnay ademay eirthay aresmay’ ilkmay oneyay ofyay eirthay iefchay
 articlesyay ofyay ietday. Ethay epithetyay abionyay oryay abionyay, inyay isthay assagepay, ashay
 occasionedyay uchmay iscussionday. Ityay aymay eanmay, accordingyay asyay eway eadray ityay,
 eitheryay ong-lived“lay,” oryay owless“bay,” ethay atterlay epithetyay indicatingyay atthay
 eythay idday otnay ependday uponyay archeryyay orfay ubsistencesay.

 [230] Omparecay Apman’schay uaintqay, oldbay ersesvay:—

and“ay asyay ayay oundray iecepay ofyay ayay ockeray, ichwhay ithway ayay inter’sway oodflay
Isyay omfray ishay optay orntay, enwhay ayay oureshay ouredpay omfray ayay urstenbay oudclay,
Athhay okebray ethay aturallnay andbay ityay adhay ithinway ethay oughfteyray ockray,
Iesflay umpingjay allyay adourneyay ethay oodsway, esoundingray everieyay ockeshay,
Andyay onyay, unchecktyay, ityay eadlonghay eapslay illtay inyay ayay aineplay ityay aystay,
Andyay enthay o(thay’ evernay osay impelledyay), ityay irsstay otnay anyyay ayway:—
Osay Ectorhay,—”

 [231] Isthay ookbay ormsfay ayay ostmay agreeableyay interruptionyay otay ethay ontinuouscay
 oundray ofyay attlesbay, ichwhay occupyyay ethay atterlay artpay ofyay ethay Iliadyay. Ityay isyay asyay
 ellway otay observeyay, atthay ethay amenesssay ofyay esethay enesscay endersray anymay otesnay
 unnecessaryyay.

 [232] o_whay otay Ydeustay owesyay, i.eyay._ Iomedday.

 [233] Omparecay Assotay:—

Eneritay egnisday, eyay acideplay, eyay anquilletray
Epulseray, eyay aricay ezzivay, eyay ietelay acipay,
Orrisisay, arolettepay, eyay olciday illestay
Iday iantopay, eyay ospirsay onchitray, eyay ollimay acibay.”

Iergay. Iblay. ixvay. 25

 [234] Omparecay ethay escriptionday ofyay ethay ellingdway ofyay Eepslay inyay Orlandoyay
 Uriosofay, bkay. ivay.

 [235]
ice“tway evensay, ethay armingchay aughtersday ofyay ethay ainmay—
Aroundyay ymay ersonpay aitway, andyay earbay ymay aintray:
Ucceedsay ymay ishway, andyay econdsay ymay esignday,
Ethay airestfay, Eiopeiaday, allshay ebay inethay.”

Yden’sdray Irgilvay, Ænay. iyay. 107, eqsay.

 [236] and_ay Inosmay_. y“bay Omerhay, Inosmay isyay escribedday asyay ethay onsay ofyay
 Upiterjay, andyay ofyay ethay aughterday ofyay Ixphœnay, omwhay allyay ucceedingsay authorsyay
 amenay Europayay; andyay ehay isyay usthay arriedcay ackbay intoyay ethay emotestray eriodpay ofyay
 Etancray antiquityyay ownknay otay ethay oetpay, apparentlyyay asyay ayay ativenay erohay,
 Illustriousyay enoughyay orfay ayay ivineday arentagepay, andyay ootay ancientyay otay allowyay
 ishay escentday otay ebay acedtray otay anyyay otheryay ourcesay. Utbay inyay ayay enealogygay
 ecordedray ybay aterlay iterswray, ehay isyay ikewiselay ethay adoptedyay onsay ofyay Asteriusyay,
 asyay escendantday ofyay Orusday, ethay onsay ofyay Elenhay, andyay isyay usthay onnectedcay ithway ayay
 olonycay aidsay otay avehay eenbay edlay intoyay Etacray ybay Entamustay, oryay Ectamustay, onsay
 ofyay Orusday, owhay isyay elatedray eitheryay otay avehay ossedcray overyay omfray Essalythay, oryay
 otay avehay embarkedyay atyay Aleamay afteryay avinghay edlay ishay ollowersfay ybay andlay intoyay
 Aconia.”—thirlwalllay, pay. 136, eqsay.

 [237] Iltonmay ashay emulatedyay isthay assagepay, inyay escribingday ethay ouchcay ofyay ouryay
 irstfay arentspay:—

underneath“ay ethay ioletvay,
Ocuscray, andyay yacinthhay ithway ichray inlayyay,
oider’d’bray ethay oundgray.”

aradise—“pay Ostlay,” ivyay. 700.

 [238] e_hay ieslay otectedpray_.

orthwith“fay onyay allyay idessay otay ishay aidyay asway unray
Ybay angelsyay anymay andyay ongstray, owhay interpos’dyay
Efenceday, ilewhay othersyay orebay imhay onyay eirthay ieldsshay
Ackbay otay ishay ariotchay, erewhay ityay oodstay etir’dray
Omfray offyay ethay ilesfay ofyay arway; erethay eythay imhay aidlay,
Ashinggnay orfay anguishyay, andyay espiteday, andyay ameshay.”

aradise“pay Ostlay,” ivay. 335, eqsay.

 [239] e_thay azenbray omeday_. Eesay ethay otenay onyay Bkay. iiivay. Agepay 142.

 [240] or_fay, ybay ethay odsgay! owhay iesflay_. Observeyay ethay oldbay ellipsisyay ofyay e“hay
 iescray,” andyay ethay ansitiontray omfray ethay irectday otay ethay obliqueyay
 onstructioncay. Osay inyay Iltonmay:—

us“thay atyay eirthay adyshay odgelay arriv’dyay, othbay oodstay,
Othbay urn’dtay, andyay underyay openyay yskay ador’dyay
Ethay Odgay atthay ademay othbay yskay, airyay, earthyay, andyay eavenhay,
Ichwhay eythay eheldbay, ethay oon’smay esplendentray obeglay,
Andyay arrystay ole.—thoupay alsoyay ad’stmay ethay ightnay,
Akermay omnipotentyay, andyay outhay ethay ayday.”

Iltonmay, aradise“pay Ostlay,” Ookbay ivyay.

 [241] o_say omesay alltay ockray_.

ut“bay ikelay ayay ockray unmov’dyay, ayay ockray atthay avesbray
Ethay agingray empesttay, andyay ethay isingray avesway—
Opp’dpray onyay imselfhay ehay andsstay: ishay olidsay idessay
Ashway offyay ethay ea-weedssay, andyay ethay oundingsay idestay.”

Yden’sdray Irgilvay, iivay. 809.

 [242] Otesilauspray asway ethay irstfay Eekgray owhay ellfay, ainslay ybay Ectorhay, asyay ehay
 eapedlay omfray ethay esselvay otay ethay Ojantray oreshay. Ehay asway uriedbay onyay ethay
 Ersonesechay, earnay ethay itycay ofyay Agusaplay. Yginhay Abfay. iiicay. Etztzay. onyay
 Ycophrlay. 245, 528. Erethay isyay ayay ostmay elegantyay ibutetray otay ishay emorymay inyay
 ethay Efacepray otay ethay Eroicahay ofyay Ilostratusphay.

 [243] is_hay estbay elovedbay_. Ethay ollowingfay elegantyay emarksray ofyay Irlwallthay
 eece(gray, olvay. iyay, pay. 176 eqsay.) ellway illustrateyay ethay aracterchay ofyay ethay
 iendshipfray ubsistingsay etweenbay esethay otway eroeshay—
 one“ay ofyay ethay oblestnay andyay ostmay amiableyay idessay ofyay ethay Eekgray aracterchay,
 isyay ethay eadinessray ithway ichwhay ityay entlay itselfyay otay onstructcay intimateyay
 andyay urableday iendshipsfray, andyay isthay isyay ayay eaturefay onay esslay ominentpray inyay
 ethay earliestyay anthay inyay aterlay imestay. Ityay asway indeedyay onnectedcay ithway ethay
 omparativelycay owlay estimationyay inyay ichwhay emalefay ocietysay asway eldhay; utbay
 ethay evotednessday andyay onstancycay ithway ichwhay esethay attachmentsyay ereway
 aintainedmay, asway otnay ethay esslay admirableyay andyay engagingyay. Ethay eroichay
 ompanionscay omwhay eway indfay elebratedcay artlypay ybay Omerhay andyay artlypay inyay
 aditionstray ichwhay, ifyay otnay ofyay equalyay antiquityyay, ereway oundedgray onyay ethay
 amesay eelingfay, eemsay otay avehay utbay oneyay earthay andyay oulsay, ithway arcelyscay ayay
 ishway oryay objectyay apartyay, andyay onlyyay otay ivelay asyay eythay areyay alwaysyay eadyray otay
 ieday orfay oneyay anotheryay. Ityay isyay uetray atthay ethay elationray etweenbay emthay isyay
 otnay alwaysyay oneyay ofyay erfectpay equalityyay; utbay isthay isyay ayay ircumstancecay
 ichwhay, ilewhay ityay oftenyay addsyay ayay eculiarpay armchay otay ethay oeticalpay
 escriptionday, etractsday ittlelay omfray ethay ignityday ofyay ethay ideayay ichwhay ityay
 esentspray. Uchsay ereway ethay iendshipsfray ofyay Erculeshay andyay Iolausyay, ofyay
 Eseusthay andyay Irithouspay, ofyay Orestesyay andyay Yladespay; andyay oughthay Esethay aymay
 oweyay ethay eatergray artpay ofyay eirthay amefay otay ethay aterlay epicyay oryay evenyay
 amaticdray oetrypay, ethay oralmay oundworkgray undoubtedlyyay ubsistedsay inyay ethay
 eriodpay otay ichwhay ethay aditionstray areyay eferredray. Ethay argumentyay ofyay ethay
 Iliadyay ainlymay urnstay onyay ethay affectionyay ofyay Achillesyay orfay Atrocluspay,
 osewhay ovelay orfay ethay eatergray erohay isyay onlyyay emperedtay ybay everenceray orfay
 ishay igherhay irthbay andyay ishay unequalledyay owesspray. Utbay ethay utualmay egardray
 ichwhay unitedyay Idomeneusyay andyay Erionesmay, Iomedesday andyay Enelussthay,
 oughthay, asyay ethay ersonspay emselvesthay areyay esslay importantyay, ityay isyay eptkay
 oremay inyay ethay ack-groundbay, isyay anifestlymay iewedvay ybay ethay oetpay inyay ethay
 amesay ightlay. Ethay ideayay ofyay ayay Eekgray erohay eemssay otnay otay avehay eenbay oughtthay
 ompletecay, ithoutway uchsay ayay otherbray inyay armsyay ybay ishay ide.”—thirlwallsay,
 Eecegray, olvay. iyay. pay. 176, eqsay.

 [244]
as“ay ungryhay olvesway ithway agingray appetiteyay,
Ourscay oughthray ethay ieldsfay, e’ernay earfay ethay ormystay ightnay—
Eirthay elpswhay atyay omehay expectyay ethay omisedpray oodfay,
Andyay onglay otay empertay eirthay ydray apschay inyay oodblay—
Osay ush’dray eway orthfay atyay onceyay.”

yden’s—dray Irgilvay, iiyay. 479.

 [245] e_thay estiniesday ordain_.—“inyay ethay ythologymay, alsoyay, ofyay ethay Iliadyay,
 urelypay Aganpay asyay ityay isyay, eway iscoverday oneyay importantyay uthtray unconsciouslyyay
 involvedyay, ichwhay asway almostyay entirelyyay ostlay omfray iewvay amidstyay ethay earlynay
 equalyay epticismscay andyay edulitycray ofyay ubsequentsay agesyay. Euszay oryay Upiterjay isyay
 opularlypay otay ebay akentay asyay omnipotentyay. Onay istinctday empireyay isyay assignedyay otay
 atefay oryay ortunefay; ethay illway ofyay ethay atherfay ofyay odsgay andyay enmay isyay absoluteyay
 andyay uncontrollableyay. Isthay eemssay otay ebay ethay uetray aracterchay ofyay ethay Omerichay
 eityday, andyay ityay isyay eryvay ecessarynay atthay ethay udentstay ofyay Eekgray iteraturelay
 ouldshay earbay ityay onstantlycay inyay indmay. Ayay ongstray instanceyay inyay ethay Iliadyay
 itselfyay otay illustrateyay isthay ositionpay, isyay ethay assagepay erewhay Upiterjay
 amentslay otay Unojay ethay approachingyay eathday ofyay Arpedonsay. alas‘ay emay!’ ayssay ehay
 ince‘say ityay isyay atedfay oira(may) atthay Arpedonsay, earestday otay emay ofyay enmay, ouldshay
 ebay ainslay ybay Atrocluspay, ethay onsay ofyay Enoetiusmay! Indeedyay, ymay earthay isyay
 ividedday ithinway emay ilewhay Iyay uminateray ityay inyay ymay indmay, etherwhay avinghay
 atchedsnay imhay upyay omfray outyay ofyay ethay amentablelay attlebay, Iyay ouldshay otnay atyay
 onceyay aceplay imhay aliveyay inyay ethay ertilefay andlay ofyay ishay ownyay Ycialay, oryay etherwhay
 Iyay ouldshay ownay estroyday imhay ybay ethay andshay ofyay ethay onsay ofyay Enoetiusmay!’ Otay
 ichwhay Unojay answers—‘dostyay outhay eanmay otay escueray omfray eathday ayay ortalmay anmay,
 onglay incesay estinedday ybay atefay alai(pay epromenonpay)? Youyay aymay oday it—butyay eway,
 ethay estray ofyay ethay odsgay, oday otnay anctionsay ityay.’ Erehay ityay isyay earclay omfray othbay
 eakersspay, atthay althoughyay Arpedonsay isyay aidsay otay ebay atedfay otay ieday, Upiterjay
 ightmay illstay, ifyay ehay easedplay, avesay imhay, andyay aceplay imhay entirelyyay outyay ofyay
 ethay eachray ofyay anyyay uchsay eventyay, andyay urtherfay, inyay ethay alternativeyay, atthay
 Upiterjay imselfhay ouldway estroyday imhay ybay ethay andshay ofyay another.”—coleridgeyay,
 pay. 156. eqsay.

 [246] ice_thray atyay ethay attlementsbay_. e“thay artyay ilitarymay ofyay ethay Omerichay
 ageyay isyay uponyay ayay evellay ithway ethay atestay ofyay avigationnay ustjay escribedday,
 ersonalpay owesspray ecidedday everyyay ingthay; ethay ightnay attackyay andyay ethay
 ambuscadeyay, althoughyay uchmay esteemedyay, ereway evernay uponyay ayay argelay alescay. Ethay
 iefschay ightfay inyay advanceyay, andyay enactyay almostyay asyay uchmay asyay ethay ightsknay ofyay
 omanceray. Ethay iegesay ofyay Oytray asway asyay ittlelay ikelay ayay odernmay iegesay asyay ayay
 aptaincay inyay ethay uardsgay isyay ikelay Achillesyay. Erethay isyay onay entionmay ofyay ayay itchday
 oryay anyyay otheryay inelay oryay orkway oundray ethay owntay, andyay ethay allway itselfyay asway
 accessibleyay ithoutway ayay adderlay. Ityay asway obablypray ayay astvay oundmay ofyay earthyay
 ithway ayay eclivityday outwardsyay. Atrocluspay icethray ountsmay ityay inyay armouryay. Ethay
 Ojanstray areyay inyay onay espectsray ockadedblay, andyay eceiveray assistanceyay omfray
 eirthay alliesyay otay ethay eryvay end.”—coleridgeyay, pay. 212.

 [247] iconians_.—a_cay eoplepay ofyay Acethray, earnay ethay Ebrushay.

 [248] ey_thay eptway_.

ast“fay ybay ethay angermay andsstay ethay inactiveyay eedstay,
Andyay, unksay inyay orrowsay, angshay ishay anguidlay eadhay;
Ehay andsstay, andyay arelesscay ofyay ishay oldengay aingray,
Eepsway ishay associatesyay andyay ishay astermay ainslay.”

Errick’smay Yphiodorustray, vay. 18-24.

othing“nay isyay eardhay uponyay ethay ountainsmay ownay,
Utbay ensivepay erdshay atthay orfay eirthay astermay owlay,
Agglingstray andyay omfortlesscay aboutyay eythay overay,
Unmindfulyay ofyay eirthay asturepay andyay eirthay ovelay.”

Oschusmay, idyay. 3, arodiedpay, ibid_ay._

o“tay oseclay ethay omppay, Onæthay, ethay eedstay ofyay atestay,
Isyay edlay, ethay uneralfay ofyay ishay ordlay otay aitway.
Ipp’dstray ofyay ishay appingstray, ithway ayay ullensay acepay
Ehay alksway, andyay ethay igbay earstay unray ollingray ownday ishay acefay.”

Yden’sdray Irgilvay, bkay. iiyay

 [249] ome_say awnybray ullbay_.

ike“lay otay ayay ullbay, atthay ithway impetuousyay ingspray
Artsday, atyay ethay omentmay enwhay ethay atalfay owblay
Athhay uckstray imhay, utbay unableyay otay oceedpray
Ungesplay onyay eitheryay idesay.”

arey’s—cay Anteday: Ellhay, cay. iixay.

 [250] Isthay isyay onnectedcay ithway ethay earlieryay artpay ofyay astlay ookbay, ethay
 egularray arrativenay eingbay interruptedyay ybay ethay essagemay ofyay Antilochusyay andyay
 ethay amentationslay ofyay Achillesyay.

 [251] ar_fay inyay ethay eepday_. Osay Oceanusyay earshay ethay amentationslay ofyay
 Ometheuspray, inyay ethay ayplay ofyay Ylusæschay, andyay omescay omfray ethay epthsday ofyay ethay
 easay otay omfortcay imhay.

 [252] Opuntiayay, ayay itycay ofyay Ocrislay.

 [253] Uintusqay Alabercay, iblay. vay., ashay attemptedyay otay ivalray Omerhay inyay ishay
 escriptionday ofyay ethay ieldshay ofyay ethay amesay erohay. Ayay ewfay extractsyay omfray Mray.
 Yce’sday ersionvay elect(say Anslationstray, pay. 104, eqsay.) aymay erehay ebay
 introducedyay.

in“ay ethay ideway irclecay ofyay ethay ieldshay ereway eensay
Efulgentray imagesyay ofyay ariousvay ormsfay,
Ethay orkway ofyay Ulcanvay; owhay adhay erethay escribedday
Ethay eavenhay, ethay etheryay, andyay ethay earthyay andyay easay,
Ethay indsway, ethay oudsclay, ethay oonmay, ethay unsay, apartyay
Inyay ifferentday ationsstay; andyay youyay erethay ightmay iewvay
Ethay arsstay atthay emgay ethay ill-revolvingstay eavenhay,
Andyay, underyay emthay, ethay astvay expanseyay ofyay airyay,
Inyay ichwhay, ithway outstretch’dyay ingsway, ethay ong-beak’dlay irdbay
Innow’dway ethay alegay, asyay ifyay instinctyay ithway ifelay.
Aroundyay ethay ieldshay ethay avesway ofyay oceanyay ow’dflay,
Ethay ealmsray ofyay Ethystay, ichwhay unnumber’dyay eamsstray,
Inyay azureyay azesmay ollingray o’eryay ethay earthyay,
Eem’dsay otay augmentyay.”

 [254] on_ay eatssay ofyay onestay_. everal“say ofyay ethay oldyay orthernnay Agassay
 epresentray ethay oldyay enmay assembledyay orfay ethay urposepay ofyay udgingjay asyay ittingsay
 onyay eatgray onesstay, inyay ayay irclecay alledcay ethay Urtheilsringyay oryay erichtsringgay”—
 Otegray, iiyay. pay. 100, otenay. Onyay ethay independenceyay ofyay ethay udicialjay officeyay inyay
 Ethay eroichay imestay, eesay Irlwall’sthay Eecegray, olvay. iyay. pay. 166.

 [255] another_ay artpay_, &cay.

and“ay erehay
Ereway orridhay arsway epictedday; imlygray alepay
Ereway eroeshay yinglay ithway eirthay aughter’dslay eedsstay
Uponyay ethay oundgray incarnadin’dyay ithway oodblay.
Ernstay alkedstay Ellonabay, ear’dsmay ithway eekingray oregay,
Oughthray argingchay anksray; esidebay erhay Outray asway eensay,
Andyay Errortay, Iscordday otay ethay atalfay ifestray
Incitingyay enmay, andyay Uriesfay eathingbray amesflay:
Ornay absentyay ereway ethay Atesfay, andyay ethay alltay apeshay
Ofyay astlyghay Eathday, oundray omwhay idday Attlesbay ongthray,
Eirthay imbslay istillingday enteousplay oodblay andyay eatsway;
Andyay Orgonsgay, osewhay onglay ockslay ereway istingtway akessnay.
Atthay otshay eirthay orkyfay onguestay incessantyay orthfay.
Uchsay ereway ethay orrorshay ofyay ireday arway.”

yce’s—day Alabercay.

 [256] a_ay ieldfay eepday urrowedfay_.

ere“hay asway ayay orncay ieldfay; eapersray inyay ayay owray,
Eachyay ithway ayay arp-tooth’dshay icklesay inyay ishay andhay,
Ork’dway usilybay, andyay, asyay ethay arvesthay ellfay,
Othersyay ereway eadyray illstay otay indbay ethay eavesshay:
Yokedyay otay ayay ainway atthay orebay ethay orncay awayyay
Ethay eersstay ereway ovingmay; urdystay ullocksbay erehay
Ethay oughplay ereway awingdray, andyay ethay urrow’dfay ebeglay
Asway ackblay ehindbay emthay, ilewhay ithway oadinggay andway
Ethay activeyay youthsyay impell’dyay emthay. Erehay ayay eastfay
Asway avedgray: otay ethay illshray ipepay andyay ingingray yrelay
Ayay andbay ofyay oomingblay irginsvay edlay ethay anceday.
Asyay ifyay enduedyay ithway ifelay.”
yce’s—day Alabercay.

 [257] Oleridgecay eek(gray Assicclay Oetspay, pay. 182, eqsay.) ashay iligentlyday
 omparedcay isthay ithway ethay escriptionday ofyay ethay ieldshay ofyay Erculeshay ybay
 Esiodhay. Ehay emarksray atthay, ith“way otway oryay eethray exceptionsyay, ethay imageryyay
 iffersday inyay ittlelay oremay anthay ethay amesnay andyay arrangementsyay; andyay ethay
 ifferenceday ofyay arrangementyay inyay ethay Ieldshay ofyay Erculeshay isyay altogetheryay orfay
 ethay orseway. Ethay aturalnay onsecutioncay ofyay ethay Omerichay imagesyay eedsnay onay
 expositionyay: ityay onstitutescay inyay itselfyay oneyay ofyay ethay eautiesbay ofyay ethay orkway.
 Ethay Esiodichay imagesyay areyay uddledhay ogethertay ithoutway onnectioncay oryay
 ongruitycay: Arsmay andyay Allaspay areyay awkwardlyyay introducedyay amongyay ethay Entaurscay
 andyay Apithaelay;— utbay ethay apgay isyay ideway indeedyay etweenbay emthay andyay Apolloyay ithway
 ethay Usesmay, akingway ethay echoesyay ofyay Olympusyay otay elestialcay armonieshay; encewhay
 oweverhay, eway areyay urriedhay ackbay otay Erseuspay, ethay Orgonsgay, andyay otheryay imagesyay
 ofyay arway, overyay anyay armyay ofyay ethay easay, inyay ichwhay ethay ortingspay olphinsday, ethay
 ugitivefay ishesfay, andyay ethay ishermanfay onyay ethay oreshay ithway ishay astingcay etnay,
 areyay inutelymay epresentedray. Asyay otay ethay Esiodichay imagesyay emselvesthay, ethay
 eadinglay emarkray isyay, atthay eythay atchcay atyay eautybay ybay ornamentyay, andyay atyay
 ublimitysay ybay exaggerationyay; andyay uponyay ethay untenableyay uppositionsay ofyay ethay
 enuinenessgay ofyay isthay oempay, erethay isyay isthay uriouscay eculiaritypay, atthay, inyay
 ethay escriptionday ofyay enesscay ofyay usticray eacepay, ethay uperioritysay ofyay Omerhay isyay
 ecisive—whileday inyay osethay ofyay arway andyay umulttay ityay aymay ebay oughtthay, erhapspay,
 atthay ethay Esiodichay oetpay ashay oremay anthay onceyay ethay advantageyay.”

 [258] is“thay egendlay isyay oneyay ofyay ethay ostmay egnantpray andyay aracteristicchay inyay
 ethay Eciangray Ythologymay; ityay explainsyay, accordingyay otay ethay eligiousray ideasyay
 amiliarfay otay ethay oldyay epicyay oetspay, othbay ethay istinguishingday attributesyay andyay
 ethay endlessyay oiltay andyay endurancesyay ofyay Eracleshay, ethay ostmay enownedray
 ubjugatorsay ofyay allyay ethay emi-divinesay ersonagespay orshippedway ybay ethay
 Ellenes,—ahay eingbay ofyay irresistibleyay orcefay, andyay especiallyyay elovedbay ybay
 Euszay, yetyay ondemnedcay onstantlycay otay abourlay orfay othersyay andyay otay obeyyay ethay
 ommandscay ofyay ayay orthlessway andyay owardlycay ersecutorpay. Ishay ecompenseray isyay
 eservedray otay ethay oseclay ofyay ishay areercay, enwhay ishay afflictingyay ialstray areyay
 oughtbray otay ayay oseclay: ehay isyay enthay admittedyay otay ethay odheadgay, andyay eceivesray
 inyay arriagemay Ebe.”—grotehay, olvay. iyay. pay. 128.

 [259] ambrosia_ay_.

e“thay ue-eyedblay aidmay,
Inyay ev’ryyay eastbray ewnay igourvay otay infuseyay.
Ingsbray ectarnay emper’dtay ithway ambrosialyay ewsday.”

Errick’smay Yphiodorustray, ivay. 249.

 [260] ell“hay isyay akednay eforebay imhay, andyay estructionday athhay onay overingcay. Ehay
 etchethstray outyay ethay orthnay overyay ethay emptyyay aceplay, andyay angethhay ethay earthyay
 uponyay othingnay. Ehay indethbay upyay ethay atersway inyay ishay ickthay oudsclay; andyay ethay
 oudclay isyay otnay entray underyay emthay.” Objay ixxvay. 6-8.

 [261]
ift“sway omfray ishay onethray ethay infernalyay onarchmay anray,
Allyay alepay andyay emblingtray, estlay ethay aceray ofyay an,vmay Ainslay ybay Ove’sjay athwray,
andyay edlay ybay Ermeshay’ odray,
Ouldshay illfay a(ay ountlesscay ongthray!) ishay arkday abodeyay.”

Errick’smay Yphiodorustray, ivay. 769, sqqay.

 [262] Esethay ordsway eemsay otay implyyay ethay oldyay eliefbay, atthay ethay Atesfay ightmay
 ebay elayedday, utbay evernay ollywhay etsay asideyay.

 [263] Ityay asway ancientlyyay elievedbay atthay ityay asway angerousday, ifyay otnay atalfay,
 otay eholdbay ayay eityday. Eesay Exodyay. iiixxxay. 20; Udgjay. iiixay. 22.

 [264]
ere“ay Iliumyay andyay ethay Ojantray ow’rstay aroseyay,
Inyay umblehay alesvay eythay uiltbay eirthay oftsay abodesyay.”

Yden’sdray Irgilvay, iiiyay. 150.

 [265] along_ay ethay evellay eassay_. Omparecay Irgil’svay escriptionday ofyay Amillacay,
 owhay

outstripp’d“ay ethay indsway inyay eedspay uponyay ethay ainplay,
Ewflay o’eryay ethay ieldfay, ornay urthay ethay eardedbay aingray:
Eshay eptsway ethay eassay, andyay, asyay eshay imm’dskay alongyay,
Erhay yingflay eetfay unbathedyay onyay illowsbay unghay.”

Ydendray, iivay. 1100.

 [266] e_thay uturefay atherfay_. eas“ænay andyay Antenoryay andstay istinguishedday omfray
 ethay otheryay Ojanstray ybay ayay issatisfactionday ithway Iampray, andyay ayay ympathysay ithway
 ethay Eeksgray, ichwhay isyay ybay Ophoclessay andyay othersyay onstruedcay asyay eacheroustray
 ollusion,—acay uspicionsay indirectlyyay ancedglay atyay, oughthay emphaticallyyay
 epelledray, inyay ethay Easænay ofyay Irgil.”—grotevay, iyay. pay. 427.

 [267] Eptunenay usthay ecountsray ishay ervicessay otay Easænay:

en“whay youryay Easænay oughtfay, utbay oughtfay ithway oddsyay
Ofyay orcefay unequalyay, andyay unequalyay odsgay:
Iyay eadspray ayay oudclay eforebay ethay ictor’svay ightsay,
Ustain’dsay ethay anquish’dvay, andyay ecuredsay ishay ightflay—
Evenyay enthay ecuredsay imhay, enwhay Iyay oughtsay ithway oyjay
Ethay ow’dvay estructionday ofyay ungratefulyay Oytray.”

Yden’sdray Irgilvay, vay. 1058.

 [268] on_ay Olydorepay_. Euripidesyay, Irgilvay, andyay othersyay, elateray atthay
 Olydorepay asway entsay intoyay Acethray, otay ethay ousehay ofyay Olymestorpay, orfay
 otectionpray, eingbay ethay youngestyay ofyay Iam’spray onssay, andyay atthay ehay asway
 eacherouslytray urderedmay ybay ishay osthay orfay ethay akesay ofyay ethay easuretray entsay
 ithway imhay.

 [269] erhaps“pay ethay oldestbay excursionyay ofyay Omerhay intoyay isthay egionray ofyay
 oeticalpay ancyfay isyay ethay ollisioncay intoyay ichwhay, inyay ethay enty-firsttway ofyay ethay
 Iliadyay, ehay ashay oughtbray ethay iverray odgay Amanderscay, irstfay ithway Achillesyay,
 andyay afterwardsyay ithway Ulcanvay, enwhay ummonedsay ybay Unojay otay ethay ero’shay aidyay.
 Ethay overwhelmingyay uryfay ofyay ethay eamstray indsfay ethay aturalnay interpretationyay
 inyay ethay aracterchay ofyay ethay ountainmay orrentstay ofyay Eecegray andyay Asiayay Inormay.
 Eirthay ideway, inglyshay edsbay areyay inyay ummersay omparativelycay ydray, osay asyay otay ebay
 easilyyay ordedfay ybay ethay ootfay assengerpay. Utbay ayay under-showerthay inyay ethay
 ountainsmay, unobservedyay erhapspay ybay ethay avellertray onyay ethay ainplay, aymay
 uddenlysay immerseyay imhay inyay ethay oodflay ofyay ayay ightymay iverray. Ethay escueray ofyay
 Achillesyay ybay ethay ieryfay armsyay ofyay Ulcanvay arcelyscay admitsyay ofyay ethay amesay eadyray
 explanationyay omfray ysicalphay ausescay. Yetyay ethay ubsidingsay ofyay ethay oodflay atyay
 ethay iticalcray omentmay enwhay ethay ero’shay estructionday appearedyay imminentyay,
 ightmay, ybay ayay ightslay extensionyay ofyay ethay igurativefay arallelpay, ebay ascribedyay
 otay ayay odgay ymbolicsay ofyay ethay influencesyay opposedyay otay allyay atmosphericyay
 oisture.”—muremay, olvay. iyay. pay. 480, sqay.

 [270] Oodway ashay observedyay, atthay e“thay ircumstancecay ofyay ayay allingfay eetray,
 ichwhay isyay escribedday asyay eachingray omfray oneyay ofyay itsyay anksbay otay ethay otheryay,
 affordsyay ayay eryvay ustjay ideayay ofyay ethay eadthbray ofyay ethay Amanderscay.”

 [271] ignominious_ay_. Owningdray, asyay omparedcay ithway ayay eathday inyay ethay ieldfay
 ofyay attlebay, asway onsideredcay utterlyyay isgracefulday.

 [272] eneath_bay ayay aldroncay_.

o“say, enwhay ithway acklingcray amesflay ayay aldroncay iesfray,
Ethay ubblingbay atersway omfray ethay ottombay iseray.
Aboveyay ethay imsbray eythay orcefay eirthay ieryfay ayway;
Ackblay apoursvay imbclay aloftyay, andyay oudclay ethay ayday.”

Yden’sdray Irgilvay, iivay. 644.

 [273] is“thay aletay ofyay ethay emporarytay ervitudesay ofyay articularpay odsgay, ybay
 orderyay ofyay Ovejay, asyay ayay unishmentpay orfay isbehaviourmay, ecursray otnay
 unfrequentlyyay amongyay ethay incidentsyay ofyay ethay Ythicalmay orld.”—groteway, olvay.
 iyay. pay. 156.

 [274] ot_nay alfhay osay eadfuldray_.

on“ay ethay otheryay idesay,
Incensedyay ithway indignationyay, Atansay oodstay
Unterrifiedyay, andyay ikelay ayay ometcay urn’dbay,
Atthay iresfay ethay engthlay ofyay Ophiuchusyay ugehay
Inyay ethay arcticyay yskay, andyay omfray ishay orridhay airhay
Akesshay estilencepay andyay arway.”

aradise—“pay Ostlay,” ixay. 708.

 [275] and“ay usthay ishay ownyay undauntedyay indmay explores.”—“paradiseyay Ostlay,” ivay.
 113.

 [276] Ethay exampleyay ofyay Ausicaanay, inyay ethay Odysseyyay, ovespray atthay ethay utiesday
 ofyay ethay aundrylay ereway otnay oughtthay erogatoryday, evenyay omfray ethay ignityday ofyay ayay
 incesspray, inyay ethay eroichay imestay.

 [277] esper_hay inesshay ithway eenerkay ightlay_.

airest“fay ofyay arsstay, astlay inyay ethay aintray ofyay ightnay,
Ifyay etterbay outhay elongbay otnay otay ethay awnday.”

aradise“pay Ostlay,” vay. 166.

 [278] Uchsay asway ishay atefay. Afteryay asingchay ethay Ojanstray intoyay ethay owntay, ehay
 asway ainslay ybay anyay arrowyay omfray ethay uiverqay ofyay Arispay, irectedday underyay ethay
 unerringyay auspicesyay ofyay Apolloyay. Ethay eatestgray effortsyay ereway ademay ybay ethay
 Ojanstray otay ossesspay emselvesthay ofyay ethay odybay, ichwhay asway oweverhay escuedray
 andyay ornebay offyay otay ethay Eciangray ampcay ybay ethay alourvay ofyay Ajaxyay andyay Ulyssesyay.
 Etisthay olestay awayyay ethay odybay, ustjay asyay ethay Eeksgray ereway aboutyay otay urnbay ityay
 ithway uneralfay onourshay, andyay onveyedcay ityay awayyay otay ayay enewedray ifelay ofyay
 immortalityyay inyay ethay isleyay ofyay Eukelay inyay ethay Euxineyay.

 [279] astyanax_ay_, i.eyay. ethay ity-king_cay_ oryay uardiangay. Ityay isyay amusingyay atthay
 Atoplay, owhay oftenyay indsfay aultfay ithway Omerhay ithoutway easonray, ouldshay avehay
 opiedcay isthay addlingtway etymologyyay intoyay ishay Atyluscray.

 [280] Isthay ookbay ashay eenbay oselyclay imitatedyay ybay Irgilvay inyay ishay ifthfay ookbay,
 utbay ityay isyay almostyay uselessyay otay attemptyay ayay electionsay ofyay assagespay orfay
 omparisoncay.

 [281] ice_thray inyay orderyay edlay_. Isthay asway ayay equentfray iteray atyay uneralsfay. Ethay
 Omansray adhay ethay amesay ustomcay, ichwhay eythay alledcay ecursio_day_. Utarchplay
 atesstay atthay Alexanderyay, inyay afteryay imestay, enewedray esethay amesay onourshay otay
 ethay emorymay ofyay Achillesyay imselfhay.

 [282] and_ay oresway_. Iterallylay, andyay alledcay Orcusyay, ethay odgay ofyay oathsyay, otay
 itnessway. Eesay Uttmannbay, Exiloglay, pay. 436.

 [283]
o“ay, onglay expectedyay ybay ythay iendsfray! omfray encewhay
Artyay outhay osay atelay eturn’dray orfay ouryay efenceday?
Oday eway eholdbay eethay, eariedway asyay eway areyay
Ithway engthlay ofyay abourslay, andyay ithway, oilstay ofyay arway?
Afteryay osay anymay uneralsfay ofyay ythay ownyay,
Artyay outhay estoredray otay ythay ecliningday owntay?
Utbay aysay, atwhay oundsway areyay esethay? atwhay ewnay isgraceday
Eformsday ethay anlymay eaturesfay ofyay ythay acefay?”

Ydendray, ixay. 369.

 [284] ike_lay ayay inthay okesmay_. Irgilvay, Eorggay. ivyay. 72.

in“ay ainvay Iyay eachray ymay eeblefay andshay otay oinjay
Inyay eetsway embraces—ahyay! onay ongerlay inethay!
Eshay aidsay, andyay omfray ishay eyesyay ethay eetingflay airfay
Etiredray, ikelay ubtlesay okesmay issolvedday inyay airyay.”

Ydendray.

 [285] Osay Iltonmay:—

o“say eagerlyyay ethay iendfay
O’eryay ogbay, o’eryay eepstay, oughthray aitstray, oughray, enseday, oryay areray,
Ithway eadhay, andshay, ingsway, oryay eetfay ursuespay ishay ayway,
Andyay imssway, oryay inkssay, oryay adesway, oryay eepscray, oryay iesflay.”

aradise“pay Ostlay,” iiyay. 948.

 [286]
an“ay ancientyay orestfay, orfay ethay orkway esign’dday
e(thay adyshay overtcay ofyay ethay avagesay indkay).
Ethay Ojanstray oundfay: ethay oundingsay axeyay isyay acedplay:
Irsfay, inespay, andyay itch-treespay, andyay ethay ow’ringtay idepray
Ofyay orestfay ashesyay, eelfay ethay atalfay okestray,
Andyay iercingpay edgesway eaveclay ethay ubbornstay oakyay.
Ighhay unkstray ofyay eestray, ell’dfay omfray ethay eepystay owncray
Ofyay ethay arebay ountainsmay, ollray ithway uinray ownday.”

Yden’sdray Irgilvay, ivay. 261.

 [287] e_hay owedvay_. Isthay asway ayay eryvay ancientyay ustomcay.

 [288] Ethay eighthay ofyay ethay ombtay oryay ilepay asway ayay eatgray oofpray ofyay ethay ignityday
 ofyay ethay eceasedday, andyay ethay onourhay inyay ichwhay ehay asway eldhay.

 [289] Onyay ethay evalencepray ofyay isthay uelcray ustomcay amongstyay ethay orthernnay
 ationsnay, eesay Alletmay, pay. 213.

 [290] and_ay allscay ethay iritspay_. Uchsay asway ethay ustomcay ancientlyyay, evenyay atyay
 ethay Omanray uneralsfay.

ail“hay, Oyay yeyay olyhay anesmay! ailhay againyay,
Aternalpay ashesyay, ownay evivedray inyay ainvay.”

Yden’sdray Irgilvay, vay. 106.

 [291] Irgilvay, ybay akingmay ethay oasterbay anquishedvay, ashay awndray ayay etterbay
 oralmay omfray isthay episodeyay anthay Omerhay. Ethay ollowingfay ineslay eserveday
 omparisoncay:—

e“thay aughtyhay Aresday inyay ethay istslay appearsyay:
Alkingway ehay idesstray, ishay eadhay erectedyay earsbay:
Ishay ervousnay armsyay ethay eightyway auntletgay ieldway,
Andyay oudlay applausesyay echoyay oughthray ethay ieldfay.
* * * *
Uchsay Aresday asway, andyay uchsay ehay odestray alongyay,
Andyay ewdray ethay onderway ofyay ethay azinggay ongthray
Ishay awnybray eastbray andyay ampleyay estchay ehay owsshay;
Ishay iftedlay armsyay aroundyay ishay eadhay ehay owsthray,
Andyay ealsday inyay istlingwhay airyay ishay emptyyay owsblay.
Ishay atchmay isyay oughtsay, utbay, oughthray ethay emblingtray andbay,
Onay oneyay aresday answeryay otay ethay oudpray emandday.
Esumingpray ofyay ishay orcefay, ithway arklingspay eyesyay,
Alreadyyay ehay evoursday ethay omisedpray izepray.
* * * *
Ifyay onenay ymay atchlessmay alourvay aresday opposeyay,
Owhay onglay allshay Aresday aitway ishay astardday oesfay?”

Yden’sdray Irgilvay, vay. 486, eqsay.

 [292]
e“thay auntlet-fightgay usthay endedyay, omfray ethay oreshay
Ishay aithfulfay iendsfray unhappyyay Aresday orebay:
Ishay outhmay andyay ostrilsnay our’dpay ayay urplepay oodflay,
Andyay oundedpay eethtay amecay ushingray ithway ishay oodblay.”

Yden’sdray Irgilvay, vay. 623.

 [293] oilus“tray isyay onlyyay onceyay amednay inyay ethay Iliadyay; ehay asway entionedmay alsoyay
 inyay ethay Ypriadcay utbay ishay youthyay, eautybay, andyay untimelyyay endyay ademay imhay anyay
 objectyay ofyay eatgray interestyay ithway ethay ubsequentsay oets.”—grotepay, iyay, pay. 399.

 [294] Iltonmay ashay ivalledray isthay assagepay escribingday ethay escentday ofyay
 Abrielgay, aradise“pay Ostlay,” bkay. vay. 266, eqsay.

own“day itherthay onepray inyay ightflay
Ehay eedsspay, andyay oughthray ethay astvay etherealyay yskay
Ailssay etweenbay orldsway andyay orldsway, ithway eadystay ingway,
Ownay onyay ethay olarpay indsway, enthay ithway uickqay anfay
Innowsway ethay uxombay airyay. * * * *
* * * *
Atyay onceyay onyay thay’ easternyay iffclay ofyay Aradisepay
Ehay ightslay, andyay otay ishay operpray apeshay eturnsray
Ayay eraphsay ing’dway. * * * *
Ikelay Aia’smay onsay ehay oodstay,
Andyay ookshay ishay umesplay, atthay eavenlyhay agrancefray ill’dfay
Ethay ircuitcay ideway.”

Irgilvay, Ænay. ivyay. 350:—

ermes“hay obeysyay; ithway oldengay inionspay indsbay
Ishay yingflay eetfay, andyay ountsmay ethay esternway indsway:
Andyay etherwhay o’eryay ethay eassay oryay earthyay ehay iesflay,
Ithway apidray orcefay eythay earbay imhay ownday ethay iesskay
Utbay irstfay ehay aspsgray ithinway ishay awfulyay andhay
Ethay arkmay ofyay overeignsay owerpay, ishay agicmay andway;
Ithway isthay ehay awsdray ethay ostghay omfray ollowhay avesgray;
Ithway isthay ehay ivesdray emthay omfray ethay Ygianstay avesway:
* * * *
Usthay arm’dyay, ethay odgay eginsbay ishay airyyay ace,vray Andyay ivesdray ethay ackingray
oudsclay alongyay ethay iquidlay acespay.”

Ydendray.

 [295] Inyay eferenceray otay ethay olewhay enescay atthay ollowsfay, ethay emarksray ofyay
 Oleridgecay areyay ellway orthway eadingray:—
 y“bay ayay oseclay udystay ofyay ifelay, andyay ybay ayay uetray andyay aturalnay odemay ofyay
 expressingyay everythingyay, Omerhay asway enabledyay otay enturevay uponyay ethay ostmay
 eculiarpay andyay ifficultday ituationssay, andyay otay extricateyay imselfhay omfray
 emthay ithway ethay ompletestcay uccesssay. Ethay olewhay enescay etweenbay Achillesyay
 andyay Iampray, enwhay ethay atterlay omescay otay ethay Eekgray ampcay orfay ethay urposepay
 ofyay edeemingray ethay odybay ofyay Ectorhay, isyay atyay onceyay ethay ostmay ofoundlypray
 ilfulskay, andyay yetyay ethay implestsay andyay ostmay affectingyay assagepay inyay ethay
 Iliadyay. Uinctilianqay ashay akentay oticenay ofyay ethay ollowingfay eechspay ofyay
 Iampray, ethay etoricalrhay artificeyay ofyay ichwhay isyay osay anscendenttray, atthay ifyay
 eniusgay idday otnay oftenyay, especiallyyay inyay oratoryyay, unconsciouslyyay ulfilfay
 ethay ostmay ubtlesay eceptspray ofyay iticismcray, eway ightmay ebay inducedyay, onyay isthay
 accountyay aloneyay, otay onsidercay ethay astlay ookbay ofyay ethay Iliadyay asyay atwhay isyay
 alledcay uriousspay, inyay otheryay ordsway, ofyay aterlay ateday anthay ethay estray ofyay ethay
 oempay. Observeyay ethay exquisiteyay astetay ofyay Iampray inyay occupyingyay ethay indmay ofyay
 Achillesyay, omfray ethay outsetyay, ithway ethay imageyay ofyay ishay atherfay; inyay
 aduallygray introducingyay ethay arallelpay ofyay ishay ownyay ituationsay; andyay,
 astlylay, entioningmay Ector’shay amenay enwhay ehay erceivespay atthay ethay erohay isyay
 oftenedsay, andyay enthay onlyyay inyay uchsay ayay annermay asyay otay atterflay ethay idepray ofyay
 ethay onquerorcay. Ethay egoyay eleeinoterosd’ay erpay, andyay ethay apusatoyay aechayay
 erontagay, areyay otnay exactlyyay ikelay ethay onetay ofyay ethay earlieryay artspay ofyay ethay
 Iliadyay. Eythay areyay almostyay ootay inefay andyay atheticpay. Ethay olewhay assagepay
 efiesday anslationtray, orfay erethay isyay atthay aboutyay ethay Eekgray ichwhay ashay onay
 amenay, utbay ichwhay isyay ofyay osay inefay andyay etherealyay ayay ubtletysay atthay ityay ancay
 onlyyay ebay eltfay inyay ethay originalyay, andyay isyay ostlay inyay anyay attemptyay otay
 ansfusetray ityay intoyay anotheryay anguage.”—coleridgelay, pay. 195.

 [296] achilles“ay’ erociousfay eatmenttray ofyay ethay orpsecay ofyay Ectorhay annotcay
 utbay offendyay asyay eferredray otay ethay odernmay andardstay ofyay umanityhay. Ethay eroichay
 ageyay, oweverhay, ustmay ebay udgedjay ybay itsyay ownyay oralmay awslay. Etributiveray
 engeancevay onyay ethay eadday, asyay ellway asyay ethay ivinglay, asway ayay utyday inculcatedyay ybay
 ethay eligionray ofyay osethay arbarousbay imestay ichwhay otnay onlyyay aughttay atthay evilyay
 inflictedyay onyay ethay authoryay ofyay evilyay asway ayay olacesay otay ethay injuredyay anmay; utbay
 ademay ethay elfareway ofyay ethay oulsay afteryay eathday ependentday onyay ethay atefay ofyay ethay
 odybay omfray ichwhay ityay adhay eparatedsay. Encehay ayay enialday ofyay ethay itesray
 essentialyay otay ethay oul’ssay admissionyay intoyay ethay oremay avouredfay egionsray ofyay
 ethay owerlay orldway asway ayay uelcray unishmentpay otay ethay andererway onyay ethay earydray
 oresshay ofyay ethay infernalyay iverray. Ethay omplaintcay ofyay ethay ostghay ofyay Atrocluspay
 otay Achillesyay, ofyay utbay ayay iefbray ostponementpay ofyay ishay ownyay obsequiesyay, owsshay
 owhay efficaciousyay eirthay efusalray otay ethay emainsray ofyay ishay estroyerday ustmay
 avehay eenbay inyay atiatingsay ethay irstthay ofyay evengeray, ichwhay, evenyay afteryay eathday,
 asway upposedsay otay ormenttay ethay ellersdway inyay Adeshay. Encehay eforebay yieldingyay
 upyay ethay odybay ofyay Ectorhay otay Iampray, Achillesyay asksyay ardonpay ofyay Atrocluspay orfay
 evenyay isthay artialpay essioncay ofyay ishay ustjay ightsray ofyay etribution.”—mureray,
 olvay. iyay. 289.

 [297] Uchsay asway ethay atefay ofyay Astyanaxyay, enwhay Oytray asway akentay.

ere“hay, omfray ethay ow’rtay ybay ernstay Ulyssesyay ownthray,
Andromacheyay ewail’dbay erhay infantyay onsay.”

Errick’smay Yphiodorustray, vay. 675.

 [298] Ethay ollowingfay observationsyay ofyay Oleridgecay urnishfay ayay ostmay allantgay
 andyay interestingyay iewvay ofyay Elen’shay aracterchay—
 ew“fay ingsthay areyay oremay interestingyay anthay otay observeyay owhay ethay amesay andhay
 atthay ashay ivengay usyay ethay uryfay andyay inconsistencyyay ofyay Achillesyay, ivesgay usyay
 alsoyay ethay onsummatecay eleganceyay andyay endernesstay ofyay Elenhay. Eshay isyay
 oughthray ethay Iliadyay ayay enuinegay adylay, acefulgray inyay otionmay andyay eechspay,
 oblenay inyay erhay associationsyay, ullfay ofyay emorseray orfay ayay aultfay orfay ichwhay
 igherhay owerspay eemsay esponsibleray, yetyay atefulgray andyay affectionateyay
 owardstay osethay ithway omwhay atthay aultfay adhay ommittedcay erhay. Iyay avehay alwaysyay
 oughtthay ethay ollowingfay eechspay inyay ichwhay Elenhay amentslay Ectorhay, andyay
 intshay atyay erhay ownyay invidiousyay andyay unprotectedyay ituationsay inyay Oytray, asyay
 almostyay ethay eetestsway assagepay inyay ethay oempay. Ityay isyay anotheryay ikingstray
 instanceyay ofyay atthay efinementray ofyay eelingfay andyay oftnesssay ofyay onetay ichwhay
 osay enerallygay istinguishday ethay astlay ookbay ofyay ethay Iliadyay omfray ethay
 est.”—classicray Oetspay, pay. 198, eqsay.

 [299] and“ay erehay eway artpay ithway Achillesyay atyay ethay omentmay estbay alculatedcay otay
 exaltyay andyay urifypay ouryay impressionyay ofyay ishay aracterchay. Eway adhay accompaniedyay
 imhay oughthray ethay effervescenceyay, undulationsyay, andyay inalfay ubsidencesay ofyay
 ishay ormystay assionspay. Eway ownay eavelay imhay inyay eposeray andyay underyay ethay ullfay
 influenceyay ofyay ethay oremay amiableyay affectionsyay, ilewhay ouryay admirationyay ofyay ishay
 eatgray ualitiesqay isyay astenedchay ybay ethay eflectionray atthay, ithinway ayay ewfay
 ortshay aysday ethay ightymay eingbay inyay omwhay eythay ereway unitedyay asway imselfhay otay ebay
 uddenlysay utcay offyay inyay ethay ullfay igourvay ofyay eirthay exerciseyay.
 Ethay equentfray andyay ouchingtay allusionsyay, interspersedyay oughoutthray ethay
 Iliadyay, otay ethay eedyspay erminationtay ofyay itsyay ero’shay oursecay, andyay ethay
 oralmay onyay ethay anityvay ofyay umanhay ifelay ichwhay eythay indicateyay, areyay amongyay
 ethay inestfay evidencesyay ofyay ethay iritspay ofyay ethicyay unityyay ybay ichwhay ethay
 olewhay ameworkfray ofyay ethay oempay isyay united.”—mureyay, olvay. iyay. pay 201.

 [300] Owpercay ays,—“isay annotcay aketay ymay eavelay ofyay isthay oblenay oempay ithoutway
 expressingyay owhay uchmay Iyay amyay uckstray ithway ethay ainplay onclusioncay ofyay ityay. Ityay isyay
 ikelay ethay exityay ofyay ayay eatgray anmay outyay ofyay ompanycay, omwhay ehay ashay entertainedyay
 agnificentlymay; eithernay ompouspay ornay amiliarfay; otnay ontemptuouscay, yetyay
 ithoutway uchmay eremonycay.” Oleridgecay, pay. 227, onsiderscay ethay erminationtay
 ofyay aradise“pay Ostlay” omewhatsay imilarsay.
